Abraham tapa, David tapa, Jesu Khrist kh: Abraham in Isaak a hing a; Isaak in Jakob a hing a; Jakob in Juda leh a sanggamte a hing a;
Huleh Juda in Tamar lahah Phares leh Zara a hing a; Phares in Esrom a hing a; Esrom in Aram a hing a;
Huleh Aram in Aminadab a hing a; Aminadab in Naasson a hing a; Naasson in Salmon a hing a;
Huleh Salmon in Rahab lahah Boaz a hing a; Boaz in Ruth lahah Obed a hing a; Obed in Jesse a hing a;
Jesse in kumpipa David a hing a, Kumpipa David in Uria ji lahah Solomon a hing a.
Huleh Solomon in Rehoboam a hing a; Rehoboam in Abia a hing a; Abia in Asa a hing a;
Huleh Asa in Jehosaphat a hing a; Jehosaphat in Joram a hing a; Joram in Ujia a hing a;
Huleh Ujia in Joatham a hing a; Joatham in Achaz a hing a; Achaz in Ezekia a hing a;
Huleh Ezekia in Manasseh a hing a; Manasseh in Amon a hing a; Amon in Josia a hing a;
Huleh Josia in Babylon gama a puimang laiun Jekonia leh a sanggamte a hing a;
Huleh Babylon lama a puimang nungun Jekonia in Salathiel a hing a; Salathiel in Zerubbabel a hing a;
Huleh Zerubbabel in Abiud a hing a; Abiud in Eliakim a hing a; Eliakim in Azor a hing a;
Huleh Azor in Sadok a hing a; Sadok in Akim a hing a; Akim in Eliud a hing a;
Huleh Eliud in Eleazar a hing a; Eleazar in Matthan a hing a; Matthan in Jakob a hing a;
Huleh Jakob in Mari pasal Joseph a hing a; hu Mari apatin Khrist kichi Jesu chu ahung piangta hi.

Huchi'n khang zousiah chu Abraham apat David chiang khang sawmleli; huleh David apat Babylon gam a, a puimang chiang uh khang sawmleli; huleh Babylon gama, a puimang vapat Khrist chiang khang sawmleli ahi.
Huchi'n Jesu Khrist hung piandan chu hichi ahi; A nu Mari chu Joseph toh a kikhaam laiun, a umkhawm ma un, Hagau Siangthou apat gaai chih a kihedohta a.
Huin a pasal Joseph chu midihtah ahi a, zapi heet a um diing ut louin a guuha khul a tumta a.

Hizongleh ama’n hi thute a ngaihtuah laiin, a mang in Lalpa angel a kawmah ahung kilaah a, "Joseph, nang David tapa, na ji Mari kiteenpih diing lau sin; ajiahchu a naupaai hi Hagau Siangthou apat ahi.
Tapa ahung nei diing a, a min Jesu na sa diing hi ajiahchu Ama’n a mite a sualna vapat a hundam diing hi," a chi hi.

Huleh hi sil zousiah chu Lalpa’n zawlnei kama ana soite a taangtunna diing a hung um ahi. 
MAT.1.23	Ngai un, nungaah siangthou a gaai diing a, tapa a nei diing a, a min Immanuel a chi diing uh, huchu i kawmah Pathian a um chihna ahi.
Huin Joseph chu ihmu a thou a, Lalpa angel in thu a piah bangin a bawl a, a ji chu a kiteenpihta hi.
Hizongleh amahnu in a tapa masapen ahung neihkhiah masiah a luppih sih; huleh a min Jesu a sata hi.
Huchi'n kumpipa Herod lal laia Judia gam a Bethlehem khua a Jesu ahung pian in, ngai un, suahlam akipanin mipilte Jerusalem ah a hung va
Khoiah ahiai Judate Kumpipa piang chu? Suahlam ah a aahsi ka mu va, amah be diing a hung ka hi uh, a chi va.
Kumpipa Herod in hichu a zaah tahin a lungdong a, huleh Jerusalem a mi zousiah zong amah toh a lungdong uhi.
Huleh siampu lalte leh mite lehkhagialtute zousiah a koukhawm a, Khrist pianna diing khoitah ahiai chih a dong a.
Huleh amahun a kawmah, Judia gam a Bethlehem khua ah; ajiahchu zawlnei in hichibangin ana gial hi,
Nang Juda gam a Bethlehem, Juda khopite lahah na neupen hial sih hi; ajiahchu na sung apatin optu hungdoh diing ahi, ka mi Israel veengtu diingin, chi'n, a chi va.
Huin Herod in mipilte a guuh kouh a, aahsi kilat hun a dong chianta a;
Huleh amahuh chu Bethlehem ah a sawl a, "Chiah unla naungeeh thu chiantahin va kankhia un; huleh na muhtah chiangun kei zong ka hung biah ve theihna diingin hung hilh kiit un," a chi a
Amahun kumpipa thu a zaah zohun a kipankheta va; huleh ngai in, suahlama a muh uh aahsi chu naungeeh umna tung zawn a tun a, a khawl masiah a ma vah a pai jel hi
Amahun aahsi chu a muhun nasatahin a kipaah uhi.
Huleh inn sungah a luut va, naungeeh a nu Mari toh um chu a mu va, huleh a khupboh va, a beta uhi; huleh a goubawmte uh hong in a kawmah sana leh, begaw leh murrah kipaahna in a pia uhi.
Huleh Herod kawma kilehkiit lou diing a Pathian in a mang va a thuhilh jiahin lampi tuam juiin a kholam vah a chiahta uhi.

Huleh amahuh a chiah nungin, ngai in, Lalpa angel chu Joseph kawmah a mang in a kilaah a, "Thou inla, naungeeh leh a nu pui inla, Aigupta gam ah tai in, huleh ka hung hilh kiit masiah hutah ah um zing in: ajiahchu Herod in naungeeh chu suhlup diing a hawl diing ahi," a chi a
Huleh amah chu a thoh in naungeeh leh a nu chu a pui a, ajan ajan in Aigupta lamah a chiahta hi.
Huleh Herod a sih masiah hutah ah a um zing a; Lalpa’n zawlnei kama, "Aigupta gam apat ka Tapa ka koudohta," chia a soi ahung taangtun theihna diingin.

Huin Herod in mipilte’n a heem uh chih a heet in nasatahin a lungthah a, huchi'n mi a sawl a, mipilte kawma a hun thu a dohchian bangtahin Bethlehem leh a kiimvel zousiah a naupang kum nih leh a nuailam zousiah a thatta hi.
Hulaiin zawlnei Jeremiah in hichibanga ana soi chu ahung taangtungta hi,
Rama khua ah thawm a kija, misi ngaia kah leh maauna nasatah bang, Rachel in a tate a kah a, a um nawn louh jiahun a hamuantheihta sih, a chih chu.
Hizongleh Herod a sih phetin, ngai in, Aigupta gam ah Lalpa angel khat Joseph kawmah a mang in a kilaah a,
Thou inla, naungeeh leh a nu chu pui inla, Israel gam ah chiah in; ajiahchu naungeeh thah tumte a sita uh, a chi a
Huin amah chu a thou a, naungeeh leh a nu chu a pui a, Israel gam ah a hungta hi.
Hizongleh Arkelaus chu Judia gam ah a pa Herod munah a lal hi chih a jahin hu lamah a chiah ngamta sih a, a manga Pathian in a thuhilh jiahin Galili gam lamah a kilehheita hi.
Huleh a hung a Nazareth kichi khopi khat ah a teengta hi: zawlneite’n, Amah chu Nazareth mi a chi diing uh, chia a soi uh a taangtun theihna diingin.
Hu hun laiin Baptistu John chu Judia gamdai ah thu soi in a hung a,
Kisiih un; ajiahchu vaan lalgam a naita hi, chia soi in.
Amah chu ahi, zawlnei Isaiah in, Gamdaai a mi kikou aw in, 'Lalpa lamlian sial unla, a lampite hihtang un,' a chi hi, chia ana soi chu.
Huleh hu John in chu sangawngsaau mul puan a silh a, a kawng savun kawnggaah in a gaah a; huleh a an chu khaukhup leh gam khuaizu ahi.
Huin Jerusalem leh Judia gam pumpi leh Jordan kiimvela umte zousiah a kawmah a chiah va,
A sualte uh thupha tawi in Jordan lui ah amah baptisma tansah in a umta uhi.
Hizongleh ama’n Pharisaite leh Sadukaite tampi a kawma baptisma tang diing a hung a muh tahin, a kawm vah, Guul suante aw, lungthahna hung tung diing taisan diingin kua’n ahung thuhilh ei?
Hujiahin kisiihna min putaahin gah suang un;
Huleh Abraham ka pu uh ahi chi'n kingaihtuah sih un; ajiahchu Pathian in hi suang te haw Abraham tate in a dingsah thei hi, chih ka hung hilh ahi.
Huleh tuin zong singbul chinah heita koih ahita hi; hujiahin sing chin gah hoiha gah lou photmah chu kiphuuha mei a kipaailuut veu ahi.

Ke'n chu kisiihna diingin tui in ka hung baptis ngei a; hizongleh ka nunga hungpa chu kei sangin a loupizaw a, A keengtophah tawi taah zong ka hi sih hi; Ama’n chu Hagau Siangthou leh mei in nanguh ahung baptis diing hi.
A khut in a pasiseep a tawi a, a phual chu a japsiang tinten diing; huleh a buhte chu a pangah a koihkhawm diing a; hizongleh a sii chu mei mitthei lou in a haaltum diing hi, a chi hi.
Huin Jesu chu John kawma baptisma tang diingin Galili gam a kipanin Jordan lui ah a kawmah a hung a;
Hizongleh John in, "Kei na hung baptis kiphamohzaw hi’ng a, nang kei kawma hung na hi maw?" chi'n ana khaam hi.
Huleh Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Tuin chu huchih diing lemsa haam in; ajiahchu huchibanga dihtatna zousiah bawl bukim chu ei diing a kilawm ahi, a chi a. Huin lem a sata hi.
Huleh Jesu chu baptisma a tan zohin tui a kipanin a pawtdohpah a; huleh, ngai in, vaan amah diingin ahung kihong a, Pathian Hagau chu vakhu banga hung kumsuh in a tunga hungtu chu a mu a;
Huleh ngai in, vaan a kipanin aw in, "Hi ka Tapa deihtah, ka kipaahna mahmah ahi, a chi hi.
Hu nungin Jesu chu diabol heema um diingin gamdai ah Hagau puiluut in a umta a.
Huleh suun sawmli leh jan sawmli an ngawla a um nungin a gil ahung kialta a.
Huin heemtu chu a hung a, a kawmah, Pathian Tapa na hih leh hi suang te tanghou suaah diingin thu pia in," a chi a.
Hizongleh ama’n a dawng a, Mihing tanghou chauh in a hing sih diing a, Pathian kama thu chin pawt in a hing zaw diing chih gelh ahi, a chi hi
Huin diabol in amah chu khopi siangthou ah a puitou a, Pathian biahinn siipzum ah a koih a,

Huleh a kawmah, Pathian Tapa na hih leh kikekhesah in; ajiahchu hichibanga gelh ahi, Ama’n na tungtaang thu ah a angelte thu a pe diing a, a khut un ahung dom diing uh; huchilou inchu na keeng in suang khat na suikha zenzen diing, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Lalpa na Pathian ze-et sin chih gelh ahi jel hi, a chi a.
Huleh diabol in amah chu taang saangpi khat tungah a pui kiit a, khovel lalgam zousiah leh a loupina uh a ensah a;
Huleh a kawmah, Khupbohin hung be lechin hite zousiah ka hung pe diing hi, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, Hitah apatin chiah mang in, Setan; Lalpa na Pathian chu na biah diing a, amah nna chauh natoh diing ahi, chih gelh ahi, a chi hi.
Huzohin diabol in a nuseta a, huleh ngai in, angelte a hung va, a nna a tohsahta uhi.
Huchi'n John ankuang ah a khum uh chih Jesu’n a jah tahin Galili gam lamah a chiahta a.
Huleh Nazareth khua nusia in, Zebulon leh Nephthalim gamkaih sunga um tuipi gei a um Kapernaum khua ah a va teengta hi.
Zawlnei Isaiah in hichibanga ana thusoite ahung taangtun theihna diingin ahi,
Tuipi lama Jordan gaal a, Zebulon gam leh Nephthalim gam, Jentelte Galili;
Mial a tou mite’n vaah loupitah a mu uh; huleh sihna gam leh liima toute tungah vaah ahung suaahta hi, a chih chu, chi'n.
Hu huna kipanin Jesu in, Kisiih un; ajiahchu vaan lalgam a naita hi, chi'n thusoi a panta a.
Huleh Jesu’n, Galili tuipi geia a vaah laiin, Peter kichi Simon leh, a sanggampa Andru tuipi a leensep a um a mu a; ajiahchu amahuh ngaman mi him ahi uhi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Hung jui un, mihing mantuin ka hung siam diing, a chi a.
Huleh amahun a leente uh nusepahin amah a juita uhi.
Huleh hu a kipana chiah jelin, unau dang nih Zebedi tapate Jakob leh a sanggampa John chu a pa uh Zebedi toh kuang sunga a leente uh phoh a um a mu a; huleh amahuh a kou hi.
Huleh amah un kuang leh a pa uh a nusepah va, amah a juita uhi.
Huleh Jesu chu Galili gam pumpi ah a vaah lehleh a, a kikhopna inn bang vah thu a hilh a, lalgam tanchinpha soi in, mite laha natna chinteng leh damlouhna chinteng a sudam jel hi.
Huleh Syria gam pumpi ah a min a thangta a; huleh amahun natna chi tuamtuam a damlou zousiah leh dawi matte, sibup veite leh zengte a kawmah ahung pui va, ama’n ana sudam jel hi.
Huleh Amah chu Galili apat bang, Dekapoli apat bang, Jerusalem apat bang, Judia apat bang leh Jordan gallam apat banga hung mipi nasatahin a jui uhi.
Huleh mipite a muh in taang ah a kaltou a, a tou a, a nungjuite a kawmah a hung va;
Huleh ama’n a kam a kaah a, amahuh thu a hilh a;
Hagau a gentheite a hampha uhi: vaan lalgam amahuh diing ahih jiahin.
Lungngaite a hampha uhi: hamuanna um diing ahih jiahun.
Thunuaigolhte a hampha uhi; Leigou luah diing ahih jiahun.
Dihtatna lama gilkial a dangtaahte a hampha uhi: tai diing ahih jiahun.
Zahngai theite a hampha uhi: zahngaihna tang diing ahih jiahun.
Lungsima siangthoute a hampha uhi; Pathian mu diing ahih jiahun.
Lemna siamtute a hampha uhi; Pathian tate chih a um diing ahih jiahun.
Dihtatna jiaha soih a umte a hampha uhi; vaan lalgam amahuh a diing ahih jiahin.
Mi’n keimah jiaha ahung housiat va, ahung soih va, zuau a gilou chintenga ahung heeh hun chiangun na hampha uhi.
Nuam unla, nasatahin kipaah un; vaan ah na kipaahman diing uh a tam mahmah ngal a; na ma va zawlnei umte zong hitobangin ana sawi veu uhi.
Lei chi na hi uh; hizongleh chi chu data leh bangin a kisu-al kiitta diai? huchia’n a panna a umta sih diing a, paihdoh a mite totchil diing ahi giapta hi.
Khovel vaah na hi uh; taang tunga khopi um chu a kiphual thei sih hi.
Mi’n thaumei de in loh a khuhkhum ngei sih uh, a tunna ah a koih zaw uhi; huchi'n inn sunga mi um zousiah a salhvaah hi.
Hutobangin na vaah uh mi mitmuh in vaah heh, huchi'n amahun na natoh hoihte uh a mu diing va, na Pa uh vaan a um chu a paahtawi thei diing uhi.
Daan thu aha, zawlneite thu aha sumang diing a hung ahi chi'n hung ngaihtuah sih un; a sumang diing a hung ka hi sih a, sutaangtung diing a hung ka hi zaw hi.
Chihtahzetin na kawmvah ka soi ahi, Vaan leh lei a man masiah daan thu a sutvom neucha aha, thaivom neuchakhat zong a mang sih diing, a bawn a, a taangtun kim masiah in.

Hujiahin koipouh hi thupiah neupente laha khat mai zong susia a, hutobanga bawl diing a mite hilh chu vaan lalgam ah mi neupen ahi diing hi; hizongleh koipouh jui a, huleh hutobanga jui diing a mite hilh chu vaan lalgam ah mi lian a chi diing uhi.
Ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, Na dihtatna un lehkhagialtute leh Pharisaite dihtatna a khup louh inchu vaan lalgam ah na luut top sih diing uhi.
Malai mite kawma, 'Tual na thah louh diing ahi; huleh koipouh tual that chu vaihawmna lauthawnghuaitah ah a um diinguh, kichi na zata uhi;

Hizongleh ke’n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, Koipouh a jiah bei a, a unau tunga lungthah chu vaihawmkhumna lauthawnghuaitah ah a um diing; huleh koipouh a unau kawma, 'Raka (Man louh),' chi chu vaihawmtute vaihawmkhumna lauhuaitah ah a um diing; huleh koipouh, 'Nang mingol,' chitu chu gawtmun mei diila paih lauthawnghuaitah ah a um diing uhi.
Hujiahin maitaam bula silpiah diing tawia na hung laitah a na unau in na tungah lunghih louhna a nei chih na heetdoh leh,
Na silpiah diing chu hu maitaam ma ah nusia inla chiah in; huleh na unau toh kilem masaphot inla, huzohchiangin hung inla, na silpiah diing chu pia in.

Na langpa toh lampi a na chiah laiin kitam zohin; huchilou inchu na langpa’n vaihawmtu ahung mansah diing a, vaihawmtu’n mimantu lian kawmah ahung pekhe diing a, huleh mimantu lian in suangkul ah ahung khumkha diing hi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Paihsa san khat tana na piah kim masiah hua kipanin na pawtdoh het sih diing hi.
Malai mite kawma, Na aangkawm louh diing ahi, chia kisoi na zata uh;
Hizongleh ke'n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, Koipouh numei enlahtaha en in a lungsimah amahnu toh a aangkawm zouta ahi.
Huleh na mit jiatlam in ahung sualsah leh kheidoh inla paai mai in; ajiahchu na tahsa pumpi gawtmuna paih ahih sangin na tahsa peng khat manthai chu nang diingin a hoihzaw hi.
Huleh na khut jiatlam in ahung sualsah leh saattan inla paai mai in; ajiahchu na tahsa pumpi gawtmuna paih ahih sangin na tahsa peng khat manthai chu nang diingin a hoihzaw hi.
Mi koipouh in a ji a khul leh khulna lehkha pia heh, ana kichi hi.
Hizongleh ke'n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, Koipouhin mi toh lupkhawm jiah hilou a, a ji a khul leh amahnu chu a aangkawmsah ahi; huleh koipouh hu khulsanu nei chu aangkawm ahi.
Huchiangleh, malai mite kawma, Kihaahsial sih un, amahvang na kichiamnate Lalpa kawmah taangtun zaw in, chia kisoi na zata uh;
Hizongleh ke'n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, Kihaahsial mawngmawng sih un; vaan louin kihaahsial sih un; ajiahchu hichu Pathian laltouphah ahi:
Huleh lei louin kihaahsial sih un; ajiahchu hichu a keeng ngahna ahi: Jerusalem louin kihaahsial sih un; ajiahchu hichu kumpipa loupi khopi ahi.
Na lutang louin kihaahsial sin; ajiahchu samzang khat zong na kaangsah in na vomsah thei sih hi.
Hizongleh na soi chu, Ahihleh hi; Ahihlouhleh hilou, hisah mai in; ajiahchu hi val chu gilou apat hung pawt ahi.
Mit luang in mit, ha luang in ha, ana kichi na zata uh.
Hizongleh ke'n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, Migilou thuh sih un; hizongleh koipouh in na ngeiphe jiatlam a beh leh a lehlam zong doh zaw in.
Huleh mi koipouh in na tunga thusia bawl a, na puannaah laah a tup leh na puanjal zong la sah ngal in.
Huleh koipouh meel khat chiah diing a hung phuut photmah kawmah amah toh meel nih chiah khawm un.
Na kawma ngen chu pia inla, huleh ahung thunglaah ut chu kiheimangsan sin.
Na innveengte lungsiat inla, na meelmate hua in, kichi na zata uhi.

Hizongleh ke'n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, Na meelmate uh lungsiat unla, haamsia hung lohte vangpiah unla, ahung mudahte diingin sil hoih bawlsah unla, huleh ahung bawlsete leh ahung suduhdahte diingin haamteisah un.
Huchi'n na Pa uh vaan a um tate na hi thei diing uhi; ajiahchu ama’n migiloute leh mihoihte tungah a ni a suaahsah a, huleh midihtatte leh midihtatloute tungah zong guah a zusah hi.
Ajiahchu nanguh hung lungsiatte chauh na lungsiat uleh kipaahman bang ahiai na muh diing uh? siahdongte’n zong huchibanga bawl ve hilou ahi viai mah?
Huleh na unaute uh chauh chibai na buuh uleh midang sanga bang ahiai na bawltam tuan uh? siahdongte’n zong huchibanga bawl ve hilou ahi viai mah?
Hujiahin vaan a um na Pa uh a hoihbukim mah bangin nanguh zong hoihbukim un.
Na sil hoih bawlte uh mi muh diing a, a ma va bawl lou diingin pilvaang un; huchilou inchu na Pa uh vaan a um kawmah muh diing kipaahman na nei sih diing uh.

Hujiahin mi kawma sil na piah chiangun milepchiahte’n, mi phat a loh theihna diing va kikhopna inn bang, kholai banga ahih veu bangun, na ma vah pengkuul muut sih un. Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Amahun a kipaahman uh a mu zouta uh.
Hizongleh nang chu mi kawma sil na piah chiangin, na khut jiatlam hih chu na khut veilam hesah sin:
Huchi’n na silpiah chu a guuhin a um thei diing a; huleh na Pa a guuha hung mupa in phuanglaahtahin ahung dit diing hi.

Huleh na haamtei chiangun milepchiahte bangin na hih diing uh ahi sih; ajiahchu amahun mi’n a muh theihna diingin kikhopna innte, kotzing ningkawite banga dingin a haamtei ut sese uh; chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Amah un a kipaahman uh a muta uhi.
Hizongleh nang chu na haamtei chiangin na pindan sungah luut inla, na kot khaah inla, a guuha um na Pa kawmah haamtei in; huchi'n na Pa a guuha hung mupa in phuanglaahtahin ahung dit diing hi.
Hizongleh na haamtei chiangun Jentelte bang in soi nonnon sih un; amahun chu a haam tam jiah va zaaha um diingin a kingaihtuah uh.
Hujiahin amahuh bang sih un: ajiahchu na Pa un amah na nget ma un bang silte ahiai na mamoh uh a he hi.
Huleh nanguh chu hichibangin haamtei un: Ka Pa uh vaan a um, na min kizahtaat heh.
Na lalgam hung tung heh. Na deihzawng vaan a a kibawl bangin, leiah zong kibawl heh.
Ka niteng an neeh uh tuni in hung pia in.
Ka leibate uh ka ngaihdam bangun ka batte uh hung ngaidam in.
Heemna ah hung puiluut sinla, gilou lahah hung hunkhe zaw in: lalgamte, silbawltheihnate, loupinate, kumtuanga nanga ahih jiahin. Amen, chi'n.
Mi a tatsualnate uh na ngaihdam uleh, na Pa uh vaan a um in zong nanguh ahung ngaidam diing hi.
Hizongleh mi a tatsualnate uh na ngaihdamlouh uleh na Pa un zong na tatsualnate uh ahung ngaidam sih diing hi.

Huchiangleh an na ngawl chiangun milepchiahte bangin ngui meel po sih un; amahun chu an ngawla a kilat theihna diingun a maaisuah uh a tuamsah veu uh; chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, amahun a kipaahman uh a muta uhi.
Hizongleh nang chu an na ngawl chiangin na lu sathau nuh inla, na maai phiat in.
Huchi'n na Pa a guuha um mitmuh ah loungal mihing mitmuh a angawl na bat louhna diingin; huleh na Pa a guuha hung mupa in phuanglaahtahin ahung pethuh diing hi.
Lei a leikha leh tui-eeh in a neehsiatna ah leh, gutate’n a pheet vang va a guuh theihna vah gou kikhol sih un;
Hizongleh vaan ah, leikha leh tui-eeh in a neehsiat louhna leh, gutate’n a pheet vang va a guuh louhna vah gou kikhol zaw un.
Ajiahchu na gou uh umna photah na lungsim u’zong a um diing hi.
Sapum vaahna chu mit ahi; hujiahin na mit a dih leh na sapum a vaah veh diing hi.
Hizongleh na mit a dih louh inchu na sapum a mial veh diing hi. Hujiahin na sunga vaah chu mial hitaleh hu mial chu nasa na’n chia!
Mi koimah in houtu nih nna a tongkhawm thei sih; ajiahchu khat mudahin khat a lungsiat diing a, ahihlouhleh khat gum in khat a simmoh diing hi. Pathian leh sum nna na tongkhawm thei sih diing uhi.

Hujiahin ka hung hilh ahi, Bang ahiai ka neeh diing, bang ahiai ka dawn diing, chi'n na hinna uh diing leh bang ahiai ka silh a ka teen diing chi'n na tahsa uh diing lunghimoh sih un. Neeh diing sangin hinna a luulzaw sih eimah? huleh silh leh teen sangin tahsa a luulzaw sih eimah?

Tungleeng vate en un, buh a tuh sih va, aat zong a aat sih uh, huleh buhinn ah zong a sunglut sih uh; ahihvangin na Pa uh vaan a um in amahuh a vaah hi. Nanguh chu amahuh sanga nasataha luulzaw hilou na hi viai mah?
Nanguh lahah kua’n ahiai kingaihtuah jiaha a dung tongkhata behlap thei?
Huleh silh leh teen thu a bang diinga lunghimoh na hi viai? gam a lili paahte khandan ngaihtuah un; tong laha tonggim sih va, pat zong a kheeh sih uh;
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, Solomon hilhial zong a loupina zousiaha a kizepin hite khat tuhin zong zep ahi zou sih hi.
Huchi'n gam a hampa tunia hing a, zinga meikhuuh a paihluut diing bawn Pathian in a huchi zep leh, Aw nanguh gintawmte, ama’n, nanguh husangin ahung zeemzaw tham sih diai mah?
Hujiahin bang ahiai i neeh diing a, bang ahiai i dawn diing; ahihlouhleh bang ahiai i silh diing, chi'n lunghimoh sih un.
(Ajiahchu hi silte zousiah Jentelte’n a hawl uhi), hi silte zousiah na mamoh uh chih na Pa uh vaan um in a he hi.
Hizongleh nangun chu Pathian gam leh a dihtatna hawl masa un; huleh hi silte zousiah piahbeh na hi diing uhi.
Hujiahin zinga diingin lunghimoh sih un; ajiahchu jing in amah a diing ahung kingaihtuah tawm diing hi. Ni khat gimthuaah chu ni khat diingin a hun ahi.
Soisel sih un, soisela na umlouhna diingun.
Na soisel bangmah un soiselin na um diing uh; huleh na tehna ngeimah un ahung tehsah kiit diing uhi.
Huleh bang diinga na mit a innkam ngaihtuah loua, na unau mit a chiangthem um muthei na hiai?
Ahihlouhleh bangchi'n ahiai na unau kawma, Na mit a chiangthem hung lakhesah in, na chih theih diing? ngai in, nang mit ngei ah innkam a um hi.
Nang milepchiah, nangmah mit apat innkam chu lakhe masa in; huchi’n na unau mit a chiangthem laahdoh diing chu na muchian thei diing hi.
Uite kawmah sil siangthou pe sih unla, voh ma-ah zong na tuikep suang uh paai sih un; amahun hute chu a keeng un a chilse diing va, huleh hung kiheiin nanguh ahung baljahkha diing uhi.
Ngen un, piahin na um diing uh; hawl un, na mu diing uh; kiu un, honsah in na um diing uhi.
Ajiahchu a ngen taphot in a tang va, a hawl taphot in a mu va; huleh a kiu taphot chu honsah in a um diing hi.
Ahihlouhleh na lahvah kua’n ahiai a tapa in tanghou ngen henla hileh suang pe diing?
Ahihlouhleh nga ngen henla hileh guul pe diing?
Huchi ahihleh, nanguh migilou in bawn na tate uh sil hoih piahna taang na heet un chu, na Pa uh vaan a um in a kawma ngente sil hoih petham lou diing ahiai mah?
Hujiahin sil zousiah mi’n na tungva a bawl na deih photmah uh, nangun zong hutobangin a tungvah bawl un; huchu daan thu leh zawlneite thu ahi.
Kot geeng ah luut un; ajiahchu manthaina lam chu a kot a gol a, a lampi zong a lian hi, huleh hua luutte chu tam zong a tam uhi:
Hinna a chiahna kot chu a geeng a, a lampi zong a neu a, huleh a mute zong a tawm uhi.
Zawlnei tahloute na lahva belaam vun silha hung a, hizongleh a sungnunglam va ngei haangsantah hingalte lahah pilvaang un.
Amahuh chu a gah un na he diing uhi. Mi’n khau lingnei gui ah grep gah a lou ngei viai mah, ahihlouhleh lenling ah zong theipi a lou ngei viai mah?
Huchimahbangin sing hoih photmah a gah hoih jel a; hizongleh singsia chu a gah a se veu hi.
Singhoih gah a se thei sih a, singsia zong a gah hoih thei boh sih hi.
Sing chin gah hoih lou taphot chu a phuuh va, mei ah a paai uh.
Hujiahin amahuh chu a gah un na he diing uhi.
Lalpa, Lalpa, hung chi nazong vaan lalgam ah a luut sih diing uh; hizongleh ka Pa vaan a um deihzawng bawlte chu a luut diing uhi.
Hu ni chiangleh mi tampi’n, Lalpa, Lalpa, na min in thu ka soi uh hilou ahiai mah? na min in dawite ka nohdoh un, na min in silmah tampi ka bawl uh hilou ahiai mah? a chi diing uhi.
Huchiangin ke’n a kawmvah, Nanguh bangchihmahin ka hung he ngei sih hi; sil gilou bawlte haw, ka kawm apatin chiah mang un, ka chi diing hi.
Hujiahin koipouh hi ka thusoite za a, jui chu mipil suangpi tunga inn bawl toh ka tehkhin diing hi;
Guah ahung zu a, tui ahung liana, huih ahung nunga, hu inn chu ahung muut vah a; hizongleh a puuh sih; suangpi tunga leptouh ahih jiahin.
Huleh mi koipouh hi ka thusoite za a, jui lou photmah chu, mi ngol sehneel tunga inn bawl toh ka tehkhin diing hi:
Guah ahung zu a, tui ahung lian a, huih ahung nung a, hu inn chu ahung nam vah a; a puuhta; hu a puuh git chu a ngaih ngeel hi, a chi a.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu’n hite a soi zohin, mipi’n a thuhilh chu limdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Ajiahchu ama’n lehkhagialtute bang loua, thuneitah bangin amahuh thu a hilh hi.
Huleh taang a kipata ahung paisuh in mipi nasatah in amah a jui va.
Huleh ngai in, miphaah khat a kawmah a hung a, amah chibai a buuha, Lalpa, na ut in chu na hung susiangthou thei hi, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a khut aha a, a khoih a, Ka ut hi, siangthouta in, a chi a. Huin a phaah chu a siangthoupah ngal hi.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmah, Koimah na hilh louh diing ahi; hizongleh chiah inla siampu va kimusah in, huleh amahuh heetsahna diing a Mosi’n thu a piah sillat ding chu va pia in, a chi hi.
Huleh Jesu Kepernaum a, a luut in, a kawm ah sepaih zahoutu khat a hung a, amah ahung ngen a,
Lalpa, ka suaahpa chu zeng in inn ah a lum a, nasataha suhnat in a um hi, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, Ka hung diing a ka sudam diing, a chi a.
Sepaih zahoutu’n a dawng a, Lalpa, ka inn sunga na hung luutnataah ka hi sih hi; thu chauh soi in, huchi'n ka suaahpa chu a dam mei diing.

Ajiahchu kei zong thuneihna nuaia um ka hi a, ka nuaiah sepaihte a um va; huleh khat kawmah, Chiah in, ka chihleh a chiah a, huleh a dang kawmah, Hung in, ka chihleh a hung a; huleh ka suaahpa kawmah, hi bawl in, ka chihleh a bawl jel hi, a chi a.
Jesu’n hi thu a jah tahin, limdang a sa a, amah juite kawmah, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Israelte laha zong hichilawm a ginna lian ka mukha sih.
Huleh ka hung hilh ahi, Suahlam leh tumlam apatin mi tampi a hung diing va, vaan gam ah Abraham toh, Isaak toh, Jakob toh a toukhawm diing uhi.
Hizongleh lalgam tate chu polam mial ah paihdoh in a um diing uh; huah chu kah leh hagawi a um diing hi, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n sepaih zahoutu kawmah, Chiahta in; na gintaat bangin na tungah hung tungta heh, a chi a. Huleh a suaahpa chu hu daah mahin a damta hi.
Huleh Jesu chu Peter inn sungah a luut a, a ji nu khosih a lum a mu a.
Huin ama’n amahnu khut a khoih a, a khosih a phata hi; huin amahnu chu ahung thou a, a nna uh a tohsahta hi.
Huleh nitaahlam ahung hihin a kawmah dawimatte tampi ahung pui va; ama’n a thu in dawite a nohdoh a, damlou zousiah a sudamta hi;
Zawlnei Isaiah in, Amah ngei in i hatlouhnate a la a, i natnate a pua hi, chia a soi chu a taangtun theihna diingin.
Chi’n Jesu in a kiimvela mipi nasatah a muh in, gaal lehlama chiah diing thu a pia a.
Huleh lehkhagialtute khat a hung a, a kawmah, Houtupa, na chiahna photah ka hung jui diing, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Si-aalte’n kua a nei va, tungleeng vate’n bu a nei uh; hizongleh mihing Tapa’n a lu ngahna diing mun a nei sih, a chi a.
Huleh a nungjuite laha midang khat in a kawmah, Lalpa, va chiah a ka pa vui phot diingin hung phalsah in, a chi a.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmah, Hung jui in, misi in a misi uh kivui u’heh, a chi hi.
Huleh kuang a a tuan in nungjuite’n a jui va.
Huleh, ngai in, tuipi ah huihpi nasatahin a nung a, hu tuikinawh in kuang chu ahung tuum a, hizongleh amah chu a ihmu a.
Huin a nungjuite chu a kawm a hung in amah a phawng va, Lalpa, hung hundam in, beimang diing hitalou ka hi u'maw, a chi va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Gin tawmte haw, bang diinga lau na hi viai? a chi a. Huzohin a thou a, huihpi leh tuipi chu a vau a; ahung daai keeita hi.
Huin mite’n chu limdang a sa mahmah va, Hipa hi bangchibang mi ahiai le, huih leh tuipi nasanin a thu a man uh! a chi uhi.
Huleh gaal lehlam Gadara mite gam a tunin, dawimat mi nih, haan apata hungin amah ahung tuaah va, a lauhuai mahmah va, hulam chu koima'n a tawn thei sih uh.
Huleh, ngai in, amahun, Jesu, nang Pathian Tapa, keiuh leh nang bang ahiai kimatna i neih? hunchiam tunma a keiuh gawt diing a hitaha hung na hi maw? chi’n a kikou va.
Huleh a umna apat va gamla simah vohhon tampi a taa va.
Huleh dawite’n a kawma ngen in, Na hung nohdoh leh, hu a vohhon sungah hung luutsah in, a chi va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Chiah un, a chi a. Huleh amahuh chu a hungdoh va, vohhon sungah a luut va; huleh ngai in, hu vohhon chu kawl ah a taikhesuh va, tuipi ah a tailuut va, hu tui ah a sigamta uhi.
Huin a chingtute a tai va, khopi ah a chiah va, sil zousiah leh dawimatte tung a sil hung tungte bang a hilhta uh.
Huleh, ngai in, a khopumpi un Jesu tuaah diingin ahung pawt va; huleh, amah a muh un, a gam vapat pawt diingin nasatahin a ngen uhi.
Huin amah chu kuang sungah a luut a, a gaalkai a, a khopi ah a luutta a.
Huleh, ngai in, mi khat zenga damlou, lupna a lum, a kawmah ahung zawng va; huleh Jesu’n a ginna uh a muh in zenga damloupa kawmah, Tapa, lungmuangtahin um in; na sualnate ngaihdam ahita, a chi a.
Huleh, ngai in, lehkhagialtute khenkhat in a lungsim un, Hipa’n Pathian a soisia hi, a chi va.
Huleh Jesu’n a ngaihtuah uchu he in, Bang diinga na lungtang va sil gilou ngaihtuah na hi viai?
Na sualte ngaihdam ahita, chih leh, Thou inla, keeng in chiah in, chih khoi a baihlamzaw diai? a chi a.
Hizongleh mihing Tapa’n leitung ah sualte ngaihdam theihna a nei chih na heetna diingun, (zeng a damloupa kawmah) Thou inla, na lupna la inla, na inn ah chiahta in, a chi a.
Huin amah chu a thou a, a inn ah a chiahta hi.
Hizongleh mipi’n huchu a muh un, thum ah a sa va, huchibang bawltheihna mihingte kawma petu Pathian a paahtawita uhi.
Huleh Jesu chu hu apatin a pai jel a, mi khat a min Matthai, siah piahna mun a tou a mu a; a kawmah, Hung jui in, a chi a, huleh a thou a, amah a juita hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu an ne diing a a tou leh, ngai in, siahdongtute leh misualte tampi hung in amah leh a nungjuite toh ankuang a uumkhawm uhi.
Huleh Pharisaite’n huchu a muh un, a nungjuite kawmah, Bang diinga na houtupa un siahdongte leh misualte toh an nekhawm ahiai? a chi va.
Hizongleh Jesu’n huchu a jah tahin a kawmvah, Mi damte’n doctor a mamoh sih uh, damloute chauhin a mamoh uhi.
Hizongleh chiah unla, Kithoihna deihlouin zahngaihna ka deih hi, chih umdan va zil un; ajiahchu midihtatte kou diing a hung ka hi sih a, misualte kisiihsah diing a kou a hung ka hizaw hi, a chi hi.
Huin John nungjuite a kawmah a hung va, Bang diinga keiuh leh Pharisaite’n an ngawl veu unga, na nungjuite’n ngawl lou ahi viai? a chi va.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Mouneitu a kawmva a um laisiah, moupuite a dah ngei uh maw? hizongleh mouneitu a lahva kipana laahmang ni ahung tung diing a, huchiangin an a ngawl diing uhi.
Mi koimah in puan lui puan thah them in a phoh ngei sih uh, ajiahchu a phohna in puan chu a luaikeeh zaw diing a, ahung keeh zawsem diing hi.

Mi koimah in uain thah savun thawl lui ah a thun ngei sih uh; huchilou inchu savun thawlte chu a pawhkeeh diing a, uain a kibo diing a, savun thawlte zong a segawp diing hi; hujiahin uain thah chu savun thawl thah ah a thun zaw va, huchi in a nihin a bit tuaah hi, a chi hi.
Hi silte ama’n a kawmva a soi laiin, ngai in, vaihawmtu khat a hung a amah chibai ahung buuh a, Ka tanu tutahin a si hi; hizongleh hung inla, a tungah na khut nga lechin a hing mei diing, a chi a.
Huin Jesu chu a thou a, amah a juita a, huleh a nungjuite’n zong a jui uhi.
Huleh, ngai in, numei khat, kum sawm leh kum nih sipawt a damlou, a nungah ahung pai a, a puan mong a khoih a.
Amahnu’n a lungsim in, A puan chauh khoih leng, ka dam mei diing, chi'n a ngaihtuah ngal a.
Huin Jesu chu a kinunghei a, amahnu a mu a, Tanu, lungmuangtahin um in, na ginna in ahung damsahta hi, a chi a. Huleh hu numeinu chu hu daah apat a damta hi.
Huleh Jesu chu vaihawmtu inn sunga a luut in, silgingthei tumte leh mipi puaah vengvung a mu a,
A kawmvah, Hung ot un; naupangnu chu a si sih hi, ihmu ahi zaw, a chi a. Huin amah a nuihsan giap va.
Hizongleh mipite sawldoh a, a um nungin, a luut a, amahnu chu a khut in a tu a, huchi’n naupangnu chu ahung thouta hi.
Huin hi thu chu hu gam pumpi ah a thangsuaahta hi.
Huleh Jesu hutah apat a pawt in, mittaw nih in a jui va, David Tapa, ka tungvah zahngai in, chi'n a kikou va.
Huleh inn sunga a luut in, hu mittawte chu a kawmah a hung va; huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, hi bawl thei in na hung gingta uh maw? a chi a. Amahun a kawmah, Gingta e, Lalpa, a chi va.
Huin ama’n a mit uh a khoih a, Na gintaat bang un na tungvah tungta heh, a chi a.
Huin a mit uh ahung vaahta a; huin Jesu’n koima hesah lou diingin amahuh a khap a.
Hizongleh amahuh chu a pawt va, hu gam pumpi ah a min a soithangta uhi.
Huleh amahuh a pawt laiun, ngai in, mi haamthei lou dawimat khat a kawmah ahung pui va.
Huleh dawi chu a nohdoh tahin, haamthei lou chu a hung haamta a; huin mipite’n thum ah a sa mahmah va, Israelte lahah hitobang sil a kimu ngei sih, a chi va.
Hizongleh Pharisaite’n chu, dawimangpa jala dawite a nohdoh ahi, a chita va.
Huleh Jesu’n a kikhopna inn bang va thuhilh in, lalgam tanchinpha chu soi in, damlouhna chinteng leh natna chinteng sudam in, khopi leh khoneute zousiah ah a vaahleh hi.
Hizongleh ama’n mipite a muh in, a chingtu bei belaamte banga, chau leh kithehdalh a, a um jiahun a hehpih mahmah a.
Huin ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, Buh laah diing a tam mahmah a, hizongleh a natongtute a tawm hi.
Hujiahin a buh la diing a natongtute hung sawldoh diingin buh Neitupa kawmah ngen un, a chi hi.
Huleh ama’n a nungjui sawmlenihte a kouh zohin, a kawmvah dawiniinte nohdoh theihna leh damlouhna chinteng leh natna chinteng suhdam theihna thuneihna a pia hi.
Sawlleh sawmlenihte min chu hite ahi: A masapen in, Simon, Peter kichipa leh a unau Andru; Zebedi tapa Jakob leh a unau John:
Philip leh Bartholomai; Thoma leh siahdongtu Matthai; Alphai tapa Jakob leh Lebbai, a mintah Thaddai;
Kananmi Simon leh a mansahtu Juda Iskariot bang.
Hi sawmlenihte chu Jesu’n a sawldoh a, amahuh chu thu a pia a, Jentelte lampi ah chiah sih unla, Samarite khopi sungah zong luut hial sih un;
Ahihvangin, Israel innkuan belaam mangte kawmah chiah zaw un.
Huleh na chiah kawmun, Vaan lalgam a naita hi, chi’n soi jel un.
Damloute sudam unla, phaahte susiangthou unla, misite kaithou unla, dawite nohdoh un; a thawn in na mu va, a thawn in pia un.
Na dangka-ip sungvah, sana, dangka, huleh sumeng bangmah guang sih un,
Na zinna va diingin sakhau aha, puannaah nih aha, kengtophah aha, chiang aha keng sih un; ajiahchu natongtu chu a neeh mutaah ahi.
Huleh na chiahna va, khopi sung hi’n, khoneu sung hileh na luutna phot vah, na tunna diing taah uh mi kandoh unla, na chiahkhiah masiah uh hutahah um zing un.
Huleh inn sung khat a na luut chiang uleh, chibai buuh un.
Huleh hu inn sung in a taah leh, na hamuanna u’chu a tungah um heh; hizongleh a taah louh uleh na hamuanna u’chu na kawmvah hung kiihkiit heh.
Huleh koipouh nanguh hung kipaahpih lou a, na thute uh ngaikhe lou chu, hu inn aha, hu khua aha apat na pawt chiangun na keeng va leivui thingkhia un.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Vaihawm ni chiangin, hu khopi thuaah diing sangin Sodom leh Gommorrah thuaah diing chu adan a um zaw diing hi.
Ngai un, ngeite laha belaam um bangin ka hung sawl ahi; hujiahin guul bangin pil unla, vakhu banga poikhoih louin um un.
Hizongleh mite lahah kiveeng un; ajiahchu amahun vaihawmte ahung mansah diing va, a kikhopna inn bang vah ahung vosah diing uh;
Huleh keimah jiahin gamoptute leh kumpite ma ah, amah uh leh Jentelte heetsahna diingin ahung pui diing uhi.
Hizongleh ahung matsah chiangun, bangchia bang soi diing ka hiai, chi’n lungkham sih un; na soi diing uh a huntaha hung kihilh diing na hi ngal va.
A soitu chu nanguh na hi sih diing va, na Pa uh Hagau in nanguh ah a soi zaw diing ahih jiahin.
Huleh unau in unau, pa’n a ta thah diingin a mansah diing; huleh tate’n zong a nu leh pate uh a dou diing va, a thatsah diing uhi.
Huleh ka min jiahin mi zousiah huat na hi diing uhi; hizongleh a tawp donga thuaah mualsuaah chu hutdam in a um diing uh.
Hizongleh hi khopi a ahung sawi chiangun, kho dang ah tailuut un; chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mihing Tapa hung ma in Israel khua zousiah na tuan suaah sih diing uhi.
Nungjui chu houtu tungah a um ngei sih a, suaah zong a pu tungah a um ngei sih hi.
Nungjui chu a houtu banga ahung um a, suaah chu a pu banga ahung um a hun ahi. Amahun inn neitupa bawn Beelzebul a chih uleh, a innkuante chu bang chituhin ahiai a chih taah diing uh?
Hujiahin amah uh haw lau sih un; ajiahchu lang lou diing a kiphual bangmah a um sih a; heet louh diing a iim zong bangmah a um sih hi.
Mial a nanguh ka hung hilh chu vaah ah soi unla: huleh na bil kawmva na jah uh chu inn tungah taangkoupih un.
Huleh tahsa that thei a, hagau that thei lou haw chu lau sih un; hizongleh hagau leh tahsa a nih a gawtmun a sumang theitu amah chu lau zaw un.
Kawlgit nih paisa khat in a kizuah veu hilou maw? ahihvangin a lahva khat zong na Pa uh heet louhin tual ah a ke sih diing hi.
Na lutungva samzangte nasan simveh ahi.
Hujiahin lau sih un, kawlgit tampi sangin na luul zaw uh ahi.
Hujiahin koipouh mite ma a hung gum chu, ke'n zong vaan a ka Pa ma ah amah ka gum diing hi.
Hizongleh koipouh mite ma a hung kiheetmohbawl chu, kei zong vaan a ka Pa ma-ah ka kiheetmohbawl diing hi.
Leitung a lemna leengsah diing a hung pai hung sa sih un; lemna leengsah diing a hung ka hi sih a, temsaau leengsah diing a hung ka hi zaw hi.
Ajiahchu tapa’n a pa, tanu’n a nu, huleh mou in a innpinu dousah diing a hung ka hi.
Huleh mi a melma chu amah innkuante ngei ahi diing hi.
Koipouh a pa aha, a nu aha keimah sanga lungsiat zaw chu ka mi hitaah ahi sih: huleh a tapa aha, a tanu aha keimah sanga lungsiat zaw chu ka mi hitaah ahi sih.
Huleh koipouh a kros pua a, hung jui lou chu, ka mi hitaah ahi sih hi.
Koipouh a hinna mu in a taan diing a; huleh koipouh keimah jiaha a hinna taan in a mu diing hi.
Koipouh nanguh hung kipaahpih chu kei hung kipaahpih a hi a, huleh koipouh keimah hung kipaahpih chu kei hung sawlpa kipaahpih ahi.
Koipouh zawlnei chu zawlnei ahih jiaha kipaahpih in zawlnei kipaahman a mu diing; huleh midihtat chu midihtat ahih jiaha kipaahpih in midihtat kipaahman a mu diing.
Huleh koipouh hi mi neutahte laha khat nungjui ahih jiaha tuisih nou khat chauh pia in zong, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, a kipaahman muh diing chu a taan hial sih diing hi, a chi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu’n a nungjui sawmlenihte thu a piah zohin, hu apatin khuate a thuhilh diing leh thusoi diingin a chiahta hi.
Huin John in suangkul sung apat Khrist natohte ana jah in, amah nungjuite nih a sawl a,
A kawmah, A hung diingpa na hiai mah, ahihlouhleh a dang khat ngaah diing ka hi viai mah? a va chisah a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Chiah unla, na jah uleh na muh uh John va hilh un;

Mittawte mit ahung vaahta a, keengbaite a chiah theita va, phaahte ahung siangthouta va, bilngongte’n khua a ja theita va, misite kaihthoh in a umta va, huleh migentheite’n tanchinpha soi a dongta uhi.
Huleh koipouh keimah a lunghihlouhna mu lou chu a hampha hi, a chi a.
Huin amahuh a chiah tahun, Jesu’n mipi kawmah John thu a soi panta a, Bang en diing a gamdai a chiahdoh na hi viai? sialluang huih muut liing maw?
Ahihlouhleh, bang en diing a chiahdoh na hi viai? Puannem silh mi khat maw? ngai in puannem silhte chu kumpite inn ah ahi a um uh
Ahihlouhleh bang en diing a chiahdoh na hi viai? zawlnei en diingin maw? ahi, ka hung hilh ahi, zawlnei sanga zong loupizaw ahi.
Ajiahchu, "Ngai in, ka thangkou na ma ah ka sawl a, ama’n na ma ah na lampi a bawl diing hi, chia a thu kigial chu amah ahi".
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Numei sunga piang lahah Baptistu John sanga lianzaw a piang nai sih; ahihvangin vaan lalgam a mi neupen zong amah sangin a lianzaw hi.
Huleh Baptistu John um apat tutanin vaan lalgam in pawngbawlna a thuaah zing ahi, huleh pawngbawlte’n haat thuin a la veu uhi
Ajiahchu zawlneite zousiah leh daan thu in John hung um tanphain ana soilawhta ahi.
Huleh nangun na pom nuam uleh, hichu Elijah hung diingpa khu ahi.
Koipouh jahna diing a bil nei in ja heh.
Hizongleh tulai khang thahte hi bangtoh ka tehkaah diai? hichu naupang dawlmun a tou a, a lawmte kou a,
Theile hung muutsah unga lah, laam lou u’china, huleh kap unga lah, na hung dahpih sih uh, chite bang ahi uh.
Ajiahchu John a hung a, ne in a dawn sih a, Dawi nei ahi, a chi va.
Mihing Tapa a hung a, a ne in a dawn a, En un, an haipa, uain haipa, siahdongte leh misualte lawmpa, a chi uh, hizongleh pilna chu a natohte’n a siamtan hi, a chi hi.
Huleh a kisiih louh jiahun, a sil loupi bawltamna pen khuate chu a taita a:
Korazin, na tung gih e! Bethsaida, na tung gih e! ajiahchu nanguh a sil loupi kibawlte Tura leh Sidon khua a kibawl hileh, saiippuan silh a vut khuh in a kisiihta diing uhi.
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, Vaihawm ni chiangin nanguh thuaah diing sangin Tura leh Sidon kho thuaah diing a dan a um zaw diing.
Huleh nang Kepernaum, vaan tana tawisanga um chu, misi kho tana paihkhiah in ahi na um diing; ajiahchu nangmah a sil loupi kibawlte Sodom khua a kibawl hileh, tuni tanin a um nalai diing hi.
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, Vaihawm ni chiangin nang thuaah diing sangin Sodom kho thuaah diing chu a dan a um zaw diing hi," a chi hi.
Huchihlaiin Jesu’n a dawng a, Aw, Pa, vaan leh lei Lalpa, nang mipil leh misiamte kawmah hi thute na iim a, naupangte kawma na phuan jiahin ka hung phat ahi.
Ahi, Pa, huchibang chu nang ngaihin a hoih ahi.
Ka pa’n sil zousiah ka kawmah ahung pekheta hi; huleh, Pa lou in koima’n Tapa chu a he sih uh; huleh Tapa leh, Tapa’n a kawma a phuan nuamnate chihlouh in koima'n Pa a he sih hi.
Nanguh tonggim leh puaahgih pote zousiah ka kawmah hung un, keima’n khawldamna ka hung pe diing hi.
Ka ngawngkol pua unla, ka kawmah zil un, ajiahchu jainemtah leh lungtang a kingaingiamtah ka hi; huchi’n na hagau diingun khawldamna na mu diing uhi.
Ajiahchu ka ngawngkol a nuam a, ka puaah zong a zang hi, a chi hi.
Huchihlaiin, Jesu chu khawlni’n buhlei lai tawnin a chiah jel a; huleh a nungjuite a gil uh a kial a, buhvuite a sihtan va, a ne panta uh.
Hizongleh Pharisaite’n hichu a muhun, a kawmvah, En ve, na nungjuite’n khawlni’n bawl siang louh a bawl uh, a chi va.
Hizongleh ama’n a kawmvah, David in a gilkial laia a lawite toh a bawl uh simkha lou na hi u'maw?
Huchia Pathian biahinn a, a luut a, amah leh a lawmte neeh siang louh, siampute chauh neeh theih, tanghou siah a neeh uh thu?
Ahihlouhleh khawlni’n Pathian biahinn a siampute’n khawlni a suhbuah unzong siamlouh a tang sih uh chih, daanbu ah na sim sih u'maw?
Hizongleh hi munah Pathian biahinn sanga loupizaw khat a um hi chih ka hung hilh ahi.
Ahihvangin nangun, Kithoihna deih louin zahngaihna ka deih, chih umzia heta hileh u’chin, mohna nei lou chu siamlouh tangsah lou diing hi u’china.
Mihing Tapa chu khawlni Lalpa ahi ngal a, a chi hi.
Huleh hutah apatin a chiah a, a kikhawpna inn vah a luut a.
Huleh, ngai in, huah mi khutzeng khat a um a, Huleh amahun a heehsiat theihna diingun, Khawlni a suhdam a siang ei? chi'n amah a dong va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Na lahva kuan ahiai belaam, khat nei henla, khawlni’n kokhuuh ah keta leh, huchu vatu lou diing leh, kaidoh lou diing um?
Huchi ahihchian belaam sanga mihing chu bangchitaha luulzaw a tai mah? Hujiahin khawlni’n bawlhoih a siang hi, a chi a.
Huin hupa kawmah, Na khut zandoh in, a chi a. Huchi’n a zandoh a; a langkhat bangin ahung damsiangta hi.
Huzohin Pharisaite a pawt va, amah suhlup theihna diing ngaihtuahin a kihou va.
Hizongleh Jesu’n hichu a heet in, hu apatin, a kihemmangta a; huleh mipi nasatah in amah a jui va, ana sudam veh hi.
Huleh amah a soiphuang louhna diingun amahuh a khap a.
Huchu zawlnei Isaiah in hichibanga ana soite ahung taangtun theihna diingin ahi.
En in, ka suaah, ka teel: ka deihtah, amah ka lungkim mahmahna pa chu; ka Hagau a tungah ka koih diing a, huleh ama’n Jentelte kawmah vaihawmna thu a soi diing.
Ama’n chu a nial sih diing a, a kikou sih diing; mi koimah in kholai dungah a aw a ja sih diing uh.
Gualzou diing a vaihawmna dih ahung tut masiah sialluang gawpsa a sutan sih diing a, pat khu zong a sumit sih diing.
Huleh amah min in Jentelte’n kinepna a nei diing uh, a chih.
Huin, dawimat, mittaw haamthei lou khat a kawmah ahung pui va; ama’n ana sudam a, huchi’n haamthei lou chu hung haamthei in khua ahung muta hi.
Huleh mipi zousiah in thum ah a sa va, Hipa hi David tapa hilou ahi maw? a chi va.
Hizongleh Pharisaite'n hi thu a jah tahun, Hipa’n dawimangpa Beelzebul jiah loungal in dawite a nohdoh sih diing, a chi va.
Huleh Jesu’n a ngaihtuah uh a he a, a kawmvah, Gam sung khat kilangkhen a amah leh amah kidou chu a mangthai veu a; huleh khopi sung aha, inn sung aha kilangkhen zong a dingdoh sih diing;
Huleh Setan in Setan mah nohdohta leh, amah leh amah kidou ahita diing a; bangchi'n a gam a dingta diai?
Huleh Beelzebul jiaha dawite nohdoh ka hih leh, na tate un koi jiahin ahiai a nohdoh uh? hujiahin amahuh chu nanguh hung vaihawmsah diingte ahi uhi.
Hizongleh ke’n Pathian Hagau vanga dawite nohdoh ka hih leh, Pathian gam na kawmvah hung tung ahita hi.
Ahihlouhleh, kuan mihaat chu a kaan masat louh leh, a inn a luut in, a neih a laahsah thei ngei ei mah? Ka an masa in huzohchiangin a inn chu a luhsah chauh diing ahi.
Koipouh ka lama pang lou chu ahung dou ahi; huleh koipouh ahung khopkhawmpih lou chu a sudalh ahi.
Hujiahin ka hung hilh ahi, Mi a sualna zousiah uleh Pathian a soisiatna zousiah vah ngaihdam ahi diing a; hizongleh Hagau Siangthou soisiatna chu ngaihdam ahi sih diing.

Huleh koipouh mihing Tapa kalh chu, a kalhna uh ngaihdamsah ahi diing a, hizongleh koipouh Hagau Siangthou kalh chu, a kalhna uh hi khovel ah zong, huleh khovel hung um kiit diing ah zong ngaihdamsah ahi sih diing hi.
Sing chu a hoih, a gah zong a hoih na chih louhngal uleh sing chu a sia, a gah zong a sia chi ngal un; ajiahchu sing hi a gah in a kihe hi.
Guul suante haw, na giitlouhna pum va bangchia thu hoih soi thei diing na hi viai? lungtang dolh val chu kam in a soi veu ahi ngal a.
Mihoih in lungtang goubawm hoih apatin sil hoihte ahung ladoh a; huleh migilou in a goubawm hoihlou apatin sil hoihlou ahung ladoh jel hi.
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, Mite’n thulimlou a soi photmah uh, vaihawm ni chiangin a jiah a soi diing uhi.
Ajiahchu na thu in siamtansah in na um diing a, na thu mahin siamlouh tansah in na um diing hi, a chi hi.
Huin Pharisaite leh lehkhagialtute hunkhop in a dawng va, Houtupa, nangmah apatin chiamchihna ka mu nuam uh, a chi va.
Hizongleh ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Khangthah gilou leh aangkawm haatte’n chiamchihna a hawl uh; hizongleh zawlnei Jonah chiamchihna loungal a kawmvah, chiamchihna dang piah ahi sih diing;
Ajiahchu Jonah suun thum leh jan thum ngapi gil sunga a um mahbangin mihing Tapa zong suun thum leh jan thum lei gil sungah a um diing hi.
Nineveh khua mite chu vaihawmna ah tulai khang thahte toh ahung ding diing va, siamlouh a tangsah diing uh; amahuh Jonah thusoi jiahin a kisiih ngal va; en un, Jonah sanga loupizaw hi-ah a um hi.

Huleh simlam kumpinu chu vaihawmna ah tulai khang thahte toh ahung thoukhawm diing a, siamlouh a tangsah diing: Solomon pilna ngaikhe diingin bawn kawlmong apat ahung ngal a; huleh en un, Solomon sanga loupizaw hi-ah a um hi.
Huleh dawiniin chu mi sung apat a pawt in tui umlouhna mun chinah khawlna hawl in a vaah lehleha, a mu ngal sih a.
Huin ama’n, Ka pawtdohna inn mahah ka kiihkiit mai diing, a chi a; huchia a hungtahin huchu a awng a, phiatsiang leh zephoih in a mu a;

Huin ava chiah a, amah sanga gilouzaw dawi dang sagih ava pui a, huah a luut va, a teengta uh; huin hupa umdan nunung chu a masa sangin a sezawsemta hi. Tulai khang thah giloutahte tungah zong hutobangin a um diing, a chi hi.
Huchia ama’n mipite kawma thu a soi laiin, ngai in, a nu leh a unaute chu amah houpih nuamin inn pua ah a ding va.
Huin mi khat in a kawmah, Ngai in, na nu leh na unaute nang hung houpih nuamin inn pua ah a ding uhi, a chi a.
Hizongleh ama’n a dawng a, amah hilhpa kawmah, Ka nu koi ahiai? huleh ka unaute zong koi ahiai? a chi a.
Huin a nungjuite lamah a khut a jah a, En un, ka nu leh ka unaute!
Ajiahchu koipouh vaan a um ka Pa deihzawng bawl taphot chu ka unaupa, ka unaunu, huleh ka nu ahi uh, a chi hi.
Hu ni mahin inn apatin a chiahdoh a, tuipi gei ah a tou a.
Huin a kawmah mipi nasatah ahung kikhawm va, hujiahin amah chu kuang khat ah a luut a; huleh mipi zousiah chu luipiau ah a ding va.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah tehkhinthu in thu tampi a soi a, Ngai un, chithehtu khat buhchi theh in a kuan a;
Huleh a theh laiin a khen lamgei ah a tu a, vate a hung va, a tom beita hi.
Huleh khenkhat suang silei munte ah a tu a; lei a sah louh jiahin ahung poupah a;
Huleh ni ahung suaah in haigot in ahung um a; zung a neih louh jiahin a gawgawpta hi.
Huleh khenkhat ling lahah a tu a; ling chu ahung khang lian a, a deepmangta hi.
Hizongleh a dang chu lei hoih ah a tu a, khenkhat a leh za bangin, khenkhat, a leh sawmguup bangin, khenkhat a leh sawmthum bangin ahung gahta hi.
Koipouh jahna diing a bil nei in ja heh, a chi hi.
Huin nungjuite a hung va, a kawmah, Bang diinga a kawmva tehkhinthu a na soi ahiai? a chi va.
Ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Ajiahchu vaan lalgam thuguuh chu nanguh heet diing a phal ahi a, hizongleh amahuh heet chu phal ahi sih.
Ajiahchu koipouh a nei chu piah beh ahi diing a, a hau sem diing; hizongleh koipouh a nei lou chu a neih sun zong laahsah ahi diing.
Hujiahin a kawmvah tehkhinthu in ka soi ahi; ajiahchu amahun mu napi in a mu sih va, huleh ja napi in a ja sih va, he zong a hesiam sih uhi.
Huleh Isaiah in ana soilawh chu a tungvah ahung taangtungta ahi; Jah chu na ja diing va, he chu na hesiam sih diing uh; huleh muh chu na mu diing va, he chu na hedoh sih diing uh;

Ajiahchu hi mite lungtang a nang gawpta a, a bil uh a ngong a, huleh a mit uh a siingta uhi; huchilou inzaw a mit un a mukha diing va, a bil un a jakha diing va, huleh a lungtang un a hekha diing va, ahung kiheikiitkha diing va, ke'n amahuh ka na sudamkha diing, chia, ana chih khu.
Hizongleh nanguh mit chu a muh jiahin a hampha hi; huleh na bil uh zong a jah jiahin a hampha hi.
Ajiahchu, chihtahzetin ka kung hilh ahi, zawlnei tampi leh midihtat tampi in zong na sil muhte uh muh a ut va, ahihvangin a mu sih uh; huleh na sil jahte uh zong a ja nuam va, hizongleh a ja sih uhi.
Hujiahin buhchithehtu tehkhinthu chu ngai un.
Koipouh in lalgam thu a jah a, a heetsiam louh leh, migiloupa a hung a, a lungtang a kithehsa chu a laahsah veu hi. Hichu lam gei a tupa chu ahi.
Huleh suang silei laha tupa chu, thu chu ja a, kipaahtaha a pompah ngalpa ahi.
Ahihvangin amah a zung a neih louh jiahin, tomkhat chauh a um a; thu jiaha gimthuaahna bang, sawina bang ahung um chiangin a puuhpah veu hi.
Huleh ling laha tupa zong, thu chu a ja a ahihvangin hi khovel awlmohna leh hauhsatna heemna in thu chu a deep a, huchi’n amah chu gah nei louin ahung umta hi.
Hizongleh lei hoih tunga tupa chu, thu chu ja a hesiampa chu ahi; huchu gah zong a gah a, khenkhat a leh za bang, khenkhat a leh sawmguup bang, khenkhat a leh sawmthum bangin a pung hi, a chi a.
Tehkhinthu dang ama’n a kawmvah a soi kiit a, Vaan lalgam chu, a lou a chihoih theh mi khat toh tehkhin ahi;
Hizongleh mite a ihmut kal un a meelmapa chu a hung a, buh lahah buhlem a theh a, a chiah mangta hi.
Hizongleh buh chu ahung pou a, ahung vuih in, buhlemte zong ahung kilangta hi.
Huchi'n inn neipa suaahte chu a hung va, a kawmah, Pu, na lou a chi hoih theh hilou na hiai mah? buhlemte khoi apata hung um ahiai? a chi va.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Meelma khat in ana bawl ahi, a chi a. A suaahte’n a kawmah, Ahihleh va chiah in hute chu va lakhawm le’ung hoih na sa ei? a chi va.
Hizongleh ama’n chu, Sa lou e, huchi hileh buhlemte na laahkhawmna lam vah, buhte zong na botkhawmkha diing uh;

Buh laah dongin poukhawm u’heh; huleh buh laah huntah chiangin buh aatte kawmah, Buhlemte lakhawm masa unla, haal diingin a lomlom in gaah un; hizongleh buh chu ka buhpang sungah koih luut un, ka chi diing, a chi hi.
Tehkhinthu dang a kawmvah a soi kiit a, Vaan lalgam chu ankamtang khat mi’n a laah a, a lou a, a theh bang ahi;
Huchu haichi lahah a neu penpen a; hizongleh ahung khanlet chiangin, hampa lahah a lianpen a; sing ahung hi a, huchi’n tungleeng vate a hung va, a ba ah ahung giaah uh, a chi a.
Tehkhinthu dang a kawmvah a soi kiita; Vaan lalgam chu numei in tol a laah a, taangbuang tehna thum lahah, a bawna a thoh masiaha a phuum bang ahi, a chi a.
Hi silte zousiah chu Jesu’n tehkhinthu in mipite kawmah a soi a; huleh tehkhinthu lou in a kawmvah bangmah a soi sih hi.
Zawlnei in, Tehkhinthu in ka kam ka kaah a; leilung pianchiil apat silguuh kiphualte chu ka soi diing hi, chia a soi chu ahung taangtunna diingin.
Huin Jesu’n mipite a sawlmang a, inn sungah a luut a; huchi’n nungjuite a kawmah a hung va, Lou a buhlem tehkhinthu chu hung hilhchian in, a chi va.
Ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Hu chi hoih thehtu chu mihing Tapa ahi;
Lou chu khovel ahi; chi hoihte, chu lalgam tate ahi va; huleh buhlemte chu giloupa tate ahi uh.
Meelma a thehtu chu Diabol ahi; buh laah hun chu khovel tawpna diing ahi; huleh a aattute chu angelte ahi uh.
Huchia buhlemte chu lakhawm a mei a, a kihaal bangin khovel tawp hun chiangin a um diing.
Mihing Tapa’n a angelte a sawlkhe diing a, a gam apatin sualsahtute leh silsual bawl zousiah chu a khawm diing uhi;
Huleh haaltuina mei ah a paai diing va; huah chu kah leh hagawi a um diing.
Huzohchiangin midihtatte chu a Pa uh gam ah ni bangin a taang diing uhi. Koipouh jahna diing a bil nei in ja heh.
Huleh vaan lalgam chu loulai a gou kiguuhphum tobang ahi; huchu mi khat in a mudoh a, a phual a, huin kipaahtahin a chiah a, a neih zousiah a zuah a, a leita hi.
Huleh vaan lalgam chu sumkawlveimi tuikep suang hoihtah bawl tobang ahi kiit hi.
Ama’n chu tuikep suang man tamtah khat a mu a, a chiah a, a neih zousiah a zuah a, a leita hi.
Huleh vaan lalgam chu leen tuipi a seh a, chi chinteng huuikhawm bang ahi.
Huchu a dim chiangin a gei ah a kaidoh va, a tou va, a hoihte chu bawmte ah a khum va, hizongleh a hoihloute chu a paai uh.
Khovel tawp chiangin hutobangin a um diing hi; angelte chu a hung diing va, migiloute chu midihtatte lah apat a khenkhe diing uh.
Huleh amahuh chu haaltuina mei ah a paai diing uh; huah chu kah leh hagawi a um diing, a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, hi silte zousiah na hesiam viai? a chi a. Amahun a kawmah, hi, Lalpa, a chi va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Hujiahin lehkhagialtu, vaan lalgam thu hilh a um photmah chu inn neitu, a goubawm apata sil lui leh sil thah pholhkhetu bang ahi, a chi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hia, Jesu’n hi tehkhinthute a soi zohin, hu apatin a chiahta a.
Huin amah gam lamah a hung a, a kikhopna inn vah amahuh thu a hilh a, huchi’n amahun thum ah a sa mahmah va, Hipa’n hi pilna leh sil loupi bawltheihna khoia a muh ahiai?
Hipa hi sing kuang bawlpa tapa hilou ahiai mah? a nu Mari kichi hilou ahiai mah? huleh a unaute chu Jakob, Jose, Simon huleh Juda hilou ahiai mah?
Huleh a sanggamnute zong i kawmva um veh hilou u'maw? hu ahihleh hipa’n khoi apata hite zousiah a muh ahiai? a chi va.
Huchi’n a tungah a lungkimta sih uhi. Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, zawlnei amah gam sung leh amah inn sung chih louh ah zahbawl louhin a um ngei sih hi, a chi a.
Huleh a gintaat louh jiahun ama’n hu ah nna loupi tamtah a tong sih hi.
Hu hunlaiin kumpipa Herod in Jesu thu kithang ana ja a,
A suaahte kawmah, Hichu Baptistu John ahi; amah chu misi lah apat a thoudoh kiitta a; hujiahin silmah bawltheihnate’n amah a kilangin nna hung tawng ahita ve, a chi a.
Ajiahchu Herod in a unaupa Philip ji Herodia jiahin, John chu mansah in ana kaan a, suangkul ah ana khumta hi.
John in a kawma, Amahnu na neih a siang sih, a chihsah jiahin.
Huleh ama’n amah chu thah ut mahleh, mipite a lau a, amahun John chu zawlnei hia a ngaih jiahun.
Hizongleh Herod pian ni ahung tun in, Herodia tanu chu a ma vah a laam a, Herod chu a kipaahsahta a.
Huchi ahih jiahin amahnu chu a nget photmah pe diing a kihaahsial in thu a chiamta hi.
Huleh amahnu’n chu a nu thufuih in, Baptistu John lutang kuang khat in hi-ah hung pia’n, a chi a.
Huin kumpipa chu a lungdongta a; ahihvangin a kihaahsialna leh a ankuang uumpihte haw jiahin, piah diingin thu a pia a.
Huleh mi a sawl a, suangkul sunga John lu a va tansahta a.
Huleh a lutang chu kuang khat in ahung dom va, naupangnu chu a pia va, huleh ama’n a nu kawmah ahung tawita hi.
Huin a nungjuite a hung va, a luang chu a la va, a vui va, huleh a chiah va, Jesu a va hilhta uhi.
Jesu’n hu thu a jah in, hu apatin kuang a kitawl in gamgaw lamah a chiah tuamta hi; Huleh mipi’n a jah tahun, khopi a kipan a keeng va chiah in a juita va.
Huleh Jesu ahung paikhiah in, mipi nasatah a mu a, a hehpih mahmah a, a damloute uh a suhdamsah hi.
Huleh nitaahlam ahung hihin, a nungjuite a kawmah a hung va, Hi mun gamgaw ahi a, huleh ni la a vaigeita a; khuate a chiah a, neeh diing a va lei theihna diingun mipite sawlkheta in, a chi va.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, A chiahmang uh a ngai sih; nangun neeh diing pia un, a chi a.
Huin amahun a kawmah, Hiah tanghou ngaa leh nga nih chauh i nei uhi, a chi va.
Ama’n Hiah ka kawmah hung tawi un, a chi a.

Huin mipite chu hampa tunga tou diingin thu a pia a, tanghou beu ngaa leh nga nih chu a la a, vaan lam en in, vang a pia a, a balkeeh a, tanghou te chu a nungjuite a pia a, huin nungjuite’n mipite kawmah a pia uh.
Huleh a bawnun a ne va, a vah chiatta va; a neeh val nenguh bawm sawmlehnih a luaahdim uhi.
Huleh a nete chu numei leh naupang sim louhin piching saang ngaa vel ahi uhi.
Huleh mipite a sawlmang kal a, ana chiah a, gaal lehlam a, ana kai masa diingin a nungjuite kuang ah a tuangsah teitei a.
Huleh mipite chu a sawlmang zohin, haamtei diingin taang ah a tuamin a chiahtou a; huleh nitaahlam ahung hihin, huah a tangin a umta a.
Hizongleh kuang chu tuipi lailung ah a um a, huih a lehnun jiahin tuikinawh in a seep lehleh a.
Huleh khovaah kuan laiin, Jesu chu tuipi tunga keeng a pai in a kawmlam uh ahung zu an a.
Huleh nungjuite’n amah chu tuipi tunga keeng a, a pai a muh un, Siha ahi chi'n, a buaita va; lauin a kikouta uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh ahung houpihpah a, Hamuangtahin um un; Keimah ka hi; lau sih un, a chi a.
Huin Peter in a dawng a, Lalpa, nang na hihleh, tui tunga na kawma hungna diing thu hung pia in, a chi a.
Huin ama’n, Hung in, a chi a. Huin Peter chu kuang apatin a kum a, Jesu kawma chiah diingin, tui tungah keeng in a paita a.
Hizongleh huih nung chu a muh in, a lau a; huleh tum diingin a kisa a, Lalpa, hung hundam in, chi’n a kikouta a.
Huin Jesu’n a zampah a, a man a, Nang ginna tawmpa, bang diinga ginglel na hiai? a chi a.
Huleh amahuh kuang sunga a tuan tahun huih chu a sipta hi.
Huin kuang a umte’n, Pathian Tapa tahzet na hi, chi'n amah a bia uhi.
Huleh a gaalkai uleh Genesaret gam ahung tungta va.
Hu mun a mite’n amah thu a heet tahun, hu kiima gam chinah mi a sawl va, damlou zousiah a kawmah ahung pui va;
Huleh a puanmong beeh khoih theih a ngen va; huchi’n a khoih photmah a dam jel uhi.
Huin Jerusalem khua a um lehkhagialtute leh Pharisaite Jesu kawmah a hung va,
Bang diinga na nungjuite upate thugousiah a taleeh veu ahi viai? chih chu, an a neeh chiangun a khut uh a sil ngei sih uhi, a chi va.
Hizongleh ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Nangun zong bang diinga na thugousiah jiah va Pathian thupiah a taleeh na hi viai?
Pathian in, Na nu leh na pa zah in, huleh, A nu leh a pa aha housia chu si jiang heh, a chi ngal a.
Hizongleh nangun chu, Koipouh a nu aha a pa aha kawma, Keimah na hung phattuampihna diing photmah, Pathian kawma piah ahita, chi photmah in;
A nu leh a pa a jah diing ahi sih a, a zalen diing hi, na chi va. Huchibangin na thugousiah jiahun Pathian thupiah bangmahlou na suaahsahta uhi.
Nanguh milepchiahte aw, Isai in, na tungtaang thu uh ana soilawh kha ngeel hi.
Hi mite’n a kam un ahung naih va, a muuh un ahung zahbawl uh; hizongleh a lungtang un ahung gamlaat uhi.
Abang abang hileh amahun a thuhilhna va mihing thupiah a hilh jiahun, ahung be thawn uhi, ana chih chu, a chi a.
Huin ama’n mipite a kou a, a kawmvah, Ngai unla, hesiam un;
Kam a luut in mi a suniin sih; hizongleh kam a pawt in, hu ngei in mi a suniin hi, a chi a.
Huin a nungjuite a hung va, a kawmah, Pharisaite’n hi thu a jah va a lunghih louh uh na he ei? a chi va.
Hizongleh ama’n a dawng a, Kung chin ka Pa vaan a um suan louh chu bohkhiah in a um diing.
Hite haw ngaihsah sih un; amahuh chu mittaw lamkaite ahi uhi. Mittaw in mittaw mah a pui inchu, kokhuuh ah a kekhawm diing uh, a chi a.
Huin Peter in a dawng a, a kawmah, Hi tehkhinthu ka kawmvah hung hilh chianta’n, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n, Tutana nanguh zong heetsiamna beia um na hi u'maw?
Kam a luut photmah gil sungah a luut a, huleh dailenna ah paihkhiah in a um chih, na theisiam nai sih u'maw?
Hizongleh kama pawtte chu lungtang a kipana hung pawt ahi a, hute’n chu mi a suniin hi.
Ajiahchu lungtang a kipatin ngaihtuahna giloute, tualthahnate, aangkawmnate, kingaihnate, guuhtaatnate, a tahlou heetpihnate, soisiatnate ahung pawt veu hi.
Hute chu ahi mihing suniin; khut sil louha an neeh in mi a suniin sih, a chi hi.
Huin Jesu hu apatin a pawt a, Tura leh Sidon gam lamah a chiahta a.
Huleh, ngai in, hu gam mah apatin Kana an numei khat ahung pawt a, kikou in a kawmah, Aw Lalpa, David Tapa, ka tungah zahngai in, ka tanu dawimatin a gim mahmah hi, a chi a.
Hizongleh ama’n chu kam khat in zong a dawng sih hi. Huin a nungjuite a hung va, a kawmah, Amahnu hi sawlmang in; i nungah a kikoukou ngal a, a chi va.
Ama’n a dawng a, Israel nam belaam mangte kawm loungal ah sawl ka hi sih, a chi a.
Huin numeinu a hung a, Lalpa, hung panpih in, chi’n a bia a.
Hizongleh ama’n a dawng a, tate tanghou laahsah a uite kawma piah a kilawm sih, a chi a.
Huin amahnu’n, Lalpa, hihzaw ahi a, hizongleh uite’n zong a pu uh dohkaan apat tanghou them kia a ne saam uhi, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, Numei, na ginna thupi hina mai e; na deih bangtahin na tungah um heh, a chi a. Huchi’n a tanu chu hu hun ngei in a damta hi.
Huleh Jesu chu hu apatin a chiah a, Galili tuipi kawm ahung tung a; huin taang ah a chiahtou a, huah a touta a.
Huleh mipi nasatah, keengbaite, mittawte, haamthei loute, piangsualte, leh midang tampi hung pui in, a kawmah a hung va, amahuh chu Jesu keengbul ah a koih va, ama’n ana sudam chiat a.

Huchia haamtheiloute hung haama, piangsualte hung hoiha, keengbaite keeng a hung pai leh, mittawte’n hung mu theita uh, chih a muh un, mipite’n thum ah a sa va; huchi'n Israelte Pathian chu a paahtawita uhi.

Huin Jesu’n a nungjuite a kawmah a kou a, Mipite tuin ka kawmah ni thum a umta va, neeh diing bangmah a neih louh jiahun, ka hehpih mahmah hi; huleh amahuh angawl in ka chiahsah nuam sih hi, huchilouin zaw lamkal ah a sawlsam kha diing uh, a chi a.
Huin a nungjuite’n a kawmah, Mipi hizah tate vaahna thamzet tanghou hu zaatpi gamdai ah khoi apatin i mu diai? a chi va.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, tanghou beu bangzah na nei viai? a chi a. Huin amahun, Beu sagih leh nga neu tawmtakhat, a chi va.
Huin ama’n mipi chu tual a tou diingin thu a pia a.
Huin tanghou beu sagih leh ngate chu a la a, kipaahthu a soi a, a balkeeh a, nungjuite kawmah a pia a, huleh nungjuite’n mipite kawmah a pia uhi.
Huleh a bawnun a ne va, a vah chiatta uh; huleh a neeh val uh anneng chu bawm sagih a luaahdim uhi.
Huleh a nete chu numei naupang sim louhin, piching saang li ahi uhi.
Huin mipite chu a sawlmang a, kuang ah a tuang a, Magdala gam lamah a hungta hi.
Pharisaite zong Sadukaite toh a hung va, amah ze-etna diingin vaan a kipan chiamchihna amahuh ensah diingin a ngen va.
Ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Nitaahlam chiangin, khua a pha diing hi’nte mei san a suaah, na chi veu uhi.
Huleh jingkal chiangin, tuni’n khua a se diing hi’nte mei san a suaah a, a ngiamkai, na chi veu uhi. Nanguh milepchiahte aw, vaan umdan na hesiam va; hizongleh hun chiamchihna na he sih uh.
Khangthah gilou leh aangkawm haatte’n chiamchihna a hawl uh; hizongleh zawlnei Jonah chiamchihna loungal a dang a kipe sih diing, a chi a. Huleh amahuh a nusia a, a chiahta hi.
Huleh a nungjuite’n gaallehlam a tun un, tanghou a po mangngilh va.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Pharisaite leh Sadukaite tol lahah kiveeng unla pilvaang un, a chi a.
Huleh amahun chu, Tanghou i puaah louh jiahin ahi ve, chi'n a kingaihtuah va.
Jesu’n huchu a hedoh a, a kawmvah, Aw gintawmte, tanghou na neih louh jiah va bang diinga kingaihtuah na hi viai?
Mi saangngaate vaahna tanghou ngaa leh, bawm bangzah aha na dimsah uh, chih tu nasan a hesiam nailoua, na lungsim va zong he zing lou na hi u'maw?
Huleh mi saangli vaahna tanghou beu sagih leh na bawm dimzaat u’zong?
Na kawmvah tanghou thu soi ka hi sih a, Pharisaite leh Sadukaite tol lahah kiveeng un chih soi ka hi zaw chih bang diinga hesiam lou na hi viai? a chi a.
Huin amahun tanghou tol lahah kiveeng un chi hilouin Pharisaite leh Sadukaite thuhilhna lahah pilvaang diingin ahi zaw, chih ahung theita uhi.
Jesu chu Caesarea Philippi gam ahung tunin a nungjuite kawmah, Mite’n kei mihing Tapa hi koi ahi ahung chi viai? chi’n a dong a.
Huleh amahun, Lawikhat in, Baptistu John ahi ahung chi va; lawikhat in Elijah huleh a dangte’n Jeremiah ahihlouhleh zawlneite laha khat ahi, ahung chi uhi, a chi va.
Ama’n chu a kawmvah, Ahihleh nangun koi ahi na hung chi viai? a chi a.
Huin Simon Peter in a dawng a, Khrist, Pathian hing Tapa chu na hi, a chi a.
Huleh Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Simon Barjona na hampha hi, ajiahchu sa leh sisan in ahung heetsah na hi sih a, vaan a um ka Pa hung heetsah ahi zaw hi.
Huleh ke'n zong na kawmah, Nang Peter na hi, chih ka hung hilh ahi; huleh hi suangpi tungah ka kouhtuam ka lemdoh diing hi; huchu misi kulh kotkhaahte’n bangmah a lohbut sih diing.
Huleh na kawmah vaan lalgam chabite ka hung pe diing a, lei a na kaan photmah chu vaan ah kaan ahi diing a, huleh lei a na phel photmah chu vaan ah phel ahi diing, a chi a.
Huin Khrist ahi chih koima hilhlou diingin a nungjuite dettahin thu a pia hi.

Hunungsiah chu Jesu’n Jerusalem a, a chiah diing bang, upate, siampu lalte huleh lehkhagialtute laha sil tampi a thuaah diingdan bang, thaha a um diing bang, huleh ni thum ni a, a thoh kiit diing bang a nungjuite a hesah panta hi.
Huin Peter in amah a puituam a, Lalpa, hih in hung gamlaat heh; na tungah a tung hial sih diing, chi'n a taihilh a.
Hizongleh amah chu a kihei a, Peter kawmah, Setan, ka nungah pai in; kei diingin puuhna na hi; nang Pathian silte ngaihtuah louin mihing silte na ngaihtuah zawh jiahin, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a nungjuite kawmah, Mi koipouh in ahung juih nuam leh mahni gimthuaah khawhsa louin, a kros pua in hung jui heh.
Ajiahchu koipouh a hinna humbit nuamin a taan diing a; huleh koipouh keimah jiaha a hinna taan in a mu diing hi.
Mi’n khovel a pum in nei henla, a hinna taan taleh amah diingin bang a phatuam diai? ahihlouhleh, mi’n a hinna luang in bang ahiai a piah diing?
Mihing Tapa chu a Pa loupinna a angelte toh hung diing ahi ngal a; huchiangin michin a natoh bangjelin a thuh chiat diing hi.
Chihtahzetin na kawmvah ka soi ahi, Hi a dingte a khen chu, mihing Tapa a lalgam a, a hung a muh masiah uh, sihna chiam lou diing a um uhi, a chi hi.
Huleh ni guup nungin Jesu’n Peter toh, Jakob toh, huleh a unaupa John toh a tonpih a, a tuamin taang saang tung khat ah a puitou a,
A ma vah a meel ahung limdangta a; a maai ni bangin ahung taang a, a puansilhte chu vaah bangin ahung vaam hi.
Huleh, ngai in, Mosi leh Elijah a kawmva hung kilaah in amah toh a kihou uhi.
Huin Peter in Jesu a houpih a, a kawmah, Lalpa, ei a diingin hitaha um a hoih hi; na ut leh hi-ah bawh thum i bawl diing a, nang a diingin khat, Mosi diingin khat, Elijah diingin khat, a chi a.
A soi laitahin, ngai in, mei vaahtahin amahuh ahung khuhta a; huleh, ngai in, hu mei lah apatin aw khat in, Hichu ka Tapa deihtah ahi, amah ah ka kipaah mahmah hi; amah thu ngai un, a chi a.
Huleh nungjuite’n huchu a jah un, bohkhup in a puuh va, a lau mahmah uhi.
Huin Jesu a hung a, amahuh a khoih a, Thou unla, huleh lau sih un, a chi a.
Huleh a daahdoh uleh, Jesu chauh lou chu, koimah dang a mu sih uhi.
Huleh taang apata ahung kumsuh un, Jesu’n amahuh thu a pia a, Mihing Tapa misi lah apat a thoh kiit masangsiah hi na sil muh uh koimah hilh sih un, a chi a.
Huin a nungjuite'n a kawmah, Ahihleh bang diinga lehkhagialtute'n, Elijah hung masa diing ahi, chi ahi viai? chi'n a dong va.
Huleh Jesu’n a dawng a, Elijah chu a hung masa ngei diing a, silbangkim a bawlthah diing.
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, Elijah chu a hung zouta, amah a he sih va, a tungah a utut un a hih zouta uhi. Huchimahbangin mihing Tapa in zong a lahvah a thuaah saam diing, a chi a.
Huin nungjuite'n Baptistu John thu a kawmva soi ahi chih ahung heta uhi.
Huleh mipi lah ahung tunun, koi aha mi khat a kawmah a hung a, a ma a khupdin in,
Lalpa, ka tapa tungah zahngai in; amah hi lungap vei ahi a, a gim mahmah hi; khatveivei chiah mei ah, huleh khatveivei chiah tui ah a puuh veu mei hi.
Huleh na nungjuite kawmah ka hung pui a, a sudam thei sih uhi, a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Ginna nei lou leh khang thah chihmoh haw, bangtan ahiai ka hung umpih diing, bangtan ahiai ka hung thuaah zoh diing? amah chu hi-ah ka kawmah hung pui un, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n dawi chu a vau a; a sunga kipatin a pawtta a; huleh naupang chu hu hun ngeiin a damta hi.
Huin nungjuite chu a tuamin Jesu kawmah a hung va, Bang diinga kei un nohdoh thei lou ka hi viai? a chi va.

Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Na gintaat louh jiahun ahi; chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Ankamtang khat bang ginna na neih uleh, hi taang kawmah, Hi apatin hu lamah kituan in, na chi diing va, a kituan mai diing; nanguh diingin sil bawltheih louh mawngmawng a um sih diing.
Bang hitaleh hichibang zaw haamteina leh angawlna loungalin a pawtdoh sih hi, a chi hi.
Huleh Galili a, a um laiun, Jesu’n a kawmvah, Mihing Tapa chu mite khuta matsah in a um diing hi;
Huleh amah chu a that diing va, huleh a ni thum ni’n kaihthoh in a um diing, a chi a. Huchi'n a lungkham mahmahta uhi.
Huleh Kepernaum ahung tunun, Pathian biahinn sum dongte Peter kawmah a hung va, Na houtupa un biahinn siah pe veu saam lou ahi maw? a chi va.

Ama’n chu, Pe veu e, a chi a. Huleh Peter chu inn sunga ava luut leh Jesu’n a kawmah, Simon, bang na chi ngaih ei? Lei a lalte’n siah hiin, sum siah hitaleh koite lahah ahiai a laah jel uh? a tate uh lahah ahiai, mi tuam lahah? chi'n ana soikhalh a.
Peter in a kawmah, Mi tuam lahah, a chi a. Jesu’n a kawmah, Huchi ahihleh tate awl a ve maw.

Hitamahleh, nang tuipiah va chiah inla, ngakuai vakhai inla, nga na khaidoh masatpen la in; huleh a kam keeh lechin dangka tengkhat na mu diing; huchu la inla, kei leh nang a dingin a kawmvah pia in, huchilou inzaw i sulunghimohkha diing, a chi hi.
Hulai tahin nungjuite Jesu kawmah a hung va, vaan lalgam ah koi a lianpen diai? a chi va.
Huin Jesu’n naupang neu khat a kawmah a kou a, amah chu a lahvah a dingsah a,
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Na lamleet va, naupang neute bang na hung hih louh uleh, vaan lalgam ah na luut het sih diing uh.
Hujiahin koipouh hi Naupang neu banga kingaingiam chu, hu mi ngei chu vaan gam ah a lianpen diing.
Huleh koipouh hitobang naupang khat keimah min a kipaahpih chu kei hung kipaahpih ahi.
Hizongleh koipouh keimah hung gingta mi neute laha khat zong puuhsah chu a ngawng ah suang sumheeh lianpi awhsah in tui khang lian thuuhtah ah kheluut leuh amah diingin a hoihzaw hi.
Puuhnate jiahin khovel tung a gih hi! puuhnate chu hung um diing mawng ahi a; hizongleh puuhna umsahtu tung a gih hi!

Huleh na khut aha na keeng aha in ahung suhpuuh leh, saattan inla paaimang in; khut nih aha keeng nih aha nei a kumtuang mei a paih a um sangin, piangsual a, ahihlouhleh keengbaai a hinna a luut nang a diingin a hoihzaw hi.
Huleh na mit in ahung suhpuuh leh kheikhia inla, paaimang in; mit nih nei a gawtmun mei a paih a na um sangin, mit khat nei a hinna a luut nang a diingin a hoihzaw hi.
Hi mineute laha khat zong simmoh lou diingin pilvaang un; ajiahchu a angelte un vaan a um ka Pa meel a en zing uhi, chih ka hung hilh ahi.
Mihing Tapa chu beimangte hundam diinga hung ahi ngal a.
Bang na chi ngaih viai? Mi khat in belaam zakhat nei henla, a lahva khat vaahmang taleh, sawmkuaah leh kuaahte chu nusia in, taang a chiah in, a vaahmang pen va hawl lou diing ahiai mah?
Huleh va mu kiitta henla hileh, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, sawmkuaah leh kuaah vaahmang loute tungah sangin, hu belaam pen tungah a kipaahzaw diing hi.
Huchimah bangin hi mineute laha khat zong a manthai diing hi na Pa uh vaan a um deihlam ahi sih hi.
Huleh na unau na tunga a tatleeh leh, chiah inla nang leh amah chauh heet in a khelhna chu va hilh in; ama'n na thu a ngaih leh na unau na zou ahi ding.
Hizongleh a ngaihkhiah louh inchu, heetpihtu nih aha, thum aha kama thu a kichetna diingin, mi khat aha nih aha tonpih in.
Huleh amahuh a ngaihkhiah nuam louha ahihleh, kouhtuamte kawmah tut in; huleh kouhtuamte thu zong a ngaihkhiah saam louh inchu amah chu nang a diingin ginglou leh siahdongmi bang hi heh.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Leitung a na kaan photmah u’chu vaan a zong kaan ahi diing a; huleh leitung a na phel photmah uh vaan ah phel ahi diing hi.
Huleh na kawmvah ka soi kiit hi, Leitung a na lahva mi nih a sil nget diing va a kithutuah uleh ka Pa vaan a um bawlsah in a um diing uhi.
Ajiahchu mi nih aha, thum aha ka min a, a kikhopna photvah a lahvah ka um jel ahi, a chi hi.
Huin Peter a kawmah a hung a, Lalpa, ka unau in bangzat vei ahiai ka tunga a khelh leh ka ngaihdam diing? Sagih vei tanin ahi diai? a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Sagih vei chiang ka hung chi sih hi; sagih vei mun sawmsagih tanchiang ka hung chi zaw ahi.
Hujiahin vaan lalgam chu kumpipa koi aha a suaahte kawma sum hisaap suhfel tum toh tehkhin ahi.
Ahung suhfel pat a ahihleh, mi khat talent saangsawm ba a kawmah ahung pui va.
Hizongleh ama’n piah diing a neih louh tahin a pu in chu amah, a ji leh a tate toh, huleh a neih zousiah toh zuah a dit diing thu a pia a.
Hujiahin suaahpa’n chu khupboh in a bia a, Pu, ka tungah thuaahthei tadih inla, a bawn in ka hung dit diing, a chi a.
Huin hu suaahpa pu in amah chu a hehpihta mahmah a, a hah a, a bat a ngaidamta hi.
Hizongleh hu suaahpa chu a pawt a, a suaah hihpihte laha khat amah sum zakhat ba chu a va mu a, amah chu a man a, Na bat hung pia in chi'n a lawl a meeh a.
Huchi'n a suaah hihpihpa chu a keeng bulaha puuh a, Ka tungah thuaahthei tadih in, ka hung dit veh diing, chi'n a ngen a.
Ahihvangin amah a ut sih a; a bat a dit zoh masiah suangkul ah ava khumta a.
A suaah hihpihte'n a silbawl chu a muh un, a lunghimoh mahmah va, huleh a hung va, sil umtan zousiah a pu uh ahung hilhta uhi.
Huphetin a pu in amah chu a kou a, a kawmah, Aw suaah giloupa, na hung nget ngutngut jiaha na bat zousiah hung ngaidam hi’nga;
Ke’n nang ka hung hehpih banga nang zong na suaah hihpihpa na hehpih sam diing hilou maw? a chi a.
Huin a pu chu a thangtawmta a, a bat zousiah a ditzoh masiah migawtte kawmah a peta hi.
Nanguh koipouh in na lungtang tah va na unaute a tatleehna uh na ngaihdamlouh uleh, Vaan a um ka Pa’n zong huchibangin na tungvah a bawl ve diing ahi, a chi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu’n hi thute a soi zohin, Galili gam apatin a pawt a, Jordan gaal Judia gam lamah a chiah a;
Huleh mipi nasatah in a jui va, ama’n huah amahuh ana sudam hi.
Pharisaite zong a kawmah a hung va, amah ze-etin a kawmah, Bang jiah pouhin mi’n a ji a khul a siang ei? a chi va.
Huin ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, A chiil apat a amahuh siamtu in numei leh pasal in ana siam hi.
Huleh, hijiahin pasal in a nu leh a pa a nuse diing a, a ji a tu diing; huleh a nih un sapumkhat ahung hita diing uh, a chi hi, chih na sim sih u'maw?
Huchi'n amahuh chu nih ahi nawnta sih va, sapumkhat ahita uhi. Hujiahin Pathian in a gawmsa chu mihing in khen sih heh, a chi a.
Amahun a kawmah, Ahihleh bang diinga Mosi in kikhulna lehkha piah a khul diing ahi, chia thu a piah ahiai? a chi va.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Mosi in na lungtang uh khauh jiaha na jite uh khul ahung phalsah ahi; hizongleh a chiil apatin huchibang ahi sih hi.
Huleh ke'n ka hung hilh ahi, Koipouh mi dang toh kingaih jiah hiloua, ji khul a, a dang nei chu aangkawm ahi; huleh khulsa nei photmah zong aangkawm ahi, a chi a.
A nungjuite’n a kawmah, pasal a ji toh kal thu huchi ahihleh, kiteen a hoih lou ahi, a chi va.
Hizongleh ama’n a kawmvah, Hi thu kisoi mi zousiah in a pom thei sih uh, a kawmva piahte lou ngalin.

Michilgeh khenkhat a nu uh gil sung apat huchibanga piang mawng a um va; huleh michilgeh khenkhat, mihing geh thuh zong a um a; huleh michilgeh, vaan lalgam jiaha michilgeha kisiamtawmte zong a um hi. Koipouh a pomthei in pom uheh, a chi hi.
Hulaiin a tungva a khut nga a, a haamteisah diingin a kawmah naupang neute ahung pui va; huleh nungjuite'n ana tai va.
Hizongleh Jesu’n, Naupangte chu ka kawma a hung diing uh phalsah unla, khap sih un; vaan lalgam, chu huchibang mite a ahi ngal a, a chi a.
Huleh a tungvah a khut a nga a, hu apatin a chiahta hi.
Huleh ngai in, mi khat a hung a a kawmah, Houtupa hoih, kumtuang hinna ka neih theihna diingin bang silpha ahiai ka bawl diing? a chi a.
Ama’n a kawmah, Bang diinga mi hoih hung chi na hiai? Pathian chih louh mi hoih dang a um sih hi; bangteng hitaleh hinna a na luut nuam leh thupiahte zawm in, a chi a.
Ama’n a kawmah, A khoi haw e? a chi a. Jesu’n a dawng a, Tual na thah louh diing ahi, Na aangkawm louh diing ahi, Na guuh louh diing ahi, Heetpihtu tahlou in na pang diing ahi sih.
Na nu leh na pa zah in: huleh, Nangmah na kilungsiat bangin na innveengte na lungsiat diing ahi, a chi a.
Tangvalpa'n chu a kawmah, Hite zousiah chu ka neu apat ka jui zingta hi; bang ka sam na lai ei? a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Hoihkim keei ning na chih leh, chiah inla, na neih zuah inla, migentheite kawmah pia in, huchi'n vaan ah gou na nei diing; huleh hung inla hung jui in, a chi a.
Hizongleh tangvalpa’n chu hu thu a jah tahin lungkham tahin a chiah mangta hi; sum tampi nei ahih jiahin.
Huin Jesu’n a nungjuite kawmah, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi hausa diingin vaan lalgam luut a hahsa hi.
Huleh ka hung hilh kiit ahi, Mi hausa Pathian gam a, a luut sangin sangawngsaau phin bilvang a, a luut paisuaah a baihlamzaw hi, a chi a.
A nungjuite’n hu a jah un limdang a sa mahmah va, Huchi ahihleh koi hutdamin a um zou diai? a chi va.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh a en a, a kawmvah, Huchu mihing diingin bawl gual ahi sih a; hizongleh Pathian diingin chu bangkim ahi thei hi, a chi hi.
Huin Peter in a kawmah, Ngai in, kei un bangkim nusia in ka hung juita va; bang ka mu diing viai leh? chi'n a dong a.

Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Siamthahna ah, mihing Tapa a loupina touphah a, a tou chiangin nanguh kei hung juite chu Israel nam sawmlenihte vaihawm in laltouphah sawmlenih ah na tou saam diing uhi.
Huleh michin ka min jiaha, innte aha, unaute aha, sanggamnute aha, pa aha, nu aha, ji aha, tate aha, gamte aha nusia in chu a lehza a mu diing va, kumtuang hinna a tang diing uh.
Hizongleh mi tampi masapen a umte nunungpen in a um diing va; huleh nunungpen a umte masapen ahi diing uhi.
Ajiahchu vaan lalgam hi inn neitu a grep huan a natong dinga mi chial dinga jingkal a pawt bang ahi.
Huleh ama’n natongtute toh ni khat a makhai khat loh diing a, a kilem tahun, a grep huan ah a sawlta a.
Huleh amah chu daah thumna velin a pawtdoh a, midang dawlmun a ding meimeite a mu a,
Huleh a kawmvah, Nanguh zong grep huan ah va kuan un, a kilawmhun ka hung pe ding, a chi a. Huin amahuh chu a chiahta va.
Huleh daah guupna leh daah kuaahna vel dingin a va pawt kiit a, huchi bangmahin a bawl kiit a.
Huleh daah sawm leh daah sawmlekhatna velin a va pawt kiit a, a kawmvah, Bang diinga ding meimei na hi viai? a chi a.
Amahun a kawmah, Koima'n ahung goih louh jiahin, a chi va. Ama’n a kawmvah, Nanguh zong grep huan ah va kuan un; a kilawm bangjel na mu diing uh, a chi a.
Huin nitaahlam ahung hihin, grep huan neitu’n a sumkolpa kawmah, Natongtute kou inla, a nunungpen apatin a masapen tanin a loh uh pia in, a chi a.
Huin daah sawmna leh daah sawmlekhatna vela a goihte a hung uleh, makhai khat chiat a muta va.
Huin a masate a hung un muh tamdeuh a kinem va; hizongleh amahun zong makhai khat chiat mah a muta va.
Huleh hichu a kilaahzoh un inn neitu tungah a phunta va,
