Hi a nunungte’n daah khat sung chauh a tong va, keiuh nisa hahlai thuaah a tonggimte toh kibangin na bawlta, chi'n.
Hizongleh ama’n chu a lahva khat a dawng a, Lawm, na tungah bangmah ka sukhial sih hi; makhai khat loh diing a kihoutuaah hilou i'maw?
Nang a chu kilaah inla chiahta in; hi a nunungpen kawmah zong nang ka hung piah zaatmah ka pe ut hi.
Ka neihsa ka utut a ka bawltheih hilou amaw? Ka hoih jiahin na thangsia ahi maw? a chi a.
Hutobangin a nunung chu a masa diing a, huleh a masa chu a nunung diing hi; ajiahchu tampi kouh ahi a, hizongleh tawmtakhat teel ahi; a chi hi.
Huleh Jesu Jerusalem khua a, a chiahtouh laiin nungjui sawmlehnihte lampi ah a puituam a, a kawmvah,
Ngai un, Jerusalem zu an in i chiah tou uh ahi; mihing Tapa chu siampu lalte leh lehkhagialtute khutah matsah in a um diing a, huleh amahun si diingin siamlouh a tangsah diing uhi,
Huleh amah chu chiamnuih bawlna diing leh, jep diing leh, kros a khetbeh diingin Jentelte khut ah a pedoh diing uhi; huleh ni thum ni in a thou kiit diing, a chi hi.
Huin Zebedi tate nu chu, a tapate toh hung in amah ahung bia va, bang sil aha a ngen a.
Huin ama’n a kawmah, Bang ahiai na deih? a chi a. Amahnu’n a kawmah, Na lalgam a hi ka tapate geel khat na jiat a, khat na vei a, a tou theihna diing uh thu pia in, a chi a.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a dawng a, Na nget uh na he sih uhi. Nangun ka nou dawn diing na dawn thei viai? huleh ka baptisma tan diing na tang thei diing viai? a chi a. Amahun a kawmah, Thei e, a chi va.

Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Ka dawn diing nou chu na dawn ngei diing va, ka baptisma tan diing zong na tang ngei diing uhi; hizongleh ka jiatlam leh ka veilam a tousah diing thu chu keimah piah diing ahi sih hi, ka Pa’n a bawlsahte kawmah piah ahi diing, a chi a.
Huleh sawmte’n hichu ana jah un, unau nihte tungah a lungthahta uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu'n amahuh chu a kawmah a kou a, Jentelte vaihawmte chu a tungvah a lal mahmah va, huleh milian milalte'n a tungvah thu a nei mahmah uhi chih na he uhi.
Hizongleh nanguh lahah chu huchi ahi sih diing; koi hitaleh na lahva let uh chu na natong un a um diing ahi.
Huleh na lahva houtupen a pan ut chu na suaah un a pang diing ahi;
Mihing Tapa hilhial zong natohsaha um dinga a hung louha, natong diing leh mi tampi tatna diing a a hinna pe diing a a hung zawh mah bangin, a chi hi.
Huleh Jeriko khua apat a pawt un, mipi nasatah in amah a jui va.
Huleh ngai in mittaw nih lam geia toute’n, Jesu lampi ah a chiah hi chih a jah tahun Aw Lalpa, David Tapa, ka tungvah zahngai in, chi'n a kikou va.
Huleh mipite’n a daihna diingun a tai va; hizongleh amahuh chu, Aw Lalpa, David Tapa, ka tungvah zahngai in, chi’n a kikou semsem uhi.
Huin Jesu a ding a, amahuh a kou a, Na tungvah bang bawlleng na ut viai? a chi a.
Amahun a kawmah, Lalpa mit vaah ka ut uh, a chi va.
Huin Jesu’n a hehpih mahmah a, a mit uh a khoih a; huchi'n a mutheipah ngal va, huleh amah a juita uhi.
Huleh Jerusalem a tun kuan va, Olive taang a Bethphage a tun un, Jesu’n nungjuite nih a sawl a,
A kawmvah, Na mazawn va khua ah va chiah un; huleh sabiltung kikhit a kawma, a nou toh na va mupah diing uhi; hute chu suut unla, ka kawmah hung kai unla.
Huleh mi a koi aha in na kawmva soi a neih leh, Lalpa’n amahuh a mamoh hi, na chi diing va, huchi'n ama’n ahung sawlpah diing hi, a chi a.
Hite zousiah chu zawlnei kam a kisoisa ahung taangtun theihna diingin ahi.
Zion tanu chu hilh inla, Ngai in, na Kumpipa chu kingaingiam tahin sabiltung tungah, sabiltung nou tunga tuangin na kawmah a hung hi, chi'n, a chih chu.
Huin nungjuite chu a chiah va, Jesu’n amahuh thu a piah bangin a bawl va,
Huleh sabiltung leh a nou chu ahung kai va, a tungah a puante uh a phah va, a tungah Jesu a tousah uhi.
Huleh mipi tamtahmei in lampi ah a puante uh a phah va, a dangte’n singbawh a saatkhia va, lampi ah a phah uhi.
Huleh mipi a ma a chiahte leh a nunga juite’n kikou in, David Tapa, Hosanna; Lalpa mina hung pai chu a hampha hi; Tungnungpen ah. Hosanna, a chi va.
Huleh Jerusalem khosung a luut tahin, Hipa koi ahiai? chi'n khopi pumpi a liing hial uhi.
Huleh mipite'n, Hipa hi zawlnei Jesu, Galili gam a Nazareth khua a mi ahi, a chi uhi.
Huleh Jesu chu Pathian biahinn ah a luut a, biahinn a sil zuah leh lei zousiah a delhdoh a, huleh sum hengtute dohkaan haw leh vakhu zuahte touna haw a sawnpuuhsah a.
Huleh a kawmah, Ka Pa inn chu haamteina inn a kichi diing, chih gelh ahi; hizongleh nangun suammangte khuuhin na siam uhi, a chi a.
Huleh Pathian biahinn ah, mittawte leh keengbaite a kawmah a hung va, ama’n amahuh chu ana sudam hi.
Hizongleh siampu lalte leh lehkhagialtute’n a silmah bawlte leh biahinn a, David Tapa, Hosanna, chia naupang kikoute a muh un a lungkim sih mahmah va.
Huleh a kawmah, Hite’n bang ahiai a soi uh na ja ei? a chi va. Huleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, hi, naungeehte leh nawiteep nalaite kam a pawt in paahtawina na sukimta, chih na sim ngei sih u'maw? a chi a.
Huleh amahuh nusia in khopi apat a pawt a, Bethani ah a chiah a; huah a giahta hi.
Huleh a zing a khopi lama a kilehkiit in a gil ahung kialta a.

Huleh lam gei ah theipi kung a mu a, a bula ava chiah leh a nah loungal bangmah a muta sih a, huin theipi kung kawmah, Tu apat kumtuang in na gah kiit nawn sin, a chi a. Huin theipi kung chu a vulpah ngal hi.
Huleh nungjuite’n huchu a muh un, Bangchidan ahiai theipi kung chu a vulpah mei? chi'n thumah a sa mahmah va.

Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Ginna na neih va, na ginlelh louh uleh theipi kung a bawl bang chauh na bawl sih diing va, hi taang kawmah zong, Kisuandoh inla, tui khang lian ah kipaai in chileh uchin, na chih bang un a um diing hi.
Huleh bangkim gingta a haamteia na nget u’chu na mu diing uhi, a chi hi.
Huleh amah Pathian biahinn a, a luut a thu a hilh laiin, siampu lalte leh vaantaang upate a kawmah a hung va, Bang thuneihna in ahiai hi silte na bawl? Kuan ahiai hi thuneihna hung pia? a chi va.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Ke'n zong thu khat ka hung dong diing a, huchu na hung hilh uleh, ke'n zong koi thu in ahiai hi sil ka bawl ka hung hilh ve diing hi.
John baptisma hi khoi apatin ahiai? vaan apatin aha, ahihlouhleh mihing apat? a chi a. Huleh amahuh a kingaihtuah va, Vaan akipat chilehang lah, huchi ahihleh bang diinga gingta lou? a chi diing a.
Hizongleh mihing a kipat chilehang lah mipite i lau ngal a; mi zousiah in John chu zawlnei a, a seh jiahun, a chi va.
Huchi'n Jesu a dawng va, Ka he sih uh, a chi va. Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Ke'n zong bang thuneihna in ahiai hi silte ka bawl chih ka hung hilh sih diing hi.
Hizongleh nangun bang na chi ngaih viai? Mi koi aha in tapa nih a nei a; huleh a khatna kawmah a hung a, Tapa, tuni in ka grephuan ah va tong in, a chi a.
Ama’n a dawng a, Ut sing, a chi a; hizongleh a khonung in a lungsim a hengta a, a va kuanta hi.
Huin a nihna kawmah a hung a, huchimahbangin a chi a. Huleh ama’n a dawng a, Pu, ka chiah diing hi, a chi a; hizongleh a chiahta sih a.

Amahuh gel koi zaw in a pa uh deihlam a bawl viai le? a chi a. Amahun a kawmah, A masazaw in, a chi va Jesu’n a kawmvah, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Siahdongte leh nohchizuahte’n Pathian gam ahung luut khelh diing uhi.

Ajiahchu John chu dihtatna lam thu ah na kawmvah a hung a, amah na gingta sih uh; hizongleh siahdongte leh nohchizuahte’n amah a gingta uhi; huleh nangun hu na muh un, amah na gintaatna diingun na kisiih nuam tuan sih uhi.

Tekhinthu dang ngaikhia un; Inn neitu mi koiaha khat a um a, hupa’n chu grephuan a bawl a, daai in a uum kiimvel a, hu sungah grep suuhna kokhuuh a lai a, innsaang a lam a, huchi'n loubawlmite kawmah hohloh diingin a pekhia a, gam dangah a chiahta a.
Huleh a gah loh a hun diing kuan in, a suaahte chu a gah la diingin a enkolte kawmah a sawl a.
Huleh a enkolte’n a suaahte chu a man va, khat a vua va, khat a that va, khat suang in a sep uh.
Huin ama’n a suaahte a masa haw sanga tamzaw a sawl kiit a; amahuh tungah zong huchimahin ana bawl va.
A tawp ah, Ka tapa a zahtaatkha diing uh chi'n, a tapa chu a sawl a.
Hizongleh a enkolte’n a tapa chu a muh un, Hipa gouluahtu diing ahi; hung un, i that diing va, a gouluah diing chu i kitan diing uh, a chi va.
Huin amah chu a man va, grephuan pua ah a paaidoh va, a thatta uhi.
Huchi'n grephuan neitupa a hung tahchiangin hu a enkoltute chu bang a lohta diai? a chi a.
Amahun a kawmah, Ama’n hu migiloute chu gentheitahin a sumang diing a, grephuan chu a enkoltu dang, a gah loh hun china a gahte a kawma pe jel diingte kawmah a kemsah diing, a chi va.

Jesu’n a kawmvah, Pathian lehkhabu ah, Inn lamtute suang deih louh, hu suang ngei chu a ning a suang poimohpen ahung hita; huchu Lalpa bawl ahi a, huleh i mitmuh un a thum ah hi, chih thu na sim kha ngei sih u'maw?
Hujiahin ka hung hilh ahi, Pathian gam chu na kawm vapat laahsah ahi diing a, gah suang diing jat dang kawmah piah ahi diing hi.
Huleh koipouh hi suang tunga puuh chu a keehjah diing a; huleh a netkhaah photmah chu a gawijan diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh siampu lalte leh Pharisaite’n a tehkhinthute a jah un, amahuh tung thu soi ahi chih a kihe va.
Hizongleh amah chu mat a tup uleh, mipite a lau ngal uhi, amahun zawlnei a, a ngaih jiahun.
Huleh Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah tehkhinthu a soi kiit a.
Vaan lalgam chu koiaha kumpipa khat a tapa a diinga kiteenna ankuang bawl tobang ahi,
Huleh kiteenna ankuang luina a chialte kou diingin a suaahte a sawl a; amahuh a hung nuam sih uhi.

Ama’n a suaah dangte a sawldoh kiit a, Chialte kawmah va chiah unla, Ngai un, ka ankuang ka peihta hi; ka bawngtalte leh ka gan thaute thah ahi a, sil zousiah peihsa ahita; kiteenna ah hungta un, va chi un, a chi a.
Hizongleh amahun a ngaihsah sih va, khat a lou ah, khat a sumdawnna ah a kichiah mangta uhi;
Huleh mi dangte’n a suaahte chu a man va, musittah in a bawl va, a thatta uhi.
Hizongleh kumpipa’n huchu a jah tahin a lungthah a; a sepaihte a sawl a, hu tualthatte chu a sumang a, huleh a khua uh zong a haalsahta hi.
Huin ama’n a suaahte kawmah, Kiteenna ankuang peih ahita, hizongleh ka chialte lah ne taah ahi sih uh.
Hujiahin lamkathuamte ah chiah unla, mi na muh taphot uh kiteenna an ne diingin hung chial un, a chi a.
Huchi'n hu suaahte chu a pawt va, lamkathuamte a va chiah in a muhphaah tan uh, misia, mipha, a bawn in a koukhawm va; kiteenna mun chu michialte in ahung dimta hi.
Huin kumpipa chu michialte en diing a ahung luut leh, kiteenna puan silh lou mi khat a muta a;
Huin ama'n a kawmah, Lawm, bangchidan ahiai, kiteenna puan silh lou a hia na hung luut, a chi a? Huin amah chu a haam keei sih a.
Huin kumpipa’n a suaahte kawmah, A khut leh a keeng kaan unla, pawdoh unla, polam mial ah paaita un; huah kah leh hagawi a um diing.
Ajiahchu tampi kouh ahi a, tawmtakhat teel ahi uh, a chi hi.
Huin Pharisaite chu a chiah va, a thusoi a mat theihna diing dan a va kihou va.

Huleh amahun a nungjuite uleh Herod pawlte a kawmah a sawl va, hute’n chu a kawmah, Houtupa, midihtah na hi a, dihtahin Pathian lam thu na hilh a, mi koimah khawhsah tuam na nei sih chih ka he uhi; ajiahchu koimah khentuam na nei sih hi.
Hujiahin bangchi na sa ei? hung hilh in; Kaisar kawma siah tawi siang aha, siang lou? a chi va.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a lungsim uh giit louhdan chu a he a, Milepchiahte, bang diinga hung ze-et na hi viai?
Siah sum chu hung ensah un, a chi a. Huin a kawmah makhai khat ahung tawi va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, hi koi lim ahiai? a chi a.
Amahun a kawmah, Kaisar a, a chi va. Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Kaisar sil chu Kaisar kawmah pia unla, Pathian sil chu Pathian kawmah pia un, a chi a.
Amahun hi thute a jah un thumah a sa mahmah va, amah a nusia va, a chiah mangta uhi.
Hu ni mahin Sadukaite, thohkiitna a um sih chite a kawmah a hung va,
Houtupa, Mosi in, Mi ta nei lou a, a sih leh, a unaupa’n a ji luah in, a unaupa diingin chi a hahsah diing ahi, a chi hi.
Tuin ka kawmvah unau pasal sagih a um va; huleh a upapen in ji a nei a, a sita a; chi a hah louh jiahin a ji chu a unaupa a nuutsiatta a.
Huchimahbangin a nihna zong ta beiin a si a, a thumna in a luah a, a sagihna tanin a nei chiat uh.
Huchi'n a tawp ah numeinu zong a sita hi.
Ahihleh thohkiitna ah amahnu chu sagihte laha koipen ji ahita diai? a bawnun la a nei chiat ngal va, chi'n a dong uh a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Pathian lehkhathu leh Pathian silbawltheihna na heet louh jiahun, na sukhial veu uhi.
Thohkiitna ah kiteenna a um nawnta sih a, teeng zong a kiteengsahta sih uh, vaan a angelte tobang ahi uhi.
Hizongleh misi thohkiitna thu a Pathian in na kawmva a soi chu simkha lou na hi uh maw?
Kei chu Abraham Pathian, Isaak Pathian, Jakob Pathian ka hi, a chih chu. Pathian chu misi Pathian ahi sih a, mihing Pathian ahi zaw, a chi a.
Huleh mipite’n huchu a jah un, a thuhilh chu thumah a sa mahmah uhi.
Hizongleh ama’n Sadukaite a nialdang chih a jah tahun Pharisaite chu a kikhawm va.
Huleh a lahva daansiam khat in amah ze-et in thu khat a dong a.
Houtupa, daan thu ah bang ahiai thupiah lianpen? chi'n.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Lalpa na Pathian chu na lungtang zousiah in, na hagau zousiah in, na lungsim zousiah in na lungsiat diing ahi, chih.
Huchu thupiah masa leh lianpen ahi.
Huleh a nihna chu hibangmah ahi, Nangmah na kilungsiat bangin na innveengte na lungsiat diing ahi, chih.
Hi thupiah nihte tungah daan thu leh zawlneite thu zousiah a kikhaikhawm veh ahi, a chi hi.
Pharisaite a kikhop laiun, Jesu’n amahuh thu a dong a.
Khrist hi bang na chi ngaih viai? koi ta ahiai? a chi a. Amahun a kawmah, David tapa, a chi va.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Ahihleh bangchidana David in hagau a amah chu,
Lalpa’n ka Lalpa kawmah, Na meelmate na keengpeeh nuaia ka koih masiah ka jiatlam ah tou in, chia, Lalpa a chih ahiai;
Huchia David in amah chu Lalpa a chih ngal leh, a tapa bang a chi hih diai? a chi a.
Huin koima'n amah chu kam khat in zong a dawng thei sih va, hu nia kipatin koima’n thu dang mawngmawng a dong kiit ngamta sih uhi.
Huin Jesu’n mipite leh a nungjuite kawmah thu a soi a,
Lehkhagialtute leh Pharisaite chu Mosi touphah ah a tou uhi;
Hujiahin juih diing chi a ahung hilh photmah uh jui unla, bawl jel un; hizongleh amahuh silbawl bang chu bawl sih un; amahun a soi va, a bawl tuan sih uhi.
Vangih puaah hah tahtah a siam va, mi liangkou ah a suan va; amahun lah a khutzung khat un zong a khoih nuam sih uh.
Amahun a bawl zousiah uh chu mi muh diing a bawl ahi uh; a sil buh uleh khipte uh a sulian va, a puan mongte uh a tualsah uh;
Huleh ankuang luinate ah mun saangpen, huleh kikhopna inn ah touna hoihpen bang a deih uh,
Huleh dawlmun a mi’n chibai a buuh uh bang, Rabbi, Rabbi, chia a kouh uh bang a ut uhi.
Hizongleh nanguh chu Rabbi chihin um sih un; ajiahchu na Houtupa uh khat a um, Khrist ngei chu; huleh nanguh na bawnun unau na hi uhi.
Huleh leitung ah koimah pa chi sih un; ajiahchu na Pa uh khat ahi a, vaan a um chu.
Houtute chihin um sih un, ajiahchu na Houtu uh khat a um, Khrist chu.
Na lahva loupipen chu na suaah un a um diing ahi.
Huleh koipouh a kiliansah chu suhneu ahi diing a; huleh koipouh kingaineu chu tawisangin a um diing hi.
Hizongleh nanguh lehkhagialtu leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tunguh a gih hi! vaan lalgam lampi mite na khaahsah va; nanguh lah na luut ngal sih va, mi a luut diingte lah na luutsah sih uhi.
Nanguh lehkhagialtu leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tunguh a gih hi! ajiahchu meithaite inn na negam va, mi heemna’n sawtpipi na haamtei uh; hujiahin siamlouhtanna liansem na mu diing uhi.

Nanguh lehkhagialtu leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tunguh a gih hi! ajiahchu mi khat Juda phungkai a siam diingin zong tui khang lian leh gam ah na chiah kiimvel va, huleh huchi na siam zoh chiangun amah chu nanguh sanga a lehnih a gawtmun mi diingin na siam veu uhi.
Nanguh mittaw ma puite, Koipouh Pathian biahinn loua kichiam chu bangmah ahi sih a, hizongleh koipouh Pathian biahinn a sana loua kichiamin chu a taangtun diing ahi, chite haw, na tunguh a gih hi.
Nanguh mingol leh mittawte; sana leh sana siangthousah Pathian biahinn a khoi loupizaw ahiai?
Huleh koipouh maitaam lou a kichiam chu, bangmah ahi sih; hizongleh a tunga um silpiah lou a kichiam in a taangtun diing ahi, na chi uh.
Nanguh mingol leh mittawte; silpiah leh silpiah susiang maitaam chu khoi loupizaw ahiai?
Huchi'n koipouh maitaam lou a kichiam phot in, maitaam leh a tunga um zousiah lou in a kichiam ahi.
Huleh koipouh Pathian biahinn lou a kichiam chu, Pathian biahinn leh a sunga um zousiah lou in a kichiam ahi.
Huleh vaan lou a kichiam phot chu, Pathian laltouphah leh a tunga toupa lou a kichiam ahi.

Nanguh lehkhagialtu leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tunguh a gih hi! ajiahchu nangun pudina leh mohuri huleh jira bang sawmakhat na pia va, huleh daanthu poimohzaw thukhen dihna bang, zahngaihna bang huleh ginumna bang na thudon sih uhi; hite chu ahi na bawl ngei diing uh a dangte zong bawl lou tuanlouin.
Nanguh puitu mittawte, thousi hisiang a sangawngsaau valh veute haw.
Nanguh lehkhagialtu leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tunguh a gih hi! ajiahchu nangun nou leh kuang polam na susiang va, hizongleh a sung lah leepguuhna leh kisumlouhna in a dim ngal a.
Nang Pharisai mittaw, nou leh kuang sunglam susiang masa in, huchi'n a polam zong ahung siang thei diing hi.
Nanguh lehkhagialtu leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tunguh a gih hi! ajiahchu nanguh hi haan kinuh vaam, a polam mawitaha kilang a, a sunglam lah misi guh leh silniinte a dim bang na hi uhi.
Hutobangmahin nanguh zong polama mihing mitmuh in, dihtat bangin na lang va, hizongleh na sunglam uh chu lepchiahna leh giitlouhna in a dim hi.
Nanguh lehkhagialtu leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tunguh a gih hi! ajiahchu zawlneite haan na bawl va, huleh midihtat haante zong na jem uh,
Huleh, Ka pu leh pate uh damlaia na um hile ung, zawlneite sisan a suahna vah tel lou diing hi ve ung, na chi uhi.
Huchi'n zawlneite thatte tate na hi uh chih na kihesah uhi.
Na pi leh pute uh tehna daan sudim ngal mei un.
Nanguh guulte, nanguh guul haahte, bangchi'n ahiai gawtmun siamlouhtanna na pelh theih diing uh?

Hujiahin, ngai un, na kawmvah zawlneite, mipilte, huleh lehkhagialtute ka hung sawl ahi; a lahva khenkhat na that diing va kros ah na kilhbeh diing uh; huleh khenkhatte chu na kikhopna inn vah na jep diing va, huleh khochin ah na sawi jel diing uh;

Huchi'n midihtat Abel sisan kisuah apat, Pathian biahinn leh maitaam kikal a Barakia tapa Zakaria na thah va a sisan suah tanphain, leitung a midihtatte sisan kisuah zousiah na tungvah ahung tung thei diing hi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, hi silte zousiah tulai khang thahte tungah ahung tung diing hi.

Aw, Jerusalem, Jerusalem, zawlneite thattu, na kawma kisawlte suang a na seplumtu, aahpi in a noute aha nuaia a opkhum banga ke'n zong na tate bangzatvei opkhum ahiai ka tup taah, hizongleh na ut sih uhi.
Ngai un, na inn uh a hawm a nuutsiat in a umta hi.
Ka hung hilh ahi, Lalpa min a hung chu a hampha hi, na chih masangsiah uh, tukal na hung mu nawn sih diing uhi, a chi.
Huleh Jesu chu Pathian biahinn apat pawt in a chiahta a; huleh Pathian biahinn kibawl daante ensah diingin a nungjuite a kawmah a hung va.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, Hi sil zousiah na mu sih uh maw? Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Suang suhchip louha kithuap mawngmawng hitah ah a um sih diing, a chi a.

Huleh Olive taang tunga a tou laiin, nungjuite a kawmah aguuhin a hung va, hi silte bangchihchiangin ahung um diai? huleh na hung kiitna diing leh khovel tawpna diing chiamchihna bang adiai? hung hilh in, a chi va.
Huin Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Mi koimah in ahung heem louhna diingin pilvaang un.
Ajiahchu mi tampi in, Khrist ka hi, Huchi'n ka min in ahung diing va; mi tampi a heem zou diing uhi.
Huleh kidou leh kidou thuthangte na ja diing va; na lungdon louhna diingun pilvaang un; ajiahchu hi silte zousiah hung um diing mawng ahi a, hizongleh a tawpna ahi nai sih diing.
Nam tuam leh nam tuam, gam tuam leh gam tuam a kidou diing va; huleh mun tuamtuam ah kial bang a tung diing, hii bang a leeng diing a, ziil bang a liing diing hi.
Hite zousiah chu gentheihna kipatna ahi.
Hu hun chiangin nanguh chu suhgim diingin ahung mansah diing va, ahung that diing uh; huleh ka min jiahin nam zousiah huat na hi diing uh.
Huleh mi tampi a puuh diing va, khat leh khat a kimansah diing va, khat leh khat a kimudah diing uh.
Huleh zawlnei tahlou tampi ahung pawt diing va, mi tampi a heem zou diing uh.
Huleh sualna a pun diing jiahin mi tampite lungsiatna chu ahung daai diing.
Hizongleh a tawp donga thuaah zou, hu mi chu hutdamin a um diing.
Huleh hi lalgam Tanchinpha chu nam zousiah heetsahna diingin khovel pumpi ah soi in a um diing; huzohchiangin a tawpna chu ahung tung diing hi.
Hujiahin sumangbangtu kihdahhuai, zawlnei Daniel in ana soi chu mun siangthou a ding na muh chiangun (a sim phot in hesiam uheh).
Huchih hun chiangin Judia gam a umte taang ah tai uh heh;
Inn tunga um chu a inn sungah bang aha ladoh diingin hung kumsuh sih heh;
Lou a um zong a puante la diingin hung kiih sih heh.
Huleh, hu ni chiangin gaaite leh naungeeh neite tung a gih hi!
Hizongleh na tai hun uh phalbi lai ahih louh a, khawlni zong ahihlouhna diingin haamtei un.
Ajiahchu hu hun chiangleh gimthuaahna nasatah um diing ahi, hutobanga gimthuaahna loupi chu khovel siam chiil apat tutanin a um ngei sih a, um zong a um nawn sih diing hi.
Huleh hu nite chu suhtom hilou hileh mihing mawngmawng hing in a suaahta sih diing; hizongleh teelte jiahin hu nite chu suhtom ahi diing hi.
Hu hun chiangleh koipouh in na kawmvah, En in, hi-ah Khrist a um, ahihlouhleh, huah a um chi zongleh tahsang sih un.
Ajiahchu Khrist tahlou leh zawlnei tahlou ahung pawt diing a, chiamchihna leh silmah loupitahtah ahung ensah diing uhi; huah chu ahihtheihleh teelte ngei zong ahung heem diing uhi.
Ngai un, a ma in ka hung hilh lawhta ahi.
Hujiahin, na kawmva, Ngai un, gamdai ah a um, ahung chih uleh chiahdoh sih un; ngai un, pindan sunggil ah a um, ahung chih uleh tahsang sih un.
Ajiahchu chu nisuaahna lama kawl ahung phet a ni tumnalam tana a salhvaah bangin, mihing Tapa hung kiitna zong huchimah bang diing ahi.
Saluang umna photah musanete zong a umkhawm diing hi.
Hu gimthuaahna nite zohtahleh ni chu suhmial in a um diing a, ha chu a vaah nawn sih diing a, vaan apatin aahsite ahung ke diing, huleh vaan silbawltheihna chu suhliing ahi diing hi.

Hu hun chiangin vaan ah mihing Tapa chiamchihna chu ahung kilang diing a; hutahchiangleh lei tunga jat zousiah in a suun diing uh, huleh mihing Tapa chu silbawltheihna leh gualzohna loupi toh vaan mei tunga hung a mu diing uhi.
Huleh ama’n a angelte chu pengkuul ging nasatah toh a sawlkhe diing a, huleh amahun a teelte chu lei ning li akipan, vaan tawp akipan a lehlam tawp tanphain a khawm diing uhi.
Huchi'n theipi kungah tehkhinthu zil un; a ka ahung meen a, a nah ahung sel chiangin nipi a naita chih na he uhi;
Huchimahbangin nangun zong hi silte na muh chiangun, a naita a, kotbul mahmah ah a umta chih he un.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Hi silte a tunkim masiah tulai khang thahte a mang sih diing uhi.
Vaan leh lei a mang diing a, hizongleh ka thu a mang sih diing hi.
Hizongleh hu ni diing leh a hun diing chu Pa chauh loungal koimah in, vaan a angelte’n zong a he sih uhi.
Hizongleh Noah damlai bangin, mihing Tapa hung kiitna zong ahi diing hi.
Ajiahchu tuijiin tun matengin, Noah kuang a, a luut ni tanin, a ne un a dawn va, ji leh pasal in a kinei uh.
Huleh tuijiin a tun a, a bawnva a laahmang masiah bangmah a he sih uhi; mihing Tapa hung kiitna zong huchibangmah ahi diing hi.
Hu hunchiangin lou ah mi nih a um diing va; khat chu laahmangin a um diing a, khat chu nuutsiatin a um diing.
Numei nih buhgawina ah buh gawtin a um diing va; khat chu laahmang in a um diing a, khat chu nuutsiatin a um diing hi.
Hujiahin kiging un, na Lalpa uh bangchih huna ahung diing chih na heet louh jiahun.
Hizongleh hichu he un, inn neitu in guta hung diing hun he leh, a veeng diing a, a inn a luhsah sih diing hi.
Hujiahin kiging zingin um un; ajiahchu na ngaihtuah louh laitah va mihing Tapa chu hung diing ahi.
Ahihleh a pu in a hunchin a, a tan diing uh hawmsah diing a a innkuanpihte tunga houtu a, a koih suaah muanhuai chu koi ahiai?
A pu hung chiangin huchibanga bawl ahung muh, hu suaah chu a hampha hi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Ama’n amah chu a neih zousiah tungah houtu in a siam diing hi.
Hizongleh suaah gilou in a lungsim in, Ka pu chu hung baih lou diing ahi, chi'n,
A suaah hihpihte na vua in, zukham ankhamte kawmah ne in na dawnta leh,
Hu suaahpa pu chu, a gintaat louh ni, a kiveen louh laitahin a hung diing a,
Huleh amah chu tum nih suah in, milepchiahte tan bang a tangsah diing a; huah chu kah leh hagawi a um diing hi.
Hu hun chiangin vaan lalgam chu nungaah siangthou sawm, a thaumei uh keng a, mouneitu dawn diing a pawtkhete toh teh ahi diing.
Huleh a lahvah mi ngaa a pil va, ngaa a ngol uhi.
Hu a ngolte’n chu a thaumei uh a keng va, thautui a kengtel sih uhi;
Hizongleh a pilte’n chu a thaumei u’toh a uum ah a tui zong a kengtel uhi.
Mouneitu chu ahung vaigeih jiahin a bawnun a lusu va ana ihmu vehta uhi.
Huleh jan khang laiin, Ngai in, mouneitu a hung hi, a dawn diingin pawtdoh un; chia kikou ging a umta a.
Hu tahin hu nungaahte chu a thou veh va, a thaumei uh a deta va.
Huleh a ngolte’n a pilte kawmah, Na thautui uh hung hawm un; ka thaumeite uh mit diing ahita hi, a chi va.
Hizongleh a pilte’n a dawng va, Keiuh leh nanguh diing a kidaih sih diing hi; a zuahte kawmah va chiah unla va kilei un, a chi va.
Huleh amahuh a lei diing a a va chiah kal un mouneitu chu a hungta a; huleh kigingsa a na umte chu amah toh moulopna inn ah a luut khawmta va; huin kot chu a kikhaahta hi.
Hu nungin hu nungaah dangte zong a hung va, Lalpa, Lalpa, kot hung hon in, a chi va.
Hizongleh ama’n a dawng a, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, nanguh ka hung thei sih, a chi a.
Hujiahin kiging un, ajiahchu mihing Tapa hung diing ni leh a hun na he ngal sih uhi.
Vaangam chu mi khat in a suaahte koukhawm a, a thuampuate a khut va kemsah a, khual gamlataha jinmang bang ahi.
Huleh ama’n a suaah khat kawmah talent ngaa, a suaah dang khat kawmah talent nih, huleh a suaah dang khat kawmah talent khat a pia a; amahun ahihtheih hun diing chiat un a pia a, amah chu a jinta hi.
Huin talent ngaa tangpa chu kuanin a va sumdawng a, talent ngaa dang a muhbeh a.
Huleh huchimah bangin talent nih tangpa’n zong talent nih dang a muhbeh a.
Hizongleh talent khat tangpa chu a chiah a, lei a tou a, a pu dangka chu a phuumta hi.
Hun sawttah nungin hu suaahte pu chu ahung tungta a, amahuh toh sum a sutuaahta a.
Huchi'n talent ngaa tangpa a hung a, talent ngaa dang ahung tawi beh a, Pu, nang talent ngaa na hung kemsah a; en in talent ngaa dang ka muhbeh hi, a chi a.
A pu in a kawmah, Suaah hoih leh ginum, na bawl hoih hi; sil tawmtakhat tungah na ginum a, sil tampi tungah thuneitu in ka hung koih diing hi; na pu kipaahna ah luut in, a chi a.
Talent nih tangpa zong a hung a; Pu, nang talent nih na hung kemsah a; en in, talent nih dang ka muhbeh hi, a chi a.
A pu in a kawmah, Suaah hoih leh ginum, na bawl hoih hi, sil tawmtakhat tungah na ginum a, sil tampi tungah thuneitu in ka hung koih diing hi; na pu kipaahna ah luut in, a chi a.
Huin talent khat tangpa chu a hung a, Pu, mi kheltah na hi a, na tuh louhna ah na aat a, na theh louhna ah zong na khawm jel chih ka hung he hi;
Hujiahin ka hung lau a, va chiah in na talent chu lei nuaiah ka va phuum a; en in, hi-ah nang a mah na kimuh kiitta hi, a chi a.
A pu in a dawng a, a kawmah, Nang suaah gilou leh zawmthopa, ka tuh louhna ah ka aat a, ka theh louhna ah ka lakhawm veu hi chih na he maw?
Huchi a hihnung, ka dangka chu sumdawngte kawma na va koih diing a, huchia ka hung chianga ka sum chu a pung toh ka muh kiit diing ahi.
Hujiahin a talent chu laahsah unla, talent sawm neitu kawmah pia un.
Ajiahchu koipouh a nei chu piah beh ahi diing a, tampi ahung nei diing; hizongleh koipouh a nei lou chu a neih sun zong laahsah ahi diing hi.
Huleh suaah phatuamlou chu polam mial ah paaikhia un; huah chu kah leh hagawi a um diing hi, a chi hi.
Mihing Tapa chu angel siangthou zousiah toh a loupina a, a hung chiangin amah chu a loupina laltouphah tungah a tou diing hi;
Huleh a ma ah nam zousiah a khawm diing a, huleh ama’n amahuh haw chu belaampu in keel lah apata belaamte a khenkhiah bangin a khen diing.
Belaamte chu a jiatlamah a koih diing a, keelte chu a veilamah a koih diing.
Huchiangin Kumpipa in chu a jiatlamate kawmah, Nanguh ka Pa deihsahte, hung unla, khovel siam chiil apata nanguh diing a kibawl gam chu luah un;
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh ka gil a kialin an na hung pia va; ka dang a taahin dawn diing na hung pia va; mikhual ka hihin na hung zintun va;
Saguah a ka um in puan na hung silhsah va; damlou a ka um in na hung veh va; suangkul a ka taan in ka kawmah na hung uh, a chi diing.
Huchiangin midihtatte’n, Lalpa, bangchihin aha gilkiala ka hung muh va, an ka hung piah uh? dangtaah a ka hung muh va, tui ka hung piah uh.
Bangchihin ahiai mikhual a ka hung muh va ka hung na zintun uh? Saguah a ka hung na muh va puan ka hung silhsah uh?
Bangchihin ahiai china aha, ahihlouhleh suangkul a na taan aha ka hung muh va, na kawma ka hung uh? chi'n a dong diing uhi.
Huleh Kumpipa in chu a dawng diing a, a kawmvah, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Hi ka unaute laha neupen khat tunga na bawl uh chu ka tunga bawl na hi uh, a chi diing.
Huzohchiangin a veilama umte kawmah, Nanguh haamsethuaahte, ka kawm apat chiahmang unla, kumtuang mei, diabol leh a sawllehte diing a a bawl vah luutta un;
Ajiahchu ka gilkial in an na hung pe sih va; ka dangtaahin dawn diing na hung pe sih va;
Mikhual ka hih in na hung zintun sih va; saguah ka hih in puan na hung silhsah sih va; ka chinat leh suangkul a ka taan in na hung veh sih uhi, a chi diing.

Huchiangleh amahun zong a dawng diing va, Lalpa kei un bangchihin ahiai gilkial aha, dangtaah aha, mikhual aha, saguah aha, damlou aha, suangkul taang aha a ka hung muh va, na nna ka hung tohsah louh uh, a chi diing uh.
Huchiangin ama’n a dawng diing a, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Hite laha neupen khat tunga na bawl louh uh chu, ka tunga bawl lou na hi uhi, a chi diing.
Huleh hute chu kumtuang gawtmun ah a chiahta diing va; hizongleh midihtatte chu kumtuang hinna ah a chiahta diing uh, a chi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu’n hi thute chu a soi zohin, a nungjuite kawmah,
Ni nih zou chiangleh chiahkaan ankuang luina um diing ahi, huleh mihing Tapa chu kilhbeh diing a matsah in a um diing hi, chih na he uh ahi, a chi a.
Hu tahin siampu lalte leh lehkhagialtute, vaantang upate chu siampu lalpen Kaiapha a chih uh innpi ah a kikhawm va,
Huleh Jesu chu doha bawl a man a, a thah theihna diingun a kihoukhawm va,
Ahihvangin ankuang lui ni in hihdah heh, huchilou inchu mipi lahah buaina ahung umkha diing, a chi uhi.
Huleh Jesu chu Bethani khua a miphaah Simon inn a, a um laiin,
Huah chu numei khat Alabastar bawm a thau namtui luultah tawi in a kawmah a hung a, ankuang a, a tou laiin a lu ah a leih a.
Hizongleh a nungjuite’n hichu a muh un, a lungkimta sih va, Bang diinga hikhu mathaang a subei ahiai?
Hi thau hi a man tamtaha zuah a, huleh mizawngte kawma piah theih ahi ngal a, a chi va.
Jesu’n hichu a heetin a kawmvah, Bang diinga hi numeinu subuai na hi viai? amahnu’n ka tungah sil hoihtah a bawl ahi.
Ajiahchu mizawngte na kawmvah a um zing uhi, hizongleh kei chu na kawmva um zing ka hi sih hi.
Hi thau namtui ka tunga a leih chu vuia ka um ni a diingin ahih ahi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Khoi munah zong, khovel pumpi ah hi tanchinpha kisoina photah, hi numeinu silbawl zong amah heetzingna diingin a soi jel diing uhi, a chi hi.
Huin sawmlehnihte laha khat, Juda Iskariot a chih u’chu siampu lalte kawmah a va chiah a,
Huleh a kawmvah, Amah ka hung pekhe diing a, bang na hung pe diing viai? a va chi a. Huleh amahun dangka sawmthum piah diingin a kikhaampihta va.
Hunungsiah chu amah matsahna diing lemtaang a hawlta hi.
Huchi'n tanghou tol sohlouh ankuang luina ni masapen in, nungjuite Jesu kawmah a hung va, a kawmah, chiahkaan ankuang na neehna diing khoi munah hung guatsah le’ung na ut ei? a chi va.
Huin ama’n, Khopi ah chiah unla, mi khat kawmah, Houtupa’n ka hun a naita a, ka nungjuite toh na inn ah chiahkaan ankuang ka nekhawm diing uh, a chi hi, va chi un, a chi a.
Huleh nungjuite’n chu Jesu’n a hilh bangin a bawl va; huleh chiahkaan ankuang chu a bawl zouta uhi.
Huleh nitaahlam ahung hihin, nungjui sawmlenihte toh ankuang a uum va.
Huleh a neeh laiun, ama’n, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Na lahva mi khat in kei ahung mansah diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh amahuh chu a lungdong mahmahta va, a kawmah, Lalpa, kei ka hi maw, a chi chiatta va.
Huin ama’n a dawng a, An kuang hung sawhpihpa ngei in kei ahung mansah diing hi.
Mihing Tapa chu a tanchin kigial bang jelin a pai diing ahi; hizongleh mihing Tapa mansah diingpa tung a gih hi! hupa chu ana pianglou hileh amah diingin a hoihzaw diing hi, a chi a.
Huin a mansahtupa Juda in a dawng a, Houtupa, kei ka hi maw? a chi a. Ama’n a kawmah, Nangma'n na chita hi, a chi a.
Huleh an a neeh laiun, Jesu’n tanghou a la a, a vangpiah a, a balkeeh a, huleh a nungjuite a pia a, La unla, ne un; hichu ka tahsa ahi, a chi a.
Huin nou a la a, kipaahthu a soi a, a kawmvah a pia a, Na bawnun dawn un;
Hichu sualnate ngaihdamna diing a mi tampite diinga pawt thuhun thah a ka sisan chu ahi.
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, Ka Pa gam a nanguh toh a thah a ka dawn ni a tun masiah, tukal hi grepgah tui ka dawn kiit nawn sih diing hi, a chi hi.
Huleh la khat a sah zou un a pawt va, Olive taang ah a chiahta uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, Tu jan chiangin na bawnun, ka tunga lungthuai veh diing na hi uhi; ajiahchu, Belaampu ka jep diing a, huleh belaamhon chu a dalhjah diing uh, chih gelh ahi.
Hizongleh ka thohkiit nung chiangin Galili gam ah na ma vah ka chiah diing, a chi a.
Peter in a dawng a, a kawmah, Mi zousiah na tungah lungthuai veh zongle uh kei chu ka lungthuai sih diing, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Tu jan chiang leh, aahkhuan ma in thumvei na hung kihetmohbawl diing, a chi a.
Peter in a kawmah, Nang toh sikhawm diing hizongleng ka hung kihetmohbawl sih diing, a chi a. Hubangmahin nungjuite zousiah in zong a chi chiat uhi.
Huin Jesu chu amahuh toh mun khat, Gethsemani a chih uh a tung a, huleh a nungjuite kawmah, Paama ka va haamtei kalin hi-ah na tou un, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n Peter leh Zebedi tapate nih a pui a, lungsim in a mangbangta a.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Ka lungsim sihna khopin a lunggim hi; hi-ah um unla, hung veenpih un, a chi a.
Huin amah chu themkhat a chiah gamla deuh a, a khupboh a, Aw Pa, ahihtheihleh hi nou hung peelsah in; ahihvangin keimah thu hilouin nang thuthu hizaw heh, chi'n a haamtei a.
Huleh nungjuite kawmah a hung a, amahuh chu ihmuin ahung mu a, huin Peter kawmah, Nangun daahkal khat zong hung veenpih zoulou na hi uh maw?
Heemna a na luut louhna diingun kiging zingin haamtei un; hagau in chu a peih a, tahsa chu a haat sih hi, a chi a.
A nihveina ah ava chiah kiit a, Aw Pa, ka dawn louha hi nou in hung peel thei lou ahihleh, nang thuthu hita heh, chi'n a haamtei a.
Huin a hung a, amahuh ihmuin ahung mu kiit a; ajiahchu a ihmut uh a suaah mahmah hi.
Huleh amahuh a nusia a, a chiah kiita, a thumveina ah a soi ngei soi in, a haamtei kiit a.
Huin a nungjuite kawmah a hung a, a kawmvah, Tuin chu ihmu unla khawldamta un, ngai un, a hun ahung tungta hi, Mihing Tapa hi misualte khutah matsah ahita.
Thou unla, i chiah diing uh; en un, ahung mansahtu diing ahung tungta hi, a chi hi.
Huleh a soi laiin, en un, sawmlenihte laha khat, Juda chu, siampu lalte leh upate kawma kipat, mipi nasatah mai namsaau leh khetbuuh tawite toh a hungta a.
Huleh a mansahtu diingpa in amahuh chiamchihna a hilh masa a, Ka tawp penpen amah ahi diing hi; amah chu man un, chi'n.
Huleh ama’n chu Jesu ahung zuanpah a, Chibai, Houtupa, a chi a; huin amah chu a tawp a.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmah, Lawm, bang diinga hung na hiai? a chi a. Huin amahuh a hung va, Jesu tungah khut a ha va, a manta uhi.
Huleh ngai in, Jesu umpihte laha mi khat in a khut in a sawh a, a namsaau a doh a, siampu lal suaahpa a saat a, a bil a saatkhiahsah hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, Na namsaau a koihna ah koih kiit in; ajiahchu namsaau pan photmah namsaau maha si diing ahi uhi.
Tuin zong angel saanggup mun sawmlenih sanga tamzaw hung sawlsah diing a ka Pa kawma ngen thei lou hung sa na hi uh maw?
Hizongleh huchi hitaleh, Pathian lehkhathu hitobanga hung um ngei diing chu bangchi'n a taangtung theita diai? a chi a.
Hu daahkal mahin Jesu’n mipite kawmah, Guta man diing bang jenin, namsaau leh khetbuuh tawiin kei man diingin na hung u'maw? Nichin in Pathian biahinn ah thuhilh in ka tou a, na hung man sih va.
Hizongleh zawlnei lehkhathu ahung taangtun theihna diing a hite zousiah hung um ahi, a chi a. Huin nungjuite zousiah in a nusia va, a taita uhi.
Huleh Jesu mantute’n amah chu siampu lalpen Kaiapha inn a lehkhagialtute leh upate umkhawmna ah a pui va.
Hizongleh Peter in siampu lalpen innpi dongin gamlatahin a jui a, huin a va luut a, a tawpna heet tum in veengtute lahah a va tou a.
Huleh siampu lalte leh upate leh vaaihawmte zousiah in, Jesu chu a thah theihna diingun heetpihtu dihlou a hawl va;
Hizongleh a mu sih uh; ahi, heetpihtu dihlou tamtah ahung vang un, a mu tuan sih uh. A tawpah heetpihtu dihlou nih a hung va,
Hi Pa’n Pathian biahinn susia a ni thum sunga bawl kiit thei ka hi, a chi hi, a chi va.
Huin Siampu lalpen chu a dingdoh a, a kawmah, Bangmahin na dawng sih maw? hite hung heehna bangchidan ahiai? a chi a.
Hizongleh Jesu chu a haam keei sih a. Huin siampu lalpen in a kawmah, Pathian hing min in ka hung vau ahi, Pathian Tapa Khrist na hihleh hih louh hung hilh in, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Na chita hi: himahleh ka hung hilh ahi, Tunung chiangleh mihing Tapa silbawltheihna jiatlama tou leh, vaan mei tunga hung na mu diing uhi, a chi a.
Huin siampu lalpen in a puan a botkeeh a, Pathian a soisia hi; heetpihtu dang bang diing i chi nalai diai? ngai un, Pathian a soisiatna chu tuin na ja uhi.
Bang na chi ngaih viai? a chi a. Amahun a dawng va, Si taah ahi, a chi va.
Huin a maaitang ah chil a siat va, a tuum va, huleh a dangte’n a khutpeeh un a beeng va,
Nang Khrist, hung hilh in, koi ahiai ahung beeng? a chi uhi.
Huleh Peter chu polamah huang sungah a tou a, huleh nungaah khat a kawmah a hung a, Nang zong Galili mi Jesu toh lawikhat na hi, a chi a.
Hizongleh ama’n chu, Na thusoi ka he sih, chi'n a bawnva ma ah hemoh a kipang a.
Huin innliima ava pawt tahin nungaah dang in amah chu ana mu-a, hu mun a umte kawmah, Hi mipa zong Nazareth Jesu kawma um ahi, a chi a.
Huin ama’n, Hupa zaw ka he sih, chia kichiam in a kiheetmohbawl kiitta hi.
Huleh tomkhat zouin hu mun a dingte a hung va, Peter kawmah, Nang zong a lahva khat na hi ngei mei; ajiahchu na haam in a kihe hi, a chi va.
Huin ama’n, Hupa chu ka he top sih, chi'n haamsia kilohin a kichiamta a. Huin aah a khuangpahta hi.
Huleh Peter in Jesu thusoi, aahkhuan ma in thumvei na hung kiheetmohbawl diing, a chih chu ahung hedohta a. Huin polam ah a pawt a, a kap huthutta hi.
Jingkal ahung hihin, siampu lalte leh vaantaang upate zousiah Jesu thahna diingin a kihoukhawm va;
Huin amah chu a kaan va, a pui va, gamoptu Pontia Pilat kawmah a pekheta uhi.
Huin Juda a mansahtu in Jesu siamlouh a tangsah uh chih a heet in a kisiih a, hu dangka sawmthum chu siampu lalte leh upate kawmah ahung tawi kiit a,
Mikhial lou sisan ka matsah chu ka sual ahi, a chi a. Huleh amahun, Hu kei uh diingin bang a khawh diai? nang na lohloh kilohta in, a chi va.
Huin ama’n dangka chu Pathian biahinn sungah a sepluut a, a pawt a, chiah in ava kikhailum hi.
Huleh siampu lalte’n dangka chu a la va, Sisan man ahih jiahin hichu thohlawm bawm a koih a siang sih hi, a chi va.
Huleh a kihoukhawm va, mikhual vuina diingin hu sum in beelkhengtu mun a leita uh.
Hujiahin hu mun chu tutanin, Sisan mun a chi uhi.
Huchi'n zawlnei Jeremiah thusoi, Israel tate laha koite aha in ana sahsa uh, amah man diing dangka sawmthum chu a la va;
Huleh Lalpa hung chiam bangin, beelkhengtu mun man diingin a pia uh, a chih chu hung taangtung ahita hi.
Huin Jesu chu gamoptu ma ah a ding a, huleh gamoptu’n, Judate Kumpipa na hi maw? chi'n a dong a, Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, Hi e, a chi a.
Huleh siampu lalte leh upate’n amah a heeh laiun bangmahin a dawng sih hi.
Huin Pilat in a kawmah, Ahung heehna zoujai uh jalou na hi maw? a chi a.
Huleh ama’n kamkhat in zong a dawng sih a; huphetin gamoptu’n thum ah a sa mahmah hi.
Huleh gual vaah ni chianga gamoptu’n suangkul taang khat, mipite’n a teel penpen uh a hahsah veu ahi a.
Hulaiin Barabba a chih uh, gilou a kithangtah suangkul taang khat a um a.
Hujiahin amahuh ahung kikhop tahun, Pilat in a kawmvah, Koi zaw ahiai ka hung hahdohsah na deih uh? Barabba ahiai? Jesu Khrist kichi? a chi a.
Ajiahchu thangsiat jiaha a matsah uh ahi chih ama’n a he hi.
Huleh vaihawmna touphah a, a tou laiin, a ji in a kawmah mi a sawl a, Hu mi dih tungah bangmah bawl sin; ajiahchu amah jiahin tu ni’n ka mang in sil tampi ka thuaah hi, a va chisah hi.
Hizongleh siampu lalte leh upate’n Barabba chu ngen a, Jesu chu sulum diingin mipite a heem va.
Gamoptu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Nihte laha koi zaw hung hahkhe leng chi na hi viai? a chi a. Amahun, Barabba, a chi va.
Pilat in a kawmvah, Ahihleh Jesu Khrist kichi hi bang ka lohta diai? a chi a. Amahun a bawnun a kawmah, Kros ah kilhbeh in um heh, a chi va.
Huin gamoptu’n, Bang diingin eimaw? Bang bawlsual a nei ei? a chi a Amahun a bawnun, Kros ah kilhbeh in um heh, chi'n a kikou saan uhi.
Pilat in bangmah loh theih louh leh, buaina semsem hi diing ahi chih a muh tahin, tui a la a, mipi ma a, a khut sil in, Hi mi dih sisan ah mohna bei ka hi; nangun na lohloh kiloh un, a chi a.
Huin mipi zousiah in a dawng va, A sisan phuba chu keiuh tung leh ka tate uh tungah tu heh, a chi va.
Huin ama’n Barabba chu a kawmvah a hahkhiahsahta a; huleh Jesu chu a jep zohin kilhbeh diingin a pedohta hi.
Huin gamoptu sepaihte’n Jesu chu innpi ah a puiluut va, a kawmah sepaih hon a bawnin a khawm va.
Huleh amah puan a hawhkhiahsah va, puansandup a silhsah uhi.
Huleh linglukhuh a phan va, a khuhsah va, a khut jiatlam ah sialluang a tawisah va; huleh a ma ah a khupdin va, Chibai, Judate Kumpipa! chi'n chiamnuih bawlna in a nei uhi.
Huleh a tungah chil a siat va, sialluang chu laahsah in a lu a jepna uhi.
Huleh amah chiamnuih bawlna a neih zoh un, puansandup chu a hawhkhiahsah va, kilhbeh diingin a puita uhi.
Huleh ahung pawtdoh uleh, Cyrene mi, a min Simon kichi mi khat a mu va; amah chu a kros paw diingin a man uhi.
Huleh Golgotha kichi mun ahung tun un, huchu luguh mun chihna ahi.
Amah chu uain thuuh, silkha toh kihal dawn diingin a pia va: ama’n huchu a chiam a, a dawn nuamta sih hi.
Huleh amah chu kros ah a kilh va, huleh aaisaan in a puante chu a kihawm va; zawlnei in, Ka puante chu a kihawm va, ka puannaah tungah aai a saan uh, chia ana soi a taangtunna diingin.
Huleh huah a tou va, amah chu a veengta uhi.
Huleh a heehna; Hichu JUDATE KUMPIPA Jesu ahi, chia gelh a lu tungah a taah uhi.
Huleh amah toh suamhaat mi nih zong a kilhbeh va, a jiatlam ah khat, a veilam ah khat.
Huleh mi vaahleh phot in a lu uh thing in, a elhou va,
Nang, Pathian biahinn susia a ni thum sunga bawl kiitpa, nang leh nang kihunkheta’n Pathian Tapa na hih leh kros dawn apat hung kumkhia in, a chi va.
Hubangmahin siampu lalte’n zong elhou in, lehkhagialtute leh upate toh,
Ama’n midang a hundam a; amah leh amah laha kihundam thei sih. Israelte Kumpipa ahihleh kros dawn apat hung kumta henla, huchileh ka gingta mei diing uh.
Ama’n Pathian a muang vele; Amah deih ahihleh tuin hunkheta hen; Pathian Tapa ka hi, a chi ngal a, a chi va.
Hu suamhaatte, amah toh a kilhbehte un zong huchimahin a elhou uhi.
Huleh pung guupna apatin pung kuaahna tandongin leitung pumpi ahung mialta a.
Huleh pung kuaahna diing velin, Jesu chu aw ngaihtahin a kikou a, Eli, Eli, lamasabakthani? a chi a. Huchu, Ka Pathian, ka Pathian, bang diinga hung taisan na hitai? chihna ahi.
Amah kawma ding khenkhatte’n huchu a jah un, Hipa’n Elijah a kou ahi, a chi va.
Huleh a lahva mi khat a taipah a, spanji a la a, uain thuuh ah a diah a, sialluang mongah a taah a, a dawn diingin a petou hi.
A dangte’n chu, Huchisah in; amah hundam diingin Elijah ahung naimah i en diing uh, a chi va.
Jesu chu aw ngaihtahin a kikou kiit a, a hagau a hahta hi.
Huleh ngai in, Pathian biahinn puanjah chu a tunglam apatin a nuailam tanin keeh nih ahung kisuaha; huleh ziil ahung liing a, suangpite ahung pawhkeeh a,
Huleh haante ahung kihong a; misiangthou ihmusate sapum tampi kaihthoh in a umta uh,
Huleh amah thohkiit nungin haante apat hung pawtdohin khopi siangthou ah a luut va, huleh mi tampi kawmah a kilaah uhi.
Huin sepaih zahoutu leh a kawma Jesu veenga umte’n ziilling leh sil hung umte a muh un nasatahin a lauta va, Hichu Pathian Tapa ahi ngei mei, a chi va.
Huleh Galili gam apata a natohsah jel kawma Jesu hung jui numei tamtah hu munah a um va, gamlatah apatin a en zing va;
Hute lahah chu Mari Magdalene, Jakob leh Jose nu Mari, huleh Zebedi tate nu chu a um uhi.
Nitaahlam ahung hihin, Jesu nungjui hive, Arimathia khua a um, a min Joseph, mihausa khat a hung a,
Amah chu Pilat kawmah a va chiaha, Jesu luang a ngen a. Huin Pilat in luang chu piah diingin thu a pia a.
Huleh Joseph in a luang chu a la a, puannem siangtahin a tuam a,
Huin a haan thah, suang a khuaah hawmah a sial a; huleh haan kot ah suang lianpi khat a liihluut a, a chiahta hi.
Huleh Mari Magdalene leh Mari dang huah, haan mazawnah tou in a um uhi.
Huleh a jingin, huchu kiginni jingni ahi a, siampu lalte leh Pharisaite Pilat kawmah a hungkhawm va,
Pu, hu miheemhaatpa’n a dam laia, Ni thum nungin ka thou kiit diing a chih ka he zing uhi.

Hujiahin haan chu ni thum tan hoihtaha veen diingin thu pia in, huchilou inchu jan chiangin a nungjuite hungin amah a va gu diing va, mipi lahah, Misi laha kipatin a thou kiitta hi, a chikha diing uhi; huchileh khelhna masa sangin khelhna nunung a sezawkha diing hi, a chi va.
Pilat in a kawmvah, Veengtu mi na nei uh ahi sih maw: chiah unla na theihpa tawp un veeng hoihsahta un, a chi a.
Huchi’n a chiah va, haan chu a enchian va, a suang a chiamchih va, veengtu a koihta uhi.
Khawlni beikuan, hapta ni masapen diing khua ahung vaah kuanin, Mari Magdalene leh Mari dang chu haan en diingin a hung va.
Huleh ngai in, zil nasatahin ahung liing a; ajiahchu Lalpa angel vaan apatin ahung kumsuh a, huleh haan kot apat suang a liihkhia a, a tungah a touta hi.
A meel kilatdan chu kawlphe bangmai ahi a, a puansilh chu vuuh bangin a vaam hi.
Huleh amah a lau jiahun veengtute chu a kithing va, misi bangin ahung umta uhi.
Huin angel in numeite a houpih a, a kawmvah, Lau sih un; Jesu kilhbeh a um chu na hawl uh chih ka he hi.
Amah hi-ah a um sih; ajiahchu ama’n a soi bangin a thouta hi. A lupna mun hung en mah un.

Huleh kintahin chiah unla, nungjuite kawmah, Misi lah apatin a thou kiitta; huleh, ngai un, Galili gam lamah na ma vah a chiah hi, hu mun ah amah na mu diing uh, chi'n va hilh un; ngai un, Ka hung hilh zouta hi, a chi a.
Huin amahuh chu lau leh kipaah mahmah kawmin, haan apatin kintahin a chiah va; huleh a nungjuite va hilh diingin a taita va.
Huleh a nungjuite va hilh diing a a chiah laiun, ngai in, Jesu’n amahuh a tuaah a, Chibai, a chi a, Huin a hung va, a keengte tu in a bia uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Lau sih un; chiah unla, ka unaute Galili gam a chiah diingin va hilh un, hu mun ah ahung mu diing uhi, a chi a.
Huleh amahuh a chiah laiun, ngai in, veengtute khenkhat khopi sungah a hung va, siampu lalte kawmah sil umdan zousiah a va hilh va.
Huleh upate toh a kikhop va a kihoutuaah zohun, sepaihte kawmah sum tampi a pia va,
A kawmvah, Jan in, ka ihmut kal un, a nungjuite a hung va, amah ana guta uh, chi un.
Huleh gamoptu’n ana jah taahleh, keiun amah ka heem diing va, nanguh ka hung hunkhe nadiing uh, a chi va.
Huchi'n sum chu a la va, amahuh a hilh bang ngeiun a bawlta uh; huleh hi thu chu Juda mite lahah tuni tanin a kisoi nalai hi.
Huin nungjui sawmlekhatte chu Galili gam ah Jesu’n a guatsah taang ah a chiah va.
Huleh amah a muh tahun chibai a buuh va; hizongleh khenkhat in a ginglel uhi.
Huin Jesu chu a kawmva hung in amahuh a houpih a, Vaan leh lei a thuneihna zousiah ka kawmah piah ahita.
Hujiahin chiah unla, nam chin a mi nungjui in siam unla, Pa leh Tapa leh Hagau Siangthou min in baptis un;
Thu ka hung piah zousiah jui diingin thuhilh un; huleh ngai un, kei bangchihtanin, khovel tawp dongin na kawmvah ka um diing hi, a chi hi. Amen.
Pathian Tapa, Jesu Khrist Tanchinpha kipatna;
Zawlneite lehkhabu ah, Ngai in, ka sawlleh na ma ah ka sawl a, ama’n na lampi a bawl diing.
Gamdaai a mi kikou aw in, Lalpa lamlian sial unla, a lampite hihtang un, a chi, chi a kigial bangin.
John in gamdai ah a baptis a, sualte ngaihdamna diing a kisiihna baptis thu a soi hi.
Huleh Judia gam mi zousiah leh Jerusalem a umte chu a pawt va, a kawmah a chiah va, a sualte uh thuphatawi in Jordan lui ah baptisma a tang chiat uhi.
Huleh John chu sangawngsaau mul puan silh in, a kawng savun kawnggaah in a gaah a; huleh a an chu khaukhup leh gam khuaizu ahi.
Huleh, Ka nung ah kei sanga lianzaw khat a hung a, kei chu kuun a, a keengtophah khau phel taah zong ka hi sih.
Ke'n chu tuiin ka hung baptis a; hizongleh ama’n chu Hagau Siangthou in nanguh ahung baptis diing, chi'n a soi hi.
Huleh hu hun laiin hichi ahung hi a, Jesu chu Galili gam a Nazareth khua a kipanin a hung a, John kawmah Jordan lui ah baptisma a tang a.
Huleh tui lah apat ahung pawt tahin, vaan kihong a, Hagau vakhu banga a tunga hung kumsuh a mu a;
Huleh vaan a kipanin aw khat ahung ging a, Nang ka Tapa deihtah na hi, na tungah ka kipaah mahmah hi, chi'n.
Huleh Hagau in amah chu gamdai ah a sawldohpah a.
Huleh amah chu Setan heem a um in ni sawmli gamdai ah a um a; huleh gamsate lahah a um a; angelte’n a nna a tohsah uhi.
Huchi'n John suangkul a, a khum nungun, Jesu chu Pathian gam Tanchinpha soiin Galili gam ah a hung a,
A hun a tungta a, huleh Pathian gam a naita hi; kisiih unla, Tanchinpha gingta un, chi'n.
Huleh Galili diil geia a vaahna ah Simon leh a unaupa Andru diil a leen sep a mu a; ajiahchu ngaman mi ahi uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, Hung jui un, mihing man di’n ka hung siam diing, a chi a.
Huleh amahun a leente uh nusia in amah a juipah uhi.
Huleh hu a kipana themkhat a chiah gamlaat leh Zebedi tapa Jakob leh a unaupa John a mu a; amah uh chu a leen uh phoh a kuang a um mah ahi uh a.
Huleh ama’n amah uh a koupah a; huin amahun a pa uh Zebedi chu a suaah thalaahte u’toh kuang a nusia in amah a juita uhi.
Huleh amah uh chu Kapernaum khua ah a luut va; huleh khawlni’n kikhopna inn ah a luutpah a, thu a hilh hi.
Huleh amahun a thuhilh chu limdang a sa mahmah va; ama’n lehkhagialtute bang hilou a, thuneitah banga a hilh jiahin.
Huleh a kikhopna inn vah dawiniin paai mi khat ana um a; amah chu a kikoudoh a;
Ka tangun hung umsah in; Nazareth Jesu, nang leh kei un bang ahiai kizopna i neih? kei uh sumang diing a hung na hi maw? Koi na hih ka hung he hi, Pathian misiangthou na hi, chi'n.
Huleh Jesu’n amah a tai a, Sip inla, a sung apatin hung pawt in, a chi a.
Huleh dawiniin in mipa chu a soisa vah a, hah kou a kikou in a sung apat ahung pawtta hi.
Huleh a bawnun limdang a sa mahmah va, huchi'n, Hi bang ata ei leh? bangchi bang thuhilhna thah a ta ei? Ama’n thunei tahin dawiniinte nasan thu a pia a, a thu a mang uh, chi in a kidongtuah uh.
Huleh Galili gam kiimvel zousiah ah, gam chinah a tanchin a thangsuahpahta hi.
Huleh kikhopna inn a kipat a pawt un Simon leh Andru inn ah Jakob leh John toh a luutpah va.
Huleh Simon ji nu chu khosih a na in ana lum a, huleh amahnu tanchin ana hilhpah uhi.
Huleh ama’n amahnu chu a khut a va tu in a phong a; huin a khosih in a nusepah a, huleh amahnu’n a nna uh a tohsah hi.
Huleh nitaahlam, nitum in, damlou zousiah leh dawi paaite a kawmah ahung pui uh a,
Huleh khopi sunga mi zousiah chu kotpi bulah a kikhawm va.
Huleh ama’n mi tampi natna tuamtuam a nate a sudam a, dawi tampi a nohdoh a; huleh dawite’n amah a heet jiahun a haam diinguh a phal sih hi.
Huleh jingkal in, kho vaah ma daihin a thou a, a pawt a, munsip ah a va chiah a, huah a haamtei hi.
Huleh Simon leh a lawite’n a nungah a jui va.
Huleh amah a muh tahun a kawmah, Mi zousiah in nang ahung hawl uhi, a chi va.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Kho nailahte ah zong thu ka soi theihna diingin i chiah diing uh; hu diing maha hung kuan ka hi ngal a, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n Galili gam pumpi a, a kikhopna innte va thu hilhin dawite a nohdoh jel hi.
Huleh miphaah khat a kawmah a hung a, a ma a khupdin in, Na ut leh na hung susiang thei hi, chi'n a ngen a.
Huleh Jesu’n a hehpih mahmah a, a khut a zam a, a khoih a, a kawmah, Ka ut hi; siangthouta in, a chi a.
Huleh a soi zoh tahin a phaahna in a nusepah a, ahung siangthouta hi.
Huleh amah a khapchat a, a sawlmangpah a;
Huleh a kawmah, En in, koimah kawmah bangmah soi het sin; hizongleh chiah inla, siampu kawmah va kilah inla, na damsiang thu amah uh heetsahna diingin Mosi’n thu a piah silte va laan in, a chi a.

Hizongleh amah chu a chiahdoh a, hu thu nasatah a taangkoupihin a phuangdalh panta hi; huchi'n Jesu chu a langtangin khopi sungah a luut theita sih a, gamdai munte ah a um zawta a; huleh mun chin a kipanin a kawmah mite ahung uhi.
Huleh ni bangzah aha nungin Kapernaum khua ah a luut kiit a, huleh inn ah a um chih thu ahung thangta a.
Huleh kotkhaah kiim tanpha a, umna diing um lou khopin mi tampi ahung kikhawmpah va; huleh ama’n a kawmvah thu a soi hi.
Huleh mizeng khat mi li in hung zawngin a kawmah ahung pui va.
Huleh mitam jiaha a kawm nai a ahung theih louh tahun a umna inn tung a hong va; huleh a pheet vang zohun, mizeng chu a lupna toh a khaikhesuh uhi.
Jesu’n a gindan uh a muh in mizeng kawmah, Tapa, na sualnate ngaihdam ahita, a chi a.
Hizongleh lehkhagialtute khenkhat hu muna tou a um va, a lungsim un,
Bang diinga hi pa’n Pathian soisia a hichibang thu a soi ahiai? Pathian chauh loungal koi ahiai sualnate ngaidam thei? chi'n a ngaihtuah uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n a lungtang un huchibangin a ngaihtuah uh chih a lungsim in ana hepah a, a kawmvah, Bang diinga hi thute na lungtang va ngaihtuah na hi viai?
Mizeng kawma, Na sualnate ngaihdam ahita, chih leh, Thou inla na lupna la inla, keengin chiahta in, chih khoi a baihlamzaw ei?
A khoi hitaleh mihing Tapa’n leitung ah sualnate ngaihdam theihna, a nei chih na heetna diingun, (mizeng kawmah),
Thou inla, na lupna la inla, na inn lamah chiahta in ka hung chi ahi, a chi a.
Huleh amah chu a thoupah a, a lupna la in a bawn va mitmuh ah a chiahdohta hi; huchi'n a bawnun limdang a sa va, Hichibang mawngmawng i mu ngei sih, chi'n Pathian a paahtawi uhi.
Huleh amah chu diil gei ah a chiahdoh kiit a; huleh mipi zousiah a kawmah a va chiah va, amahuh thu ana hilh hi.
Huleh a chiah pum in Alphai tapa Levi, siahdonna muna toulai a mu a, a kawmah, Hung jui in, a chi a. Huin amah chu a thou a, a juita hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu’n Levi inn a ankuang a uum leh siahdongtute leh misualte tampi in zong Jesu leh a nungjuite a uumpih va; ajiahchu tampi ahi va, a nung a jui uhi.
Huleh lehkhagialtute leh Pharisaite’n siahdongtute leh misualte toh an nekhawma amah a muh tahun, a nungjuite kawmah, Bangchidan ahiai siahdongtute leh misualte toh a neeh a, a dawn? a chi va.
Jesu’n hichu a jah tahin, a kawmvah, Mi damte’n doctor a mamoh sih va, mi damloute’n a mamoh zaw uhi; midihtatte kou diing a hung ka hi sih a, misualte kisiihsah diing a hung ka hi zaw hi, a chi hi.

Huleh John leh Pharisaite nungjuite’n an a ngawl veu va; huleh a hung va, a kawmah, Bang diinga John nungjuite leh Pharisaite nungjuite’n an a ngawl va, nang nungjuite’n a ngawl louh uh ahiai, a chi va.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, Moupuite kawma mouneitu a um laisiah moupuite’n an a ngawl thei ngei viai mah? Mouneitu a kawm va a um laisiah an a ngawl thei sih diing uhi.
Hizongleh mouneitu a kawm va kipana puimang nite ahung tung diing a, hu ni chiangin chu a ngawl diing uhi.
Mi koimah in puan lui puan thah them in a phoh ngei sih; phoh tale uh a phohna pen in a lui pen a luai keeh diing a, a susezaw sem diing hi.

Huleh mi koimah in uain thah savun thawl lui ah a thun ngei sih uh; thun tale uh uain thah in savun thawl chu a phukeeh diing a, uain a kibo diing a, huleh savun thawl chu a seta diing hi; uain thah chu savun thawl thah a thun ngei diing ahi zaw hi, a chi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, khawlni in buhlei lai tawnin a chiah a; huleh a nungjuite’n a chiah kawmun buhvuite a zuut panta va.
Huin Pharisaite’n a kawmah, En in, bang diinga amahun khawlni a bawl sianglou bawl ahi viai mah? a chi va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, David leh a lawite a taahsap va, a gilkial lai va a silbawl uh na simkha ngei hial sih u'maw?
Abiathar siampu lalpen ahihlai a, Pathian inn a, a luut a, siampute chauh loungalin neeh sianglou tanghou siah a neeh a, a lawite kawma zong a piah thu, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Khawlni chu mihing a diing a bawl ahi a, mihing chu khawlni a diing a bawl ahi sih.
Hujiahin mihing Tapa chu khawlni Lalpa zong ahi, a chi hi.
Huleh amah chu kikhopna inn ah a luut kiit a; huah mi khutzeng khat ana um a.
Huleh amah a heeh theihna diingun, khawlni a, a suhdam leh suhdamlouh a ensim va.
Huleh ama’n khutzengpa kawmah, Dingdoh in, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Khawlni in sil hoih bawl aha siang, ahihlouhleh sil hoihlou bawl? hutdam aha siang, ahihlouhleh suhlup? a chi a. Hizongleh amah uh a sip chiat va.
Huleh ama’n a lungtang khauhdan uh poisatahin, lungthah pum a, a et kimvel nungin, hupa kawmah, Na khut zandoh in, a chi a. Huleh ama’n a zandoh a: huchi'n a langkhat bangin a damta hi.
Huleh Pharisaite chu a pawtdoh va, amah a suhlup theihdan diing uh ngaihtuahin. Herod mite toh a kihoukhawmpah uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu chu a nungjuite toh diil lamah a chiahta a; huleh Galili gam a kipan mipi nasatahin amah a jui va,
Huleh a silbawl loupidante a jaun, Judia gam apat, Jerusalem apat, Idumai apat bang, Jordan gaal apat bang in; Tura leh Sidon khokiim apat bangin mipi nasatah a kawmah a hung uhi.
Huleh ama’n mipi jiahin amah diing a kuang neu khat guatsa a koih diingin a nungjuite a hilh a, huchilou inchu amah a nehthopkha diing uh.
Ajiahchu mi tampi a sudamta a; huchi'n natna nei photmahin amah a khoih theihna diingun a boh lutlut uh.
Huleh dawiniinte’n amah a muh un, a ma a bohkhup in, Nang Pathian Tapa na hi, chi'n a kikou uhi.
Huleh ama’n a tanchin phuangdoh lou diingin amahuh a khap chat hi.
Huleh taang ah a chiah tou a, a deihdeihte a kawmah a kou a; Huleh amahuh a kawmah a hung va.
Huleh a kawm a um diingin leh, thusoi a, a sawlkhiah theihna diingin sawmlenihte a guat a,
Damloute suhdam theihna leh, dawite nohdoh theihna thunei diingin;
Huleh Simon chu ama’n Peter a sa a,
Zebedi tapa Jakob leh, Jakob unaupa John; amahuh chu Bonerges a sa a, huchu, Vaanpiging tate, chihna ahi.
Huleh Andru, Philip, Bartholomai, Matthai, Thoma, Alphai tapa Jakob, Thaddai, Kananmi Simon,
Huleh a mansahpa Juda Iskariot zong ahi uh; huleh amahuh inn sungah a luut va.
Huleh an nasan nesah thei lou khopin mipi ahung kikhawm kiit uh.
Huleh a lawmte’n hichu a jahun, A ngol ahita, chi'n amah mat tum in a pawt uhi.
Huleh lehkhagialtute Jerusalem khua a kipan a hungsuhte’n, Beelzebul paai ahi, huleh dawi maangpa jiahin ahi dawite a nohdoh, a chi va.
Huleh ama’n amahuh a kou a, a kawmvah tehkhinthu in thu a soi a, Bang chi'n Setan in Setan a nohdoh thei diai?
Gam khat kilangkhen in kidou leh, hu gam chu a dingdoh thei sih diing hi.
Huleh innkuan khat kilangkhen in kidou leh, hu innkuan zong a dingdoh thei sih diing hi.
Setan zong amah leh amah kidouin kilangkhen leh a dingdoh zou sih diing a, a mangthai zaw diing hi.
Mi koimah in mi haatpa a kaantom masat louhngalleh, mi haatpa inn a luut in a thuampuate a laahsah thei sih; a kaantom nung chiangin chu a thuampua a tomsah mai diing.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Mihing tate a sualna zousiah uleh, Pathian soisiatna lama a soisiatna zousiahte uh ngaihdam ahi diing va;
Hizongleh koipouh Hagau Siangthou soisia in chu bangchihtanin ngaihdamna a mu sih diing a, kumtuang siamlouhtanna lauhuai ah a um zaw diing hi, a chi a.
Dawi niin paai ahi, a chih jiahun hu thu chu a soi ahi.
Huin a unaute leh a nu a hung va, inn pua a ding in amah kou diingin mi a sawl va.
Huleh a kiim ah mipihon a tou va, amahun a kawmah, Ngai in, inn pua ah na nu leh na unaute’n ahung hawl uhi, a chi va.
Huleh ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Ka nu leh ka unaute koite ahiai? a chi a.
Huin a kiim a pute a envel a, En un, ka nu leh ka unaute!
Ajiahchu koipouh Pathian deihzawng bawl photmah, hu mite chu ka unaute, ka sanggamnute leh ka nute ahi uh, a chi hi.
Huleh diil pangah thu a hilhpan kiitta a; huleh mipi nasatah a kawmah ahung kikhawm va, huchi'n diil tunga kuang ah a luut a, a touta a; huleh mipi zousiah chu diil geiah leitung ah a um uhi.
Huleh amahuh chu tehkhinthu in thu tampi a hilh a, huleh a thuhilhna ah a kawmvah;
Ngaikhia unla, En un, buhchithehtu khat buhchi theh diingin a kuan a;
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, a theh laiin khenkhat lampi gei ah a tu a, huleh hute chu tungleeng vate a hung a, a ne zouta uh.
Huleh khenkhat suang silei lahah a tu a, huleh lei a sah louh jiahin a poupah a;
Hizongleh ni ahung satin a haivul a, huleh zung a neih louh jiahin a gogawpta hi.
Huleh khenkhat chu lingnawng lahah a tu a, huleh ling ahung khang a, a deepmangta a, huleh gah a neita sih hi.
Huleh a dang chu lei hoih ah a tu a, huleh pouin a khangpahta a, huleh a leh sawmthum bang, sawmgup bang, huleh zakhat bangin ahung pungta hi, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Koipouh jahna diing a bil nei in ja heh, a chi a.
Huleh a tang a, a um laiin a kiim a sawmlenihte toh umte’n tehkhinthu chu a dong va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Pathian gam thuguuh chu nanguh heet diing phal ahi a; hizongleh polam mite diingin chu sil zousiah tehkhinthu a hih ahi.

Muh chu a muh theih va, a heetsiam louhna diing uleh, jah chu a jah theih va, a ngaih na a heet louhna diingun; huchilou inchu a zawleh ahung kihei kiit diing va, a sualnate uh ngaihdam ahi kha diing uh, a chi hi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Hi tehkhinthu na he sih u'maw? huleh huchi a hih inchu tehkhinthu zousiah bangchi’n na heta divuai?
Buhchithehtu in chu thu a theh a.
Huleh lamgei a thu thehnate chu hitobang ahi uh; thu chu a jah tahun Setan a hungpah a, a lungtang va thu kitheh chu a lamangpah hi.
Huleh huchibang mahin suang si leia kitheh chu hite ahi uh; amahun thu chu a jah tahun kipaahtahin a pompah uh;
Hizongleh amah vah zung a nei sih va, tomtakhat chauh a um va; hu nunga thu jiaha gimthuaahna ahung um chiangin a puuhpah uhi.
Huleh lingnawng laha kitheh chu hite ahi uh: hute’n thu chu a ja va,
Huleh khovel hinkhua ngaihtuahnate, hauhsat utna heemnate leh sil dangdang deihgohnate hung luut in thu chu a deep a, gahlouin a um veuta hi.
Huleh lei hoih a kitheh chu hite ahi uh: thu chu ja in a pom va, a leh sawmthum bang, sawmguup bang, huleh za khat bangin a gah uh, a chi hi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Khawn vaah koihna a koih louh diingin, loh nuai aha, ahihlouhleh lupna nuai aha a koih diingin khawnvaah a la ngei viai mah?
Ajiahchu kiphuang lou diing a iim bangmah a um sih a; kilang lou diing a phual zong bangmah a um sih hi.
Mi koipouh in jahna diing a bil a neih leh ja heh, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Bang ahiai na jah uh pilvaang un; na tehna ngeimah un ahung tehsah diing va; huleh nanguh a ngaikhete kawmah ahung piah behlap diing uh.
Ajiahchu koipouh a nei kawmah piahbeh ahi diing a; huleh koipouh a nei lou chu a neihsun zong laahsah ahi diing, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n, Pathian gam chu, mi’n leiah haichi tuh henla;
Huleh jan chiangin ihmu in suun chiangin thou henla, huleh haichi chu hung pou in khang doh henla, amahpa’n laha zia he sih leh, hutobang ahi.
Ajiahchu lei in amah in gah ahung suah jel a; a masa in a nah, huin a vui, huin a vui ah a tangching.
Hizongleh a gah chu ahung min chiangin, buhlaah a huntaah jiahin kawite in a aat panta hi, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n, Pathian gam chu bangtoh i tehkaahta diai? ahihlouhleh bangtoh tehkhina soi diing i ta viai?
Hichu ankam chi tang khat leia a kituh chianga, leia haichi zousiah sangin neupen zongleh;
A tuh nungun, ahung pou a, loupa zousiah sangin ahung lianzaw a, ba lianpi ahung nei a; huchi'n tungleeng vate a liimah a giaah uhi, hutobang ahi, a chi a.
Huleh hichibang tehkhinthu tampiin, amahuh heet theih khamkham in a kawmvah thu a soi a;
Hizongleh tehkhinthu louin a kawmvah thu a soi sih hi; huleh amahuh ngena a um chiangun a nungjuite kawmah sil zousiah a hilhchian jel hi.
Huleh huni mahin, nitaahlam ahung hih in, ama’n a kawmvah, Gaalkhat lamah i kai diing uh, a chi a.
Huleh amahun mipite a sawlkhiah zoh un, kuang a a um bangbang in amah a paipihta va. Huleh a kawmah kuang neu dangte zong a um hi.
Huleh huihpi nasatah ahung nungta a, tuikinawh chu kuang sungah ahung luut juijui a; huchi'n ahung dim phialta a:
Huleh amah chu kuang meilamah taangkhap khap in, ihmu in a um a; huleh a phawng va, a kawmah, Houtupa, ka manthai uh poisa lou na hi maw? a chi va.
Huin amah chu ahung thou a, huih chu a tai a, diil kawmah, Daai inla, um kinke'n in, a chi a. Huin huih chu a tawpta a, ahung sipkeeita hi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Bang diinga huchi lau na hi viai? Ginna himhim na neih louh uh bangchidan ahiai? a chi a.
Huleh a lau mahmah va, khat leh khat kihouin, Hipa hi bangtobang mi ahiai, huih leh diil tanphain a thu a awi uh, a kichituah uhi.
Huleh diil gaal, Gadara mite gam ahung tungta va.
Huleh kuang a kipan ahung pawt tahin, mi dawiniin paai khat, haan a kipan hung pawt in amah ana tuaahpah a.
Amah chu haan lah ngen a teeng ahi a; mi koima’n khainiang in a kaan thei hial sih uh;
Kol buh in, khainiang bangin ana kaanta va, hizongleh khainiangte chu a bottan a, huleh kolte a sugawp a, mi koimah in a thunun zou sih uhi.
Huleh suun leh janin taangte leh haante a um zingin a kikou a, suang bangin a kiziih veu hi.
Hizongleh ama’n gamlatah apat Jesu a muh tahin, a tai a, a va beta a;
Huleh aw ngaihtaha kikouin, Jesu, Pathian Tungnungpen Tapa, nang toh kizolhna bang ahiai ka neih? hung sugim lou diingin Pathian minin ka hung ngen hi, a chi a.
Ajiahchu Jesu’n a kawmah, Nang dawiniin, hipa sunga kipan hung pawt in, ana chita a.
Huleh ama’n, Na min bang ahiai? Huchi'n a dong a. Huleh ama’n, Ka min Nuai ahi, ajiahchu tampi ka hi uh, chi'n a dawng a.
Huleh hu gam a kipan amahuh sawlmang lou diingin a kawmah hah nget in a ngen a.
Huleh hutaha taang pangah voh hon tampi a taa a.
Huleh dawite zousiah in, Voh sungah hung sawl in, a sung va ka luut theihna diingun, chi'n a kawmah a ngen uhi.
Huin Jesu’n amahuh thu a pia a, huchi'n dawiniinte chu a pawt va, voh sungah a luut va; huin voh hon saang nih phial chu keenah diil lamah hah tai in a taisuhta va; huchi'n tui lahah a sita uhi.
Huin voh chingte chu a tai va, khopi sung leh kho neu ah hi thu a va hilh va; huin amahuh chu bang sil hung um a taimah, chia en diingin ahung uh.
Huleh Jesu kawm ahung tung va, dawi mat, nuai paaipa chu puan silh a, lungsim ngeina pua a ana tou chu ahung mu va; huin a lauta uhi.
Huleh a mute’n dawi matpa tunga sil tundan leh, voh umtan bang amahuh ana hilh va.
Huin amah chu a gam va kipan pawtkhe diingin a ngenta uhi.
Huleh amah kuang a, a luut kuanin dawi paaipa’n a kawma um diing a ngen a.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a phal sih a, a kawmah, Na inn ah na lawmte kawmah chiah inla, Lalpa’n nanga diing a sil loupi ahung bawlsah daante leh, nang ahung hehpih daante va hilh in, a chi zawta hi.
Huin a chiah a, Jesu’n amah diing a sil loupi a bawlsah daante Dekapoli khua ah a taangkoupihta a; huleh mi zousiah in limdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Huleh Jesu kuang a gaalkhat lama ahung kai kiitin mipi tampi a kawmah ahung paikhawm va; huin amah chu diil pangah a um a.
Huleh, ngai in, kikhopna inn a vaihawmte laha mi khat, a min Jaira kichi a hung a; Jesu a muh tahin a keeng bulaha bohkhup a,
Ka tanu naupang neu a si dehdeh a; ahung dam a, a hin theihna diingin, hung a a tunga na khut nga diingin ka hung ngen hi, chi'n hah nget in a ngen a.
Huleh Jesu chu amah toh a chiah a; mipi nasatahin a jui va, a tuam huthut uhi.
Huleh numei khat Kum sawmlenih sipuuta damlou a um a,
Doctor tampi lahah sil tampi ana thuaah in, a neih zousiah ana zang zouta a, bangmah phatuam louin a khawh zosem a.
Amahnu in Jesu tanchin ana ja a, a nungah mipi lahah a hung a, a puan a khoih a.
Ajiahchu a lungsim in, A puan chauh khoih leng zong ka dam mai diing, chi'n a ngaihtuah hi.
Huin a sipuut chu a kangpah a; a natna a damta chih a tahsa ah a kiheet hi.
Huleh Jesu’n a sunga kipanin silbawltheihna a pawt chih a hepah a, mipi lahah a kihei kimvel a, Koi ahiai ka puan khoih? a chi a.
Huleh a nungjuite’n a kawmah, Mipi in ahung tuam huthut uh na mu ngal a, Koi ahiai hung khoih? na chih, a chi va.
Huleh ama’n hu sil bawlnu chu muh tum in a en kimvel a.
Hizongleh numeinu in a tunga sil kibawl he in, lau leh kituun pum in a hung a, a ma ah a bohkhup a, a kawmah thudih zousiah a hilhta hi.
Huin ama’n amahnu kawmah, Tanu, na ginna in ahung damsahta hi; hamuangtah in chiah inla, na natna kipanin damta in, a chi a.
Ama’n huchia a soi laiin, kikhopna inn vaihawmtu inn a kipanin mi a hung a, Na tanu a sita ve; bang diinga Houtupa subuai nalai na hiai? ahung chi a.
Jesu’n hu thu kisoi a jah tahin, kikhopna inn vaihawmtu kawmah, Lau sin, gingta mai in, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n Peter leh Jakob leh, Jakob unaupa John chih louh in amah a juih uh a phal sih a.
Huleh kikhopna inn vaihawmtu inn ahung tung a, a na buai vengvung leh, kap a na maau jenjunte a mu a.
Huleh a luut a, a kawmvah, Bang diinga kap a hichi na hi viai? naupangnu chu a si ahi sih, ihmu ahi, a chi a.
Huin amahun awilou tahin a nuihsan va. Hizongleh amahuh chu a bawnun a nohdoh a, naupangnu nu leh pa leh a tonpihte a pui a, naupangnu umna ah a luut va.
Huleh ama’n naupangnu chu a khut in a tu a, a kawmah, Talitha kumi, a chi a; huchu, Naupangnu thou in, ka hung chi ahi, chihna ahi.
Huin naupangnu chu a thou a, a paipah ngal a; amah chu kum sawmlenih mi ahita him a. Huin amahun nasatahin limdang a sa uh.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah hi thu koimah in a heet louh diing a chi tinten a; Huleh amahnu chu neeh diing bang aha piah diing thu a pia hi.
Huleh hu a kipanin a pawt a, amah gam lamah a hung a; huleh a nungjuite’n amah a jui uhi.

Huleh khawlni ahung hihin, kikhopna inn ah thu a hilh panta a; huleh mi tampi a thuhilh jate’n limdang a sa va, Hipa’n hi thute khoi apat a muh ahiai? a kawma pilna kipia bang pilna hi a, a khut in hichitah a sil loupi a bawl hi bangchidan ahiai?
Amah hi Mari tapa, Jakob leh, Josse leh, Juda huleh Simon unaupa, sing kuang bawltu khu hilou amaw? A sanggamte hi ah i kawmah um hilou ahi u'maw? a chi va. Huchi'n a tungah a lungkimta sih uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, zawlnei chu amah gam sung leh, amah innkuante lah leh, amah innsungah chih louh zahbawl louhin a um ngei sih hi, a chi a.
Huleh mi damlou tawmtakhatte tunga khut nga a, a suhdam chih louh hutahah sil loupi mawngmawng a bawl thei sih hi.
Huleh ama’n a gintaat louh jiahun limdang a sa mahmah hi. Huleh khuate a thuhilh in, a chiah lehleh hi.
Huleh ama’n sawmlenihte a kawmah a kou a, nih nihin a sawldoh a; huleh dawiniinte tunga thuneihna zong a pia hi.
Huleh a zinna va diingin chiangphut chih louh bangmah, kawljal hileh, tanghou hileh, dangka ip sunga zong sum keng lou diingin thu a pia hi.
Hizongleh keengtophah chu but unla; huleh puannaah nih silh sih un, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Khoi munah zong na tunna inn phot vah, hu apat na pawt masiah un umden un.

Huleh koi hizongleh ahung tunsah louh va, na thu u’zong a ngaihkhiah louh uleh hu apat na pawt chiangun amah uh heetsahna diingin na keengtaw va leivui thingkhia un. Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Vaihawmni chiangin hu khua thuaah diing sangin Sodom leh Gommorrah thuaah chu a dan a um zaw diing, a chi a.
Huin a kuandohva, Mite chu a kisiih diing uh ahi chih thu a soi uhi.
Huleh dawi tampi a nohdoh va, damlou tampi thau nuh in a sudam jel uhi.
Huleh kumpipa Herod in a tanchin ana ja a; (a min a than taah jiahin), Baptistu John misi laha kipan in ahung thou kiitta a, hujiahin sil loupite bawl theihna amah ah um in ahung kilang ahi, a chi a.
Midangte’n, Elijah ahi, a chi va. Huleh mi dangin, zawlnei ahi, zawlneite laha khat ahi, a chi va.
Hizongleh Herod in chu, A lu ka tansahpa John ngei ahi; misi lah apat ahung thou kiit ahi, a chi hi.
Ajiahchu Herod in a unaupa Philip ji Herodia a kiteenpih taah jiahin Herodia jiahin mi a sawl a, John chu a mansah a, huleh amah chu kaan in suangkul aha khumta hi.
Ajiahchu John in Herod kawmah, Na unaupa ji na kiteenpih daan ngei ahi sih, ana chi hi.
Hujiahin Herodia in amah a mudah a, thah a ut a; hizongleh a that thei sih.
Ajiahchu Herod in John chu midihtat leh siangthoutah ahi chih a heet jiahin a lau a, a huuh veu a; a thu a jahin a lungdong a, hizongleh kipaahtahin a ngaikhe jel hi.
Huleh lemtaan ni khat ahung tung a, Herod in a pi ani in a mi loupite, a sepaihliante, huleh Galili gam a mi liante a diingin jan ankuang a lui a;
Huin Herodia tanu ahung luut a, a laam a, Herod leh a kawma pute a kipaahsahta a, kumpipa’n nungaah naupangnu kawmah, Na deihdeih ngen in ka hung pe diing, a chi a.
Huleh amahnu kawmah, Na hung nget photmah, ka gam kimkhat tan in ka hung pe diing, chi'n a kichiam a.
Huin amahnu chu a pawt a, a nu kawmah, Bang ka ngen diai? a va chi a; Huleh amahnu in, Baptistu John lutang, ana chi a.
Huin amahnu chu kumpipa kawmah kintahin ahung luutpah a, Baptistu John lutang tu mahmahin kuang khat in hung pe lechin ka ut, chi'n a ngen a.
Huin kumpipa chu a lungkham mahmah a; hizongleh a kichiamnate leh, a kawma pute jiahin a nial nuam sih a.
Huleh kumpipa in a that diingin mi khat a sawlpah a, a lutang hung tawi diingin thu a pia a; huleh amah chu chiah in suangkul sungah a lutang a va tanta hi.
Huleh a lutang chu kuang khat in ahung tawi a, nungaah naupangnu a peta a; huin hu nungaah naupangnu in a nu kawmah a peta hi.
Huleh a nungjuite’n hichu a jah tahun a hung va, a luang ahung la va, haan ah a vuita uhi.
Huleh sawllehte chu Jesu kawmah ahung kikhawm va, a silbawlte zousiah uleh a thuhilhnate uh ahung hilh va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Nanguh chauhin hung unla, munsip ah tomkhat hung khawl phot un, a chi a; ajiahchu huah mi ahung paileh a tam jiahin an nasan a ne man sih uhi.
Huleh amahuh chu kuang in mun sipah a tuam chiahta va,
Huleh mipite’n a chiah lai uh a mu va, mi tampi in amah a he va, khopi chin a kipan keeng in ahung tai va, ana makhelh in a kawmah ahung paikhawmta uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n ahung pawtdoh in mipi nasatah a muta a, a chingtu bei belaam bang ahihjiahun a hehpih mahmah a; thu tampi a hilh panta hi.
Huin ni a vaigeih mahmah tahin a nungjuite a kawmah a hung va, Hi gamsip mun ahi a, hun laha vaigeita a;
I kimvela loute leh khuate a va chiah a, an neeh diing a kilei theihna diingun amahuh sawldoh in; neeh diing bangmah laha nei ngal sih va, a chi va.
Ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Nangun neeh diing pia un, a chi a. Huin amahun a kawmah, Tanghou makhai za nih man va lei in, neeh diing ka pe diing uh maw? a chi va.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Tanghou beu bangzah na nei viai? va endih vua, a chi a. Huin amahun a neih jah uh a heet tahun, Beu ngaa leh nga nih, a chi va.
Huleh ama’n mi zousiah hampa hing tunga a lawilawi a tousah diingin thu a pia a.
Huin amahuh a gualgual in, za khatkhat bang, sawmngaa ngaa bangin a touta va.

Huleh ama’n hu tanghou beu ngaa leh nga nih chu a laah zohin vaan lam a en a, a vangpiah a, tanghou te chu a balkeeh a, a ma va luisah diingin a nungjuite kawmah a pia a; huleh nga nihte zong a bawn va lahah a hawmsah suahta hi.
Huleh amahun a bawnun a ne va, a vah chiatta uhi.
Huleh tanghou neente leh nga neente chu bawm sawmlenih dimin a luaah uh.
Huleh tanghou nete chu mi saang ngaa vel ahi uhi.
Huleh ama’n mipi a hahkhiah sungin a nungjuite chu gaal lehlam a Bethsaida khua a na chiah masa diingin kuang ah a tuangsahpah a.
Huleh amahuh a sawlkhiah zohin haamtei diingin taang ah a chiahta hi.
Huleh nitaah lam ahung hihin, kuang chu diil laiah a umta a, amah chu a ngen in tual tungah a um a.

Huleh ama’n amahuh chu huihin a lehlamlam a, a nam jiaha kuang jap a, a mangbat uh a mu a; huleh kho vaah kuan la min amah chu diil tunga a keeng a pai in a kawmlam uh ahung zu an a, amahuh paipeel a tum a.
Hizongleh amah chu diil tunga keenga pai a muh un siha khat hiinte, a chi va, a kikoudoh uh.
Ajiahchu a bawnun amah a mu va, a buaita uhi. Huin amahuh a houpihpah a, Ha muangtah in um un; kei ka hi; lau sih un, a chi a.
Huleh kuang ah a kawmvah a tuangdoh a; huih chu a tawpta hi. Huin amahun soi theih louh khopin limdang a sa mahmah uh.
Ajiahchu amahun tanghou silmahte bang a he nawn sih uhi, a lungtang uh ana ngon taah jiahin.
Huleh gaal lehlam a kai un, Genesaret gam a tung va, luipang ahung zu an va.
Huleh kuang a kipan a pawtdoh un mite’n amah ana hepah uh,
Hu gam sung pumpi ah a tai kimvel va, amah a um hi chih a heetna tan vah damloute a lupna un ahung zawng uhi.

Huleh khoneute leh, khopite leh louzau bang, khoi munah zong a luutna photah, damloute chu kotzing bangah a lumsah va, a puanmong beeh khoih theih a ngen va, huleh amah khoih pouhmah chu a dam jel uhi.
Huin Jerusalem khua a kipan a hung Pharisaite leh lehkhagialtu koite aha a kawmah a hung va.
Huleh amahun, a nungjuite khenkhat in khut niin pum a, chihchu khut sil lou a an a neeh uh a muh un, dih a sa sih va.
Ajiahchu Pharisaite leh Judate zousiah in upate thugousiah a juih zing jiahun, a khut uh hoihtah a sil louin an a ne ngei sih uhi.
Huleh dawl mun apat ahung chiangun, kisilzet louin an a ne sih uhi. Huleh thudang tampi juih diing a a muh uh a um a, hute chu noute, beelte, sumbeelte sil bang ahi.
Huin Pharisaite leh lehkhagialtute’n, Bang diinga na nungjuite’n upate thugousiah banga um lou a, khut silou a an ne ahi viai? chi'n amah a dong va.
Huin ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Isaiah in nanguh milepchiahte thu ana soilawh dihten hi, Hi mite’n a muuh un ahung paahtawi va, hizongleh a lungtang uh kei apatin a gamla hi.
Bang hitaleh a thuhilhna va mihing thupiahte a hilh jiahun, ahung biah u’chu a thawn ahi, chih gelh bangin.
Ajiahchu nangun Pathian thupiah paampaih in, mihing thugousiah na tu uh; beelte leh noute sil bang; huleh a dang tampi huchibang silte na hawl uhi, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Na thugousiah uh na juih theihna diingun Pathian thupiah tangtahin na paampaih uhi.
Ajiahchu Mosi in, Na pa leh na nu zahbawl in; koipouh a pa aha, a nu aha housia chu si jiang heh, a chi a.
Hizongleh nangun, Mi'n a pa aha, a nu aha kawma, Ka vanga na phattuamna diing uh Korban ahita, a chih inchu, (huchu Pathian kawma piah chihna ahi), amah chu a zalen diing, na chi uh.
Huleh amah chu a pa aha, a nu aha diing a bangmah a bawlsah na phal sih uh;
Na thugousiah uh mi na piahsawn un Pathian thu bangmahlou na suahsah uhi; huleh huchi bang sil tampi na hawl uhi, a chi a.
Huin ama’n mipi zousiah a kawmah a kou a, a kawmvah, Na bawnun ka thu ngaikhia unla, hesiam un;
Mihing polam apat a, a sunga luut a, amah subuah thei bangmah a um sih; hizongleh amah apat a hung pawt silte, hute ngei chu mihing subuah ahi zaw hi.
Mi koipouh jahna diing a bil nei in ja heh, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n mipi nusia a innsung a, a luut zohin, a nungjuite’n hu tehkhinthu amah a dongchianta va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Nanguh zong huchi lawm a heetsiam na bei na hi uh maw? Bang sil hitaleh polam a kipan a mihing sunga luut in amah a subuah thei sih;
Ajiahchu a lungtang sunga luut lou a, a gil sunga luut zaw a, neeh chinteng susiang a dailenna a pawtkhemei ahi chih he lou na hi viai mah? a chi a.
Huleh ama’n, Mihing sunga kipan a hung pawt, hu ngei in mihing a subuah hi;
Ajiahchu sunglam a, mihing lungtang a kipanin, ngaihtuahna giloute, aangkawmnate, thanghuainate, tualthahnate,
Guuhtaatnate, huaihamnate, giitlouhnate, heemhaatnate, bevennate, kimitsiipnate, soisiatnate, kiletsahnate, leh ngolhuainate bang ahung pawt veu hi;
Hi sil gilou zousiah chu sunglam apat hung pawt in mihingte a subuah veu hi, a chi hi.
Huin a thoua, hu a kipanin Tura leh Sidon gam kual sungah a chiahta a, inn khat ah a luut a, koimah heet diing a deih sih a; hizongleh a kiphual zou sih hi.
Huchi'n numei khat, a tanu naupang khat dawiniin paai ahi a, a tanchin ana ja a, huleh a hung a, a keeng bulaha bohkhup a.
