Hu numeinu chu Grik mi ahi a, nam lam thu ah Sirophoniki mi ahi; amahnu in a tanu sunga dawi nohdohsah diingin a ngen hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amahnu kawmah, Tate hung vah phot u’heh; tate tanghou laahsah a uite kawma piah a kilawm sih, a chi a.
Huin amahnu in a dawng a, a kawmah, Hih zaw ahi, Lalpa, ahihvangin dohkaan nuaia uite’n zong tate anneng kia a ne veu uhi, a chi a.
Huin ama’n amahnu kawmah, Na thusoi jiahin chiahta in; dawi chu na tanu sunga kipanin a pawtta hi, a chi a.
Huleh amahnu a inn ahung tunin dawi chu a na pawtdohta a, a tanu, lupna a lum ahung muta hi.
Huleh Tura leh Sidon gam kual sung apat pawt kiit in, Dekapoli gam lai tawnsuah peh in Galili diil ahung tungta a:
Huleh mi bilngong, haam zong haamchian thei lou khat a kawmah ahung pui va; a tunga a khut nga diingin a ngen va.
Huin ama’n mipi lah apatin amah a puituam a, a khutzung in a bil sungte a khoih a, huin chil a siat a, huleh a lei a khoih a;
Huin vaan lam en in a haaihuai a, a kawmah, Ephphatha, a chi a, huchu, Kihong in, chihna ahi.
Huin a bilte ahung vang a, a leigui a kiphel a, huleh siangtahin a haam theita hi.
Huleh ama’n koimah hilh lou diingin amah uh a khap a; hizongleh a khap nah pouh leh a soi phuang zaw sem uhi.
Huleh soi theih louh khopin thumah a sa va, Ama’n sil zousiah a bawl hoih ta; bilngong lah khua a jasah a, huleh haamthei lou laha haamsahta, a chi uhi.
Huchih hunlaiin mi a tam mahmah va, neeh diing bangmah a nei sih va, Jesu’n a nungjuite a kou a, a kawmvah,
Mipite tuin ka kawmah ni thum neeh diing nei lou a um ahih taah jiahun ka hehpih mahmah hi;
Huleh angawl in a inn vah paisah leng lamkal ah a sawlsamkha diing uh; khenkhatte hung na a gamla mahmah ngal a, a chi a.
Huin a nungjuite’n a dawng va, Koi in hi gamdai ah mihing hizahpi vahna khop tanghou khoi a la diing ahiai? a chi va.
Huin ama’n; Tanghou beu bangzah na nei viai? chi'n a dong a. Huleh amahun, Sagih, a chi uh.

Huin ama’n mipite chu tual a tou diingin thu a pia a; tanghou beu sagih chu a la a, kipaahthu a soi a, a balkeeh a, huin a ma va lui diingin a nungjuite kawmah a pia a; huleh amahun mite ma ah a luita uh.
Huleh nga tawmtakhat zong a nei va; ama’n a vangpiah a, hute zong a ma va lui diingin thu a pia hi.
Huchi'n a ne va, a vahta uh; huleh a kham val uh neen bawm sagih dim in a luaah uhi.
Huleh a nete chu mi saang li vel ahi va; huin amahuh a sawlmangta hi.
Huleh amah chu a nungjuite toh kuang sungah a luutpah a, Dalmanutha gam a tungta uh.
Huleh Pharisaite ahung kuan va, amah ze-etna in, chiamchihna ngen in, amah chu thu ahung dongta uhi.

Huin amah chu a lungsim in a khuaisa a, Bang diinga tulai khang thahte’n chiamchihna hawl ahi viai? Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Hi tulai khang thahte kawmah chiamchihna mawngmawng a kipe sih diing hi, a chi a.
Huin amahuh nusia in kuang ah a luut kiit a, gaal lehlamah a chiahta hi.
Huleh nungjuite’n tanghou a keng mangngilh va, tanghou beu khat chauh chih louh kuang ah tanghou dang mawngmawng a nei sih uh.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Pil vang unla, Pharisaite leh Herod tol lahah kiveeng un, a chi a.
Huin amahuh chu, Tanghou i neih louh jiah ahi, chi'n a kingaihtuah va.
Huleh Jesu’n a heet tahin a kawmvah, Bang diinga tanghou na neih louh jiah va kingaihtuah na hi viai? Tutan a hethei lou leh hesiam nailou na hi uh maw? Na lungtang uh taah nalai ahi maw?
Mit nei ngal a mu lou na hi viai mah? bil nei ngal a ja lou na hi viai mah? huleh he zing lou na hi viai mah?
Mi saang ngaa laha tanghou beu ngaa ka balkeeh laiin a neen bawm bangzah a tai na luaahdim uh? a chi a Amahun a kawmah, Sawmlenih, a chi va.
Huleh mi saang li laha sagih ka balkeeh laiin a neen bawm bang jah a tai na luahdim uh? a chi a Amahun, Sagih, a chi va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Bangchia hesiam lou na hi viai? a chi hi.
Huleh Bethsaida ahung tung a; a kawmah mittaw khat ahung pui va, amah khoih diingin a ngen uh.
Huin ama’n mittawpa chu a khut in a tu a, kho polamah a puidoh a; Huleh a mit ah chil a siat a, a tungah khut a koih a, Khua na mu thei ei? chi'n a dong hi.
Huin amahpa a daahdoh a, Mite chu sing bangin pai in ka mu hi, a chi a.
Hunungin a mit ah a khut a koih kiit a, a mit a hahsah a; huchi'n ahung damta a, mi chinteng chu chiantahin a mu theita hi.
Huleh amah chu, Khosung a lah luut sinla, khua a mi koimah zong hilh het sin, chi'n a inn lamah a sawlta hi.
Huleh Jesu leh a nungjuite chu a pawtdoh va, Caesarea Philippi khuate ah a chiah va; huleh lampi ah a nungjuite kawmah, Mite’n kei hi koi ka hi ahung chi viai? chi'n a dong a.
Huleh amahun, Baptistu John ahi, ahung chi uh; hizongleh khenkhatte’n, Elijah ahi, ahung chi uh; huleh a dang in, zawlneite laha khat ahi, ahung chi uhi, chi'n a dawng uhi.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Ahihleh nang un koi ka hi na hung chi viai? a chi a. Huin Peter in a dawng a, a kawmah, Khrist chu na hi, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n a tanchin koimah hilh lou diingin amahuh a khap a.

Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Mihing Tapa in sil tampi a thuaah diing bang, upate leh, siampu lalte leh, lehkhagialtute deih louh a, a um diing bang, thah a, a um diing bang, huleh ni thum ni a, a thohkiit diing haw bang a hilh panta hi.
Huleh ama’n hu thute chu phuanglaah tahin a soi a. Huin Peter in amah a pui a, a vauta hi.
Hizongleh amah chu a kihei a, a nungjuite a en a, Peter chu a vau a, Setan, ka nungah pai in, nangma’n Pathian silte ngaihtuah louin, mihing silte na ngaihtuah zaw hi, a chi hi.
Huleh ama’n mipite leh a nungjuite a kou a; a kawmvah, Mi koipouh in ahung juih nuam inchu, amah gimthuaah poisa louin, a kros pua in hung jui heh,
Ajiahchu mi koipouh a hinna humbit tum in a taan diing a; hizongleh mi koipouh keimah leh Tanchinpha jiaha, a hinna taan in a humbit diing hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh mi’n khovel a pum in nei henla, amah hinna taan ngal leh bang a phatuam diai?
Ahihlouleh, mi’n a hinna luang in bang a pe diai?

Hujiahin mi koipouh tulai khang thah aangkawm haat leh giloute laha keimah leh ka thu zumpih chu mihing Tapa in zong angel siangthoute toh a Pa loupina a ahung chiangin, hu mi chu a zumpih ve diing hi, a chi hi.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Hi muna dingte khenkhat chu Pathian gam silbawltheihna toh hung tung a muh masiah uh sihna chiam lou diing a um uh, a chi a.
Huleh ni guup nungin Jesu’n Peter toh, Jakob toh, John a pui a, a tuam in taang saang tung khat ah amahuh chauh a puitou a; huleh a ma vah a meel ahung kihengdangta hi.
Huchi'n a puansilh chu leitung a puansawp koimah in huchibanga a sawp ngou theih louh diing khopin, vuuh bang mai in a ngou in a ngou a,
Huleh Elijah leh Mosi a kawmah ahung kilang va; Jesu toh a kihou khawm uh.
Huin Peter in a houpih a, a kawmah, Houtupa, ei uh diingin hitaha um a hoih hi; buuh thum i bawl diing a; khat nang a diingin, khat Mosi a diingin, huleh khat Elijah a diingin, a chi a.
Ajiahchu, a lau mahmah jiahun a soi diing pen zong a he sih hi.
Huin meilum lom khat in amahuh ahung liah a; huleh meilum laha kipanin aw ahung ging a, Hichu ka Tapa deihtah ahi; a thu ngai un, a chi a.
Huleh kintah a, a kiimvel uh a etpah uleh, Jesu chih louh a kawmvah midang koimah a muta sih uhi.
Huleh taang apat ahung kumsuh laiun, mihing Tapa misi laha kipan a thohkiit masiah a sil muhte uh koimah hilh lou diingin a khap chat hi.
Huleh hu thu chu a lungsim vah a vom zing va, Misi lah apat a thohkiit chih pen bang chihna hi diing a diai? chi'n a kidong uh.
Huleh amahun, Bang diinga lehkhagialtute’n Elijah hung masa diing ahi chi ahi viai, chi'n amah a dong va.

Huleh ama’n a dawng a a kawmvah, Elijah chu hung masa a, sil zousiah a bawl hoih diing mawng ahi; ahihleh mihing Tapa in sil tampi a thuaah diing a, huleh deih louhin a um ngei diing ahi, chia a tanchin bangchidana kigial a diai?
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, Hu Elijah chu a hung zouta a, huleh a tanchin a gelh bang ngei un a tungah a utut uh a bawlta uhi, a chi a.
Huleh amah a nungjuite kawma ahung tunin, a kiim va mipi nasatah leh lehkhagialtute’n amahuh ana nial uh a mu a;
Huleh mipi zousiah in amah a muh tahun limdang a sa mahmah va, a kawma tai in chibai a va buuh uh.
Huin ama’n lehkhagialtute kawmah, Amah u’toh bang kinial na hi viai? chi'n a dong a.
Huin mipi laha khat in a dawng a a kawmah, Houtupa, ka tapa haam thei lou dawi paai na kawmah ka hung pui hi;
A matna mun phot ah a heeh puuh jel a; huchi'n a chilphuan bua in, a ha bang a gawi a, a gawng deuhdeuh hi; huchi'n na nungjuite kawma hung nohdohsah un ka chih leh a bawl thei sih uh, a chi a.
Huin ama’n amah a dawng a, Aw ginna nei lou khang thahte, na kawm va bangtan ahiai ka um diing? bangtan ahiai ka hung thuaahtheih diing? amah chu ka kawmah hung pui un, a chi a.
Huleh amah chu a kawmah ahung pui va; huleh dawi in amah chu a muh tahin naupang chu nasatahin a soisapah a; huchi'n tualah a puuh a, chilphuan bo zengzungin a kitaal lehleh hi.
Huleh ama’n a pa kawmah, Hichibang ahung hihna bangtan ahitai? chi'n a dong a. Huin ama’n, A naupan laia kipanin ahita.
Huchi'n amah hihlum diingin khatvei chiangin mei laiah leh tui lahah a sawn luut veu a; hizongleh nangin bang aha na bawl theih leh hung hehpih inla, hung panpih in, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Na gintaat theih phot leh a gingtate diingin sil zousiah ahithei hi, a chi a.
Huin naupangpa pa chu a kikoupah a; huleh mithi luang pum in, Lalpa, ka gingta hi, ka ginlahna hung panpih in, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n mipi hung taikhawm a muh tahin dawiniin chu a tai a, a kawmah, Nang haamtheih louhna leh bilngonna dawi, thu ka hung pia hi, a sung apat hung pawt inla, luut kiit nawn sin, a chi a.
Huin dawi chu a kikou a, nasatahin a soisa a, hu zohin ahung pawtta a; huleh naupang chu mi tampite’n, A si ahi, a chih diing khop un ahung umta hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amah chu a khut in a tu a, a phong a, huleh ahung thouta hi.
Huleh inn sunga ahung luut in a nungjuite’n, Bang diinga kei un nohdoh thei lou ka hi viai? chi'n a guuhdot va.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Hitobangte hi haamteina leh angawl na loungal in a pawt thei sih hi, a chi hi.
Huleh hu a kipanin a chiahdoh va, Galili gam a tawnpeh va; huleh koimah heet diing a ut sih hi.
Ajiahchu a nungjuite thu a hilh a, a kawmvah, Mihing Tapa chu mite khut ah a kipedohta, huchi'n a that diing va, huleh a sih nung ni thum ni in a thou kiit diing, a chi a.
Hizongleh amahun a thusoi chu a hesiam sih va, dong laha dong ngam sih uhi.
Huleh amah chu Kapernaum khua ahung tung a, inn sunga a um laiin a kawmvah, Lampi a hu na kinialna uh bang ahiai? chi'n a dong a.
Hizongleh amahuh chu a sipkeei uh; ajiahchu lampi ah koi ahiai lianpen diing, chi'n ahung kinial zouta uhi.
Huin amah chu a tou a, sawmlenihte a kou a, a kawmvah, Mi koipouh a masapen hih ut chu a nunungpen ahi diing a, huleh mi zousiah natong in a um diing ahi, a chi a.
Huin ama’n naupang neutakhat a kai a, a lailung vah a dingsah a; huleh a pom zohin a kawmvah,
Mi koipouh ka mina hitobang naupang neutakhat sang chu kei hung sang ahi; huleh mi koipouh kei hung sang chu, kei hung sang hilouin ahung sawlpa sang ahi zaw hi, a chi hi.
Huleh John in, Houtupa, mi khat na min a dawite nohdoh ka mu va, kei uh ahung zui sih a; huleh keiuh ahung zuih louh jiahin ka khapta uhi, chi'n amah a dawng a.
Hizongleh Jesu’n, Khap sih un; ajiahchu ka min a sil loupi bawl ngal a, kei hung soise meimei thei mi a um sih hi,
Ajiahchu koi hitaleh ei hung dou lou chu ei lam a pang ahi.
Mi koipouh ka min a hih jiah va, ka min a tuisih nou khat dawn diing a hung pia inchu, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, a kipaahman muh diing a taan hial sih diing hi.
Huleh koipouh kei hung gingta hi naupang neutatate laha khat zong supuuh chu, a ngawngah sumheeh suang lianpi ki-ohsah henla, tui khang lian ah kipaailuut leh amah diingin a hoihzaw diing hi.
Huleh na khut in ahung suhpuuh leh tankhia in; khut nih nei a gawtmun mei mit thei lou a na chiah sangin, khut beia hinna a luut nang a diingin a hoihzaw hi.
A than uh a sih louhna leh, mei kuang a mit louhna ah.
Huleh na keeng in ahung suhpuuh leh tankhia in; keeng nih nei a gawtmun mei mit thei loua chiah sangin, keengbaai a hinna a luut nanga diingin a hoihzaw hi;
A than uh a sih louhna leh, mei kuang a mit louhna ah.
Huleh na mit in ahung suhpuuh leh khei khia in; mit lang nih nei a gawtmun mei kuang a paih a na um sangin mit langkhat nei a Pathian gam a luut nang a diingin a hoihzaw hi.
A than uh a sih louhna leh, mei kuang a mit louhna ah.
Ajiahchu michin mei kuang a soh-al in a um diing a, kithoihna chinteng chia soh-al in a um diing hi.
Chi chu a hoih a; hizongleh chi in a alna mangsah taleh bangchi'n na alsah kiitta diviai? Nanguh ngeiah chi kineih unla, huleh khat leh khat kilem in um un, a chi hi.
Huleh amah chu hu apat a kipandoh a, Judia gam kualsung Jordan gaal lampeh ahung tungta a; huleh mipite a kawmah ahung kikhawm kiit va; huchi'n ahih ngeimah bangin amahuh thu a hilh kiit hi.
Huleh Pharisaite a kawmah ahung va, amah ze-etna diingin, Mi'n a ji a khul a siang ei? chi'n a dong va.
Huleh ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Mosi in nanguh bang thu ahung pia ei?’ a chi a.
Huin amahun, Mosi in kikhulna lehkha gial a kikhul a phal hi, a chi va.
Huin Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Na lungtang khauh jiahun ahi ama’n hi thupiah nanguh diing a ahung na gelhsah.
Hizongleh leilung kisiam chiila kipanin Pathian in amahuh pasal leh numei in a siam hi.
Hi jiahin pasal in a pa leh a nu a nuse diing a, a ji a tu tinten diing;
Huleh a nihun tahsa pumkhat ahung hita diing va; huchi'n nih hi nawn louin tahsa khat ahung hi zawta diing uh.
Hujiahin Pathian in a gawmsa chu mihingin khen sih heh, a chi a.
Huleh inn sungah a nungjuite’n hu thu mah amah a dong kiit va.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Mi koipouh in a ji a khul a ji dang a neih leh a ji a aangkawmsan ahi.
Huleh numei in a pasal a khul a pasal dang a neih leh a aangkawm ahi, a chi a.
Huleh a khoih diingin naupang neute a kawmah ahung pui va; huleh a nungjuite’n ahung puite ana tai uh.
Hizongleh Jesu’n hu a muh in a lungkim hial sih a, a kawmvah, Naupang neute ka kawmah hungsah unla, khap sih un; ajiahchu Pathian gam chu huchibang mite a diing ahi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Mi koipouh naupang neu banga Pathian gam sang lou chu, a sungah a luut het sih diing, a chi a.
Huin ama’n amahuh a pom a, a tung vah a khut a koih a, huleh a vangpiahta hi.
Huleh lampi a chiah diing a a pawt laiin, mi khat ahung tai a, a ma ah a khupdin a, huleh a kawmah, Houtupa hoih, kumtuang hinna ka tan theihna diingin bang ahiai ka bawl diing? chi'n a dong a.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, Bang diinga hoih hung chi na hiai? Khat chih louh hoih koimah a um sih, huchu Pathian ahi.
Thupiahte na he vele, Aangkawm sin, tual that sin, Gu sin, Heetpihtu tahlouin pang sin, Mi heem sin, Na nu leh na pa zahbawl in, chihte, a chi a.
Huin ama’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Houtupa, hihaw zousiah chu ka naupan laia kipana ka juih a hita, a chi a.

Huin Jesu’n amah a en a, a lungsiat a, a kawmah, sil khat na sam nalai hi; chiah inla, na neih photmah zuah inla, migentheite kawmah pia in, huchi'n vaan ah gou na nei diing; huleh hung inla, kros pua in hung jui in, a chi a.
Huin amahpa chu hu thu ah a maai ahung mualta a, huleh lunggim tahin a chiahmangta hi, sum tampi nei mi ahih jiahin.
Huleh Jesu’n a en kimvel a, a nungjuite kawmah, Mi hausate diingin Pathian gam a luut hahsa hina mei e! a chi a.
Huleh a nungjuite’n chu a thusoite thumah a sa thei mahmah va. Hizongleh Jesu’n a dawng kiit a, a kawmvah, Naute, hauhsatna muangte diingin Pathian gam a luut hahsa hina mei e!
Mi hausa Pathian gam a a luut sangin, sangawngsaau phin bil vanga a luut paisuaah a baih zaw hi, a chi a.
Huin amahun soi theih louh khopin thumah a sa va, Huchi ahihleh koi hutdam in a um zou diai? a kichi uh.
Huin Jesu’n amahuh a en a, Mihing diingin hichu bawl gual louh ahi a, hizongleh Pathian diingin ahi sih; ajiahchu Pathian diingin sil zousiah a hithei hi, a chi a.
Huin Peter in a kawmah, En in, kei un bangkim nusia in ka hung jui uh, chi'n a soi panta a.

Huleh Jesu’n a dawng a, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Mi koi hitaleh keimah jiah leh Tanchinpha jiaha inn aha, unaupate aha, unaunute aha, pa aha, nu aha, ji aha, tate aha, huleh gamte aha nusia chu,
Tu damsung ngeia sawinate toh innte, unaunute, nute, tate, huleh gamte a lehza a mulou diing a um sih uh; huleh khovel hung tung diing ah kumtuang hinna toh.
Hizongleh mi tampi a masapente a nunung pen diing va, a nunungpente a masapen diing uh, a chi hi.

Huleh amahuh chu Jerusalem khua a chiahtou in lampi ah a um va, Jesu chu a ma vah a pai a; huleh amahun limdang a sa mahmah va; huleh a juih pumun a lau va. Huin ama’n sawmlenihte a pui kiit a, a tung a sil hung tung diingte a hilh panta a,

Ngai un, Jerusalem khua a chiahtou diing i hi uh; huleh mihing Tapa chu siampu lalte leh lehkhagialtute kawmah matsah in a um diing; huleh amah chu si diingin siamlouh a tangsah diing va, Jentelte khutah a pekhe diing uh;
Huleh amahun chiamnuih bawlna in a zang diing va, a jep diing va, chil a siatkhum diing va, huleh a that diing uh; huleh a ni thum ni in a thou kiit diing hi, a chi hi.
Huin Zebedi tapate Jakob leh John a hung va, a kawmah, Houtupa, na kawma ka deih photmah uh hung bawlsah lechin ka chi uh, a chi va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Nanguh diingin bang hung bawlsah leng na chi viai? ana chi a.
Huin amahun a kawmah, Na loupina ah, khat na jiatlam ah, khat na veilam ah hung tousah in, a chi uh.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, Bang ahiai na nget uh na he sih uhi; ka nou dawn diing na dawn thei diviai? huleh ka baptisma tan diing zong na tangthei diviai? a chi a.
Huin amahun a kawmah, Thei e, a chi va. Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Ka dawn diing nou chu na dawn ngei diing va; huleh ka baptisma tan diing zong na tang ngei diing uh;
Hizongleh ka jiatlam leh ka veilama tou diing chu kei piah diing ahi sih a, a diing va kiguatsahte kawmah piah ahi zaw diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh sawmlenihte’n hichu a jahun Jakob leh John tungah a lungkim sih mahmah meita va;
Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh a kou a, a kawmvah, Jentelte tunga vaihawm diing a kiguatte chu a tung vah a lal mahmah uh; huleh a mi lianteun a tung vah thu a nei mahmah mei chih na he uh.
Hizongleh nanguh lahah huchibang ahi sih diing hi; mi koipouh na lah va a lian hih ut chu na natongtu un a pang diing a;
Huleh mi koipouh na lah va lalpen ut chu mi zousiah suaahin a pang diing ahi.
Ajiahchu mihing Tapa hiilhial zong natohsah a um diingin ahung sih a, natongtu diing leh mi tampite tatna diing a a hinna pe diingin a hung zaw hi, a chi hi.
Huleh Jeriko khua ahung tung va; huleh a nungjuite leh mipi nasatah toh Jeriko khua apat a pawt laiun Timai tapa Bartimai mittaw chu lam gei ah khutdohin ana tou a.
Huleh Nazareth Jesu ahi chih a jah tahin, Jesu, nang David tapa, hung khotuah in, chi'n a kikou a.
Huleh mi tampi in amah chu sip diingin a khap va; hizongleh ama’n chu, Nang David tapa, hung khotuah in, chi'n a kihahkou sem hi.
Huin Jesu chu a dinga, amahpa kouh diing thu a pia a. Huleh amahun mittawpa chu a kou va, a kawmah, Ha muangtahin um inla, thou in; ama’n nang ahung kou hi, a chi va.
Huin amah chu a puansilh paai in a thou a, Jesu kawmah a hungta a.
Huleh Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Na tungah bang bawl leng na ut ei? a chi a. Mittawpa in a kawmah, Lalpa, muhtheih ka ut hi, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, Chiahta in; na ginna in ahung damsahta hi, a chi a. Huin a mit ahung vaahpah a; lampi ah Jesu a juita hi.
Huleh Jerusalem kawm, Olive taanga Bethphage leh Bethani khua a tun un, a nungjuite laha mi nih a sawl a.
Huleh a kawmvah, Na mazawn va khua ah va chiah unla; huleh a sunga na luuttah uleh, sabiltung nou kikhit, a tung a koimah tuan ngei louhna khat na mupah diing uh; huchu hung suut unla, hung kai un.
Huleh mi koi aha in na kawm va, Bang diinga na suut uh ahiai? ahung chih leh, Lalpa’n a mamoh ahi; ahung thah kiitpah na diing, chi un, a chi a.
Huin amahuh chu a chiah va, innpua kot bula lampi nih kisuhtuahna a sabiltung nou kikhit chu a mu va; huleh a suut va.
Huleh hutaha ding koite aha in a kawmvah, Bang diinga sabiltung nou suut na hi viai? a chi va.
Huin amahun a kawmvah Jesu’n thu a piah bangin a soi va; huchi'n a chiahsahta uh.
Huin amahun sabiltung nou chu Jesu kawmah ahung pui va, a tung ah a puan uh a phah va, amah chu a tung ah a tuangta hi.
Huin mi tampi in lampi ah a puante uh a phah va, a dangte’n lou a sawlbawh saat in lampi ah a phah uhi.
Huleh malama paite leh nunglama juite’n, Hosanna; Lalpa mina hung pai chu a hampha hi.
Lalpa mina hung tung diing i pu David lalgam chu a hampha hi; Tungnungpen ah Hosanna, chi'n a kikou uh.
Huin Jesu chu Jerusalem ah Pathian biahinn ah a luut a; huleh sil zousiah a et kimvel zohin, nitaahlam zong ahung hita a, sawmlenihte toh Bethani khua ah a chiahta hi.
Huleh a jingin Bethani a kipan ahung un, a gil a kialta a;
Huleh theipi kung nah nei gamlapi a umkhat a mu a, a gah ka muh khaah leh chi'n a va zu an a; huleh a tun in a nah loungal bangmah a mu sih; ajiahchu theipi gah hun ahi sih hi.
Huin Jesu’n a houpih a, sing kawmah, Tunungsiah bangchihtanin koima’n nang apat gah ne nawn sih heh, a chi a. Huleh a nungjuite’n huchu a ja uhi.
Huleh Jerusalem khua ahung tung va; Jesu chu Pathian biahinn ah a luut a, biahinn sunga sil zuah leh leite a nohdoh panta a, huleh sum hengtute dohkaante leh, vakhu zuahte touna a sawnpuuhsah hi.
Huleh mi koimah in Pathian biahinn a van a luut paisuaahpih uh a phal sih.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Ka inn chu nam chin diing a haamteina inn a kichi diing, chi a kigial hilou ahiai mah? hizongleh nangun gutate khuuh in na bawlta uh, chi'n a hilh hi.
Huleh lehkhagialtute leh siampulalte’n hichu a ja va, amah suhmang na diing lampi a hawlta uh; ajiahchu mi zousiah in a thuhilh limdang a sah jiahun amah a lauta uhi.
Huleh nitaah lam ahung hihin khopi a kipanin a pawtdohta hi.
Huleh jingkal a ahung paikawm un theipi kung chu a zung apat a gogawp chu ahung mu va.
Huleh Peter in hung hedoh in a kawmah, Houtupa, en dua, theipi kung na haamsiat chu a gogawpta hi, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Pathian gingta un.

Ajiahchu chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Mi koipouh in hi taang kawmah, Kituandoh inla, tui khang lian ah kipaai in, chia a lungtanga ginglel lou hial a, a soi chu hung tung ngei diing ahi chia gingta photmah in a soi photmah a mu diing hi.
Hujiahin ka hung hilh ahi, Sil bangkim na deih phot uh, na nget chiangun, musa in kingai un, huchi'n na mu diing uhi.
Huleh haamtei a na din chiangun, koi tung hitaleh thupoi bang aha na neih unchu ngaidam un; na pa uh vaan a um in zong na tatsualnate uh ahung ngaihdam theihna diingin.
Hizongleh na ngaihdam louh un chu, na Pa uh vaan a um in zong na tatsualnate uh ahung ngaidam sih diing hi, a chi hi.
Huleh Jerusalem khua ah a luut kiit va; huleh Pathian biahinn sunga, a vaah lehleh laiin, siampu lalte leh, lehkhagialtute leh upate a kawmah ahung va;
Huleh a kawmah, Bang thuneihna in ahiai hi silte na bawl? huleh hi silte bawlna diingin hi thuneihna kuan ahung pia ei? a chi va.
Huin Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Ke'n zong thu khat ka hung dong diing a, hung dawng un, huchi'n bang thuneihna in ahiai hi silte ka bawl, ka hung hilh diing.
John baptisma hi vaan a kipan ahiai, mihing a kipan? hung dawng un, a chi a.
Huin amahuh a kingaihtuah va, Vaan apat chi leilah, bang diinga amah gingta lou, ahung chi diing a;
Hizongleh, Mihing apat chilei lah; mipite a lau ngal va, ajiahchu mi zousiah in John chu zawlnei hitahzet in a sep uh, a chi va.
Huin amahun a dawng va, Jesu kawmah, Ka soi thei sih uh, a chi va. Huin Jesu’n a dawnna in a kawmvah, Ke'n zong bang thuneihna a hi silte bawl ka hih ka hung hilh diah sih diing, a chi hi.

Huleh ama’n a kawmvah tehkhinthu in thu a soi panta a. Mi koi aha in grephuan a bawl a, daai in a uum kimvel a, greptui suuhna kokhuuh a lai a, innsaang khat a lam a; louhoute kawmah hohloh diingin a pia a, huleh khual gamlapi ah a chiahta hi.
Huleh a gah loh hunin, hu an a gah a tan diing chu lou houte kawm apat va la diingin louhoute kawmah suaah khat a sawl hi.
Huleh amahpa chu ana man va, a vua va, khutguaahin a sawl kiitta uh.
Huin ama’n suaah dang khat a sawl kiit a; amah chu suang in ana sep va, a lutang ana suliam va, zumhuaitah a na bawl in a sawlmangta uhi.
Huin ama’n a dang khat a sawl kiit a; amah chu ana that va, huleh a dangte tampi zong khenkhat a vua va, khenkhat a that uhi.
Huleh ama’n tapa deihtah khat a neih nahlai jiahin, Ka tapa chu a zahtaat diing uh, chi'n a nunungpen in amah zong a kawmvah a sawlta hi.
Hizongleh hu louhoute’n, Hichu a gouluah diingpa ahi; hungun, i that diing uh, huchi'n a gouluah diing chu ei a ahi mei diing, a chi va.
Huchi'n amah chu a man va, a that va, huleh grephuan polamah a paaita uhi,
Hujiahin grephuan neitu in bang a lohta diai? Amah chu ahung diing a, louhoute chu a sumangthai diing a, huleh grephuan chu mi dangte kawmah a pe diing hi.
Hi Pathian lehkhabu thu, Inn bawlte’n a suang deih louh u’chu a ning a suang poimohpen ahung hita hi.
Hichu Lalpa bawl ahi a, huleh i mitmuh un a limdang hi, chih na simkha sih viai mah? a chi a.
Huin hu tehkhinthu chu amahuh dem a, a soi ahi chih a heet jiahun amah chu mat a tum va, hizongleh mite a lau uhi; huchi'n amah chu a nusia va, a chiahta uhi.
Huleh amahun a thusoite a man diingin, Pharisaite hunkhop leh Herod pawlte hunkhop a kawmah a sawl va.

Huleh amahun ahung tunun, a kawmah, Houtupa, nang hi midihtah na hi a, mi koimah na giing sih hi; ajiahchu mi maaizahtuam na nei sih a, dihtahin Pathian lampi thu na hilh jel, chih ka he uh; Kaisar kawma siah tawi dih ahiai, dihlou?

Pe diing ka hi viai, ahihlouhleh pe lou diing ka hi viai? a chi va. Hizongleh ama’n a lepchiahdan uh a he a, a kawmvah, Bang diinga hung ze-et na hi viai? makhai khat hung tawi un, ka en diing, a chi a.
Huin ahung tawi va. Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Hi koi lim leh koi min ahiai? a chi a. Huleh amahun, Kaisar a, a chi uh.
Huin Jesu’n a dawng a a kawmvah, Kaisar silte chu Kaisar kawmah pia unla, Pathian silte chu Pathian kawmah pia un, a chi a. Huin amahun limdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Huleh Sadukaite, misi thohkiitna a um sih chitute a kawmah ahung va,
Houtupa, Mosi in, Mi khat a unaupa sita henla, a ji ta nei louin nuse leh, a unaupa in a ji a luah diing a, a unaupa diingin chi a haahsah diing ahi, chih ahung gelhsah hi.
Tuin unau pasal sagih a umta a, a upapen in ji a nei a, huleh chi haah nei louin a si hi.
Huin a nihna in amahnu a nei a, chi haah nei lou mahin a si jel a; huleh a thumnapa zong huchimahbangin.
Huchi'n a sagih un a kiteenpih chiat va, chi haah nei louin a sivehta uh; huleh a tawp ah numeinu zong a sita hi.
Ahihleh misi lah apat thohkiit nia ahung thohkiit chiangun a lah va koi pen ji a hita diai le? a sagih un a kiteenpihkha chiat ngal va, chi'n a dong va.
Jesu’n amahuh a dawng a a kawmvah, Pathian lehkhathu leh Pathian silbawltheihna na heet zawh saang uh a um louh jiahtah a bawl khial hilou na hi uh maw?
Misi laha kipan a thohkiit chiangun, a kiteeng nawn sih diing va, teeng zong a kiteengsah nawn sih diing uh; vaan a um angelte bang ahita diing uhi.
Huleh misite kaihthoh a, a um diing uh thu, Mosi lehkhabu ah, loubawh laha Pathian in, Kei Abraham Pathian, Isaak Pathian, huleh Jakob Pathian ka hi, chi a, a houpihdan sim lou na hi viai mah?
Amah chu misi Pathian ahi sih a, mihing Pathian ahi zaw hi; hujiahin na he khial mahmah uhi, a chi hi.
Huleh lehkhagialtute laha khat a hung a, a kinial uh a ja a, Jesu’n amahuh dihtahin a dawng chih a he a, a kawmah, Thupiah zousiah laha lianpen khoikhu ahiai? chi'n a dong a.
Huin Jesu’n a dawng a, Thupiah zousiah laha lianpen chu, Aw Israel, ngai un; Lalpa i Pathian u’chu Lalpa khat ahi;
Huleh Lalpa na Pathian chu, na lungtang zousiah a, na hinna zousiah a, na lungsim zousiah a, huleh na haatna zousiah a na lungsiat diing ahi, chih ahi: hichu thupiah masapen ahi.
Huleh a nihna chu hi ahi, Nangmah na kilungsiat bang a na innveengte na lungsiat diing ahi. Hite sanga lianzaw thupiah mawngmawng a um sih hi, a chi a.
Huin lehkhagialtupa’n a kawmah, Ahi, Houtupa, na soi dih ngei mei; Pathian khat chauh a um a, amah chih louh a dang a um sih;

Amah chu lungtang zousiah a, heetsiamna zousiah a, hinna zousiah a, huleh haatna zousiah a lungsiat a, huleh eimah i kilungsiat banga i veengte lungsiat chu haaltum sillat leh kithoihna zousiah sangin a hoihzaw hi, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n piltaha, a dawn Jesu’n a muh in a kawmah, Pathian gam apat na gamla sih hi, a chi a. Hunungsiah chu koima’n thu mawngmawng a dong ngamta sih uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n Pathian biahinn a thu a hilh laiin, amahuh a houpih a, Lehkhagialtute’n, Khrist chu David tapa ahi, bangchidan a, a chih uh a hiai?
Amah David ngei in Hagau Siangthou in, Lalpa’n ka Lalpa kawmah, Na meelmate na keeng ngahna a ka bawl masiah ka jiatlamah tou in, a chih, a chi ngal a.
Hujiahin David ngei in amah chu Lalpa a chih ahi; khoi a kipan a, a ta hi a ta diai le? a chi a. Huleh mipi vaantaang in kipaahtahin a thu a ngaikhia uhi.
Huin ama’n a thuhilhna ah a kawmvah, Lehkhagialtute lahah kiveeng un, amahuh chu puantual silh a vaah, huleh dawl muna chibai buuh bang a ut uh.
Huleh kikhopna inn a touphah hoihpen leh, gual vaahna a mun hoihpen bang a ngaina biih uhi.
Meithaite innsung a negam va, huleh a heem in sawtpipi a haamtei uh; hite’n chu siamlouh tana lian sem a mu diing uhi, a chi hi.
Huleh Jesu chu sumkholna zawnah a tou a, mipite’n sumkholna a, a sum khiahdan uh a en a; huleh mi hausa tamtahte’n tampipi a khia uh.
Huleh meithainu zawngtah khat a hung a, sumeng dangka nih a khia a; huchu paihsa khat toh kibang ahi.
Huin ama’n a nungjuite a kou a, a kawmvah, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, sumkholna bawma sum khete zousiah sangin, hi meithainu zawng tahin a khe tampen hi.
Ajiahchu amahuh zousiah in a neih val uh a khia uh ahi a; hizongleh hi meithainu in chu a neih zousiah, a kitunhingna diing teng a khe veh ahi, a chi hi.
Huleh Pathian biahinn a kipana a pawtdohin a nungjuite laha khat in a kawmah, Houtupa, en dua, a suang te bang tobang hi a, huleh a innte haw bangchitah a loupi a taimah! a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Hi inn loupite na mu maw? suhchim louh a, suang khat tunga khat kichiang mawngmawng hi-ah a um sih diing, a chi a.
Huleh Olive taang a Pathian biahinn zawna a tou laiin, Peter toh Jakob toh, John toh Andru in a guuhin a kawmah,
Hi silte bang chih chiangin ahung tung diai? huleh hi silte hung tun diing chiangin chiamchihna bang ahung um diai? hung hilhin, chi'n a dong va.
Huleh Jesu’n amahuh a dawng a, a kawmvah, Koima’n ahung heem louhna diingun pilvaang un.
Ajiahchu, Kei Khrist ka hi, chi'n mi tampi ka minin ahung diing va, mi tampi a heem diing uh.
Huleh gaal thute leh kidou thuthangte na jah hun chiangun lungdong sih un; hute chu hung tung diing mawng ahi: hizongleh a tawpna chu ahi nai tadih sih diing.

Ajiahchu nam tuam leh nam tuam a kidou diing va, gam tuam leh gam tuam a kidou diing uh; huleh mun tuam tuam ah ziil a kiliing diing a, kialte leh buainate a tung diing: hi silte chu gentheihna kipatna ahi.

Hizongleh kipilvaang un; ajiahchu vaihawmtute khutah ahung pedoh diing va, kikhopna innte ah ahung vo diing va; huleh keimah jiahin houtute leh kumpite ma ah amah uh heetsahna diingin a hung kipui diing hi.
Huleh Tanchinpha chu nam zousiah kawmah soi masat ahi diing hi.

Hizongleh ahung pui va, ahung piahdoh hun chiangun bang ka soi de aw chi'n ngaihtuah khawl sih unla; a huntaha hung kipia chu soi zaw un; ajiahchu a soitu nanguh hilouin, Hagau Siangthou ahi zaw ngal a.
Huchi'n unaupa in unaupa thah diingin a mansah diing a, huleh pa in a ta; huleh tate’n a nulepate uh a dou diing a, a thatsah diing uhi.
Huleh ka min jiahin mi zousiah huat na hi diing uh; hizongleh a tawp dong a thuaah tawntung zou, hu mi ngei chu huuhhing in a um diing hi.
Hizongleh zawlnei Daniel in ana soi, sumangtu kihdahum chu a din louhna diing a ding na muh chiangun, (a sim photin a umzia he heh) hu hun tah chiangin Judia gam a umte taang ah tai u’heh.
Huleh inn tunga um zong kum sih heh, a inn sunga thuampua umte ladoh diingin zong va luut sih heh;
Huleh lou a um chu a puan la diingin kiih kiit sih heh.
Hizongleh hu lai huna gaai leh naunou pomte tung a gih hi!
Huleh hu lai hun chu phalbilai ahih louhna diingin haamtei un.
Ajiahchu hu nite ah gimthuaahna a um diing, hutobang gimthuaahna Pathian in leilung a siam chiila kipan tuni tanin a um ngei nai sih a, um zong a um nawn sih diing hi.
Huleh Lalpa’n hu nite chu sutom sih henla hileh, mi mawngmawng hingin a suahta sih diing uh; hizongleh miteel, a teeltuamte jiahin a nite chu a sutomta hi.
Huleh hu hun chianga mi khat pouh in na kawm va, En un, hi ah Khrist a um, aha ahihlouhleh, en un, hutah ah a um, a chih uleh tahsang sih un.
Ajiahchu Khrist tahlou leh zawlnei tahlou ahung pawt diing va, hute’n chu chiamchihnate leh silmahte ensah in, hithei lehouh teelte nasan a heemkhe diing uh.
Hizongleh kipilvaang un: ngai un, sil zousiah ka hung hilh masata hi.
Hizongleh hu nite a, hu hahsatna tun zoh chiangin, ni chu a mialta diing a, huleh ha zong a vaah nawn sih diing.
Huleh vaan aahsite chu ahung ke diing a, vaan a um silbawl theihnate chu a kiliing diing hi.
Huleh hutah chiangin mihing Tapa chu silbawltheihna nasatah leh loupina toh meipi laha hung a mu diing uh.
Huleh hutah chiangin ama’n a vaansawllehte a sawlkhe diing a, a teelte, kawlmong li a kipan, lei tawp a kipanin vaan tawp dongin a khawmkhawm diing uhi.
Huchi'n theipi kungah tehkhinthu zil un; a ba ahung dot a, a nah ahung sel chiangin nipi a naita chih na he uh.
Huchimahbangin hi silte ahung tun na muh chiangun, amah ahung naita, kotkhaah bul ngei ah ahung tungta, chih he un.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, hi sil zousiah a tunkim masiah tulai khang thahte a bei sih diing uh.
Vaan leh lei a bei diing a: ka thu ahihleh a bei sih diing hi.
Hizongleh hu ni leh hu huntah chu, Pa chauh loungal, koimah in, vaan a um angelte’n zong, Tapa in zong a he sih hi.
A hun diing na heet louh jiahun pilvaang unla, kiging zinga um in haamtei un.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh mihing Tapa chu, mi khat a inn nusia a, a suaahte kawma thuneihna pia a, huleh a natoh diing uh pe chiat a, khual gamlapi a va zin bang ahi.
Hujiahin kiging zing un; ajiahchu inn neitupa hung diing hun, nitaah lam aha, jan khang lai aha, aahkhuan in aha, ahihlouhleh jingkal in aha chih na he sih uh.
Huchilou inzaw thakhata hungin ihmu in ahung mukha diing hi.
Huleh na kawm va ka soi chu mi zousiah kawma ka soi ahi, Kiging zing un, a chi hi.
Huleh ni nih nungin chiahkaan kuut leh tanghou tolsoh louh kuut a um a; huleh siampu lalte leh lehkhagialtute'n amah chu doha bawl a, mat a, thah theihna diingdan a hawl va.
Hizongleh kuut ni in hidah leh, huchilou inchu mipi buaina a umkha diing, a chi va.

Huleh Bethani khua a Simon miphaahpa inn a um a, ankuang a, a tou laiin, numei khat, Alabastar bawma spiknard thau gimtui man tamtah tawi in a hung a; huleh amahnu’n a bawm chu a tatkeeh a, a lu ah a sungta hi.
Huleh a lah vah lungkim lou khenkhat a um va, Bang diinga thau namtui kimawh suhbei ahiai?
Hichu makhai zathum sanga tamzaw a zuah a, migentheite kawma piah theih diing ahi ngal a, a chi va. Huchi'n amahnu tungah a phunta uhi.
Huin Jesu’n, Amahnu chu a umum in umsah un, bang diinga subuai na hi viai? ka tungah na hoih a tong ahi.
Ajiahchu migentheite na kawmvah a um zing va, na ut hun teng un na panpih thei uh; hizongleh kei chu na kawmvah ka um zing sih hi.
Amahnu’n a bawl theihtawp a bawlta ahi, ka sapum vui diing a thau hung nuh khawl ahi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, khovel pumpi a hi tanchinpha kisoina phot ah hi amahnu sil bawl zong a heetzingna diingin a kisoi diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh sawmlenihte laha khat, Juda Iskariot chu amah mansah diingin siampu lalte kawmah a va chiah a.
Huleh hikhu a jah tahun amah uh a kipaah va, huleh amah chu sum piah a chiamta uhi. Huin ama’n a matsahna diing lemtaang a hawlta hi.
Huleh tanghou tolsoh louh kuut ni masapen, chiahkaan kuut belaamnou a goh ni un, a nungjuite’n a kawmah, chiahkaan ankuang na neeh theihna diingin khoiah va bawl le ung na ut ei? a chi va.
Huin ama’n a nungjuite nih a sawldoh a, a kawmvah, Khopi sungah va luut un, huchi'n pasal tuibeel pua khat in ahung tuaah diing a: amah chu jui un.
Huleh a luutna penpen, hu inn neitu kawmah, Houtupa’n ka nungjuite toh chiahkaan ankuang ka neeh na diing uh mikhual pindan khoitah ahiai? a chih hi, chi un.
Huchi'n ama’n pindan tungnung liantah, van umsa leh guatsa diam ahung ensah diing; hu ah ei uh diing bawl un, a chi a.
Huin a nungjuite a chiah va, khopi sungah a luut va, huleh a kawm va a soi bangin a muta uh; huchi'n chiahkaan ankuang chu a bawlta uhi.
Huin nitaah lam ahung hihin amah chu sawmlenihte toh ahung a,
Huleh tou a, a neeh laiun Jesu’n, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, An ka neehkhawmpih na lah va mi khat in ahung mansah diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh amahuh chu a lungkham panta va, a kawmah, khatkhat in, Kei ka hi maw? a chi va, a banban in a dongta uhi.
Huin ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Sawmlenihte laha khat, kuang a ka an sawhkhawmpih ahi.
Mihing Tapa chu a tanchin kigial bang ngei a chiah diing ahi a; hizongleh mihing Tapa mansah diingpa tung a gih hi! amahpa chu a pian a piang lou hileh amah diingin a hoihzaw diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh a neeh laiun Jesu’n tanghou a la a, a vangpiah a, huleh a balkeeh a, a kawmvah a pia a, La unla ne un: hichu ka tahsa ahi, a chi a.
Huin nou a la a, huleh kipaahthu a soi zohin, a kawmvah a pia a; a bawnun a dawn chiat uhi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Hichu thuhun thah a ka sisan, mi tampite diing a luang chu ahi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Pathian gam a a thah a ka dawn ni a tun masiah greptui ka dawn nawnta sih diing, a chi a.
Huleh amahun la khat a sah zohun a pawtdoh va, Olive taang ah a chiahta uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, Tujan chiangin na bawnun ka tungah na lunghilou veh diing uh; ajiahchu, Belaampu ka jep diing a, belaam hon chu a dalhjah diing uh, chih gelh ahi.
Hizongleh ka thohkiit nung chiangin Galili gam ah na ma vah ka chiah diing, a chi a.
Hizongleh Peter in chu a kawmah, A bawnun lunghilou veh zong le uh kei chu ka lunghilou sih diing, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Tuniin, tujan ngei in, aah nihvei a khuan ma in thumvei na hung kiheetmohbawl diing, a chi a.
Hizongleh ama’n chu khauh semin, Nang toh sikhawm diing hizongleng ka hung kiheetmohbawl sih diing, a chi a. Huchimahbangin a bawnun a chi chiat uhi.
Huleh amahuh chu Gethsemani kichi mun khat ahung tungta va; huleh ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, Ka haamtei sungsiah hi-ah na tou un, a chi a.
Huleh Peter toh, Jakob toh John a pui a, nasatah a thaphaangin a mangbang panta a.
Huchi'n a kawmvah, Ka lungtang sihna khop hialin a lungkham hi, hi-ah ana um unla, kiging zing un, a chi a.
Huin malamah themkhat a chiahsuan deuh a, tual ah a puuh a, ahihtheih leh hu hunin amah a pelh theihna diingin a haamtei a.
Huleh, Abba, Pa, sil zousiah nanga diingin a hithei hi, hi nou hi kei apatin lamang in; hizongleh kei thu hilouin, nangmah thu thu hizaw heh, a chi a.
Huin a hung a, amahuh chu ihmu in ahung mu a, huchi'n Peter kawmah, Simon ihmu na hi maw? daahkal khat zong kiging a um zou lou na hi maw?
Heemna a na luut louhna diingun kiging zing unla, haamtei un. Hagau in chu a peih a, hizongleh tahsa chu a zawngkhal hi, a chi a.
Huleh a chiahmang kiit a, a haamtei a, a chih ngeimah a chi a.
Huin ahung kiihkiit a, amahuh chu ihmuin ahung mu jel a, (a ihmut uh a suaah mahmah jiahin) huleh amah dawnna diing zong a he sih uhi.
Huin a thumveina in a hung a, a kawmvah, Tuin chu ihmu unla, khawlta un; a hunta hi, a hun zong a tungta; ngai un, mihing Tapa chu misualte khut a piahkhiah ahita.
Thou un, i chiah diing uh; en un, kei hung mansahtu chu a naita hi, a chi a.
Huleh thu a soi laiin, sawmlenihte laha khat, Juda chu siampu lalte leh lehkhagialtute leh upate a kipanin namsaau leh khetbuuh tawi mipi nasatah toh ahung tungpah a.
Huleh amah mansahpa in, Ka tawp penpen chu amah ahi, man unla, kituup tahin puimang un, chi'n chiamchihna a pe masa zouta a.
Huchi'n ahung hun tahin a va naihpah a, Houtupa, houtupa, chi'n a tawpta a.
Huin amahun a tungah khut a ha va, a manta uhi.
Huleh a kawm va dingte laha khat in namsaau a doh a, siampu lalpen suaahpa a saat a, a bil a saatkhia hi.
Huleh Jesu’n amahuh a dawng a, a kawmvah, Guta man diing bang hialin namsaaute leh khetbuuhte keng in kei man diingin na hung kuan uh maw?
Ni chinin, biahinn ah thuhilh in ka um zinga, na hung man sih uh; hizongleh Pathian lehkhabu thu a taangtun ngei diing ahi, a chi a.
Huin a bawnun amah a nusia va, a taita uhi.
Huleh tangval koi ahakhat in, puannem khat chauh silh in amah a jui a; huleh tangvalte’n amah ana man va;
Huin a puannem chu nusia in, a saguah in a taita hi.
Huin Jesu chu siampu lalpen ma ah a pui va; huleh amah toh siampu liante leh, upate leh, lehkhagialtute zousiah ahung kikhawm va.
Huleh Peter in gamlapi ah, siampu lalpen inn sung tandongin a jui a; huleh suaahte toh a toukhawma, mei a awi hi.
Huleh siampu lalte leh vaihawmna inn a um zousiah in Jesu a thah theihna diingun a heeh na diing a hawl va; a mu sih uh.
Mi tam tahin zuauthu in a heeh va, hizongleh a heehna haw uh a kituaah sih.
Huin mi koite aha a dingdoh va, zuauthu in a heeh va,
Hi khuta bawl biahinn ka suse diing a, ni thum sungin khuta bawl louh a dangkhat ka lam diing, ama’n a chih ka ja uh, a chi va.
Hizongleh huchi'n zong a heehna uh a kituaah thei tuan sih hi.
Huin siampu lalpen a lai ah a dingdoh a, Jesu kawmah, Bangma a dawng lou maw? Hite hung heehna bangchidan ahiai? chi'n a dong a.
Hizongleh amah chu a sip bihbeh a, bangmahin a dawng sih hi siampu lalpen in, Nang Hampha Tapa, Khrist chu na hi maw? chi'n a dong kiit a.
Huleh Jesu’n, Ka hi; huleh mihing Tapa hi silbawltheihna jiatlama tou a, vaan meipi laha hung na mu diing, uh, a chi a.
Huin siampu lalpenin a puante a botkeeh a, Heetpihtu dang bang diing i chi nalai diai?
Pathian a soisiatdan na jata uh; bangchi na sa viai? a chi a. Huin a bawnun amah chu si taahin siamlouh a tangsahta uhi.
Huin khenkhat in chil a siatkhum panta va, a maai a tuamsah va, khut in a su va, huleh a kawmah, Soi in, a chi va; huleh suaahte’n zong a khutpeeh un a beeng uhi.
Huleh Peter chu nuai lama innpi huanga a um laiin, Siampu lalpen suaah nungaahte laha khat a hung a;
Huleh amahnu in Peter mei awi a um a muh in, a en a, Nang zong Nazareth Jesu toh kilawi na hi, a chi a.
Hizongleh ama’n chu kiheetmohbawl in, Ka he sih, na soi zong a ngaihna ka he sih, a chi a. Huleh inn liimah a va pawtdoh a, huchi'n aah a khuangta hi.
Huleh nungaah khat in amah a mu kiit a, a kawma dingte kawmah, Hipa a lah va khat ahi, a chi jel a.
Huleh a kiheetmohbawl kiit a. Huin tomkhat zouin a kawma dingte’n Peter kawmah, A lah va khat hijen te: ajiahchu Galilimi na hi a, na haam in zong a kihe hi, a chi va.
Hizongleh ama’n, Hu na mihing soipa uh ka hekha sih, chi'n haamsia louin a kichiamta hi.
Huleh a nihveina’n aah a khuangta a. Huin Peter in Jesu’n a kawma, aah nihvei khuan ma in thumvei na hung kiheetmohbawl diing hi, a chih thu a hedoh a ama’n huchu a ngaihtuahin a kapta hi.
Huleh jingkal ahung hihin, siampu lalte chu upate toh, lehkhagialtute toh, huleh vaihawmtute zousiah toh a kihoukhawm va, huleh Jesu chu a kaan va, a pui va, Pilat kawmah a pedohta uhi.
Huin Pilat in, Judate Kumpipa na hi maw? chi'n a dong a. Huin ama’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Na chikha hi, a chi a.
Huleh siampu lalte’n thu tampiin a heeh va; hizongleh ama’n bangmah in a dawng sih.
Huin Pilat in a dong kiit a, Bangma a dawng lou maw? en in, ahung heehna zoujaite uh, a chi hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n bangmah in a dawng tuan sih a; huchi'n Pilat in limdang a sa mahmah hi.
Huleh kuut ni chiangin a nget penpen uh suangkul taang khat ama’n a hahdohsah veudan ahi a.
Huleh a min Barabba kichi, a helna lama tualthat, a helpihte toh koltaang khawmkhat a um a.
Huleh mipi chu ngaihtaha kikou in, amahuh diing a a bawlsah veu banga bawl diingin a ngen va.
Hizongleh Pilat in a dawng a, a kawmvah, Judate Kumpipa hung hahdohsah leng na ut viai? a chi a.
Ajiahchu siampu lalte’n’ thangsiatna jiahin amah a pedoh uh ahi chih a he hi.
Hizongleh siampu lalte’n chu, Barabba hung hahdohsah zaw in, chia ngen diingin mipite a chiilta uhi.
Huin Pilat in a dawng a, a kawmvah, Ahihleh Judate Kumpipa na chih pa uh hi bang loh leng chi na hi viai? a chi kiit a.
Huin amahun, Kros ah kilhbehin, chi'n a kikou kiit va.
Huin Pilat in a kawmvah, Bang jiahin e, bang bawl sual a nei a ahiai? a chi a. Huin amahuh chu, Kros ah kilhbeh in, chi'n a kihahkou sem uhi.
Huchi'n Pilat in mipi suhlungkim a ut a, Barabba a hahdohsah a, huleh Jesu chu a jep zohin kros a kilhbeh diingin a peta hi.
Huin sepaihte’n amah chu innpi sung, Praitorium a chih vah a pui va, huleh sepaih zousiah a kou khawm va.
Huleh amah chu puansandup a silhsah va, linglukhuh a phan va, a khuhsahta uhi.
Huleh, Chibai, Judate Kumpipa, chi'n chibai a buuh uhi.
Huleh a lu sialluang in a vua va, chil a siatkhum va, huleh khupdin in a bia uhi.
Huleh chiamnuih bawlna a, a zat zohun, puan sandup chu a hawhkhia va, amah puan a silhsah kiit va, kros a kilhbeh diingin a puita uhi.
Huleh mi pailai khat, gam lama kipana hung, Cyrene gam mi Simon, Alexander leh Rufa pa chu a kros po diingin amah va.
Huleh amah chu Golgotha munah a pui va, huchu, Luguh mun, chihna ahi.
Huleh uain murrah toh kihal dawn diingin a pia va; hizongleh ama’n a sang sih hi.
Huleh kros a, a kilhbeh zohun, a tan diing chiat uh heetna diing a aai saan in, a puansilhte chu a kihawmta uhi.
Huleh amah a kilhbeh hun u’chu daah thumna ahi.
Huleh a heehna uh heetsahna, a tungah, Judate Kumpipa, chi'n a kigial hi.
Huleh amah toh miguta nih a kilhbeh va; khat a jiatlam ah, huleh khat a veilam ah.
Huchi'n Pathian lehkhathu, Amah chu mi tasualte toh simkhawm ahi, chih chu a taangtungta hi.
Huleh mi chiahleh vaahleh zousiah in a lu uh thingkawm in, Ehei, nang Pathian biahinn susia a ni thum a sadoh kiitpa,
Nangmah kihuhing inla, huleh kros apat hung kumkhia in, chi'n a elhou uhi.
Huchibang mahin siampu lalte’n zong a elhou va, lehkhagialtute toh amah leh amahuh kihou in, Ama’n midang a huhinga, amah a kihuhing thei sih.
Israelte Kumpipa Khrist chu tuin kros apat hung kumkhia heh, i muh a, huleh i gintaat theihna diingun, a chi va. Huleh kros a, a kilhbehkhawmte un zong amah a housia uhi.
Huleh daah guupna ahung hihin, gam pumpi tungah sim ahung zing a, daah kuaahna ahih mateng khua a mialta hi.
Huleh daah kuaahna ah Jesu chu aw ngaihtahin a kikou a, Eloi, Eloi, lamasabakthani? chi'n. Huchu, Ka Pathian, ka Pathian, bang diinga hung taisan na hiai? chihna ahi.
Huleh a kawma dingte khenkhat in hu a jah un, Ngai un, Elijah a kou hi, a chi va.

Huleh mi khat a tai a, spanji khat uain thuuh a diah dimin, sialluang chiang dawnah a taah a, dawn diingin a pia a, Ngaihsah sih un; amah lakhe diingin Elijah ahung ngeel eimah i en diing uh, a chi uhi.
Huin Jesu chu aw ngaihtahin a kikou a, a hagau a hahta hi.
Huleh Pathian biahinn puanjah chu a tunglam a kipan a nuailam tandongin keeh nih ahung kisuahta hi.
Huleh a mazawn a ding sepaih zahoutu in, hutobanga a kikoudoh leh a hagau hah a muh in, Hipa hi Pathian Tapa ahitahzet mai, a chi a.
Hutah ah numeite zong gamlatah apat en in a um va; hute lahah, Mari Magdalene, Jakob neuzaw leh Jose nu Mari, huleh Salomi a tel uhi.
(Amah u’chu Galili gam a a um laia, amah jui a, a natohsahte zong ahi uh). Huleh numei dang tampi Jerusalem a amah toh kitonpute zong a um uhi.
Huleh nitaahlam ahung hihin, kiginni ahih jiahin, huchu khawlni ma a ni ahi a.
Joseph, Arimathai khua a mi, vaihawmtu zahumtah, Pathian gam ngaah zing a um, a hung a, haangsan tahin Pilat kawmah a luut a, Jesu luang chu a va ngenta a.
Huleh Pilat in a huchi sihpah chu thumah a sa mahmah a; huchi'n sepaih zahoutu kou in a kawmah, A sihna a sawt tai mah, chi'n a dong a.
Huleh sepaih zahoutu apat a heetchian phetin a luang chu Joseph a peta hi.
Huin ama’n puannem a lei a, amah chu a lakhia a, puannem in a tuam a, suang hawtkuaah haan khat ah a sialta a, huleh suang khat haankot ah a liihkhumta hi.
Huleh Mari Magdalene leh Jose nu Mari in a sialna a en uhi.
Huleh khawlni a bei phetin, Mari Magdalene leh, Jakob nu Mari leh, Salomi in amah a vanuh diingun sil gimtui a lei va.
Huleh hapta ni masapen ni jingkal matahin haan ah ni suaah in ahung va.
Huleh, amah uleh amahuh kihou in, Ha an kot apat suang kua’n hung liihkhiahsah diing adiai? a kichi va.
Huleh a et uleh suang chu liihdohsa in a muta uhi; a suang chu a lian mahmah hi.
Huleh haan sunga a luut uleh, tangval khat puan vaam tualtah silh a, jiatlam panga tou a muta va; a lau mahmah uhi.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Lau sih un; Kros a kikilhbeh Nazareth Jesu na hawl uh ahi; amah chu a thou kiitta a, hi-ah a um nawn sih hi; en un a sialna mun uh.
Hizongleh chiah unla, a nungjuite leh Peter kawmah, Galili gam ah na ma vah a chiah hi; na kawm va a soi bangin amah na mu diing uh, chih va hilh un, a chi a.
Huin amahuh chu kintahin a pawt va, haan apatin a taita uh a; kiliing a thum ah a sah jiahun. Huleh a lau jiahun koimah kawmah bangmah a soi sih uhi.
Huchi'n Jesu chu hapta ni masapen a, a thohkiit in Mari Magdalene, a sung apat dawi sagih a nohdohna nu kawmah a kilaah masapen a.
Huleh amahnu chu a chiah a, Jesu umpih veute, amah suuna kapte a va hilh a.
Huleh amahun, amah chu a hingta a, huleh amahnu in a mu hi chih a jah un a tahsang sih uhi.
Huleh hu nungin a lah va mi nih, gamlam zuana a pai laiun, meel tuam pu in a kawmvah a kilaah a.
Huin amahuh chu a chiah va, nungjui dangte a va hilh va; amahun zong ana gingta sih uhi.
Hunung la min, ankuang a, a tou laiun, sawmlekhatte kawmah a kilaah a, a thohkiit nunga amah mute thu a gintaat louh jiahun, a gintaat louhna uleh, a lungtang khauh thu vah a taihilh hi.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, khovel zousiah ah chiah unla, silsiam chinteng kawmah Tanchinpha soi un.
Koipouh a gingta a baptisma tang chu huhing in a um diing a; hizongleh a gingta lou chu siamlouh tang in a um diing hi.
Huleh a gingtate chu hi chiamchihnate in a jui diing: Ka min in dawite a nohdoh diing va; haam thahte in a haam diing uh.
Guulte khut in a la diing va; sih theihna sil bangchi bang dawn zongle uh bangmah a chi sih diing uh; huleh damloute tungah khut a nga diing va, a dam jel diing uhi, a chi hi.
Huchia Lalpa’n a kawm va thu a soi zohin, amah chu vaan ah puitouh in a um a, Pathian jiatlamah a touta hi.
Huleh amahuh chu a kuandoh va, mun chinah thu a soita va, Lalpa’n amah uh a tohpih a, chiamchihna in juiin a thu chu a sukip jel hi. Amen.
I lahva chiantaha gintaat a um hu silte, mi tampite’n a phuanjahna diing ngaihtuah a gelh ana tup uh;
A chiil apat a mita mutute leh thu natongtute’n ahung na hilh bangun,
Zahumpen Theophil, a bul a kipan sil zousiah heetkimna nei in, kizom jel a na kawm a gelh hoih ka sa hi.
Tuma a nang hungna kihilh thute a dih ngeel hi chih na heetna diingin.
Juda gam kumpipa Herod damlai in, a min Zakaria kichi, Abia pawla mi siampu natong khat a um a; huleh a ji chu Aaron tanute khat ahi a, a min Elizabeth ahi.
Huleh amahuh geel chu soisel beiin Lalpa thupiah leh a daan zousiah juiin Pathian mitmuh in dihtattahin a um uhi.
Huleh Elizabeth a chi'n jiahin ta a nei sih va, a nih un a upa tuaah mahmahta uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Ama’n a hun tan dungjui a Pathian ma a siampu nna a toh laiin,
Siampu tawndan dungjuiin Lalpa biahinn a luut chiang a gimnamtui haal chu a tan ahi a.
Huleh gimnamtui kihaal laiin mipite chu a bawnun innpua ah ana haamtei uhi.
Huleh Lalpa angel khat gimnamtui haalna maitaam jiatlam a dingin a kawmah ahung kilaah a.
Huleh Zakaria in amah a muh tahin a mangbang a, lau zong a lau a.
Hizongleh angel in a kawmah, Zakaria, lau sin; ajiahchu na haamteina jah ahita hi; na ji Elizabeth in tapa ahung neihsah diing a, a min John nasah diing ahi.
Huleh nang chu nuamin na kipaah diing a; huleh mi tampite amah pianin a kipaah diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Lalpa ngaih in amah mi lian ahi diing a, uain aha, ahihlouhleh khamtheih zu mawngmawng a dawn sih diing; huleh a nu sunga kipan ngei in Hagau Siangthou in a dim diing hi.
Huleh Israel tate tampi Lalpa a Pathian uh lam a kihei kiitsah diing hi.

Huleh pate lungtang tate lam a ngasah diing leh, thumang loute midihtat pilna lam a ngasah diing leh, Lalpa diing a mi honkhat kipeihsa a um diing a na bawllawh diingin Elijah lungsim leh silbawltheihna toh Lalpa ma ah a pai diing hi, a chi a.
Huin Zakaria in angel kawmah, Hikhu bangchi'n ka hethei diai? keilah teehsia hita ing a, ka ji zong a teeh mahmahta a, a chi a.
Huin angel in a dawng a, a kawmah, Kei Gabriel, Pathian ma a diing chu ka hi; huleh na kawm a thu soi diing leh hi thu kipaah huaite hilh diing a sawl ka hi.
Huleh ngai in, a hun banga hung tung diing hi thu ka soite na gintaat louh jiahin hi silte ahung tun masiah haamthei louin na um diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh mipite’n Zakaria chu a nangaah va, Pathian biahinn sunga a sawt um beeh jiahin limdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Huleh ahung pawt in a kawmvah thu a soi theita sih a; huin biahinn sungah kilaahna a mu ahi chih a heta va; ajiahchu a kawmvah heetsahna a bawl a, huleh haam thei louin a um zingta hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, a natohna a ni a chin tahin a inn ah a chiahta hi.
Huleh hu nite nungin a ji Elizabeth chu ahung gaaita a, ha ngaa sunga kibu a,
Mite laha ka minse seel diingin, Lalpa’n ahung muh in hichibangin ka tungah a bawlta hi, chi'n.
Huleh aha guupna ah Pathian in angel Gabriel chu Galili gam a khua khat, a min Nazareth kichi ah,
Nungaah siangthou khat, David suan a mi, a min Joseph kichipa ji diing a hual kawmah a sawl a; hu nungaah siangthou min chu Mari ahi.
Huleh angel chu a kawmah a luut a, Chibai, nasatah a deihsahnu, Lalpa na kawmah a um hi; numei lahah hamphanu na hi, a chi a.
Huleh amahnu’n amah a muh in a thusoite ah a lunghimoh mahmah a, hikhu hi bangtobang chibai buuhna hita diing a de aw, chi'n a ngaihtuah a.
Huin angel in a kawmah, Mari, lau sin; ajiahchu Pathian lahah deihsahna na tang hi.
Huleh ngai in, na gaai diing a, tapa na nei diing a, a min Jesu na sa diing hi.
Amah chu mi lian ahi diing a, Tungnungpen Tapa a kichi diing; huleh Lalpa Pathian in a kawmah a pa David laltouphah a pe diing a;
Huleh Jakob haahte tungah kumtuang in a lal diing a, a gam in beini a nei sih diing hi, a chi a.
Huin Mari in angel kawmah, hi bangchi'n ahi diai? pasal lah nei lou ing a, a chi a.

Huleh angel in a dawng a, a kawmah, Hagau Siangthou na tungah ahung tung diing a, Tungnungpen silbawltheihna in ahung liahkhuh diing; hujiahin mi siangthou nang a hung piang diing zong Pathian Tapa chih ahi diing hi.
Huleh ngai in, na sanggamnu Elizabeth in zong a teeh nungin tapa khat a paaita hi; a chiing a chihnu ah, tu aha guupna a hita hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian diingin ahi thei lou bangmah a um sih diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh Mari in, En in, Lalpa suaahnu chu; na soi bang ngei in ka tungah hung tung heh, a chi a. Huin angel in a chiahsanta hi.
Hulaiin Mari chu a thou a, singtaang gam ah, Juda khopi khatah kintahin a chiah a;
Huleh Zakaria inn ah a luut a, Elizabeth chibai a buuh a.
Huleh hichi ahung hia, Elizabeth in Mari chibai buuh a jah tahin a sunga naungeeh chu a tawm a; huleh Elizabeth chu Hagau Siangthou in ahung dimta a.
Huleh aw ngaihtahin ahung haamdoh a, Numei lahah hamphanu na hi, na gil a gah zong a hampha hi.
Ka Lalpa nu ka kawma na hung bangchidan a hitai?
Ngai in, na chibai hung buuh gin ka bila a luut tahin ka gilsunga naungeeh chu nuamin a kitawm hi.
Huleh a gingtanu zong a hampha hi; Lalpa’n a kawma a thusoite chu taangtung diing ahih jiahin, a chi a.
Huin Mari in, Ka hinna in Lalpa a paahtawi a,
Huleh ka hagau chu ka Hundampa Pathian tungah a nuam hi.
Ajiahchu ama’n a suaahnu namngiam dan a ngaihsah a; huchi'n, ngai in, tu a kipanin khang thah zousiah in hampha ahung chi diing uhi.
Ajiahchu amah mihaat in ka tungah sil loupitahte a bawlta a; huleh a min zong siangthou ahi.
Huleh amah laudan siamte tungah a hehpihna a khang a khang in a um peh hi.
A baantha in a haatdan a ensah a; mi kiliansahte chu a lungtang suangtuahna uh a suhdalhsahta hi.
Mi haatte chu a laltouna va kipan a lakhia a, mi ngiamte chu a tawisangta hi.
Gilkialte chu silhoih in a sutai a; huleh mi hausate chu khutguaah in a sawlmangta hi.
A hehpihna heet zingna in a suaah Israel a panpihta a;
Kumtuanga diing a i pulepate, Abraham, huleh a haahte kawma ana soi bang ngei in, a chi a.
Huleh Mari chu a kawmah ha thum vel a taam a, huin a inn ah a pai kiitta hi.
Huleh Elizabeth chu a nausuah hun ahung tungta a; huchi'n tapa ahung neita a.
Huleh a innveengte leh a sanggamte’n, Lalpa’n hehpihna loupitah a tungah a sulang chih ana ja va, a kipaahpih uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, a ni giatni in naungeeh zehtan diingin a hung va; a min diingin a pa min la in Zakaria a sah tum va.
Huin a nu in a dawng a, Huchi hi sinte, John chih zawh diing ahi, a chi a.
Huleh amah un a kawmah, Na beh na phung lahah hi mina kikou koimah um loupi, a chi va.
Huleh amah un a pa kawmah, A min bang na hisah nuam ei chi'n heetsahna a bawl va.
Huin ama’n lehkhagelhna dohkaan a ngen a, A min chu John ahi, chi'n a gial a. Huleh a bawnun thumah a sa mahmah uh.
Huin a kam ahung kihongpah a, a lei ahung kiphel a, ahung haam a, Pathian a paahtawita hi.
Huleh a kawmva teeng zousiahte chu ahung lauta va; huleh hi thute chu Judia gam singtaang zousiah ah a thangsuahta hi.
Huleh a jakha zousiah in a lungtang vah a geel chiat va, Hi naungeeh bangchibang ahung hitaphet de aw, chi'n! Huleh Lalpa khut in amah a umpih hi.
Huleh a pa Zakaria chu Hagau Siangthou in ahung dim a, huleh thu ahung soidohta a,
Israel Lalpa Pathian chu paahtawi in um heh; ajiahchu ama’n a mite ahung kana, ahung tanta hi,
Huleh a suaah David innkuante lahah hutdamna kii ahung siamsahta hi.
Leilung pian chiil apat a zawlnei siangthoute kama ana soi bangin;
I meelmate lah leh ahung mudah zousiahte khuta kipan hutdam i hi a;
I pulepate kawma khotuahna a chiam chu bawl diing leh, a thuhun siangthou he zing diingin;
I pu uh Abraham kawma a kihaahsialna chu,
I meelmate lah apat a hung hunkhia a, lau loua a nna i toh theihna diing,
I damsung teng a mitmuh a siangthou leh dihtattaha um diingin.
Huleh nang, naungeeh, Tungnungpen zawlnei ahung kichi diing hi; ajiahchu a lampite bawl diingin Lalpa ma ah na pai diing hi.
A sualnate uh ngaihdamna a, a mite kawma hutdamna heetna pe diingin.
I Pathian uh hehpihna nemtah jalin; hujiahin tunglama kipana nisuaah in ahung khohta hi.
Mial lah leh sihna liim nuaia pute taan vaah diing leh, hamuanna lampi a i keengte hung puisah diingin, a chi a.
Huleh naungeeh chu ahung khang lian a, a lungsim lam ahung haat deuhdeuh a, Israelte kawma a kilaah masiah gamdai ah a um zing hi.
Huleh hulaiin hichi ahung hi a, Kaisar Augusta in khovel pumpi min gelh diing thu a pia a.
(Huleh hichu Syria gam a Cyrenea gam optu ahih lai a mingelhna masapen ahi).
Huleh mi zousiah chu mingelh diingin amah uh gam chiat ah a chiah va.
Huleh Joseph zong Galili gam a Nazareth khua a kipanin Judia gam a David khopi Bethlehem a chih vah a chiah tou a; (David innkuante leh a haah a mi ahih jiahin).
Mari, a ji khaam gaai saanlai toh, min gelh diingin.
Huleh hichi ahi a, hutaha a um laiun a nauneih ahung hunta a.
Huleh a tapa masa chu ahung neikheta a, huleh puannem in a tuam a, amahuh diing a zinbuuh a mun a um louh jiahin gankuang ah a sial hi.
Huleh hu gam mah ah belaampute a belaamte uh chinga jan a gam a giah a um va.
Huleh, ngai in, Lalpa angel khat a kawmvah a hung a, Lalpa loupina in a kiimvel uh a taanvaah a; huleh amah uh chu a lau mahmah uhi.
Huin angel in a kawmvah, Lau sih unla, ngai un, mi chin a diingin thupha kipaahhuai mahmah nanguh ka hung puaah hi.
Ajiahchu tuniin nanguh diingin David khua ah. Hundampa a piangta, Khrist Lalpa chu.
Huleh hikhu nanguh diingin chiamchihna ahi diing, Naungeeh puannema tuam, gankuang a lum chu na mu diing uhi, a chi a.
Huleh thakhatin hu angel kawmah vaan mipite a hungkhawm va, Pathian a phat va,
Tungnungpen ah Pathian loupitahin um henla, leitung a a kipaahpih mihingte lahah lemthu leeng heh, chi'n.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, angelte’n vaan a, a paisan tahun belaampute’n chu, Tuin Bethlehem khua tanpha in i chiah diing a, Lalpa’n thu ahung hilh hung tung chu i va en diing uh, a kichi va.
Huleh kintahin a hung va, Mari leh Joseph leh gankuang a lum naungeeh chu a va mu uh.
Huleh a muh zohun hi naungeeh tungtaang thu amah uh heetsah a um chu a soithangta uhi.
Huleh a jakha taphot in hu belaampute thusoi chu limdang a sa chiat uhi
Hizongleh Mari in hi thu zousiah a lungtangah a vom zinga, a ngaihtuah zingta hi.
Huleh belaampute chu amah uh kihilh bang ngeia sil zousiah a jah va a muh jiahun Pathian paahtawia phat kawmin a kiihkiitta uhi.
Huleh a zehtanna diing ni giat ahung chinin hu naungeeh chu a min diingin suul a, a um ma daih a angel in a phuaahsa Jesu a sata uhi.
Huleh Mosi daan dungjui a amahnu kisuhsiang ni ahung tunin, amah chu Jerusalem ah ahung pui va, Lalpa ma a lat diingin.
(Tapasal suul hong photmah chu Lalpa diingin siangthou a kichi diing ahi chih, Lalpa daanthua a gelh dungjuiun;)
Huleh Lalpa daanthua kisoi dungjuia vakhu kopkhat aha, vapaal nou nih aha kithoihna a laan diingin.
Huleh ngai in, Jerusalem ah pasal khat a min Simeon kichi a um a; amah chu midihtat leh Pathian ngaihsahtah ahi a, Israelte hamuanna diing chu a ngaah zing a; huleh Hagau Siangthou a tungah a um hi.
Huleh Lalpa Khrist a muh masiah a si sih diing chih Hagau Siangthou in a hesah a.
Huleh Hagau heetsah in Pathian biahinn ah ahung luut a; huleh naungeeh Jesu chu a nu leh pa in daan ngeina banga hihsah diing a ahung puiluut tahun,
Ama’n ana aangpom a, Pathian a paahtawi a,
Lalpa, tuin na suaah chu na thu bang jel a hamuangtah a chiahsah diing na hi;
Ajiahchu ka mit in na hutdamna chu a muta hi.
Mi zousiah maai ma a na bawl chu;
Jentelte salhvaah diing vaah leh, na mi Israelte loupina diing chu, chi'n.
Huleh Joseph leh a nuin naungeeh tungtaang a thu kisoite chu thumah a sa mahmah uhi.
Huleh Simeon in amah uh a vangpiah a, a nu Mari kawmah, Ngai in, hi naupang hi Israelte laha mi tampi puuhna diing leh din kiitna diing a guat ahi; huleh chiamchihna niala um diingin toh.
(Ahi, nangmah ngei lungtang zong namsaau in a sun pailet diing a), mi tampite lungtanga ngaihtuahte a kilat theihna diingin, a chi hi.
Huleh Aser nam a mi, Phanuel tanu, Ana kichi numei zawlnei khat a um a; amahnu chu teehsia a hita a, a nungaah tawp zousiah a pasal kawmah kum sagih a um a.
Huleh amahnu chu meithai kum sawmgiat leh li vel mi ahi a, Pathian biahinn paisan louin suun leh janin an ngawl pum a haamteiin Pathian a bia hi.
Huleh amahnu chu huchih laitahin a hung a, Pathian kawmah kipaahthu a soi a, Jerusalem khua a tatna diing lamen photmah kawmah Jesu tanchin a soi hi.
Huleh Lalpa daan dungjuia sil zousiah a bawl zoh un Galili gam ah amah uh khua ngei Nazareth ah a pai kiitta uhi.
Huleh naungeeh chu ahung khang lian deuhdeuh a, a lungsim ahung haat deuhdeuh a, pilna in ahung dimta a; huleh Pathian khotuahna chu a tungah a um hi.
Huleh a nulepa chu kum chinin chiahkaan ankuang lui chiangin Jerusalem ah a chiah veu va.
Huleh amah chu kum sawmlenih ahung hihin ankuang luina daan ngeina in Jerusalem ah a chiahtou va;
Huleh a nite a chin zoh a ahung kilehkiit laiun, naupang Jesu chu Jerusalem ah a umdenta a; Huleh Joseph leh a nu in hichu a he sih uh.
Hizongleh amahun a lawi lahva um hina’nte chi'n ni khat lam a paita uh a, huleh a sanggamte uleh a meelheette u’laha hawl uh.
Huleh a muh louh tahun amah hawl kawmin Jerusalem ah a kinungleh kiitta uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, ni thum nungin Pathian biahinn, ah, houtute laha tou a, a thu uh ngaikhia leh, amah uh thu dongin a va mu va.
Huleh a thu zata photin a heetdan leh a dawndan limdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Huleh a nulepa in a muh tahun limdang a sa mahmah va; a nuin a kawmah, Bawi, bang diinga hichibang a hung bawl na hiai? ngai in, na pa leh ke'n lungkhamtahin ka hung hawl uhi, a chi a.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Bang diinga hung hawl na hi viai? ka Pa inn a um a, a nna ka toh diing mawng sa lou na hi viai mah? a chi a.
Huleh amahun a kawmva a thusoi chu a hesiam sih uhi.
Huin amah uh a juisuh a, Nazareth khua a tungva, a thuthu un a um a; hizongleh a nuin hi sil kisoi zousiah chu a lungtangah a vom zing hi.
Huleh Jesu chu pilna ah leh tahsa ah ahung khang lian deuhdeuh a, Pathian leh mihing deihsah in a um deuhdeuhta hi.

Tiberia Kaisar vaihawm kum sawmlengaa kum in Pontia Pilat chu Judia gamoptu ahi a, huleh Herod chu Galili gam kumpipa ahi a, a unaupa Philip chu Ituria leh Trakoniti gam kumpipa ahi a, huleh Lusania chu Abilene gam kumpipa ahi a,
Ana leh Kaiapha chu siampu lalpente ahi va, hulaiin gamdai ah Zakaria tapa John kawmah Pathian thu ahung tung a.
Huleh amah chu Jordan lui kiim gam zousiah ah a hung a, sualte ngaihdamna diing a kisiihna baptisma thu a soi a;
Zawlnei Isaiah thu lehkhabua, Gamdaaia mi kikou awging in, Lalpa lamlian sial unla, a lampite sutang un,
Guam chin dipdim ahi diing a, huleh taang leh mual chin suhngiam ahi diing; huleh a kawite chu suhtang ahi diing a, lampi phonte suhnal ahi diing;
Huleh mi zousiah in Pathian hutdamna a mu diing uh chia kigelh bangin.
Huin ama’n a khut a baptisma tang diing a hung mipite kawmah, Guul haahte aw, lungthahna hung tung diing taisan diingin kua’n ahiai hung vauhilh?
Hujiahin kisiih min potaahin gah un, huleh Abraham ka pu uh ahi chi'n na lungsim un ngaihtuah sih un; Ajiahchu Pathian in hi suang te Abraham haahtein a dingsah thei hi chih ka hung hilh ahi.
Huleh tuin zong sing bul ah heita koih ahita; sing chin gah hoih a gah lou phot chu a phuuh va, meiah a paailuut veu uh, a chi a.
Huin mipite’n a kawmah, Ahihleh kei un bang ka bawlta diing viai? chih a dong va.
Ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Koipouh puannaah nih nei in a nei lou hawm heh; huleh neeh diing nei in zong huchibang mahin bawl heh, a chi a.
Huin siahdongtute zong baptisma tang diingin a hung va, a kawmah, Houtupa, kei un bang ka bawl diing viai? a chi va.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Ahung chiamsah val uh phuut sih un, a chi a.

Huleh sepaihte’n zong huchimahbangin a kawmah, Kei un bang ka bawl diing viai? Huchi'n a dong va Ama’n a kawmvah, Koima pawngbawl sih unla, dihloutahin zong heeh sih un; huleh na loh vah lungkim un, a chi a.
Huleh mipite a kinep va, mi zousiah in John chu Khrist houh ahi de aw chia a lungtang va a ngaihtuah laiun;

John in a dawng a, a kawmvah, Ke'n chu tui in ka hung baptis ngei a; hizongleh kei sanga loupizaw, a keengtophah khau zong suut taah ka hih louh mi khat ahung diing; ama’n chu Hagau Siangthou leh mei in nanguh ahung baptis diing;
A khut in a pasiseep a tawi a, a phual a jap siang tinten diing a, a buhte a buhpangah a sungkhawm diing hi; hizongleh a si chu mei mit thei louin a haaltum diing hi, chih.
Huleh mite kawmah hasotna thu dang tampi in tanchinpha a soi jel hi.
Hizongleh kumpipa Herod chu, a unaupa Philip ji Herodia jiah leh a silgilou bawl zousiah a John in a taihilh jiahin,
A silsual bawl zousiah behlapna in John chu suangkul ah a khumta hi.
Huleh mipi zousiah in baptisma a tan zohin hichi ahung hia, Jesu’n zong baptisma a tang a, huleh a haamtei laiin vaan ahung kihong a,
Huleh Hagau Siangthou chu tahsa nei in vakhu bangin ahung kumsuh a, a tungah a tuta a; huleh vaan apatin aw ahung suaah a, Nang ka Tapa deihtah na hi; na tungah ka kipaah mahmah hi, a chi hi.
Huleh Jesu’n thuhilh apat chiil laiin amah chu kum sawmthum vel ahita a, mi ngaihdanin chu Joseph tapa ahi a, huchu Heli tapa ahi a,
Huchu Matthat tapa ahi a, huchu Levi tapa ahi a, huchu Melki tapa ahi a, huchu Janna tapa ahi a, huchu Joseph tapa ahi a,
Huchu Mattathia tapa ahi a, huchu Amos tapa ahi a, Huchu Naum tapa ahi a, huchu Esli tapa ahi a, huchu Nagge tapa ahi a,
Huchu Maath tapa ahi a, huchu Mattathia tapa ahi a, huchu Semei tapa ahi a, huchu Joseph tapa ahi a, huchu Juda tapa ahi a,
Huchu Joanna tapa ahi a, huchu Rhesa tapa ahi a, huchu Zerubbabel tapa ahi a, huchu Salathiel tapa ahi a, huchu Neri tapa ahi a,
Huchu Melki tapa ahi a, huchu Addi tapa ahi a, huchu Kosam tapa ahi a, huchu Elmodam tapa ahi a, huchu Er tapa ahi a,
Huchu Jose tapa ahi a, huchu Eliezer tapa ahi a, huchu Jorim tapa ahi a, huchu Matthat tapa ahi a, huchu Levi tapa ahi a,
Huchu Simeon tapa ahi a, huchu Juda tapa ahi a, huchu Joseph tapa ahi a, huchu Jonan tapa ahi a, huchu Eliakim tapa ahi a,
Huchu Melia tapa ahi a, huchu Menan tapa ahi a, huchu Mattatha tapa ahi a, huchu Nathan tapa ahi a, huchu David tapa ahi a,
Huchu Jesse tapa ahi a, huchu Obed tapa ahi a, huchu Boaz tapa ahi a, huchu Salmon tapa ahi a, huchu Naasson tapa ahi a,
Huchu Aminadab tapa ahi a, huchu Aram tapa ahi a, huchu Esrom tapa ahi a, huchu Phares tapa ahi a, huchu Juda tapa ahi a,
Huchu Jakob tapa ahi a, huchu Isaak tapa ahi a, huchu Abraham tapa ahi a, huchu Terah tapa ahi a, huchu Nahor tapa ahi a,
Huchu Saruk tapa ahi a, huchu Ragau tapa ahi a, huchu Phalek tapa ahi a, huchu Heber tapa ahi a, huchu Sala tapa ahi a,
Huchu Kainan tapa ahi a, huchu Arpachsad tapa ahi a, huchu Sem tapa ahi a, huchu Noah tapa ahi a, huchu Lamek tapa ahi a,
Huchu Mathusela tapa ahi a, huchu Enok tapa ahi a, huchu Jared tapa ahi a, huchu Mahalelil tapa ahi a, huchu Kainan tapa ahi a,
Huchu Enos tapa ahi a, huchu Seth tapa ahi a, huchu Adam tapa ahi a, huchu Pathian tapa ahi.
Huleh Jesu chu Hagau Siangthou a dimin Jordan lui apatin a kilehkiit a, huleh gamdai ah Hagau puiin a um a.
Ni sawmli sung diabol heemin a umta a; huleh hu nite sungin bangmah a ne sih a; huin a tawpah a gil ahung kialta hi.
Huin diabol in a kawmah, Pathian Tapa na hihleh hi suang tanghou suaah diingin thupia in, a chi a.
Huleh Jesu’n, Mihing tanghou chauhin a hing sih diing a, Pathian thu chinin a hing zaw diing, chih gelh ahi, chi'n a dawng a.
Huin diabol in amah chu taang saang khatah a puitou a, mitphetkal louin khovel lalgam zousiah a ensah a.
Huin diabol in a kawmah, Hi zousiah tunga thuneihna leh a loupina chu ka hung pe diing: ka kawma piahkhiah ahita ngal a; huleh ka piah nuam taphot kawmah ka pe veu hi,
Hujiahin kei na hung biah phot inchu a bawnin nanga ahi diing, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Ka nunglamah um in Setan; Lalpa na Pathian na biah diing a, Amah nna chauh na tohsah diing ahi, chih gelh ahi, a chi a.
Huin diabol in amah chu Jerusalem ah a pui a, Pathian biahinn tungzum ah a koih a, a kawmah, Pathian Tapa na hihleh hitah apat ke khesuh in;
Ajiahchu Ama’n bang ahung kem diing a, a vaansawllehte thu a pe diing a,
Huleh amahun a khut un ahung nadom diing uh; huchilou inchu na keeng in suang na suikha diing, chih gelh ahi, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Lalpa na Pathian na ze-et louh diing ahi, chih ahi, a chi a.
Huin diabol in a heemna diing tenga a heem zohin hun lemtaanga diingin a paisanta hi.
Huleh Jesu chu Hagau silbawltheihna in Galili gam ah a kileh kiitta a; huleh a tanchin chu hu gam kiim zousiah ah a thangsuahta hi.
Huleh a kikhopna inn vah thu a hilh jel a, mi zousiah paahtawiin a umta hi.
Huleh a khanletna khua Nazareth ahung tungta a; huleh a hihdan ngeina bangin khawlni in kikhopna inn ah a luut a, sim diingin a ding a.
Huleh a kawmah zawlnei Isaiah lehkhabu a pia va, huin ama’n hu lehkhabu chu a pheet a, hi thu kigelhna laitah a mu a,

Migentheite kawma Tanchinpha soi diing a ahung guat jiahin Lalpa Hagau chu ka tungah a um hi; ama’n chu lungtang hasete sudam diing leh, saltaangte kawma suahtaatna thu leh, mittawte kawma mit vaah kiitna thu soi diing leh, bawlsiat thuaahte zalensah diingin,
Lalpa lungdam kum thu bang soi diingin ahung sawl hi, chih.
Huin lehkhabu chu a jial a, thunatongtu kawmah a pe kiit a, a touta hi. Huleh kikhopna inn a um mi zousiah mit chu a tungah a tu vehta hi.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Tuni’n hi Pathian Lehkhabu thu chu na jah un ahung taangtungta ahi, a chita hi.
Huleh mi zousiah in a thu a heetpih va, a kam a pawt hehpihna thute chu limdang a sa mahmah uhi. Huleh amahun, Hipa hi Joseph tapa hilou ahiai mah? a chi uhi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah Nangun hi paunaah, Doctor, nang leh nang kisudam in, Kapernaum khua a na silbawlte ka na jah zousiah uh, hi-ah nangmah kholamah zong bawl in, na hung chi ngei diing uh, a chi a.
Huin ama’n, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, zawlnei koimah amah gam sungah kipaahpih in a um ngei sih,
Hizongleh thutah ka hung hilh ahi, Elijah damlaia kum thum leh ha guup vaan a kikhaah a, khovel a kial nasatah a tun laiin Israel gam ah meithai tampi a um uh;
Hizongleh Sidon gam a Sarepta khua a meithainu khat kawmah chih louh a lahva koimah kawmah Elijah sawl ahi sih hi.
Huleh zawlnei Elisa damlai in Israel gam ah phaah tampi a um uh, hizongleh Syriami Naaman chih louh koimah suhsiangthou in a um sih uhi, a chi a.
Huleh kikhopna inn a um zousiah in hi thute a jah un a lungthah mahmahta uh.
Huleh a dingdoh va, amah chu khua a kipanin a delhdoh va, a khotaang kawlkhou ah sawnkhiah diingin a pui uhi.
Hizongleh amah chu a lahvah paisuaah in a chiahta hi,
Huleh Galili gam a khua khat, Kapernaum ah a hungsuh a, huleh khawlnite in amah uh thu a hilh a.
Huleh thuneitah a, a soi jiahin a thuhilh chu limdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Huleh kikhopna inn ah dawiniin hagau nei mi khat a um a, huleh aw ngaihtahin a kikou a;
Ka tangun hung umsah in; Nazareth Jesu, Nang leh kei un bang ahiai kizopna i neih? keiuh sumang diing a hung na hi maw? nang kua na hiai chih ka hung he hi, Pathian misiangthou na hi, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a tai a, Sip inla, a sung apatin hung pawt in, a chi a. Huin dawiin amah chu a lai va a suhpuuh zohin a sung apatin ahung pawt a, amah a suna sih hi.
Huleh a bawnun thumah a sa mahmah va, Hikhu bang thu hi ata’i le! ajiahchu thuneitah leh silbawlthei tahin dawiniinte thu a pia a, a pawt mai uh, chi'n a kihou va.
Huleh hu kiim gam mun chinah a tanchin a thangta hi.
Huleh amah chu a thou a, kikhopna inn apat a pawt a, Simon inn ah a luut a. Huleh Simon ji nu chu nasatahin ana khosih a; huchi'n amah diingin ana ngetsah va.
Huleh amah chu amahnu geiah a ding a, khosih chu a tai a, huchi'n a phata hi; huleh ahung thoupah a, ana uh a tohsahta hi.
Huleh nitumkuan ahung hihin natna tuamtuam a na damlou nei zousiah a kawmah ahung pui va; huleh ama’n a tung chiat vah a khut ana nga a, a sudamta hi.

Huleh dawite zong, Nang Khrist, Pathian Tapa na hi, chi a kikou in mi tampite sung apat ahung pawtdoh uhi. Huleh ama’n amahuh a tai a a haam diing uh a phalsah sih hi; ajiahchu Khrist ahi chih a he uhi.
Huleh khua ahung vaah in a pawt a, gamgaw munah a chiah a; mipite’n amah a hawl uh a, a kawmah a hung va, amahuh nuse lou diingin a hou uhi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Pathian gam thu chu kho dangah zong ka soi diing ahi; hu diing a sawl ka hi him ahi, a chi a.
Huleh Galili gam a kikhopna innte ah thu a soi jel hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Pathian thu ngai diing a amah a bohbuai jiahun, Genesaret diil geiah a ding a;
Huleh diil geia kuang nih um a mu a; hizongleh nga mantute chu a kuang uh nusia a, a leente uh sawp in a um va.
Huleh kuang te laha khat, Simon a penah a tuangdoh a, a kawmah, piaugei apat themkhat tolhdeuh diingin a ngen a. Huleh a tou a, mipite chu kuang tung apatin thu a hilhta hi.
Huleh a thusoi zohin Simon kawmah, Lithuuh lam naih inla, nga man diingin na leente uh sep un, a chi a.
Huleh Simon in a dawng a, a kawmah, Houtupa, Jan kho vaahin gim tahin ka pang va, bangmah ka man sih uhi; hizongleh na thu in leen ka sep diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh hichu a bawlzohun nga tampi a khuhkha va; huleh a leen uh keeh diing a kisa a.
Huleh kuang danga tou a lawite uh hung a panpih diingin a khutjap va. Huin amahuh ahung va, huleh kuang te geel chu a sungdim uh a, huchi'n tum diing a kisa hialta hi.
Simon Peter in hikhu a muh in Jesu keengbulah a puuh a, Lalpa, hung chiahsan in; ajiahchu kei misual ka hi, a chi a.
A nga mat uh amah leh a lawmte’n limdang a sah mahmah jiahun.
Huleh Simon kithuahpihte Zebedi tate Jakob leh John in zong limdang a sa uhi. Huleh Jesu’n Simon kawmah, Lau sin, tu apatin mihing na manta diing, a chi a.
Huleh a kuangte uh luipanga ahung tawldoh zohun, bangkim a nusia va, amah a juita uhi.

Huleh hichi ahung hi a, khua khata a um laiin, ngai in, mi khat a pumtanga phaah tuam a um a; ama’n chu Jesu a muh in lei siin a bohkhup a, Lalpa, na utin chu na hung susiangthou thei hi, chi'n a ngen a.
Huin ama’n a khut a hadoh a, amah chu a khoih a, Ka ut hi, siangthouta in, a chi a. Huchi'n thakhat in a phaahna in a nusepahta hi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmah, Koima hilh sin; hizongleh va chiah inla, siampu kawmah va kilah in; huleh amahuh heetsah na diingin Mosi thupiah bangin, sianhonna diingin sil va laan in, chi'n thu a pia a.
Hizongleh a tanchin chu a thang na sa zawsem a; huleh mipi nasatah a thu ngaikhe diing leh a natna uh kisudamsah diingin ahung uh.
Huleh amah chu gamdai ah a chiah tuam a, a haamteita hi.

Huleh ni khat chu hichi ahung hi a, thu a hilh laiin; Galili leh Judia gam kho chin leh Jerusalem a kipana hung Pharisaite leh daan siamte a kawmah a tou va; amahuh suhdamna diingin Lalpa silbawltheihna chu a kawmah a um a.
Huleh, ngai in, mite’n zeng khat lupna in ahung zawng va; huleh a zawn luut theihna diing leh a ma a, a koih theihna diing a ngaihtuah uh a.
Huleh mipi jiahin zawn luutna dan a mu sih va; inn tungah a kaltou va, huleh bichiing pheet vangin a laitah ah Jesu ma ah a lupna toh a khaikhesuh uhi.
Huin ama’n a ginna uh a muh in, a kawmah, Mihing, na sualnate ngaihdam ahita hi, a chi a.
Huin lehkhagialtute leh Pharisaite’n, Hi Pathian soisia koi ahiai? Pathian chauh loungal kua’n ahiai sual ngaidam thei? chi'n a ngaihtuah va.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a ngaihtuah uh a heet in a dawng a, a kawmvah, Bang ahiai na lungtang va na ngaihtuah uh?
Na sualnate ngaihdam ahita chih leh, thou inla keeng in chiahta in chih khoi a baihlam zaw ei? a chi a.
Banghitaleh leitung ah mihing Tapa in sual ngaihdam theihna a nei hi chih na heet na diingun. (Zeng a damloupa kawmah) Thou inla, na lupna la inla, na inn ah chiahta in ka hung chi ahi, a chi a.
Huleh a ma vah a thoukhepah a, a lupna a la a, Pathian paahtawi kawmin a inn lamah a chiahta hi.
Huin a bawnun limdang a sa mahmah va, Pathian a paahtawi uh; huleh, Tuni’n sil limdangtah mai i mu uhi, chi'n a lau mahmah uhi.
Huleh hi silte zohin a pawtkhia a, siahdonna muna tou, a min Levi kichi siahdongtu khat a mu a; huleh a kawmah hung juiin, a chi a.
Huchi'n ama’n bangkim nusiain a thou a, amah a juita hi.
Huleh Levi in a inn ah Jesu diingin ankuang luina loupitah a nei a, huah chu siahdongtute tampi leh midang tampite’n amahuh ankuang a uumpih uhi.
Hizongleh a lehkhagialtute uleh Pharisaite chu a nungjuite tungah a phun va, Bang diinga siahdongtute leh misualte toh ne a dawn khawm na hi viai? a chi va,
Huin Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Mi chidamte’n doctor a mamoh sih va, mi chinate’n a mamoh zaw uhi.
Midihtatte kou diing a hung ka hi sih a, misualte kou a kisiihsah diing a hung ka hi zaw hi, a chi hi.

Huin amahun a kawmah, Bang diinga John nungjuite’n an a ngawl veu va, huleh a haamtei veu uh, huleh Pharisaite nungjuite’n zong huchimah banga a bawl va; hizongleh nang nungjuite’n ne a dawn ahi viai? a chi va.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, Moupuite kawma mouneitu a um laisiah moupuite an na ngawlsah thei viai mah?
Hizongleh a lah vapat mouneitu laahmang nite ahung tung diing a, hu ni chiangin a ngawl diing uh, a chi a.

Huleh ama’n a kawmvah tehkhinthu khat zong a soi a; Koima’n puan thahin puan lui a phoh ngei sih; phohta henla hileh a nihin a keehta diing a, huleh a thah them pen chu a lui toh a kituaah sih diing hi.
Huleh koima’n uain thah chu savunthawl luiah a koih ngei sih; koihta henla hileh uain thahin savunthawl lui chu a pawhjahsah diing a, a kibo diing, huleh a thawlte zong a segawp diing hi.
Hizongleh uain thah chu savun thawl thah a koih diing ahi; huchi'n a nih in a bit diing hi.
Mi koima’n zong uain lui a dawn zoh nungin a thah a duhpah ngei sih; a lui mah tui zaw, a chi veu uhi, a chi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, khawlni masapen zoh a khawlni nihna pen niin buhleite ah a paisuaah a; a nungjuite’n buhvui a sihtan va, a khut va nuaisiangin a ne va.
Huleh Pharisai koite aha in a kawmah, Bang diinga khawlni a bawl sianglou na bawl uh ahiai? a chi va.
Huleh Jesu’n a dawng a, David in a gilkial laia a lawite toh a silbawl uh simkha lou na hi viai mah?
Huchia Pathian inn a, a luut a, siampute loungal neeh siang louh tanghou chu a laah a, a neeh a, huleh a lawite kawma zong a piah thu chu, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Mihing Tapa chu khawlni Lalpa zong ahi, a chi hi.
