Huleh hichi ahung hi a, khawlni dangin kikhopna inn ah a luut a, thu a hilh a, huleh huah mi khat khut jiatlam zoi ana um a.
Huleh lehkhagialtute leh Pharisaite’n a heehna diing a muhtheihna diingun, khawlnia a suhdam leh suhdamlouh a ensim va.
Hizongleh ama’n a ngaihtuah uh a he a, khut zoipa kawmah, Thou inla, a lai ah dingdoh in, a chi a. Huin amah chu a thou a, a dingdohta a.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Sil khat ka hung dong diing hi, Khawlni a sil hoih bawl ahiai siang, sil gilou bawl? Hutdam ahiai siang, suhlup? a chi a.
Huleh a kiima umte zousiah a en vel a, hupa kawmah, Na khut zandoh in, a chi a. Huin ama’n a jan a; huchi'n a khut chu a langkhat lam bangin a damta hi.
Huleh amahuh chu a lungthah segawp va, Jesu tunga a bawl dan diing uh khat leh khat a kihouta uhi.
Huleh hulaiin hichi ahung hi a, taang ah haamtei diingin a chiah a, Pathian kawmah jankhovaah in a haamtei hi.
Huleh khovaah phetin a nungjuite a kou a; a lah vapat sawmlenih a teel a, a min u’zong sawllehte ahisah hi.
Simon (ama’n Peter zong a chih) leh a unaupa Andru, Jakob leh John, Philip leh Bartholomai;
Matthai leh Thoma, Alphai tapa Jakob, huleh Simon Zelot a chih uh,
Huleh Jakob unaupa Juda, huleh a mansahtu Juda Iskariot zong ahi uh.

Huleh amahuh toh a kitonsuh a, munjang ah a ding a, a nungjuite mi tampi leh, Judia gam pumpi leh Jerusalem a kipan leh Tura leh Sidon kho lama tuipi geia kipan mipi nasatah toh, hute chu thu ngai diing leh a damlouhnate uh suhdam ut in a hung va,
Huleh hagau niin suhgentheihte zong a hung va; ahung dam vehta uh.
Huleh amah a kipana silbawltheihna pawtkhia a amahuh zousiah a suhdam jiahin mipite’n a bawnun amah khoih a tum uhi.
Huin amah chu a khodaah a, a nungjuite a en a, Nanguh migentheite na hampha uh; ajiahchu Pathian gam nanguh a ahi.
Nanguh tu a gilkialte na hampha uh; ajiahchu vah diing na hi uhi. Nanguh tu a kapte na hampha uh; ajiahchu nui diing na hi uhi.
Mihing Tapa jiaha mite’n ahung muhdah va, a lahva kipana ahung nohdoh va, ahung tai va, huleh na min uh hoihlouchia ahung pampaih chiangun na hampha uh ahi;
Hu niin kipaah unla, nuamin kidiang un; ajiahchu, ngai un, vaan ah na kipaahman uh a loupi ahi; Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh huchimah bangin a pulepate un zawlneite ana bawl uhi.
Hizongleh nanguh mihausate na tunguh a gih hi; ajiahchu nangun na hamuanna uh na mu zouta uhi.
Nanguh tu a gil vahte na tunguh a gih hi; ajiahchu kial diing na hi uhi. Nanguh tu a nuite na tunguh a gih hi; ajiahchu mau a kap diing na hi uhi.
Mi zousiah in ahung phat chiangun na tunguh a gih hi; ajiahchu huchimahbangin a pulepate un zawlnei tahloute tungah ana bawl uhi.
Hizongleh nanguh ka thu ngaikhete kawmah ka hung hilh ahi, Na meelmate uh lungsiat unla, ahung mudahte hoihbawl un.
Haansia hung lohte vangpiah unla, ahung simmohbawlte diingin haamteisah un.
Na ngeiphe hung behsahtu kawmah a langkhat lam zong doh in; huleh na puanjal uh hung laahsahtu kawmah na puannaah uh laah zong nial sih un.
Na kawmva hung ngen photmah kawmah pia unla; huleh na thuampua uh hung laahsahtu kawmah ngen kiit nawn sih un.
Huleh mi'n na tungva a bawl diing na deih bang ngei un, nangun zong amahuh tungah bawl un.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh nanguh hung lungsiatte chauh na lungsiat uleh paahtaat bang na loh diviai? misualte’n zong amahuh lungsiattute a lungsiat uhi.
Huleh na tungva hoihte tung chauh a na hoih uleh paahtaat bang na loh diviai? ajiahchu misualte’n zong huchimahbangin a bawl uhi.
Huleh muh kiitna kinepnate uh kawm chauha na thunglaahsah uleh paahtaat bang na loh diviai? ajiahchu misualte’n zong a zahmah muh kiit diingin misualte kawmah a thunglaahsah uhi.

Hizongleh nangun chu na meelmate uh lungsiat unla, hoih bawl un, bangmah muh kiit kinem louin thunglaahsah un; huchi leh na kipaahman uh a loupi diing a, Tungnungpen tate na hi diing uhi; ajiahchu ama’n kipaahnadan heloute leh migiloute a hehpih veu hi.
Hujiahin na Pa uh mi hehpih a siam bangin nanguh zong mi hehpih siam un.
Soisel sih un, huchi'n soiselin na um sih diing uh; mohpaih sih un, huchi'n mohpaihin na um sih diing uh; huleh ngaidam un, huchi'n ngaihdamin na um diing uhi.

Pia un, huchi'n piah in na um diing uh; hoihtaha teh in, sawndet in, lohhal in, huleh dimlet in, mite’n na aangsung vah ahung pe diing uhi. Ajiahchu na tehna mah un ahung tehsah kiit diing uhi, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah tehkhinthu khat a soi a, Mittaw in mittaw mah a pui thei diai? a nih va kokhuuh a kekhawmta lou diing ahi viai mah?
Nungjui chu a pu tungah a um sih; hizongleh michih a bukim taphot chu a pu bangin a um diing hi.
Huleh bang diinga nangmah mit a innkam um chu ngaihtuah lou a, na unaupa mit a niinthem um mu na hiai?

Nangmah mit a innkam mu loupi a, na unaupa kawma, Unaupa, na mit a niinthem um hung lakhesah in, bangchi a chithei na hiai? Nang milepchiah, na mit a inkam um chu lakhe masa in, huchileh na unaupa mit a niinthem laahkhiah diing chiantahin na mu thei diing hi.
Ajiahchu sing hoih a gah a se ngei sih a; huleh sing sia zong gah hoihin a gah ngei sih hi.
Sing chin a gah ah heet ahi. Ajiahchu mi'n lingkungah theipi a lou ngei sih va, huleh lingnoh lahah zong grep a lou ngei sih uhi.

Mihoih in a lungtang goubawm hoiha kipanin sil hoih ahung suahkhia a; huleh migilou in a lungtang goubawm sia a kipanin sil hoihlou ahung suahkhe veu hi. Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh lungtang a dim val chu a ka min a soi ahi.
Huleh nangun bang diinga ka soite bawlloupi a Lalpa, Lalpa, hung chi na hi viai?
Koipouh ka kawma hunga, ka thusoite za a, huleh jui chu bang tobang mi ahiviai chih ka hung ensah diing;
Amah chu innbawlmi, thuuhtaha tou a, suangpi tunga innbul lem toh kibang ahi; huleh tui ahung letin tuikhauhin hu inn chu ahung khoh a, a suliing but sih hi; suangpi tunga bawl ahih jiahin.
Hizongleh ja ngal a jui lou chu, innbul kiptah a lem lou a, leitung maia innbawlmi bang ahi; huchu tuikhauhin ahung khoh a, a puuhpah hi; huleh hu inn siat chu ana sa ahi, a chi hi.
Huleh mipite jah a, a thusoi zousiah a zoh nungin Kapernaum khua ah a luut a;
Huleh sepaih zahoutu koi ahakhat suaah deihtah chu damlou in a si dehdeh a.
Huleh ama’n Jesu tanchin a jah tahin, a kawma hunga, a suaahpa hung sudam diing a ngen diingin Juda upate a kawmah a sawl a.
Huleh amahun Jesu kawm a va tun un, Amah chu hi sil na bawlsahtaah ahi,
Ajiahchu ama’n ka nam uh a ngaina a, huleh ka kikhopna inn uh zong ahung bawlsah hi, chi'n hoihtahin a ngen va.

Huin Jesu chu amahuh toh a hungta a. Huleh inn apat gamla lou ahung geiin, hu sepaih zahoutu in a kawmah a lawmte a sawl a, Lalpa, kisugim nuam dah mai in; ajiahchu ka innsung na luutna taah ahi sih hi;
Hujiahin kei zong na kawma hung taah in ka kingai sih hi, hizongleh a thu in soi lechin ka suaahpa chu a dam mai diing hi,

Ajiahchu kei zong mi thunuaia um ka hi a, ka nuaiah sepaihte a um a, khat kawma, Chiah in, ka chihleh a chiah a; huleh a dang kawma, Hung in, ka chihleh a hung a; huleh ka suaahpa kawma, Hi bawl in, ka chih leh a bawl jel hi, chi'n.
Jesu’n hi thute a jah in, amah chu limdang a sa mahmah a, a kinunghei a, mipi amah juite kawmah, Na kawmvah ka soi ahi, Israelte laha zong hichi bang lawma ginna lian ka mukha sih hi, a chi a.
Huleh hu a misawlte chu inn lamah a chiah kiit va, suaah damloupa chu damin a muta uhi.
Huleh hunungin hichi ahung hi a, amah chu Nain kichi khua khat ah a chiah a; huleh a nungjuite tamtah leh mipi tampi mahmahin a jui va.
Huleh khopi kotkhaah kawm ahung tunin ngai in, misi khat ahung zawngdoh va, a nu tapa neihsun ahi a, amahnu chu meithai ahi a; huleh hu khua a mipi tampi a kawmah a um uh;
Huleh Lalpa’n amahnu a muh tahin a hehpih mahmah a, huchi'n a kawmah, Kap sin, a chi a.
Huin a hung a, a laang chu a khoih a; huleh a zawngtute chu a dingta uh; Huin ama’n, tangval, thou in, ka hung chi ahi, a chi a.
Huleh hu misi chu ahung toudoh a, ahung haamta hi; huin ama’n amah chu a nu kawmah a pekheta hi.
Huin mi zousiah ahung lauta va, Pathian a paahtawi va; I lahah zawlnei loupitah ahung suaahta; huleh Pathian in a mite ahung vehta ahi, chih.
Huleh hi a tungtaang thu chu Judia gam pumpi leh a kiimvel gam zousiah ah a thangsuaahta hi.
Huleh John nungjuite’n hi thu zousiah amah a hilh va.
Huin John in a nungjuite laha mi nih a kou a, Jesu kawmah a sawl a, Ahung diingpa chu na hiai mah? ahihlouhleh midang hungaih nalai diing ka hi viai mah? chi'n.
Hute chu Bang diinga ahung tunun, Baptistu John in, Ahung diingpa chu na hiai mah? ahihlouhleh midang hungaih nalai diing ka hi viai mah? chi a na kawma ahung sawl ka hi uh, a chi va.
Huleh hulai ngei in ama’n mi tampi, damloute, hiveite, huleh dawimatte a sudam a; huleh mittaw tampite mit a suhvaahsah a.

Huleh Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Chiahta unla, na sil muh uleh na jahte u’chu John va hilh un; bangchi banga mittawte mit hung vaahta a, keengbaite ahung paitheita a, miphaahte ahung siangthouta a, bilngongte’n ahung ja theita a, misite kaihthoh in a umta a, huleh tagahte kawmah tanchinpha soi in a umta, chih.
Huleh koipouh ka tunga lunghih louhna mu lou chu a hampha hi, a chi a.
Huleh John misawlte a pai nungun ama’n mipite kawmah John tungtaang thu a soi panta a, Bang en diinga gamdai a chiahdoh na hi viai? sialluang huih muutliing maw?
Ahihlouhleh bang en diing a chiahdoh na hi viai? Puannem silh maw? Ngai un, puan loupi silh leh mi nuamsate chu kumpipate inn ah ahi a um uh.
Ahihlouhleh bangpen en diing a chiahdoh na hi viai? zawlnei maw? Ahi, ka hung chi ahi, zawlnei sanga loupizaw ahi.
Ngai in ka thangkou na ma ah ka sawl a, ama’n na ma ah na lampi a siam diing, chia a tanchin kigial chu amah ahi.
Numei hin lahah Baptistu John sanga loupizaw zawlnei a um sih; hizongleh Pathian gam a neupen zong amah sangin a loupizaw hi, chih ka hung hilh ahi, a chi a.
Huleh a thu ja zousiah leh siahdongte’n chu John baptisma tang in, Pathian siam a tan uhi.
Hizongleh Pharisaite leh daanhetute’n chu a kawma baptisma tang louin Pathian in amahuh diing a, a lemguatsah chu a nualta uhi.
Huin Lalpa’n, Tulai khang thahte bang toh ka tehkhinta diai? huleh bang tobang ahi viai?
Amah u’chu naupang dawlmun a tou a, khat leh khat kikoutuah a, Theile ka hung muutsah va, na laam sih va; ka hung kah uh lelah na kap tuan sih uh, kichite bang ahi uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Baptistu John chu an lah nelou, uain lah dawn louin ahung a, huleh nangun amah chu dawipaai ahi, na chi uh.
Huleh mihing Tapa chu ne leh dawnin a hung a, huleh nangun, Endih vua, an haipa, uain haipa, siahdongtute leh misualte lawmpa, na chi jel uh.
Hizongleh pilna chu a tate zousiah in siam a tan uhi, a chi hi.
Huleh Pharisaite laha khat in amah toh an neehkhawm a ut a. Huin amah chu Pharisaipa inn ah a luut a, ankuang ah a touta a.
Huleh ngai in, hu khua a um numei sual khat in Jesu Pharisaipa inn ah an ne in a tou chih a heetin Alabastar bawmin thau gimtui ahung tawi a,
A nungah a keeng bulah kapkawmin a ding a, a keengphaangte chu a mittui in a sukawt a, a sam in a siaah a, huleh a keengpeh a tawp a, thau gimtui a nuh hi.
Huleh Pharisai amah koupa’n hikhu a muh in a lungsim in, Hipa zawlnei ahihleh hi a khoihnu koi ahiai, huleh bangchi bang mi ahiai chih he leh kilawma, amah lah misual ahi ngal a, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a dawng a a kawmah, Simon, na kawmah soinuam khat ka nei hi, a chi a; Huin ama’n, Houtupa soita’n, a chi a.
Sum thunglaahsahtu koi ahakhat in leibatu nih a nei a; khat in makhai ja ngaa a ba a, huleh khat in sawmngaa.
Huleh a ditna diing a neih louh tahun a nih un a ngaidam tuaahta hi. Hujiahin, hung hilh in, a lahva koi zaw in amah a lungsiat naah zaw diai? a chi a.
Simon in a dawng a, A ngaihdam tam zawpa’n hi diingin ka ngaihtuah, a chi a. Huin ama’n a kawmah, Na chi dih hi, a chi a.

Huleh ama’n numeinu lam a nga a, Simon kawmah, Hi numeinu na mu ei? Na innsungah ka hung luut a, nang ka keeng silna diing tui na hung pe sih hi; hizongleh amahnu’n chu a mittui in ka keengpeh a sil a, a sam in a siaah hi.
Nang chu tawp zong na hung tawp sih a; hizongleh hi numeinu’n chu ka hung luut a kipanin ka keengpehte tawp a khawl nai sih hi.
Nang chu ka lu sathau na hung nuh sih a; hizongleh hi numei in chu ka keengpehte thau gimtui ahung nuh hi.
Hujiahin ka hung hilh ahi, a sualna tampi chu ngaihdam ahita hi; a lungsiat naah mahmah jiahin; hizongleh tawm ngaihdamnate’n a lungsiat tawm uhi, a chi a.
Huin ama’n numeinu kawmah, Na sualte ngaihdam ahita hi, a chi a.
Huleh amah toh ankuang a toukhawmte’n a lungsim un, Sualnate zong ngaidam, hipa hi kua ahiai, a chi va.
Huin ama’n numeinu kawmah, Na ginna in ahung hundamta hi; hamuangtahin chiahta in, a chi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, hunungin Jesu chu thuhilh kawm leh Pathian gam tanchinpha soi kawmin kholian leh khoneu ah a vaah lehleh a, huleh sawmlenihte chu a kawmah a um uhi.
Huleh numei kuate aha, dawipaai dam kiit leh natnate apat dam kiit Mari Magdalene a chih uh, a sung apat dawi sagih pawtdohnanu toh,
Huleh Herod sumkoltu Chuza ji Joanna toh, Susanna toh, huleh midang tampite toh ahi va, hute’n chu a neihsa un a nna a tohsah jel uhi.
Huleh mipi nasatah hungkhawma, khochina mi a kawma a hung tahun, tehkhinthu a soi a;
Buhchithehtu khat buhchi theh in a kuan a; huleh a theh laiin khenkhat lampi geiah a tu a, huchu a kituanchil a, huleh tungleeng vate’n a tom beita hi.
Huleh khenkhat suang tungah a tu a; huleh ahung pou pan leh a vulpahta hi, a lei a nom louh jiahin.
Huleh khenkhat chu loulingnei lahah a tu a; huleh ling toh ahung poukhawm a, a deep lumta hi.
Huleh a dang chu lei hoih ah a tu a, ahung pou a, a lehza in a gahta hi, a chi a. Huleh hithute a soi zohin a kikou a, Koipouh jahna diing a bil nei in ja heh, a chi a.
Huleh a nungjuite’n, Hi tehkhinthu hi bang chihna ahiai? chi'n amah a dong va.

Huleh ama’n, Pathian gam thuguuhte chu nanguh diingin heet phal ahi a; hizongleh midang kawmah chu tehkhinthu a soi ahi; mu zing ngal a a muh louhna diing uleh, ja zing ngal a, a heetsiamlouhna diingun.
Hu tehkhinthu chu hikhu ahi; Buhchi chu Pathian thu ahi a.
Huleh lampi geia tute chu thu jate ahi uh; huin diabol chu a hung a, thu chu a lungtang vapat a lamang hi, a gintaat va hutdama a um louhna diingun.
Suang tungate chu hichi bangte ahi uh, a jah tahun thu chu kipaahtahin a pom va; huleh hite’n chu zung a nei sih a, tomkhat sunga gingta va, heemna a tuaah chiangun a puuh veu uhi.
Huleh loulingnei laha tute chu hichibangte ahi uh; a jah nungun a chiah va, khosah diingdan ngaihtuahnate, hauhsatnate, huleh damsung nopsahnate’n a deep a, a gah piching ngei sih hi.
Hizongleh lei hoiha tute chu hichibangte ahi uh; lungtang siangthou leh hoihin thu chu a ja va, a pom va, huleh kuhkaltahin gah a suang uhi.
Mi koimah in thaumei a det chiangin kuang in a khuh ngei sih, ahihlouhleh lupna nuaiah zong a koih ngei sih hi; hizongleh a luut photmahin a muh theihna diingin a koihna ah a koih zaw hi.
Ajiahchu kiphuang lou diing a iim bangmah a um sih a, huleh heet louh diing leh kilang lou diing a phual zong bangmah a um sih hi.
Hujiahin bangchi'n ahiai na jah uh pilvaangun; ajiahchu koi hizongleh a nei chu piahbeh ahi diing a, huleh koi hizongleh a nei lou chu neia a kingaih nasan laahsah ahi diing hi, a chi hi.
Huleh a kawmah a nu leh a unaute a hung a, huleh mipi jiahin a kawm a tung thei sih va.
Huleh, Na nu leh na unaute nang hung mu nuamin innpua ah a ding uh, chi'n a hilh uh a,
Huin ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Ka nu leh ka unaute chu hi Pathian thu ngaikhia a juite ahi uh, a chi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, ni khat chu a nungjuite toh kuang ah a tuang a; huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Diil gaal lehlamah i kai diing uh, a chi a. Huleh kuang chu phelin a tawlta va.
Hizongleh a kitawl laiun amah chu a ihmuta a; huleh hu diil tungah huihpi ahung nungsuh a; a kuang uh tui in a dimta a, huleh lauthawng huai tahin a umta hi.
Huleh amahuh chu a kawmah ahung va, a phawng va, Houtupa, houtupa, beimang ka hita uh, a chi va. Huin amah chu ahung thou a, huih leh tuikinawh chu a taita a; huin a tawp a, ahung daaita hi.

Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Na ginna uh khoia um ahiai? a chi a. Huleh amahun chu lauin limdang a sa mahmah va, Hipa hi bangtobang mi hi ahiai! ajiahchu huihte leh tui nasan thu a pia a, a mang mai uh, a kichi va.
Huleh Galili gaal zawna um Gadarate gam ahung tungva.
Huleh amah gam a a kaidoh tahin hun sawtpi dawi paai koi ahakhat in khopi apat amah ana kituaahpih a; ama’n chu puan a silh sih a, huleh inn mawngmawng a zong a um sih a, haante chauh ah a um veu hi.

Huleh ama’n Jesu a muh tahin, a kikou a, a ma ah a puuh a, huleh aw ngaihtahin, Jesu, Nang Pathian Tungnungpen Tapa, kei leh nangin kizopna bang i nei ei? hung sugim lou diingin ka hung ngen ahi, a chi a.

(Ajiahchu ama’n dawiniin chu mipa sunga kipan pawt diingin thu ana peta hi. Tamveipi dawiniin in amah chu a mankhata a; khainiang leh kol buhsah in a um a; huleh ama’n a kikaannate chu a phutan a, gamdaiah dawi delhmang in a um veu hi)
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmah, Na min bang ahiai? chi'n a dong a Ama’n, Nuai, a chi a; a sunga dawi tampi a luut jiahin.
Huleh amahun kokhuuh thuuh a chiah diing a thu pe lou diingin amah a ngen va.
Huleh hu munah taang ah voh hon tampi a ta va; amahun hute sunga a luut uh phalsah diingin a kawmah a ngen va. Huleh ama’n a phalsah hi.
Huin dawite chu hu mipa sunga kipan pawt in vohte sungah a luut va; voh hon chu diil lamah munkeenah a taisuh huthut va, tui valh in a sita uhi.
Huin a khawite’n sil umdan a muh tahun a tai va, hi thu khopi leh khoneu ah a va soi uhi.
Huin bang thu ahitai chi a en diingin ahung pawt va; huleh Jesu kawm ahung tun uleh dawi matpa chu puan silh a, lungsim hoihtah pua a Jesu keengbula tou ahung mu va; huleh a lauta uhi.
Huleh a mute’n dawimatpa suhdama ahung umdante amahuh ana hilh va.
Huin Gadara gam kimvela mi zousiah in a lau mahmah jiahun amah chu a kawmva kipan chiahmang diingin a ngen va; huin amah chu kuang sungah a luut a, a kiih kiitta hi.
Huleh a sunga kipana dawi hung pawtnapa’n chu a kawma umden diingin a ngen a; hizongleh Jesu’n amah chu a sawlkhia a,

Na inn ah chiah kiit inla, Pathian in na tunga bangchituh a sil loupi hung bawlsah ahitaimah chih va hilh in, a chi a. Huin amah chu a chiahta a, Jesu’n sil loupitah amah diing a, a bawlsah chu khopi pumpi ah a phuangjahta hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu chu ahung kinungleh kiitin mipi’n amah nasatahin ana kipaahpih va; ajiahchu a bawnva amah na ngaah zing ahi uh.
Huleh ngai in, pasal khat a min Jaira kichi kikhopna inn vaihawmtu a hung a; Jesu keengbulah a khupboh a, a inn a hung diingin a ngen a.
Ajiahchu ama’n tanu kum sawmlenih vel pha khat chauh a nei a, amah chu laitat in a lum a. Hizongleh Jesu a chiah tahin mipi’n a tuam huthut uh a.
Huleh numei khat kum sawmlenih sipuut, a neih zousiah doctorte kawma zangbeita a, hizongleh koima’n a suhdam zoh louh uh,
A nungah a hung a, a puan mong a khoih a; huin thakhat in a sipuut chu a kangta hi.

Huin Jesu’n, Koi ahiai ahung khoih? a chi a. Huleh mi zousiah in kei ka hi sih a chih chiat phetun Peter leh a lawite’n, Houtupa, mi honpi’n hung tuam a, hung neh huthut a, Koi ahiai hung khoih na chih, a chi va.
Jesu’n, Koi ahakhat in ahung khoih hi; ajiahchu silbawltheihna ka sunga kipanin a pawt hi chih ka he hi, a chi a,
Huin numeinu’n a kiphual theih louh a muh tahin kiliing pum in a hung a, a ma ah a puuh a, mipi zousiah maaiah a kawmah a khoih nasan leh ahung dampahdan a phuangta a.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, Tanu, hamuangtahin um in; na ginna in ahung damsah ahi; lungmuangtahin chiahta in, a chi a.
Ama’n hichia thu a soi laiin kikhopna inn vaihawmtu inn a kipanin mi khat a hung a, Na tanu a sita hi, Houtupa subuai dah mai in, a chi a.
Hizongleh Jesu’n hi a jahin a dawng a, a kawmah, Lau sin; gingta mai in, huchi'n amah chu a damdoh kiit diing, a chi a.
Huleh inn sunga a luut tahin Peter toh, Jakob toh, John toh huleh naupang pa leh nu chih louh koimah luut a phal sih a.
A bawnun amahnu kahin ana mau jenjun va; hizongleh ama’n, Kap sih un; a si sih hi, a ihmu ahi zaw, a chi a.
Amahun amahnu a sita chih a heet jiahun amah chu musit in a nuihsan uhi.
Huleh ama’n a bawnun a sawldoh veh a, amahnu chu a khut in a tu a, Nungaah, thou in, chi'n a kou a.
Huin a hagau ahung kiit a, a thoukhepah a; huin amahnu chu neeh diing pe diingin thu a pia hi.
Huleh a nu leh a pa’n limdang a sa mahmah va; hizongleh hu sil kibawl chu koimah hilh lou diingin ama’n amahuh a khapta hi.
Huzohin ama’n a nungjui sawmlenihte a koukhawm a, dawi zousiah tunga silbawltheihna leh thuneihna, huleh natnate suhdamtheihna a pia a.
Amah u’chu Pathian gam thu soi diing leh damloute sudam diingin a sawlkheta hi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Na zinna diingun chiang aha, sakhau aha, tanghou aha, sum aha bangmah keng sih un; puannaah zong thuaah nih nei sih un.
Na luutna inn vah tungden unla, huleh hua kipanin kipankhia un.
Huleh ahung kipaahpih lou photmah chu hu khopia kipan a na chiahdoh chiangun amahuh heetsahna diingin na keengpeeh va leivui tatkhia un, a chi a.
Huin a chiahta va, tanchinpha soi kawm leh mun china mite sudam in akhua akhua ah a chiahta uhi.
Huchi'n kumpipa Herod in a silbawl zousiah ana za a; a lungjingta a, ajiahchu khenkhat in John ahung hing kiit ahita a chi va.
Khenkhat in, Elijah ahung kilaah ahita, a chi va, huleh midangte’n, Malai zawlneite khat hung thou kiit ahita a chi uh.
Huleh Herod in, John laha lu tanta ing a; hizongleh hichilawma a thu ka jah hi koi ahitai? a chi a. Huchi'n amah chu muh a utta hi.
Huleh sawllehte’n a hung kiit un a silbawl zousiah uh amah a hilh va. Huin Jesu’n amahuh a pui a, Bethsaida kichi khopi a gamgaw mun khatah a chiahtuampih a.
Mipite’n huchu a heet tahun amah a juita va; huleh ama’n amahuh ana kipaahpih a, a kawmvah Pathian gam thu a hilh a, suhdam ngaite a sudam hi.

Huleh ni tumkuan ahung hihin sawmlenihte chu a hung va, a kawmah, I kimvela khopi leh khoneute a chiah a giahna leh neeh diing hawl diingin mipite sawlkhia in; ajiahchu hi-ah gamgaw mun a um i hi, a chi va,
Hizongleh ama’n a kawmvah, Nangun a neeh diinguh pia un, a chi a. Amahun, Mipi hizaat zoujai neeh diing i va leisah louhleh tanghou ngaa leh nga nih chauh loungal bangmah i nei sih uh, a chi va.
Ajiahchu amahuh mi saang ngaa vel ahi uh. Huin ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, Sawmngaa jelin a honhon in tousah un, a chi a.
Huleh amahun hichi’n a bawl va, a bawnun a tousahta va.
Huin ama’n hu tanghou ngaate leh nga nihte chu a la a, vaanlam entouin a vangpiah a, a balkeeh a, a nungjuite kawmah mipite ma a lui diingin a pia a.
Huleh a ne va, a vah chiatta uh; huleh a khawnmawh uh a neng bawm sawmlenih a luaahdim uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, amah ngena a haamtei laiin a nungjuite a kawmah a um va; ama’n a kawmvah, Mipite’n kei koi ahi ahung chi viai? chi'n a dong a.
Amahun a dawng va, Baptistu John ahi, ahung chi uh; hizongleh khenkhat in, Elijah ahi ahung chi va, huleh a dangte’n, zawlnei malai ate laha khat hung thou kiit ahi, ahung chi uh, a chi va.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Ahihleh nangun koi ka hi na hung chi viai? a chi a. Peter in a dawng a, Pathian Khrist chu, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n hu thu chu koimah hilh lou diingin amahuh a khapta hi,
Mihing Tapa’n chu sil tampi a thuaah ngei diing ahi a; upate leh siampu lalte leh lehkhagialtute deih louhin a um diing a, thahin a um diing, huleh ni thum ni’n kaihthohin a um diing ahi, chi in.
Huleh ama’n a bawnva kawmah, Mi koipouh in ahung juih nuam inchu amah le amah kimumangtop in, nichinin a kros pua in hung jui heh.
Ajiahchu koipouh a hinna humbit ut in a taan diing a; hizongleh keimah jiaha a hinna taan in a humbit diing hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh mi’n khovel a pum in nei henla, amah kisumang in, ahihlouhleh paihmang in umta leh amah diingin bang a phatuam diai?
Ajiahchu keimah leh ka thute zumpih chu mihing Tapa’n a loupina toh, a Pa loupina toh, angel siangthoute loupina a ahung chiangin amah chu a zumpih diing hi.
Hizongleh thutah ka hung hilh ahi, hi a dingte khenkhat, Pathian gam a muh masiah uh sihna chiam lou diing a um uh, a chi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, hite a soi nung ni giat diing bangin ama’n Peter leh, John leh, Jakob a pui a, taang ah haamtei diingin a chiah a.
Huleh a haamtei laiin a meel umdan chu ahung dangta a, a puansilhte chu a vaam a, a teselsulta a.
Huleh ngai in, mi nih amah toh a kihou va, hute chu Mosi leh Elijah ahi uh.
Amah u’chu loupina a hung kilaahin Jerusalem khua a, a sihna suhkim diing thu a soi va.
Hizongleh Peter leh a kawma umte chu a ihmut uh a suaah mahmah a; huleh ahung halh tahun Jesu loupina leh a kawma diing mi nihte a muta uh.

Huleh hichi ahung hi a, a kawma kipan a paikhiah un, Peter in Jesu kawmah, Houtupa, eiuh diingin hitah a um a hoih hi; bawh thum i lam diing a, nanga di’n khat, Mosi a di’n khat, huleh Elijah a di’n khat, a chi a; bang ahiai a soi zong he louin.
Huchia a soi laiin meilum ahung kai a, amahuh ahung khuh a; huleh meilum laha, a luut phetun a lauta uh.
Huleh meilum laha kipanin aw ahung suaah a, Hi ka Tapa deihtah ahi, A thu ngai un, chi'n.
Huleh aw a daih tahin Jesu chauh a muta va. Huleh a sip vengveng va, hulaiin a sil muhte uh koimah a hilh sil uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, a jingni a taanga kipan a hungsuh un mipi nasatahin amah ana lamtuah va.
Huleh, ngai in, mipi lah apat mi khat hung kikou in, Houtupa, ka hung ngen ahi, ka tapa en in; ka tapa neihsun ahi ngal a.
Ngai in, hagau khat in a man a, thakhat khat in a kikoudoh a; huleh chilphuan bo khopin a bawl gimveu a, naahpihtaha susidup in a nuseveu hi.
Na nungjuite kawmah delhdoh diingin ka ngen a; a delhdoh thei sih uhi, a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Ginna bei leh khang thah hilhlahte aw, na kawmva bangtan um a hung thuaahsiam diing ka hiai? Na tapa hi-ah hung pui in, a chi a.
Huleh amah chu ahung pailai dawiin a supuuh a, a bawlgim hi. Huin Jesu’n dawiniin chu a tai a, naupang chu a sudam a, a pa kawmah a peta hi.
Huleh a bawnun Pathian silbawltheihna loupi chu limdang a sa mahmah va. Hizongleh mi chinin Jesu silbawl zousiah limdang a sah laiun ama’n a nungjuite kawmah.
Hi thu kisoite na bil sungvah luut heh; ajiahchu mihing Tapa chu mite khuta matsah a um diing ahi, a chi a.
Hizongleh amahun hi a thusoi chu a hesiam sih va; a heet louh diing va iim ahihjiahin; huleh a thusoi chu amah a dong ngam sih uhi.
Huin a lahva koi ahiai lianpen diing chi'n kinialna ahung neita va.
Jesu’n a lungtang va a ngaihtuah uh a he a, naupang khat a pui a, a kawmah a umsah a,
A kawmvah, Koipouh ka mina hi naupang kipaahpih chu kei hung kipaahpih ahi; huleh kei hung kipaahpih chu ahung sawlpa kipaahpih ahi; na bawnva laha neupen chu a lianpen diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh John in a dawng a, Houtupa, mi khat na mina dawite nohdoh ka mu va; ka hung juihna vah a tel louh jiahin ka khapta uhi, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Amah chu khap sil un; ajiahchu ei hung dou lou phot chu ei lama pang ahi, a chi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, puitouh a, a um diing hun a tunin Jerusalem khua a chiah diingin a maai a ngat tinten a,
A ma ah mi a sawl masa a, huchi'n amahuh chu na chiahin amah diing a guatsa diama na koih diingin Samaria mite khua khatah a luut va.
Huleh amahun Jerusalem kholama chiah diing banga a meel a lat jiahin amah ana kipaahpih sih va;
A nungjuite Jakob leh John in hi a heetun, Lalpa, Elijah bawl bangin amahuh kaang mang diingin vaan a kipanin mei koukhe lei hoih na sa diai? a chi va.
Hizongleh amah chu a kihei a, amahuh a tai a, Bangchibang lungsim po mi na hih uh kihe lou na hi uh,
Ajiahchu mihing Tapa hi mite hinna suse diing a hung hilouin, hundam diingin ahung ahi zaw, a chi a. Huin khodang ah a chiahta uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, lampi a, a chiah laiun mi khat in a kawmah, Lalpa na chiahna photah ka hung jui diing, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Sialte’n kua a nei a, tungleeng vate’n zong bu a nei uh; hizongleh mihing Tapa’n a lu ngahna diing zong a nei sih, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n midang khat kawmah, Hung juiin, a chi a. Hizongleh ama’n, Lalpa, ka pa hung va vuisah masa photin, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Misi in a misi uh kivui u’heh; hizongleh nang chu chiah inla, Pathian gam thu va soi in, a chi a.
Huleh midang khat in zong, Lalpa, ka hung jui diing; hizongleh ka inn a mite kamphain hung va hasah masa photin, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Mi koipouh laangkawn tujing a nunglam en chu Pathian gam mi hitaah ahi sih, a chi hi.
Hi silte nungin Lalpa’n midang sawmsagih zong a guat a, amah ngei hungna diing kho chin leh mun chin ah a ma ah nih nihin a sawl a.
Hujiahin ama’n a kawmvah, Buh laah diing a tam mahmah a, hizongleh a tongtute a tawm uhi; hujiahin, a buh la diing a natongtute hung sawl doh diingin buh neitu kawmah ngen un.
Chiahta unla, ngai un, ngeihon laha belaamnoute bangin ka hung sawl hi.
Dangka ip aha, sakhau aha, keengtophah aha keng sih un; huleh lampi ah koimah chibai buuh sih un.
Huleh inn na luutna phot vah, a masapenin hi inn ah hamuanna tung heh, chi un.
Huleh hu a hamuanna taah a um leh na hamuanna u’chu a tungah a um diing; a um louhleh na kawmvah ahung kihkiit diing.
Huleh hu inn ah um zing unla, ahung piah phot uh nein dawn un; ajiahchu natongtu chu loh mutaah ahi. Inn khat apat inn khat ah tuan lehleh sih un.
Khua na luutna phot vah ahung na kipaahpih uleh na ma va a lui photmah uh ne un.
Hu a damlou umte chu sudam unla, a kawmvah, Pathian gam na kawmvah ahung tungta, chi jel un.
Hizongleh khua na luutna phot vah ahung na kipaahpih louh uleh a kho kotzingah chiah unla,
Na kho leivui uh ka keengpeeh va baang nasan na tungvah ka taatsiang uh; ahihvangin Pathian gam na kawmvah ahung tungta chih he un, chi un.
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, hu ni chiangin hu khuate thuaah diing sangin Sodom kho thuaah chu a dan a um zaw diing.

Korazin, na tung gih e! Bethsaida, na tung gih e! Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh na sung va sil loupi kibawlte Tura leh Sidon khua a kibawl hileh saiip puan silhin, vut laha touin sawtpiin a kisiih zouta diing uh.
Hizongleh vaihawmni chiangin nanguh thuaah sangin Tura leh Sidon thuaah chu adan a um zaw diing hi.
Huleh nang Kapernaum, vaan tan a paahtawi a um diing kisapa, gawtmun tana sawnkhiah a um diing na hi zaw hi.
Koipouh na thusoi uh ngai chu kei thu ngai ahi uh; huleh koipouh nanguh hung nual chu kei hung nual ahi uh; huleh kei hung nual chu ahung sawlpa nual ahi uh, a chi a.
Huleh sawmsagihte chu kipaahtahin ahung tungkiit va, Lalpa, na min jalin dawite nasan ka thu un a um uh, a chi va.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Setan vaan a kipana kawlphe banga hungkia ka mu hi.
Ngai un, guulte leh momaite totdeen theihna leh melma silbawltheihna zousiah tunga thuneihna ka hung pia hi; huchi'n bangmahin ahung suna het sih diing,
Himahleh dawite na thuthu va a um jiahin kipaah sih unla, vaan a na min uh gelh ahihjiahin kipaah zaw un, a chi a.

Hu hun laitahin Jesu chu Hagau in a kipaah a, Aw Pa, vaan leh lei Lalpa, nangma’n mipil leh misiamte kawmah hi thute na iim a, naungeehte kawma na phuan jiahin ka hung paahtawi hi; ahi, Pa, huchih chu na kipaahna zawng ahi.
Sil zousiah ka Pa’n kei ahung pekheta hi; Tapa koi ahih chih Pa loungal koima’n a he sih; huleh Pa koi ahih Tapa leh a kawmva Tapa’n a phuan nuamnate loungal koima’n a he sih, a chi a.
Huin a nungjuite lam a ngat a, a guuh in, Na sil muhte uh muhna mitte a hampha hi;
Ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, zawlnei tampi leh kumpi tampite’n na sil muhte uh muh ana ut va, hizongleh a mu sih uh, huleh na jahte u’zong jah ana ut va, hizongleh a ja sih uh, a chi hi.
Huleh ngai in, daantheimi khat a dingdoh a, amah ze-etna in, Houtupa, kumtuang hinna ka neih theihna diingin bang ahiai ka bawl diing? a chi a.
Ama’n a kawmah, Daan lehkhabu ah bang a kigial ei? Bang na chi sim ei? a chi a.

Ama’n a dawng a, Lalpa na Pathian chu na lungtang zousiah a, na hagau zousiah a, na haatna zousiah a huleh na lungsim zousiah a na lungsiat diing ahi; huleh nangmah na kilungsiat bangin na innveengte zong na lungsiat diing ahi, chi'n, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, Na dawng dih zet mai; hichi'n bawl in, na hing diing hi, a chi a.
Hizongleh ama’n amah siamkitan utin Jesu kawmah, Ka innveeng koi ahiai? a chi hi.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Mi koi ahakhat Jerusalem apatin Jeriko ah a chiahsuh a, suammangte a tuaahkha a, hute’n a puansilh a phelsah veh va, a voliam va, silou phetin a nusia uh.
Huin siampu khat hu lampi ah a hungsuh jenjen a; amah a muh tahin lampi gei langkhat ah a peelta a,
Huleh huchimahbangin Levimi khat hu mun ahung tunin a en a, lampi gei langkhat ah a peelta hi.
Hizongleh Samarimi khat khualzin lai chu hupa umna mun ahung tunga, amah a muh tahin a lungsiat mahmah a.
A kawmah a chiah a, a liamnate thau leh uain sunkhum in a tuam a, amah gan tunga tuangsah in zinbuuh ah a chiahpih a, a enkolta hi.
Huleh a jingni a, a chiah diingin makhai nih a ladoh a, jinbuuh neitu kawmah a pia a Amah na enkolin la, hibana na seen jahjah chu ka hung kiit chiangin ka hung pekiit diing, a chi a.
Tuin hi mi thumte lahah a koipen chu gutate tuaahpa innveeng hi diingin na ngaihtuah ei? a chi a.
Ama’n, A tunga khotuahna neipa, a chi a. Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, Chiah inla, nang zong huchibangin va bawl in, a chi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, a chiah laiun khua khatah a luut a; numei khat a min Martha in a inn ah a tungsah a.
Huleh amahnu’n Mari kichi sanggamnu khat a neia, amah chu Jesu keeng bulaha tou a, a thusoi a ngai hi.
Hizongleh Martha chu neehbawl in a buai mahmah a, Jesu kawmah a hung a, Lalpa, ka sanggamnu’n kei chauh neehbawl a ahung set khawhsa lou na hiaimah? hung huh diingin sawlin, a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Martha, Martha, sil tampi na ngaihtuaha buai na hi;
Hizongleh sil khat chauh a poimoh hi. Mari in tan hoih a teelta a, huchu laahsah louh diing ahi, a chi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, mun khata a haamtei laiin, a haamtei zohin a nungjuite khat in a kawmah, Lalpa, John in a nungjuite a hilh bangin haamtei daan hung hilh in, a chi a.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Na haamtei chiangun, Ka Pa uh vaan a um, Na min kizahtaat heh. Na gam hung tung heh. Na deihzawng vaan a, a kibawl bangin, lei ah zong kibawl heh.
Ka nikhat neehkhop uh an ni chinin hungpia in.
Ka sualnate uh hung ngaidam in; kei un zong ka leibate uh photmah ka ngaihdam jiahun; Heemna ah hung puiluut sinla, gilou lah apat hung hunkhe zaw in, chi un, a chi hi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Na lahva koiaha in lawm khat nei henla, jan khang laiin a kawma va chiahin, Lawm, tanghou beu thum hung thunglaahsah in;
Ajiahchu ka lawm khat khualzin ka kawmah a hung a, a ma a lui diing bangmah ka nei sih, chi henla;
Huleh ama’n innsung patin dawngin, Hung subuai sin; kot khaah ahita a, huleh ka tate zong ka kawmah lupna ah a ihmuta uh; hung thouin ka hung pe thei sih, ana chi leh,
Ka hung hilh ahi, a lawm ahihjiaha va thouin va pe sih mah zongleh a nget teitei jiahin thouin a deih jahjah a va pe diing hi.
Ka hung hilh ahi, Ngen un, ahung kipe diing; hawl un, na mu diing uh; huleh kiu un, ahung kihonsah diing hi.
Ajiahchu a ngen photin a tang va; a hawl photin a mu va; huleh a kiu phot chu a kihonsah diing hi.
Na lahva pa hite koi aha a tapa in tanghou ngen leh kuan suang a pe diai? ahihlouhleh nga ngen leh nga luang in guul a pe diai mah?
Ahihlouhleh aahtui ngen leh mom-ai a pe diai mah?
Huchia nanguh migilou in bawn na tate uh sil hoih piah na taang na heet uleh, na Pa uh vaan a umin a ngentute kawmah Hagau Siangthou naah piah mahmah lou diing ahiai mah? a chi hi.
Huleh ama’n dawi haamthei lou khat a nohdoh a; Huleh hichi ahi a, dawi a pawt phetin haamthei lou chu ahung haamta a; huchi'n mipi’n limdang a sa mahmah uh.
Hizongleh a lahva khenkhat in, Dawi maangpa Beelzebul jala dawite a nohdoh ahi, a chi va.
A dangte’n lah amah ze-etna’n vaan apat a chiamchihna a ngen va.
Hizongleh ama’n a ngaihtuah uh he in a kawmvah, Gam amah leh amah kidou photmah a mangthai veu hi; huleh innsung khat zong a kidou leh a puuh veu hi.
Setan zong amah leh amah kidou taleh bangchi'n a gam a ding thei diai? Beelzebul jala dawite nohdoh ahi na hung chi ngal va.
Huleh ke’n Beelzebul jala dawite nohdoh ka hihleh na tapateun koi jala nohdoh ahi viai? hujiahin amahuh chu nanguh hung vaihawmsah diingte ahi uh.
Hizongleh ke’n Pathian khut zung vanga dawite ka nohdoh leh Pathian gam na kawmvah ahung tung tahzetta ahi.
Mi haatin hiam leh thal tawi a, a inn a veen chiangin a thuampuate a bit hi.
Hizongleh amah sanga haatzaw khat a hung a, ahung zoh chiangin a kimuanna gaalthuam zousiah a laahsah a, huleh a thuampo laahsahte chu a hawmjah veu hi.
Koipouh ka lama panglou chu ahung dou ahi a; huleh koipouh ahung laahkhawmpih lou chu a thehjah ahi.
Dawi niin chu mi sunga kipan a pawtkhiahin khawlna diing hawlin gam gaw mun bangah a vaah lehleh a; huleh a mu sih a; Ka pawtna inn mah ah ka chiah kiit mai diing, a chi a.
Huleh hutah ahung tun leh phiat sianga jep hoihin a muta a.
Huin a chiah a, amah sanga gilou zaw dawi dang sagih ahung pui a, a sungah a luut va, a teengta uh; huleh hupa umdan nunung chu ama a sangin ahung se zosemta hi, a chi a.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, hi thute a soi laiin mipi lah apat numei koi ahakhat ahung kikoudoh a, a kawmah, Nang hung kipaaina gil a hampha hi, huleh na nawi teepte toh, a chi a.
Hizongleh ama’n chu, Ahi, himahleh Pathian thu ja a juite a hampha zaw uh, a chi a.

Huleh mipi ahung kikhop khawm laiun, ama’n a kawmvah, Tulai khang thahte chu khang giloutah ahi uh; chiamchihna a hawl va; hizongleh zawlnei Jona chiamchihna loungal chiamchihna dang piah ahi sih diing uh.
Ajiahchu Jona Ninevi khua a mite diing a chiamchihna ahih bangin mihing tapa zong tulai khang thahte diingin chiamchihna ahi diing.

Simlam kumpinu chu vaihawmni chiangin tulai khang thahte toh ahung thou diing a, siamlouh a tangsah diing hi; ajiahchu Solomon pilna ngaikhe diingin kawlmonga kipan ahung hi; ngai un, Solomon sanga loupizaw hi-ah a um hi.

Nineveh khua a mite chu vaihawmni chiangin tulai khang thahte toh a thou diing va, siamlouh a tangsah diing uh; ajiahchu Jona thusoi jiahin amahun a sual a kisiih uh; ngai un, Jona sanga loupizaw hi-ah a um hi.
Mi koimah in thaumei a vaah chiangin beemkawm kalah a koih ngei sih, huleh loh nuaiah zong a koih ngei sih; ahung luutte’n a vaah a muhtheihna na diingin thaumei koihna ah a koih zaw hi.
Tahsa vaahna chu mit ahi, hujiahin na mit a chiim chiangin na tahsa zong a bawnin a vaah suaah hi, hizongleh na mit a hoih louh chian na tahsa zong a mial veu hi.
Hujiahin na sunga vaah um chu mial ahih louhna diingin pilvaangin.
Hujiahin na tahsa a pumpia a vaah a, a mialna mun a um louhleh thaumei vaahtahin ahung taanvaah bangin a vaahsuaah veu diing, a chi hi.
Huleh a thusoi laiin Pharisai koi ahakhat in a kawma an ne diingin amah a chial a; huin a luut a, an ne diingin a touta a.
Hu Pharisaipa’n an neeh ma a khut a sil louh a muh in limdang a sa mahmah a.
Lalpa’n a kawmah, Nanguh Pharisaite’n nou leh kuang polam na silsiang ngei va; hizongleh na sunglam u’chu leepguuhna leh giitlouhna in a dim hi.
Nanguh mingol haw, a polam siamtu’n a sunglam zong siam lou ahiai mah?
Hizongleh na sil neihte uh migentheite kawmah pezaw un; huleh ngai un, sil zousiah nanguh diingin a siang hi.

Hizongleh Pharisaite, na tunguh a gih hi! ajiahchu nangun pudinate, pardite, huleh haichi zousiah sawma khat na pia va, vaihawmna dih leh Pathian lungsiatna na thudon sih uh; hite ahi na bawl diing uh, a dangte bawllou tuan louin.
Nanguh Pharisaite, na tunguh a gih hi! ajiahchu nangun kikhopna inn ah touna hoihpen pente leh dawlmuna mi’n chibai ahung buuh diing na deih uh.
Nanguh lehkhagialtu leh Pharisai lepchiahte haw, na tunguh a gih hi! ajiahchu nangun hi haankhuuh, mi’n haan ahihlam he loua a tung a a va pai veunate bang na hi uh, a chi a.
Huin daanhe mite laha khat in a dawng a, a kawmah, Houtupa, hichibanga na thusoi in kei u’zong hung tai na hi, a chi a.
Ama’n, Nanguh daanhe mite zong na tunguh a gih hi! ajiahchu nangun vangih puaah hah tahtah mi na pat va, nangun lah hu vangihte na khut zung khat un zong na khoih nuam sih uh.
Na tunguh a gih hi! ajiahchu nangun zawlneite haan na lam va, amah u’lah na pulepate uh thah ahi.
Na pulepate uh silbawl a hoih hi chi'n na heetpih tahzet uhi; ajiahchu amahun amahuh a na that va, nangun a haan uh na lamsah uhi.
Hujiahin Pathian pilna in zong, A kawmvah zawlneite leh sawllehte ka sawl diing a, a lahva khenkhat a na that diing va, khenkhat a suduhdah diing uh;
Khovel siam chiila kipana kisuah zawlnei zousiah sisan phu chu tulai khang thahte tungah a kila thei diing hi,
Abel sisan kisuah apat maitaam leh Pathian biahinn kikala si Zakaria sisan tanin; a chi hi chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, hi Phuba chu tulai khang thahte tungah a kila diing hi.
Nanguh daan he mite na tunguh a gih hi! ajiahchu nangun pilna chabi na lamang va, nang u’lah na luut sih va, mi a luut diingte lah na khaam veu uhi, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n hi thute a soi laiin lehkhagialtute leh Pharisaite’n amah chu thu tampi soisah tum in hahphinin a phin panta va;
Siamlouh a tansah theihna diingun a haamkhialna mat tum in a taang zing uhi.
Huchiah laia mipi simseeng louh khat leh khat kituanchil khop hiala ahung kikhop laiun, ama’n a masapenin a nungjuite kawmah, Pharisaite tol, lepchiahna lahah kiveeng un.
Ajiahchu kilanglou diing a kikhuh bangmah a um sih a; huleh heet louh diing a kiphual zong bangmah a um sih.
Hujiahin miala na soi photmah uh vaah ah jahin a um diing a; huleh innsung tawnga bilbula na soi uh chu innkhum vuum ah taangkou pihin a um diing hi.
Huleh nanguh ka lawmte, ka hung hilh ahi, Tahsa sulumtheia, huzohchianga bangmah dang bawltheih nei nawnloute lau sih un.
Hizongleh koi ahiai na lau diing uh ka hung hilh lawh diing: a thah nunga zong gawtmuna paihtheihna thuneipa amah chu lau un; ahi, ka hung hilh ahi, Amah chu lau un.
Kawlgit ngaa paisa nihin a zuah veu sih viai mah? huleh a lahva khat zong Pathian ma ah mangngilh in a um sih hi.
Hizongleh na lu va samzangte nasan sim veh ahi. Hujiahin lau sih un; kawlgit tampi sangin na luulzaw uhi.
Ka hung hilh ahi, Koipouh mite ma a kei hung gum photmah chu mihing Tapa’n zong Pathian angelte ma ah amah a gum diing hi.
Hizongleh mite ma a kei hung kiheetmohbawl chu Pathian angelte ma ah kiheetmohbawl in a um diing.
Koipouh mihing Tapa kalha thusoi chu ngaihdam ahi diing a; hizongleh Hagau Siangthou kalha soisia chu a soisiatna ngaihdamsah ahi sih diing hi.
Huleh nanguh kikhopna innte, thukhentute, huleh houtute ma a ahung pui tah chiangun bangchia bangthuin ka dawng diai, ahihlouhleh bang ka soi diai chih lungkham sih un.
Bang jiahin i chih leh Hagau Siangthou in a huntahin na soi diing uh ahung hilh diing hi, a chi hi.
Huleh mihon laha khat in, a kawmah, Houtupa, ka unaupa kawmah gou hung kihoppih diingin soi in, a chi a.
Ama’n a kawmah, Mihing, Kua’n ahiai kei na tungva vaihawmtu aha, tanhawmtu aha a hung bawl? a chi a.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Pilvaang unla, eenna lahah kiveeng un; ajiahchu hauhsat mihing damsan ahi sih hi, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah tehkhinthu khat a soi a, Mi hausa koi ahakhat chu a loua piang ahung pung mahmahta a.
Huchi'n a lungsim in a kingaihtuah a, Ka buh le baal koihna diing lah ka nei sih a, bang loh diing ka diai? a chi a.
Huin, Hikhu ka bawl diing, ka buh innte ka phel diing a, a lianzaw ka lam diing; huleh huah ka buh leh baalte leh ka thuampua zousiah ka koih diing;
Huleh ka hagau kawmah, Hagau, kum tampi sunga diing thuampua tampi na neita a; kitawlnga inla, ne in, dawn in, huleh nuamtahin um in, ka chi diing, a chi a.
Hizongleh Pathian in a kawmah, Nang mingol, tujan leh na hinna hung kilaahsah diing ahi; hu na sil kholkhawmte koi a diing ahita diai? a chi a.
Amah chauh diing a gou kikhol a, Pathian lama hausa lou chu huchi ahi veu hi, a chi hi.
Huin ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, Hujiahin ka hung hilh ahi, Bang ahiai ka neeh diing, chi'n na hinna diing uleh; bang ahiai ka silh diing, chi'n na tahsa diingun lungkham sih un.
Hinna chu neeh diing sangin a thupi zaw a, huleh tahsa zong puansilh sangin a thupi zaw hi.
Va'aahte ngaihtuahun, buh lah a tuh sih va, aat zong a aat sih uh; buhpang leh buhinn zong a nei sih uh; himahleh Pathian in amahuh a vaah hi; nanguh vate sanga bangchituha hoihzaw na hita viai mah?
Huleh na lahva kua’n ahiai lungkham jiaha, a din tongkhata behlap thei?
Huchia nangun hu sil neupa tawp bawn na bawl theih louh uleh bang diinga a dangte lungkhampih na hi viai?
Lili paahte khandan ngaihtuah un; nna a tong sih va, pat a kheeh sih uh; himahleh ka hung hilh ahi, Solomon zong a loupina zousiaha a kijepin hi lili paahte laha khat banga jep in a um sih hi.
Huchia gam a hampa tunia hing a, a jing a meikhuuh a paih mai diing bawn Pathian in huchituh a, a jep inchu, Aw nanguh ginna tawmte, bangchituha nanguh silhsaha um diing na hita viai mah?
Huleh na neeh diing uh aha, na dawn diing uh aha hawl sih un; ginlahna lungsim nei in zong um sih un.
Ajiahchu khovela namte’n hihaw zousiah a hawl uh; huleh na Pa un hi silte na mamoh uh chih a he hi.
Hizongleh nangun chu Pathian gam hawl zaw un; huchi'n hi silte ahung kipiahbeh diing hi.
Pawl tawmte, lau sih un; bang jiahin i chih leh na kawmva lalgam piah chu na Pa uh kipaahna zawngtah ahi.
Na neih pouh uh zuah unla, migentheite kawmah pia un; vaan ah guta chiah louhna leh, leikha neehsiat louhna ah, dangka ip lui thei lou leh gou sethei lou kikhol zaw un.
Ajiahchu na gou uh umna photah na lungtang u’zong a um diing hi.
Na kawng uh gaah unla, na thaumei u’zong kuang sah zing un.
Mi a pu kiteenna ankuang luina apat a hung pai a kotkhaah ahung kiuh tah chianga na honsahpah thei diing a na ngaah zing bangin um un.
A pu uh a hung tahchianga amah na ngaah zinga a muh suaahte a hampha uhi; chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, a kawng a gaah diing a, amahuh chu ankuang ah a tousah diing a, a neeh uh a bawlsahta diing.
Huleh jan khang laiin ahiai, jingthoh in ahiai hungleh, huchibanga ahung muh in chu, hu suaahte chu a hampha uhi.
Hichu he un, guta hung diing hun inn neitu in he henla hileh a veeng diing a, a inn a suvangsah sih diing.
Hujiahin nanguh zong kiging zingin um un; ajiahchu na ngaihtuah louh laitah va mihing Tapa chu hung diing ahi, a chi a.
Huin Peter in a kawmah, Lalpa, hi tehkhinthu hi keiuh kawm chauh a na soi ahiai, ahihlouhleh mi zousiah kawm a zong? a chi a.
Lalpa’n, Sumkoltu ginum leh piltah, a pu in a hunchina a an tan diing uh hawmsah diing a, a innkuanpihte tunga houtu a, a siam diing chu koipen ahi diai?
A pu ahung pai chianga huchibang bawl a ahung muh hu suaah chu a hampha hi.
Dihtahin ka hung hilh ahi, Amah chu a neih zousiah tunga thuneitu in a siam diing hi.
Hizongleh hu suaahpa’n a lungsim in, Ka pu hungzoh lou diing hita, chi'n a suaah numei leh pasalte na jep in, huleh ne a dawnin na kham taleh;
Hu suaahpa pu chu a gintaat louh ni khat in a heet louh kalin ahung diing a, tum nih a suah diing a, ginglou mite tan bang a tangsah diing hi.
Huleh suaah a pu deihzawng he ngal a ana kiginglou leh a deihzawng banga bawl lou chu tampivei vuaah ahi diing.

Hizongleh he lou a, vuaahna taah hial sil bawltu chu tawmtakhat vei vuaah ahi diing Ajiahchu koipouh tampi kipiahna kawmah tampi a kiphuut diing a, huleh mi’n tampi a kolsah uh kawmah a tamzosem a phuut diing uhi.
Leitung a mei khesuh diing a hung ka hi; tuin zong kaangpanta leh chi hina'ng e!
Hizongleh baptisma tan diing khat ka nei hi, hu ka taangtun masiah ka ngaih muanglou hina e!
Lei tunga lemna leengsah diing a hung hungsa na hi viai mah? Hilou hial, ka hung hilh ahi, kikhenna umsah diing a hung ka hi zaw hi.
Ajiahchu tu a kipanin innsung khat a mi ngaa um chu nih langah thum, huleh thum langah nih pangin a kikhen diing uh.
Pa in tapa, huleh tapain pa; nuin tanu, huleh tanuin nu; innpinuin a mounu, huleh mounuin a innpinu a dou diing, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n mipite kawmah zong, Nangun nitumna lama mei hung kai na muh chiangun guah zu diing ahi na chipah ngal va; huleh huchi'n ahung um ngei a.
Huleh sim huih hung nung na heet chiangun khua lum diing ahi na chi va, huchi'n ahung lum ngei hi.
Nanguh milepchiahte Aw, vaan leh lei umzia lah na hesiam va, bang diinga tulai hun umzia hesiam lou na hi viai?
Huleh bang diinga nangun bang dih ahiai chih ngaihtuahlou na hi viai?

Thukhentu ma a na langpa toh na chiah chiangin lamkal ah amah apat suahtaatna diing hawl haamhaam in; huchilouin chu vaihawmtu ma ah ahung tut diing a, vaihawmtuin miman houtu kawmah ahung pekhe diing a, huleh miman houtuin suangkul ah ahung khumkha diing hi.
Ka hung hilh ahi, paisa san khat tan a na dit bei keei masiah hu apatin na pawt hial sih diing hi, a chi hi.
Huchih hun laiin, Galili gam a mite Pilat in a thah a, a sisan uh Pathian biahna sa toh a halkhawmsah uh thu a kawma hung hilh mi hunkhop a um va.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Huchibang silte a thuaah jiahun hu Galilimite chu Galili gam a mite zousiah sanga sual diahkhola ngaihtuah na hi viai mah?
Ka hung hilh ahi, Hilou e; nanguh zong na kisiih louh unchu huchibang mahin na mangthai veh diing uh, a chi a.
Ahihlouhleh Siloam innsaang in a puuhkhum a, a netlup mi sawmlegiatte zong Jerusalem khua a um zousiah sanga misual diahkhol hia ngaituah na hi viai mah?
Ka hung hilh ahi, Hilou e; Nanguh zong na kisiih louh unchu huchibang mahin na mangthai veh diing uhi, a chi hi.
Ama’n hi tehkhinthu zong a soi a; Mi koiaha in a grep huanah theipi kung suan khat a nei a; huleh a gah ahung hawl a, khat zong a mu sih a;
Huin ama’n grep hu an enkoltu kawmah, Ngai in, kum thum sung hi theipi kungah a gah ka hung hawl a, khat zong ka mu sih; phuuh mai in, bang diinga mun luaha um zing ahiai? a chi a.
Ama’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Lalpa, tukum zong umsah nalai in, a kiimkot in ka tou diing a, bawng-eeh in ka phungvuh diing;
Ahung gah taah leh a pha ahi diing a; ahung gah louha ahihleh huchian na phuuh na diing, a chi hi.
Huleh ama’n khawlni in kikhopna inn khat ah thu a hilh a.
Huleh ngai in, kum sawmlegiat haat louhna dawi in a mat numei khat a um a, a ngum a kuul khiukheu a, huleh a dingtang thei himhim sih hi.
Jesu’n amah a muh tahin a kou a, a kawmah, Numei, na haatlouhna apat hahkhiah na hita, a chi a.
Huleh a tungah a khut a koih a; huchi'n amahnu chu thakhat in ahung tangpah a; Pathian a paahtawita hi.

Huin khawlnia Jesu’n mi a suhdam jiahin kikhopna inn houtu chu a lungthah a, mipite kawmah, Mihing natohna diing ni guup um hilou ahiai mah; hu sungin hung unla, hung kisudamsahta un, khawlni a hilouin, a chi a.
Huphetin Lalpa’n amah a dawng a, Nang milepchiah, khawlni in na bawng uh aha, na sabiltung uh aha, a khihna apat suut in tui dawnsah diingin na puikhe veu uh hilou ahiai mah?
Hi numei Abraham tanu ahih toh, ngai in, Setan in kum sawmlegiat sunga mat chu khawlni a, a gaahna suutsah louh diing ahiai mah? a chi a.
Huleh ama’n hi thute a soi tahin a meelmate zousiah chu a zumta va; mipite chu a sil loupi bawl zousiah jiahin a kipaah chiat uhi.
Huin ama’n, Pathian gam chu bang tobang ahiai? huleh bangtoh tehkhin diing ka hiai?
Hichu mi’n ankam tang khat a laah a, a huana a paihluut bang ahi; huchu ahung pou a, a khang a, sing lianpi ahung hi a, huleh tungleeng vate’n a bate giahna’n a nei uh, a chi a.
Huleh Pathian gam chu bangtoh tehkhin diing ka diai? a chi kiit a.
Hichu tol, numei in a laah a, tehna thum dim an laha, a bawna a thoh veh masiah a phuum bang ahi, a chi hi.
Huleh ama’n thuhilh kawmin Jerusalem lam zuanin khopi leh khoneu tawn jelin a chiah a.
Huin mi khat in a kawmah, Lalpa, hutdama um diingte tawmtakhat hi u'maw? a chi a. Ama’n a kawmvah,
Kot jim ah luut tum teitei un; ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, mi tampi’n luut a tum diing a, a luut thei sih diing uh;

Inn neitu khatvei a thoh a, kot a khaah tah chian, nanguh innpua a dingin, Lalpa, Lalpa, kot hung honin, chia kot na kiuh chiangun, ama’n na kawmvah, Khoilam mi na hi viai, ka hung he ngei sih, chi'n ahung dawng diing.
Hutah chian nangun, Na ma ah ka ne un, ka dawn va, huleh ka kotzing vah thu na hilh hi, na chi diing uh;
Hizongleh ama’n, Ka hung hilh ahi, khoilam mi na hi viai mah ka hung he sih; nanguh sil gilou bawlte zousiah, ka kawm apat paimang un, ahung chi diing.
Abraham leh, Isaak leh, Jakob leh zawlneite zousiah Pathian gam a um na muh va, nanguh polama paikhiah a um na hih uh na hung kiheet chiangun huah kah leh hagawi a um diing.
Huleh suahlam leh, tumlam leh, simlam leh maallam apat in mi ahung diing va, Pathian gam ah a tou diing uhi.
Huleh ngai un, a nunung pente a masa pena pang diing a um va, huleh a masa pente zong a nunung pena pang diing a um uhi, a chi a.
Hu ni mahin Pharisai koite aha a hung va, a kawmah, Pawt inla, hi mun apat chiahmang in; ajiahchu Herod in thah hung tum ahi, a chi va.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Chiah unla, hu si-aal kawmah hi thu va soi un, Ngai in, tuni leh jingchiang dawite nohdoh in natnate sudam in ni thum niin ka zou diing hi.
Bang hitaleh tuni toh, jingchiang toh, a jing kiit toh ka pai jel diing hi; ajiahchu Jerusalem khua lou ah zawlnei sih ngeina hilou ahi, a chi hi.
Aw Jerusalem, Jerusalem! zawlneite that leh nang kawma hung kisawlte suang a na seplum; aahpi’n a noute a hanuaia a opkhum bangin bangzah vei na tate opkhum ka tum a, hizongleh na ut sih uh.
Ngai un, na inn uh a hawm a nuutsiatsah in a umta hi; huleh chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Lalpa min a hung pai chu a hampha hi na chih masiah uh na hung mu sih diing uh, a chi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, khawlni a Pharisai houtu khat inn a an ne diing a, a chiah in a enkhia va.
Huleh ngai in, a ma ah chipawma damlou mi khat a um a.
Jesu’n daanhete leh Pharisaite a houpih a, a kawmvah, Khawlni in suhdam siang ahiai, siang lou? a chi a.
Amah u’chu a sip chiat va, huin ama’n damlou chu a tu a, a sudama, a chiahsahta hi.
Huin a kawmvah, Na lahva kua’n ahiai na sabiltung uh aha, na bawngtal uh aha kokhuuh ah ke taleh, khawlni a zong kaidoh lou diing? a chi a.
Huleh amahun hi thute a dawng thei kiitta sih uhi.
Huleh a mi kouhte un mun saangpen a teel veu uh a mu a, a kawmvah tehkhinthu a soi a;
Kiteenna a koiaha in ahung kouh chiangin touna saangpen ah tou sih un; huchilou inchu nang sanga mi zahtaathuai zaw ana koukha diing a;
Nang hung koutu leh amah chu na kawma hungin, Hipa touna diing ot in; ahung chi diing a; nang chu zum tahin mun hoihlou penah na va toupan phiing diing hi.

Hizongleh ahung kikouh chiangin chiah inla mun hoihloupenah va tou zaw in; huchi'n ahung koutu ahung chiangin na kawmah, Lawm, a saang deuh ah hung tou in, ahung chi thei diing a; hutahchian na an neehpihte ma ngeiah zahbawl in na um diing hi.
Ajiahchu koipouh amah kingaisang chu a ngiam diing a; huleh amah kingaingiam chu tawisang in a um diing, a chi a.

Huin ama’n a chialtupa kawmah zong, Suun ankuang aha, jan ankuang aha na lui chiangin, na lawmte, na unaute, na sanggamte, huleh na innveeng mihausate zong kou sin; huchilou inchu amahun zong ahung kouve diing va ahung thuh kha diing uh.
Hizongleh ankuang na lui chiangin, tagahte, piangsualte, keengbaite, huleh mittawte kou zaw in.
Huchi'n na hampha diing hi; ajiahchu amahun ahung thuh zou sih diing va; midihtatte thohkiit chiangin thuh in na um diing hi, a chi hi.
Huleh a an neehpihte khat in hi thute a jahin a kawmah, Pathian gam a an ne diing chu a hampha hi, a chi a.
Huin ama’n a kawmah, Mi koi ahakhat in ankuang luina loupitah a bawl a, mi tampi a kou a;
Huleh a neeh hunin a mi chialte kawma, Hungun, tuin bangkim a kimanta, va chi diingin a suaahpa a sawl a.
Huleh amahun kithugualin suanlam a nei chiat va A masapenin a kawmah, Lou ka leita a, a en diing a ka chiah a kiphamoh hi; na hung ngaihsiam ka hung ngen hi, a chi a.
A dangin, Bawngtal tuah ngaa ka leita a, a siat a phat en diing a ka chiah a kiphamoh hi; na hung ngaihsiam ka hung ngen hi, a chi a.
Huleh a dang khat in, ji ka neita a, hujiahin ka hung thei sih hi, a chi a.

Huchi'n hu suaahpa chu a hung a, hu thute a pu ahung hilh a. Huin hu inn neipa chu lungthah in a suaahpa kawmah, Kotzing leh kawmkalah kintahin chiah inla, tagahte, piangsualte, mittawte huleh keengbaite hitah ah hung puiluut in, a chi a.
A suaahpa’n, Pu, na hung thupiah bangin ka bawl zouta a, himahleh mun a awng nalai hi, a chi, a.
Huin a pu in a suaahpa kawmah, Lamlian leh daaiah chiahdoh inla, ka inn a dim theihna diingin mi hung zawl luut haamhaam in,
Ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, Ka mi kouhte khatmah in zong ka ankuang lui a chiam sih diing uh, a chi hi.
Huleh mipi nasatahin amah a tonpih va; huleh amah chu a kinunghei a, a kawmvah,
Mi koipouh ka kawma hungin, a pa, a nu, a ji, a tate, a unaupa, a sanggamnu huleh amah hinna nasan a huat louhleh ka nungjui ahi thei sih diing,
Huleh koipouh amah kros kipuaah a hung jui lou chu ka nungjui ahi thei sih diing hi.
Nanguh koipouh innsaang lam tum in a lam zohna diing a neih leh neih louh heetna diing a tou masa phot a, a luut diing zah hisaap bawl lou diing koi na um viai?
Huchilou inchu innbul a lepzoh nungin lamzou theita sih leh a mu zousiah in nuihsan in,
Hipa’n inn a lampan ngal a, a zou theita sih, a chikha diing uh.

Ahihlouhleh kumpipa koi ahiai kumpipa dang dou diing a kuan diingin, tou masa phot a, amah dou diing a mi siing nih toh hung kuanpa chu mi siing khat toh a tuaah ngam diing leh ngam louh diing ngaihtuah masa lou diing?
Ahih louh vanglahleh, a dang pen gamla pia a um laiin Kilemna thuchiam ngen diingin palai a sawl diing hi.
Huchimahbangin nanguh lahah koipouh a neih zousiah paisan lou chu ka nungjui ahithei sih diing hi.
Chi chu a hoih hi; ahiin chi da zouta leh bangin a kisualta diai?
Leia di’n laha hoih sih diing a, eehneel diingin zong a hoih boh sih diing; mi’n a paaidoh jo veu uhi. Koipouh jahna diing a bil nei in ja heh, a chi hi.
Huin siahdongtute leh misualte zousiah a thu ngaikhe diingin Bang diinga ahung zu an va.
Pharisaite leh lehkhagialtute’n, Hipa’n misualte a kipawlpih a, an bang a neeh khawmpih, chi'n a phunchiah va,
Huin ama’n hi tehkhinthu a kawmvah a soi a,
Nanguh laha mi koiaha in belaam za nei henla, a laha khat mangsah leh, sawmkuaah leh kuaahte gamdaia nusia a, a mangpen a muh masiah va hawl lou diing koi na hi viai?
Huleh a muh kiit tahin kipaahtahin a liangkou ah a pua a,
Inn a tunin a lawmte leh a innveengte a kou khawma a kawmvah, Hung kipaahpih un; ajiahchu ka belaam mang ka mu kiitta hi, a chi ahi.
Ka hung hilh ahi, Huchimahbangin midih kisiihna tuan diing nei lou sawmkuaah leh kuaahte tungah sangin misual khat kisiih tungah vaan ah kipaahna a lianzaw diing.
Huleh numei koi ahiai dangka sawm nei in khat mangsah leh, thaumei de a, inn phiat a, huleh a muh kiit masiah nguntaha hawl lou diing um?
Huleh a muh kiit chiangin a lawmte leh a innveengte a koukhawm a, Hung kipaahpih un; ajiahchu ka dangka mansah ka mu kiitta hi, a chi hi.
Ka hung hilh ahi, Huchimahbangin Pathian angelte ma ah misual kisiih khat tungah kipaahna a um hi.
Huleh ama’n, Mi koiahakhat in tapa nih a nei a;
A lahva a naupangzaw pa’n a pa kawmah, Pa, gou kei tan diing teng hung pia in, a chi a. Huchi'n a pa’n a sum chu amahuh a hawmsahta a.
Huleh ni sawtlou nungin tapa naupangzaw pa’n a tan a bawnin a lakhawm a, khual gamlapi ah a zinta a, huleh hu munah a neih teng pahtattahin a va zang zoupahta hi.
Huleh a bawna a zatbei veh tahin hu gam ah kial nasatah ahung tungta a; neeh diing ahung kitasamta a.
Huleh amah chu a chiah a, hu gam mi khat a va beelta a; ama’n amah chu voh an pe diingin lou lamah ana sawl a;
Huleh vohte neeh bangkhat hawngte a, a gil suhvah a ut mahmah a; koima’n lah bangmah a pe sih hi.
Huleh ahung halh tahin, Ka pa kawma kiloh suaahte an neeh seeng louh a nei a tamtam u’toh, keilah gilkial a si diing himai veengin!
Ka thou diing a, ka pa kawmah ka chiah diing a, a kawmah, Pa, vaan a tungah leh nangmah mitmuh in sil ka bawl sualta;
Na tapa chih taah zong ka hi nawn sih; na kawma kiloh na suaahte khat bangin hung bawl in, ka chi diing, a chi a.
Huin a thou a, a pa kawmah a hungta a. Huleh gamlapi a, a um laiin a pa’n ana mu a, a hehpih mahmah a, a tai a, a ngawngkawi a, huleh a tawpta a.
Huin a tapa’n a kawmah, Pa, vaan a tungah leh nangmah mitmuh in sil ka bawl sualta; na tapa chihtaah zong ka hi nawn sih, a chi a.
Hizongleh a pa’n chu a suaahte kawmah, Pu an hoihpen hung ladoh unla silhsah un; a khut ah zungbuh butsah unla, a keengah keengtophah butsah un.
Huleh bawngnou thautah hung la unla, that un; huchi'n i ne diing a, kipaahtahin i um diing uh;
Ajiahchu hi ka tapa chu a si a, ahung hing kiitta hi; a mang a, a kimu kiitta ahi, a chi a. Huchi'n kipaahtah in a umta uhi.
Huleh a tapa upazaw chu lou ah a um a; Inn ahung tunkuanin sil tumging leh laam thawm a jata a.
Huin a suaahte khat a kou a, Hite bang ata’i leh? chi'n a dong a.
Amahpa’n a kawmah, Na naupa ahung tung a, dam leh hoih a, a muh kiit jiahin na pa’n bawngnou thautah a that ahi, a chi a.
Huin amah chu a lungthahta a, a luut nuamta sih a; Hujiahin a pa chu ahung pawt a, ahung zawl a.

Huin ama’n a dawng a, a pa kawmah, Ngai in, kum hizaatpi hung vaah inga, khatvei mah zong na thupiah juikhial lou inga; huchi'n zong ka lawmte toh nop ka bawl na diingin keelnou khat zong na hung pe ngei sih.
Hizongleh hi na tapa, nohchizuahte kawma na sum teng va zang zouvehpa ahung tun tahin amah diingin bawngnou thautah na gohsahpah hi, a chi a.
Huin a pa’n a kawmah, Tapa, nang ka kawma um zing na hi a, ka neih zousiah zong nanga ahi.
Kipaahtah leh nuamtah a i um diing hilou maw? ajiahchu hi na naupa a si a, ahung hing kiitta hi; a manga, i mu kiitta hi, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n a nungjuite kawmah hi thu zong a soi a, Mi hausa koiaha in sumkoltu khat a nei a; amahpa’n a sum a mawh thangjatsah chi'n a kawmah a heeh va.
Huin amah chu a kou a a kawmah, Na tung thu ka jah hi bangchi ahiai? na sumkol hisaap hung pia in; ajiahchu tukalsiah sumkola pang nawn lou diing na hi, a chi a.
Huin sumkoltupa’n a lungsim in, Bang chi diing kata’i? ka pu in lah ka sumkol hung tawpsah diing ahita a; lei toh lah peih lou ing a; khutdoh diing lah zum inga.
Sumkol ahung tawpsah chianga a inn va ahung umsah theihna diingun ka bawldan diing ka he ta, a chi a.
Huchi'n a pu sumbate chu a kou chiat a, a masapen kawmah, Ka pu a bangzah ahiai na bat? a chi a.
Ama’n, Thau tehna zakhat, a chi a. Huin ama’n a kawmah, Na lehkha la inla, tou kin inla, sawmngaa gial in, a chi a.
Huleh a dong khat kawmah, Nang bangzah ahiai na bat? a chi a. Ama’n, Buh tehna zakhat, a chi a. Huin ama’n, Na lehkha la inla, sawmgiat gial in, a chi a.
Hu sumkoltu dihtatlou chu a pu in a lemtheih jiahin a phatta hi; ajiahchu vaah tate sangin hi khovel tate hi a tulai thu vah a pilzaw uhi.
Ka hung hilh ahi, Dihtatlouhna sum in na lawm diing uh kibawl un; hu a manthai hun chianga kumtuanga umna a nanguh ahung umsah theihna diingun.
Koipouh tawmtakhat tunga ginum chu tampi tungah zong a ginum ahi; huleh koipouh tawmtakhat tunga ginum lou chu tampi tunga zong a ginum sih hi.
Hujiahin dihtat louhna sum tunga bawn na ginum louh uleh kua’n ahiai nanguh sum tah hung kolsah diing?
Huleh midang a tunga bawn na ginum louh uleh, kua’n ahiai nanguh a tah hung pe diing?

Suaah khat in houtu nih nna a tongkop thei sih; bang jiahin i chihleh khat huain khat a lungsiat diing a; ahihlouhleh khat gum in khat a musit diing hi. Pathian nna leh sum nna na tong kop thei sih diing uh, a chi a.
Huleh sum ngaina Pharisaite’n zong hi thu zousiah a ja va, amah a nuihsan va.
Ama'n a kawmvah, Mite mitmuha siamtan tumte na hi uh; hizongleh Pathian in na lungtang uh a he hi; ajiahchu mihing laha paahtawia um chu Pathian mitmuh in sil kihdah huaitah ahi.
Daan leh zawlneite thu John hung um tanchiang a um a; hu kalsiah chu Pathian gam tanchinpha a kisoi a, huleh mi chinin huah pawng luut haam a sawm uhi.
Huleh daan thu neutakhat a man sangin vaan leh lei a bei a baihlamzaw hi.
Koipouh a ji khul a, a dang kiteenpih chu aangkawm ahi; huleh koipouh a pasal in a khulsa kiteenpih chu aangkawm ahi.
Mi hausa koiaha a um a, puan sandup leh puan malngaat a silh a, ni chinin nuamsatahin a um a.
Huleh a min Lazar kichi a pumtanga meima a dim a kotkhaah bula a lupsah veu uh khutdoh khat a um a.
Mi hausapa dohkaan apat khateneng kia pouh neeh vah a ut a; hulou zong uite a hung a, a meimate a liaahsah veu uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, hu khutdohpa chu a si a, angelte’n Abraham aangsungah a pui va; huleh mi hausapa zong a si a, vui in a umta a.
Huleh gawtmun ah gimthuaah in a um a, a daahtou a, gamlapi-a Abraham leh a aangsunga Lazar um chu a muta a.
Huin a kikou a, Pa, Abraham hung khotuah inla, Lazar chu a khutzung muuh tuia diahkawta ka lei hung suvot diingin hung sawl in; ajiahchu hi mei kuang ah ka gim mahmah hi, a chi a.

Hizongleh Abraham in, Tapa, nangma’n na dam laiin sil hoihte na kimuh a, huchibangin Lazar in sil hoihloute a mu chih geeldoh in; hizongleh tu’n chu amah hamuanin a um a, nang gimthuaahsah in na um ahi,

Huleh hite lou zong, kei uleh nanguh kikalah guam nasatah siamin a um hi; hilama kipana na kawmva hung tumte ahung theih louhna diingun; huleh hulama kipana keiuh kawma hung tumte ahung theih louhna diingun, a chi a.
Huin ama’n, Ahihleh, pa, amah chu ka pa inn a sawl diingin ka hung ngen hi.
Ajiahchu unaupasal ngaa ka neia, amahuh va hilh leh; huchilou inchu amah u’zong hi gimthuaahna munah a hungkha diing uh, a chi a.
Abraham in a kawmah, Amahun Mosi leh zawlneite a nei uh; hute thu ngaikhia u’heh, a chi a.
Huin ama’n, Hilou e, pa Abraham, misi laha mi khat a kawmvah va chiah leh a kisiih diing uh, a chi a.
Ama’n a kawmah, Mosi leh zawlneite thu a ngaihkhiah nuam louh uleh misi lah apat mi khat thou kiit mah zongleh a tahsang tuan sih diing uhi, a chi a.
Huin ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, Puuhnate um lou thei ahi sih; hizongleh puuhna umsahtu tung a gih hi!
Hi mineute laha khat zong a suhpuuh sangin a ngawng ah buh gawi zanna suang ohsah in tuilianpi ah kipaailuut leh amah diingin a hoihzaw diing hi.
Pilvaang un; na unaupa’n na tunga sil a bawlsual leh tai in; huleh a kisiih leh ngaidam in.
Ni khat sunga na tunga sagih vei sil a bawlsuala sagih vei na kawma ka kisiih hi chi-a nang lama ahung kiheikiitleh na ngaihdam diing ahi, a chi a.
Huin sawllehte’n Lalpa kawmah, Ka ginna uh khang sah in, a chi va.
Lalpa’n, Ankam tang khat bang ginna na neih uleh hi singtheimin kung kawmah, Na kibotdoh inla tuilianpi ah na kisuanin, na chi diing va, na thu uh a mang diing hi;
Nang u laha koi na hi viai loukai aha, belaam ching aha suaah khat neia, lou apat ahung hun chianga, An va uumpah aw, ana chi diing?
Ka neeh diing hung bawlsah inla, na tai gaah inla, ka neeh a ka dawn zoh masiah hung jenin; huzohchiang in nang nein na dawn diing, chizaw lou diing ahiai mah?
Ama’n hu suaahpa chu a kawma thu kipia banga a bawl jiahin a paahta eimah? Ka gingta sih.
Huchimah bangin nangun zong na kawmva thupiah zousiah na bawlzoh chiangun, Suaah phatuam lou ka hi uh; ka bawl diing mawnguh ahi ka bawl uh, chi un, a chi a.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jerusalem zuana a chiahin Samaria, leh Galili gamgi jul a tawn peh a;
Huleh khua khata a luut leh phaah sawm in ana lamtuah va, amahuh chu gamlapi ah a ding va;
Huleh aw ngaihtahin a kikou va, Jesu, Houtupa, Hung khotuah in, a chi va.
Huleh amahuh a muh tahin ama’n a kawmvah, Chiah unla, siampute va kiensah un, a chi a. Huleh hichi ahung hi a, a chiah laiun ahung siangthouta uhi.
Huleh a lahva khat in a damta chih ahung kiheet tahin a kihkiita, aw ngaihtahin Pathian a paahtawi a,
Jesu keeng bulah a bohkhup a, kipaahthu a soi hi; huleh amah chu Samarimi ahi.
Huin Jesu’n a dawng a, Sawm hilou maw suhsiangthoua um? Himahleh kuaahte khoia umta?
Hi meelheet louhpa chih louh Pathian paahtawi diing a hung kihkiit kuamah a kimu sih a, a chi a.
Huin ama’n a kawmah, Thou inla, chiahta in; na ginna in ahung damsahta hi, a chi a.
Huleh Pharisaite’n Pathian gam hung tun hun diing a dot uleh ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Pathian gam chu muhtheih in ahung tung sih;
Huleh, En un, hitah ah, ahihlouhleh en un hutah ah, zong a chi sih diing uh: bang jiahin i chih leh ngai un, Pathian gam chu na lahvah a um hi, a chi a.
Huin ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, Mihing Tapa damlai nite ni khat beeh mu nuam mahmah ngal a, na muh theih louh hun uh ahung tung diing.
Huchian na kawmvah, En un hitah ah; ahihlouhleh en un hutah ah, ahung chi diing va; chiah sih unla, a nung uh zong jui sih un.
Ajiahchu kawlphe vaan nuai langkhata a pheta, vaan nuai lehlam tanpha a salhvaah mahbangin mihing Tapa zong ahung niin ahi diing.
Hizongleh hu ma in sil tampi a thuaah diing a, tulai khang thahte deih louh in a um diing hi.
Noah damlaia sil umdan bangin mihing Tapa hungkiit ni chiangin zong ahi diing hi.
Noah kuang a a luut a, tuijiin ahung tunga, a bawnva a suhlup ni a tun masiah a neun, a dawn va, ji a nei va, huleh ji leh ta in a kipetuah uh.
Huchimah bangin Lot damlaiin zong a um a; a ne un a dawn va, a lei un a zuah va; huleh a suan va, a lam uh;
Hizongleh Sodom khua apat Lot a pawt niin vaan apatin mei leh kaat a zu a, a bawnun a sulumta hi.
Huchimah bangin mihing Tapa hung kilaah ni chiangin ahi diing hi.
Hu ni chian koipouh inn tunga um chu inn sunga a thuampua la diingin kum sih heh; huleh huchimahbangin koipouh loua um zong hung kihkiit sih heh.
Lot ji he zing un.
Mi koipouh a hinna humbitna hawlin a taan diing a; huleh koipouh a hinna taanin a humbit diing uhi.
Ka hung hilh ahi, hu janin lupna khatah mi nih a lum diing a, khat laahmang in a um diing a, khat nuutsiat in a um diing.
Numei nih buh gawijan in a um diing a; khat laahmang in a um diing a, khat nuutsiat in a um diing.
Lou ah mi nih a um diing va; khat chu laahmang in a um diing a, khat chu nuutsiat in a um diing, a chi a.
Huin amahun a dawng va, a kawmah, Khoiah e, Lalpa? a chi va. Ama’n a kawmvah, Saluang umna photah musa nete zong a umkhawm diing uh, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n mihingte’n lungke loua a haamtei zing diing uh ahi chih heetna diingin a kawmvah tehkhinthu khat a soi a;
Khopi khatah Pathian lau lou, huleh mihing zong bangmah a sim lou vaihawmtu khat a um a.
Huleh hu khosungah meithai khatmah a um a; amahnu chu a kawma hungin, Ka langpa tungah phuba hung laahsah in, ahung chi a.
Huleh amah chu tomkhat sunga ut sih a; hizongleh a nungin a lungsim in, Pathian lau louin mihing bangmahin sim sih mahleng,
Hi meithainu’n ahung suhbuai jiahin a phuba ka laahsah diing; huchilou inchu ahung thithena in ahung sutawlkha diing, a chi a.
Huleh Lalpa’n, Vaihawmtu dihtatlou thusoi chu ngai un.
A tungvah jaidoh sawt zong mahleh a miteelte, suun leh jana amah koutute phuba chu Pathian in laahsah lou diing ahiai mah?
Ka hung hilh ahi, ama’n a phuba uh a laahsahpah diing hi. Hizongleh mihing Tapa ahung chiangin leitung ah ginna ahung mu na diai? a chi a.
Huleh ama’n mi amahuh midihtat a kingaihtuaha midangte musit koite aha kawmah hi tehkhinthu a soi a.
Mi nih Pathian biahinn ah haamtei diingin a chiahtou va; khat chu Pharisai ahi a, huleh khat chu siahdongtu ahi.
Pharisaipa chu a dinga, amah chauhin a haamtei a, Pathian, midang negute, tawn dihloute, aangkawmte bang ka hih louha, hi siahdongtu bang zong ka hih louh jiahin na tungah ka kipaah hi.
Hafta khat sungin an nihvei ka ngawl a, ka neih zousiah sawma khat ka pe veu hi, a chi a.
Huleh siahdongtu chu gamlataha dingin, vaanlam zong a en ngam sih a, himahleh, Pathian, kei misual tungah zahngai in, chi'n a awm a tuum a.

Ka hung hilh ahi, khatpen sangin hipa chu siamtang in a inn ah a chiahsuhta hi; ajiahchu mi amah kingailoupi photmah a ngiam diing a; huleh mi amah kingaingiam photmah chu tawisangin a um diing, a chi a.
Huleh ana khoih diingin a kawmah naungeehte ahung pui va; hizongleh nungjuite’n a muhun amahuh ana tai uh a.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh a kou a, Naupang neute ka kawmah hungsah unla, khaam sih un; bang jiahin i chih leh Pathian gam chu huchibangte a ahi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Koi hizongleh Pathian gam naupang neute banga kipaahpih lou chu a sungah a luut hial sih diing, a chi a.
Huleh vaihawmtu koiaha in a kawmah, Houtupa hoih, kumtuang hinna ka tan theihna diingin bang ahiai ka bawl diing? chi'n a donga.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Bang diinga hoih hung chi na hiai? khat chauh chih louh koimah a hoih a um sih, huchu Pathian ahi.
Thupiahte na he hilou maw? Aangkawm sin, Tual that sin, Gu sin, Heetpihtu tahlouin pangsin, Na pa leh na nu zahbawl in, chihte, a chi a.
Ama’n, Hite zousiah ka naupan apata ka juih veh ahi, a chi a.
Jesu’n hi thute a jah tahin, a kawmah, Sil khat na sam nalai hi, na neih zousiah zuah inla mi zawngte kawmah hawmin, huchi'n vaan ah gou na nei diing; huleh hung inla, hung jui in, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n hi chu a jahin a lungkham mahmah a; ajiahchu mihausa mahmah ahi.
Huin Jesu’n a lungkham mahmah chih a muh in, Mihausate diingin Pathian gam a luut hahsa hina mai e!
Ajiahchu mi hausa Pathian gam a a luut sangin sangawngsaau phinbil vanga a luut paisuaah a baih zaw hi, a chi a.
Huin hu thu jatute’n, Huchi ahihleh koi hutdamin a um zou diai? a chi va.
Huin ama’n, Mihing diing a sil hithei lou chu Pathian diingin ahi thei hi, a chi a.
Huin Peter in, En in, kei un bangkim nusiain ka hung jui uhi, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Pathian gam jiaha a inn aha, a nulepa aha, a unaute aha, a ji aha, a tate aha nusia chu,
Tu damsung ngeia a leh tampi, huleh hun hung tung diing a kumtuang hinna toh mulou diing koimah a um sih, a chi a.
Huin ama’n sawmlenihte a puituam a, a kawmvah, Ngai un, Jerusalem khua a chiahtou diing i hi a; mihing Tapa tungtaang thu a zawlneite thugelh zousiah ahung taangtung diing hi.
Ajiahchu amah hi Jentelte khutah piahkhiah ahi diing a; chiamnuih bawlna’n a zang diing va; zumhuaitaha bawl in chil a siatkhum diing uh;
Huleh a vo diing va, a that diing uh; huleh ni thum ni’n a thou kiit diing, a chi a.
Amahun hi silte chu a hesiam sih va; hi thu chu a lahvah phual in a um a, thu kisoite zong a he sih uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jeriko khua a tun kuanin mittaw koi ahakhat lamgeiah khutdohin ana toua.
Ama’n mipi pai thawm ging a ja a, bangchi thu ahitai chi'n a dong a.
Amah un, Nazareth Jesu a pai ahi, chi'n a hilh va.
Huin ama’n, Jesu, nang David Tapa, hung khotuah in, chi’n a kikou a.
Huleh a masate’n amah chu sip diingin a tai va; hizongleh amah chu, David Tapa, hung khotuah in, chih a kihahkou sema.
Huin Jesu a dinga, amah chu a kawma hung pui diingin thu a pia a; huleh Bang diinga ahung tunin ana donga,
Na tungah bang hung bawlsah leng na uh ei? a chi a. Ama’n, Lalpa, muhtheih ka ut hi, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Mutheita in; na ginna in ahung damsah ahi, a chi a.
Huin thakhat in ahung mutheita a, Pathian paahtawi kawmin amah a juita a; huleh mi zousiah in hi a muh tahun Pathian a phat ta uhi.
Huleh Jesu chu Jeriko khua ah a luut a, a paisuaah a.
Huleh ngai in, mi khat a min Zakai kichi, siahdong houtu a um a, amah chu mi hausatah ahi.
Huleh ama’n Jesu chu mi bangtobang ahiai chih muh a tum a; hizongleh mipi lahah a din ngiam jiahin a muthei sih hi.
Huchi'n a taikhelh a, a en diingin theipi dawnah a kal a; ama’n hu lampi hung tawn diing ahihjiahin.
Jesu hu mun ahung tunin a daahtou a, amah chu a mu a a kawmah, Zakai, kintahin hung kum in; ajiahchu tuni’n na inn a tung diing ka hi, a chi a.
Huin kintahin ahung kum a, kipaahtahin amah chu a zintunta hi.
Huleh amahun hichu a muh tahun, Misual kawma tung diingin a chiahta ve, chi'n a phun uh a.
Huleh Zakai chu a dinga, Lalpa kawmah, Ngai in, Lalpa, ka sum kimkhat tagahte kawmah ka pe diing a; huleh mi thuampua bangaha dihloutaha ka laah a um leh a lehli in ka dit diing, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, Tuni’n hi inn ah hutdamna ahung tungta hi, amah zong Abraham tapa ahi ngal a.
Ajiahchu beimangte hawl diing leh hundam diing a mihing Tapa chu hung ahi, a chi a.
Huleh hi thute a ngaihkhiah laiun Jerusalem a naih taah jiah leh Pathian gam hung langpah diing a a ngaihtuah jiahun tehkhinthu khat a soi beh a.
Ama’n hujiahin a soi a, Mi loupi koi ahakhat a lalna gam diing khat va neia, hung kilehkiit diingin kho gamlatah ah a chiah a.
Huleh ama’n a suaah sawmte a koua, sanasum sawm a kawmvah a pia a, huleh, Ka hung kiit masiah hikhu in sumkawl na vei un, a kawmvah a chi a.
Hizongleh a mite’n amah chu a hua va, Hipa ka tungva vaihawm diingin ka deih sih uh, chi'n a nungah palai a taisah uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, gam chu va nei a ahung kilehkiitin, a sum veipungdan uh heetna diingin a suaah sum a piahte chu a kawmah a kousah a.
Khatnapa chu a hung a, Lalpa na sanasum sawmin a pung hi, a chi a.
Ama’n a kawmah, Hoih e, nang suaah pha; sil tawmtakhat tunga na ginum jiahin kho sawm tungah vaihawmtu in pangin, a chi a.
Huin a nihnapa a hung a, Lalpa, na sanasum nga in a pung hi, a chi a.
Ama’n huchimahbangin a kawmah, Nang zong kho ngaa tungah vaihawmtu in pang in, a chi a.
Huleh a dang a hung a, Lalpa, en in, na sanasum hi-ah a um hi, kisiaahna puana tuam in ka koih heh hi;
Ajiahchu mi gumtat na hi a ka hung lau hi; na koih louh bang na la veu a, huleh na tuh louh bang na aat veu hi, a chi a.
Ama’n a kawmah, Nang suaah gilou, na kamsuah ngei in siamlouh ka hung tangsah diing. Mi gum tat ka hiha, ka koih louhna a ka laah veua, huleh ka tuh louhna a ka aat veu na he hi.
Huchi ahihleh ka hung tuncha ka sum a pung toh ka laah theih diing a bangchidana ka sum chu sum-inn a na koih lou na hiai? a chi a.
Huin ama’n a kawma dingte kawmah, A sanasum chu laahsah unla, sawm neipa kawmah pia un, a chi a.
(Huin amahun a kawmah, Lalpa, ama’n sanasum sawm a nei hi, a chi va; )
Ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, A nei taphot chu piahbeh ahi diing a, huleh a nei lou chu a neihsun zong laahsah ahi diing hi.
Hizongleh hu ka meelmate, a tungva ka vaihawm diing deihloute chu hung pui unla, ka ma-ah that un, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n huchia a soi zohin a makai a, Jerusalem lam zuanin a chiah tou va.
Huleh hichi ahung hia, Olive kichi taanga Bethphage leh Bethani kho kawm naih ahung tunun a nungjuite laha mi nih a sawl a,
Na mazawn va khua ah va chiah unla, na luut tahun sabiltung nou koimah tuanna ngei nai louh na va mu diing uh; huchu hung suut unla, hung kai un.
Huleh mi koipouh in, Bang diinga na suut uh ahiai? chia ahung dot leh, Lalpa’n a mamoh ahi, chi'n a kawmah soi un, a chi a.
Huleh a sawlte chu a va chiahta va, a kawmva a soi bang ngei in a va mu uh.
Huleh sabiltung nou chu a suut uleh a neite’n a kawmvah, Sabiltung nou bang diinga na suut uh ahiai? a chi va.
Amahun, Lalpa’n a mamoh ahi, a chi va.
Huin Jesu kawmah ahung kai va; huleh sabiltung nou tungah a puante uh a phah va, a tungah Jesu a tuangsah uh.
Huleh a chiah laiin lampi ah a puante uh a phah va.
Huleh ahung tun kuana Olive taang liamsuhna diing tah ah nungjui mipi zousiah in a sil loupi bawlte zousiah a muh jiahun a kipaah va, aw ngaihtahin Pathian a paahtawi va.
Lalpa mina hung Kumpipa chu a hampha hi; vaan ah lemthu leeng henla, tungnungpen ah loupina um heh, chi'n.
Huin mipi laha Pharisai khenkhat in a kawmah, Houtupa, na nungjuite tai in, a chi va.
Ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Ka hung hilh ahi, hite a sip unchu suang te a kikoudohpah diing uh, a chi a.
Huleh a tun kuanin khopi chu a mu-a, a kahkhum a.
Aw, nang mahmah in tu na hun sung beehin na hamuanna thu hung he tamai lechin maw! himahleh tuin chu na mit apat a kiphual ta hi.
Ajiahchu hitobang nite na tungah ahung tung diing, na gaalte’n na kimvelah leikua a tou diing va; na kiimkotin pawt thei louin ahung uumkhum diing uh.
Huleh nang leh na sunga na tate tualsaatna’n ahung nei diing va, na sungah suang khatbeeh kithuap in a nuse sih diing uh; ahung kiveh lai nite na heet louh jiahin, chi'n.
Huin amah chu Pathian biahinn ah a luut a, sil zuahte leh leite a nohdoh a.
A kawmvah, Ka inn chu haamteina inn ahi, chih gelh ahi; hizongleh nangun gutate kua in na siamta uh, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n ni chinin Pathian biahinn ah thu a hilh a. Hizongleh siampu lalte leh lehkhagialtute leh mipi houtute’n amah suhmang a tum uh.
Himahleh mipi zousiah in phatuamngaitaha a thu a ngaihkhiah zing jiahun a lohnadan diing a he sih uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Pathian biahinn a mite thu a hilh a, tanchinpha a soi laiin, ni khat chu siampu lalte leh lehkhagialtute upa haw toh a kawmah ahung va.
Huchi'n a kawmah, Bang thuneihna in ahiai hi silte na bawl? hung hilh in, a chi va.
Ama’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Ken zong sil khat ka hung dong diing, hung dawng un;
John baptisma hi vaan a kipan ahiai, mihinga kipan? a chi a.
Huin amahuh chu a kingaihtuah va, Vaan apat ahi chi leilah, Ahihleh bang diinga gingta lou, ahung chi diing a,
Huleh, Mihinga kipan ahi chi leilah mipi zousiah in suang in ahung sep diing uh; ajiahchu John hi zawlnei ahi a chiveh ngal va, a chi va.
Huin amahun, Khoi apat ahih ka soi thei sih uh, chi'n a dawng va.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, Ken zong bang thuneihna-a hi silte bawl ka hiai chih ka hung hilh sih diing hi, a chi a.
Huin mipite kawmah hi tehkhinthu a soi a; Mi koi ahakhat in grephuan a bawla; lou enkoltu kawmah hohloh diingin a pia a; huleh gam tuamah sawtpi taam diingin a chiahta hi.
