Huleh a gahloh hunin grep huana gah chu ana piah diingun lou enkoltute kawmah suaah khat a sawl a; hizongleh lou enkoltute’n amah chu ana vua va, khutguaahin a sawlmangta uh.
Huin ama’n suaah dang a sawl kiit a; amah zong ana vua va, zumhuai tahin a bawl va, khutguaahin a sawlmangta uh.
Huin ama’n a thumna a sawl kiita; huleh amah zong ana suliam va, a delhdohta uhi.
Huin grep huan neitu in, Bang chi bawl diing ka diai? ka tapa deihtah ka sawl diing hi, amah beeh a muh chiangun ana zahtaatkha moh sih diing uh, a chi a.
Hizongleh lou enkoltute’n amah a muh tahun, Hipa gouluahtu diing chu ahi; a gou i tan theihna diingin i that diing uh, chi'n a kihou va.
Huchi'n grep huan apat a delhdoh va, a thatta uhi Ahihleh grep huan neitu in a tungvah bangchi’n a bawl diai le?
Ahung diing a, lou enkoltute chu a sumang diing a, huleh grep huan chu mi dangte kawmah a pe diing hi, a chi a. Amahun hi a jah tahun, Huchi lawm lawm zaw tundah heh, a chi va.
Huin ama’n amahuh a ena, Ahihleh hi thu kigial bang ahiai? Inn bawltute suang deih louh, hu pentah chu a ning a suang poimohpen ahung hita, chih hi.
Koipouh hi suang tunga puuh chu a kitatgawp diing a; huleh a kiahkhum photmahte chu a gawijan diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh hulai mahin siampu lalte leh lehkhagialtute’n amah mat a tum va; hizongleh mipite a lau uh; ajiahchu hu tehkhinthu amahuh demna-a a soi ahi chih a he uhi.
Huin amah chu a taang va, gam optu vaihawmna leh thuneihna a, a tut theihna diingun a thusoi khial man diingin midih kipang enkhemi a sawlkheta uh.
Huleh amahun a kawmah, Houtupa, dihtahin na soia, na hilh veu, huleh koimah khentuam nei louin Pathian lampi dihtahin na hilh ahi chih ka he uh.
Kei uh diing a Kaisar kawm a siah tawi siang ahiai, sianglou? chi'n a dong va.
Hizongleh ama’n a doha bawl uh a he a, a kawmvah, Bang diinga hung ze-et na hi viai?
Makhai khat hung ensah un. Koi lim leh koi min ahiai tuang? a chi a. Amah un a dawng va, Kaisar-a, a chi va.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Hujiahin Kaisar silte chu Kaisar kawmah pia unla, Pathian silte chu Pathian kawmah pia un, a chi a.
Huin mipite ma-ah a thusoi khial mat diing a mu sih va; a dawnna chu limdang a sa mahmah va, a sipta uhi.
Huzohin misi thohkiitna a um sih chi Sadukaite laha mi hunkhop a kawmah a hung va; amah chu a dong va;
Houtupa, Mosi’n, Koipouh a unaupa in ji nei a, ta bei a, a sihsan leh a naupa in a ji a luah diing a, a upa diingin chi a haahsah diing ahi, chi'n ahung gelhsah hi.
Huchi'n unau pasal sagih a um a; a upa penin ji a neia, ta nei louin a si a.
Huin a nihna in a luah a, ta nei louin a si a.
Huin a thumna in a luah a, huchimahbangin sagihin a nei va, ta nei louin a si chiatta uh.
A bawnva nungah numeinu zong a sita hi.
Hujiahin thohkiit ni chiangin amahnu chu koipen ji ahita diai? sagihin ji in a nei chiat ngal va, a chi va,
Jesu’n a dawng a kawmvah, Hi khovel tate chu a kiteeng va, huleh ji leh ta in a kipia uh;
Hizongleh hu khovel luah taah diing leh misi lah apat thohkiitna-a tel taah diing a guatte chu a kiteeng sih va, ji leh ta in zong a kinei sih uh;
Amah u’chu si zong a sithei nawn sih uh; ajiahchu angelte bang ahi va; huleh thohkiitna tate ahihjiahun Pathian tate ahi uh.
Huchi'n misite kaihthohin a um chih Mosi’n zong loubawh munah, Lalpa chu Abraham Pathian, Isaak Pathian, huleh Jakob Pathian a chih laiin a hesah hi.
Huchi'n amah chu misi Pathian ahi sih a, mihing Pathian ahi zaw hi; ajiahchu amah ngaihin mi zousiah a hing hi, a chi a.
Huin lehkhagialtu koite ahain a dawng va, Houtupa, na soi dih ngeel hi, a chi va.
Hu nungin amahun thudang mawngmawng a dong ngam nawn ta sih uhi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Khrist chu David tapa ahi bangchidana a chih uh ahiai?
Amah David ngei in Psalm bu ah, Lalpa’n ka Lalpa kawmah, Ka jiat lamah touin,
Na meelmate na keeng ngahna a ka bawl masiah, a chi a.
Hujiahin David in amah chu Lalpa a chihleh bangchidana a tapa hi ahiai? a chi a.
Huzohin mipi kikhawmte zousiah jahin a nungjuite kawmah,
Puannaah tual silha vaah uh, dawlmunte-a chibai buuh bang, kikhopna inn a touna hoihpente leh gual vaahna a mun hoihpente tan ngaina lehkhagialtute lahah kiveeng un.
Meithaite innsung a negam va, mi heemna in sawtpipi a haamtei uh; huchibang mite’n chu siamlouh a hahtan sem diing uhi, a chi a.
Huleh a daahdoh a, mi hausate’n sumkholna-a sum a khiah lai uh a mu a.
Huleh ama’n meithainu zawngtah khat in paisa san nih a khiah lai zong a mu a.
Huin ama’n, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, amahuh zousiah sangin hi meithai zawngnuin a khetam zaw hi.
Bang jiahin i chih leh hite zousiah in a neih tuang uh Pathian thohlawmah a khia va; hizongleh ama’n chu a hinna diing a a neihsun teng a khe veh hi, a chi a.
Huleh koite ahain Pathian biahinn thu, suang hoihtahte leh silpiahte-a jep hoih a hihdan a soi uleh ama’n,
Hi na sil muhte uh ahihleh, suhchim louha suang khat tunga khat kichiang mawngmawng a um louh nite ahung tung diing hi, a chi a.
Amahun, Houtupa, hi silte bangchih chia’n ahung um diai? huleh hi silte ahung tun diing chiangin heetsahna bang ahung um diai? chi'n a dong va.
Huin ama’n, Heema na um louhna diingun pilvaang un; ajiahchu Khrist ka hi, huleh a hun tung diing ahita, chi'n mi tampite ka minin ahung diing uh; hujiahin amahuh jui sih un.
Amahvang kidou thu leh buai thute na jah chiangun lau sih un; ajiahchu hi silte hung tung masa diing mawng ahi; hizongleh a tawpna chu a tungpah nai sih diing hi, a chia.
Huzohin ama’n a kawmvah, Nam tuamin nam tuam, huleh gam tuamin gam tuam a dou diing;
Mun tuam tuamah jil nasatahin a liing diing a, kialte hung tungin, hiite ahung leeng diing; huleh vaan apatin sil lauhuaite leh chiamchihna loupite ahung um diing hi.
Hizongleh hi silte zousiah a tunma in nanguh ahung man diing va, kikhopna inn leh suangkul ahte hung puiin ahung bawlgenthei diing va, ka min jalin kumpipate leh vaihawmtute ma-ah ahung pui diing uh.
Huleh hichu nanguh diingin heetsahna ahi diing.
Hujiahin bangchi dawn diing chih ngaihtuah masa lou diingin na lungtang vah kisukip un;
Ajiahchu na meelma zousiahun ahung dou va, ahung soisel theih louh diinguh kam leh pilna ka hung pe diing hi.
Huleh na nulepate uh, na unaute uh, na behte uleh na lawmteun zong ahung mansah diing va; na lahva khenkhat chu ahung sulum diing uh.
Huleh ka min jiahin mi zousiah huat in na um diing uh.
Hizongleh na lu va samzang khat zong a mangthai sih diing hi.
Na kuhkalna vah na hinna uh na humbit diing uhi.
Huleh sepaihte’n Jerusalem a umkhum uh na muh chiangun a manthaina diing a naita chih he un.
Hu hun chiangin Judia gam a umte taang ah taimang u’heh; a sunga umte zong pawtdoh u’heh; huleh gam a umte zong a sungah luut sih u’heh.
Ajiahchu thu kigial zousiah a taangtun na diing a hu nite chu phubalah ni ahi diing.
Hizongleh hu ni chiangin gaaite leh naungeeh nawiteep neite a tunguh a gih hi! ajiahchu gam sungah hahsatna nasatah leh hi mite tungah lungthahna tung diing ahi.
Huleh amahuh chu namsaau hia min a si diing va, nam chin kawmah suaaha puiin a um diing uh; huleh Jentelte hun a buchin masiah Jerusalem chu Jentelte totdeenin a um diing hi.
Huleh ni leh, ha leh aahsite bangah chiamchihna a um diing a; leitung ah nam chin hahsatna leh mangbatna a um diing; tui khang lian kinawhin a mau vengvung diing.
Mite chu launa jiah leh khovel a sil hung tung diingte ngaihtuahna jiahin a sibup diing uh; ajiahchu vaan silbawltheihnate kisuliing diing ahi.
Hutah chiangin amahun mihing Tapa chu silbawltheihna leh loupina nasatah toh meipi laha hung a mu diing uh.
Huleh hi silte ahung tun pat chiangin entou unla, daahdoh un; ajiahchu na tatna uh a naita hi, a chi a.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, tehkhinthu khat a soi a; Theipi kung leh sing kung zousiah en un;
A nah ahung sel tah chiangin nipi ahung naita chih na mu va na kiheet uhi.
Huchimahbangin hi silte hung tun na muhchian un Pathian gam ahung naita chih he un.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Sil zousiah a taangtun veh masiah tulai khang thahte a mang sih diing uh.
Vaan leh lei a bei diing a, hizongleh ka thu a bei sih diing hi.
Pilvaang un; huchilou inchu neeh vah taahluat leh, zukham leh, damsung khosah ngaihtuahna in na lungtang uh a dim talokha diing a, huchi'n hu ni na heet louh kalun ahung tung guih kha diing hi.
Ajiahchu thaang kipel banga leitung pumpia umte zousiah tunga tung chiat diing ahi.
Hujiahin hi sil hung tung diing zousiahte peel taah leh, mihing Tapa ma-a diing taah diing a guat na hih theihna diingun bangchih laipouhin haamtei unla, ngaihsah zing un, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n suun laiin Pathian biahinn ah thu a hilh a; jan chiangin a pawtdoha, Olive taang kichi ah ava giah veu hi.
Huleh mipite zousiah chu jingkalin a kawmah biahinn ah a thu ngaikhe diingin ahung uhi.
Huleh tanghou tolsoh louh ankuang luina chiahkaan Kuut a chih uh ahung naita a.
Siampu lalte leh lehkhagialtute’n amah a thah theihna diing uh a ngaihtuah va; mipite laha lau uh a.
Huin sawmlenihte laha tel Juda Iskariot a chih uh sungah Setan a luut a.
Huleh a chiahta a, a kawmva Jesu a matsah theihna diing daan siampu lalte leh houtute a va kihoupih a.
Huin amahuh chu a kipaah mahmah va, amah chu sum piah diingin ana chiamta uhi.
Huleh ama’n lem a sa a, mipi um louh kal khata matsahna diing lemtaang a hawlta hi.
Huin tanghou tol sohlouh ni chiahkaan Kuut belaamnou gohna ni diing ahung tung ta a.
Ama’n Peter leh John a sawla, Chiah unla, chiahkaan kuut i neeh diingun hung va bawlsah un, a chi a.
Huin amahun a kawmah, Khoitah ah va bawlte le ung na deih ei? a chi va.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Ngai un, khopi sunga na luut chiangun tuibeel pua pasal khat in ahung na tuaah diing a; a luutna inn ah juiluut un.
Huleh a inn neitu kawmah, Houtupa’n, ka nungjuite toh chiahkaan kuut ka neeh na diing uh mikhual pindan khoitah ahiai ahung chi hi, na chi diing uh;
Huleh ama’n pindan tungnung lianpi, guatsa diam khat ahung na ensah diing; huah bawl un, a chi a.
Huin a chiah va, a kawmva a soi bangin a muta va; huleh chiahkaan kuut chu a bawlta uhi.
Huleh ahun ahung chin tahin a touta a, sawmlenihte’n zong a toupih va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Ka thuaah ma in hi chiahkaan kuut nang u’toh neehkhawm ka ut mahmah hi;
Ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, Pathian gam a suhbukim ahih masiah hikhu ka ne nawn sih diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh nou a la a, kipaah thu a soi zohin, Hi la unla, kihawm un;
Ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, Pathian gam ahung tun masiah grep gah tui ka dawn nawn sih diing hi, a chi a.
Huin tanghou a la a, kipaahthu a soi zohin a balkeeha, a kawmvah a pia a, Hichu ka tahsa, nanguh diing a piah chu ahi; na hung heet zing na diingun hichu bawl veu un, a chi a.
Huchimahbangin nitaah an neeh zohin nou zong a la a, Hi nou ka sisana thuhun thah, nanguh diing a luang khia chu ahi.
Hizongleh, ngai un, ahung mansahtu diing khat chu ka kawmah dohkaan tungah a um hi.
Tahzetin mihing Tapa chu a kiguatsa bangjelin a chiah hi; hizongleh a mansahtupa tung a gih hi! a chi a.
Huin amahuh chu hitobang bawl diing a lahva koipen hi diing ahiai chi'n a kidongtuahta uhi.
Huleh amah u’lahah koiaha lianpena seh diing chi-a kinialna zong a um a.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Jentelte kumpipate chu a tungvah lal tahin a um va; huleh a tungva thuneitute chu mi hoihna diing bawltute a chih uh;
Hizongleh nang u’chu huchibang na hi sih diing uh; na lahva lianpen chu naupang zaw bangin um henla; huleh a loupipen chu neehbawltu bangin um zaw heh.
Ajiahchu, ankuang uumtu leh neehbawltu koi ahiai lian zaw? Ankuang uumtu hizaw lou ahiai mah? hizongleh kei chu na lahvah neehbawltu bangin ka um hi.
Nanguh chu heemna ka tuaah sung siaha hung umpihtute na hi uhi.
Huleh ka Pa’n kei gam ahung guatsah bangin nanguh diingin gam ka hung guatsah hi.
Ka gam a ka dohkaana na neeh va, na dawn va, huleh Israel nam sawmlenihte vaihawmsaha laltouphaha na tou theihna diingun, a chi a.
Huin Lalpa’n, Simon, Simon, ngai in, Setan in buh banga ahung seep theihna diingin ahung ngen hi.
Hizongleh na ginna a man louhna diingin ka hung haamteisah hi; na kihei kiit chiangin na unaute sukip in, a chi a.
Huin ama’n a kawmah, Lalpa, nang toh suangkul leh sihna ah zong chiah ka ngaap hi, a chi a.
Huin ama’n, Peter, ka hung hilh ahi, thumvei na hung kiheetmohbawl masiah tuni’n aah a khuang sih diing, a chi a.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Nanguh dangka-ip beia, sakhau beia, huleh keengtophah beia ka hung sawl laiin sil khatbeeh na kitasam viai mah? a chi a. Amahun, Tasam lou, a chi va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, hizongleh tuin chu dangka-ip nei in keng henla, huchimahbangin sakhau nei in zong; huleh namsaau nei louin a puan zuah henla, lei heh.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh ka hung hilh ahi, Amah chu daan botsetute lahah a sim tel uh chih gelh chu ka tungah a taangtung diing him ahi; ajiahchu ka tungtaang thute tungkim ahita, a chi a.
Huin amahun, En in, Lalpa, hi-ah namsaau nih a um hi, a chi va Ama’n a kawmvah, A hun hi, a chi a.
Huin a pawtdoh a, a ngeina bangin Olive taang ah a chiah a; huleh a nungjuite’n zong a jui va.
Huleh a mun a tun un ama’n a kawmvah, Heemna-a na luut louhna diingun haamtei un, a chi a.
Huin amah chu suang a sehphaah tan diing bangah a chiahtuam a, a khupdin a; huleh a haamtei a;
Pa, lem na sah a ahihleh hi nou chu ka kawma kipanin lasuanin; hizongleh kei thu hilouin nang thuthu hizaw heh, a chi a.
Huin vaan apatin angel khat a kawmah ahung kilaah a, amah ahung suhaat a.
Huin amah chu a gim mahmah a, phatuam ngai josemin a haamtei a; huleh a khosa chu sisan khal liantah bangin leiah ava kheta a.
Huleh a haamtei zoh-a ahung thohdoh tahin a nungjuite kawmah a hung a, amahuh chu lungkham jiaha ihmuin ahung mu a.
Huin a kawmvah, Bang diinga ihmu na hi viai? Heemna-a na luut louhna diingun thou unla haamtei un, a chi a.
Huleh thu a soi lai tahin, ngai un, mipi hon khat a hung a, huleh sawmlenihte laha khat, Juda a chih uh ahung makaia, tawp tum in Jesu kawm a naih a.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmah, Juda, mihing Tapa hi tawpa mansah na hi maw? a chi a.
A kiima mi umte’n sil hung um diing chu a muhun, Lalpa, namsaauin ka saat diviai? a chi va.
Huleh a lahva mi khat in siampu lal suaahpa a saata, a bil jiatlam a saat khiahsah a.
Huin Jesu’n ahoupih a, Hichi chiang chu phal un, a chi a Huin a bil chu a khoih a, a sudamta hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawma hung siampu lalte leh, Pathian biahinn houtute leh, upate kawmah, Guta man diing bang hialin namsaau leh khetbuuh tawiin na hung uh ahi maw?
Na kawmva ni china Pathian biahinn a ka um laiin lah ka tungah khut na ha hial sih va; hizongleh tu hi na hun uh ahi, huleh mial thuneihna toh, a chi a.
Huin amah chu a man va, a pui va, siampu lal inn sungah a puiluut uhi. Huleh Peter in gamlatahah agaal juih a.
Huleh amahun huang sung laiah mei a chih va, a toukhawm va, Peter chu a lahvah a va tou a.
Huleh mei kawma a tou laiin nungaah koiaha in a mu a, ngun tahin a ena, Hipa zong a kawma um ahi, a chi a.
Ama’n, Numei, amah ka he sih hi chi'n a kiheetmohbawl a.
Huleh tomkhat zouin midang khat in a mu kiita, Nang zong a lahva mi na hi, a chi a. Huin Peter in, Ka hi sih, mihing, a chi a.
Huleh pung khat vel nungin midang khat in, Hipa zong a kawma um himah tham ve aw, Galilimi ahi ngal a, a chi tenten a.
Peter in, Na thusoi ka he sih, mihing, a chi a. Huin a thusoi laitahin aah ahung khuangta a.
Huin Lalpa chu a kiheia, Peter a ena Peter in, Tuni’n aahkhuan ma in thumvei na hung kiheetmohbawl diing, chia Lalpa’n a kawma a chih chu ahung hedohta a.
Huin Peter chu a pawtdoh a, a kap huthutta hi.
Huleh Jesu mantute’n amah chu chiamnuih bawlna’n a zang va, a vua va.
Huleh amaikaan zohun a maai a beeng va, Koi ahiai hung vua? soi in, chi'n a dong va.
Huleh thudang tampiin amah soisia in a kawh uhi.
Huleh kho vaah tahin vaantaang upate leh, siampu lalte leh, lehkhagialtute ahung kikhawm va, a vaihawmna ma- vah a puiluut va;
Khrist na hiai mah? hung hilh in, a chi va Ama’n a kawmvah, Hung hilh mah zongleng na gingta sih diing uh;
Huleh ke'n zong nanguh thu hung dong leng na hung dawng saam sih diing va, chiah lah na hung chiahsah sih diing uh;
Tukalsiah mihing Tapa chu Pathian silbawltheihna jiatlam ah a tou ta diing hi, a chi a.
Huin a bawnun, Ahihleh, Pathian Tapa na hi maw leh? a chi va. Ama’n a kawmvah, Na hung chih bangun ka hi, a chi a.
Huin amahun, Heetsahna dang bang i ngai nawntuan eimah? Eimah ngei in a kamsuaah i zata uhi, a chi va.
Huin mipite chu a bawnun a ding va, amah chu Pilat kawmah a pui va;
Hipa’n, Kei Khrist, kumpipa ka hi chi a Kaisar kawm a siah tawi a khap leh, ka jaatte uh a tohbuai ka he uh, chi'n a heeh ta va.
Huin Pilat in, Judate kumpipa na hi maw? chi'n a donga. Ama’n a dawng a, Na chih chu ka hi, a chi a.
Huin Pilat in siampu lalte leh mipite kawmah, Hipa tungah sualna bangmah ka mu sih, a chi a.
Huin amahun, Hipa’n Galili gam apatin hi mun tanin Juda gam khochinah thu hilhin mipite a tohbuai veu hi, chi'n a hahpan sem uhi.
Galili thu a jah tahin Pilat in hu mi chu Galili gam mi ahihleh hih louh a donga.
Huleh Herod vaihawmna nuaia um ahi chih a heet tahin Herod kawmah a sawla, hulaiin amah zong Jerusalem a um ahihjiahin.
Huleh Herod in Jesu a muh tahin a kipaah mahmah a; a tanchin tampi ana jah jiahin hun sawttah apat kimuhpih ut mawng ahi a; huleh a silmah bawl bangaha beeh muh zong a kinem a.
Huin ama’n a kawmah thu tampi a donga; hizongleh ama’n bangmahin a dawng sih.
Huin siampu lalte leh lehkhagialtute chu a dingkhia va, nasatahin a heeh uhi.
Huin Herod leh a sepaihte’n Jesu chu a simmohbawl va, chiamnuih bawlna’n a zang va, huleh puan loupi a silhsah va, Pilat kawmah a sawl kiitta uhi.
Huleh huni mahin Herod leh Pilat chu a kihoutheita uh; hu masiah chu kilungdou zing ana hi uhi.
Huin Pilat in siampu lalte leh houtute leh mipite a koukhawma,
A kawmvah, Mite a tohbuai chi-a hipa ka kawma na hung pui uh ahi a; huleh, ngai un, na ma va hoihtaha ka etchian nungin na heehna thu vah a tungah bangmah dih louhna ka mu sih hi;
Herod in zong a mu sih; ajiahchu nanguh a kawmah ka hung sawla, huleh ngai un, sihna khop hial bangmah a bawl sih hi;
Hujiahin ka jep diing a, ka hah mai diing, a chi a.
(Ajiahchu gualvaah ni a mi khat a kawmva hahkhiahsah teitei diing ahi a)
Huin amahun thakhat in a kikou va, Hipa sumangthai inla, Barabba hung hahdohsah in, a chi va.
(Hu pa chu khopi sunga helna bang aha jiah leh tualthah jiaha suangkul a taang ahi a)
Hujiahin Pilat in Jesu a hahdoh nuama, a kawmvah thu a soi kiita.
Hizongleh amahuh chu a kikou va, Kros ah kilhbeh in, kros ah kilhbeh in, a chi va.
Huin ama’n a thumveina di’n a kawmvah, Bang jiahin eimaw? bang ahiai a suhkhelh? sihna khop hial a tungah bangmah ka mu sih hi; hujiahin ka jep diing a ka hah mai diing, a chi a.
Huleh amahun chu aw ngaihtahin kros a kilhbeh diingin a ngen teitei va. Huin amahuh aw leh siampu lalte aw in a neh zou zota hi.
Huin Pilat in a nget bang va bawl diingin thu a tanta a.
Huleh helna leh tualthahna jiaha suangkul taang a ngetpa u’chu ahah a; Jesu ahihleh a utut va bawl diingin a pekheta hi.
Huleh amah a pui laiun gam lama kipana hung Cyrene gam mi Simon chu a man va, Jesu nung nunga po diingin a tungah kros chu a ngata uhi.
Huleh mipi nasatah leh, amah kah a maau jenjun numei honin a jui va.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh lam hung ngain, Jerusalem tanute, kei hung kah sih unla, nang uleh na tate uh diingin kap zaw un.
Ajiahchu ngai un, hichibang nite ahung tung diing a, huni chiangin chiingte leh nau paai ngei louhna gilte, huleh naungeeh teep ngei louh nawite a hampha uh, a chi diing uh.
Hu hun chiangin amahun taangte kawmah, Hung netkhum un, huleh mualte kawmah, Hung khuhkhum un, a chi diing uh.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh sing hinga bawn hi silte a bawl uleh, sing gaw ah bang a kibawltaphet diai? a chi a.
Huleh amah toh midang migilou nih zong suhlup diingin a pui va.
Huleh Kalvari a chih mun uh a tun un huah amah chu kros ah a kilhbeh va, migiloute toh, khat a jiat lamah, huleh khat a veilam ah a kilhbeh uhi.
Huin Jesu’n, Pa, amahuh ngaidam in; ajiahchu a silbawl uh a he lou uh ahi, a chi a. Huin a puansilh kihawmin aai a saan uhi.
Huleh mipite’n dingin a en zing uh. Huleh houtute’n zong, Midang bawn a hundam vele; Pathian miteel, Khrist ahih ngeel leh amah leh amah kihundamta henla, chi'n a eenghou va.
Sepaihte’n zong chiamnuih bawlna’n a zang va, a kawma hungin zu thuuh a pia va.
Huleh, Judate kumpipa na hih tahzet leh nangmah kihundam in, a chi uhi.
Huleh a lutung lamah Grik leh Latin leh Hebrai haa min, HIPA JUDATE KUMPIPA AHI chia kigial a tuang hi.
Huleh migilou kikhaite laha khat in amah a taia, Khrist na hihleh nangmah kihundam inla, kei u’zong hung hundamta’n, a chi a.
Hizongleh khatpen inchu amah taikawmin a dawng a, Kibang giapa ahung kigawt he in Pathian lau lou na hiai mah?
Ei chu gawt taah mawng i hi; ajiahchu i silbawlte man mu i hi; hizongleh hipa’n chu bangmah a susual sih hi, a chi a.
Huin ama’n Jesu kawmah, Lalpa, na gam na tun chiangin hung he zing in, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Tuni’n ka kawmah paradis ah na um diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh hichu pung guupna vel diing ahi a, pung kuaahna tandongin leitung zousiah ahung mialta a.
Huleh ni ahung mialta a, Pathian biahinn puanjah chu a kimlaiah ahung keeh ta hi.
Huleh Jesu chu aw ngaihtahin a kikoua, Pa, na khutah ka hagau ka hung kolsah hi, a chi a; huleh huchia a chihzohin a hagau ahahta hi.
Huleh sepaih zahoutuin sil umdan a muh in, Hipa matheilouin midihtat ahi ngei mai, chi'n Pathian a paahtawita hi.
Huleh hu etnop en diing a hung khawm mipi zousiah in sil umdan a muhun a awm uh tuum kawm kawmin a chiah kiitta uhi.
Huleh a meelheette zousiah leh Galili gam a kipana amah hung jui numeite chu gamlapi ah a ding va, hi silte a en zing uhi.
Huleh, ngai un, mi khat a min Joseph kichi vaihawmtu a um a; amah chu mipha leh midih ahi a;
(Ama’n chu a vaihawm uleh, a silbawl u’zong lem ana sahpih sih a; ) Amah chu Judate khopi Arimathiami ahi a, Pathian gam ngaah zinga um ahi.
Hipa chu Pilat kawmah a chiah a, Jesu luang a ngen a.
Huin a lakhia a, puannem in a tuama, koimah sialna ngei nai louh suang kikhuaah haan khatah a sialta hi.
Huleh hu ni chu kiginni ahi a, khawlni ahung naita a.
Huleh numeite, Galili gam a kipana amah toh hung kitonte’n zong a nung a jui va, a haan leh a luang kisialdan a mu uhi.
Huin a chiah kiit va, silgimnamte leh thau gimtuite a siam va; huleh thupiah dungjuiin khawlni in a khawlta uhi.
Huleh hafta ni masa niin, jingkal matahin a gimtui bawlte uh tawiin, midang koite aha toh haan ah a hung va;
Huleh suang chu haan apat liihdoha um a mu va.
Huin a sung ah a luut va, Lalpa Jesu luang chu a muta sih uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, hujiaha a lungbuai laiun ngai un, mi nih puan vaam tah mai silhin a kawmvah ahung diing a;
Huleh amahuh laua lei a a bohkhup laiun amahun a kawmvah, Bang diinga misi laha mihing hawl na hi viai?
Hi-ah a um nawn sih hi, a thou kiitta hi; Galili gam a, a um laia na kawmva a soi he un,
Mihing Tapa chu misualte khuta matsah in a um diing a, kros ah a kilhbeh diing va, huleh ni thum ni’n a thou kiit diing, a chih, a chi va.
Huin amahun a thusoite ahung hedohta uhi.
Huleh haan apatin a nungchiah kiit va, hi silte zousiah sawmlekhatte leh midang zousiah kawmah a hilh ta uhi.
Amah u’chu Mari Magdalene toh, Joanna toh, Jakob nu Mari toh, huleh a kawmva um numei dangte toh ahi va, hi silte chu sawllehte kawmah a hilh ta uhi.
Huleh a thusoi u’chu mawh thu mai in a ngai va, ana tahsang sih uhi.
Huin Peter chu a dingdoha, haan ah a va taia; huleh kuuna a et leh puannemte chauh um chu a mu a, sil um daante chu limdang satahin a chiahmangta hi.
Huleh ngai in, huni mahin a lahva mi nih Emmau kichi khua khat, Jerusalem apata farlong sawmgup banga gamla ah a chiah va.
Amah u’chu hi sil hung umte zousiah thu ah a houlim va.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, houlima a kidottuah laiun Jesu ngei in ahung naih a, amahuh toh a chiahkhawm ta a.
Hizongleh amah a heet theih louh na diingun a mit uh suhvaih in a um a.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Na chiahkawmva na kihoulimna uleh, na dahna thu uh bang ahiai? a chi a.
Huin khatpa, a min Kleopa kichi penin a dawng a a kawmah, Tulaia sil umdante na heet louh, Jerusalem a nang chauh mikhual na hiai mah? a chi a.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Bang silte eimaw? a chi a. Huin amahun a kawmah, Nazareth Jesu, Pathian leh mi zousiah mitmuha silbawl leh thusoia zawlnei minthangtah tungtaang thu:
Amah chu siampu lalte leh ka houtute un sitaah a siamlouh tansah diing a a piahkhiah va, kros a, a kilhbeh uh thu.
Hizongleh kei un chu Israelte tantu diing amah ahi chih ka kinem uh; huleh hihaw lou zong, hi silte tun kalsiah tuni ani thum ni ahita hi.
Hulezong ka lawi lahva numei khenkhat haan a mataha va chiahte’n thumah satahin ahung koih uhi.
Huleh a luang a muh louh phetun ahung kihkiit va, A hing kiitta, chia hung hilh angelte zong ka mu uh, a chi uh.
Huin ka umpihte lahva khenkhat haan ah a va chiah va, numeite soi bang ngei in a va mu va; hizongleh amah a mu tuan sih uhi, a chi va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Aw mingolte leh, zawlneite thusoi zousiah tahsang diing a lungngongte;
Khrist in hi silte thuaah a, a loupina a, a luut diing him hilou ahiai mah? a chi a.
Huin Mosi leh zawlneite zousiah lehkhabu apanin Pathian lehkhabu pumpia amah tungtaang kigialte a kawmvah a hilhchianta hi.
Huleh a chiahna diing khua uh tung diing ahita va; amah chu gamlataha chiahsuaah tum bangin a um a.
Hizongleh amahun a hou va, Ka kawmvah um mai ta’n; nitaahlam ahita a, huleh ni zong tum diing ahita hi, a chi va, Huin a kawmva um diingin a luut ta hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, amahuh toh ankuang a a touin tanghou a la a, vang a pia a, huleh a balkeeh a, a kawmvah a pia a.
Huin a mit uh ahung vaahta a, amah a heta uh; huin amah chu a mitmuh vapat a mangta hi.
Huin amahun, Lampi a ahung houpiha, Pathian lehkhabu thute ahung hilhchian laiin i lungtang i sungah a kuang hial hilou ahiai mah? a kichi va.
Huleh hulaitah mahin a thou va, Jerusalem khua ah a kinungleh va, sawmlekhat umkhawmte leh a kawmva umte chu a mu uh.
Amahun, Lalpa chu a thou kiittahzet ahi, Simon kawmah zong a kilaahta, ana chi va.
Huin amahun zong lampi a sil hung umte leh tanghou a balkeeh a amah a heetdohdante uh a hilh uhi.
Huleh hichi-a a soi laiun, Jesu ngei chu a lahvah ahung dinga, a kawmvah, Na tungvah hamuanna um heh, a chi a.
Hizongleh amahuh chu a chija mahmah va, huleh a lau va; siha mu hiin a kingaihtuah uh.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Bang diinga mangbang na hi viai? huleh bang jiaha na lungtang va ginlahna hung um ahiai?
Ka khutte leh ka keengpeehte en un, kei mahmah hilou ka hiai mah? hung khoih unla, en un; ajiahchu ke’n neia na hung muh bangun siha in sa leh guh a nei sih hi, a chi a.
Huleh hichi-a a soi zohin a khutte leh a kengpeehte amahuh a lah hi.
Huleh a kipaah luat jiah va agintaat louh uleh limdang a sah laiun ama’n a kawmvah, Hi-ah neeh diing bangaha na nei viai? a chi a.
Huin amahun a kawmah nga kikanggaw khat leh khuaizu khal khat a pia va.
Ama’n huchu a la a, a ma- vah a neta hi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Mosi daan leh zawlneite lehkhabu leh psalm bu-a ka tungtaang kigial zousiah ahung taangtun diingdan nang u’toh ka umkhawm laia na kawmva ka thusoite chu hihaw ahi, a chi a.
Huin Pathian lehkhabuthu a heet theihna diingun a lungtang uh a hihpil ta hi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Hichibanga gelh ahi, Khrist in gim a thuaah diing a, ni thum ni a misi laha kipan a thohkiit diing him ahi;
Huleh kisiihna leh sual ngaihdamna chu amah minin Jerusalem apatin nam chin lahah soi ahi diing;
Nanguh hi silte heetpihtute na hi uh.
Huleh ngai un, ka Pa silchiam na tungvah ka hung sawl diing hi; hizongleh tunglama kipana silbawltheihna a thop na hih masiah uh Jerusalem khopi ah um kinke'n un, a chi a.
Huleh amahuh chu Bethani tanphain a puidoh a, huin a baan a jah a, amahuh a vangpiah a;
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, a vangpiah lai tahin amahuh a paisan ta a, vaan ah puitouhin a um ta hi.
Huin amahun amah abia va, kipaah mahmahin Jerusalem ah a kih kiitta uhi.
Huleh Pathian biahinn ah Pathian phat leh paahtawiin a um zingzingta uhi, Amen.
A chiilin Thu a um a, Thu chu Pathian kawmah a um hi, huleh Thu chu Pathian ahi.
Humah chu a chiilin Pathian kawmah a um hi.
Sil zousiah amah siam ahi a; silsiam himhim amah siamlouh bangmah a um sih hi.
Amah ah hinna a um a, hu hinna chu mihingte vaahna ahi.
Vaah chu mial ah ahung vaah a, mial in huchu a he sih hi.
Pathian a kipan a sawl mi khat a um a, a min John ahi.
Humah chu heetpihtu diingin a hung a, hu vaah thu heetpih diingin, mi zousiah in amah jiaha a gintaat theihna diingun.
Amah chu hu Vaah ahi sih a, hizongleh hu Vaah heetpih diing a sawl ahi zaw hi.
Huchu Vaah dihtah, mi chin khovel a hung photmah hih vaahtu ahi.
Amah chu khovel ah a um a, khovel amah siam ahi; huleh khovel in amah a he sih hi.
Amah a mite kawmah a hung a, amah a mite’n ana kipaahpih sih uh.
Hizongleh amah kipaahpih photmahte chu a kawmvah Pathian tate hihtheihna diing silbawltheihna a pia hi, a min gingtate chu.
Hute chu sisana piang ahi sih va, tahsa deihdana piang zong ahi sih va, huleh mihing deihdana piang zong ahi het sih uh; hizongleh Pathiana piang ahi zaw uhi.
Huleh Thu chu sa ahung suaah a, i lahah a um hi, (Pa ta khat neih loupi bangin a loupi jia i mu uh) hehpihna leh thutah a dim.
John in a thu a heetpih a, a kikou a, Ka nunga hung pai pa in ahung makhelhta hi, ka ma a um mawng ahihjiahin, chia a thu ka soi pa khu amah ahi,
A taangchinna i tang chiat uh, hehpihna tunga hehpihna sawn toh,
Ajiahchu daan thu chu Mosi manga piah ahi a; hizongleh hehpihna leh thutah chu Jesu Khrist jiahin ahung um hi.
Kuama’n bangchihmahin Pathian a mu ngei sih; Tapa tang neihsun, Pa aangsunga umpa, amahin a tanchin a phuangta hi, chi in.
Hichu Judate’n Jerusalem a kipan siampu leh Levimite a kawm a, Kua na hiai, chia dong diing a, a sawl lai va John thu theihsah ahi.
Huleh amah chu panglou in a kiphuang a, Khrist chu ka hi sih chi'n a kiphuang hi.
Huin amahun, Ahihleh kua na hiai? Elijah na maw? chi'n a dong va. Ama’n, Ka hi sih, a chi a. Hu zawlnei na moleh? a chi va. Ama’n, Hilou, chi'n a dawng a.
Huin amahun a kawmah, Kua na hiai? ahung sawlte ka dawn theihna diingun hung hilh in nangle nang kua ka hi kichi na hiai? a chi va.
Ama’n, zawlnei Isaiah soi banga, Lalpa lampi sial tangun, chia gamdaia kikoupa aw chu ka hi, a chi a.
A misawlte uh chu Pharisaite laha mi ahi va.
Huleh amah a dong va, a kawmah, Khrist lah hilou, Elijah lah hilou, huleh hu zawlnei lah hilou na hihleh bang diing a na baptis ahiai? a chi va.
John in amahuh a dawng a, Ken chu tui in ka baptis a, hizongleh na heet louh uh khat na lahvah a ding hi;
A keengtophah khau zong suut taah ka hih louh, ka nunga hung pai ahung makhelhpa, amah chu hupa ahi, a chi a.
Hi silte chu Jordan ka la Bethabara, John in a baptis na muna kibawl ahi.
A jingni’n John in Jesu a kawm lama hungin a mu a, En un Pathian Belaamnou, khovel sualna pomangpa chu,
Hipa chu ahi, Mi khat ahung makhelhpa ka nungah ahung pai hi, ka ma a umsa mawng ahihjiahin, chia kana soi pa chu.
Huleh ke'n amah kana he sih; hizongleh Israelte kawma a kisuhlat theihna diingin tuia baptis in ka hung ahi, a chi a.
Huleh John in a thu a heetpih a, Hagau vakhu banga vaan a kipan a hung kumsuh a, a tunga tuangden ka mu hi.

Ken amah kana he sih; hizongleh tuia baptis diing a hung sawlpa amahmahin ka kawmah, Kua tungah zong Hagau hung kumsuh a, a tunga tuangden na muh penpen, amah chu Hagau Siangthou a baptis diingpa chu ahi ahung chi a.
Huchu ka mu a, huleh hipa chu Pathian Tapa ahi chih ka heetpih ahi, a chi a.
A jing kiitin John chu a ding a, a nungjuite nih toh.
Huleh Jesu vaahlehleh lai a mu a, En un, Pathian Belaamnou, a chi a.
Hu nungjui nihte’n a thusoi a ja va, Jesu a juita uhi.
Huin Jesu a kihei a, ahung juih uh a muh in a kawmvah, Bang ahiai na hawl uh? a chi a. Amahun a kawmah, Rabbi, (huchu, Houtupa chihna ahi) khoiah ahiai na teen? a chi va.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Hung unla, en un, a chi a. Huin amahuh chu a hung va, a teenna a en va, huleh a kawmah huni a um uh, daah sawmna vel ahih jiahin.
John thusoi ja, Jesu juite geel laha khat chu Simon Peter sanggampa Andru ahi a.
Ama’n a masapenin amah ngei sanggampa Simon a mudoh a, a kawmah, Messiah, Khrist kichipa chu ka muta uh, a chi a.
Huleh amah chu Jesu kawmah ahung pui a. Jesu’n amah a en a, Nang chu Jona tapa Simon na hi a; Kipha ahung kichita diing hi, a chi a, huchu Suang chihna ahi.
Huleh a jingni’n Jesu’n Galili gam ah chiah a tum a, Philip a mu a, a kawmah, Hung jui in, a chi a.
Philip chu Andru leh Peter teenna khua Bethsaida a teeng ahi a.
Philip in Nathanael a mu a, a kawmah, Mosi in daan lehkhabu a, a tungtaang ana gelh leh, zawlneite’n ana gelh uh Nazareth Jesu, Joseph tapa chu ka muta uh, a chi a.
Huin Nathanael in a kawmah, Nazareth a kipanin sil hoih a piang thei eimah? a chi a. Philip in a kawmah, Hung en in, a chi a.
Jesu in Nathanael a kawm zuana chiah a mu a, a kawmah, En un, giitlouhna nei lou, Israel mitah chu, a chi a.
Nathanael in a kawmah, Bang na hung chi heet ahiai? a chi a. Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Philip in nang ahung kouh ma in, theipi kung nuaia na um laiin ka hung mu hi, a chi a.
Nathanael in a dawng a, a kawmah, Rabbi, Pathian Tapa na hi; Israelte Kumpipa na hi, a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Theipi kung nuaiah ka hung mu na kawm a ka chih jiaha gingta na hi maw? hi silte sanga loupizaw na hung mu diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmah, Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Tunung vaan kihong a, Pathian angelte mihing Tapa tunga kal leh kum na muta diing uhi, a chi hi.
Huleh ni thum ni’n Galili gam a Kana khua ah kiteenna khat a um a; huah chu Jesu nu a um a.
Jesu leh a nungjuite zong kiteenna ah kouh ahi uh.
Huleh uain ahung kitaahsap tahun Jesu nuin a kawmah, Uain a nei nawn sih uh, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Numei, nang hung heetsah diing bang a um ei? ka hun a tung nai sih hi, a chi a.
A nuin suaahte kawmah, Ama’n na kawmva a soi photmah bawl un, a chi a.
Huleh Judate tawndan dungjuia kisuhsiangthouna suang tuibeel buuh sawmli mun nih aha, mun thum aha dawl, guup hu munah a tungva.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, Tuibeelte ah tui sungdim un, a chi a. Huin ageitan chiatin a sungdim va.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Tuin thaal unla, gual vaah vaihawmtu kawmah tawi un, a chi a. Amahun a tawi va.
Gual vaah vaihawmtuin tui uain hung suaah chu a chepin khoia kipana hung um ahih a he sih a, (ahihvangin suaah tui thaalte’n chu a he va), gual vaah vaihawmtuin mouneipa chu a kou a,
A kawmah, Michinin a chiilin uain hoih a tungkhia va, huleh tam deuh ahung dawn nung chiangun a hoihlou zaw a tungkhia uh; nangin chu tutan phain uain hoih na koih nalai hi, a chi a.
Hi silmah kipatna chu Jesu’n Galili gam a Kana khua a, a bawl ahi a; a loupi daan a sulang hi, huleh a nungjuite’n amah a gingta uhi.
Huzohin Kapernaum ah a chiahsuh a, amah toh, a nu toh, a unaute toh, huleh a nungjuite toh; hutah ah ni tamlou khat a um uhi.
Huleh Judate chiahkaan kuut ahung naita a, Jesu chu Jerusalem ah a chiahtou a.
Huleh Pathian biahinna bawng leh, belaam leh, vakhu zuahte leh, sumhengtute tou chu a mu a.
Huin jepna khauhual a bawl zohin biahinn a kipanin belaamte leh bawngte a nohdoh veh a, huleh sumhengtute dangka a sunbuahsah a, a dohkaan uh a sawn puuhsah hi.
Huleh ama’n vakhu zuahte kawmah, Hi silte hitah apatin la mang un; ka Pa inn sumdawnna inn in bawl sih un, a chi a.
Huin a nungjuite’n, Na inn a ka phatuamngaihna in ahung ne zouta, chih gelh ahih ahung hedoh uhi.
Huin Judate’n a dawng va, a kawmah, hi silte na bawl, chiamchihna bang ahiai na hung muhsah theih? a chi va.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Hi biahinn susia un, ni thum sungin ka tungding diing, a chi a.
Huin Judate’n, kum sawmli leh guup hi biahinn bawlna’n a luuta, nangin ni thum sungin na tungding diing maw? a chi va.
Ahihvangin ama’n huchu a tahsa biahinn a soi ahi.
Hujiahin misi laha kipana a thoh kiit nungin a nungjuite’n, a kawmvah hi thute a soi ahi chih ahung hedohta va; Pathian lehkhathu leh Jesu thusoi a gingta ta uhi.
Huchi'n chiahkaan ankuang luina a Jerusalem a, a um laiin a silmah bawlte a muhun mi tampite’n a min a gingta uh.
Hizongleh Jesu chu a kawmvah a kituluut nuam sih, ajiahchu ama’n mi zousiah a he a;
Huleh mihing sunga um a heet jiahin mihing thu koimah hilhchet a kiphamoh sih hi.
Pharisaite laha mi, a min Nikodem kichi, Judate vaihawmtu khat a um a.

Amah chu janin Jesu kawmah a hung a, a kawmah, Rabbi, Pathian akipana thuhilhtu diing a hung na hi chih ka he uh; ajiahchu Pathian a kawma a um louhleh na silmah bawlte koima’n a bawl thei sih diing, a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi koipouh in a pianthah louhleh Pathian gam a mu sih diing hi, a chi a.
Nikodem in a kawmah, mi a teeh nungin bangchi'n a piang thei diai? a nu sunga nihvei luut in a piang thei diing maw? a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi koipouh tui leh Hagau a, a pian louhleh Pathian gam a luut sih diing hi.
Sa a piang phot chu sa ahi a; huleh Hagau a piang photmah chu hagau ahi.
Na pianthah ngeingei diing ahi, na kawma ka chih limdang sa sin.
Huih a utna pouh ah a nung a, agin na ja hi, hizongleh khoia kipana hung a, khoilama chiah diing chih na he sih; koipouh Hagau a piang chu huchibang ahi; a chi a.
Nikodem in a dawng a, a kawmah, Hi silte bangchi’n ahithei diai? a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Israelte houtu na hi a, hi silte na he sih maw?
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Kei unchu ka heet uh ka soi va, ka muh uh ka hesah uh; ahihvangin nangun ka thu heetsah uh na awi sih uh.
Leitung silte ka hung hilh bawn gingta lou na hih uleh, vaan lam silte hung hilh leng bangchi’n na gingta diviai?
Vaan apata hung kumsuh mihing Tapa vaan a um chih louh kuamah vaan ah a kal ngei nai sih hi.
Huleh Mosi’n gamdai a guul a khaikaang mahbang in mihing Tapa zong khaikaang in a um ngei diing ahi.
Koipouh amah gingta in a beimang louh a, kumtuang hinna a neih zawh na diingin.
Ajiahchu Pathian in khovel a lungsiat mahmah a, huchi'n a Tapa tangkhat neihsun a pia, koipouh amah gingta in a beimang louh a, kumtuang hinna a neih zawh na diingin.
Khovel siamlouhtangsah diingin Pathian in a Tapa khovel ah a sawl sih, khovel amah jala hutdam ahihtheihna diingin a sawl zaw hi.
Amah gingta chu siamlouhtansah in a um sih; hizongleh a gingta lou chu siamlouhtansah zoh ahita, Pathian Tapa tangkhat neihsun min a gintaat louh jiahin.
Hichu siamlouhtanna ahi, vaah khovel ah a hung a, hizongleh mite’n vaah sangin mial a deih zaw uh, a silbawlte uh a giitlouh jiahin.
Ajiahchu koipouh sil gilou bawl in vaah ahaw veu uh, huleh vaah ah zong ahung ut sih uh; huchilou inchu a sil bawlte uh a langkha diing.
Hizongleh koipouh sildih bawl chu vaah ah ahung uh, a silbawlte uh Pathiana bawl ahi chih a lat theihna diingin.
Hi silte nungin Jesu chu a nungjuite toh Judia gam ah a hung va; hutah ah amahuh toh a um zinga, huleh a baptis hi.
Huleh John in zong Salim kawm Ainon ah a baptis a, hutah a tui a tam jiahin; huleh amahuh a hung va, baptisma a tang uh.
Ajiahchu huchihlaiin John suangkul ah khum ahi nai sih hi.
Huin John nungjuite leh Judate kikal ah kisuhsiangthou thu ah kinialna ahung umta a.
Amah u’chu John kawmah a hung va, a kawmah, Rabbi, Jordan gaala na kawma um, a tanchin na heetpihpa’n, ngai in, hupa’n baptisma a bawl a, mi zousiah a kawmah ahung uh, a chi va.
John in a dawng a, Vaana kipana piah ahihlouhleh mihingin bangmah a nei thei sih,
'Kei Khrist chu ka hi sih a, a ma a sawl ka hi zaw chih nanguh mahin na hung heetpih uhi.
Mou neitu chu mou pasal ahi a, hizongleh mou neitu lawmpa, a kawma dinga a thu ngaikhia chu mouneitu aw jiahin nasatahin a nuam hi, hi ka nuamna chu a bukimta hi.
Amah chu a khantouh diing ahi a, kei chu ka kiamsuh diing ahi.
Tunglama kipana hung chu mi zousiah tunga ahi a; leia piang chu leimi ahi, huleh lei thu a soi veu; vaan akipana hung chu mi zousiah tunga ahi.
Huleh a muh leh a jah chu ama’n a hesah hi; koimah in a thuheetsah a awi sih.
Koipouh a thuheetsah awi in Pathian chu a dih hi chi'n a minin namdetna a bawl hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian sawlin Pathian thu a soi veu; Pathian in laha kawmah Hagau teh detdetin a pe sih.
Pain Tapa a lungsiat a, a khutah sil zousi ah a peta hi.
Koipouh Tapa gingta in kumtuang hinna a neita, koipouh Tapa gingta louin hinna a mu sih diing a, hizongleh Pathian lungthahna a tungah a um zing hi, a chi hi.
Hujiahin Jesu’n John sangin nungjui a siam tamzaw a, a baptis chih Pharisaite’n a ja uh chih Lalpa’n a heet tahin,
(Ahihvangin Jesu hialin chu a baptis sih a, a nungjuite’n a baptis zaw uh ahi a),
Judia gam a nusia a, Galili gam ah a chiah kiitta a.
Huchi'n Samaria gam tawn diing ahi a.
Huin Samaria khopi khat, Saikar a chih uh, Jakob in a tapa Joseph kawma a munpiah kawm ahung tungta a.
Hutah ah Jakob tuitohdoh a um a. Jesu chu a paigim jiahin tuitohdoh geiah a tou a; huchu daah guupna vel diing ahi a.
Huin Samaria numei khat tuitawi diingin a hung a; Jesu’n a kawmah, dawn diing hung pia in, a chi a.
(A nungjuite lah neeh diing lei in khopi ah a chiahta ngal va).
Huin Samaria numeinu in a kawmah, bangchidana nang Juda mi in kei Samaria numei kawma dawn diing na hung nget ahiai? Judate’n lah Samarimite bangmahin a ngai sih ngal va, a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Pathian silthawnpiah leh, na kawma, dawn diing hung pia in, chipa koi ahiai chih helechin zaw nang a kawma ngen diing china, ama’n tuihing hung pe diing hiveen, a chi a.
Numeinu’n a kawmah, Pu, a sawh na diing bangmah na nei sih a, tuitohdoh lah a thuuh ngal a, khoi a kipanin ahiai tui hing na laah diing?
Ka pu uh Jakob sanga lian zaw na hiai mah? Ama’n hi tuitohdoh ahung pia a, huleh amah ngei in zong a dawn a, a tate leh a gangualte’n zong a dawn uh, a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Koipouh hi tuitohdoh a dawn chu a dangtaah kiit diing;

Hizongleh ke’n a kawma ka piah diing tui dawn photmah chu bangchih tanin a dangtaah sih diing uh; a kawmva ka piah diing tui chu a sung vah tuitohdoh in ahung um diing a, kumtuang hinna phain a kikhohdoh diing, a chi a.
Numeinu’n a kawmah, Pu, hu tui hung pe ve, ka dang a taah louh na diing leh, tuitawi diing a hitaha ka hung louh na diingin, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, na pasal va kou inla, hitah ah hung kiit in, a chi a.
Huin numeinu’n a dawng a, pasal ka nei sih, a chi a. Jesu’n a kawmah, pasal ka nei sih, na chih na chi dih mahmah hi.
Ajiahchu pasal ngaa na neita a, huleh tua na neih zong na pasal ahi sih; hi thu na soi dih hi, a chi a.
Numeinu’n a kawmah, Pu, zawlnei na hi chih ka he,
Ka pulepate un hi taang ah Pathian a beveu uh; hizongleh nangun chu mite’n Pathian a biah na mun diing chu Jerusalem ahi na chi uh, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Numei, hung gingta in, hi taang ah khel lou zong, huleh Jerusalem khelah lou zong Pa na biah hun uh hung tung diing ahita.
Nangun na heet louh uh na bia uh; Kei un chu ka biah uh ka he uh; ajiahchu hutdamna Judate a hung kipan ahi.
Hizongleh ahun tung diing ahita, tuin zong a tung zing ahi, hu hun chiangin a be tahtahte’n Pa chu hagau leh thu tahin a be diing uhi, ajiahchu Pa’n huchibang mi amah be diingin a hawl ahi.
Pathian chu Hagau ahi a, huleh a be mite’n hagau leh thutah a, a biah diing uh ahi, a chi a.
Numeinu’n a kawmah, Khrist kichi, Messiah ahung diing chih ka he; amah ahung chiangin sil bangkim ahung hilh veh diing, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Kei, na kawma thusoi chu amah ka hi, a chi a.
Huleh hulai tahin a nungjuite ahung tungva, numeinu a kihoupih limdang a sa mahmah va; hizongleh koima’n, Bang diinga numeinu na kihoupih, a chi keei sih uhi.
Huin numeinu in a tuibeel a taisan a, khopi ah a chiah a, mite kawmah,
Ka sil bawl zousiah hung hilh mi khat, hung unla, hung endihvua; Khrist hilou diing ahiai mah? a chi a.
Huin amahuh chu khopi apat a pawtdoh va, a kawmah ahung ta uhi.
Huchihlaiin a nungjuite’n, Houtupa, an ne in, chi'n a sawl va.
Hizongleh ama’n a kawmvah, Nanguh heet louh neeh diing an ka nei, a chi a.
Hujiahin a nungjuite a kihou va, Koi aha in a neeh diing ahung tawisah adiai? a chi va.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, Ka an chu ahung sawlpa deihzawng bawl leh a na tohzoh ahi.
Nangun, Ha li zoh chiangin buhlaah hun ahung tung diing, na chi sih viai mah? ngai un, ka hung hilh ahi, Daah unla, loute en un; laah hunin a min vehta hi.
Koipouh a la in loh a mu a, kumtuang hinna tan um diing gah a kikhol veu hi; a tuhpa leh a lapa a kipaahkhawm theihna diingun.
Khatin a tuh a, a dangin a la veu chih thu hitah ah a dih ngeel ahi.
Na tohgim louh uh la diingin ka hung sawl ahi; mi dangte’n ana tong a, nangun a toh ah na sunzop uh ahi, a chi a.
Huleh, Ama’n ka bawl zousiah hung hilh, chih numeinu thusoi jiahin hu khopia Samarimi tampiin Jesu a gingta ta uh.
Huchi'n Samarimite chu Jesu kawm ahung tunun a kawmva um diingin a hou va; huleh amah chu hutah ah ni nih a tuang hi.
Huleh amah thusoi jiahin mi dang tampi in a gintaat behlap uh.
Huleh numeinu kawmah, Tuin chu nang soi jiaha gingta ka hi sih va, keiuh ngei in a thu ka ja va, huleh hipa chu khovel hundampa, Khrist ahi chih ka he uhi, a chi va.
Huleh ni nih nungin hu a kipanin a pawt a, Galili gam ah a chiahta hi.
Ajiahchu, amah Jesu ngei in, zawlnei amah gam lamah paahtawiin a um ngei sih chih a hesahta hi.
Huin Galili gam ahung tun in, Jerusalem a gual vaahna a, a silbawl zousiah a muh jiahun Galilimite’n ana kipaahpih uh, ajiahchu amah u’zong hu gual vaahna ah a va chiah uhi.
Huchi'n Jesu chu tui uain a suaahsah na Galili gam a Kana khua ahung tung kiit a; Huleh hutah ah mi loupi khat, a tapa Kapernaum khua a china, a um a.
Jesu Judia gam apat hung pawt in Galili gam ah a hungta chih a jah tahin, a kawmah a chiah a, huleh hungsuh a, a tapa sudam diingin amah a ngen a; ajiahchu amahpa si dehdeh a china ahi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, chiamchihna leh silmahte na muh louh uleh na gingta sih diing uh, a chi a.
Mi loupipa in a kawmah, Pu, ka tapa sih ma in hungsuh in, a chi a.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, chiahta in, na tapa a damta hi, a chi a. Huleh hu mipa’n Jesu’n a kawma a thusoi chu a gingta a, a chiahta hi.
Huleh a paisuh laiin a suaahte’n ana kituaahpih va, Na tapa a damta, chi'n ana hilh uh.
Huin ama’n ahung dam pat lai hun a kawmvah a dong a Amah un a kawmah, jaanni, daah sagih hunin a khosih in amah a nuseta hi, a chi va.
Huchi'n a pa in huchu Jesu’n a kawma, Na tapa a damta, a chih hun laitah ahi chih a heta a; huleh amah leh a innkuanpih tengin a gingta ta uhi.
Hichu Jesu’n Judia gam apat ahung pawta Galili gam a ahung laia a silmah bawl nihna ahi.
Hi nungin Judate gual vaahna khat a um a, Jesu chu Jerusalem ah a chiahtou a.
Huleh Jerusalem ah belaam kotkhaah kawmah diil khat, Hebrai haama Bethesda kichi, innliim ngaa nei a um a.
Hute ah damloute, mittawte, keengbaaite, huleh zengte a tam a tam a lum va, tui kiloh ngaah in.
Ajiahchu hun chihkhat chiangin angel khat hu diil ah a chiahsuh a, tui a vatoh veu a, huchi'n koipouh tui kitoh nunga luut masapen chu bangchi bang natna nei hizongleh suhdam in a um veu hi.
Huleh hutah ah kum sawmthum leh giat damlou mi khat a um a.
Jesu’n amah lum a muh in, huleh hutobangin hun sawtpi um ahita chih a heetin a kawmah, Suhdam na ut ei? a chi a.
Damloupa’n, Pu, tui kitoh chianga diil a hung koih diing mi ka nei sih; ka chiah chiangin mi dangin ahung makhelh veu hi, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Thou inla, na puanphah la inla, keengin chiahta in, a chi a.
Huin thakhat in amah chu ahung damta a, a puanphah a la a, keengin a chiahta hi; huleh hu ni chu khawlni ahi hi.
Hujiahin Judate’n a dampa kawmah, Khawlni ahi a, na puanphah na puaah dan hilou ahi, a chi va.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Ahung sudampa ngei in ka kawmah, Na puanphah la inla, keengin chiahta in, ahung chi hi, chi'n a dawng hi.
Huin amahun a kawmah, Na puanphah la inla, keengin chiahta in, hung chipa koi ahiai? a chi va, a dong va.
Hizongleh a dampa’n koi ahiai chih a he sih a; ajiahchu hu munah mipi tamtah a um a, Jesu laha chiahmangta a.
A nunglam in Jesu’n amah Pathian biahinnah a mu a, a kawmah, Ngai in, suhdam in na umta hi, sual kiit nawn sin, huchilou inchu sil hoihlou sem na tungah ahung tung kha diing, a chi a.
Huin hu mipa chu a chiahta a, a sudampa chu Jesu ahi chih Judate a va hilhta hi.
Hujiahin Judate’n Jesu chu a gawtbawl va, thah a sawmta uhi; hi silte khawlni a, a bawl jiahin.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh a dawng a, Ka Pain tutanin nna a tong zinga, huleh ke’n zong ka tong zing, a chi a.
Huchi'n Judate’n amah chu thah a tum sem va, ama’n khawlni a bohsiat chauh hilou a, Pathian ka Pa ahi a chi a, Pathian toh kibanga a kibawl jiahin.

Huin Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Chihtahzetin chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Tapa in amah thuin bangmah a bawl thei sih, Pain a bawl a muhte loungal; ajiahchu ama’n a bawl photmah, hute chu Tapa in zong a bawl veu hi.
Ajiahchu Pain tapa a lungsiat a, a silbawl zousiah a kawmah a musah veu hi, huleh thumah na sah diing uh hite sanga na loupizaw a musah diing hi.
Pain misite a kaihthoh a, a suhhing mah bangin Tapa in zong a ut pouhmah a suhing veu hi.
Ajiahchu Pain koimah vai a hawmsah sih, hizongleh vaihawmna zousiah Tapa kawmah a pekheta hi,
Pa a zahbawl bang va mi zousiah in Tapa zong a zahbawl na diingun. Koipouh Tapa zahbawl lou in Pa amah sawlpa zong a zahbawl lou ahi.
Chihtahzetin chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Koipouh ka thu ja a, ahung sawlpa gingta in kumtuang hinna a neita; siamlouhtangin a um sih diing a, hizongleh sihna apat hinna ah a luut zawta ahi.
Chihtahzetin chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Misite’n Pathian Tapa aw a jah na diing uh hun hung tung diing ahita, tuin zong a tung zing hi; huleh a ja photmah a hing diing uh.
Ajiahchu Pain amah a hinna a kineih bangin Tapa in zong amah a hinna kineih diingin a peta hi.
Huleh mihing Tapa ahihjiahin a kawmah vaihawmna thu zong a peta hi.
Hikhu thumah sa sih un; ajiahchu ahun tung diing ahita, hu hun chiangin haana um zousiah in a aw a ja diing va,
Huleh ahung pawtdoh diing uh; sil hoih bawlte chu kumtuang hinna tangin a thoudoh diing va, huleh sil gilou bawlte chu siamlouh tangin a thou kiit diing uh.
Ke’n ka thuin bangmah ka bawl thei sih; ka jah bangin vai ka hawm veu hi; huleh ka vaihawm chu a dih hi, ajiahchu keimah deihzawng hawl lou in, Pa ahung sawlpa deihzawng ka bawl zaw hi.
Keimah tanchin kiheetpih hitaleng ka thu heetpih a dih sih diing.
Ka tanchin heetpih khat a um; huleh ama’n ka tanchin a heetpih chu a dih ahi chih ka he hi.
Nangun John kawmah mi na sawl uh, ama’n thutah tanchin a heetpih hi.
Hizongleh mihing thu heetsah ka pom sih; ahihvangin hutdama na um theihna diingun hi silte ka soi ahi.
John chu mei vaah kuang tah leh taangtah ahi a, huleh nangun a vaah ah tomkhat nopsahtaahdih na ut uh.
Hizongleh John a sang a heetpihna lian zaw ka nei hi; ka Pa’n ka toh zoh diing a ahung piah ka natohte mahin Pain ahung sawl chih ka tanchin ahung heetpih hi.
Huleh Pa ahung sawlpa ngei inzong ka tanchin ahung heetpih hi. Nangun bangchihmahin a aw na ja ngei sih va, a meel zong na mu ngei sih uh.
Huleh a thu na lung sung vah na vom sih uh; amah ahung sawlpa na gintaat louh jiahun.
Pathian lehkhathu na sim ngun ngeeluh; ajiahchu hute sungah kumtuang hinna nei in na kingaihmah uh; hute chu ka tanchin heetsahna ahi.
Hizongleh hinna na neihna diingun ka kawmah na hung nuam sih uh.
Mihing paahtawina ka pom sih hi.
Hizongleh Pathian lungsiatna nanguh ah a um sih chih ka hung he hi.
Ka Pa minin ka hung a, nangun na hung kipaahpih sih uh; a dang khat amah minin hung lehlah na kipaahpih diing uh.
Nanguh, khat leh khat kipaahtawituahna ngaina a, Pathian chauh a kipan a hung pawt paahtawina hawl loute’n bangchi’n na gingta thei diviai?
Pa kawma nanguh hung heeh diingin hung ngaihtuah sih un; nanguh hung heehtu khat a um, amah chu na tahsan uh Mosi ahi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Mosi ana gingta hitaleh u’chin kei zong na hung gingta diing uh; ajiahchu ama’n ka tanchin ahi ana gelh.
Hizongleh amah thu gelhte na gintaat louh uleh bangchi'n kei thute na gingta diviai? a chi hi.
Hi silte nungin Jesu chu Galili diil, Tiberi diil kichimah gaal lamah a chiahta a.
Huleh natna veite tunga a silmah bawlte a muh jiahun mipi nasatahin amah a jui va.
Jesu chu taang ah a chiahtou a, huah a nungjuite toh a tou hi.
Huleh chiahkaan kuut, Judate gual vaahna chu a naita a.
Huin Jesu a daah a, mi tampi a kawm lam zu an a muh in Philip kawmah, Hite neeh diing tanghou khoi a ahiai i lei diing? a chi a.
Ama’n hichu amah etkhiahna diing a, a soi ahi a, ajiahchu bang ahiai a bawl diing ama’n a kiheet hi.
Philip in a kawmah, Mi chinin themkhat chiata a tan diing u’zong makhai za nih man tanghou in a daih sih diing hi, a chi a, a dawng a.
A nungjuite laha khat, Simon Peter unaupa Andru in a kawmah,
Hitah ah barley-buh tanghou pheeng ngaa leh ngagawp nih nei naupang khat a um hi, ahihvangin mi hizahpi lahah bangtham ahi diai? a chi a.
Jesu’n, Mipite tousah un, a chi a. Huleh hutah ah hampa tampi a um a. Huchi'n mipite chu a touta va, a tam lam u’chu saang ngaa vel ahi uh.
Huin Jesu’n tanghou pheengte chu a la a, huleh a vangpiah zohin a nungjuite kawmah a hawm a, a nungjuite’n a toute kawmah; huchimahbangin ngate zong a deihkhop un a hawm uhi.
Huin a kham nungun ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, Bangmah mang lou diingin a nengthemte luaah un, a chi a.
Hujiahin a luaahkhawm va, barley buh tanghou pheeng ngaa nete neeh valin bawm sawm le nih a luaah dim uhi.
Huin Jesu silmah bawl a muhun hu mipite’n, Tahzetin hipa chu khovel a zawlnei hung diingpa ahi ngei mei, a chi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n amah chu kumpipa a bawl diing a pawngmat diingin hung diing ahi uh chih a heet tahin amah ngenin a chiahtuamta a.
Huleh nitaah lam ahung hihin a nungjuite diilaha chiahsuh va.
Kuang khatah a tuang va, Kapernaum lam zuanin diil tungah a chiahuh. Huleh khua a mialta a, Jesu laha kawmvah ahung nai sih hi.
Huihpi haat tah a nun jiahin tui a kinawh saang hulhul a.
Huchi'n farlong sawmnih le ngaa aha, sawmthum aha a jap nungun Jesu diil tunga a keenga pai a, kuang lam hung naih a mu va, huleh a lau uhi.
Hizongleh ama’n a kawmvah, Kei ka hi, lau sih un, a chi a.
Huin amahun uttahin amah chu kuang ah a tuangsahta va; huleh kuang chu thakhat in a zot gam uh a tungpahta hi.
A jingni’n diil gaal lehlam a ding mipite’n a nungjuite tuanna loungal kuang dang a um sih chih leh, Jesu a nungjuite toh kuang ah a chiah sih a, a nungjuite a ngen un a chiah uh chih a heta va.
(Ahihvangin Tiberi akipanin Lalpa’n a vangpiah nunga tanghou a neehna mun kawmah kuang dang ahung tung ngal a;)
Huchi'n mipite’n Jesu hileh, a nungjuite hileh a um nawn sih uh chih ahung heet tahun amah u’zong kuang neute ah a tuang va, Jesu hawlin Kapernaum ahung tung va.
Huleh amah chu diil gaal lehlama ahung muh tahun a kawmah, Rabbi, bangchih a hitah tung na hiai? a chi va.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Chihtahzetin chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Silmahte na muh jiah va hung hawl na hi sih va, hizongleh tanghou na neeh va, na vah jiahun na hung hawl uh ahi zaw hi.
An mangthang diing mai hawlin phephe sih unla, kumtuang hinna dong a um zing diing an, mihing Tapa in ahung piah diing hawlin phe zaw un; ajiahchu Pa Pathian in amah a chiamchihta hi, a chi a.
Huin amahun a kawmah, Pathian nna ka toh theihna diingun bang ahiai ka bawl diing uh? a chi va.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Amah ahung sawlpa na gintaat uh, hichu Pathian natoh ahi, a chi a.
Hujiahin amahun a kawmah, Ahihleh ka muh va ka hung gintaat theihna diingun bang chiamchihna na hung ensah diai?
Ka pulepate un gamdaiah manna a ne uh; Ama’n vaan a kipanin neeh diing tanghou a pia, chia kigelh bangin, a chi va.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Mosi in hu tanghou vaan a kipanin ahung pe sih a, hizongleh ka Pa in vaan a kipanin tanghou dihtah ahung pe zaw hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Pathian tanghou chu vaan a kipana hung kumsuh, khovel kawma hinna pe pa chu ahi, a chi a.
Amahun a kawmah, Lalpa, hu tanghou chu kumkhuain hung pia in, a chi va.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, Kei hinna tanghou chu ka hi; koipouh ka kawma hung chu a gilkial ngei sih diing, huleh koipouh kei hung gingta chu a dangtaah ngei sih diing,
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, Nangun na hung muh un zong na hung gingta sih uh.
Ka Pa’n ahung piah zousiah ka kawmah ahung diing; huleh ka kawma hung photmah chu bangchi lezong ka nohdoh het sih diing.
Ajiahchu keimah deihzawng bawl diing a vaan apata hungsuh ka hi sih a, ahung sawlpa deihzawng bawl diing a hungsuh ka hi zaw hi.
Huleh Pa ahung sawlpa deihzawng chu hi ahi, Ama’n ahung piah zousiah khatbeeh mangsah lou a, hizongleh ni tawpni chianga ka kaihthoh chu,
Huleh hichu ahung sawlpa deihzawng ahi, Koipouh Tapa mu a, gingta in kumtuang hinna a neih a, huleh ke’n ni tawpni chianga amah ka kaihthoh chu, a chi a.
Huin Judate a tungah a phun va, Kei vaan apata tanghou hung kumsuh ka hi, a chih jiahin.
Huleh amahun, Hipa hi Jesu, Joseph tapa, a pa leh a nu zong i heet uh hilou ahiai mah? Vaan apata hung kumsuh ka hi, bangchidana a chih ahiai? a chi va.
Hujiahin Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Phun phun sih un.
Pa ahung sawlpa’n a hiip louhleh koimah ka kawmah ahung thei sih; huleh ke’n amah nitawp ni chiangin ka kaithou diing.
Zawlneite lehkhabu ah, Pathian hilhin a um veh diing uh, chih gelh ahi. Hujiahin michin Pa thu ja a, he photmah ka kawmah ahung veu hi.
Mi koimah in Pa a mu ngei sih, Pathian a kipana hungpa loungal; ama’n chu Pa a muta hi.
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh hi, Koipouh kei hung gingta in kumtuang hinna a neita.
Kei hinna tanghou chu ka hi.
Na pulepate un gamdaiah manna a ne va, a si uh.
Hichu vaan apata hung kumsuh tanghou, mi’n a neeh a, a sih louh nadiing uh chu ahi.

Kei vaan apata tanghou hing hung kumsuh chu ka hi, mi koipouh in hi tanghou a neeh inchu kumtuang in a hing diing uh; huleh ka tanghou piah diing chu khovel hinna diing a ka piah diing ka tahsa ahi, a chi a.
Hujiahin Judate a kinial va, Bangchidana hipa’n a tahsa neeh diing a pe thei diing ahiai? a chi va.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Mihing Tapa tahsa na neeh va, huleh a sisan na dawn louh uleh nanguhah hinna na nei sih uh.
Koipouh ka tahsa ne a, huleh ka sisan dawnin kumtuang hinna a neita; huleh ke’n amah chu ni tawpni chian ka kaithou diing hi.
Ajiahchu ka tahsa hi an ahitahzet a, huleh ka sisan zong dawn diing tahzet ahi.
Koipouh ka tahsa ne a, ka sisan dawn chu keiah a um zinga, huleh kei amah ah ka um zing hi.
Pa hingin ahung sawl a, huleh Pa jiaha ka hin bangmahin koipouh kei hung ne chu kei jiahin amah zong a hing diing.
Hichu vaan a kipana tanghou hing hung kumsuh chu ahi; na pulepate un manna a neeh va a sih banguh chu ahi sih; koipouh hi tanghou ne chu kumtuang in a hing diing hi, a chi a.
Hi thute ama’n Kapernaum khua a, a um laiin kikhopna inn ah a soi hi.
Hujiahin a nungjuite tampiin hi thu a jah un, Hichu thu hahsa ahi, kua’n ahiai ngai thei diing? a chi va.
Huin Jesu’n hi thu ah a nungjuite a phun uh chih a lungsima a heet in, a kawmvah, Hi thuin nanguh ahung lunghilousah maw?
Mihing Tapa tuma a, a umna ngeiah kaltou mu le u’chin bang na loh diviai?
Suhingtu chu hagau ahi a, tahsa chu bangmah a phatuam sih; na kawmva ka thusoite chu hagau ahi a, huleh hinna zong ahi.
Hizongleh na lahvah gingta lou khenkhat na um uh, a chi a. Ajiahchu Jesu’n a tuung apata a gingta loute leh amah mansah diingpa a heetsa ahi.
Huleh ama’n, Hujiahin ahi, Ka Pa’n ahung piah louhleh koimah ka kawmah ahung thei sih, chia na kawmva ka soi, a chi a.
Hu huna kipanin a nungjuite tampi a nungpaita va, amah a jui nawnta sih uhi.
Huin Jesu’n sawmlenihte kawmah, Nanguh zong na paimang diing uh maw? a chi a.
Simon Peter in a dawng a, a kawmah, Lalpa, koi kawmah ahiai ka chiah diing uh? Nang in kumtuang hinna thute na nei hi.
Huleh nang chu hu Pathian hing Tapa, Khrist chu na hi chih ka gingta va, he zong ka he uhi, a chi a.
Jesu’n amahuh a dawng a, Nanguh sawmlenihte ka hung teel na hi sih viai mah? huleh na lahva khat diabol ahi, a chi a.
Ama’n Simon tapa, Juda Iskariot thu a soi ahi; ajiahchu amah hi sawmlenihte laha telve, amah mansah diingpa chu ahi.
Hi silte nungin Jesu chu Galili gam ah a vaah a, Judate’n thah a tup jiahun Judia gam a pha nuamta sih a.
Huleh Judate bawh kuut ahung naita a.
Hujiahin a unaute’n a kawmah, Hi apat in Judia gam ah chiahmang in, na nungjuite’n na natohte a muh theihna diingun;
A minthanna diing bawl ngalin koima’n sil bang aha a guuhin a bawl ngei sih hi. Hi silte bawl na hihleh khovel kawmah kimusah in, a chi va.
Ajiahchu a unaute ngei in zong amah a gingta sih uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Ka hun a tung nai sih; hizongleh nanguh hun chu bangchih laipouh in a tung zing hi.
Khovel in nanguh ahung ho thei sih a, kei chu ahung hua uhi: a natohte uh a gilou chih ka heetsah jiahin.
Nanguh gual vaahna ah chiahtou un; kei chu hi gual vaahna ah ka hungtou nai sih diing hi. Ajiahchu ka hun a tung bukim nai sih hi, a chi a.
Hi thute a kawmva a soi zohin amah chu Galili gam ah a um zing nalai a.
Hizongleh a unaute ankuang luina a, a chiahtouh nungun amah zong vaantaang heet hilou in, a guuhin a chiahtou a.
Huin Judate’n gual vaahna ah amah a hawl va, Khoi a um ahiai? a chi va.
Huchi'n amah tungtaang ah mipite lahah phunna nasatah a umta a; ajiahchu khenkhat in, Mi hoih ahi, a chi va; a dangin, Mite a heem a hizaw, a chi va.
Ahihvangin Judate lau jiahin koima’n a tung thu a langtangin a soi ngam sih uhi.
Huleh ankuang lui saan lai tahin Jesu chu Pathian biahinn ah a chiahtou a, thu a hilh a.
Huleh Judate’n thumah a sa va, Hipa’n jil ngeiloupi a bangchidan a lehkha he ahiai? a chi va.
Huin Jesu’n amahuh a dawng a, Ka thuhilh chu keimaha hung kuan ahi sih a, ahung sawlpa a hung kuan a hizaw hi.
Mi koipouh in a deihzawng a bawl inchu thuhilhna chu Pathian a kuan ahiai, ahihlouhleh keimah phuaah thuh ka soi ahiai chih a he diing uh.
Koipouh amah phuaahthuh thusoi chu amah kipaahtawina diing hawl ahi; hizongleh koipouh a sawlpa paahtawina diing hawl chu, amah ngei chu mi dih ahi a, amah ah dihtat louhna himhim a um sih hi.
Mosi’n nanguh daan ahung pe sih eimah? hizongleh na lahva koima’n daan na jui sih uh. Bang diinga thah hung tum na hi viai? a chi a.
Mipite’n a dawng va, Dawi paai na hive, kua’n ahiai nang thah hung tum? a chi va.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Nna khat ka tong a, na bawnun thumah na sa uhi.
Huchi'n Mosi’n zehtan thu nanguh ahung pia a, (Mosi piah ahi sih a, pulepate a hung kipan ahi zaw), huleh khawlni’n mi zeh na tan veu uh.
Mosi daan bohsiat louh na diing a mi’n khawlni a zeh a tan inchu, ke’n khawlni a mi khat ka damsiangsah jiahin ka tungah na lungthah uh ahiai mah?
A latdan bangin thu khen sih unla, dihtattahin khen zaw un, a chi a.
Huin Jerusalem mi khenkhat in, Hipa, thah a tup pa uh hilou ahiai mah?
Hizongleh endih vua, haangtahin thu a soi a, amahun laha kawmah bangmah a soi sih uh. Amah hi Khrist chu ahi chih vaihawmtute’n a he tahtah uh adiai?
Enlah hipa khoia hung kipan chih i he ngal a, hizongleh Khrist ahung chiangin chu koima’n a he sih diing hi, a chi va.

Huin, Jesu chu Pathian biahinn ah thuhilhin a kikou a, Nangun kei na hung he va, huleh khoi a hung kuan chih zong na hung he uh; keimah thua hung ka hi sih a, hizongleh amah ahung sawlpa chu a dih ahi, nangun amah na he sih uh.
Hizongleh ke’n amah ka he hi; ajiahchu amah a kuana hung ka hi a, huleh amah hung sawl ka hi, a chi a.
Huin amah mat a tum va, hizongleh a hun a tun nai louh jiahin koima’n a tungah khut a nga sih uh.
Huleh mipi tam tahin amah a gingta va, Khrist ahung chiangin hipa bawl sanga tamzaw silmah a bawl diai? a chi uh.
Pharisaite’n a tung thu ah mipite hutobanga a phun uh a ja va, huleh Pharisaite leh siampu lalte’n amah man diingin houtute a sawl va.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, Tomchakhat na kawmvah ka um diing a, huzohchian ahung sawlpa kawmah ka chiah diing hi.
Nangun na hung hawl diing va, na hung mu sih diing uh; huleh ka umna ah na hung thei sih diing uh, a chi a.
Huin Judate amahuh kihouin, i muh louh diing a khoi a chiah diing a de aw? Jentelte laha kithedalhte kawma chiah a Jentelte thu va hilh diing a diai?
Na hung hawl diing va, na hung mu sih diing uh; huleh ka umna ah na hung thei sih diing uh, a chih bang a chihna a diai? a chi uhi.
Huleh gual vaahna ni loupi, ni nunungpenah Jesu chu a ding a, a kikou a, Koipouh a dang a taahleh ka kawmah hung henla, dawn heh.
Koipouh kei hung gingta chu Pathian lehkhathuin a soi bangin a sunga kipanin tuihing luite a luang doh diing, a chi a.
(Hizongleh hichu ama’n amah gingtate’n a muh diing uh Hagau Siangthou a soi na ahi; ajiahchu Hagau Siangthou piah ahi nai sih a, Jesu paahtawia a um nai louh jiahin).
Hujiahin mipi tamtahte’n hi thu a jah tahun, Tahzetin hipa zawlnei khu ahi, a chi va;
Adangte’n, Khrist ahi, a chi uh. Hizongleh khenkhatte’n, Khrist Galili gam ah ahung piang diai mah?
Pathian lehkhathu in, Khrist chu David haahte lahah leh David teenna khua Bethlehem ah ahung piangdoh diing, a chi sih eimah? a chi uh.
Huchi'n amah jiahin mite lahah kikhenna a umta hi.
Huleh a lahva khenkhat in amah mat a tum va, hizongleh koima’n a tungah khut a nga sih uh.
Huin houtute chu siampu lalte leh Pharisaite kawmah a hung va, huleh amahun a kawmvah, Bang diinga amah hung puilou? ana chi va.
Houtute’n, Hipa thusoi bangin koima’n thu soi ngei himhim sih, a chi va, a dawng va.
Huin Pharisaite’n, Nang u’zong heema um na hita uh maw?
Vaihawmtute leh Pharisaite lahah amah gingta mi a umkha ta’imah?
Hizongleh daan he lou hi mipite chu haamsethuaah ahi uh, a chi va, a dawng va.
Nikodem, jan a Jesu kawma hungpa, a lahva telve in a kawmvah,
I daanun mi amah kama thu jah ma leh, a silbawlte heet ma in siamlouh a tangsah ngei ei mah? a chi a.
Amahun a dawng va, a kawmah, Nang zong Galili mi na hia maw? Hawl inla, en in, ajiahchu Galili gam ah zawlnei himhim a piang ngei sih hi, a chi va.
Huin mi chin a inn chiat vah a chiahta uhi.
Jesu chu Olive taang ah a chiahta a.
Huleh jingkal matahin Pathian biahinn ah ahung kiit a, mi zousiah a kawmah a hung a; huleh amah chu a tou a, amahuh thu a hilh hi.
Huleh lehkhagialtute leh Pharisaite’n numei khat, a aangkawm lai a, a mat uh, a kawmah ahung pui va, a lai va a dinsah zoh un,
A kawmah, Houtupa, hi numei a aangkawm laitaha kiman ahi a.
Daan lehkhabu ah Mosi’n hitobang mi chu suang a sehlup diing thu ahung pia hi; hizongleh nang bangchi diing na chi ei? a chi va.
Hichu amah heehna diing a muh theihna diing va a ze-etna a, a soi uh ahi a. Hizongleh Jesu chu a kuun a, amahuh soi jalou hileh kilawm in, a khutzung in lei a gial a.
Huchi'n a dot mun jiahun a thoudoh a, a kawmvah, Na lahva sualna nei hetlou penin amahnu chu sep masa heh, a chi a.
Huin a kuun kiit a, lei a gial jel a.
Huleh amahun hi thu a jah un a sialepha heetna un siamlouh tangsah in, a upapen a kipan a tawptanin khat khat in a chiahmangta va; Jesu chauh leh numeinu a lai a diing toh a um hi.
Huin Jesu a thou a, numeinu chih louh midang a muh louh tahin a kawmah, Numei, nang hung heehte khoi a um ahita viai? koima’n siamlouh ahung tangsah sih maw? a chi a.
Amahnu’n, Koima’n hung tangsah lou, Lalpa, a chi a. Jesu’n a kawmah, Ke’n zong siamlouh ka hung tangsah sih hi, chiah inla, sual kiit nawn sin, a chi hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Kei khovel vaah ka hi; koipouh kei hung jui chu mial ah a khohei sih diing a, hizongleh hinna vaah a nei zaw diing hi, a chi a.
Hujiahin Pharisaite’n a kawmah, Nangmah leh nangmah thu na kiheetsah ahi, na thu heetsah a dih sih hi, a chi va.

Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmvah, Keimah leh keimah thu kiheetsah hizongleh ka thu heetsah a dih hi; ajiahchu khoi a kuan a hung ka hih leh, khoi a chiah diing ka hih ka he hi; hizongleng nangun khoi a kuan a hung ka hih leh, khoi a chiah diing ka hih na he sih uh.
Nangun tahsa daan in vai na hawm uh; ke’n koimah vai ka hawmsah sih.
Huleh vai hawmsah hitazongleng ka vaihawm chu a dih hi; ajiahchu kei ngen ka hi sih a, kei leh ka Pa ahung sawlpa ka hi zaw uhi.
Na daan lehkhabu va’ zong, Mi nih thuheetpih chu a dih ahi, chih gelh ahi.
Kei chu keimah thuheetpih khat ka hi a, huleh Pa ahung sawlpa’n ka thu ahung heetpih hi, a chia.
Huin amahun, a kawmah, Na Pa khoiah a um ei? a chi va Jesu’n a dawng a, Nangun kei lah na hung he sih va, ka Pa lah na he sih uh; kei hung he hile uchin ka Pa zong na he diing uh, a chi a.
Hi thute Jesu’n Pathian biahinn a thu a hilh laiin sumkoihna munah a soi a; huleh koima’n a tungah khut a nga sih, ahun a tun nai louh jiahin.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Ka chiahmang diing a, nangun na hung hawl diing uh; ka chiahna ah na hung thei sih diing uh, a chi kiit a.
Huin Judate’n, Amah leh amah a kithat diing a diai? a chi va; ama’n, Ka chiahna diing ah na hung thei sih diing uh, a chih jiahin.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, Nanguh chu nuai lama kipan na hi va; kei chu tunglama kipan ka hi; nanguh hi khovel a na hi va, kei chu hi khovel a ka hi sih.
Hujiahin na kawmvah, Na sualna vah na si diing uh; ajiahchu kei amah ka hi chih na gintaat louh uleh na sualna vah na si diing uh, ka chi ahi, a chi a.
Huin amahun a kawmah, Nang koi na hiai? a chi va Jesu’n a kawmvah, Achiila kipana na kawmva ka soi khu mah ka hi,
Na tung thu vah soi diing leh vaihawmsah diing tampi ka nei hi; hizongleh ahung sawlpa chu a dih hi; huleh amah apata ka jahte chu khovel kawmah ka soi veu hi, a chi a.
Ama’n Pa thu a kawmvah a soi ahi chih amahun a he sih uhi.

Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Mihing Tapa na khaikaang zoh chiangun amah ka hi chih leh, keimah thu in bangmah ka bawl sih a, hizongleh ka Pa’n ahung hilh bangin hi thute ka soi zaw ahi, chih na he diing uh.
Amah ahung sawlpa ka kawmah a um hi; Pa'in ka ngen in ahung nuse sih; ajiahchu a kipaah zawng silte ka bawl zing hi, a chi a.
Hi thute a soi laiin mi tampi’n amah a gingta uhi.
Huin Jesu’n amah gingta Judate kawmah, Ka thu a na um zing uleh ka nungjuite na hitahzet diing uh.
Huleh thutah na he diing va, thutahin nanguh ahung suaahtasah diing hi, a chi a.
Amahun, Abraham haahte ka hi va, bangchih mahin koimah salin ka taang ngei sih uh; bangchidan a na suaahta diing uh, na chih ahiai? chi'n a dawng va.
Jesu’n amahuh a dawng a, Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Koipouh sual bawl chu sual suaah ahi.
Suaah chu kumtuang in innah a um zing sih; hizongleh Tapa chu kumtuang in a um zing hi.
Hujiahin Tapa in ahung suaahtaatsah inchu na suaahta tahzet diing uhi.
Abraham haahte na hi uh chih ka hung he hi; hizongleh nangun kei thah na hung tum uh, ka thu nanguh a, a um louh jiahin.
Ke’n ka Pa kawma ka muhte ka soi a; nangun na pa kawmva na muhte uh na bawl uhi, a chi a.
Amahun a dawng va, a kawmah, Abraham ka pa uh ahi, a chi va Jesu’n a kawmvah, Abraham tate hile u’chin Abraham natohte na tong diing uh.
Hizongleh tuin kei, Pathian kawma ka jah thutah na kawmva hung hilhpa thah na hung tum uh; Abraham in hichibangin a bawl sih hi.
Nangun chu na pa uh silbawlte na bawl uhi, a chi a. Huin amahun a kawmah, aang kikawm a piang ka hi sih uh; Pa khat ka nei uh, huchu Pathian ahi, a chi va.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, Pathian na Pa uh hile chu keimah na hung lungsiat diing uh; ajiahchu Pathian a kipana hung pawt ka hi a; keimah thu in ka hung sih a, ama’n ahung sawl zaw ahi.
Bangchidan a ka haam dan hesiam lou na hiviai? ka thu na pom theih louh jiahun ahi.

Nang u’chu na pa uh diabol a hung kuan na hi uh, huleh na pa uh deihzawng na bawl ut uhi. Amah chu a chiila kipana tualthat ahi a, huleh thutah ah a um sih, amaha thutah a um louh jiahin. Juau a soi inzong amah a ngei a soi ahi; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh amah mi zuau ahi a, huleh zuau pa zong ahi.
Thutah ka soi jiahin nangun na hung gingta sih uhi.
Na lahvah kua na hi viai sual thu a siamlouh hung tangsah? Thutah ka soi leh bang diing a hung gingta lou na hi viai?
Pathian a hung kuanin Pathian thu a ngaikhe veu; hujiahin na ngaikhe lou uh ahi, Pathian a hung kuan na hih louh jiahun; a chi a.
Huin Judate’n a dawng va, a kawmah, Samarimi na hi a, huleh dawipaai na hi ka hung chih uh ka chi dih mahmah sih viaimah? a chi va.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Dawipaai ka hi sih a, ka Pa ka paahtawi ahi zaw; nangun kei na hung paahtawi sih uh.
Keimah loupina diing chauh ka hawl sih; a hawl leh vaihawmtu khat a um hi.
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Mi koipouh in ka thu a zop leh sih na a mu ngei himhim sih diing, a chi a.

Huin Judate’n a kawmah, Tuinchu dawipaai na hi chih ka hung heta uh. Abraham a sita a, huleh zawlneite zong a sita uh; hizongleh nangin, Mi koipouh in ka thu a zop leh sih na a mu ngei himhim sih diing, na chi hi.
Ka pu uh Abraham sisa sanga loupizaw na hiai mah? huleh zawlneite zong a sita uh; nang leh nang koia kibawl na hiai? a chi va.
Jesu’n, Kei le kei kipaahtawi hitaleng ka kipaahtawina bangmah ahi sih diing; ahung paahtawi chu ka Pa, nangun ka Pathian uh ahi na chih uh ahi.
Hizongleh nangun amah na he sih uh; ke’n chu amah ka he hi; amah ka he sih chitaleng nanguh banga mi zuau ka hita diing hi; hizongleh amah ka he a, huleh a thu zong ka zop zing hi.
Na pu uh Abraham in ka ni muh diing a nuam mahmah a, huleh a mu ngei a, a kipaah mahmah hi, a chi a.
Huin Judate’n a kawmah, Nang kum sawmngaa zong ching nailou chin a, Abraham na mukha maw? a chi va.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Abraham um ma in ka um hi, a chi a.
Huin amahun a sehna diingin suang a la va, hizongleh Jesu chu a kiphual a, Pathian biahinn apat a pawta, a lahva paisuaahin a chiahta hi.
Huleh Jesu’n a paikawmin a pian apat mittaw khat a mu a.
A nungjuite’n a kawmah, Houtupa, hipa mittaw a, a pian, kua’n ahiai sil sual bawl, hipa’n ahiai, ahihlouhleh a nulepa’n? chi'n a dong va.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Hipa lah a sual sih a, a nulepa lah a sual sih uh; hizongleh Pathian natohte amah a, a kilattheih na diingin ahi zaw hi.
Suun ahihlaiin ahung sawlpa nna ka toh ngeingei diing ahi; jan hung tung diing ahita, hu hun chiangin koima’n nna a tong thei sih diing uh.
Khovel a ka um sung teng khovel vaah ka hi, a chi a.
Huchia a soi zohin leiah chil a siat a, hu chilin tungman a bawl a, huleh hu tungman chu mittawpa mit ah a nuh a.
Huleh a kawmah, Chiah inla, Siloam diilah va sil in, a chi a. (Siloam chu, Sawl chihna ahi). Hujiahin a chiah a, a sil a, huleh muthei in a hungta hi.
Hujiahin a innveengte leh ma a, a mittawt lai musate’n, Hipa hi khutdoh a tou veupa hilou ahiai mah? a chi va.
Khenkhatte’n, Amah ahi, a chi va a dangte’n, A kibatpih ahi, a chi uh; hizongleh ama’n, Amah chu ka hi, a chi a.
Hujiahin amahun a kawmah, Bangchi'n ahiai na mit ahung vaah? a chi va.

Ama’n a dawng a, Jesu kichi mi khat in tungman a bawl a, ka mit ahung nuhsah a, huleh ka kawmah, Siloam diilah chiah inla, va sil in, ahung chi a. Huchi'n ka chiah a, ka sil a, huleh ka mutheita hi, a chi a.
Huin amahun, a kawmah, Amah khoiah a um ei? a chi va. Ama’n, Ka he sih, a chi a.
Huleh a ma a mittawpa chu Pharisaite kawmah ahung pui va.
Jesu’n tungman bawl a, a mit a suhvaah ni chu khawlni ahi a.
Pharisaite’n zong a mit hung vaah daan a kawmah a dong kiit va. Ama’n a kawmvah, Ka mit ah tungman a nuh a, ka va sil a, huleh ka muta hi, a chi a.

Hujiahin Pharisaite khenkhat in, Hipa Pathian a hung kuan ahi sih; ajiahchu khawlni a tang sih hi, a chi va a dangte’n, Bangchi'n misualin hitobang silmah a bawl thei diai? a chi va. Huin a lahvah kikhen na a umta hi.
Huin amahun mittawpa kawmah, Na mit hung suhvaahsahpa, amah tungtaang nang bang na chi ngaihtuah ei? a chi kiit va. Ama’n, zawlnei ahi, a chi a.
Hizongleh Judate’n chu a mit hung vaahpa nulepa a kouh masiah uh, mittaw ana hia, ahung vaahta ahi chih a tungtaang thu a gingta sih uhi.
Huleh amahun a nulepa kawmah, Hipa, na tapa uh mittaw a piang na chih uh ahi maw? bangchi'n ahiai tua ahung muhtheih taah? a chi va.
A nulepate’n amahuh a dawng va, Hi ka tapa uh ahi a, huleh mittawin a piang chih ka he uh,
Hizongleh bangchidan a tu a ahung muhtheih taah ka he sih uh; huleh kua’n a mit a suhvaahsah zong ka he sih uh; Mi piching ahi na, amah dong un; amah tungtaang ama’n a kisoi mai diing, a chi va.
Hi thute a nulepate’n Judate a lau jiahun a soi uhi; ajiahchu Judate’n ma apat in, Amah chu Khrist ahi, chia phuang a umleh kikhopna inn apat nohdoh diing chi'n thu ana lemsahta uhi.
Hujiahin ahi a nulepate’n, Mi piching ahi na, amah dong un, a chi uh.
Huin amahun mittawpa chu a kou kiit va, a kawmah, Pathian paahtawi in, hipa zaw misual ahi chih ka he uh, a chi va.
Ama’n a dawng a, Misual ahihleh hih louh ka he sih; sil khat ka he hi, mittaw kana hi a, tuin chu ka mutheita hi, a chi a.
Huin amahun a kawmah, Ama’n na tungah bang ahiai a bawl? na mit bang ahung chi suhvaahsah ei? a chi kiit va.
Ama’n, Ka hung hilhta a, hizongleh na ja nuam sih uh; bang diinga ja nuam kiit na hi viai? nanguh zong a nungjui hih na ut u'maw? chi'n a dawng a.
Huin amah a tai va, Nang amah nungjui na hi a; kei u’chu Mosi nungjuite ka hi uh.
Pathian in Mosi kawmah thu a soi chih ka he uh; hipa ahihleh khoi a kipana hung ahih ka he sih uh, a chi va.
Amahpa’n a dawng a a kawmvah, Hikhutah ahi a thumah na, Khoi a kipana hung ahih na heet louh uh, ama’n lah ka mit a hungsuh vaahsah ngal hi.
Pathian in misualte thu a ngaikhe ngei sih chih i he uh; hizongleh mi koipouh Pathian ngaihsah a, a deihzawng bawl chu Pathian in a ngaikhe veu hi.
Khovel um tuung a kipan koima’n mittaw a piang mit a suhvaahsah chih a kija ngei sih.
Hipa Pathian a hung kuan ahih louh inchu bangmah a bawl, thei sih diing, a chi a.
Amahun a dawng va, a kawmah, Nang sual lumleta piangin keiuh na hung hilh vial maw? a chi va. Huin amah chu a nohdohta uhi.
Jesu’n amah a nohdoh uh chih a jah in, huleh amah a muh in a kawmah, Pathian Tapa na gingta ei? a chi a.
Ama’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Lalpa, amah’ koi ahiai? ka gintaat theihna diing in, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Amah na muta a, huleh nang hung houpihpa ahi, a chi a.
Huin ama’n, Lalpa, ka gingta hi, a chi a. Huleh amah a beta hi.
Huin Jesu’n, Muthei loute’n ahung muhtheihna diing uleh, mit vaahte mit ahung tawt theihna diing in vaihawm diing in khovel ah ka hung ahi, a chi a.
A kawm a um Pharisai khenkhatte’n hi thute a jah un, a kawmah, Kei u’zong mittaw ka hi viai mah? a chi va.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, Mittaw hile u’chin sualna nei lou diing hi u’chin a; hizongleh tuin, Ka muthei uh, na chi va; hujiahin na sualna uh a um zing hi, a chi hi.
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Koipouh kotkhaah a luutlou a, lamtuama kala belaam huanga luut chu guta leh suammang ahi.
Hizongleh koipouh kotkhaah a luut chu belaampu ahi.
Amah chu kotkhaah ngaahpa’n ana honsah a; belaamte’n a aw a ja uh; huleh ama’n a belaamte chu a min un a kou a, a puidoh veu hi.
Huleh a belaamte a pawtdohsah chiangin a ma vah a pai a, belaamte’n a nung a jui uh; a aw a heet jiahun.
Midangte chu a jui sih diing va, a taimangsan zaw diing uh; ajiahchu midang aw a ja thei sih uh, a chi a.
Hi tehkhinthu Jesu’n a kawmvah a soi a; hizongleh amahun a kawmva bang thu ahiai a soi chih a he sih uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Kei belaam kotkhaah chu ka hi.
Ka ma a hung pai zousiah chu gutate leh suammangte ahi uh; hizongleh belaamte’n a thu uh a ngai sih uhi.
Kei kotkhaah chu ka hi; koipouh keimaha a luut leh hutdam in a um diing; huleh luut in a pawt diing a, neeh diing a mu diing hi.
Guta chu gu diing leh, that diing leh, suse diing loungalin ahung sih; kei chu amahun hinna a neihna diing uleh, tampi a, a neihna diing va hung ka hi.
Kei belaampu hoih chu ka hi; belaampu hoihin a belaamte diing in a hin na a pia hi.
Hizongleh kiloh, belaampu tahlou, belaamte amah a hilou inchu ngei hung a muh chiangin belaamte a nusia a, a tai veu; huleh ngeiin amahuh a man a, a sudalh veu hi.
Kiloh chu a tai veu; kiloh ahihjiahin, huleh belaamte a ngaihsah sih hi.
Kei belaampu hoih chu ka hi, huleh ka belaamte ka he a, amahun zong kei ahung he uhi.
Pain kei ahung heet bangin ke'n zong Pa ka he hi; huleh belaamte diingin ka hinna ka pia hi.
Huleh hi belaam huang a lou belaam dang ka nei hi; amah u’zong ka hung pui diing a, ka aw a ja diing uh; huleh hon khat in a um diing va belaampu khat toh.
Hujiahin ka Pain ahung lungsiat hi, laah kiit diing a ka hinna ka piah jiahin.
Koima’n ahung laahsah ahi sih a, ka thuin ka pia ahi zaw hi. Piah theihna leh laah kiit theihna thu ka nei hi. Hi thupiah ka Pa apat ka muta hi, a chi a.
Hujiahin hi thute jiahin Judate lahah kikhenna a um kiitta hi.
Huleh a lahva tampi in, Dawipaai ahi, a ngol ahi; bang diing a, a thu ngaikhia na hi viai? a chi va.
Adangte’n, Hi thute dawipaai mi thusoi ahi sih; dawiin mittaw mit a suvaah thei eimah? a chi uhi.
Huleh Jerusalem a kipumpiahna gual vaah lai ahi a; phalbi lai ahi.
Jesu chu Pathian biahinn ah Solomon innliimah a vaah lehleh a.
Huleh Judate a kiimvelaha hung va, a kawmah, Bangtan ahiai lungawpkai a na hung koih diing? Khrist na hihleh chiantahin hung hilh in, a chi va.
