Jesu’n amahuh a dawng a, Ka hung hilhta a, na gingta sih uh; ka Pa mina ka natohte’n ka tanchin ahung heetpih uhi.
Hizongleh na kawmva ka soi taah mah bangin ka belaam laha mi na hih louh jiahun na gingta sih uh.
Ka belaamte’n ka aw a ja uh, ke'n amahuh ka he hi; huleh amahun ahung jui uhi.
Huleh keima’n a kawmvah kumtuang hinna ka pia hi, kumtuang in a mangthai sih diing va, koima’n ka khut apat ahung laahsah thei sih diing uh;
Ka Pa amahuh hung pepa mi zousiah sangin a lian zaw hi; koima’n ka Pa khut apat ahung laahsah sih diing hi.
Kei leh ka Pa khat ka hi uh, a chi a.
Huin Judate’n a sehna diingin suang a la kiit va.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, Na hoih tampi ka Pa akipanin nanguh ka hung musah a, hu nnate laha khoipen jiahin ahiai suang a na hung sehtum uh? a chi a a dawng a.
Judate’n a dawng va, Natoh hoih jiahin suang in seh ka hung tum uh ahi sih a; hizongleh Pathian na soisiat jiah leh, nang mihing hi ngal a, Pathian banga na kibawl jiahin ahi zaw, a chi uh.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, Na daan lehkhabu vah, pathiante na hi uh, ka chi, chih gelh hilou ahiai mah?
Pathian thu tunnate bawn pathiante chi ahihleh, Pathian lehkhathu lah suhsiat theih ahi sih a;
Pa in a guat, khovel a, a sawlpa tungah, Pathian Tapa ka hi ka chih jiahin Pathian na soisia na hung chi uh ahi maw?
Ka Pa natohte ka toh louhleh hung gingta sih un,
Hizongleh ka toh a ahihleh, kei hung gingta sih mah zong leh u’chin natohte beeh gingta un; Pa keimah ah a um a, kei amah ah ka uhi chih na heet va, na gintaat theihna diingun, a chi a.
Hujiahin amah mat a tum kiit va; hizongleh a khut vapat a pawt a,
John in a chiil a baptis a bawlna mun, Jordan gaal aha chiah kiita, hutah ah a va umta hi.
Huleh mi tampi a kawmah a hung va, John in silmah bangmah bawl a nei sih, hizongleh hipa tungtaanga John in a soi zousiah a dih veh hi, a chi va.
Huleh hutah ah mi tampi’n amah a gingta uhi.
Huleh mi khat, Mari leh a sanggamnu Martha teenna khua Bethani khua a um, a min Lazar kichi a chi na a.
(A sanggampa Lazar china nu chu Lalpa thau namtui nuh a, a sama a keeng siaahnu Mari chu ahi).
Hujiahin a sanggamnute’n Jesu kawmah, Lalpa ngai in, na lungsiatpa a chi na hi, chi'n mi a sawl va.
Jesu’n hu thu a jahin, Hi natna chu sihna diing hial ahi sih a, hizongleh hi jiaha Pathian Tapa paahtawia a um theihna diing a Pathian loupina diing ahi zaw hi, a chi a.
Jesu’n Martha leh a sanggamnu leh Lazar a lungsiat hi.
Hujiahin a chi na chih a jahin a umna mun mah ah ni nih a um nalai hi.
Huzohin a nungjuite kawmah, Judia gam ah i chiah kiit diing uh, a chi a.
A nungjuite’n a kawmah, Houtupa, tuma deuh mahin Judate’n suang in seh ahung tum va, hutah ah chiah na sawm kiit maw? a chi va.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Suun khat sungin daahkal sawmlenih a um sih eimah? Mi koizong suuna a vaah inchu a kisui ngei sih, hi khovel vaah a muh jiahin.
Hizongleh mi koizong jan a, a vaah inchu a kisui veu hi, amah a vaah a um louh jiahin, a chi a.
Hi thute ama’n a soi a, huzohin a kawmvah, i lawmpa uh Lazar a ihmuta, hizongleh a ihmutna apat phawng diingin ka chiah diing, a chi a.
Huin a nungjuite’n, Lalpa, ihmu ahih inchu a dam kiit na diing hi, a chi va.
Ahiinlah Jesu’n a sih thu a soi ahi a; hizongleh amahun ihmu a khawldam thu soi hiin a ngaihtuah uhi.
Huin Jesu’n chiantahin a kawmvah, Lazar a sita hi,
Huleh nanguh vanga hutah a ka um louh ka kipaah hi, na gintaat theihna diingun; Ahiinlah a kawmah i chiah diing uh, a chi a.
Huin Thoma, Didum a kichipa’n a nungjui hihpihte kawmah, Amah toh i sihkhawm theihna diingin ei u’zong i chiah diing uh, a chi a.
Huin Jesu ahung tunin amah haanah ni li ana umta chih ahung heta.
Bethani chu Jerusalem khokawm naih, chiing sawmlengaa vela gamla ahi a.
Huleh Judate tampi Martha leh Mari kawmah a hung va; a sanggampa uh sih na tunga amahuh hehnem diingin.
Huin Martha chu, Jesu ahung chih a jah tahin, a chiah a, amah a va lamtuah a; hizongleh Mari chu inn sungah a tou nalai hi.
Huin Martha in Jesu kawmah, Lalpa, hitaha um hilechin chu ka sanggampa si lou diing hi a,
Hizongleh tuin zong Pathian kawma na nget photmah Pathian in ahung pe diing chih ka he hi, a chi a.
Jesu’n amahnu kawmah, Na sanggampa a thou kiit diing hi, a chi a.
Martha in a kawmah, Ni tawpni a misite thoh kiit na ah a thou kiit diing chih chu ka he hi, a chi a.
Jesu’n amahnu kawmah, Kei thoh kiit na leh hinna ka hi; koipouh kei hung gingta chu si mah zongleh a hing diing;
Huleh hinga hung gingta photmah chu bangchih tanin a si sih diing hi. Hikhu na gingta ei? a chi a.
Amahnu’n a kawmah, Hi, Lalpa, nang chu Khrist, Pathian Tapa, khovel a hung diingpa chu na hi chih ka gingta hi, a chi a.
Huchi a, a soi zohin a chiah a, a sanggamnu Mari chu a guuh in a kou a, Houtupa a hung a, ahung kou hi, a chi a.
Amahnu in hu a jahin kintahin a thou a, a kawmah ahung a,
Jesu chu khosung ahung tung nai sih a, Martha in a va lamtuahna munah a um nalai hi.
Huin Judate, inn sunga amah hehnema amah toh umte’n Mari chu kintaha thou a pawtdoh a muhun a nung a jui va, Haanah kap diingin a chiah, chi in.
Huin Mari in Jesu umna mun ahung tun a, amah a muh in, a keengbulah a puuh a, a kawmah, Lalpa, hitaha um hilechin chu ka sanggampa si lou diing hi a, a chi a.
Jesu’n Mari kap leh, amah toh hung Judate zong kapa um a muh in lungsim in a thuum a, huleh a mangbang a.
Huleh, Amah khoiah na sial viai? a chi a. Amahun a kawmah, Lalpa, hung inla, en in, a chi va.
Jesu a kapta.
Huin Judate’n, En dih vua, lungsiat hina mai e! a chi va.
Khenkhat in, Hipa mittaw mit suhvaahsahpa’n hipa zong silou sah thei lou adiai? a chi va.
Hujiahin Jesu chu a lungsima thuum kiit in haan ah a hung a, haan chu kohawm ahi a, huleh suang a sit ahi.
Jesu’n, A suang ladoh un, a chi a. Misipa sanggamnu Martha in a kawmah, Lalpa, tu inchu a uihta diing; ajiahchu a sih na ni li ahita hi, a chi a.
Jesu’n amahnu kawmah, Na gintaata ahihleh Pathian loupina na mu diing, na kawmah ka chi sih eimah? a chi a.
Huin amahun misi umna apat suang chu a ladoh va. Huleh Jesu chu a vaandaah a, Pa, ka thu na ngaihkhiah jiahin na tungah ka kipaah hi;
Huleh na hung ngaikhe zingzing chih zong ka he hi, hizongleh ka kiima diing mipite jiahin hikhu ka chi ahi, Nangma'n na hung sawl chih a gintaat na diingun, a chi a.
Huchi a, a soi zohin aw ngaihtahin, Lazar, hung pawtdoh in, chi'n a kikou a.
Huin misi chu a khut a keeng haan puana kituamin ahung pawtdoh a; a maai chu kisiaahna puana tuam ahi a. Jesu’n a kawmvah, Phel unla, paisah un, a chi a.
Huchi'n Mari kawma hung, huleh Jesu silmah bawl mu Judate tampiin Jesu a gingta ta uhi.
Hizongleh khenkhat chu Pharisaite kawmah a chiah va, Jesu silbawlte a va hilh uhi.
Huin siampu lalte leh Pharisaite’n vaihawmtute a koukhawm va, Bang i lohta diai? hipa’n silmah tampi a bawl hi.
Hichibanga i hahjan unchu mi zousiah in amah a gingta diing va, huleh Romemite ahung diing a, i mun leh chite ahung laahsah diing uh, a chi uh.
Huin a lahva mi khat, Kaiapha a chih un, hu kum a siampulal ahi a, a kawmvah, Bangmacha na he sih uh,
I nam pumpi a man louhna diing a mipi luang a mi khat sih eiuh diingin a hoih chih zong na ngaihtuah sih uh, a chi a.
Hichu ama’n amah phuaahthuh in a soi ahi sih a, hu kum a siampulal ahi a, hu namte luang a Jesu a sih diing a soilawh ahi.
Huleh hu namte chauh hilou in, Pathian ta kithehdalhte zousiah pawl khata a puikhawm theihna diingin zong ahi.
Huin hu ni a kipanin amah thah na diing ngaihtuahin a kihou zingta uhi,
Hujiahin Jesu chu Judate lahah a langtangin a vaah nawn sih a; hizongleh hu a kipanin gamdai naih lamah Ephraim kichi khopi khat ah a chiah a, hutah ah a nungjuite toh a um zingta uhi.
Huleh Judate chiahkaan gual vaahna chu ahung naita a; mi tampite gam a kipanin kisusiang diingin Jerusalem ah chiahkaan gual vaah hun ma in a chiahtou uh.
Huin amahun Jesu a hawl va, Pathian biahinn a ding kawmin a kihou va, Bangchi'n na ngaihtuah viai? gual vaahna a hunglou diing adiai? a chi va.
Siampulalte leh Pharisaite’n amah a mat theihna diingun mi koipouh in a umna a heet leh a soilat diing ahi chih thu a peta uhi.
Huleh chiahkaan gual vaah na diing ni guup ma in Jesu chu misi laha kipana a kaihthoh Lazar umna Bethani khua ahung tung a.
Hutah ah amah diingin nitaah an a bawl a; Martha in neeh a bawl a, hizongleh Lazar chu amah toh a ankuang uumpihte laha khat ahi.
Huin Mari in Spiknard thau namtui man tamtah buuh kimkhat ahung tawi a, Jesu keeng a nuh a, a sam in a keengte a siaah a, huleh thau gimin inn chu a dimta hi.
Huin nungjuite laha khat, amah mansah diingpa Juda Iskariot, Simon tapa in,
Bang diing a hi thau gimtui makhai za thum a zuah a, tagahte kawma kipe lou ahiai? a chi a.
Hichu ama’n tagahte a khawhsahpih jiah hilouin, guta ahi a, dangka-ip a kol a, huleh a sunga kikoih a laah veu jiahin a soi ahi zaw hi.
Huin Jesu’n, A um um in umsah un; ka kivui ni a diingin ama’n huchu a koih ahi;
Ta gahte chu na kawmvah a um ngiitngeet uh, hizongleh kei chu na kawmvah ka um ngiitngeet sih diing; a chi a.
Hujiahin Judate tampiin amah hutah ah a um chih a heta va; Jesu jiah chauh hilouin, misi lah apat a kaihthoh Lazar zong a muhnop jiahun ahung uh.
Hizongleh siampulalte chu Lazar zong a thah theihna diingun a kihou va.
Ajiahchu amah jiahin Judate tampi a paimang va, Jesu a gingta ta uhi.
A jingni’n gual vaahna a hung mi tampi in, Jesu Jerusalem ah hung diing ahi chih a jah un,
Tuum nahte a tawi va, amah lamtuah diingin a pawtdoh va, huleh, Hosanna, Lalpa mina Israelte Kumpipa hung chu a hampha hi, a chi uh.
Huleh Jesu’n sabiltung nou khat a mu a, a tungah a tuang a, Hichia gelh bangin,
Lau sin, Zion tanu; ngai in, na Kumpipa chu sabiltung nou tung a tuang in ahung hi, chih.
Hi silte nungjuite’n a tuungin a he sih uh; hizongleh paahtawia a um nungin hi thute amah tungtaang a kigial ahi a, huleh a tungah hi silte a bawl uh ahi chih ahung hedohta uhi.
Hujiahin haan apat Lazar a kouhdoh leh, misi lah apat a kaihthoh lai a, a kawma umte’n a thu a heetpih uhi.
Hikhu jiahin mipite’n zong hi silmah a bawl chih a jah jiahun amah ana lamtuah uh ahi.
Hujiahin Pharisaite a kihou va, Bangma na loh thei sih uh chih na he viai? en un, khovel in amah a juita hi, chi'n.
Huleh ankuang luina a hungte lahah Grik mi kuate aha a um va.
Amah u’chu Galili gam a Bethsaida khua a um Philip kawmah a hung va, Pu, Jesu muh ka ut uh, chi’n a ngen va.
Philip chu a hung a, Andru a hilh a, huleh Andru leh Philipin Jesu a hilh uh.
Jesu’n amah uh a dawng a, Mihing Tapa paahtawia a umna diing hun a tungta hi.
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Buhtang khat lei a, a kiah a, a sih louhleh a ngenin a um zing; hizongleh a sih inchu tampiin a gah veu hi.
Koipouh a hinna it in a taan diing a, huleh koipouh hi leitung a a hinna huain kumtuang hin dongin a humbit diing.
Koipouhin ka nna a toh leh hung jui heh; ka umna ah ka suaahpa zong a um diing ahi; mi koipouh in ka nna a tohleh ka Pain amah a kipaahpih diing hi.
Tuin ka lungsim a mangbang hi; huleh bang ahiai ka soi diing? Pa, Hi hun lahah hung hundamin ka chi diing adiai? hizongleh hikhu diing jiaha hi huna hung ka hi ngal a.
Pa, na min paahtawi in, a chi a. Huin vaan apat aw ahung suaah a, Ka paahtawita a, huleh ka paahtawi kiit diing hi, chi’n.
Hujiahin mipi a kawma ding leh hukhu jate’n vaan ging ahi, a chi va; a dangte’n lah, angel in amah a houpih ahi, a chi uh.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Hi aw chu kei diing a hung suaah ahi sih a, nanguh diing a hung suaah ahi zaw hi.
Tu chu hi khovel vaihawm lai ahi; tuin hi khovel lal paihkhiah ahi diing hi.
Huleh kei lei apat a khaikaang a ka um leh mi zousiah ka kawmah ka hiip diing hi, a chi a.
Hichu ama’n bangtobang sihna in ahiai a sih diing chih heetsahna a, a soi ahi.

Mipite’n amah a dawng va, Khrist chu kumtuang in a um zing diing chih ka daan vapat ka ja uh, bang chidan a nangin, Mihing Tapa khaisanga a um ngei diing ahi, na chih ahiai? hi mihing Tapa chu koi ahiai? a chi va.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Hun tomchakhat vaah na lahvah a um hi; vaah na neih laiun mialin ahung lap louh na diingin khohei un; ajiahchu koipouh miala khohei in khoilama pai ahih a he sih.
Vaah na neih laiun vaah chu gingta un, vaah tate na hung hihtheihna diingun, a chi a. Hi thute Jesu’n a soi a, huin a pawta, amah vapat a kibuta hi.
Hizongleh a ma vah silmah tampi mahmah bawl zongleh amah a gingta tuan sih uhi.
Zawlnei Isaiah in, Lalpa, ka thusoi uh koi ahiai gingta? huleh Lalpa khut zong koi kawmah ahiai a kilat? chia a soi ahung taangtun theihna diingin.
Hujiahin a gingta thei sih uh, ajiahchu Isaiah in,

Ama’n a mit va a muh theih louh na diingun a mit uh a suhtawtsah a, huleh a lungtang va a heetsiamlouh na diingun a lungtang uh a suhkhauhsah ahi; ahung kihei kiit va, ka na suhdam louh na diingin, a chi kiit hi.
Hi thute chu Isaiah in a loupina a muh laia a soi ahi a, huleh a tungtaang thu a soi na ahi.
Ahihvangin vaihawmtu lamkaite lahah zong tampiin amah a gingta va, hizongleh Pharisaite jiahin amah a soiphuang ngam sih uh, huchilouin chu kikhopna inn apat nohdohin a umkha diing uhi.
Ajiahchu amahun Pathian kipaahpiha um sangin mihingte phata um a deih zaw uhi.
Jesu chu a kikou a, Koipouh kei hung gingta chu, kei hung gingta ahi sih a, ahung sawl pa gingta ahi zaw hi.
Huleh koipouh kei hung mu chu ahung sawl pa mu ahi.
Vaah diing a khovel a hung ka hi, koipouh ahung gingta chu miala a um zing louh na diingin.
Mi koipouh in ka thusoite jain, gingta sih mah zongleh ke’n siamlouh ka tansah sih; ajiahchu khovel siamlouh tangsah diing a hung ka hi sih a, khovel hundam diing a hung ka hi zaw hi.
Koipouh kei hung deihlou a, ka thusoite zong pomlouin siamlouh tangsah khat a nei hi, ka thusoite mahmahin ni tawpni chiangin amah siamlouh a tangsah diing hi.
Ajiahchu keimah phuaahtawm in ka soi sih a, hizongleh Pa ahung sawlpa’n ka soi diing leh ka hilh diing thu ahung pia hi.
Huleh a thupiah chu kumtuang hinna ahi chih ka he hi; hujiahin ka soi pouhmah chu Pain ka kawma a soi bangin ka soi veu ahi, a chi hi.
Huleh chiahkaan ankuang lui ma in, Jesu’n hi khovel apat paimanga Pa kawma a chiah diing hun ahung tungta chih a he a; khovel a um a mite chu ana lungsiatta in, amahuh chu a tawptanin a lungsiat hi.
Huin nitaah an neeh laiin diabol in Simon tapa Juda Iskariot lungtang ah Jesu matsah diing a ngaihtuahsah a.
Jesu’n Pain sil bangkim a khutah a peta chih leh, Pathian a kipana hunga, Pathian kawma chiah kiit diing a hihdan he in,
Nitaah an uumlai a ding a, a puansilh a koih a; huleh kisiaahna puan a la a, a teeng a.
Huleh kisilna kuang a tui a sun zohin a nungjuite keeng a silsah a, kisiaahna puan a teen in a siaah jui peh hi.
Huin Simon Peter kawmah ahung a, Peter in a kawmah, Lalpa, Nang in maw ka keeng na sil diing? a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Ka silbawl tuin na he sih; hizongleh tunung chiangin na hung he diing hi, a chi a.
Peter in a kawmah, Ka keeng na sil hial sih diing, a chi a. Jesu’n a dawng a, Ka hung sil louhleh ka kawmah tan bangmah na nei sih diing, a chi a.
Simon Peter in a kawmah, Lalpa ka keeng chauh hilou in, ka khut leh ka lu zong hung sil in, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Koipouh kisilsain a keeng loungal sil a mamoh sih, hizongleh a pum in a siang hi, na bawnun chu hilouin, a chi a.
Ajiahchu ama’n a mansah diingpa a he a; hujiahin, Na bawnva siang veh na hi sih uh, a chi ahi.
Huchi'n a keeng uh a silzoh a, puansilh la a, a tou kiit zohin a kawmvah, Na tungva ka silbawl bang ahih na he viai?
Nangun kei chu, Houtupa leh Lalpa, na hung chi va, na hung chi dih ngei uh, ajiahchu ka hi him hi.
Huchia kei na Lalpa uleh Houtupaun bawn na keeng uh ka sila ahihleh nanguh zong khat leh khat keeng na kisilsah diing uh ahi.
Na tungva ka bawl banga na bawlve na diingun na etton diing uh ka hung pia ahi.
Chilitahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Suaah chu a pu sangin a lianzaw sih a, huleh a kisawlpa zong a sawltu sangin a lian zaw sih;
Hi silte na heet unchu, bawl leh u’chin mi hampha na hi diing uhi.
Na bawnva thu ka soi sih; ka teelte ke'n ka he hi, hizongleh huchu, Ka tanghou neehpihpa’n ka tungah a khetuul a lehta, chih Pathian lehkhathu a taangtun theihna diing ahi.
Ahung tun ma in tuin ka hung hilh ahi, ahung tun chianga amah ka hi chih na gintaat theihna diingun.
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Koipouh ka sawltaphot kipaahpih chu kei hung kipaahpih ahi; huleh koipouh kei hung kipaahpih in ahung sawlpa a kipaahpih ahi, a chi hi.
Jesu’n hichibanga a soi zohin a lungsim a mangbang a, Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh hi, na lahva khat in ahung mansah diing, chi'n a hesahta a.
Nungjuite’n koipen ahiai a soi chih he louin a kientuah va.
Huleh a nungjuite laha khat Jesu’n a lungsiatpa chu Jesu aang a kingai in a um a.
Hujiahin Simon Peterin, Koi thu ahiai a soi chih dong diingin amah chu mitmeiin a houpih a.
Huin Jesu awma kingaipa’n a kawmah Lalpa, koipen ahiai? a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Tanghou them ka diah a, ka piah penpen chu amah ahi, a chi a. Huin tanghou them a diah zohin Simon tapa Juda Iskariot kawmah a pia hi.
Huleh tanghou them a piah zohin Setan a sungah a luutta a. Jesu’n a kawmah, Na bawl diing chu kintahin bawl in, a chi a.
Dohkaan kiima pute koimah in bang chihna a hu thu a kawma a soi chih a he sih uh.

Ajiahchu a lahva khenkhat in, Juda in dangka ip a kol jiaha Jesu’n a kawma, Gual vaahna a i mamoh diing silte lei in, chi aha, ahihlouhleh tagahte kawma bang aha khat a piah diing chi ahain a ngaihtuah uhi.
Huin amah chu tanghou them la zouin a pawtdohpah a; hulai chu jan ahi a.
Hujiahin, a pawtdoh nungin Jesu’n, Tuin chu mihing Tapa paahtawi in a umta, huleh Pathian zong amah ah paahtawi in a um hi.
Amah a Pathian paahtawia a um inchu, Pathian in zong amah ah amah a paahtawi diing a, a paahtawipah ngal diing hi.
Naute haw, tomchakhat na lahvah ka umta dih hi. Nangun na hung hawl diing va, Judate kawma, Ka chiahna ah na hung thei sih diing uh, ka chih mah bangin, tuin na kawmvah ka chi ahi.
Thupiah thah ka hung pia hi, Khat le khat kilungsiat un; Ke’n nanguh ka hung lungsiat bangin, nanguh zong khat leh khat kilungsiat un.
Khat leh khat na kilungsiat uleh mi zousiah in ka nungjuite na hi uh chih hikhu ah a he diing uhi, a chi hi.
Simon Peter in a kawmah, Lalpa khoiah ahiai na chiah diing? a chi a. Jesu’n amah a dawng a, Ka chiahna diing ah tuin na hung jui thei sih diing, a chi a.
Peter in a kawmah, Lalpa, bang jiahin ahiai tu a ka hung juih theih louh diing? nang jiahin ka hinna ka pekhe diing, a chi a.
Jesu’n amah a dawng a, Keimah jiahin na hinna na pekhe diing maw? Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh hi, Nangma'n thumvei na hung kiheetmohbawl ma in aah a khuang sih diing hi.
Na lungtang uh mangbangsah sih un; Pathian na gingta uh, Kei zong hung gingta un.
Ka Pa innah umna tampi a um; um lou hileh ka hung hilh ta diing hi. Nanguh diing a mun bawl a chiah diing ka hi.
Huleh ka chiah a, nanguh diing a mun ka bawl leh ka hung kiit diing a, ka kawmah nanguh ka hung la diing; ka umna a nanguh zong na um theihna diingun.
Khoia ka chiah diing na he va, a lampi zong na he uh, a chi a.
Thoma in a kawmah, Lalpa, khoia na chiah diing ka he sih uh; a lampi bangchi'n ka he diviai? a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Kei lampi leh, thutah leh, hinna chu ka hi; keimah a pailou in koimah Pa kawm a tung ngei sih hi.
Kei hung he hile uchin ka Pa zong na heta diing uh. Tua kipan amah na he va, muh zong na muta uhi, a chi a.
Philip in a kawmah, Lalpa, Pa chu keiuh hung musah in, huchi'n keiuh diingin ahuntawh diing, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Hitanveipi na kawmah ka um a, huchi'n zong na hung he nai sih maw, Philip? koipouh kei hung muin Pa a mu ahi; bangchidan a, Pa chu kei uh hung musah in, na chih ahiai mah?
Kei Pa ah ka um a, huleh Pa keiah a um chih gingta lou na hiai mah? Na kawmva ka thusoite, keimah thuin ka soi sih a, hizongleh Pa keia um in, ama’n sil a bawl veu hi.
Kei Pa ah ka um a, huleh Pa keiah a um chih hung gingta un; ahihlouhleh silbawlte jiah beehin hung gingta un.
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin, ka hung hilh ahi, Koipouh kei hung gingta inchu ka silbawlte ama’n zong a bawlve diing a, huleh hite sanga loupizaw zong a bawl diing, ka Pa kawma ka chiah diing jiahin.
Huleh ka min a na nget photmah uh huchu ka bawl diing, Pa Tapa a paahtawia a um theihna diing in.
Ka min a bang aha na nget uleh huchu ka bawl diing.
Kei na hung lungsiat uleh ka thupiahte jui un.
Huleh Pa ka ngen diing a, ama’n nanguh Hamuantu dang ahung pe diing, na kawmva kumtuang a um diing in.
Thutah Hagau ngei chu; khovel in amah a nei thei sih, ajiahchu amah a mu sih va, he zong a he sih uh; ahihvangin nangun chu amah na he uh; ajiahchu na kawmvah a um a, na sung vah a um diing ahi.
Ha muanna beiin ka hung nuse sih diing; na kawmvah ka hung diing hi.
Tomchakhat nungin khovel in kei ahung mu nawn sih diing; hizongleh nangun chu na hung mu diing uh; ajiahchu kei ka hing a, nanguh zong na hing diing uh.
Hu ni chiangin kei ka Pa ah ka um a, nanguh keiah na um va, huleh kei nanguh ah ka um chih na he diing uh,
Koipouh ka thupiahte nei a, jui chu, kei hung lungsiat ahi; huleh koipouh kei hung lungsiat chu ka Pa lungsiatin a um diing a, ke'n amah ka lungsiat diing a, a kawmah ka kilaah diing, a chi a.
Iskariot hiloupen, Judain a kawmah, Lalpa keiuh kawma kilaah a, khovel kawma na kilaah louh diing bangchidan ahiai, a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Mi koipouh in ahung lungsiat leh ka thu a jui diing; huleh ka Pa’n amah a lungsiat diing a, a kawmah ka hung diing va, amah toh ka umkhawm zing diing uh.
Koipouh ahung lungsiat lou in ka thusoite a jui sih; thu na jahte uh keimah a, ahi sih a, Pa ahung sawlpa a ahi zaw hi.
Na kawmva ka um taahdih sungin hi thute na kawmvah ka soi hi.
Hizongleh Hamuantu, Hagau Siangthou, Pa in ka min a ahung sawl diingin, ama’n sil zousiah nanguh ahung hilh diing a, huleh thu na kawmva ka soisa photmah nanguh ahung hedohsah diing hi.
Ha muanna ka hung nuutsiat hi, keimah hamuanna ka hung pia hi; khovel in a piah bangin ke'n nanguh ka hung pe sih. Na lungtang uh mangbangsah sih unla, lau zong lausah sih un.

Ka chiahmang diing a, na kawmvah ka hung kiit diing, chia na kawmva ka soi na zata uh. Kei na hung lungsiat unchu Pa kawmah ka chiah diing ka chih jiahin na nuam diing uh; ajiahchu ka Pa kei sangin a lianzaw hi.
Tuin ahung tun ma in ka hung hilhta hi, ahun hung tun chianga na gintaat theihna diingun.
Tukalsiah na kawmvah thu tampi ka soi nawn sih diing hi; ajiahchu hi khovel lal hungpah diing ahi a, ama’n keimah ah bangmah a nei sih hi.
Hizongleh Pa ka lungsiat a, thu ahung piah bangin ka bawl veu hi chih khovel in a heet na diingun ahi. Thou un, hi a kipanin i chiah diing uhi.
Kei grepgui dihtah chu ka hi, ka Pa a hu an enkoltu ahi.
Keimah a um ba gahlou photmah chu a paaimang veu a; a gah photmah chu a susiangthou veu hi, a gah tam sem theihna diingin.
Huin nang u’chu na kawmva ka thusoi jiahin na siang uhi.

Keimah ah um ngiitngeet un, kei zong nanguh ah ka um ngiitngeet diing. Ba in grepguia a um ngiitngeet louhngalleh amah ngen a, a gah theih louh mahbangin, nanguh zong keimaha na um ngiitngeet louh uleh na gah thei sih diing uhi.
Kei grepgui chu ka hi, nanguh a bate na hi uh; koipouh keimah a um ngiitngeet leh, kei amah a ka um ngiitngeet napa chu tampiin a gah veu hi; ajiahchu keimah louin bangmah na bawl thei sih uhi.
Mi keimah a, a um ngiitngeet louhleh ba bangin paihdohin a um a, a vuai veu hi; huleh mi’n amahuh a tomkhawm a, meiah a paai va, a kaang veu hi.
Keimaha na um ngiitngeet va, huleh ka thu zong nanguh a, a um ngiitngeet inchu na utut uh na ngen diing va, huchu ahung kibawlsah diing hi.
Hikhu ah ka Pa paahtawi in a um hi, tampi a na gah vah; huchi'n ka nungjuite na hi diing uhi.
Pa’n kei ahung lungsiat bangin ke'n nanguh ka hung lungsiat hi; ka lungsiatna ah um ngiitngeet un.
Nangun ka thupiahte na juih uleh ka lungsiatna ah na um ngiitngeet diing uh; Ke’n ka Pa thupiahte ka juih a, a lungsiatna a ka um ngiitngeet mah bangin.
Ka kipaahna nanguh a, a umden theihna diing leh, na kipaahna uh a bukim theihna diingin hi thute na kawmvah ka soi ahi.
Ke’n nanguh ka hung lungsiat bangin nanguh zong khat leh khat kilungsiatun chih ka thupiah ahi.
Mi’n a lawmte’ diing a hinna a piah sanga lianzaw lungsiatna koima’n a nei sih hi.
Thu ka hung piah photmah na bawl unchu ka lawmte na hi diing uhi.
Tu a kipat suaahte ka hung chi nawn sih diing; ajiahchu suaahin a pu in bang a bawl a he sih; lawmte ka hung chi zawta diing; ajiahchu ka Pa kawma ka jah zousiah na kawmvah ka hung hilhta hi.

Nangun kei na hung teel sih va, ke’n nanguh ka hung teel zaw hi; huleh chiah a gah diing leh, na gah uh um zing diingin, huleh ka mina Pa kawma na nget photmah uh ahung piah theihna diingin nanguh ka hung guat hi.
Hi thute nanguh ka hung pia hi, khat leh khat kilungsiat un.
Khovel in nanguh ahung huat leh, nanguh ahung huat ma in kei ahung haw zouta chih he un.
Khovel a hile u’chin khovel in amah a, a lungsiat diing hi; hizongleh khovel a hilou a, khovel a kipana ka hung teeldoh na hihzawh jiahun khovel in nanguh ahung hua ahi.
Suaah a pu sangin a lianzaw sih chih na kawmva ka thusoi he zing un. Amahun kei ahung sawi unchu nanguh zong ahung sawi diing uh; ka thusoite a juih uleh nanguh soi zong a jui diing uh.
Hizongleh ka min jiahin hi silte zousiah na tungvah a bawl diing uh, ahung sawlpa a heet louh jiahun.
Kei hunglou a, a kawmva thu soilou hileng sualna nei lou diing hi va, hizongleh tuin chu a sualna uh khuh na diing a neita sih uhi.
Koipouh kei hung huain ka Pa zong a hua ahi.
Mi dang koimah bawl ngei louh nna a lahva bawllou hileng sualna nei lou diing hi va, hizongleh tuin chu muh zong ahung muta va, huleh kei leh ka Pa ka nih un hua zong ahung hua uhi.
Hizongleh hichu, Amahun ajiah beiin ahung hua uh, chih a daanbu va kigial thu a taangtun na diing a hung um ahi.
Hizongleh Pa kawm apat na kawmva ka hung sawl diing, Hamuantu, Pa apat hung pawt, thutah Hagau ahung tun chiangin, ama’n ka tanchin a hesah diing hi.
Huleh nangun zong na hesah diing uh, a chiila kipana ka kawma um na hih jiahun.
Hihlungkim louh a na um louh na diingun hi thute na kawmvah ka soi ahi.
Kikhopna innahte ahung nohdoh diing va; ahi, koipouh nanguh hung thatin Pathian tunga silhoih bawl a, a kingaihtuah hun uh ahung tung diing hi,
Huleh hi silte na tungvah a bawl diing uh, Pa leh kei ahung heet louh jiahun.
Hizongleh ahun ahung tun chianga hute ka hung hilhta chih na heetdohna diingun hi silte nanguh ka hung hilh ahi. Na kawmva ka um jiahin hi thute a chiilin na kawmvah ka soi sih hi.
Hizongleh tuin chu ahung sawlpa kawma chiah diing ka hi a; kuamahin khoi a chiah diing na hiai? chi'n na hung dong sih uh.
Hizongleh hi thute na kawmva ka soi jiahin na lungtang uh lunggimna in a dimta hi.
Hizongleh thutah ka hung hilh hi; Ka chiahmang nanguh diingin a hoih hi; ajiahchu ka chiahmang louhleh Hamuantu na kawmvah ahung sih diing hi; ka chiah inchu na kawmvah ka hung sawl diing hi.
Amah ahung tun chiangin sual thu ahte, dihtatna thu ahte, huleh vaihawmna thu ahte khovel a siamlouh dan a hesah diing hi.
Sual thu ah siamlouh a tangsah diing, kei ahung gintaat louh jiahun.
Dihtatna thu ah siamlouh a tangsah diing, ka Pa kawma chiah a, na hung muh nawn louh diing jiahun.
Vaihawmna thu ah siamlouh a tangsah diing, Hi khovel lal vaihawmsah a, a um taah jiahin.
Na kawmvah thu soi diing tampi ka neia, hizongleh tuin na po zou, nai sih uh.

Hizongleh thutah Hagau ahung tun chiangin ama’n nanguh thutah zousiah ah ahung puiluut diing; ajiahchu amah phuaahthuh in thu a soi sih diing a, hizongleh a jah photmah chu a soi zaw diing; huleh sil hung tung diingte ahung musah diing hi.
Ama’n kei ahung paahtawi diing; ajiahchu keimaha a la diing a, nanguh ahung musah diing hi.
Pa sil neih zousiah keia ahi; hujiahin keimaha a la diing a, nanguh ahung musah diing, ka chi ahi.
Tomchakhat nung chian nangun na hung mu nawn sih diing uh; huleh tomchakhat nung chian na hung mu kiit diing uh, Pa kawma ka chiah diing jiahin, a chi a.

Huin a nungjuite khenkhat in, Tomchakhat nungchian nangun na hung mu nawn sih diing uh, huleh tomchakhat nungchian na hung mu kiit diing uh, Pa kawma ka chiah diing jiahin, i kawma a chih bang a chihna ahiai? chi’n a kihou va.
Hujiahin amahun, Hi a thu soi, Tomchakhat nungchian a chih bang a chihna ahiai? a chi va.

Huchi'n amah a dong nuam uh chih Jesu’n a he a, a kawmvah, Tomchakhat nungchian na hung mu nawn sih diing uh, huleh tomchakhat nungchian na hung mukiit diing ah, chi a ka soi na kidongtuah uh ahi maw?

Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin, ka hung hilh ahi, Nanguh na kap diing va, na maau diing uh; hizongleh khovel a kipaah diing; nanguh chu na lunggim diing va, hizongleh na lunggimna uh kipaahna a suaah diing hi.
Numeiin a nauvei laiin a lunggim veu, ahun a tun taah jiahin; hizongleh nau a suaah zoh tahin hu lunggimna chu a he nawn sih, mihing khat khovel a ahung pian kipaahna jiahin.
Hujiahin tuin lunggimna na nei uh ahi; hizongleh nanguh ka hung mu kiit diing a, na lungtang ah a kipaah diing; huleh na kipaahna ah koima’n ahung laahsah sih diing hi.
Huni chiangin nangun bangmah na hung ngen sih diing uh Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin, ka hung hilh ahi, Ka mina Pa kawma na nget photmah uh ama’n nanguh ahung pe diing hi.
Tutanin ka minin bangmah na ngen nai sih uh; ngen un, na mu diing ah, na kipaah uh a kimna diingin.
Hi thute a heemin na kawmvah ka soi hi; hizongleh a heem a na kawmva thu soi nawn lou a, Pa tungtaang chiantaha ka hung heetsah diing hun tung diing ahita.
Hu ni chiangin ka minin na hung ngen diing uh; nanguh diingin Pa ka ngen diing ka chi ahi sih hi.
Ajiahchu nangun kei na hung lungsiat va, huleh Pa a kuana hung ka hi chih na gintaat jiahun Pa amah ngei in nanguh ahung lungsiat hi.
Pa a kipana hungdoh a, khovel a hung ka hi, huleh khovel nusia a Pa kawma chiah kiit diing ka hi, a chi a.
A nungjuite’n a kawmah, Ngai in, tuin chu a heemin na soi sih a, chiantahin na soita hi.
Huleh tuin chu sil bangkim na he a, koimah in ahung dot na kiphamoh sih chih ka hechianta uh; hikhu jiahin Pathian a kipana hung pawt na hi chih ka gingta uhi, a chi va.
Jesu’n amah uh a dawng a, Tuin na gingta uh maw?
Ngai un, ahun ahung tung diing; ahi, tuin zong a tungta, michin na inn chiat vah na kithehdalh diing va, ka ngenin na hung nuse diing uh; ahihvangin Pa ka kawma a um jiahin ka ngen ka hi sih hi.
Keimaha hamuanna na neihna diingun hi thute na kawmvah ka soi ahi. Khovel ah gimthuaahna na nei diing uh; hizongleh kipaahtahin um un, ke’n khovel ka zouta hi, a chi hi.
Hi thute Jesu’n a soi a, huleh vaanlam ngain a daah a, Pa, ahun a tungta, na Tapa paahtawi in, na Tapa’n zong Nangmah ahung paahtawi theihna diingin.
Huchia nangma’n a kawma na piah photmahte kumtuang hinna a piah theihna diing a mi zousiah tunga thuneihna na piah bangin.
Huleh hichu ahi kumtuang hinna, Nang Pathian tah chauh leh na sawl Jesu Khrist a heet uh.
Leitungah na min ka paahtawita; bawl diing a na hung piah nna ka tong zouta hi.
Tuin Aw Pa, khovel um ma a na kawma ka neih paahtawina in nangmah kawm ngeiah hung paahtawi in.
Khovel a kipana na hung piahte kawmah na min ka sulangta hi; amahuh nanga ahi a, nang kei na hung piah ahi; huleh na thu a juita uh.
Nang ka kawma na hung piah photmah nangmaha kuan ahi chih tuin a heta uh.
Ajiahchu nang thu na hung piahte a kawmvah ka peta a, amahun zong a pomta uh; huleh tahzetin nanga kipana pawt ka hi chih a heta va, na hung sawl ahi chih a gingtata uhi.
Amahuh diingin ka ngetsah hi; khovel a diingin ka ngetsah sih a, nang na hung piahte diingin ka ngetsah zaw hi; ajiahchu amahuh nanga ahi uh.
Sil zousiah keia photmah nanga ahi a, nanga zousiah keia ahi; huleh amah vah paahtawi in ka um hi.

Tuin kei khovel ah ka um nawn sih diing, hizongleh hite khovel ah a um diing uh, kei na kawmah hung diing ka hi. Pa Siangthou, ei pumkhat i hih mahbanga amah u’zong pumkhat ahihtheihna diingun, nang na hung piahte na minin kem in.
Khovel a amahuh toh ka um sungin na minin Amahuh ka kema, Pathian lehkhathu a taangtun theihna diingin mangthang tapa loungal khatbeeh a mangthang sih uh.
Huin na kawmah hung diing ka hita; huleh amah va ka kipaahna a bukim theihna diingin hi silte khovel ah ka soi ahi.
Na thu Amahuh ka peta a, khovel in amahuh a hua hi; kei khovel a ka hih louh mahbanga amah uh khovel a ahih louh jiahun.
Amahuh khovel a kipana lamang diingin ka hung ngen ahi sih a, hizongleh migiloupa apat veeng diingin ka hung ngen ahi zaw hi.
Amahuh khovel a ahi sih uh, kei khovel a ka hih louh mahbangin.
Na thuin Amahuh susiangthou in; na thu chu thutah ahi.
Kei khovel a na hung sawl mahbangin, ke’n zong amahuh khovel ah ka sawl hi.
Amahuh jiahin ka kisusiangthou hi, thutah jala amah u’zong suhsiangthou a, a um theihna diingun.
Hite a diing chauhin ka ngen sih a, hizongleh a thu jiah va kei hung gingta diingte a diingin zong ka hung ngen hi.
Pumkhat ahih theihna diingun; Pa, nang keimah a na um a, kei nangmah a ka um banga amah u’zong eimaha pumkhat ahihtheihna diingun; huleh nang na hung sawl chih khovel in a gintaat theihna diingun.
Huleh nang na hung piah loupina amah uh ka peta hi; ei pumkhat i hih banga amah u’zong pumkhat ahihtheihna diingun.
Kei amahuh ah, Nang keiah, pumkhat a amahuh suhbukima a um theihna diingun; huleh nang na hung sawl a, kei na hung lungsiat bangin amahuh na lungsiat chih khovel in a heet na diingun.
Pa, nang kei na hung piahte zong ka umna a kei toh um diingin ka deih hi; na hung piah loupina a muh theihna diingun; ajiahchu nang leilung siam ma pehin kei na hung lungsiat hi.
Aw Pa dihtat, khovel in nang ahung he sih a, hizongleh ke'n chu ka hung he hi; huleh nang na hung sawl chih hite’n a heta uhi.
Huleh a kawmvah na min ka hesahta a, ka hesah jel diing; keimah na hung lungsiatna a kawmva a um theihna diing leh, kei amah va ka um theihna diingin, a chi hi.
Jesu'n hi thute a soi zohin a nungjuite toh a pawt va, Kidron luiguam a kaan va; huleh hutah ah hu an khat a um a, huah a nungjuite toh a luut hi.
Huleh a mansahpa Juda in zong a mun a he a; Jesu a nungjuite toh hulama a vaah veu jiahin.
Huin Juda in siampulalte leh Pharisaite apat sepaih pawl leh miman houtute pui in, thaumeite leh meiselte leh gaal vante tawi in hutah ah ahung ta uhi.
Hujiahin Jesu’n a tunga siltung diing zousiah he in a pawtdoh a, a kawmvah, Koi ahiai na hawl uh? a chi a.
Amahun a dawng va, Nazareth Jesu, a chi va Jesu’n a kawmvah, Kei ka hi, a chi a. Huleh a mansahpa Juda zong a kawmvah a ding hi.
Huin, Kei ka hi, a chih tahin a nungtawl va, leiah a puuh uhi.
Huin ama’n, Koi ahiai na hawl uh? chi'n a dong kiit a. Amahun, Nazareth Jesu, a chi va.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Kei ka hi chi'n ka hung hilhta; hujiahin kei hung hawl na hih uleh hite chiahsah un, a chi a.
Nang na hung piahte khatmah zong ka mangsah sih, chia ama’n a soi a taangtun theihna diingin.
Huin Simon Peter in namsaau khat a neih a doh a, siampulal suaahpa a saat a, a bil jiatlam a saatkhiahsah hi. Hu suaahpa min chu Malka ahi.
Huin Jesu’n Peter kawmah, Na namsaau a paai ah siat in; ka Pa’n nou ahung piah chu ka dawn sih diai mah? a chi a.
Huin sepaih pawlte leh, houtu lamkai leh, Judate houtute’n Jesu chu a man va, a kaan uh a.
Amasapenin Ana kawmah a pui uh; ajiahchu amah hu kum a siampulal a pang Kaiapha sungpa ahi.
Huleh Kaiapha chu, Mipite luang a mi khat sih a hoih hi, chia Judate kawma hilhpa ahi.
Huleh Simon Peter in Jesu a jui a, huchi bangmahin nungjui dang khu inzong a jui hi; hu nungjuipa chu siampulal meelheet ahi a, siampulal inn huang sungah Jesu toh a luut khawm a.
Hizongleh Peter chu polamah kotkhaah bulaha ding a. Nungjui khatpen, siampulal meelheetpa chu a va pawt a, kotkhaah ngaahnu kawmah a soi a, Peter ahung puiluut hi.
Kotkhaah ngaah nungaahnuin Peter kawmah, Nang zong hipa nungjuite laha khat hilou na hi maw? a chi a. Ama’n, Ka hi sih, a chi a.
Huleh suaahte leh houtute hutahah a ding va, a vot jiahin hutah ah suang meihol a chih va, a awi uh. Huleh Peter zong amahuh toh ding khawmin mei a awi hi.
Huin siampulalin Jesu kawmah a nungjuite tungtaang leh a thuhilhna tungtaang a dong a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Alangtangin khovel ah thu ka soi a, Judate umkhawm zingna kikhopna innte leh Pathian biahinn ah thu ka hilh zing, a guuh in bangmah ka soi sih.
Bang diinga kei hung dong na hi viai? A kawmva bang ka soi ka thu jate kawmah dong un; ngai un, amahun ka soi a he uhi, a chi a.
Hutobanga a soi zohin a kawma ding houtu khat in a khut in Jesu a beeng a, Siampulal bang huchi'n na dawng maw? a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Thu gilou ka soi leh ka giitlouhna hung hesah in; hizongleh a hoih ka soi leh bang diinga hung beeng na hiai? a chi a.
Huchi'n Ana in amah chu kaansain siampulal Kaiapha kawmah a sawlta hi.
Simon Peter chu ding in mei a awi a. Hujiahin amahun a kawmah, Nang zong nungjuite, laha khat hilou na hi maw? a chi va. Ama’n a kiheetmohbawl a, Ka hi sih, a chi a.
Huin, Peter in a bil a saatkhiahsahpa sanggam, siampulal suaahte khat in, Hu an a amah toh na umkhawm uh ka hung mu sih eimah? a chi a.
Peter in a kihetmohbawl kiit a, huleh aah a khuangpahta hi.

Huin amahun Jesu chu Kaiapha inn a kipanin vaihawmna inn ah a puita va; jingkal matah ahi a; huleh amahuh chu vaihawmna inn sungah a luut sih uh; huchilouin chu a ki subuahkha diing va, chiahkaan gual vaahna a nethei sih kha diing uhi.
Pilat chu a kawmvah ahung pawta, Hipa heehna bang ahi’ai na neih uhi? a chi a.
Amahun a dawng va, a kawmah, Amah migilou hi sih leh na kawma hung pekhe hetlou diing ka hi uh, a chi va.
Huin Pilat in a kawmvah, Pui unla, na dan dungjuiun vaihawmsah un, a chi a. Judate’n a kawmah, Keiuh diingin mi suhlup dan ahi sih hi, a chi va.
Hichu bangchibanga a sih diing thu Jesu’n a soi a taangtun theihna diingin ahi.
Huin Pilat vaihawmna inn sungah a luut kiit a, Jesu a kou a, a kawmah, Judate Kumpipa na hi maw? a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Hukhu nangmah lungsima suaah na soi ahiai? ahihlouhleh midangin ka tungtaang thu a hi ahung hilh ahiai? a chi a.
Pilat in a dawng a, Kei Judami ka hiai mah? Na chipihte leh siampulalte’n nang ka kawmah ahung pekhia ahi; bang ahiai na bawltaah? a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Ka gam hi khovel a ahi sih; ka gam hi khovel a hitaleh Judate khuta piahkhiah ka hih louh na diingin ka suaahte’n a dou diing uh; hizongleh ka gam chu hi a ahi nai sih hi, a chi a.

Hujiahin Pilat in a kawmah, Ahihleh Kumpipa na hi maw? a chi a. Jesu’n a dawng a, Kumpipa na chih chu ka hi. Huleh hikhu diing a piang ka hi a, huleh thutah heetpih diing a khovel a hung ka hi. Koipouh thutah a photmahin ka aw a ja uh, a chi a.
Pilat in a kawmah, Thutah bang ahiai? a chi a. Huleh hikhu a soi zohin Judate kawmah a pawt kiit a, a kawmvah, Amah ah dih louhna ka mu het sih hi.
Hizongleh chiahkaan ni a mi khat ka hung hahsah diing ahi chih tawndan khat na nei uh; Hujiahin Judate Kumpipa hung hahdohsah leng na ut viai? a chi a.
Huin a bawnun a kikou va, Hipa hilou in, Barabba zawh, chi'n. Barabba ahihleh suammang ahi.
Hujiahin Pilat in Jesu chu a pui a, a jepta a.
Huleh sepaihte’n linglukhuh a phan va, a khuhsah va, huleh puansandup a silhsah uh.
Huleh, Chibai, Judate Kumpipa! a chi va, a khut un a beeng uhi.
Pilat chu a pawt kiit a, a kawmvah, Amah ah dih louhna ka mu sih chih na heet na diingun na kawmvah ka hung puidoh hi, a chi a.
Huin Jesu chu linglukhuh khuh leh puansandup silhin ahung pawtdoh a, Pilat in a kawmvah, En un, mihing chu a chi a.

Hujiahin siampulalte leh houtute’n amah a muh tahun, Kros ah kilhbeh in, kros ah kilhbeh in, a chi va. Pilat in a kawmvah, Nangun pui unla, kros ah kilhbeh un; ajiahchu ke’n amah ah dih louhna ka mu sih hi, a chi a.
Judate’n amah a dawng va, daan khat ka nei uh, Pathian Tapa a, a kibawl jiahin ka daan dungjui un sitaah ahi, a chi va.
Pilat in hu thu a jahin a lau semta hi.
Huleh vaihawmna inn ah a luut kiit a, Jesu kawmah, Khoi a hung kuan na hiai? a chi a. Hizongleh Jesu’n a dawng sih hi.
Huin Pilat in a kawmah, Ka kawmah thu na soi sih maw? Kros a kilhbeh theihna leh hahkhiah theihna nei ka hi chih he lou na hiai mah? a chi a.
Jesu’n a dawng a, Tunglam a kipana piah hi sih lechin ka tungah bangmah bawltheihna nei sih diing hi; hujiahin na kawma hung pekhepa’n sualna a lian neih zaw hi, a chi a.
Hu nungsiah Pilat in hahdoh a tum a; hizongleh Judate’n, Hipa na chiahsah a ahihleh Kaisar lawm na hi sih diing; koipouh amah leh amah kumpipa a kibawl chu Kaisar dou ahi, chi'n a kikou va.
Hujiahin Pilat in hu thu a jahin Jesu ahung puidoh a, huleh vaihawmna touphah, Suanglep Hebrai haama Gabbatha kichi tungah a tou a.
Huleh hu ni chu chiahkaan kiginni ahi a, daah guupna vel ahi; huleh ama’n Judate kawmah, En un, na Kumpipa uh! a chi a.

Hizongleh amahuh chu a kikou va, Puimang in, puimang in, kros ah kilhbeh in, a chi uhi. Pilat in a kawmvah Na kumpipa uh ka kilhbeh diing maw? a chi a. Siampu lalpente’n Kaisar loungal Kumpipa dang ka nei sih uh, chi'n a dawng uhi.
Hujiahin ama’n amah chu kros a kilhbeh diingin a kawmvah a pekheta a. Amahun Jesu chu a tu va, a puita uhi.
Huleh amah chu a kros kipuaahin, Luguh kichi, Hebrai haama Golgotha kichi munah a chiah a;
Hutah ah amah chu midang nih toh kros ah a kilhbehta va, a gei geelah khat tuaah, Jesu a lai ah.
Huleh Pilat in lehkha khat a gial a, kros tungah a taah a, A gelh chu, Nazareth Jesu, Judate Kumpipa, chih ahi.
Hi lehkha chu Judate tampiin a sim va; Jesu a kilhbehna uh khopi kawm naih ahihjiahin. Huleh hichu Hebrai haam leh, Grik haam leh, Latin haama kigial ahi.
Huin Judate siampulalte’n Pilat kawmah, Judate Kumpipa, chi'n gial sinla, Judate Kumpipa ka hi a chi, chi'n gial zaw in, a chi va.
Pilat in a dawng a, Ka gelh ka gial zouta, a chi a.

Huin Jesu kros a a kilhbeh zohun sepaihte’n a puansilhte a la va, khat chiat a a tan diingun phel li a suah va, huleh a puannaah zong a la uh; a puannaah chu a khuina bei ahi a, a ngawng apat a pum a gatveh ahi.

Hujiahin amahun, I botkeeh sih diing a, kuan tang diing aai i saan diing uh, chi'n a kihou va, Pathian lehkhathuin, Ka puansilhte a kihawm va, ka puannaah diingin aai a saan uh, chih a taangtun na diingin. Hujiahin hi silte sepaihte’n a bawl uhi.
Huleh Jesu kros kawmah a nu leh, a nu sanggamnu, Kleopa ji Mari leh, Mari Magdalene a ding a.
Hujiahin Jesu’n a nu leh, nungjui a lungsiatpa a kawma diing a muh in a nu kawmah, Numei, en in na tapa! a chi a.
Huin nungjuipa kawmah, En in na nu! a chi a. Hua kipanin hu nungjuipa’n amahnu chu a inn ah a puita hi.
Hi nungin Jesu’n sil bangkim tuin bawl zohveh ahita chih he in Pathian lehkhathu a taangtun na diingin, Ka dang a taah, a chi a.
Hutah ah beel uain thuuh a dim khat a kitung a, spanji khat uain thuuhin a sudim va, huleh hussop chiangah a taah va, a kam ah a koihtou uhi.
Huin Jesu’n uain thuuh a dawn zohin, Joh ahita, a chi a; huin a lu a kuun a, hagau a hahta hi.

Huleh, Judate’n, kiginni ahihjiahin a luang te uh khawlnia kros dawna a um louh na diingin(jiahchu hu khawlni chu ni loupi ahi a). Pilat kawmah a keengte uh suhtahsah a, a luang uh laahmang diingin a ngen va.
Huin sepaihte a hung va, a kikilhbehpih tuah masatpen leh a khatpa a keeng a suhtansah va.
Hizongleh Jesu kawm ahung phaah un ana si zouta chih ahung mu va, a keengte a sutan sih uhi.
Hizongleh sepaihte laha khat in teipiin a naah a sun a, hutah ah sisan leh tui ahung pawtdohpah hi.
Huleh hikhu mupa’n a heetpihta, a sil heetpih chu a dih ahi; huleh mi gintaat theihna diingun a soi dih hi chih a he hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian lehkhathu, A guh khat zong suhtan ahi sih diing, chih a taangtun theihna diingin hi silte ahung umta ahi.
Huleh Pathian lehkhathu dangin, Amahun a sutpa uh a en diing uh, a chi hi.

Hi nungin Joseph, Arimathiami, Judate lau jiaha a guuh a Jesu nungjuiin Jesu luang a laah theihna diingin Pilat kawmah a va ngen a; Pilat in ana phal a. Hujiahin amah chu a hung a, Jesu luang a lata hi.
Huleh Nikodem, a tuung a jana Jesu kawma hungpa zong a hung a, murrah leh aloe buuh sawmngaa vel ahung tawi a.
Jesu luang a la va, Judate kivui ngeina bangin silgimtui toh puanmalngaat in a tuam uhi.
Huleh kros a a kilhbehna mun vah hu an khat a um a; hu huanah haan thah khat, koimah kivuina ngei louh a um a.
Hujiahin, Judate kiginni ahihjiahin hutah ah Jesu a sialta uh; haan chu naitah ahih jiahin.
Hapta ni masapenin, jingkal khua mial nalaiin, Mari Magdalene haanah a hung a, huleh haana kipat suang kiladohin a muta a.
Huin a tai a, Simon Peter leh nungjui khatpen, Jesu’n a lungsiatpa kawmah a hung a, a kawmvah, Ha an apat in ka Lalpa a la mangta va, khoitah a a koih uh ka he sih uh, a chi a.
Hujiahin Peter chu a pawtdoh a, nungjui dangpen zong, huleh haanlam zuanin a hung va.
Huchi'n a nihun a taikhawm va; nungjui khatpenin Peter a makhelh a, haan ahung tung masa a.
Ama’n kuunin a en a, puan malngaat um a mu a, ahihvangin a sungah a luut sih.
Huin Simon Peter in a nungah ahung jui a, haan sungah a luut a, puan malngaat umte a mu a.
Huleh a lu tuamna kisiaahna puan chu puan malngaat toh umkhawm loua a tuam a mun khata kijial a um a mu a.
Huin haana tung masa nungjui dangpen zong a sungah a luut a, huleh a mu a, a gingtata hi.
Ajiahchu amahun misi laha kipan a thohkiit diing ahi chih Pathian lehkhathu a he nai sih uhi.
Huin nungjuite chu a inn lam vah a chiah kiitta uhi.
Hizongleh Mari chu haan pua ah kapin a ding a; huleh a kahpum in a kuun a, haan sunga en a.
Huleh Jesu luang kisialna munah puan vaam silh angel nih, khat a lu lamah, khat a keeng lamah tou in a mu a.
Amahun a kawmah, Numei, bang diing a kip na hiai? a chi va Amahnu’n a kawmah, Ka Lalpa a la mangta va, huleh a koihna uh ka heet louh jiahin, a chi a.
Huchia a soi zohin a kinunghei a, Jesu diing a mu a, hizongleh Jesu ahi chih a he sih hi.

Jesu’n a kawmah, Numei, bang diing a kap na hiai? koi ahiai na hawl? a chi a. Amahnu’n hu an veengpa sain a kawmah, Pu, hitah apat amah na puaahmang ahihleh na koihna hung hilhin, huchi'n ka la mang diing, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Mari, a chi a. Amahnu chu a kihei a, a kawmah, Rabboni, a chi a; huchu, Houtupa chihna ahi.

Jesu’n a kawmah, Hung khoih sin; ajiah chu ka Pa kawmah ka chiahtou nai sih hi. Ahihvangin ka unaute kawmah chiah inla, a kawmvah, Ka Pa, na Pa uh, huleh ka Pathian, na Pathian uh kawmah chiahtou diing ka hi chi in, a chi a.
Mari Magdalene chu a hung a, nungjuite kawmah Lalpa a muh thu leh hi silte ama’n a kawmah a soi hi chih a hilhta hi.
Huni mah hapta ni masapen nitaahin, Judate lau jiaha nungjuite umna kotte a kikhaah nungin Jesu a hung a, a lai vah a ding a, a kawmvah, Na tungvah hamuanna um heh, a chi a.
Huchia a chih zohin a khutte leh a naah a kawmvah a lah a. Huin nungjuite’n Lalpa a muh phetun a kipaahta uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Na tungvah hamuanna um heh; ka Pa’n ahung sawl bangmahin nanguh ka hung sawl hi, a chi kiit a.
Hikhu a soi zohin a tungvah hu a haihkhum a, a kawmvah, Hagau Siangthou tangta un;
Kua sualna zong na ngaihdam phot uh ngaihdam ahi diing a, kua sualna zong na ngaihdam louh phot uh ngaihdam louh ahi diing, a chi a.
Hizongleh Thoma, Didum a kichi, sawmlenihte laha khat, Jesu hung lai in a kawmvah a um sih a;

Hujiahin nungjui dangte’n a kawmah, Lalpa ka muta uh, a chi va. Hizongleh ama’n a kawmvah, A khuta siihkilhna pawnte ka muh a, siihkilhna pawn sunga ka khutzung ka gu an a, huleh a naah a ka khut ka thun louhleh ka gingta sih diing, a chi a.
Huleh ni giat nungin nungjuite inn sungah a um kiit va, Thoma zong a kawmvah a um a; huin kot kikhaah ngalin Jesu a hung a, a lai vah a ding a, Na tungvah hamuanna um heh, a chi a.
Huin ama’n Thoma kawmah, Na khutzungin hung sawh inla, ka khutte en in; huleh na khut in hung baan inla, ka naah sawh in; gingta lou in um sinla, gingta mai in, a chi a.
Thoma’n a dawng a, a kawmah, Ka Lalpa leh ka Pathian, a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Thoma, nang chu na hung muh jiahin na gingta ahi a; mulou a gingtate a hampha uhi, a chi hi.
Huleh hi lehkhabua kigial lou chiamchihna dang tampi Jesu’n a nungjuite ma-ah a bawl hi.
Hizongleh hite chu nangun Jesu chu Khrist, Pathian Tapa ahi chih na gintaat na diing uleh, na gintaat jiah va a mina hinna na neihna neihna diing va kigial ahi.
Hi silte nungin Jesu chu Tiberi diil ah, a nungjuite kawmah a kilaah kiit a; hichi bangin a kilaah hi.
Simon Peter toh, Thoma Didum a kichi toh, Galili gam a Kana khua a um Nathanael toh, Zebedi tate toh; huleh a nungjui dang nih umkhawm ahi va.

Simon Peter in a kawmvah, Nga man in ka chiah diing, a chi a. Amahun a kawmah, Kei u’zong na kawmah ka hung diing uh, a chi va. Huin a chiah doh va, kuang sung khatah a toupah va; hu janin bangmah a man sih uh.
Hizongleh jingkal ahung hihin Jesu chu diil pangah a ding a; ahihvangin nungjuite’n Jesu ahi chih a he sih uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, Naute, neeh diing bang aha na nei viai? a chi a. Amahun, Nei lou, chi'n a dawng va.
Ama’n a kawmvah, Kuang gei jiatlamah sep leh u’chin na man diing uh, a chi a. Hujiahin amahun a sep va, huchi'n nga a tam mahmah jiahin a kaidoh zouta sih uhi.
Hujiahin Jesu’n a lungsiat nungjuipa’n Peter kawmah, Lalpa ahi, a chi a. Huin Simon Peter in Lalpa ahi chih a jahin a nga mat puannaah a silh a, (guaahtanga um ahihjiahin), diil ah a tawm kheta hi.
Huleh nungjui dangte chu leena nga kai kawmin, kuang neu khat in a hung va; (ajiahchu piaugaw apat a gamla um sih va, tong ja nih diing bang giap ahi).
Huin piaugaw ahung tunun amahun suang meihol mei kichih leh, a tung a nga leh tanghou kikoih a mu va.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, Tu a na nga matte uh hung tawi un, a chi a.
Simon Peter chu a chiahtou a, nga lianpipi ja leh sawmngaa leh thum a dim leen chu piaugaw ah ahung kaidoh hi. Huchi lawma tam hizongleh leen chu a keeh sih hi.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, An hung ne un, a chi a. A nungjuite koimah in, Lalpa ahi chih a heet jiahun, Koi na hiai? a chi ngam sih uhi.
Huin Jesu a hung a, tanghou a la a, a kawmvah a pia a, huchibang mahin ngate zong a pia hi.
Hichu Jesu’n sihna apat a thohkiit nung a a nungjuite kawma a kilaah a thum veina ahi.

Huchi'n an a neeh zohun Jesu’n Simon Peter kawmah, Simon, Jona tapa, hite sangin kei na hung lungsiat zaw ei? a chi a. Ama’n a kawmah, Hi, Lalpa; ka hung lungsiat hi chih na he hi, a chi a. Ama’n a kawmah, Ka belaam noute vaah in, a chi a.
Ama’n a nihveina a kawmah, Simon, Jona tapa, na hung lungsiat ei? a chi a. Ama’n a kawmah, Hi, Lalpa; ka hung lungsiat hi chih na he hi, a chi a. Ama’n a kawmah, Ka belaamte vaah in, a chi a.

Ama’n a thumveina a kawmah, Simon Jona tapa, na hung lungsiat ei? a chi a. Ama’n a kawma a thumveina, Na hung lungsiat ei, a chih jiahin Peter chu a lungkham a. Huin ama’n a kawmah, Lalpa nangin sil zousiah na he a; ka hung lungsiat hi chih na he hi, a chi a. Jesu’n a kawmah, Ka belaamte vaah in,

Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Na naupan laiin nang le nang na kawng na kigaah a, na utnalam lamah na chiah veu; hizongleh na hung upat chiangin chu na khut na jah diing a, midangin ahung gaah diing a, na ut louhna lam lamah ahung pui diing hi, a chi a.
Hichu ama’n bangtobang sihna in ahiai Pathian a paahtawi diing chih heetsah na diing a a soi ahi. Huleh hikhu a soi zohin ama’n a kawmah, Hung juiin, a chi a.
Huin Peter a kinunghei in, nungjui Jesu’n a lungsiat, nitaah an neeh na a zong a awm a kingai a, Lalpa, koi ahiai nang hung mansah diing? chipa in hung juiin a mu a,
Peter in amah a muh in Jesu kawmah, Lalpa, hipa’n bang a bawl diai? a chi a.
Jesu’n a kawmah, Ka hung masiah um diingin deih leng nang diingin bang ahiai? Nang hung juiin, a chi a.

Huin hu nungjuipa chu a si sih diing chi'n hi thu kisoi chu unaute lahah a thang vengvungta a; Jesu’n laha kawmah, A si sih diing, a chi sih a, hizongleh, Ka hung masiah um diingin deih leng nang diingin bang ahiai, a chi zaw ahi.
Hi silte hesah leh gelh nungjui chu hipa ahi; huleh a thu heetsah chu a dih hi chih i he hi.
Huleh Jesu’n a bawl sildang tampi zong a um a, hute gelh kimveh diing hitaleh lehkhabu kigial diingte chu khovel in zong dawllou diingin ka ngaihtuah hi. Amen.
Aw Theophil, tuma a lehkhathot masazaw ah, Jesu silbawl leh a thuhilh pat thu zousiah ka gial ahi,
Hagau Siangthou panpih a, A sawlleh teelte kawma thupiahte A piah zoh a, vaan a puitouh a A um ni tan a thu;
Hu sawllehte kawmah gentheihna A thuaah nungin heetchi ana zuaulou tamtah in hing in A kiensah a, ni sawmli zet a kawmvah A kilaah a, Pathian lalgam thu A soi zing hi.
Amah uh toh kipawl jel in, “Jerusalem khua nuse sih unla, hizongleh Pa silchiam Ka soi na jah uh chu na ngaah un,” chi’n thu A pia hi.
Ajiahchu John in tui in a baptis ngeia; hizongleh nangun chu ni sawtlou sungin Hagau Siangthou in baptisma na tang diing uh, a chi a.
Huleh, amahun ahung kikhop un, a kawm ah, Lalpa tuin ahiai Israelte kawma lalgam na piah kiit diing? chi’n a dong va.
Huleh, Ama’n’ a kawmvah, Pa in a hun leh a ni Amah thuthu a um diing a, a guat, nangun na heet diing uh ahi sih hi.

Hizongleh, na tungva Hagau Siangthou ahung tun chiangin silbawltheihna na nei diing uh; huchi'n Jerusalem khua ah zong, Judia gam leh Samaria gam zousiah ah zong, huleh, kawlmong tanphain zong ka thu heetpihtute na hi diing uh, a chi a.
Huleh, hi thute a soi zohin, a muh tangpi vah vaan a puitouh in a um a; meiin a muh phah louh vah a puimang touta hi.
Huleh a paitouh laia, amahun vaan lam a et zing laiun, ngai in, mi nih puanvaam silh in a kawmvah ahung ding va;

Hute’n chu, Nanguh Galili gam a mite, bang diinga vaan lam en zing a diing na hi viai? Hi Jesu, na kawm vapata vaan a puitouh a um hi, vaan a, a chiah na muh mahbangun, Amah ngei a hung kiit diing hi, a chi uhi.
Huin, Olive taang a chih vapatin Jerusalem khua ah a kiih kiitta va; huchu Jerusalem kho kawm ahi a, khawlni a chiah theihna tan ahi.
Huleh, a luut un, Peter leh John, Jakob leh Andru, Philip leh Thoma, Bartholomai leh Matthai, Alphai tapa Jakob leh Simon Zelot leh Jakob sanggampa Juda umna pindan tungnung ah a chiahtou uh.
Hihaw zousiah chu numeite leh, Jesu nu Mari toh, Jesu unaute toh lungsim munkhat in phatuam ngaitaha haamtei in a um zing uhi.
Huleh, hu hun laiin Peter chu nungjuite lai ah a ding a, (a bawnun za leh sawmnih vel ahi uh).
Mite leh unaute, Hagau Siangthou in David kam a, Jesu mantute lamkaipa Juda thu ana soilawh, hu Pathian lehkhathu khuh ahung tung diing mawng ahi.
Ajiahchu, amah hi i lahva simtel ahi a, hi natohna ah tan a nei ahi.
Huleh, hipa’n a sualna man in mun khat a lei a; huleh, a bohkhupin a kia a, a lai ah a pawhkeeh a, a gil zousiah a pawt vehta hi.
Huleh, hu thu chu Jerusalem khua a um haw zousiah in ana he va; huchi'n, hu mun chu amahuh haam in, Akeldama, a chi va, Huchu sisan mun chihna ahi.
Psalm bu ah hi thu gelh ahi, A umna suhgam in um henla, a sungah kuamah um sih heh; huleh a houtu hihna midang in tang heh, chih hi.
Huchi’n Lalpa Jesu i lahva luut jel pawt jela awm sung siaha,
John baptisma a kipana, i lahva apata vaan a puitouh a a um ni tanpha a hung na kithuahpihte laha mi khat, a thohkiitna hung theihpihtu diingin a um ngei diing ahi, a chi a.
Huin mi nih a guat va, khat chu Joseph Barsaba, (a min dang Justa a chih uh) huleh khat chu Matthia ahi.
Huleh, a haamtei va, Nang, Lalpa, mihing zousiah lungtang hetu, hi nihte laha kua zaw ahiai na teel, hung hesah in,
Juda in amah umna mun ngeia chiah diingin hi natohna leh sawlleh hihna a puuhsan, mun luah diingin, a chih va.
Huleh, aai a saansah va, a aai saan uh chu Matthia tung ah a tu a; huchi’n amah chu sawlleh sawm leh khatte toh simtel ahita hi.
Huleh, Pentikost ni ahung tunin, a bawnun lungsim mun khat pua in mun khat ah a umkhawm va.
Huleh, thakhat in vaan a kipanin ging, huihpi nasatah nung bangin ahung um phut a, huleh, huhin chu a touna inn uh a sudim veh a.
Huleh, leite amah leh amah kihawm in mei bangin a kawmvah ahung kilang a, huleh, a tung chiat vah ahung umta hi.
Huleh, a bawnun Hagau Siangthou in a dimta va, Hagau in a haamsah bangjelin haam dang in ahung haamta uhi.
Huleh, vaan nuaia jat zousiah laha kipan Pathian ngaihsah Juda haw Jerusalem khua ah a um va.
Huleh, hu ging a jah tahun mipi ahung kikhawm va, huleh a haam uh mi zousiah in amahuh haam chiata a jah jiahun a lungsim un ahung buaita va.
Huleh, a bawnun a mangbang va, thum ah a sa mahmah uh, Endih vua, hi-a haam haw zousiah Galili gam a mi ngen hilou ahi uh maw?
Bangchidan ahiai i bawnva i pianpih haama i jah chiat uh?
Khenkhat Parthiate, Medaite, Ela mite huleh khenkhat Mesopotamia gam a um, Kappadosia gam a um, Judia gam a um, Ponta gam a um, Asia gam a um,
Phrigia gam a um, Pamphilia gam a um, Aigupta gam a um, huleh Cyrene khawkawm vela Libya gam a um i hi va; huleh, khenkhat Rome kho-mikhual, Judahaw leh a biahdan uh juite i hi va,
Khenkhat Krit gam leh Arab gammi bang i hi ngal va, hizongleh Pathian silbawlloupite a soi uh eimah haam chiat in i ja uh, a chi va.
Huleh, a bawnun thum ah a sa va, a ngaihna a he sih va, bangchidan ahitai? a chi va.
Khenkhat in, a nuihsan va, Uain thah kham hi uh e, a chi uhi.
Hizongleh, Peter chu sawm leh khatte toh a dingkhawm a, aw ngaihtahin a kawmvah a soi a, Nanguh Judia gam a um mite leh Jerusalem khua a um zousiah haw, Hi thu he unla, ka thu zong ngai un;
Hihaw na gintaat bangun a kham sih uhi, vaihaamsaang ahi pan hi.
Hizongleh, hite zawlnei Joel in ana soi chu ahi;
Pathian in, Ni nunungte ah hichi ahung hi diing, Mi zousiah tungah ka Hagau ka leih diing a; huchi'n, na tapate un kilaahnate a mu diing va, na teehsete un mang a man diing uh;
Huleh, ka suaahpate leh ka suaahnute tungah zong ka Hagau ka leih diing a ka thu a soi diing uh;
Huleh, tunglam vaan ah silmahte, nuailam lei ah chiamtehnate ka musah diing a; sisan leh, mei leh meikhuhu toh;
Lalpa ni loupi leh minthangtah ahung tun ma in, ni mial a suah diing a, ha sisan a suaah diing;
Huleh, hichi ahung hi diing a, kuapouh Lalpa min lou taphot chu hutdam in a um diing uh, a chi hi, a chih.

Nanguh Israel mite, hi thute ngai un, Nazareth Jesu chu Pathian in Amah zang a na lahva, silmahte, silloupite leh chiamtehnate a bawlte apatin Pathian mi deih ahi chih a hesah a, huchu nangun zong na he uhi.
Amah chu Pathian lemguat mawng leh heetlawh bangin piahkhiaha um in na pui va, misualte khut in kros ah na kilhbeh va, na sulumta uh;
Amah chu Pathian in sihna gaahnate phelsah in, a kaithouta hi; sihna tuuhden gual ahih louh jiahin.
Ajiahchu, David in a tungthu a soi a, Ka ma ah bangchihlaipouhin Lalpa ka mu zing a, suhliing a ka um louhna diingin ka jiatlam ah a um hi;
Hujiahin ka lungtang a nuam a, ka lei zong a kipaah a; ka tahsa zong kinemtahin a um nalai diing hi;
Ka hagau misi khua ah na nuse sih diing a, Na misiangthou zong muatna na musah phal sih diing.
Nangmah in hinna lampi na hung hesah a; na meel in kipaahin na hung sudim zing diing, chi'n.
Mite leh unaute, chihaahtu David thu hi lau louin na kawmvah ka soi thei hi, amah zaw a si a, vui zong a vuita va, a haan zong tuin i kawmvah a um nalai hi.
Hujiahin amah chu zawlnei ahi a, sa dana, a khaalbe a kipanin a laltouphah a tou diing, Khrist, ka hung tungdoh diing chih, Pathian in kichiam in a soi hi chih a he a;
Ama’n hichu ana heetlawhsa ahih jiahin, Khrist thoh kiit diing thu a soi ahi, amah misi khua ah nuutsiat in a um sih a, a luang zong a muat sih hi, chih.
Hi Jesu chu Pathian in a kaithou kiitta ngeia, huchu ka bawnun heetpihtute ka hi uhi.
Hujiahin Pathian khut jiatlam a paahtawi in a um a, huleh, Hagau Siangthou chiam chu Pa kawm apatin a mu a, na muh uleh na jah uh chu ahung leih ahi.
David chu vaan ah a kaltou sih hi; amah ngei in, Lalpa’n ka Lalpa kawmah, Ka jiatlam ah tou zing in,
Na gaalte na keengpeeh ngahsan a ka bawl masiah, a chi hi, a chi zaw hi.
Hujiahin, Jesu na kilhbeh ngei uh chu Pathian in Lalpa leh Khrist hikhawm in a bawlta chih, Israel nam zousiah in chiantahin he uheh, a chi hi.
Huleh, Hi thu a jah tahun a lungtang va sut bang ahung hita va, Peter leh sawlleh danghaw kawmah, Mite leh unaute, bangchibangin ka bawlta diing viai? a chi va.
Huin, Peter in a kawmvah, Kisiih in lunghei unla, na sual uh ngaihdam a hihna diingin Jesu Khrist min in baptisma tang chiat un, huchi'n Hagau Siangthou silpiah na tang diing uhi.
A chiam chu nanguh diing zong, na tate uh diing zong, gamlataha um zousiahte a diingin zong Lalpa i Pathian in a kawma a kouh photmahte a diing zong ahi, a chi a.
Huleh, thudang tamtah in a hilhchian a, Tulai khang thah giloute lahah kihumbit un, chi’n a hasot hi.
Huin, a thu pom pouhmah in baptisma a tang va; hu ni in mi saang thum vela behlap in a um uhi.
Huleh, sawllehte thuhilh leh kipawlna ah, tanghou balkeeh in haamtei in phatuamngaitahin a um zingzing uhi.
Huleh, mi zousiah in a lauta va; sawllehte’n silmahte leh chiamchihnate tamtah, a bawl uh.
Huleh, a gingta zousiah a kipumkhat va, sil bangkim a kikop uhi;
Huleh, a silneih zousiah uh a zuah va, a kisapna bangun a bawnva lahah a hawm jel uhi.
Huleh, ni chinin lungsim munkhat in Pathian biahinn ah phatuamngaitahin a um jel va, a inn lam haw vah zong tanghou balkeeh in kipaahtah leh lungkimtahin a an uh a ne jel uh,
Pathian a paahtawi va, mi zousiah deihsah zawng in a um veu uh. Huleh hutdamna hung mu photmahte Lalpa’n ni chinin a kawmvah a behlapsah jel hi.
Huleh, Peter leh John chu pung kuaahna, haamtei hun laiin, Pathian biahinn ah a chiahtou va.
Huleh, kua aha pasal khat, a pian chiil apat keengbai ahung zawng va, hu pa chu Pathian biahinn a luutte kawma khutdoh diingin, biahinn kotkhaah “Kilawm” a chih uh bul ah ni chinin a lumsah veu uhi.
Huchi’n Peter leh John Pathian biahinn a luut diing a mu a, khut ana doh hi.
Huleh, Peter in John toh amah hah et in a en va, Keiuh hung en in, a chi a.
Huleh, ama’n amah vapat bang aha muh a kinem a, a en a.
Hizongleh, Peter in, dangka leh sana bangmah ka nei sih; hizongleh, ka neihsun ka hung pe diing; Nazareth Jesu Khrist min in thou inla keeng in chiah in, a chi a.
Huin, a khut jiatlama tu in a kaithouta a; huleh, thakhat in a keengte leh a siahguhte ahung haatpahta hi.
Huchi’n, amah chu a diangdoh a, a ding a, keeng in a chiahta a, huleh keeng a chiah a diangdiang leh, Pathian pahtawi kawm jel in, amahuh toh Pathian biahinn ah a luutta hi.
Huleh, keeng a a chiah leh Pathian a paahtawi mi zousiah in a mu va;
Huleh, amahun, biahinn kotkhaah Kilawm bula khutdoh a tou veupa ahi chih a he va; huleh, a tunga sil tung limdang sa mahmahin a buai hial uhi.
Huleh, keengbai hung dampa in Peter leh John a tuuh laiin, mi zousiah in limdang a sa mahmah va, Solomon innliim a chih vah ahung taikhawm uhi.

Huleh, Peter in hu a muh in, mite a houpih a, Nanguh Israel mite, hikhu bang diinga limdangsa na hi viai? ahihlouhleh, keiuh silbawltheihna leh Pathian ka ngaihsah jiah va amah ka paisah uh bang hiala bang diinga hung en zing na hi viai?
Abrahamte, Isaakte, leh Jakobte Pathian, i pulepate Pathian in, a tapa Jesu a tawisaangta ahi; Amah na mansah va, Pilat in hah a tup in zong amah na awi sih uhi.
Misiangthou leh Dihtat chu na deih sih va, tualthatpa chu na kawmva piah na ngen zawta uh;
Hinna siamtu chu na that va; hizongleh, Pathian in Amah chu misi lah apat a kaithou kiit a; hu heetpihtute ka hi uhi.
Huleh, Amah min gin jiahin, A min in hipa na muh uleh na heet uh chu a suhaatta ahi; ahi, Amah jiaha ginna hung um in, na bawnva mitmuh in a sudam vilvelta ahi.
Huleh, tuin unaute, na houtute un zong ana bawl bangun, na heet louh jiahun hi na bawl uh ahi chih ka he hi.
Hizongleh, Pathian in a zawlnei zousiah kam a, Khrist in a thuaah ngei diing ahi chih ana heetlawhsah chu, huchi bangin a tungsahta ahi.
Hujiahin, kisiih unla, na sualte uh nawtmang ahih theihna diingin kiheikiit un, huchi'n, Lalpa kawm apat halh hunte ahung tung thei diing a;
Huleh, Jesu Khrist, nanguh diinga a guatsa chu ahung sawl diing ahi;
Bangkim siamhoih hun a tun masangsiah Amah chu vaanin a kol tadih diing ahi, hu siamhoih diing chu Pathian in leilung pianchiil apat a zawlnei siangthou zousiah ka min a soi zouta hi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Mosi ngeiin i pulepate kawmah, Lalpa Pathian in keimah ahung siam bangin na unaute lahah zawlnei khat ahung siamsah diing; Ama’n na kawmva thu a soi zousiah chu na ngaihkhiahsah diing uh;
Huleh, hichi ahung hi diing a, mi kuapouh hu zawlnei thu ngaihsahlou chu, mipi laha kipan suhmangthai ahi diing uh, a chi hi.
Ahi, Samuel um akipat zawlnei zousiah, huleh a nung vate toh, thu ana soi photmah in huchi bangin, tulai hun tanchin ana soilawh chiat uhi.
Nanguh, zawlneite leh thuhun tate na hi uh, Pathian in Abraham kawmah, Na haah jalin khovela nam zousiah vangpiah in a um diing uh, chi'n, i pulepate kawmah a chiam hi.
Pathian in a Tapa Jesu kaithou in, na sualte uh kiheisansah diing leh vang hung pe diingin nanguh kawmah ahung sawl masapen ahi, a chi a.
Huleh, Peter leh John in mite kawma thu a soi laiun, siampute, biahinn houtute, huleh Sadukaite a hung va.
Mi a hilh uleh Jesu jala misi laha kipana thohkiitna thu a hilh jiahun a lungkimta sih va.
Huleh, a man va, nitaahlam ahih jiahin a jingni tanphain suangkul ah a khumta uhi.
Hizongleh, thu ngaikhete laha tamtahin a tahsang va; a tamdan uh chu pasal ngen zong saang nga vel a pha uhi.
Huleh, hichi ahung hi a, a jingni in, a houtute uleh, upate leh lehkhagialtute,
Huleh siampu lal Ana leh Kaiapha leh John leh Alexander leh siampu lal chipih zousiah chu Jerusalem khua ah a kikhawm va.
Huleh, Peter leh John chu a lai vah a dingsah va, Bang thuneihna in ahiai, ahihlouhleh, kua min in ahiai hibang na bawl uh? chi in a dong uh.
Huin, Peter chu Hagau Siangthou in a dim a, a kawmvah, Nanguh mipi houtute leh Israel upate haw,
Keiuh, tunia mi haatlou khat suhhatna thu ah, amah bang chi-a hung dam ahitai, chi a na hung phuul uleh;
Na bawnun he un, huleh, Israelmi zousiah in zong he un, Nazareth Jesu Khrist, na kilhlup uh, Pathian in misi lah apat a kaithou kiit a, Amah min ngei in hi pa chu na bawnva ma ah dam in a dingta ahi.
Amah ahi nanguh inn bawlte’n na suang deih louh uh a ninga suang phatuampen hung hita chu.
Midang kuamah kawmah hutdamna a um sih; vaan nuaia mihingte kawma kipia min lahah hung hundam diing min dang mawngmawng a um sih, a chi a.
Huleh, Peter leh John haansandan a muh va, huleh, lehkha siamlou leh mi mawltah ahi uh chih a heet un, thumah a sa mahmah va; Jesu kawmah ana umta uh chih a heta uhi.
Huleh, a mi suhdam uh a kawmva ding a muhun, bangmah a soisel thei tuan sih uhi.
Hizongleh, a vaihawmna apat va, chiahtuam diing a thu a piah nungun, a kihou va,
Hi mite bang i lohta diai? Silmah kithang a bawl uh Jerusalem khua a um zousiah in kichiantahin a he va; ei un zong i nial thei tuam sih uhi.
Hizongleh, mi kawma a kithan sem louhna diingin, tukalsiah hi mina kuamah kawma thu a soi nawn louhna diingun i vau diing uh, a chi va.
Huchi in, amahuh a kou va, Jesu min a thu soi kiit hetlou diing leh hilh hetlou diingin thu a pia uhi,
Hizongleh, Peter leh John in chu a kawmvah, Pathian mitmuh in, Pathian thu man sangin nanguh thu man a hoihzaw eimah? ngaihtuah un.
Keiun zaw ka sil muh uleh, ka jahte uh soi louin ka um thei sih uh, a chi uhi.
Huin, amahuh chu a vau naah sem va, a hahta uh, mipi jiahin gawtna lemtaang a mu sih uhi; a silbawl uh jiahin mi zousiah in Pathian a paahtawi ngal va.
Silmah a, a suhdampa uh kum sawmli sanga tam zaw ahi ngal a.
Huleh Peter leh John a pawt un a lawite uh kawmah a chiah va, siampu lalte leh upate’n a soi zousiah uh a hilh uhi.
Huleh, amahun a jah tahun, kituaahtah leh aw ngaihtahin; Pathian kawmah, Lalpa, nang chu vaan leh lei huleh, tuipite leh a sunga um zousiahte siamtu Pathian na hi.
Nang, na suahpa David ka min hi thu na soi hi. Bangchidana Jentelte lungthah ahi viai? huleh mite’n bangchidanin ahiai sil phatuamlou a ngaihtuah uh?
Khovel kumpite a ding va, vaaihawmte zong a kikhawm uh, Lalpa leh Khrist kalh in, chi'n.
Na Tapa siangthou, na thaunuh Jesu tungah, Herod leh Pontia Pilat toh, Jentelte leh Israelmite toh a kikhawm tahzet uhi.
Na khut leh na lungsim a hung tung diing a na guatlawh taphot bawl diingin.
Huleh, tuin, Lalpa, ahung vaudan uh en dih; huleh, na suahte’n haangsantah a na thu a soi theihna diing uh pia in,
Mite sudam diing a na khut jah in; Na Ta siangthou Jesu min jala chiamchihna leh silmahte bawl in, a chi va.
Huleh, a haamtei zohun a umkhawmna uh ahung kiliing a; huleh, a bawnun Hagau Siangthou in ahung dim vehta va, huchi'n, Pathian thu chu haangsantahin a soita uhi.
Huleh, a gingta mipite chu, lungsim munkhat leh ngaihtuah munkhat in awm va; a lahva khat in zong a sil neih chu kei a tuam ahi, a chi sih a; sil zousiah a kikop jel zaw uhi.
Huleh, sawllehte’n silbawltheitahin Lalpa Jesu thohkiitna thu chu a hilh zing va; a bawnva tung ah khotuahna nasatah a um hi.
A lahva zong tasam kuamah a um sih uh; gamte, ahihlouhleh, innte neite’n a zuah va, a sil zuahte uh man ahung tawi va,
Sawllehte keeng bul ah a koih jel uhi; huleh, michin kawmah deihdong ching hun chiat in a hawm jel uhi.
Huleh, Jose, sawllehte’n Barnaba a chih uh (hu min umdan chu, Hamuanta, chihna ahi) Levi chi, Cyprus gam mi ahi a.
A gam neih chu a zuah a, a man ahung tawi a, sawllehte keeng bul ah a koihta hi.
Hizongleh, mi khat a min Anania in, a ji Saphira toh a neih uh a zuah va,
Huleh, a ji heet in a man khenkhat a iimta a, huleh, khenkhat hung tawi in sawllehte keeng bul ah a koih hi.
Hizongleh Peter in, Anania, Hagau Siangthou heem diing leh, gam man khenkhat iim diingin, bang diinga setan in na lungsim sudim ahiai?
A um sungsiah nang a hi zing lou ahiai mah? na zuah nungin zong na thuthu in a um sih eimah? bang diinga hi thute na lungtang a ngaihtuah? mihing heem na hi sih a, Pathian heem na hi zaw, a chi a.
Huleh, Anania in hu thu a jah tahin a puuh a, a sita a; huleh, hu thu ja zousiah chu a lau mahmahta uhi.
Huleh, tangvalte’n a thou va, a tuam va, a zawngdoh va, a vuita uhi.
Huleh, daahkal thum diing vel nungin, a ji, sil umdan he loupi in ahung luut a.
Huin, Peter in a kawmah, Hung hilh in, gam hizat chauh in ahi maw na zuah uh? a chi a. Huleh, ama’n, Hi, hizat chauh in ahi, a chi a.
Huin, Peter in a kawmah, Bang diinga Lalpa Hagau ze-et diing a kithutuah na hi viai? ngai in, na pasal vuite keeng kotkhaah bul ah ahung umta, nang zong ahung zawngdoh diing uh, a chi a.
Huin, thakhat in a keeng bul ah a puuhpah a, a sita hi; huin, tangvalte ahung luut va, amahnu chu si in ahung mu va, a zawngdoh va, a pasal kawmah a vuita uhi.
Huin, kouhtuam zousiah leh hu thu ja pouhmahte’n a lau mahmah uhi.
Huleh, Pathian in sawllehte khut in mi lahah chiamchihna leh silmah tamtah a bawl jel hi; (Huin amahuh a bawnun lungsim mun khat in Solomon innliim ah a um uhi.
Huleh, midang kuamah a lahvah a tel ngamta sih uhi; hizongleh mite’n amahuh a paahta ngal uhi.
Gingthah numei leh pasal tampi tah Lalpa kawmah ahung kibehlap deuhdeuh uhi).
Huchi'n mi damloute hung pui in, lupnate bang, talaaite bangah, kotzing vai ah a lumsah va, Peter a chiah kawma, a liim in khenkhat beeh a liah theihna diingin, a chi va.
Huleh, Jerusalem kiima khuate akipat mipite zong damloute leh dawiniin suhgimte hung puiin ahung khawm va; hute zong ahung dam vehta uhi.
Huin, siampu lal leh a lawite zousiah a hung va, (hu a lawite chu Sadukai pawl ahi uh) a thangse mahmah va,
Huleh sawllehte chu a man va, vaantaang khumna ah a khumta uhi
Hizongleh, Lalpa angel in jan in suangkul kotkhaahte hung hong in amahuh a puidoh a,
Pathian biahinn ah va ding unla, mi kawmah hi hinna thu zousiah va soi un, a chi a.

Huleh, hu thu a jahun jingkal matahin Pathian biahinn ah a va luut va, thu a va hilh uh. Hizongleh, siampu lal leh a lawite a hung va, vaihawmte leh Israel suan upate tengteng a koukhawm va, sawllehte va pui diingin suangkul ah mi a sawl uhi.
Hizongleh, houtute a va chiah va, suangkul ah amahuh a va muta sih va, ahung kiihkiit uhi.
Suangkul bittaha kikhaah in leh a veengtute zong kotkhaah bula ding in ka mu ngal va, hizongleh ka hon uleh a sungah kuamah ka mu sih uh, chi'n a soi hi.
Pathian biahinn houtu leh siampulalte’n hu thute a theih un hi-hi bang chiphet in ahung thangta de aw, chi'n, a thu ah a mangbang mahmah va.
Huin, mi khat a hung a, a kawmvah, ngai un suangkul a na mikhumte un Pathian biahinn ah dingin mi a hilh uh, chi'n ahung soi a.
Huchi’n houtupa chu upate toh a va chiah va, vantaang a lau jiahun bawlse louin ahung pui va, huchilou hileh suang in ana sep diing uh.
Huleh, amahuh ahung puitung phetun, vaihawmte ma ah a dingsah va; huin siampulal in a kawmvah,
Hi min a thuhilh kiitta lou diingin thu khauhtahin ka hung peta uh hilou maw? he un, na thuhilh un Jerusalem khua na sudim vehta uh, huleh hi mipa sisan hung khuhsah tum na hi uh, chi'n a dong a.
Huin, Peter leh sawlleh dangte’n, Mihing thu sangin Pathian thu ka man zawh diing uh ahi.
Jesu, nangun singa na khai va na suhluppa uh, i pulepate Pathian in a kaithouta hi.
Amah ngei chu Pathian in Kumpipa leh Hundampa a um diingin a jiatlam ah a hihlianta a, Israelte kawma kisiih a lungheina leh sual ngaihdamna pe diingin.
Huleh, keiuh hi thute heetpihtute ka hi uh; huchimahbangin Hagau Siangthou, Pathian in a thu jui photmahte kawma a piah taah zong heetpihtu ahi nalai hi, a chi va, a dawng uh.
Huleh, amahun hu thu a jahun a sin uh a khoih mahmah a, suhlup a tumta uhi.
Huin, vaihawmtute lahah mi khat a min Gamaliel, Pharisai, daan siam mi zousiah laha minthangtah khat ahung ding a, hu sawllehte chu puidoh tadih diingin thu a pia a.
Huin, a kawmvah, Nanguh Israel mite aw, hi mite tunga na sil bawl guat uh pilvaang un,

Tuma in zong, Theoda, milian ka hi chi'n ahung um a; hupa kawmah chu mi tamtah, zali vel ana um va; amah chu suhlup in a umta a; huleh a thu na jui photmah a bawnun a dalhjahta va, bangmah ahita sih uhi.
Hupa nungin mingelh laiin, Galili gam mi Juda ahung um kiitta, huleh, a kawmah mi tamtah a hiip a; hizongleh amah zong a sita a; huleh, a thu juite zousiah zong a dalhjahta uhi.
Huchi'n, tuin ka hung hilh ahi, hi mite khoih dah unla, huchi'n um mai uheh. Hi a siltup uh leh a silbawl uh mihing akipan ahih inchu ahung mang diing hi;
Ahihvangin, Pathian bawldoh ahih inchu, amahuh na sumang thei sih diing uh, huchilouin zaw Pathian dou na hi zenzenkha diing uhi, a chi a.
Huleh, a soi chu lem a sata va; huchi'n sawllehte chu a kou va, a jep va, a jep zohun, Jesu min a thu soi kiit hetlou diingin thu a pia va, a hahta uhi.
Huleh, amahuh chu vaihawmte lah apatin a pawtkhia va, hu min jiaha zumna thuaah taah a guat ahih jiahun a kipaah mahmah uhi.
Huleh, ni chinin Pathian biahinn leh inn chinah Jesu chu Khrist ahi chia thu hilh leh soi a tawp sih uhi.
Huleh, hulaia nungjuite a punpun laiun, a nichin sil hawm vah a meithaite uh a ngaihsah louh veu jiahun, Grik haam zang Judate chu Hebraite tungah a phunta va.
Huin, sawmlehnihte’n nungjui mipite a kou va, Pathian thusoi tawpsan a dohkaan a neeh diing nna ka toh unchu a hoih sih diing hi.
Hujiahin, unaute, na lahva Hagau Siangthou leh pilna a dim, mi min hoih ngen sagih teel un, amahuh chu hi sil ngaihtuahin i bawl diing uh.
Keiuh chu haamtei leh thunatong in ka um zom zing zaw diing uh, a chi va.

Huleh, hu thu in mi zousiah a kipaahsah a; huchi'n Stephen, ginna leh Hagau Siangthou a dim toh, Philip toh, Prokora toh, Nikanor toh, Timon toh, Parmena toh, Judate biahdan jui, Antiok khua a mi Nikola toh a teel va;
Amahuh chu sawllehte ma ah a dingsah va, a haamtei zohun a tungvah a khut uh a nga uhi.
Huleh, Pathian thu ahung dalh a; Jerusalem khua ah nungjuite a pungta mahmah uhi; huleh siampute lahah zong mi tamtah ginna lam ah a thumangta uhi.
Huleh, Stephen, ginna leh silbawltheihna a dim in mi lahah silmah leh chiamchihna loupitahte a bawl veu hi.
Huin, Libertinete, Cyrenia khua ate, Alexandria khua a mite kikhopna a chih va mi khenkhat leh Silisia gam a leh Asia gam a te kikhopna a mi khenkhatte ahung kisa va, Stephen ahung kinialpih uhi.
Hizongleh, a pilna leh a soipihtu Hagau chu a nialkhe theita sih uhi.
Huin, mite a chiilgu va, hute’n chu, Mosi leh Pathian a soisiat ka ja uh, a chi va.
Huleh, mite, upate, lehkhagialtute a chiilsia va, Stephen chu a sual va, a man va, vaihawmtute kawmah, a pui uhi.
Huleh, heetpihtu dihloute a bawl va, hute’n chu, Hipa’n hi mun siangthou leh daan a soise zingzing hi.
Ajiahchu hi Nazareth Jesu’n hi mun siangthou a suse diing a, Mosi in daan ahung piahte a sudanglam diing chi a, a soi ka ja uh, a chi va.
Huin, vaihawmna a pute zousiah in Stephen a ensaal chiat va, a meel chu angel meel bangin a mu uhi.
Huin, siampulal in, hi thute a dihna eimah? a chi a.
Huin, Stephen in, Mite, unaute leh pate, ngai un; I pu uh Abraham, Haran khua a a um ma a, Mesopotamia gam a a um laiin, Loupina Pathian, chu a kawmah ahung kilaah a,
A kawmah, Na gam akipat leh na chite lah apat pawt inla, gam ka hung etsah diing lamah hung pai in, a chi a.
Huin, amah chu Kaldaite gam a kipat a paikhia a, Haran ah a va umta hi; huleh a pa a sih nungin Pathian in hu apatin, hi tua na teenna gam vah a peem luutsahta hi.
Huleh, hi-ah chu mun luah diing bangmah, a keeng ngahna diing khop zong a pe sih a; hizongleh, amah leh a nunga a suante tanphaa gou diingin piah a chiam hi, ta a neih ma pehin.
Huleh, Pathian in hichibangin a soi hi; A suante mi gam ah a taam diing va, suaah in a khawi diing va, huleh kum za li a bawl genthei diing uh.
Huleh, Pathian in suaah a, a umna diing uh nam chu Keima’n ka ngaihtuah diing a, huzoh chiangin ahung pawt diing va, hi munah ka na a tong diing uh, a chi hi.

Huleh, Pathian in a kawmah zehtan thuhun a pia hi; huchi’n Abraham in Isaak ahung hing a, huleh, a ni giat niin a zeh a tan a; huleh Isaak in Jakob ahung hing a; huleh Jakob in chihaahtu sawm leh nihte ahung hing hi.
Huleh, chihaahtute chu thangsiatna a hung dim in Joseph chu Aigupta gam lamah a zuah va; hizongleh, Pathian a kawmah a um a.
A gimthuaahnate zousiah apat a hundoh jel a, Aigupta gam kumpipa Pharaoh aang sungah deihsahna leh pilna a pia a; huchi'n amah chu Aigupta gam leh a inn a mi zousiah tungah houtu in a bawlta hi.
Huin, Aigupta leh Kanan gam zousiah ah kial ahung tunga, gimthuaahna nasatah ahung umta a; i pulepate un neeh diing mawngmawng a muta sih uhi.
Hizongleh, Jakob in Aigupta gam ah buh a um chih a jah tahin i pute uh a sawldoh a, huchu a chiah patna masapen uh ahi.
Huleh, a nihvei chiahna vah, Joseph chu a unaute a kihesah a; huleh, Joseph unaute chu Pharaoh a hesahta uhi.
Huin, Joseph in a pa Jakob leh a unaute zousiah a kousah a; a bawnun sawmsagih leh nga ahi uh.
Huchi'n, Jakob chu Aigupta gam ah a chiahsuh a, huleh, amah leh i pute uh a sita va,
Huleh a luang uh Sikem khua a potungva, Abraham in Sikem khua a Emmor tapate laha dangka sum a, a lei, haanah a vuita uhi.
Hizongleh, Pathian in Abraham kawma a thuchiam a tun hun ahung nai tahin, hu mite chu Aigupta gam ah hung pungin ahung tam deuhdeuhta va.
Joseph he lou kumpipa dang ahung um masiahin.
Hu mi’n i chite a a zeheem a, i pulepate uh a suduhdah a, a naungeehte uh hing lou diingin a paidohsah veu hi.
Hulaiin Mosi ahung piang a, a meel a hoih mahmah a, a pa inn ah ha thum a vaah va.
Huleh, amah a paihdoh un, Pharaoh tanu in a la a, amah tapa diingin a vaahta hi.
Huleh, Mosi chu Aigupta gam mite pilna zousiah a hilh va, huchi'n, thu leh silbawl ah a loupi mahmah hi.
Huleh, ama’n chu kum sawmli ahung hihin, a unau, Israel haahte chu kan ahung utta a.
Huleh, a lahva mi khat dihloutaha suhgima um a mu a, a hun a, suhduhdah a umpa phuba a laahsah a, Aiguptami chu a sulum hi.
Ajiahchu ama’n amah khut in Pathian in amahuh hundoh diing ahi, chih a unaute’n he diing a sa a; hizongleh, amahun a he sih uhi.
Huleh, a jingin a lahva mi nih a kisual laiun a kawm uh ahung tunga, Pute, unau na vevua; bang diinga dihloutaha kibawl na hi viai? chi'n lep a tum a.
Hizongleh, a innveengpa tunga sil gilou bawl zawpa in Mosi chu a sawndoh, a, Kuan nang ka tungva houtu diing leh vaihawm diingin ahung bawl ei?
Jaanni a Aiguptami na thah banga, hung thah tum na hi maw? a chi a.
Huin, hi thu jiahin Mosi chu a taimangta a, Midian gam ah a taamta a, huah chu tapa nih a va nei hi.
Huleh, kum sawmli a bei nungin, Sinai taang gamdai ah, sawlbawh a mei kuang lahah, Lalpa angel khat a kawmah ahung kilaah a.
Mosi’n hi a muh in a silmuh chu limdang a sa a; en diing a ava naih laiin, Lalpa aw in a kawmah,
Kei, na pulepate Pathian chu ka hi, Abraham Pathian, Isaak Pathian, Jakob Pathian, a chi a. Huin, Mosi chu a kithing a, a en ngamta sih hi.
Huin, Lalpa’n a kawmah, Na keeng apat na keengtophah suut in; ajiahchu na dinna mun lei siangthou ahi.
Aigupta gam a ka mi umte gentheihdan chu chiantahin ka mu zing ahi, huleh, a thuum uh zong ka zata a, amahuh hundoh diing a hungsuh ka hi. Hungin Aigupta gam ah ka hung sawl diing, a chi a.

Hi Mosi, houtu leh vaihawmtu diingin kuan ahung bawl ei? chi a, a huat uh chu, sawlbawh laha a kawma hung kilaah angel kithuahpihsah in, Pathian in amah ngei chu houtu leh hundohtu hikhawm diingin a sawlta hi.
