Ama’n chu Aigupta gam ahte, Tuipi san ahte, huleh gamdai ahte kum sawmli sung silmah leh chiamchihnate a muhsah nungin, amahuh a puidohta hi.
Israel suante kawma, Lalpa na Pathian un keimah ahung bawl bangin na unaute laha mi zawlnei khat ahung bawlsah diing a, amah thu na ngaikhe diing uh, chitu hu Mosi chu hih ahi.
Sinai taanga amah toh kihou angel leh i pulepate toh gamdai a kouhtuamte laha um, i kawma piahsawn diing a thu hingte latu chu hipa ahi.
I pulepate’n a thu a jui ut sih va, a hua va, huleh Aigupta gam a lunggulh kiit va,
Aaron kawmah, I ma pui diingin pathiante hung bawlsah in, ajiahchu hi Mosi Aigupta gam a hung puidohpa laha tanchin ka he nawnta sih uh, a chi uh.
Huleh, hulaiin bawngnou lim a bawl va, a lim chu gan that in a bia va, huleh amahuh khutsuaah tungah a nuamta uhi.

Huin, Pathian in a kiheisan a, vaan a aahsite a biah theihna diingun, amahuh a nuseta hi; zawlneite lehkhabu a, Israel chite aw, gamdai ah kum sawmli sungin sa leh gan that in kei na hung bia ngei uh maw?

Moloch biahbuuh (puan inn) leh na pathian uh Remphan aahsi zong biah diing a, a lim na bawlte uh, na zawng zaw veu va; huleh, ke’n nanguh Babylon khawkhen lamah ka hung puimang diing, chih gelh bangin.
A lim a muh banga bawl diing a Mosi hilh tu’n a guat bangin, i pulepate un hu gamdai ah heetsahna biahbuuh (puan inn) a nei va.
Humah chu, i pulepate haah sawnte’n Pathian in i pulepate ma-a Jentel a delhdohte gam a luah laiun, Joshua luut gualin a luutpih va; David hung umtanphain huah chu a um zingta hi.
Hu David in chu Pathian mitmuh in deihsahna a mu a, Jakob Pathian diingin biahbuuh bawlsah a ut a.
Hizongleh, Solomon in hu inn chu a bawl zawta hi.
Ahihvangin, Tungnungpen chu khuta bawl inn bangah a um sih hi; zawlnei in,
Lalpa’n, Vaan ka touphah ahi a, lei ka keeng ngahna ahi; inn bang chi bangin na hung bawlsah diing viai? Ka khawlna mun zong bang ahiai?
Ka khut in hi sil zousiah a bawl hi lou amaw? a chi hi, chi a, a soi bangin.
Mi chihmoh, lungtang leh bil jehtan louhte haw, Hagau Siangthou na doudaal zing uhi; na pulepate uh bawl bangin na bawl zing uhi.
Na pulepate un zawlneite laha kua ahiai a suhduhdah louh uh um? huleh Mi dihtah hung diing thu soilawhte chu a sulum va; hu Midihtah mansahtu leh thattute tuin, nanguh ngei na hi uhi.
Daan angelte piahsawn munapi a jui tuanloute aw, a chi hi.
Hi thute a jah tahun a sin uh a khoih a, Stephen chu ha a gial khum va.
Hizongleh, amah chu Hagau Siangthou a dim in vaanlam a ensaal a Pathian loupina leh Pathian jiatlam a Jesu ding a mu a.
Ngai un, vaan kihong a, huleh, Pathian jiatlam a mihing Tapa ding zong ka mu hi, a chi a.
Huin amahuh chu aw ngaihtahin a kikou va, a bil uh a huum va, thakhata pang in a noh uh a;
Huleh, khua apatin a delhdoh va, suang in a sep va, huleh a heetpihtute’n tangval khat a min Saul keeng bul ah a puante uh a koih uhi.
Huleh, Stephen in, Lalpa Jesu ka hagau la in, chi a Pathian a kouh laiin suang in a sep souhsouh uhi.
Huleh, amah chu a khupdin a, aw ngaihtahin a kikou a, Lalpa, hih a sualna uh a tungvah mohposah sin, a chi a. Huleh, hi thu a soi zohin a ihmuta hi.

Huleh, Saul in zong Stephen sih chu lem a sa hi. Hu hun laiin Jerusalem khua a kouhtuam umte chu nasatahin a sawi panta va; huchi'n sawllehte chauh loungal chu Judia leh Samaria gam khochinah a dalhjah vehta uhi.
Huleh, Pathian ngaihsah kuate aha in Stephen chu a vui va, nasatahin a suun uhi.
Saul in ahihleh, kouhtuam pawlte a suduhdah mahmah a, inn chinah a luut a, numei pasal a kaidoh a, suangkul ah a khum hi.
Huleh a dalhjahte chu khochin ah a chiah va thu a soita uhi.
Huin, Philip chu Samaria khopi ah a chiahsuh a, a kawmvah Khrist thu a soi hi.
Huleh, a silmah bawlte a jah va, a muh un mipite’n Philip thusoi chu lungsim munkhat in a ngaihsah uhi.
Dawiniinte, aw ngaihtaha kikou a, mi tampi a matte uh sunga kipat ahung pawt va; huleh zeng leh keengbaai tamtahte zong ahung damtaah jiahun;
Huleh, hu khopi ah kipaahna nasatah a umta hi.
Hizongleh, a min Simon kichi mi khat a um a, ama’n chu, milian ka hi chi'n, tum a la min hu khopi ah mitphialdawi zang in Samarimite limdangsatahin a koih veu a.
Mi zousiah in, a neupen apat a lianpen tanphain, Hi mi hi Pathian silbawltheihna loupi a chih uh ahi, chi'n a thu a ngaihsah veu uh.
Huleh, mitphialdawi a hun sawttah limdangsataha ana koih taah jiahin a thu a ngaihsah uhi.
Hizongleh, amahun chu Pathian gam leh Jesu Khrist Tanchinpha, Philip soi a gintaat un, a numei a pasal in baptisma a tangta uhi.
Huin, Simon nasanin zong ahung gingta a; huleh, baptisma a tan nungin, Philip kawmah a um zing a, chiamchihna leh silmah nasatah kibawlte muin, limdang a sa thei mahmah hi.
Huin, sawlleh Jerusalem khua a umte’n, Samarite’n Pathian thu a awita uh chih a heet un, a kawmvah Peter leh John a sawl va.
Hu mite chu a va tunsuh un Hagau Siangthou a tan theihna diingun a haamteisah va;
Hu ma in chu a lahva kuamah tungah a tung nai sih hi; Lalpa Jesu min a baptisma tang chauh ahi nalai uhi.
Huin, sawllehte’n a tungvah a khut uh a nga va, Hagau Siangthou a tangta uhi.
Huleh, Simon in sawllehte khut ngah jiaha, Hagau Siangthou piah ahi chih a muh in.
Hitobang thuneihna hung pe ve un, kua tungah hizongleh khut ka ngahna phot in Hagau Siangthou a muh vena diingun, chi'n sum piah a tum a.
Hizongleh, Peter in a kawmah, Na sum nangmah toh mangkhawm heh, Pathian silpiah dangka sum a lei na tup jiahin.
Hi thu ah tellah na tel sih a, tan zong na nei ngal sih hi, na lungtang Pathian muh a, a dih louh jiahin.
Hujiahin na mohna kisiih inla, Pathian kawmah haamtei in, huchi'n na lungtang a na ngaihtuah hi ahung ngaidamkhamoh sih diing.
Ajiahchu sil khaatna sinkha ah leh, bohsiatna kaan gawmna ah na um hi, chih ka he hi, a chi a.
Huin, Simon in a dawng a, Na sil soite uh bangmah ka tunga a tun louhna diingin nangun Lalpa kawmah hung haamteisah un, a chi a.
Huin, amahun Lalpa thu chu a heetsah leh a soi zoh nungun, Jerusalem khua ah a chiah kiitta va, Samarite kho tamtah ah Tanchinpha a soita uhi.
Huleh, Lalpa angel in Philip a houpih a, Thou inla, simlama Jerusalem khua akipan a Gaza kho sunsuh lampi, hu gamdai ah chiah in, a chi a.

Huleh, amah chu thou in a chiahta a; huleh, ngaidih, Ethiopia gam a mi khat, Ethiopia kumpinu Kandake nuaia michilgeh lal tah, a gou zousiah koltu chu Jerusalem khua ah Pathian be diingin a va chiah a.
Ahung pai kiit lam in a kaangtalai a toukawm in zawlnei Isaiah lehkhabu a sim hi.
Huin, Hagau in Philip kawmah, Hu kaangtalai va naih inla, va kithuahpih in, a chi a.
Huin, Philip chu a kawmah a va tai a, zawlnei Isaiah lehkhabu a sim a ja a, Na sim chu na theisiam nai? a chi a.
Huleh, ama’n chu, Kuamah hung hilhchet louhin bang ka chi theihsiam diai? a chi a. Huleh, Philip chu kaldohtou a, a kawma tou diingin a zawn a.
Pathian lehkhabu a simna mun chu hih ahi, Thah diing belaam bangin Amah chu a pui va; huleh belaamnou a mulmeettu ma a, a sip khiinkhian bangin, Ama’n zong a kam a keeh sih;
A thunuaigolh laiin a tunga thudih soina laahmang ahi a; a haahte tanchin kuan ahiai hung soi diing? Leitung akipanin a hinna laahsah ahi ngal a, chih.
Huleh, michilgeh in Philip a houpih a, a kawmah, Ka hung ngen hi, hi thu hi zawlnei in kua thu a soina ahiai? amah thu ahiai, mi dang thu? a chi a.
Huin, Philip in a kam a kaah a, hu Pathian lehkhathu ngei apanin a kawmah Jesu thu a soita hi.
Huleh, lampi a, a pai laiun tui umna mun khat ahung tungva; huleh michilgeh in, Endua, hi ah tui um, baptisma ka tanna diing bangin ahung daal ei? a chi a.
Huin, Philip in, Na lungtang zousiaha na gintaat leh, na tang thei hi, a chi a. Huleh, ama’n a dawng a, Jesu Khrist chu Pathian Tapa ahi chih ka gingta hi, a chi a.
Huin, kaangtalai chu a khawlsah a; a nih un, Philip leh michilgeh chu tui lahah a chiahsuhkhawm va; huin, Philip in amah chu a baptista hi.
Huleh, tui apat a paidohtouh phet un, Lalpa Hagau in Philip chu a la mangta a, michilgeh in chu a mu kiitta sih hi; huleh, a lampi ah nuamtahin a pai jelta hi.
Hizongleh, Philip chu Azota khua ah a mu kiitta va; huleh, paisuaah pehin Caesarea khua a tun masiah khochin ah Tanchinpha chu a soita hi.
Huleh, Saul chu Lalpa nungjuite a vau thu leh, thah a tup thu sekhe kawmin, siampu lal kawmah a va chiah a,
Huleh, Damaska khua a kikhopna innte a diingin lehkha a ngen a, hilama mi kuapouh, pasal hiin numei hitaleh uh a muhmuh kaansa a Jerusalem khua a ahung pui theihna diingin.
Huleh, a zin a; Damaska khua kawm ahung tunga; huleh thakhat in vaan akipanin vaah a kiim ah ahung taang hi;
Huin, lei ah a puuh a, Saul, Saul, nang bang diinga hung suduhdah na hiai? chih aw a ja a.
Huin, ama’n, Lalpa, kua na hiai? a chi a. Huin, Lalpa’n, Jesu na suhduhdahpa chu ka hi; vuaahna siihzum peeh zing nang di’n a hahsa hi, a chi a.

Huleh, ama’n kithing kawm leh limdangsatahin, Lalpa, bang bawl diingin na hung deih ei? a chi a. Huin, Lalpa’n a kawmah, Thou inla khopi sungah luut in, huchi'n na bawl diing ahung na hilh diing uh, a chi a.
Huleh, amah toh zinkhawmte chu soi diing beiin a ding va, aw chu a ja va, hizongleh kuamah a mu sih uhi.
Huin, Saul chu lei a kipanin a thou a; huleh, ahung hah a, hizongleh bangmah a muthei sih a; huchi'n a khut in a kai va, Damaska khua ah a puiluut uhi.
Huleh, ni thum kho mu louin a um a, bangmah a nein a dawn sih hi.
Huleh, Damaska ah a min Anania kichi nungjui khat a um a; Lalpa’n manglam bangin a kawmah, Anania, a chi a. Huleh, ama’n, En in Lalpa, hi ah ka um hi, a chi a.
Huleh, Lalpa’n a kawmah, Thou inla, kotzing-tang a chih vah chiah inla, huleh, Juda inn a um, Tarsa khua a mi, a min Saul kichi kandohin; ajiahchu, ngai in, a haamtei laitah ahi.
Huleh, manglam bangin, mi khat a min Anania kichi luut a, a mit suvaah diing a a tunga khut nga in a muta hi, a chi a.
Huin, Anania in, Lalpa, hipa in Jerusalem khua a na misiangthoute tunga sil hoihlou a bawl dante mi tampi kam ah ka ja hi.
Huleh, Hi ah zong na min lou zousiahte kaanna diingin siampu lalte kawma kipanin thu a mu hi, a chi a.
Hizongleh, Lalpa’n a kawmah, Chiah mai in, ajiahchu amah hi jentelte leh kumpipate leh Israeltate kawma ka min poluuttu diing a ka beel teel ahi.
Ajiahchu ka min vangin gimna bangchi banga nasa aha a thuaah diing, a kawma theisah diing ka hi, a chi a.

Huin, Anania chu a va chiah a, inn ah a luut a; a tunga a khut nga in, Unau Saul, na mit vaahna diing leh, Hagau Siangthou a na dim theihna diingin, Lalpa, na hungna lampi a na kawma kilaah Jesu ngeiin, ahung sawl ahi, a chi a.
Huleh, thakhat in a mit apat phulipte bang a kepah a; huleh, a mit ahung vaah a, huin, a thou a, baptisma a tangta hi.
Huleh, an a ne a, a halhta hi. Huin, Saul chu Damaska a nungjui umte kawmah ni bangzah aha a um a.
Huleh, kikhopna innte haw ah Jesu chu Pathian Tapa a hihdan thu a taangkoupih pai ngal hi.
Huleh, a thu jate zousiah in limdang a sa mahmah va, Hi pa Jerusalem khua a, Hi min loute suduhdah veupa hilou amaw, huleh, kaansa a siampu lalte kawma pui tum a hi-a hung hilou maw? a chi va.
Hizongleh, Saul chu ahung haat sem a, Hi mi chu Khrist ahi tahtah hi chih hilhchian in, Damaska khua a Juda umte chu a ngaihna he lou in a koih hi.
Huleh, ni tamtah nungin, amah thah tum in Judate a kihou va;
Hizongleh, Saul in a siltup uh ana he a. Huleh, amahun amah thah tum in kulh kotkhaah suun leh jan in a taang uh.
Huin, nungjuite’n amah chu janin a pui va, kulh baangah bawmin a khaikheta uhi.
Huleh, Saul Jerusalem a tunin nungjuite kithuahpih a tum a; hizongleh, amahun nungjui ahih ve a gintaat louh jiahun, a lau mahmah uhi.
Hizongleh, Barnaba in amah a pui a, sawllehte kawmah ahung tonpih a, lampi a Lalpa a muh a, a houpihdan bang, huleh, Damaska khua a Jesu min a haangsantaha thu a soidante bang a soita a.
Huchi'n, amah chu Jerusalem khua ah a kawmvah luut jel pawt jelin a umta a.
Lalpa Jesu minin haangsantahin thu a soi a, huleh, Grik-Judate a nial a; hizongleh, amahun amah thah a tum uhi.
Huchu, unaute’n a heettah un, Caesarea khua ah a puisuh va, Tarsa khua ah a sawlmangta uhi.

Huin, kouhtuamte chu Judia gam vel, Galili gam vel, Samaria gam vel ah a det deuhdeuh va; muangtahin a umta uhi, huleh, Lalpa laudan siam in, Hagau Siangthou hamuan in a um va, ahung pung deuhdeuhta uhi.
Huleh, hichi ahung hi a, Peter chu amahuh laha vaah leh leh kawmin, Lidda khua a misiangthou umte kawma zong a chiahsuh a.
Huleh, hu ah a min Ainia kichi, a zeng jiaha kum giat lupna a lum zing khat a mu a.
Huleh, Peter in a kawmah, Ainia, Jesu Khrist in ahung sudam hi; thou inla, na puanphah jial in, a chi a. Huchi'n, amah chu a thoupah hi.
Huleh, Lidda leh Saron a umte zousiah in amah chu a mu va, Lalpa lam a ngata uhi. Tabitha (Dorka) sihna apat thohkiitna
Huleh, Joppa khua ah a min Tabitha kichi nungjui khat a um a, (Tabitha umzia chu Dorka ahi) hi numei in silbawl hoih leh silpiah a hau mahmah hi.
Huleh, hichi ahung hi a, hulaiin a chi ana a, a sita a; a sil zohun pindan tungnungah a lumsah uhi.
Huleh, Lidda khua chu Joppa kho kawm ahih jiahin, nungjuite’n Peter hu ah a um chih a ja va, sawt hal loua a kawmva hung diing a va ngen diingin, a kawmah mi nih a sawl va.

Huin, Peter chu a thou a, amahuh geel toh a kitonta a. Ahung tun in, amah chu pindan tungnung ah a pui va; huleh, meithai zousiah a kawma dingin, Dorka a kawmva a dam laia a puannaah bawlte a puan bawlte lah pum in a kap uhi.
Hizongleh, Peter in a bawnun a pawtsah a, a khupdin a, a haamteita a; huleh mi luang lam ngat in, Tabitha, thou in, a chi a. Huleh amahnu’n chu a mit ahung hah a; Peter a muh tahin ahung touta hi.
Huleh, Peter in a khut a pia a, a kaithouta a, huleh, misiangthoute leh meithaite a kou a, dam in a peta hi.
Huleh, hu thu Joppa khua zousiah in a he veh va; huleh, mi tampi in Lalpa a gingta uhi.
Huleh, hichi ahung hi a, Peter chu Joppa khua ah savun bawlpa Simon inn ah ni tampi a taamta hi.
Huleh, Caesarea khua ah a min Kornelia kichi mi khat a um a, Italy pawl a chih va sepaih zahoutu ahi a;
Pathian ngaihsahmi ahi a, a innkuante zousiah toh Pathian laudan a siam va, mite kawmah sil tampi a pia a, huleh, Pathian kawmah zong a haamtei zing hi.
Ama’n suun daah kuaahna vel diingin, manglam bangin, chiantahin Pathian angel khat a kawma luut a, Kornelia, chi'n a mu a.
Huin, Kornelia in amah a et leh, a lau a, Lalpa, bang ahitai? a chi a. Huin, angel in a kawmah, Na haamteinate leh na silpiahte heet zing diingin Pathian ma ah ahung tung touta hi.
Huchi'n, tuin Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, mi khat Simon Peter a chih uh chu va kousah in;
Amah chu tui khang lian gei a um, savun bawlpa Simon inn a tung ahi; ama’n na bawl diing ahung hilh diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh, angel Kornelia houpih khuh a pai tahin, Kornelia in a suaahte laha mi nih leh amah natohsah diingte laha Pathian ngaihsah sepaih khat a kou a;
Huleh, thu zousiah a kawmva a hilh zohin, Joppa khua ah a sawlta hi.
A jinga a chiah laiun, huleh khua a tun kuanun, Peter chu haamtei diingin, inn tungah a kaltou a, suun daah guupna hun vel ahi a;
Huleh, a gil ahung kial mahmah a, an neeh a ut a; hizongleh, neeh diing a bawl laiun jelh in ahung umta hi,
Huleh vaan kihongin, bangaha bawm, puan liantah bang, a ning li a khih a, lei a hung kikhaikhesuh in a mu a;
Hu sungah chu leitung a keenglinei ganhing chi chinteng leh, gamsate leh ganhing boh vaahte leh, tungleeng vate a um a.
Huleh a kawmah aw in, Peter, thou in; huleh that inla, ne in, a chi a.
Hizongleh, Peter in, Hilou e, Lalpa; ajiahchu sianglou leh a niin mawngmawng bangmah ka ne ngei sih hi, a chi a.
Huleh aw in a nihveina in, Pathian in ahih siangthousa nang siangthou lou chi sin, a chi a.
Huchibangin thumvei ahung um a, huin bawm chu vaan a khaitouh in a um kiitta hi.
Huleh Peter in manglam banga a silmuh chu a ngaihna thei loua a buai laiin, ngai in, Kornelia mi sawlte’n Simon inn a kandohta va, kotkhah bulah ana diing va;
Huleh a kou va, Simon Peter a chih uh a tun leh tun louh ana dong uh.
Peter in manglam banga a sil muh chu a ngaihtuah laiin, Hagau in a kawmah, ngai in, mi thum in ahung hawl uhi.
Huchi'n thou in, huleh kumkhia inla, bangmah ginglel louin amahuh juiin; amahuh chu ka sawl ahi uh, a chi a.
Huin Peter chu Kornelia mi sawlte kawmah a chiahsuh a, a kawmvah, Ngai un, na hawl uchu ka hi; bang ahiai na hung nasan uh? a chi a.

Huleh amahun, Pathian apata angel siangthou khat in, Kornelia, sepaih zahoutu mi dihtah, Pathian laudan siam, Judami zousiah in a soiphat, kawmah na thusoi a jahna diinga, a inn a nang kousah diingin a hilh hi, a chi va.
Huin amahuh a kou luut a, a giahsahta a. Huleh a jingin Peter amahuh toh a chiah a, huleh Joppa khua a unau kuate aha in amah a kitonpih uhi.
Huleh a jing kiitin Caesarea khua ah a luutta va. Huleh, Kornelia in a tanaute leh a lawm deihtahte koukhawm in, amahuh ana ngaah zing a.
Huleh Peter ahung luut kuanin Kornelia in ana lamtuah a, huleh a keengbulah bohkhup in Pathian biah bangin ana bia a.
Hizongleh Peter in amah chu a kaithou a, Ding in; kei zong mihing ka hi, a chi a.
Huleh amah toh kihoulim kawmin, inn sungah a luut a, mi tamtah umkhawm chu a muta hi.
Huleh a kawmvah, Judami namdang toh kipawl a, a kawmva chiah a si an louhdan na he uh; hizongleh, kuamah sianglou leh niin ka chih diing ahi sih, chih, Pathian in ahung hesah hi.
Hujiahin na hung kouh tahun, nial louin ka hungpah ahi; hujiahin na hung kouhna san uh bang ahiai? chih, ka hung dong ahi, a chi a.
Huin Kornelia in, Ka an ngawlna ni li ahita hi; huleh, ka inn ah, pung kuaahna hunin ka haamteia; huleh, ngai in, mi khat puan vaamtah silh in ka ma ah ahung ding a.
Huleh Kornelia, na haamteina jahin a umta, mi kawma na silpiah zong Pathian in a he zing hi.

Hujiahin Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, Simon, Peter a chih uh chu na kawmah kouin; amah chu tui khang lian, panga savun bawlpa Simon inn a tung ahi; amah ahung chiangin thu ahung hilh diing hi, a chi a.
Hujiahin, na kawmah mi ka hung sawlpah ahi; na hung hi a hoih hi huchi'n, Pathian in na kawma ahung thupiah zousiah ja diingin, tuin Pathian mitmuh in ka bawnun hi ah ka um uhi, a chi a.
Huin Peter in a soi a, Pathian in mi deihsahtuam a nei sih hi, chih dihtahin ka he hi;
Ahihvangin namchin laha kuapouh Amah laudan siam a, dihtaha gamta photmah chu a paahtaat mi ahi veu uhi.
Pathian in hamuanna thu Jesu Khrist mina soi a, Israel haahte kawma a thu thot chu, (Jesu chu mi zousiah Lalpa ahi).
John in a taangkoupih baptisma nungin, thu Galili gam a kipan ahung thang pan a, Judia gam zousiah ah a thang suaah a, nangun na he uhi.

Nazareth Jesu tungtaang thu, Pathian in Amah chu Hagau Siangthou leh silbawltheihna a, a thopdan; Amah chu mi tunga silhoih bawl leh diabol suhduhdah zousiah sudam in a vaah leh a; Pathian a kawma a um jiahin.
Huleh Judate gam leh, Jerusalem khua a a silbawl zousiah heetpihtu ka hi uhi; amah chu singdawn a khai in a sulumta uhi;
Amah chu Pathian in, ni thum niin a kaithou kiit a, chiantahin a musah hi.
Mi zousiah kawmah ahi sih a, hizongleh, Pathian in heetpihtu a guatlawhte kawmah chauh ahi, keiuh misi lah apat a thohkiit nunga a kawma ne a dawnte kawmah.
Huleh Amah chu mihing leh misite tunga vaihawmtu diing a Pathian guat ahi chih, mi kawma taangkoupih diing leh hesah diingin Pathian in thu ahung pia hi.
Kuapouh Amah gingta in a min jalin sualnate ngaihdamna a mu diing uh chih a tanchin chu zawlnei zousiah in ana heetsah sa uh ahi, a chi a.
Peter in hi thute a soi laitahin, a thu ja zousiah tung ah, Hagau Siangthou ahung tungta hi.
Huleh zehtante laha gingtute, Peter toh hung zousiahte’n, Hagau Siangthou piah chu Jentelte tunga zong leih ahih jiahin thumah a sa mahmah uhi.
Amahuh chu haam heet louha thu soi in, Pathian phat in a ja ngal va. Huin Peter in a dawng a,
Hi mite eimah banga Hagau Siangthou tang ve chu baptisma a tan louhna diingun mi’n tui zat a khaam thei diviai mah? a chi a.
Huchi'n Lalpa min a baptisma tang diingin thu a pia a. Huin, ni bangzah aha taam diingin a houta uhi.
Huleh Judia gam a sawllehte leh unau umte’n Jentelte in zong Pathian thu a pomta uh chih, a jata va.
Huleh Peter chu Jerusalem khua a tuntouh tahin, zehtante’n a kawmah,
Zehtanloute inn ah na luut a, a kawmvah na ne vial a, chi'n a kalh va.
Hizongleh Peter in sil umdan a bul akipatin kijom jelin a kawmvah a hilhchian a, hichia chi'n,
Joppa khua ah haamteiin ka um a; huleh, jelin ka um a, manglam bangin, bangaha bawm, puan liantah bang, a ning li a khih a, vaan akipat a kikhaikhia ka mu a; ka kawm ngeiah ahung tung hi;
Huchu ka en tinten a, ka ngaihtuah a, huleh lei a gamsa keeng li neite, gamsate, ganhingte boh vaahte leh tunga leeng vate ka mu a.
Huleh, aw in, Peter, thou inla; that inla ne in, hung chi'n ka ja a.
Hizongleh ke'n, Lalpa, hilou e, ajiahchu sianglou leh niin mawngmawng bangmah ka kam ah a luut ngei sih, ka chi a.
Hizongleh vaan akipanin aw in, Pathian in a suhsiangsa nang siang lou chi sin, ahung chi kiit a.
Huleh huchibang ngenin thumvei ahung um a, huin a bawnin vaan ah khaitouh in a um kiitta hi.
Huleh ngai un, mi thum Caesarea apat a ka kawma ahung sawl uh ka umna inn ah ana tung uh a.
Huleh Hagau in ginglel lou leh kuamah khentuam nei loua, amahuh jui diingin ahung sawl a. Hi unau guupte’n zong ahung jui va, hu mi inn ah ka luut uhi;
Huleh ama’n ka kawmvah, a inn a angel ding a muhdan leh, angel in a kawma, Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, Simon Peter a chih uh chu va kousah in;
Ama’n thu ahung hilh diing a, hu thuin nang leh na innkuanpihte huhing in na um diing uh, a chihdan zong ahung hilh hi.
Huleh thu ka soi pat leh, Hagau Siangthou i tunga ahung tun chiil lai mahbangin, a tungvah ahung tungta hi.
Huin Lalpa thu, John in tui in mi a baptis veu a; hizongleh, nangun chu Hagau Siangthou in baptisma na hung tang diing uh, a chih chu ka hung hedoh kiitta hi.
Huchi'n eiuh Lalpa Jesu Khrist gingtate kawma, Pathian in silpiah ahung piah bang a kawmva a piah ve nungin, kei bang giap hi Pathian nial gual ka hiaimah? a chi a.
Hu thu chu a jah tahun a sipta va, Huchi ahihleh, Pathian in Jentelte zong hing diingin a kisiih uh phal ahita ve, chi'n Pathian a phatta uhi.
Huleh Stephen jiaha a bawlsiat uh, a taithaangte chu Phoenicia gamte, Cyprus gamte, Antiok khuate tanphain a zin va, Judate kawm chauh ah lou chu kuamah kawmah thu a soi sih uh.
Hizongleh a lahva khenkhat chu Cyprus gam leh Cyrene khua a mite ahi va, hu mite’n Antiok khua a tunun Grikte zong a houpih va, Lalpa Jesu Tanchinpha a hilhta uhi.
Huleh Lalpa khut in amahuh a panpih a, huleh, mi tamtah in a gingta va, Lalpa lam ahung ngatta uhi.
Huin a tanchin thu uh Jerusalem khua a kouhtuam umte bil ah a luutta a; huleh, Antiok khua tung diingin Barnaba a sawlkhia va.
Huleh amah a va tuna Pathian khotuah zia a va muh in a kipaah mahmah a, phatuam ngaitaha Lalpa chu tu zing diingin a bawnun a hasotta hi.
Ajiahchu amah chu mi hoihtah ahi a, Hagau Siangthou leh ginna a dim ahi a, huleh, mi tamtah Lalpa kawmah a telbehta uhi.
Huin Barnaba chu Saul hawl diingin Tarsa khua ah a chiah a,

Huleh amah a muh in Antiok khua ah ahung pui a. Huleh, hichi ahung hi a, kumkhat kouhtuamte kikhopna ah a tel uh a, mi tampi thu a hilh uhi. Huleh, Antiok khua ah, nungjuite chu Khristian a kichi masapen uhi.
Huleh hulaiin zawlnei kuate aha Jerusalem khua apatin Antiok khua ah ahung va.
Huleh a lahva mi khat, a min Agaba chu a ding a, khovel zousiah ah kial loupitah tung ding ahi chih, Hagau hilhin a hesah a, hu kial chu Klaudia Kaisar lal laiin ahung tung hi.
Huin nungjuite’n a ngaapdan chiat un, Judia gam a unau umte kawmah panpihna thot a tum uh;
Huchu a bawlta ngei va, Barnaba leh Saul khut ah, upate kawmah a thotta uhi.
Huleh hulai velin kumpipa Herod in kouhtuamte laha kuate aha suhduhdah tum in a khut a lehta a.
Huleh John sanggampa Jakob chu namsaau in a saatlum a.
Huleh hihin Judate a kipaahsah chih a muh jiahin, Peter zong mat a tum sawn a (Hulai chu tanghou tol sohlouh nite a hi).
Huleh, amah a mat tahin suangkul ah a khum a, sepaih honli li chiat jelin a veen kheelsah a; chiahkaan kuut zohin mipite kawmah puidoh a tum hi.
Hujiahin Peter chu suangkul ah a koih tadih a; hizongleh, kouhtuamte’n amah diingin phatuamngaitahin Pathian kawmah a haamteisah zing uhi.
Huleh Herod in a puidoh diing ni, hu jan ngei in Peter chu sepaih nih kikal ah khainiang nih bulh in a ihmu a; huleh, a veengtute’n zong kotkhaah bul a um in suangkul chu a veeng uhi.
Huleh ngai in, Lalpa angel khat a kawmah a hung a, suangkul sungah vaah ahung taangta a, huleh Peter chu a pang beeng in a phawng a, Thou kin in, a chi a, Huleh khainiangte a khut apat a keta hi.
Huin angel in a kawmah, Na kawng gaah inla, na keengtophah but in, a chi a. Huleh ama’n huchibangin ahih a. Huin angel in a kawmah, Na puan silh inla, hung jui in, a chi a.
Huin Peter chu a pawt a, a juita a; angel silbawl chu a tah ahih a he sih a; manglama a muh a sa zaw hi.

Veengtu masa leh a nihna a pelh nungun, khopi luutna siihkot chu a tungta va; Huchu amahuh diingin amahin ahung kihongta hi; huleh a pawt va, kotzing khat a paipeel va; huin angel in a paisanpahta hi.
Huleh Peter a halh tahin, Lalpa’n angel ahung sawl a, Herod khut leh Juda mite kinepna zousiah akipanin ahung hundohta chih tuin chiantahin ka heta, a chi a.
Huleh hu sil a ngaihtuah zohin, John, Mark a chih uh nu Mari inn ah a va chiah a; hu ah chu haamteina nei in mi tamtah ana umkhawm uhi.
Huleh Peter in kotkhaah a kiuh tahin, a min Rhoda kichi nungaah khat a dawng diingin a hung a.
Huleh Peter aw ahih a heet tahin a kipaah jiahin kot chu hong louin a tai luut kiit zawta a, Peter kotkhaah bul ah a ding chih a va soi hi.
Amahun a kawmah, Angol hi teh, a chi va. Hizongleh ama’n chu thudih ahi chi'n a pang teitei a. Huin, amahun a angel ahi, a chi va.
Hizongleh Peter in chu kot a kiukiu a; huleh kot chu a hon tahun, amah a mu va, limdang a sa mahmah uhi.

Hizongleh ama’n a sipna diingun a khut in a jap a, Pathian in suangkul apat amah a puidohdan chu a hilhta a. Hi thute Jakob leh unaute kawmah va hilh un, a chi a. Huin a pawt a, mun dang ah a chiahta hi.
Huin ni a suah tahin, sepaih haw chu Peter khoia um ahiai? chi'n buai chihtahin a buaita uhi.
Huleh, Herod in a hawl a, a muh louh tahin, a veengtute chu a endih a, thah diingin thu a peta hi. Huin Herod chu Juda gam a kipan Caesarea khua ah a chiahsuh a, hu ah a um zingta hi.

Huleh Herod chu Tura leh Sidon khua a mite tungah a lungkim sih mahmah a; hizongleh, amahun Blasta kumpipa innsung vaipotu chu a kizolhpih va, thukhat a luang in a kawmah a hung va, a khaw lamte uh chu kumpipa khawlama buh po jel ahih jiahun kilemna a ngen uh.
Huleh a ni chiam niin Herod in a lalpuan a silh a, a laltouphah tungah a tou a, a kawmvah thu a soi hi.
Huleh mipi chu kikou in, Hi chu Pathian aw ahi, mihinga ahi sih, a chi va.
Huleh Pathian kawma paahtawina a piah louh jiahin, Lalpa angel in amah a manpah ngal a; huut in a ne a, a sita hi.
Hizongleh Pathian thu chu a dalh a, a pung jel hi.
Huleh Barnaba leh Saul chu a natoh uh a zohun, Jerusalem khua akipat a kiih kiitta va, John, a mintah Mark chu a kawmvah a pui uhi.

Huleh Antiok khua a kouhtuam umte laha zawlneite leh thuhilhtute a um va; hute chu Barnaba, Simeon, Nigar a chih uh te, Cyrene khua a um Lusia, kumpipa Herod toh khang khawm Manaen, leh Saul te ahi uh.
Huchia Lalpa nna tong a an a ngawl laiun, Hagau Siangthou in, Barnaba leh Saul keimah nna tong diingin hung khenkhiahsah un, a chi a.
Huleh an a ngawl va a haamtei zohun, a tungvah a khut uh a nga va, a chiahsahta uhi.
Huchi'n Hagau Siangthou sawldoh in a chiah va, Seliusia khua ah a chiahsuh va, hu akipatin Cyprus lamah kuang in a chiahta uhi.
Huleh Salamis khua a a um laiun, Judate kikhopna innte ah Pathian thu a soi va; huleh John zong a nna uh tohsah diingin a pui uhi.
Huleh Cyprus tuikulh gam chu tawnsuah in Paphos khua ah a tungva, huah dawisiam zawlnei heem Judami khat a mu va, a min chu Bar-Jesu ahi a.
Hu mi chu gamoptu Serjia Paulus mipiltah kawma um ahi; hu gamoptu’n Saul leh Barnaba chu a kou a, Pathian thu jah a ut a.
Hizongleh Elima (Bar-Jesu min dang umzia ahi), dawisiampa’n gamoptu chu gin louhsah tum in, amahuh chu ana doudaal hi.
Huin Saul, (Paul a chih mah uh) chu Hagau Siangthou in a dim a, amah chu a ensaal a,
Huin, Aw Nang mi heem leh hoih louhna chintenga dimpa, nang diabol tapa, nang dihtatna zousiah meelmapa, Lalpa lam dihtahte suhsiat tawplou diing na hi maw?

Huleh tuin, ngai in, Lalpa khut na tungah a tu ahi, na mit ahung taw diing a, bangtan aha khovaah mu louin na um diing, a chi a. Huin, thakhat in mei leh mial a tungah ahung kia a; khuta kaitu diing hawl in a vaah lehlehta hi.
Huin gamoptu in hu sil kibawl chu a mu a, Lalpa thuhilh chu limdang a sa mahmah a, a gingtata hi.
Huin Paul chu a lawite toh Paphos khua apatin a chiah va, Pamphilia gam a Perga khua a tungva; huleh John in amahuh chiahsanin Jerusalem khua ah a kiih kiitta hi.
Hizongleh amahuh chu Perga khua akipat a chiah jel va, Pisidia gam a Antiok khua a tungva, huleh, khawlni in kikhopna inn ah a luut va, a tou uh.
Huleh Daan lehkhabu leh zawlneite lehkhabu a sim zohun kikhopna inn upate in a kawmvah mi a sawl va, Nanguh mite leh unaute, mite hasotna thu soi diing na neih uleh soi un, a chi va.
Huin Paul a ding a, a khut a jap in, a soi a, Israelmite leh nanguh Pathian laudan siamte, ngai un.
Hi Israel namte Pathian in i pulepate uh a teel a, Aigupta gam a, a um laiun a suloupi a, huleh, tungnung khut in hu a kipatin a puidohta hi.
Huleh kum sawmli hun sung vel chu gamdai ah a silbawlte uh a ngai thei a.
Huleh Kanan gam a nam sagihte a suhmang zohin, a gam uh a kawmvah aaisaan in a hawmsah hi.
Hu nungin kum zali leh kum sawmngaa sung vaihawmtute a pia a, zawlnei Samuel chiang tanin.
Huleh hu nungin kumpi a ngen va; huchi'n, Pathian in Saul, Kis tapa, Benjamin phung a mi, amahuh a pia a, kum sawmli sung diingin.

Huleh amah a suanmang nungin a kumpipa va pang diingin David a tungdohta a; Pathian in hu pa thu chu hesah in, David, Jesse tapa, ka lungtang bang pua mi ka mudohta, ama’n chu ka deihlam phot a bawl diing, a chi a.
Hi mipa haahte lahah Pathian in a thuchiam dungjuiin Israelte kawmah Hundampa Jesu ahung tutta hi.
Ahung ma in John in kisiihna baptisma thu Israelmi zousiah kawmah ana hilh masa hi.

Huleh John in a lam a juih zoh kuan laiin, Nangun kua hi diingin na hung gingta viai? Amah chu hilou ka hi. Hizongleh, ngai un, ka nungah mi khat hung diing ahi, kei chu a keengtophah phel taah zong ka hi sih hi, a chi hi.
Mite leh unaute, Abraham suan tate haw, huleh na lahva Pathian laudan siam zousiah haw, na kawmvah hi hutdamna thu hung kihaah ahi.
Jerusalem khua a umte leh a lamkaiteun, a heet louh jiahun, Amah chu siamlouh tangsah in, hu thute ana sutaangtungta uh ahi.
A sihna diing khop a tunga bangmah a muh louhun zong, Pilat kawmah suhlup diingin a ngen va.
Huleh a tungtaang thu na kigelhsa zousiah a suhtaangtung zohun, sing akipanin a lakhia va, haanah a sialta uhi.
Hizongleh Amah chu Pathian in misi laha kipat a kaithou kiitta hi;
Huleh, amah toh Galili gam a kipat a Jerusalem khua a chiah pute kawmah ni tampi sung a kilaah veu a, hu mite chu tuin mite kawmah a thu heetpihtute ahi uhi.
Huleh kei un zong i pulepate uh kawma chiamsa, hu thuchiam tanchin kipaahhuai ka hung hilh uhi.
Pathian in Jesu a kaihthoh kiitna ah, Huchu, ei a tate uh kawmah a sutaangtung ahi; Psalm nihna a, Nang chu ka Tapa na hi a, tuni’n ka hung hing ahi, chih gelh bangin.
Huleh muatna muna pai kiitta lou diing a Pathian in Amah misi laha kipat a kaihthoh diingdan thu chu hichi'n a soi hi, David kawma khotuahna thawnloute nangmah ka hung pe diing, chi'n.
Hujiahin ama’n Psalm dangah, Na misiangthou chu muatna na musah sih diing hi, a chi kiit jel hi.
Ajiahchu David in chu Pathian vaihawmsah banga amah khang a mite na a toh zohin, a ihmu a, huleh a pulepate kawmah a sial va, a muat mangta hi.
Hizongleh Pathian in a kaihthoh in chu muatna a mu sih hi.
Hujiahin hi chu he un, mite leh unaute; Amah vanga sual ngaihdamna thu na kawmva kisoi ahi;
Huleh kuapouh a gingta phot chu Mosi daan a siam na tan zoh louhna uh sil zousiah ah, siamtansah in a um hi.
Hujiahin pilvaang un, huchilouin zaw zawlneite lehkhabu a hu thu kisoi na tungvah ahung tungkha diing hi.
Nanguh musittute en un, huleh limdang sa unla, mangthai un; ajiahchu na damsungun nna khat ka tong hi, hu nna chu mi’n nanguh hung hilh mahleh uh na gingta top sih diing uhi, chih, a chi a.
Huleh Judate kikhopna inn apat a pawt un, Jentelte’n khawlni kiit chianga hu thu chu a kawmva soi diingin a ngen uh.

Huleh kikhawmte chu a kikhenjah tahun, Judate tamtah leh Juda biahdan jui Pathian ngaihsah laha mi tamtah in Paul leh Barnaba a jui va,amahun amahuh chu ana houpih va, Pathian khotuahna a um zing diingin ana hasot uhi.
Huleh khawlni kiit in, a khojang phial un, Pathian thu ngaikhe diingin ahung kikhawm va.
Hizongleh Judate’n mipite a muh tahun a thangse mahmah va, Paul thusoi chu a kalh va, a soisia uhi.

Huin Paul leh Barnaba in haangsantahin a soi va, Pathian thu hi nanguh kawma soi masat diing mawng ahi a; hizongleh, na nial va, kumtuanga hing taahlou a na kiguat nungun he un, Jentelte lam ka ngatta uh ahi.
Ajiahchu Lalpa’n hichi bangin kei uh thu ahung pia hi, Jentelte vaah hi diingin ka hung guat a, kawlmong tanpha a hutdamna hi diingin, chih gelh bangin, a chi a.
Huleh Jentelte’n hu thu a jahun a kipaah va, Lalpa thu a paahtawi va; huleh, kumtuanga hing diing a guat taphot in a gingta uhi.
Huleh Lalpa thu chu hu gam pumpi ah a dalhta hi.
Hizongleh Judate’n Pathian ngaihsah numei zahtaathuaite leh khosung upate a chiilsia va, Paul leh Barnaba chu a sawisah va, a gam vapat a delhmangta uhi.
Huin amahun a tungvah a keengpeeh va leivui a thingkhia va, Ikonium khua ah a chiahta uhi.
Huleh nungjuite chu kipaahna leh Hagau Siangthou in a dimta uhi.
Huleh, Ikonium khua ah hichi ahung hia, Judate kikhopna inn ah a luutkhawm va, thu a soi va, huchi'n, Judate leh Grikte tamtah in zong a gingtata uhi.
Hizongleh, gingta lou Judate’n Jentelte a chiilsia va, unaute a mudahsahta uhi.
Hujiahin, Lalpa ah haangsantaha thu soi in hu ah sawttah a um va, ama’n chu chiamtehnate leh sillamdangte a khut va bawlsah in, a hehpihthu a theisah jel hi.
Hizongleh khopi sunga mipite chu a kilangkhen va; khenkhat in Judate a gum va, khenkhat in sawllehte a gum uhi.
Huin, Jentelte leh Judate’n a houtute uh toh kithuaha sawllehte zumhuaitaha bawl leh suang a seh tum a sil a bawl tahun,
Amahun hichu ana he va, Likaonia gam a Listra leh Derbe khua ah, huleh a kiimvel gam ah a taimang uh;
Huleh hu ah chu tanchinpha a soita uhi.
Huleh Listra khua ah keeng zoi kua aha mi khat a tou a, a pian tuung apat keengbaai mawng ahi a, keeng in a pai ngei sih hi;
Hu mi'n Paul thusoi a ngaikhia a; huleh Paul in a ensaal a, a damna diingin ginna a nei chih a he a,
Aw ngaihtahin, Na keeng in dingtang in, a chi a. Huin, amah chu a kitawm a, a keeng in a paita hi.
Huleh mipite’n Paul silbawl chu a muh tahun ngaihtaha kikou in, Likaonia haam in, Pathiante chu mihing banga i kawmva hungsuh ahi uh, a chi va.
Huleh amahun Barnaba chu, Jupiter a chi va, Paul chu thusoipen ahih jiahin, Merkuria, a chi uhi.
Huin khopi kot maaia um Jupiter siampupa’n chu bawngtalte leh paahvui kotpi bulah ahung tawi a, mipite toh amahuh geel biahna in thah a tumta hi.
Hizongleh sawllehte, Barnaba leh Paul in hichu a heet tahun, a puan uh a botkeeh va, mipi lahah a tawmluut va, a kikou va,

Pute, bang diinga hi silte bawl na hi viai? Keiuh zong nanguh toh thuaah kibang mihing ka hi uhi, huleh hi sil thulimloute na kiheisan va, vaan leh lei, tui khang lian huleh a sunga sil um zousiah bawlpa Pathian hing kawma na hung kihei theihna diingun tanchinpha ka hung tut uh ahi.
Hu Pathian in chu nidang laiin nam chin amahuh lampi chiat a, a chiah uh ana phal a.

Ahihvangin Amah heetsahna bawl louin ana umsah sih, huchi'n, silhoih a bawl jel a, vaan apatin guahtui leh gahpha bangkim ahung pia a, i lungtang (lungtangte) uh neeh diing leh kipaahna in a sudim zing hi, a chi va.
Huleh hi thute soi in, mipite’n amahuh biahna diing a gan a goh diing uh a khap zou hamham uhi.
Huleh Antiok leh Ikonium khua apat Judami kuate aha hu ah a hung va, mipite chu a heem zou va, huchi'n Paul chu suang in a sep va, si a, a gintaat jiahun khopi geilam ah a kaikhia uhi.
Ahihvangin nungjuite a kiima a din laiun, ahung thou a, khopi sungah ahung luut kiitta a; huleh, a jingin Barnaba toh Derbe khua ah a chiahta uhi.
Huleh amahun hu khopi a tanchinpha a soi va, mi tampi a hilh zohun, Listra leh, Ikonium leh, Antiok khua ah a kiih kiitta uhi.
Gimna tampi thuaah in Pathian gam ah i luut diing mawng ahi, chi'n nungjuite lungsim a kipsah va, ginna a um zingzing diingin a hasot uhi.
Huleh kouhtuam china upate a namdet va, an ngawl a, a haamtei zohun, amahuh chu a gintaat uh Lalpa kawmah a kemsahta uhi.
Huleh Pisidia gam chu a tawnsuah va, Pamphilia gam a tungva.
Huleh Perga khua a thu a soi zohun, Attalia khua ah a chiahsuh uhi;
Huleh hu akipatin kuang in a chiah va, a natoh zohsa uh tong diing a unaute’n Pathian khotuahna kemsaha a pawtna uh Antiok khua chu ahung tungta uhi.
Huleh ahung tunun, kouhtuamte chu a koukhawm va, Pathian in amahuh zang a sil a bawl zousiah leh Jentelte diing a ginna kotkhaah a honsahdante a hilh uhi.
Huleh nungjuite toh sawttah a umkhawmta uhi.
Huleh mi kuate aha Judia gam apatin a hungsuh va, Mosi daan banga zeh na tan louh uleh hutdam na hi thei sih diing uh, chi'n unaute a hilh va.

Huleh Paul leh Barnaba chu amahuh toh hahnial a, a kinial va, a kikhin jiahun, Paul leh Barnaba chu a lahva kuate aha toh hu thubuai tungah, Jerusalem khua a sawllehte leh upate kawma chiah tou diingin a guat va.
Huin kouhtuamte’n amahuh chu a va thah va, amahun Jentelte lunghei kiitdan thu soi jel in, Phoenicia gam leh Samaria gam a tawn suaahuh; huchi'n, unaute zousiah nasatahin a kipaahsah uhi.
Huleh Jerusalem khua a tunun kouhtuamte leh sawllehte leh upate in ana kipaahpih va, huleh, Pathian in amahuh zang a a silbawlte zousiah a soi uhi.
Hizongleh Pharisai pawl a gingtu kuate aha a kipan va, Jentelte chu a zeh uh tan a, huleh Mosi daan jui diing a zong hilh ngei diing ahi, a chi uhi.
Huin sawllehte leh upate chu hu thu ngaihtuah diingin a kikhawm va.
Huleh naahtaha a kinial nungun, Peter a kipan a; a kawmvah, Mite leh unaute, Jentelte’n keimah kama tanchinpha ja a, a gintaatna diing va, Pathian in nidang laia, i lah vapat ahung guatdan na he uhi.
Huleh lungsim hetu Pathian in eihaw ahung piah bangmahin Hagau Siangthou a kawmvah a pia a, a heetpihta hi.
Huleh eihaw leh amahuh khentuam nei louin, ginna in a lungsim uh ahih siangthou hi.
Huchi'n i pulepate leh eihawn zong i zoh louhsa uh namkol chu tuin nungjuite ngawng a baat tum a bang diinga Pathian ze-et na hi viai?
Hizongleh amahuh tobangin, eihaw zong Lalpa Jesu Khrist khotuahna jiaha hutdam diing hi in i kigingta uhi, a chi a.
Huin mipi zousiah a sipta va, Barnaba leh Paul in Pathian in amahuh zanga. Jentelte laha chiamchihna leh sillimdang a bawlthu a soi uh a ngaikhia uhi.
Huleh a soi zohun, Jakob in a soi a, Mite leh unaute, ka thu ngai un;
Pathian in amah min paw diing a, a lah vapat mi honkhat ladoh diingin a masa in Jentelte a veh hi chih thu Simeon in a soita hi.
Huleh, hi thu leh zawlneite thu a kituaah hi;
Hizohchiangin, ka hung kiit diing a, David biahbuuh puuhsa ka bawl kiit diing; a siatnate ka bawl kiit diing a, huchi'n ka tungding diing hi.
Midangte leh Jentel ka min a kikou zousiahte’n Pathian a hawl na diingun, Hi silte zousiah bawlpa Lalpa’n a chi hi, chih gelh bangin.
A silbawlte zousiah chu khovel siam chiil apatin Pathian heet ahi.
Hujiahin, Jentelte laha Pathian lama kiheite chu suhbuai dah lei chih ka ngaihdan ahi.
Milim biahna, sil niin neehte, kingaihte, sa heehlup leh sisan neehte tawpsan diingin a kawmvah gelh lehang ka chi zaw hi.
Ajiahchu nidanglai apatin Mosi in khaw chinah a thu hilhtu a nei jela, kikhopna inn chinah khawlni tengin a thu chu sim ahi veu hi, a chi a.

Huin sawllehte leh upate chu kouhtuam zousiah toh, a lahva mi teel a, Paul leh Barnaba toh Antiok khua a chiahsah hoih a sa va; a teelte uh min chu Juda, a min dang Barsaba, a chih uh leh Silas ahi va, amahuh chu unaute laha houtu ahi uhi.
Huleh hichibangin lehkhathot chu a gial va a khut vah a thot uh; Sawllehte leh upate leh unaute’n Antiok khua leh Syria leh Silisia gam a um Jentel unaute chibai a buuh uhi.

Ka lahva kipatin mi kuate aha in, zeh na tan va, huleh daan zong na juih diing uh ahi, chia thu soi in, nanguh ahung subuai va, na lungsim uh a mangbangsah uh chih ka he va; a kawmvah lah thu bangmah ka pe ngal sih va;
Hujiahin lungsim munkhat pua a ka kikhop un, mi teeldoh a, ka deihtah uh Barnaba leh Paul,
Lalpa Jesu Khrist min jiaha sih khawhsa loua umte geel toh na kawmva hung sawl diingin hoih ka sa uhi.
Huchi'n Juda leh Silas ka hung sawl uhi, amahun zong hi thu ka min ahung hilh diing uh.
Ajiahchu, Hagau Siangthou leh kei un, hi thu poimohte chih louh puaahgih dang bangmah na tungva ngah louh hoih ka sa uhi.
Milim biahna sa neeh bang, sa heehlup neeh bang leh kingaih bang tawp leh uchin ka chi uhi; hi haw na tawp uleh nanguh diingin a hoih diing hi. Damtahin um un, chi in.
Huchi'n a sawlkheta va, Antiok khua a tungva; huleh, mipi a koukhawm va, lehkhathot chu a peta uhi.
Huchu a sim zohun, hamuanna thu jiahin a kipaah mahmahta uhi.
Huleh Juda leh Silas zong zawlnei ahi va, thu tamtahin unaute chu aha muan va, a sukip uhi.
Huleh hu a sawttah a um nungun amahuh chu hamuangtahin unaute lah apat sawllehte kawmah a chiahsahta uhi.
Silas in chu hu muna um tadih hoih a sa hi.
Paul leh Barnaba ahihleh Antiok khua ah Lalpa thu hilh leh soi in a um zing va, midang tamtahte toh zong.
Huleh ni bangzat aha nungin Paul in Barnaba kawmah, i chiah kiit diing a, khochina Lalpa thu i soina zousiah a unaute va vehni, bang chi'n a um viai chih i va en diing, a chi a.
Huleh Barnaba in John, a min dang Mark chu a kawmvah pui a tum a.
Hizongleh amah, Pamphilia gam a amah uh kiihsan a, natohna a amahuh toh chiah loupi a kawmva pui diing chu Paul in hoih a sa sih hi.
Huchi'n nasatahin a kinialta va, huleh a kikhen va; Barnaba in Mark a pui a, Cyprus gam ah kuang in a chiahta hi.
Huleh Paul in Silas a teel a, unaute’n Pathian hehpihna a, a kolsah nungun a chiahkheta hi.
Huleh kouhtuamte sukip jelin Syria leh Silisia gam a tawnsuah uhi.
Huin amah chu Derbe leh Listra khua ah a hung a; huleh ngai in, huah Timothi kichi, nungjui khat a um a, amah chu gingtu, Juda numei koi aha tapa ahi a; hizongleh a pa chu Grik mi ahi.
Amah chu Listra leh Ikonium khua a um unaute in a soiphat mahmah uh ahi.
Paul in amah chu tonpih diingin a deih a; huleh a pui a, hu vela Judami umte jiahin a zeh a tansah a; amahun a pa Grik mi ahi chih a heet jiahun.
Huleh khopite tawna a pai kawmun, amahun Jerusalem khua a um sawllehte leh upate’n juih diing a, a namdet uh thupuuhnate chu a kawmvah a pekhia uhi.
Huchi'n, kouhtuamte chu ginna ah a kipta va, nichinin a pung deuhdeuhta uhi. Paul Hagau in a pui:
Huleh amahun Phrigia gam leh Galatia gam a totsuaah zohun Hagau Siangthou in Asia gam a thusoi a khap a,
Misia gam kawm a tun un, Bithinia gam a luut a tum va; hizongleh, Hagau in a phal sih hi.
Huchi'n Misia gam a khen va Troas khua ah a chiahsuhta uhi.
Huleh jan laiin, Paul in manglam bangin Makedonia gam a mi khat ding in, Makedonia gam ah hung gaalkai inla, hung panpih in, chi a ngen in a mu a.
Huleh hu manglam banga sil a muh zohin Makedonia gam ah chiah ka tumpah va, a kawmva tanchinpha soi diingin Pathian in ahung kou ahi chih dihtahin ka he uhi.
Huchi'n Troas khua apat kuang in ka pawt va, zangtahin Samothrakia ah ka chiah va, a jingin Niapoli khua ah ka chiah jel uhi.
Huleh hu apatin Philippi khua ah ka chiah va, huchu Makedonia gam a khaw poimoh khat ahi a, Rome khua a mipeemte khua ahi; hu khua ah ni tamdeuh ka taam uhi.
Huleh khawlni in kulhpi polam ah luipang ah haamteina mun hi a ka gintaat vah ka chiah va; huleh, ka tou va, numei hung paikhawmte kawmah thu ka soi uh.
Huleh, numei khat a min Lidia, puan sandup zuah, Thyatira khua a um Pathian bemi in ka thu uh a ja a; Paul thusoi jui diingin Lalpa in a lungtang a suhvaahsah hi.
Huleh, amah leh a innkuante in baptisma a tan zohun, Lalpa a ginum a na hung seh uleh, ka inn ah hung unla hung tung un, chi'n ahung kou a. Huleh, ahung houtaang teiteita hi.
Huleh, hichi ahung hi a, haamteina mun a ka chiah laiun, nungaah kua aha dawi aaisaansiam zawl in ahung kituahpih a, ama’n chu a aaisaan jiahin a pute sumtamtah a muhsah veu hi.
Hu mi in chu Paul leh keiuh ahung jui a, kikou in, Hi mite, hutdamna lampi hung hilhte hi tungnungpen Pathian suaahte ahi uh, a chi a.
Huleh, huchi'n ni sawttah ahih a. Huin Paul chu a lunghita sih a, a kihei a, dawi kawmah, Jesu Khrist min in a sunga kipat pawt thu ka hung pia ahi, a chi a. Huleh, amah chu hu laitahin a pawtpah hi.
Huleh a pute in a summuhna uh a bei chih a heettah un Paul leh Silas a man va, dawl munah houtute ma ah a kailuut uh a.
Huleh thukhentute kawmah a pui va, Hite hi Judami ahi va, ka khua uh a subuai mahmah uh.
Huleh ei Romemi in i laah leh i zop sianglou daante juisah ahung tum uhi, a chi va.
Huchi'n mipite chu amahuh sual diingin ahung kipan va; huleh, thukhentute in a puan uh a bohkeehsah va, chianga jep diing in thu a pia uhi.
Huleh tampi vei a jep zohun, suangkul ah a khum va, a veengtu kawmah bittah a veeng diingin thu a pia uh a;
Huchitah a thu a piah jiahun, amahuh chu taanna sungnung zaw ah a khum va, a keengte vah singkol a butsah uhi.
Huleh jan khang laiin Paul leh Silas chu a haamtei va, Pathian kawmah phatna la a sa va; huleh, mitaangte in a ngaikhia uhi.
Huleh thakhat in ziil nasatahin ahung kiliing a, huchi'n, suangkul innbulte chu a kiliing gawpa; huleh kotkhaah zousiah kihongpah in, michin kolbuhte ahung kiphel vehta hi.
Huin suangkul veengtu chu ihmu ahung halh a, huleh, suangkul kotkhaahte kihong a muh in, mitaangte chu taimangta uh a sa a, a namsaau a doh a, kithah a tum hi.
Hizongleh Paul chu aw ngaihtah a kikou in, Bangmah kiloh sin, ka bawnun hi ah ka um uhi, a chi a.
Huin a veengtu in chu khawn val a kan a, a tawmluut a, kithing kawma hungin, Paul leh Silas ma ah a khupbohta a.
Huleh amahuh chu ahung puidoh a, Pute, hutdama umna diingin bang ahiai ka bawl diing? a chi a.
Huin amahun, Lalpa Jesu Khrist gingtain, huchi'n hutdam in na um diing, nangleh na innkuante toh, a chi uh.
Huin amahun a kawma leh, a inn a um zousiahte kawmah Lalpa thu a soita uhi.
Huleh ama’n amahuh chu hu janin hu laitah mahin a pui a, a jepna golhte uh a silsiang a; huleh, amah leh a innkuante zousiah in baptisma a tangpah ngal uhi.
Huleh amahuh chu a inn sungah a pui a, a ma vah an a lui a, Pathian a gintaat jiahun a innkuante zousiah toh a kipaah uhi.
Huleh ni a suaah in, thukhentute in, Hu mite hah in, chi'n mi mantute a sawl va;
Huleh suangkul veengtu in Paul kawmah hu thu a hilh a, Thukhentute in nanguh hah diingin mi ahung sawl uhi; hujiahin tuin pawt unla hamuangtahin chiah un, a chi a.

Hizongleh Paul in a kawmvah, Romemite ka hi ngal va, ka siamna uh leh siamlouhna he louin vantaang mitmuh in ahung jep va, suangkul ah ahung khum va; huleh tuin; a guuha hung delhkhiah sawm ahi uh maw? hithei ngei lou diing; amahuh mahmah hung u’henla hung puidoh uheh, a chi a.
Huleh mimantute in hu thute chu thukhentute kawmah a hilh va; huleh, Romemite ahi uh chih a jah un a lauta va.
Huin amahuh a hung va, a zawl va, a puidoh va, khopi polama chiah mang diingin a ngen uhi.
Huleh amahuh chu suangkul apat a pawt va, Lidia inn ah a luut va; unaute a muh tahun, a hamuan va, a pawtta uhi.
Huleh Amphipoli khua leh Apollonia khua a paipeel va, Thessalonika khua a tungta va, huah chu Judate kikhopna inn a um a;
Huleh Paul chu amah ngeina in, a kawmvah a luutta, khawlni thumvei Pathian lehkhathute apat suituahpihin,
Khrist chu gimthuaah diing mawng a hihdan bang, huleh misi lah apat thou kiit ngei diing a hihdan leh, hi na kawmva ka soi Jesu chu Khrist ahi chih a hilhchian a, a sulang hi.
Huchi'n a lahva mi khenkhat in a gingta va, Paul leh Silas chu a pawlta uh; Pathian ngaihsah Grik mipi nasatah leh numei lamkai tamtahte toh.

Hizongleh ginglou Judate’n a huphulh va, dawlmun a migilou thasia kuate aha a kawmvah a pui va, mipi a koukhawm va, khopi sung teng a hihbuaita uhi, huleh Jason inn a luh va, amahuh chu vantaang laha puikhiah a tum uhi.
Huleh amahuh a muh louh phetun, Jason leh unau dang kuate aha khopi sung houtute kawmah a kailuut va, a kikou va, Hi khovel hihbuaitute hi ah zong a hung va;
Jason in ana zintungsah a; hite zousiah in A min Jesu, kumpi dang a um hi, chi'n Kaisar thu kalhin a um uhi, a chi va.
Huleh mipite leh khopi sung hoututein hu thu a jah un, a buaita va.
Huleh amahun Jason leh midangte kawm apatin a luang va heen diing bang aha a la va, amahuh a hahta uhi.
Huleh unaute’n ajan ajan in Paul leh Silas chu Beria khua ah a sawlkhepah va; hutah a va tun un Judate kikhopna inn ah a luut uhi.
Hu mite chu Thessalonika khua a mite sangin ana hoihzaw va, lungsim kipaahtahin thu chu a pom va, a thusoi uh chu a dih leh dihlouh heetna diingin, nichinin Pathian lehkhathu ah a hawl veu uhi.
Hujiahin amahuh laha tamtahin a gingta va; Grik numei zahumte leh pasalte zong tawmtham louin a gingtata uhi.
Hizongleh Thessalonika khua a Judate’n, Paul in Beria khua ah Pathian thu a soita chih a heet tahun, hu ah zong a hung va, mipite ahung subuaita uhi.
Huin kintahin unaute’n Paul chu tui khang lian tana chiah diingin a sawlkhepah va, hizongleh, Silas leh Timothi chu huah a umdenta uhi.
Huleh Paul puitute’n chu Athen khua tanin a pui va; huleh, Silas leh Timothi chu a kintheitawpa a kawma hung diing a thuhaah chu puain a chiahta uhi.
Huleh Paul in Athen khua a amahuh ana ngaah laiin, hu khua chu pathian lima dimin a mu a, a lung a thahta hi.
Hujiahin kikhopna inn ah Judate leh Pathian ngaihsahte a nial veu a, dawl munah zong ana um photmahte chu ni chinin a nial jel hi.

Huin Epikuria mite leh Stoikmite laha mipil kuate aha in zong amah ahung nial va. Huleh, khenkhat in, Hi mi kamta min bang ahiai a soi tup? a chi va. A khen dangte’n, (Jesu thu leh thohkiitna thu a soi jiahin) gam dang pathiante thu soitu ahih tuaah hi, a chi uhi.
Huleh amah chu a pui va, Areopaga ah a tut va, a kawmah, Hi thuhilhna thah na soi hi na hung hesah thei diai?
Silmah bang aha ka bil vah na hung tut ahi; hujiahin, Hi sil umzia ka he ut uhi, a chi uh.
Ajiahchu Athenmi haw zousiah leh a khua va zin umte zong, a kiman kal phot un thuthah taphot soi in aha, a ngaikhe beehin aha a um veu uhi.
Huin Paul chu Mars taang laitah ah a ding a, a soi a, Nanguh Athen khua a mite haw, bangkimah sahkho ngaihsahtah mi na hi uh chih ka he hi.
Ajiahchu ka vaah kawma, na biahte uh ka et leh, maitaam khat, a tunga, heetlouh Pathian a diing, chi a kigial ka mu hi. Hujiahin, he loupi a na biah uh, hu, Amah chu ka hung hilh ahi.
Pathian khovel leh a sunga sil zousiah siamtu chu, vaan leh lei Lalpa ahihjiahin, khut a bawl inn bangah a um ngei sih hi;
Sil tasam bangin mihing khuta natohsah in zong a um ngei sih hi, Amah ngei chu bangkim kawma hinnate, haihna leh sil zousiah petu ahi zaw hi.
Huleh leitung zousiah luahsuaah a um diingin sisan bul munkhat vehin namchin mi a siam a, amahuh diingin hunbite a guat a, a umna gii uh zong a khamsah hi;
Amahun Lalpa a hawl va, amai amai va, a muh teiteina diingun, hizongleh, Ama’n chu eite ahung gamlat chiat sih ngal a;
Ajiahchu Amah ah i hing va, i taang va, i um uh ahi ngal a; nanguh, laphuahsiam kuate aha in zong, Ei zong a haahte i hi ngal va, chi a a soi bangun.
Huchi'n Pathian haahte i hih jiahun, Pathian chu sana pouh, dangka pouh, suang pouh, mihing khutsiam leh suhtuah a kheen milim tobang ahi, chih, i gingta diing uh ahi sih hi.
Huleh Pathian in i heet louh laite uh a kitheihmohbawl a, hizongleh, tuin chu gamchin a mi zousiah kisiih diingin thu a peta hi.
Ni a chiam jiahin, hu ni chiangin a mi guat chu, lei a mite dihtattahin a ngaihtuahsah diing; huchu Pathian in Amah misi lah akipata kaithouin, mi zousiah kawmah a hesahta hi, chi in,
Huleh, amahun misi lah akipata thohkiitna thu a jah tahun, kimkhat in a nuihsan va; huleh a dangin, Hi thu na kawmah ka ngaikhe kiit diing uhi, a chi va.
Huchi'n Paul chu a lahva kipat a pawtta hi.
Hizongleh mi kuate aha a kawmah a belh tinten va, a gingta va; huleh a khenkhat chu Areopagami Dionisia leh numei khat a min Damari leh a kawmva midangte toh ahi uhi.
Hu silte zohin Paul chu Athen khua apat a pawta, Korinth khua ah a chiahta hi.

Huleh, a min Akuila, Judami khat a mu a, hu mi chu Ponta gam a piang ahi a, Klaudia in Judate zousiah Rome khua apat pawt thu a piah jiaha a ji Prisilla toh Italy gam akipat hung tung panphet ahi va; huleh, Paul chu a kawmvah a hung a.
Huleh, a natoh uh kibang ahih jiahin a kawmvah a tunga, a tongkhawmta va, a natoh uh chu puaninn bawl ahihjiahin.
Huleh khawlni chinin kikhopna inn ah thu a suutpih a, Judate leh Grikte chu gingta diingin a zawl veu hi.
Huleh Silas leh Timothi Makedonia a kipat ahung tun un, Paul chu thusoi chauhin a umta a, Jesu chu Khrist ahi chih Judate kawmah a hilhchian veu hi.
Huleh a kalh un a soisia va, Paul in a puan a thing a, a kawmvah, Na moh uh na tungvah kituh heh; kei chu ka siang ahi; tu kalsiah Jentelte kawmah ka chiahta diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh hu apatin a chiah a, mi khat a min Tita Justa a chih uh inn ah a luut a, hu mi'n chu Pathian a bia veu a, a inn zong kikhopna inn toh kizom ahi.
Huleh Krispa, kikhopna inn houtu in a innkuante zousiah toh Lalpa a gingta va; Korinth khua a mi tamtahin zong jain a gingta va, baptisma a tangta uhi.
Huin janin Lalpa’n Paul kawmah manglam bangin, Lau sinla, sip louin thu soi jel in;
Kei na kawmah ka um zing ahi, huleh, suna diingin kuama’n na tungah khut a ha sih diing uhi; hi khua ah mi tampi ka nei ngal a, a chi hi.
Huleh Paul chu huah a lahva Pathian thu hilh in kumkhat leh ha guup a umta hi.
Huleh Gallio, Akaia gamoptu ahih laiin, Judate in kithutuah in Paul a sual va, vaihawmna touphah ma ah a tut va.
Hipa soplaiin, daan kalh zawngin Pathian be diingin mi a heempuuh hi, a chi va.
Huleh Paul in dawng diing a, a kisah laitahin, Gallio in Judate kawmah, Aw nanguh, Judate, hi haw hi sil dihlou thu aha, sil hihsual thu aha beeh hileh, matheilouin ka hung ngaihsah diing a;
Hizongleh thute, minte, nanguh daan thute giap ahihleh vang nangun kingaihtuah zaw un; ajiahchu ke'n zaw huchibang thu ka ngaihtuah ut sih hi, a chi a.
Huleh vaihawmna touphah apatin amah uh a delhmangta a.
Huin Grik mi zousiah in kikhopna inn houtu Sostheni a man va; vaihawmna touphah ma ah a vua va. Huleh, Gallio in hu a silbawlte uh poi a sa sih hi.

Huleh hunungin Paul chu ni sawttah a taam nalai a, huzohin unaute chu kampha in a khen a, hu akipatin Syria gam lamah kuang in a chiahta a, Prisilla leh Akuila toh zong a ton uhi; kichiamna a neih jiahin, Kenkria khua ah Paul in a lu a meet hi.
Huin Ephesa khua a tunga, amahuh hu ah a nuseta a; hizongleh, amah chu kikhopna inn ah a luut a, Judate toh thu a suutkhawmta uhi.
Huleh amahun a kawmva sawtdeuh taam diingin a hou va, amah a ut sih hi.

Hizongleh kampha in a khen a, Jerusalem a ankuang luina um diing ah tel ngei ka tum hi; Pathian in a phal leh na kawmvah ka hung kiit diing hi, chi in. Huleh, Ephesa khua akipatin kuang in a chiahta hi.
Huleh Caesarea khua ah ahung kai a, a chiahtou a, kouhtuamte chibai a buuh a; Antiok khua ah a chiahsuhta hi.
Huleh huah sawttah a um nungin, a chiah kiit a, nungjuite zousiah sukip diingin Galatia gam leh Phrigia gam zousiah a tuansuaah hi.
Huleh Judami khat a min Apollo, Alexandria khua a piang, mipiltah Pathian lehkhathu he deuh mai, Ephesa khua ah a chiah a.
Hu mi chu Lalpa lampi thu jil sa ahi a; Hagaua guntuhtahin Lalpa tanchin pilvaangtah a soi in a hilh jel a, John Baptisma thu chauh a he giap a.
Huleh kikhopna inn ah haangsantahin thu a soipanta a; Prisilla leh Akuila in a thusoi a jah un a inn vah a pui va, a kawmah Pathian lampi thu kichian semin a hilhchianta uhi.

Huleh ama’n Akaia gam a chiah peh a tup phetin, unaute’n a hasot va, amah ana kipaahpihna diingun nungjuite kawmah lehkha a thotta uhi; amah a tun in, Pathian khotuahna jala gingtate nasatahin a panpih hi;
Ajiahchu ama’n vantaang heetin Judate a nialdong a, Pathian lehkhathu zangin Jesu chu Khrist ahi, chih a hesah hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Apollo Korinth khua a, a um kalin Paul chu khosah lam tuansuah zouin Ephesa khua ahung tung a; huleh nungjui kuate aha a mu a,
Ama’n a kawmvah, Na gintaat tuung laiun Hagau Siangthou na tang viai? a chi a. Amahun a kawmah, Hagau Siangthou a um chih zong ka jakha ngei mawngmawng sih uh, a chi va.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, Bang baptisma ah ahiai na tan uh? a chi a. Amahun, John baptisma ah, a chi uh.
Huleh Paul in, John inchu mi kawmah a nunga hung diing Khrist Jesu chu na gintaat diing uh ahi, chi'n, kisiihna baptisma in a baptis veu ahi, a chi hi.
Amahun hi thu a jah tahun, Lalpa Jesu min in baptisma a tangta uhi.
Huleh Paul in a tungvah a khut a ngah tahin, Hagau Siangthou a tungvah ahung tungta a; huleh, haam heetlouh in a haam va, thu a soita uhi.
Huleh a bawnun mi sawm leh nih(vel) ahi uhi.
Huleh Paul chu kikhopna inn ah a luut a, ha thum sung diing haangsantahin thu a soi a, Pathian gam lam thu ah kinialpih in mi a zawlluut jel hi.
Hizongleh khenkhat a chihmoh va, a gingta ut sih va, mipi ma a hu lampi chu a soisiat tahun, amahuh a chiahsan a, nungjuite a puituam a, Tiranna skul ah nichinin a kihoulimpihta hi.
Huleh hichibangin kum nih sung a um a; huchi'n Asia gam a um zousiah Judate leh Grikte in zong Lalpa Jesu thu a zata uhi.
Huleh Pathian in Paul khut in silmah limdang tahtahte a bawlsah a;
Huchi'n a sa tung akipatin kisiaahna puante aha teenthuaahte aha bang damloute kawmah ahung tawi va, a natnate uh a dam jel a, huleh, a sung va kipat dawite zong a pawt jel uhi.
Huin Juda vaah vai, dawithu he kuate aha in, Paul in a thu a tangkoupih veu Jesu minin ka hung vau uhi, chi'n, dawipaaite tungah Lalpa Jesu min a lou veu vial va.
Huleh Judami, siampu lal khat, Skeva in hutobang bawl tapa sagih a nei hi.
Hizongleh dawi in chu a dawng a, Jesu ka he hi, Paul zong ka he hi; hizongleh, nanguh kuate na hi viai? a chi a.
Huin dawipaiin chu amahuh ahung boh a, a zou a, a nuaisiahta a, huchi'n hu inn apatin saguah leh liam in a taidohta uhi.
Huleh hi chu Ephesa khua a teeng zousiah, Judate leh Grikte kawmah zong a thangta a; huleh, a bawnun a lau va, Lalpa Jesu min a lianta hi.
Huleh a gingtate zong tamtah a hung va, a silbawlte uh thupha a tawi va, a kiphuangta uhi.
Mitphialdawi zang mi tampiin zong a lehkhabu uh ahung tawikhawm va, mi zousiah mitmuh in a haalta uh; huleh, a man a suut va, dangka saang sawmngaa a phasah uhi.
Huchi'n loupitah mai in Lalpa thu chu a dalh a, a gualzou jel hi.

Hu silte nungin, Paul in a lungsim in, Makedonia gam leh Akaia gam a totsuaah zoh chianga Jerusalem khua a chiah a tum a, Hutah a ka chiah zoh chiangin, Rome khua zong, ka va pha teitei diing, a chi a.
Huchi'n, amah natohsahte mi nih Timothi leh Erasta chu Makedonia gam ah a sawl a; hizongleh, amah chu Asia gam ah hun tomkhat a um tadih hi.
Huleh hulai velin hu Lampi thu jiahin mi a buai nasatenta hi.
Ajiahchu mi khat a min Demetria, dangka siih kheengtu, dangka siih a Diana lim bawltu in khutsiamte kawmah kilohna tampi a pe jel veu hi.
Hu mi in amahuh a koukhawm a, a natoh banguh tongte toh; huin, a kawmvah, Pute, hi natohna hi i hauhna uh ahi, chih na he uhi.
Hi Ephesa khua chauh ah hilouin, Asia gam pumpi ah zong, hi Paul in, khuta bawlte chu Pathian ahi sih uh, chi'n mi tampi a thuzoh a, a kiheisah zouta hi chih, nanguh ngei in na mu un na ja uhi;

Huchi'n i kiveina uh man louh ahung suah diing lauhuai chauh zong ahi sih; pathiannu loupi Diana biahinn zong ahung kingai neu diing a, huleh Asia gam pumpi leh khovela mi’n a biah uh amahnu ngei zong a loupina suhsiatin ahung umkha diing chih a lauhuai ahi, a chi a.
Huleh hu thute a jah tahun a lungthah mahmah va, Ephesa mite Diana a loupi hi, chi'n a kikou uhi.
Huin a kho-pum in a buai vehta va; Gaia leh Aristarkha, Makedonia gam a mi, Paul in a khualzinna a, a tonpihte geel chu a man va, kituaahtahin etnop inn ah a tailuutpihta uhi.
Huin Paul in mi laha luut a tup leh a nungjuite’n a phal sih va.
Huleh Asia gam a houtu pente laha Paul lawmte khenkhat in a kawmah mi a sawl va, etnop inn a luut hetlou diingin a houhou uhi.
Khenkhat thu khat in a kikou va, khenkhat thudang in a kikou va; kikhawmte chu a buai va; mi tamzaw in a kikhop nasan uh zong a he sih uhi.
Huleh mipi lah apat Alexander a kaidoh va, Judate’n amah chu malam ah a sawn va. Huleh, Alexander in a khut in a jap a, mi zousiah kawmah a siamna thu soi a tum hi.
Hizongleh amah Judami ahi chih a heet tahun, daahkal nih sung diing vel aw kituaahtahin, Ephesa mite Diana a loupi hi, chi'n a kikou kou uhi.
Huleh khosung lehkhagialtuin mipi a daihsah zohin, Nanguh Ephesa khua a mite, Ephesite hi pathiannu Diana loupi leh, Jupiter apat hung kia milim bia ahi uh, chih he lou kua a um ei?
Huchi'n hi thu nial gual ahih louh nungin, na sip khiinkhian diing uh ahi, kin hehuin bangmah na bawl diing uh ahi sih hi.
Ajiahchu, hi na hung mi puite uh hi biahinn luhmi lah ahi sih va, i pathiannu soisete zong ahi sih uh.
Demetria leh a tohpih khutsiam haw in mi kua tung aha a thubuai a neih uleh, thubuai soina inn honsa in a um hi, huleh gamoptute zong a um uhi; kiheeh u’heh.
Hizongleh sil danga buaina nei na hih uleh daan banga kikhopna ah lep diing ahi.
Tunia buaina jiahin i tungvah thu ahung um diing a lauhuai hi, i kikhopna san pen hi ahi chih diing laha um ngal sih a, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n huchia a soi zohin kikhawmte chu a tawpsahta hi.
Huleh buaina a daih nungin, Paul in nungjuite a kawmah a kou a, amahuh a aangkawi a, kampha in a ha a, Makedonia gam a diingin a chiahta hi.
Huleh hu gam vel a totsuaah a, a kawmva hasotna thu tampi a soi zohin, Greece gam a tungta hi.
Huleh huah ha thum a taam a. Huleh, Judate’n amah a guuhtaan jiahin Syria gam lama kuang a a pai diing laiin, Makedonia gam lehtot kiit a tumta hi.
Huleh Beria khua a Sopater, Thessalonika khuate: Aristarkha leh Sakundate, Derbe khua a Gaia leh Timothi; huleh, Asia gam a Tikika leh Trophima in Asia gam dongin a tonpih uhi.
Hite chu ka ma vah ana chiah va, Troas khua ah ahung na ngaah uhi.
Huleh keiuh chu tanghou tolsohlouh nite zohin Philippi khua apat kuang in ka pai va, ni ngaa nungin a kawmvah Troas khua ah ka tungva; hu ah ni sagih ka taam uhi.
Huleh, hapta ni masapenin, nungjuite tanghou balkeeh diing a ahung kikhop laiun, Paul in a jing a chiah a tup jiahin a kawmvah thu a soi a; huleh, jan khang dongin a soizop hi.
Huleh pindan tungnunga a kikhopna vah khawnval tampi a um a.
Huleh a min Eutika kichi tangval khat kotta ah a tou a, tuitahin ana ihmu hi: Paul in thu a soi sawt taatluat jiahin, ana ihmukha a, innsawng thumna apatin a kesuh a, a sisa in a tawm uhi.
Huleh Paul a kumsuh a, a tungah a bohkhum a, a poma, Lauthawng sih un, ajiahchu a hing nalai hi, a chi a.
Huin pindan tungnunga a kaltouh kiit phetin, tanghou a balkeeh a, a ne a, sawttah khovaah dongin a kawmvah thu soi in a houlim a, huchi'n a chiahta hi.
Huleh amahun tangvalpa chu a hing in ahung pui va, lungmuan tahzetin a lungmuangta uhi.
Huleh keiuh chu kuang lamah kana chiah masa va, Assos zuanin kuang in ka chiah va; Paul tuansah diing ka sawm uh; ama'n a keeng a chiah a tup jiahin huchi bangin a chi mawng ahi.
Huleh Assos khua a ahung kituahpih tahin, ka tuangsahta va, Mitilene khua ka tungta uhi.
Huleh hu apatin kuang in ka chiah kiit va, a jingni in Kios zawn ka tungva; huleh a jingni in Samos ka tungva, Trogiliam ah ka taam uh; a jingni in Mileta khua ka tung uhi.
Ajiahchu Paul in Asia gam a um sawt a ut louh jiahin, Ephesa khua kuang a chiah kheel a tupsa him ahi a; ahihtheih leh Jerusalem khua ah Pentikost nia um a tum a, a kin chiah ahi.
Huleh Mileta khua a kipanin Ephesa khua ah mi a sawl a, kouhtuam upate a va kousah a.
Huleh amahuh a kawma ahung tunun, ama’n a kawmvah, Asia gam a ka hung chiil ni masani apat na kawmva ka um sungsiah a ka umdan na he uhi,
Thunuaigolhtah leh Judate’n ahung jebawl jiah va mittui tampi leh, sil hahsa ka tunga hung tungte thuaah kawmin Lalpa nna ka tong hi.
Huleh nanguh phattuamna diing sil bangmah ka iim sih a, ka hung hesah veha, vaantaang lah leh inn chinah ka hung thuhilh veu hi.
Judate leh Grikte kawmah zong, Pathian lama lungsim kisiih thu leh, i Lalpa Jesu Khrist lama ginna thu ka hesah jel hi.
Huleh tuin ngai un, lungsima chiah louthei loua ka kiheet jiahin Jerusalem khua ah chiah diing a kisa ka hi, hu muna ka tunga sil hung tung diingte ka he sih hi;
Hagau Siangthou in, kaanna leh hahsatna in ahung ngaah hi chia, khochina ahung heetsah veute chauh ka he hi.

Hizongleh ka kitaidemna kipaahtaha ka taitung theihna diing leh Lalpa Jesu apat a ka muh Pathian lungsiatna tanchinpha heetsah diing natohna ka toh zoh theihna diingin hi silte khat mahin ahung hihliing sih a, ka hinna zong ittahin ka ngai sih hi.
Huleh tuin ngai un, nanguh zousiah Pathian gam thu soi a ka vaahlehnate’n ka meel na mu nawn sih diing uh, chih ka he hi.
Hujiahin mi zousiah sisanah ka siang ahi chih tuni in ka hung hesah ahi.
Ajiahchu Pathian thuguat zousiah na kawmvah phuandoh louha iim ka nei sih hi.
Hujiahin Pathian kouhtuam, Amah sisana a leite vaah diingin Hagau Siangthou in houtu a ahung siamna pawlte zousiah leh nanguh tungah pilvaang un.
Ajiahchu ka chiah nung chiangin ngei giloute na lahvah ahung luut diing a, pawlte a hawi sih diing uh chih ka he hi;
Nanguh lah ngei ah zong nungjui pawlte amahuh lama kaimang diingin thu tuam soi na hung um diing uhi.
Hujiahin kiveeng un, huleh, kum thum sung zet mittui luang pum a suun leh jana mi chin taihilh ka tawp louhdan he zing un.
Huleh tuin unaute, hung siama hung khang sah thei a, huleh, mi lungsim siangthousate laha goutan pethei Pathian leh, a khotuahna thu kawmah nanguh ka hung kemsah hi.
Kuamah dangka, sana, silh leh teen ka eeng ngei sih hi.
Hi khutte’n keimah leh ka lawite taahsap luang a tongkhe jel chih nanguh ngei in na he uhi.

Bangkim ka bawl taphot na juih diingun ka hung ensah vehta hi, huchibanga tonggim leh Lalpa Jesu thu he zing kawmin mi haatloute na panpih diing uh ahi; Amah ngei in, 'Laah sangin, piah hi vangpiahna sangzaw ahi,' a chih khuh, a chi a.
Huleh huchibang thu a soi zohin a khupdina, a bawnun a haamteikhawm uhi.
Huleh a bawnun hah kahin a kap va, Paul a ngawngkawi va, a tawp va,
A meel a muh nawn louh diing uh thu a soi chu a lungkhampih diah uhi. Huleh kuang mun tanphain ava hata uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, amahuh toh ka kikhen zohun, kuang in ka chiah va, zangjelin Koos ka tungva, huleh, a jing in Rode ka tungva, hu apatin Patara khua ka tung uhi;
Huleh, Phoenicia gam a kai diing kuang khat ka mu va, ka tuang va, ka chiah jel uhi.
Huleh Cyprus gam ka muhun veilampang ah ka peel va, Syria gam lamah ka chiah jel va, huleh Tura khua ah ka kinga uh; hu mun a kuang van suahkhiah diing ahihjiahin.
Huleh nungjuite ka hawldoh va, huah ni sagih ka taam uhi; amahun Hagau hilh in Paul kawmah Jerusalem khua a, a chiah louh diing ahi, chih a soi uh.

Huleh hu ni zaat ka um zohun, ka kipandoh va, ka chiahna diing uh ka zuanta va; huleh, amahun a bawnun, a jite a tate utoh khogei dongin ahung ha va; huin tui khang lian geiah ka khupdin va, ka haamtei uhi.
Huleh mangpha ka kihaah zohun, keiuh kuang ah ka tuang va, amahuh inn lamah a kiih kiitta uhi.
Huleh Tura khua apat kuang a chiah in Ptolemai khua ka tung va, unaute chibai ka buuh va, a kawmvah nikhat ka um uhi.
Huleh a jingni in keiuh Paul lawite teng ka kipandoh va, Caesarea ka tungva; sagihte laha khat, sawlleh Philip innah ka luut va; amah toh ka um uhi (Sil. 6:5).
Huleh hu mipa’n tanu li a nei a, nungaah siangthou ahi va, Pathian thu a soi jel uhi.
Huleh huah ni tampi ka taam laiun, Judia gam a kipan a min Agaba kichi zawlnei khat a hungsuh a.

Huleh amah ka kawmvah ahung a, Paul kawnggaah a la a, a khutte leh a keengte a kikaan a, huleh, Hi kawnggaah neitu hi Jerusalem khua a Judate’n hichi bangin a kaan diing va, Jentelte khutah a pekhe sawn diing uhi, Hagau Siangthou in a chi hi, a chi a.
Huleh hi thu ka jah tahun, keiuh leh hu muna umte’n Paul chu Jerusalem khua a chiah lou diingin ka hou uh.
Huin Paul in, Bang diinga na kah va, ka lung na siatsah uh ahiai? ajiahchu Jerusalem khua a kaan chauh hi louin, Lalpa Jesu min diingin sih zong ka ngaap ahi, chi'n a dawng hi.
Huleh houh zoh gual ahih louh tahin ka tawp va, Lalpa thuthu hiheh, ka chita uhi.
Huleh hu nite nungin ka van uh ka siam va, Jerusalem ah ka chiahtouta uhi.
Caesarea apatin nungjui kuate aha in ahung jui va, amahun a min Mnason, Cyprus a nungjui masa khat tunna a ka neih diingpa uh ahung pui uhi.
Huleh Jerusalem ka hung tun tahun, unaute in kipaahtahin ahung na saang uhi.
Huleh a jingni in, Paul chu kei u’toh Jakob kawmah a luut a; huah kouhtuam upate zousiah a um uhi.
Huleh Paul in amahuh chibai a buuh zohin, a natohna zanga Pathian in Jentelte laha sil a bawlsah zousiah chu a baan in a soi hi.
Huleh amahun hu thu a jah un, Lalpa a paahtawi va; huin Paul kawmah, Unaupa, Judate lahah gingtute saang tamtah na mu a; huleh a bawnun daan tungah phatuam a ngai uhi.
Huleh nang, Jentelte laha Juda umhaw zousiah kawma a tate uh zehtan louh diing leh, daan banga um louh diing, chi'n, Mosi paihkhiahna diing na thu hilh jel chih mi kama kipanin na thu a he uhi.
Bangchi hita diing ahiai le? mipi ahung paikhawm ngei diing uhi; Na hung tung chih lah ja ngei diing ahi va.
Hujiahin na kawma ka soi bangun bawl in; Kichiamna nei pasal li ka nei va;

Hu mite pui inla, amahuh toh kisusiang inla, a sam uh a meetna diing uh sum tuaah in; huchi'n mi zousiah in, mi kama na thu a jah teng uh bangmahlou ahi chih a he diing va, nang chu daan juiin kijentahin na um zaw chih a he diing uhi.

Jentelte laha gingtute tungtaang thu zaw, milim biahna sil neeh lamah, sa sisan neeh lamah, sa heehlup neeh lamah, kingaih lam banga kipanin, a kihepkhiah uh chih louhngal sildang a tang sih uhi, chih ka soi va, ka gialta uhi, a chi va.

Huin Paul in a jingni in mite chu a puia, a kawmvah a kisiangsah a, Pathian biahinn ah a luut a, kisiansahna ni bei hun diing leh, amahuh chiat a diinga a sillat hun diing uh siampu kawmah ava hilh hi.
Huleh ni sagih a chin diing kuan tahin, Asia gam a Judate in Pathian biahinn a Paul a muh tahun, mipi zousiah a chiilsia va, amah a man va,

A kikou va, Israel mite, hung panpih un: hi mipa ahi, gam china mi zousiah kawma, Juda mite, daante, huleh, hi mun soisia chu; hu lou zong Pathian biahinn ah Grikte a luutpih a, hi inn siangthou a hihbuah zouta hi, a chi va.
(Ajiahchu hu ma in khopi ah Ephesa khawmi Trophima, a kawmah a mu va, Paul in amah chu Pathian biahinn ah ahung pui tahin a gingta uhi)
Huin, khopi zousiah a phuta souhsouh va, mihaw chu a taikhawm va; Paul chu a man va, Pathian biahinn a kipan a kaidoh va; kotkhaahte a khaahpah ngal uhi.
Huleh amah thah a tup laitahun, Jerusalem khua a mi zousiah a buai uh chih thu, sepaih houtu lianpen kawm a tung a.
Ama’n sepaihte leh sepaih zahoutute a puipah ngal a, a kawmvah a taisuh a; huin, amahun houtu lianpen leh sepaihte a muh tahun, Paul a vuaah uh chu a tawpta uhi.
Huin houtu lianpenin ahung naih a, Paul a tu a, khainiang nih a khih diing thu a pia a; huleh, kua hi aha, bang hihsia aha, chih a dong hi.
Huleh mipi lahah a khen thukhat in a kikou va, a khen thudang in a kikou uhi; huleh, buai jiahin a dan a he sih a, kulh a puiluut thu a pia hi.
Huleh Paul kalbi a tun laiin, mipi'n a hoh nasat jiahun sepaihte’n amah a domkaang uhi.
Mipi zousiah in, Sumangthai un, chi a kikou in a jui lutlut ngal va.
Huleh, Paul chu kulh a, a puiluut diing kuan un, ama’n sepaih houtu lianpen kawmah, Na kawmah thu themkhat ka soi thei diai? a chi a; huleh, ama’n, Grik haam na he maw?
Tuma a mite buaina bawla mithatte saangli gamdai a puikhetu, Aiguptami hilou na hi maw? a chi a.
Hizongleh Paul in, Judami, Silisia gam a Tarsa khua a mi ka hi, kho namei a um hilou ka hi; hung lungsiat inla, mi zousiah kawmah thu hung soisah in, a chi a.
Huleh, lem a sah tahin, Paul chu kalbi ah a ding a, mipi lam a khut in a jap a. Huleh, a sipduam tahun, a kawmvah Hebrai haam in thu a soi hi.
Mite, unaute leh pate haw, tuin na kawmvah ka siamna thu ka soi diing hi, ngai un, a chi a.
(Huleh a kawmva Hebrai haam a thu a soi a jah tahun, a sipta sem va; huin ama’n,)

Kei chu Judami ka hi a, Silisia gam a Tarsa khua a piang ka hi, hizongleh, hi khua ah Gamaliel keengbula khang liana i pulepate uh daan khauhtah dungjuia zildoh a, tunia nanguh haw banga Pathian lama phatuamngai ka na hi hi.
Huleh hi lampi a mite hi sihna khopin ka sawi jel a, huleh numei pasal in ka kaan a suangkul ah ka khum jel hi.

Siampu lal leh upate zousiah inzong hu thu chu ahung heetpih uhi; amahuh kawm apat unaute piah diingin lehkha ka mu a, Damaska khua a um photmahte sawi diingin, Jerusalem a kaansa a pui diingin ka chiah hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hita a, ka chiah a, Damaska khogei ka tunin, suunkim vel tahin, thakhat in vaan akipat vaah nasatah ka kiimah ahung vaahpum a.
Huleh kei chu tualah ka puuh a, huleh, aw khat in, Saul, Saul, nang bang diinga hung sawi? chi in ka ja hi.
Huleh Ken, Lalpa, kua na hiai? chi'n ka dawng a. Huleh, Ama’n ka kawmah, Nazareth Jesu, na suhduhdah chu ka hi, a chi a.
Huleh ka kawma umte’n vaah chu a mu va, a lau uh; hizongleh, ka kawma thusoitu aw chu a ja sih uhi.
Huleh ke'n, Bang ka bawl diai Lalpa? ka chi a. Huleh, Lalpa’n ka kawmah, Thou inla Damaska khosung ah luut in, hutah ah sil zousiah na bawl diingte ahung kihilh diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh hu vaah loupi jiahin khua ka mu thei nawnta sih a, ka lawite’n khut in ahung kai va, Damaska khua ah ka luutta hi.
Huleh mi khat Anania, daan thu banga Pathian ngaihsah leh hua um Juda zousiah laha a soiphat uh.
Ka kawmah ahung a, ka bula dingin, Unau Saul, khua muta in, ahung chi a. Huleh, huchih laitahin amah chu ka muta hi.
Huleh ama’n, I pulepate uh Pathian in a deihlam he diing leh, Midihtat chu mu a, a kama suaah aw ja diing a hung guat ahita hi.
Ajiahchu na muh leh na jah thu ah mi zousiah kawmah Amah thu heetpihtu na hi diing hi.
Huleh bang diinga khongai nalai na hiai? thou inla, baptisma tangin, Lalpa minin haamtei inla, na sualna kisusiang in, ahung chi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jerusalem khua a ka chiah kiit nungin, Pathian biahinn a ka haamtei laiin, jelhin ka um a;
Kin inla Jerusalem khua apat pawt in; ajiahchu ka tanchin na soi diing pom lou diing ahi uh, hung chi'n Amah chu ka mu a.
Huleh keima'n, Lalpa, amahun Nang hung gingtate suangkul a ka khum a, kikhopna inn china ka vuaah veu a he uhi.
Huleh Na thu hetu Stephen sisan a suah laiun, kei zong a kawmah ka ding a, lem ka na sa a, a hihlumte puante zong ka na kem ahi, ka chi a.
Huleh Ama'n ka kawmah, Chiah in, hi apatin gamlataha Jentelte kawmah ka hung sawl diing ahi, ahung chita a, a chi a.
Huleh amahun hi tan chiang a ngaikhia va, huin aw ngaihtahin, Hitobang phet mi hi khovela kipatin suchimit un; hing taah ahi sih hi, a chita uh.
Huleh a kikou va, a puante uh a sepkhia va, vaan lamah, leivui a theh uhi,
Sepaih houtu lianpenin Paul chu kulh sunga puiluut diing thu a pia a, a tunga hutobang lawma a kikouna san uh a heetna diingin jep a dohchian diing, a chi hi.
Hizongleh savun khau a, a kaan zohun, Paul in a kawma ding sepaih zahoutu kawmah, Romemi mawngmawng siamlouh tansahna bei a vuaahna diing thu na nei viai mah? a chi a.
Sepaih zahoutu in hu a jah tahin, sepaih houtu lianpen kawmah a chiah a, Na silbawl diing pilvaang in; hi pa Romemi ahi, chi'n a hilh a.
Huin sepaih houtu lianpen a hung a, a kawmah, Romemi na hi maw? hung hilh in, a chi a. Ama’n, Hi e, a chi a.
Huleh sepaih houtu lianpenin, Hi khomi hihna ke'n sum tampi a ka lei ahi, chi'n a dawng a. Huleh, Paul in, Kei chu Romemi a piang mawng ka hi, a chi hi.
Huin dotchian tumte’n amah a chiahsanpah va; huleh sepaih houtu lianpenin zong Romemi ahi chih a heet tahin, amah mah in a kaansah ahih jiahin a lauta hi.

A jingni’n, Judate in bang jiahin aha Paul a heeh uh chih heetchian a tup jiahin, sepaih houtu lianpenin amah a phel a, siampu lalte leh vaihawmtute zousiah kikhawm diingin thu a pia a, Paul ahung pui va, a ma vah a dingsahta hi.
Huleh Paul in vaihawmtute a en piinpen a, Mite leh unaute, tuni tanin Pathian mitmuha hoiha ka heet photmah bawl in ka um zing hi, a chi a.
Huleh siampu lal Anania in, Paul kawma dingte a kam behsah diingin a sawl a.
Huin Paul in a kawmah, Nang, baang kinuhvaampa, Pathian in nang ahung beeng zaw diing hi; nang daan banga ka thu ngaihtuah diingin na toua, daanlou banga kei beh diingin na hung chi maw? a chi a.
Huleh a kawma dingte’n, Nang Pathian siampulal huchi bawl siat maw? a chi va.
Huin Paul in, Unaute, siampulal ahih ka he sih a ahi; Na chipihte houtu tungah thu hoihlou soi sin, chih gelh ahi, a chi a.

Hizongleh Paul in a keehkhat Sadukaite ahih va, a dang Pharisaite ahih uh a heet tahin, vaihawmtute lahah a kikoua, Mite leh unaute, kei chu Pharisai tapa, Pharisai ka hi; kinepna leh misi thohkiitna thu ah vaihawmsaha um ka hi, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n hichi a, a soi zohin, Pharisaite leh Sadukaite kal ah kinialna ahung um a; huleh, mipi chu a kilangkhenta uhi.
Ajiahchu Sadukaite’n misi thohkiitna mawngmawng a um sih, angelte zong a um sih, hagau zong a um sih, a chi va; hizongleh, Pharisaite’n hutegel a um tuaah hi chih a gum uhi.

Huleh nasatahin a buaita va, Pharisai mi, lehkhagialtute khenkhat a ding va, a nial uh, Hi mi ah giitlouhna bangmah i mu sih uh; hagau in aha, angel in aha a kawmah thu soi ahih taah leh, Pathian i dou sih diing uh, a chi va.

Huleh ahung kinial naah deuhdeuh phetun, sepaih houtu lianpenin Paul chu a loihtel uh a lau a, sepaihte chu va chiahsuh a, a lahva kipata Paul va pummat a, kulha hung puitou ngei diingin thu a pia hi.
Huleh a janin Lalpa chu Paul kawmah a ding a, Paul, hamuangtahin um in; Jerusalem khua a ka thu na heetsah bangin Rome khua ah zong na hesah diing hi, a chi hi.
Huleh khua ahung vaah tahin Judate hunkhop a kithukum va, Paul a thah masiah va bangmah ne leh dawn lou diingin a kichiamta uhi.
Huleh, mi thah sawma kithukumte chu sawmli sanga tamzaw ahi uhi.
Huleh amahuh chu siampulalte leh upate kawmah a chiah va, Paul ka thah masiah va bangmah nelou diingin nasatahin ka kichiam uhi.

Hujiahin nangun vaihawmtute toh a thu kichian sema ngaihtuah diing kipangin na kawmva puikhe diingin, sepaih houtu lianpen kawmah va soi un; huleh, ama’n na kawm uh ahung phaah ma a ana that diing a mansa ka hi uhi, a chi uhi.
Huleh Paul sanggamnu tapa in, a guuhtaan thu uh ana ja a, kulh ah ava luut a, Paul ava hilhta hi.
Huin Paul in, sepaih zahoutu khat a kawmah a kou a, Hi tangval sepaih houtu lianpen kawmah puiin; a kawmah soi ut a nei hi, a chi a.
Huchi'n ama’n sepaih houtu lianpen kawmah a pui a, Paul mitaangpa’n a kawmah ahung kou a, Hi tangval in na kawma soi ut bang aha a neih jiahin na kawma hung pui diingin ahung sawl hi, a chi a.
Huin sepaih houtu lianpenin a khut in a tu a, a tuam in a puidoh a, Ka kawma na soi ut bang ahiai? chi'n a guuh in a dong a.
Huleh ama’n, Paul thu kichian sema ngaihtuah tum bangin, jing chianga vaihawmtute kawma puisuh diingin Judate’n na kawma hung nget lem a sata uhi.

Hizongleh a thu uh na zop sin; ajiahchu a lahva mi sawmli sanga tamzaw in a guuhtaan va, hu mite in amah a thah masiah va bangmah ne lou diing leh dawn lou diingin a kichiam uhi; huleh, tuin na thu ngaah in mansa in a um uhi, a chi a.
Huchi'n sepaih houtu lianpenin tangval chu a chiahsah a, Hi thu na hung hesahta chih kuamah hilh sin, chi'n thu a pia hi.
Huleh sepaih zahoutu nih a kou a, Jan khang hun chiang a Caesarea tana chiah diingin sepaih za nih toh, sakol tungtuang mi sawmsagih toh, teitawi mi za nih toh kimansa in koih un, a chi a.
Huleh gamoptu Felix kawma bittaha a luut theihna diingin Paul tuanna diing sakol zong guatsah un, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n hichibangin lehkhathot a gial hi;
Klaudia Lisia in gamoptu hoihpen, Felix chibai a buuh hi.
Hi mi Judate in a mat va a thah diing kuanun; Kei sepaihte toh ka va chiah a, amah hi Romemi ahih ka he a ka hundohta hi.
Huleh a heehna pen uh heet ka ut a, a vaihawmtute uh kawmah ka pui a;
Amah chu, a daan thu uh bang aha a kiheeh ahi chih ka he a, hizongleh, a heehna thu vah sihna leh kaanna diing khop bangmah a um sih hi.
Huleh Judate’n amah a taang uh chih mi'n ahung hilh tahin, na kawmah amah ka hung sawl phot ahi, huleh, amah heehte’n a tunga thubuai a neih phot uh na ma a soi diingin thu ka pia hi. Mangpha, chi'n.
Huchi'n sepaihte’n a thupiah bangin Paul chu janin a pui va Antipatris a tunpih va.
