A jingni in sakol tungtuang mite amah toh a kitonsah va, amahuh kulh ah ahung kiihta uhi.
Amahuh Caesarea a tungva, gamoptu kawmah lehkhathot chu a pia va, Paul zong a ma ah a dingsah uhi.
Huleh gamoptu in lehkhathot a sim zohin, Paul umna gam a dong a. Huleh, Silisia gam ahi chih a heet tahin;
Nang hung heehte ahung tun chiangun, na thu ka ngaikhe diing, a chi a. Huleh, Herod vaihawmna inn sunga koih diingin thu a pia hi.
Huleh ni ngaa nungin siampulal Anania toh, upate leh a min Tertulla thusoi siam toh a hungsuh va, Paul tunga thubuai chu gamoptu kawmah a soi uh.
Huleh Paul a kouhdoh tahun, Tertulla in amah a heehpanta a, Felix zahumpen, Nangmah vangin lungmuangtahin ka um va, huleh, na kepna jiaha hi namte a diinga giitlouhna khap hoih a, a um jiahin,
Bang chihtanin khoimun pouhah lungkimtahin ka kipaah zing uhi.
Ahihvangin, nang diing a chimtahhuai talua hih ka ut sih, na migiitna a ka thu uh themkhat hung ngaihkhiahsah diingin ka hung ngen ahi.
Ajiahchu, kei un hi mi huathuaitah, khovel a Judate zousiah tohbuaitu leh Nazareth mite pawla a makaipen uh khat ahih ka he uhi;
Pathian biahinn suhbuah zong a tum a; amah chu man ung a, ka daan bang va vaihawmsah ka tup uh ahi;
Hizongleh, sepaih houtu lianpen Lisia ka kawmvah ahung kuana, huleh, ka khut va kipatin ngongtattahin a lamangta hi,
A tunga thubuai neite na kawma hung diing thu pia in; nang ngei in amah dongchian in, ka heehna thute uh na he thei diing hi, a chi a.
Huleh Judate’n zong hu thu chu huchibang ahi chi'n a panpih uhi.
Huin gam-optu’n thusoi diing a khut a, a jap tahin, Paul in, Nang chu kum tamtah hi namte vaihawmsahtu na hih ka heet jiahin kipaahtahin ka dihna thu ka soi diing hi.
Jerusalem a Pathian be diing a ka chiahtouh nung ni sawmlehnih val ahi nai sih diing chih na he thei diing.
Huleh, Pathian biahinn a mi toh ka kinial aha, ahihlouhleh kikhopna inn leh khosunga mipi ka chiilsiatna bangmah a mu sih uhi;
Huin zong ahung heehnate uh kichiantahin a bul a suikhe thei sih uhi.
Hizongleh, hi thu chu na kawmah ka soidoh hi, amahun biahdan tuam a chih uh lam juiin ka pulepate uh Pathian ka bia a, daan leh zawlneite lehkhabu a kigial zousiah gingta in;
Huleh, mi dihtatte leh dihtatloute thohkiitna a um diing chi a amahun zong a gintaat uh, huchu ke’n Pathian lamah ka kineppih ahi.
Hujiahin, Pathian lam leh mihing lama a sia a pha heetkhenna nei a, suhkhial beia um diingin bangchihtanin ka kihahbawl hi.
Tuin, kum tampi nungin ka namte uh kawma silpiah diing leh ganthah diing hung kengin ka hung a.
Hu sil ka piah laiin, Asia gam a hung kipan Judami kuate aha in, mipi tellou leh buai louin Pathian biahinn a ka kihihsiang thou chu ahung mu uhi.
Hutein ka tunga thubuai nei hileh uh hi ah na ma ah um in ahung heeh diing uhi.
Ahihlouhleh, hi mite ngei in vaihawmtute ma a ka din laiin, ka suhkhelh muh a neih uleh, soi u’heh.
Hi thu kam khat jiah houh ahih ngal louhleh a lahva ding a, Misi thohkiitna thu ah tuni’n na ma vah salh in ka um ahi, ka chih khuh, chi'n a dawng hi.
Huleh Felix in hi thute a jahin hu lam thu chu a hechian deuh a, amahah kawmah, Sepaih houtu lianpen Lisia ahung tunsuh chiangin na thu uh ka ngaihtuah veh diing chi'n a khongaisah phot hi.
Huleh ama’n Paul chu veenga, thuthawl deuh a umsah a, huleh a lawite’n a nna a tohsah uh khap lou diingin sepaih zahoutu khat kawmah thu a pia hi.
Huleh ni bangzah aha nungin, Felix chu a ji Juda numei Drusilla toh a hung va, Paul a kousah a, Khrist a ginna thu a ngaikhia hi.
Huleh Paul in dihtatna thute, kideehna thute leh, vaihawmna hung tung diingte a soi leh, Felix chu lauin a kithing a, Tuin chiah kiit photin; hun lem ka neih tahchiangin ka hung kou diing, a chi a.
Huleh a hahkhiahna diing a Paul in sum a piah bang a kinem a; a kousah mun sim a, a houpih thimthem hi.
Hizongleh kum nih nungin Porsia Festa in Felix ahung hengta a; huleh, Felix in Judate kipaahsah a ut a, Paul chu kaansa in a nuseta hi.
Huchi'n Festa in gam chu a opta a, Caesarea apatin Jerusalem ah a chiahtou a.
Huin, siampulal leh Juda lamkaite’n a kawmah, Paul tungthu ahiloulam in a hesah va,
Huleh, lampi a ana guuhtaan va, ana thah theihna diingun a kawmah Paul chu Jerusalem a va puitousah diingin a ngen uhi.
Hizongleh, Festa in, Paul chu Caesarea ah kep diing ahi, kei zong hu lamah ka chiahpah diing.
Huchi'n, hu mi in giitlouhna nei ahihleh, na lahva thu neithei photmah in hung juisuh u’henla heeh u’heh, chi'n a dawng hi.
Huleh a lahva ni sawm val a taam nungin Caesarea ah a chiahsuh a; huleh, a jingin vaihawmna touphah ah a tou a, Paul chu hung pui diingin thu a pia hi.
Huleh amah ahung tunin, Jerusalem akipan hungsuh Judate chu a kiimah a ding va, a tungah thubuai tampi soi in, setahin a heeh va a thu dihtah chu a ensah thei tuan sih uhi.
Paul in a dihna thu a soi a, Judate daan thu ah hiin, Pathian biahinn thu hitaleh, huleh Kaisar tungah hitaleh sil mawngmawng ka hihkhial sih hi, a chi a.
Hizongleh Festa in Judate deihzawng bawl a ut a, Paul kawmah, Jerusalem a chiahtouh a hutaha ka ma a hi thute ngaihtuah hileh na ut ei? a chi a, a dong hi.
Huin Paul in Kaisar vaihawmna touphah ma ah vaihawmsaha um diingin ka ding hi; Judate tungah bangmah ka hihkhial sih hi, nang chiantaha na heet ahi.

Migilou ka hih a, sihna khopa sil hihkhial ka hih leh, sih zong ka nial sih; hizongleh, hite'n ahung heehna teng uh a dihtah a um louh leh, kuama’n a kawmvah ahung pekhe thei sih diing uh Kaisar kawmah ka tut diing, a chi a.
Huin Festa in vaihawmtute a houpih kiimvel zohin, Kaisar kawmah tut na tum maw? Kaisar kawmah na tung ngei diing hi, chi'n a dawng hi.
Huleh, ni bangzah aha nungin, kumpipa Agrippa leh Bernisi chu Caesarea ah Festa chibai buuh diingin a hung va.
Huleh amahuh hua ni tampi a taam nungun, Festa in Paul tungthu kumpipa kawmah a soi a, Felix in mitaang khat a nusia a;
Jerusalem a ka um laiin siampu lalte leh Juda upate’n a thu ahung hesah va, siamlouh tangsah diingin ahung ngen uh.
Ke’n a kawmvah, A heehpa uleh a heehte a kimaituah va, a heehna thu va ama’n a dihna thu soina lemtaang a neih ma in, mi kuamah gawt diing a piahkhiah Romemite daan ahi sih hi, chi'n ka dawng hi.
Hujiahin amahuh hitah ahung tunun, sawt hal louin a jingni in vaihawmna touphah ah ka tou a, Hi mi chu hung pui diingin thu ka pia hi.
Huleh a heehtute a din laiun, ka gintaat bangtahin a tungah giitlouhna thubuai bangmah laha soi sih va;
Hizongleh amahuh biahdante leh, mi khat, Jesu, a sisa, Paul in a hing kiit chia a soi, thu ah kinialna nei ahi zaw uhi.
Huleh ke'n hutobang kinialnate khendan ka heet louh jiahin Jerusalem a chiah a, hutaha hu thu khen a ut leh ut louh ka dong hi.
Hizongleh Paul in Augustus khen diing a siit a nget zawh jiahin Kaisar kawma ka sawl theih masiah veeng diingin thu ka pia hi, a chi a.
Huin Agrippa in Festa kawmah, Ke’n zong hu pa thusoi ka ngaikhe diing, a chi a. Ama’n, Jing chiangin a thusoi na ngaikhe diing, a chi hi.
Huleh a jingni in, Agrippa leh Bernisi chu loupitahin a hung va, sepaih houtu liante leh khua a miliante toh thu soina inn ah ahung luut va, Festa thuin Paul chu ahung pui uh.

Huin Festa in, kumpipa Agrippa leh hi muna ka kawmva um zousiahte’n hi pa na mu uhi, amah chu Judate mipi zousiah in Jerusalem ah leh hitah munah ka kawmah a heeh va, hing taah ahi sih chi'n a kikou uhi.
Hizongleh sihna diing khophial bangmah a bawl sih chih ka he a, huleh, ama’n Augustus kawma a thu tut a tup jiahin sawl ka guat ahita.

Hizongleh a thugin a bangmah ka lalpa kawma gelh diing lah ka thei sih a. Hujiahin na ma vah ka hung puikhia ahi, kumpipa Agrippa Aw, nang ma a hung pui ka hi deuh hi, ajiahchu, a thu dotvel nunga gelh diing nengkhat beeh ka muh theihna diingin.
Mitaang khat lalpen kawm a sawl a, a tunga a heehna thu uh heetkhawmsah louh ngolhuai hiin ka he ngal a, a chi hi.
Huin Agrippa in Paul kawmah, Na dihna thu na soi thei hi, a chi a. Huin Paul in a khut a jah a, a dihna thu a soi a;
Kumpipa Agrippa, Judate’n ahung heehna zousiah ah ka dihna thu tuni a na ma a ka soi diing jiahin kipaahin ka kihe hi.
Ajiahpen chu Judate laha daan thubuai zousiah thua na pil mahmah ka heet jiahin ahi; hujiahin hoihtaha na hung ngaihkhiahsah ka hung ngen hi.
Ka naupan laia kipan, a masapena ka chipihte lahah leh Jerusalem khua a ka umdan Judate zousiah in a he uhi;
A chiil apatin ka tanchin a he uhi, ka sahkho daan va a khauhpen dungjuia Pharisai ana hi ka hi, chih a ut uleh ahung soipih thei uhi.
Huleh, tuin ka pulepate uh kawma Pathian thuchiam chu kineppihna jiahin hitah ah vaihawmsah in ka ding ahi.
Hu thuchiam chu, ka nam uh sawmlenih in suun leh jana Pathian na phatuamngaitaha tongin, muh a kinem uhi. Kumpipa Agrippa, hu kinepna jiahin Judate in ahung heeh uh ahi.
Pathian in misite a kaithou chih bang diinga gintaathuai loua ngai na hi viai?
Ke’n zong Nazareth Jesu min kalh zawngin sil tampi bawl leng hoih diingin kana gingta veu a.
Hu bang chu Jerusalem khua ah zong ka bawl veu hi; huleh siampulalte kawm apat thu ka mu a, misiangthoute laha mi tampi suangkul ah ka khum a; huleh, amahuh a thah laiun lemsa lamah kana pang jel hi.
Huleh kikhopna inn chinah amahuh ka gawt zing a, Jesu min soisiatsah ka tum hi; huleh, a tungvah ka gilou mahmah a, khodangte tanphain ka gawt veu hi.
Hutobang bawl diingin, siampulalte thu muin leh a sawlna lehkha uh tawiin, Damaska khua ah ka chiah a,
Aw kumpipa, suun laitahin, vaan akipan vaah, ni sanga vaahzaw kei leh ka tonpihte kiimah vaah in ka mu a.
Huleh ka bawnun tualah ka puuh va, Hebrai ha min, Saul, Saul, nang bang diinga hung suduhdah? vuaahna siihzum peeh nang diingin a hahsa hi, chi'n aw khat ka ja hi.
Huleh ke’n, Lalpa, kua na hiai? ka chi a. Huin, Ama’n, Na suhduhdah Jesu ka hi,
Hizongleh thou inla na keeng in ding in; hi na sil muhte leh na kawma ka hung kilaahna diingte toh, hu nna tong diing leh, theihpih diing a nang hung bawl diingin na kawmah ka hung kilaah ahi ngal a.
Judate leh tua ka hung sawlna Jentelte khut a kipan ka hung hundoh diing.

A mit uh suvaah diing leh mial apat vaahlam ngatsah diingin, huleh, Setan thuneihna apat Pathian lama a kihei theihna diing uleh sual ngaihdamna a muhna diingun, huleh kei ahung gintaat jiah va kisusiangte laha gou a luah theihna diingun.
Hujiahin, Aw kumpipa Agrippa, vaanlam kilaahna thu chu ka nial sih hi;

Hizongleh a masa in Damaska khua a mite kawmah, huin Jerusalem khua a mite kawmah, huin Juda gam pumpi a mite kawmah leh Jentelte kawmah zong, a kisiih va Pathian kawm a zot va, kisiihna toh kiphu, nna a tohna diingun, ka hesahta ahi.
Hite jiahin Judate’n Pathian biahinn ah ahung man va, thah ahung tum uh ahi.
Pathian akipan panpihna ka muh jiahin, tuni tanin mi neute leh mi liante kawmah thu hesah in ka um nalai hi, zawlneite leh Mosi in hung tung diing a chih uh thu chauh loungal thu dang soi louin.
Khrist in gim a thuaah diing a, huleh misite laha thou kiit masapen ahi diing a, huleh Judate leh Jentelte kawmah vaah a musah diing, a chih thu uh, a chi a.
Huleh huchia a dihna thu a soi laiin. Festa in aw ngaihtahin, Paul, a ngol hite, na lehkha siam sangin hung sungol ahi, a chi a.
Hizongleh, ama’n, Milianpen Festa, angol ka hi sih hi; thu dihtah leh pilna thu ka soi ahi zaw hi.
Hi thute kumpipa in a he hi, hujiahin a kawmah zong lau loua ka soi ahi; hi silte bangmah a kawmah iim ahi sih chih ka he hi; hi silte ningkawm khata kibawl ahih louh jiahin.
Kumpipa Agrippa, zawlneite thu na gingta ei? Na gingta chih ka he hi, a chi a.
Huin Agrippa in Paul kawmah, Thu themkhat a heema Khristian a hung bawl tum na hi, a chi a.
Huleh Paul in, Thu themkhat hiin thu tampiin hitaleh, nang chauh hilouin tuni a ka thu ja zousiah keimah banga um diingin Pathian kawmah ka ngen hi, hi kolte ahihleh but louin, a chi a.
Huleh Paul in huchia a soi zohin, kumpipa toh, gamoptu leh Bernisi toh, huleh a kawmva pute toh a ding chiat va;
Huin a chiahkhe tuam va, a kihou va, Hi mi in sihna leh kolbuhna khophial sil bangmah a bawl sih hi, a chi va.
Huin Agrippa in Festa kawmah, Hipa in Kaisar kawmah a thu tut sawmlou hi leh hahkhiah theih mai diing hive’n, a chi hi.
Huleh Italy gam a kuang a ka chiah diing uh thu suhpuuh ahih phetin, Paul leh mitaang dang kuate aha chu Augusta pawla mi sepaih zahoutu a min Julia kichi a kemsah va.
Huleh, Asia gam tuipi geia khua umte tawn diing Adramitim kuang ah ka tuang va, ka kitawlta uhi; Thessalonika khua a um Makedonia gammi, Aristarkha ka tonpih uhi.
A jingni in Sidon ka tung uhi, Huleh, Julia in Paul a hoih bawl a, kisuhalh diingin a lawite kawmah a chiahsah hi.
Hu apatin kuang in ka chiah kiit va, huih a lehnun jiahin Cyprus gam liah lamah ka kitawl uhi.
Huleh Silisia gam leh Pamphilia gamzuul tuilianpi ka khen nungun, Lisia gam a Mira khopi ka tungva.
Hu ah sepaih zahoutu in Italy gam zu an diing Alexandria kuang a mu a; hu ah ahung tuangsah hi.
Huleh awl-awl in ni tampi ka kitawl va, hahsatahin Knida zawn ka gei haamhaam va, huihin ahung n an jiahin Salmoni zuanin Krit gam liah ah ka kitawl uhi;
Huleh, hahsataha paisuaahin, Kuangkhawlna kilawm a chih mun uh ka tungta va; hu kawmah La sia khua a um hi.
Huin ni tampi a bei taah jiah leh, kuang a pai a lauhuai jiahin, an ngawlni a beita ngal a, Paul in amahuh a thuhilh a,
A kawmvah, Pute, tua kuang a paina ah siatna leh manna nasatah tung diing ahi chih ka he a, thuampua leh kuang tung chauh ah hilouin, i hinna uh nasanin lauhuai ahi, a chi a.
Ahihvangin sepaih zahoutu in Paul soi sangin kuang pu leh kuang neitu thu a gingta zaw hi.

Huleh phalbi huna umna diing a kuang khawlna mun a kizen louh jiahin a tamzaw in, hu a kipana kitawldoh a, Phoenicia tun teitei a, hutaha phalbi sung um a sawmta va; Phoenicia chu Krit gam a kuang khawlmun khat ahi a, sim tumlam leh maal tumlam ngat tuaah ahi.
Huleh simlam huih awl-awl a ahung nun tahin, a deihzawng uh mu kisain kuang chu a suut va, Krit gam ning zuulzuul ah a kitawl uhi.
Hizongleh tomkhat zohin hu apatin Euroklidon a chih uh huihpi haattah ahung nungsuhta hi.
Huleh, kuang ahung phukhata a, huih lam a nawt theih taah louh jiahin ka mawh hahta va, ahung laam lehlehta hi.
Huleh, Klauda a chih uh tuikual gam khat zuul ah ka tai va, hahsatahin kuang neu chu ka bitsah thei hamham uhi.

A kaihdoh zohun a panpihna khaute a zang va, kuang nuai lamah a vial va; huin azawleh sehneel lahah kileengluutkha inteh chih lauin, puanjahna bangkim a puuhsah va, huchi'n ahung mawh toh lehlehta hi.
Huleh tuikinawh in ahung vawh na sat jiahin, a jingni in kuang a thuampuate tui ah a paikhia uh;
Huleh a ni thumni in ka khut ngei un kuang van ka paikhia uhi.
Huleh ni tampi, ni leh aahsi a kilang sih a, huleh huihpi nameiin ahung nuai sih a, hin diing mawngmawng ka kinem nawnta sih uhi.
Hizongleh sawttah an ne loua a um nungin, Paul a lahvah a ding a, Pute, Krit tuikual a ka thu man a, kuang suut louh a, hibang siatna leh manna tuaah louh diing hijen a.
Huleh tuin lungmuangtaha um diingin ka hung hasot ahi; ajiahchu na lahva kuamahin hinna a taan sih diing uh, kuang chu se diing ahi.
Ajiahchu Amah a ka hih a, a na zong ka toh Pathian angel tujanin ka kawmah ahung tung a,
Lau sin Paul; Kaisar ma ah na ding ngei diing ahi; huleh, ngai in, kuang a na tuanpihte zousiah zong Pathian in ahung piah na hita, ahung chi hi.
Hujiahin pute, lungmuangtahin um un; Pathian ka gingta a, ahung hilh bangin a um diing hi.
Hizongleh tuikual gam khat ah ahung sepdoh ngei diing hi, a chi a.
Hizongleh Adria tui khang lian a huihin a dung a vaai a ahung muutleeng uh a jan sawmleli jan in, jankim lai diingin kuang mite in gam khat tung diing bangin a kiheta va;
Huleh tui thuuhdan a teh va, laam sawmnih hiin a he va, huleh, themkhat kitawl gamla deuhin a teh kiit va, laam sawmlehngaa hiin a he uh.
Huin suang lahah leengluutkha inteh chih a lau va, kuang meilam ah siihka li a khia va, khovaah a ngaahta uhi.
Huleh kuang mite in chu kuang malama siihkate khia kipangin, kuang neu chu tui khang lian ah a khaikhia va, kuang chu taihsan a tum uhi.
Paul in sepaih zahoutu leh sepaihte kawmah, Hite kuang a a um zing louh uleh na bit sih diing uh, a chi a.
Huin, sepaihte in kuang neu khaute a saattan va a hahta uhi.
Huleh, khovaah kuanin, Paul in a bawnun an ne diingin a sawl a, Tuni, an ngawl a na ngaah va, bangmah ne loua na umna uh ni sawmleli ni ahita.
Hujiahin an ne diingin ka hung sawl ahi; hi chu na damna diing uh ahi; na lahva kuamah a samzang khat zong a mang sih diing, a chi a.
Huleh hu thu a soizohin, tanghou a la a, a ma vah Pathian kawmah kipaahthu a soi a; huleh, a balkeeh zohin a nepanta hi.
Huin amahuh zousiah lungmuangtahin a um va, huleh, an zong a neta uhi.
Huleh kuang sunga um mi chu ka bawnun za nih leh sawmsagih leh guup ka hi uhi.
Huleh an a neeh kham zohun, buh chu tui lahah a paai va, kuang a suzaangta uhi.
Huleh kho vaah phetin a gam chin a heta sih va; hizongleh, kuang khawlna piautaah nei khat a mu va huah chu ahihtheih leh kuang tawlluut a tum uhi.
Huleh siihka haw chu a hahkhia va, tui khang lian ah a nusia va, kuangkhe kaanna a phel uh a, huleh, kuang puanjah chu huih seh zawngin a kaitou va, piau taah a zuanta uhi.
Huleh tuilianpi nih kisuhtuahna mun ah ka luutkha va, kuang chu lei a susahta uh; huin kuang malam chu a kiphutdetta a, hihliing zoh louhin a um a, a meilam chu tuikinawh a haat jiahin a keehta hi.
Huleh sepaihte in mitaangte chu tui liau gaalkai a taimang khat umkha unte a chi va thah a tumta uhi.
Hizongleh sepaih zahoutu in Paul huhing a ut a, a siltup uh a khaam a; tuiliau siam photmah tui khang lian a tawmkhia a khomuala kai masa diing leh;
Midang khenkhat kuang dang tungah, khenkhat kuang keehphel tung banga gaalkai diing thu a pia hi; Huchi'n, a bawnun khomualah bittahin a gaalkai vehta uhi.
Huleh a suahtaat phetun, hu tuikual gam chu Malta ahi chih a heta uhi.
Huleh a gam mimawlte’n lungsiattah zetin ahung na lungsiat va; guah a zut jiah leh a dap jiahin mei a chih va, ka bawnun ahung na kipaahpih uhi.
Huleh Paul in sing lomkhat a tom a, meia a vah leh, meisa hulin guul khat ahung pawtdoh a, a khut a tu a, a kikhaidenta hi.
Huleh a gam mimawlte’n guul a khuta kikhaiden a muhun, Hipa hi tualthat ahi ngei diing, tui khang lian apat suahta mahleh phubalatu in a hin phal nawnlou ahita, a chi va.
Huleh ama’n ganhing chu meiah a thingkhia a, bangmah a chi sih hi.

Ahihvangin amahun chu, ahung pawm aha, ahihlouhleh thakhata puuh a sipah diing a gingta in a ngaah va; hizongleh, sawtpi a ngaah va, bangmah a chih louhtahin, a lungsim uh a heng va, amah chu pathian ahi, a chizawta uhi.
Hu mun chu hu tuikuala hausapa a min Publia a chih uh gam ahi a; hupa in ahung na kipaahpih a, ngainatahin ni thum ahung zintungsah hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Publia pa chu nattun leh eehsi in ana lum a; Paul a kawmah ava luut a, a haamteia, a tungah a khut a nga a, a sudamta hi.
Huchibanga a bawl zohin, hu tuikual gam a midang natna nei zousiah zong a hung va, a dam chiatta uhi.
Amahun nasatahin ahung paahtawi va; huleh ka chiah diingun ka poimoh zousiah uh kuang ah a koih uhi.
Huleh ha thum nungin Alexandria kuang, phalbi sungteng tuikuala taam, a chiamchihna Kastor leh Pollax a chihun ka chiahta uhi.
Huleh Siraka ah ka kinga va, hutah ah ni thum ka taam uhi.
Huleh hu apatin ka paikual va, Rhegium ka tungva; huleh, nikhat nungin sim huih ahung nunga, a jing kiit in Puteoli ka tung uhi.
Hua unaute ka mu va, a kawmva ni sagih taam diingin ahung hou va; huchi’n Rome lam zuanin ka chiah jelta uhi.
Huleh unaute’n ka tanchin uh a jah tahun, hu a kipanin Appii dawlmun leh Zinbuuh thumte chianga hung dawn diingin a hung va; Paul in amahuh a muh in, Pathian kawmah kipaahthu a soi a, a hamuangta hi.
Huleh Rome ka tunun, sepaih zahoutu in mitaangte chu veengtu sepaih houtupa kawmah a pekhia a; hizongleh Paul chu a veengtu sepaih khat toh amah chauh a, a um a phalsah hi.

Huleh hichi ahung hi a, ni thum nungin Paul in Juda houtu haw a kou khawma; amahuh ahung kikhop tahun, a kawmvah, Mite leh unaute, Juda nam leh i pulepate uh daan tungah bangmah ka bawlsiat a um louh vangin, Jerusalem a kipanin Romemite kawmah mitaanga piahkhiah ka hita hi.
Ahung etdih zohun, sihna khop hial ka tunga bangmah a um louh jiahin hah ahung gua va.
Hizongleh, Judate’n huchu a nial jiahun Kaisar kawmah ka thu tut lou thei ka hita sih ahi; ka chipihte heehna a bawl chu hi louin.
Hi thu jiaha nanguh toh kimuhtuaha kihoulim diingin ka hung kou ahi; Israelte kinepna jiaha hi khainianga kaan ka hi ngal a, a chi a.
Huleh, amahun a kawmah, Na tanchin Judia gam a kipanin lehkhathot in ka mu sih uh, unaute kuama’n zong hi a hungin na tung thubuai bangmah ahung ensah sih va, soi zong ahung soi ngei sih uhi.
Hizongleh na ngaihdan chu nangmah apat ka ja nuam uhi; ajiahchu hi pawl hi gam chin a soisiat a, a um uh ka he uhi, a chi va.

Huleh ni a guat va, hu a tunni in a kawmah mi tampi ahung va; jingkala kipat nitaahlam dongin a kawmvah Pathian gam thu hilhchianin a hesah a, Mosi daan lehkhabu thu leh zawlneite lehkhabu thuin, Jesu lamah amahuh a zawlzawl hi.
Huleh khenkhat in thu kisoi chu a gingta va, khenkhat in a gingta sih uhi.
Huleh amahuh a kithugual theih louh phetun, Paul in thu khat a soi zohin a paikheta uhi. A thusoi chu hih ahi, Hagau Siangthou in zawlnei Isaiah kama i pulepate uh kawma a soi chu a dih ngei mai,
Hi mite kawmah chiah inla va soi in, Ja chu na ja na diing va, a ngaihna na he sih diing uh; muh chu na mu na diing va, na hedoh sih diing uh;

Ajiahchu Hi chite lungtang a taahta a, a bil uh a ngongta a, a mit uh a siingta uhi; huchilou inchu a mit un a mukha diing va, a bil un a jakha diing va, a lungtang un a hesiamkha diing uh, huchi'n ahung kiheikiitkha diing uh a, ke’n ka na sudamkha diing hi, a chih chu.
Hujiahin Pathian hutdamna thu chu Jentelte kawma sawl ahita chih he un, amahun zaw ngai zong a ngaikhe diing uhi, a chia.
Huleh hi thute a soi zohin, Judate chu a pawtkheta va, amahuh lahah nasataha kinialna a nei uhi.
Huleh Paul chu kum nih pumlum luahman a kipiah inn ah a um a, a kawma chiah photmah ana kipaahpih a,
Pathian gam thu a soi a, Lalpa Jesu Khrist thu haangsantahin a hilh jela, kuama’n amah a khaam sih uhi.
Paul, Jesu Khrist suaah, sawlleh hi diinga kouh, Pathian tanchinpha diinga sehtuam in,
(Hu tanchinpha Pathian in malaipeha zawlneite kama lehkha siangthou a ana chiamsa,)
Tahsa daan a David suan a piang, a Tapa Jesu Khrist i Lalpa uh;
Huleh sianthouna hagaulam daan a misi laha kipan a thohkiitna in silbawltheihna toh Pathian Tapa ahih a kilatsah tungtaang;
A min jiaha nam chin laha mi ginna lama thumangsah diingin amah vangin hehpihna leh sawlleh hihna i tangta uhi;
Hute lahah nanguh zong Jesu Khrist a kouhte na hi uhi;
Pathian deihtah, misiangthou hi diinga kouh, Rome khua a um zousiahte kawmah; i Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawma kipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Khovel pumpi a na ginna uh a thangsuaah jiahin na bawnva tunga ka kipaahna thu, a masapenin Jesu Khrist jalin ka Pathian kawmah ka soi hi.
Ajiahchu ka haamteina chinah tawplouin na min uh ka lou ngiitngeet chih A Tapa tanchinpha a ka hagaua a nna ka tohsah zing Pathian chu ahung heetpihtu ahi.
Tu beeh a na kawmva hungna diing Pathian lemsah a zin hun lemtaang ka muh teiteina diinga ngen in.
Ajiahchu na detna diing va hagaulam silpiah bangaha ka hung piah theihna diingin nanguh hung muh ka ut mahmah hi.
Huchu na ginna uleh ka ginna a, nang uleh kei i kihamuantuah theihna diingin ka chihna ahi.

Huleh unaute, Jentel dangte kawma ka tohgimna gah ka muh taah mahbanga nang u’laha zong ka muh theihna diingin na kawmvah tampi vei hung ka tumta (huleh tu dongin daalin ka um zing) chih na heet louh uh ka deih sih hi.
Grikte leh meelmahte kawmah bat ka nei hi; mipil leh mipilloute kawm a zong.
Huchi'n nanguh Rome khua a umte kawm a zong tanchinpha ka theihtawpa soi diingin ka kiman zing hi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh tanchinpha chu ka zumpih sih hi; ajiahchu a gingta photmah diingin hichu hutdamna diinga Pathian silbawltheihna ahi; Judate diingin ahi masa a, huleh Grikte diingin zong ahi.
Ajiahchu huah gintaatna diingin ginna in Pathian dihtatna a kilang a; Midihtat chu ginna in a hing diing, chih gelh bangin.
Ajiahchu thutah dihtat louhna a daal mite Pathian ngaihsah louhna leh dihtat louhna zousiah tungah Pathian lungthahna chu vaan apatin ahung kilangta hi;
Pathian in a heetsahtaah jiahin Pathian tanchin heet diing chu amahuh ah suhlatin a umta hi.
Ajiahchu khovel siam chiila kipana a silmuhtheih louhte, a kumtuang silbawltheihna leh a Pathianzia natan chiang silsiamah a kilang a, chiantah a muh in a um hi; hujiahin suanlam diing a nei sih uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian he ngalin Pathian bangin a paahtawi sih va, kipaahthu zong a soi sih uh; himahleh sil thulimloute a ngaihtuah zota va, a lungtang ngol u’chu ahung mialta hi.
Pil kisain mingol ahung suahta va,
Sithei lou Pathian loupina chu sithei mihingte, vate, keenglinei sate leh a boh a vaah ganhingte limah a tangsahta uhi.
Hujiahin Pathian in amah uchu a sapum uh zumhuaitaha kibawltuah diing leh, a lungtang uh ut zawng banga sil niin a bawl uh phalin a umsanta hi.
Hute’n chu Pathian thutah zuau a tangsah in a siamtu sangin, a silsiam bia in, a nna a tohsah zota uhi, a siamtu chu kumtuang a phattaah ahi. Amen.
Hukhu jiahin Pathian in zumhuaitaha a huuh uh phalin a umsanta hi; ajiahchu a numeite uh nasanin zong a pianpih umdan ngeina uh daan lou banga um diingin a kibawl limdang veu uhi.
Hutobangmahin pasalte’n zong numei zatdan ngeina tawpsanin huuhin a kienlah va, pasal leh pasal kilawmloutahin a kibawl va, a tawndih louh man muh diing uchu amahuh ah a kimuh uhi.
Huleh a lungsim va Pathian a heet ut louh jiahun Pathian in sil kilawmloute bawl diing a, a deih louh zawng lungsim neih phalin a umsanta hi.

Dihtat louhna zousiah, kingaihna zousiah, giitlouhna zousiah, duhaamna zousiah, kimuhdahna zousiaha dim in: thangsiatnate, tualthahnate, kinialnate, kihemnate, mi siatna diing ngaihtuahnate in a dim va,
Thuguuh soihaatte, misoisiathaatte, Pathian mudahte, simmoh haatte, kiliansahte, kisatheite, sil gilou pandohtute, nulepa thu mangloute,
Heetsiamna neiloute, thuchiam botsete, pianpih lungsiatna neiloute, hunlehai neiloute, khotuahna neiloute ahi uhi.
Hutobang sil bawlte chu sitaah ahi chih Pathian vaihawmna he ngalin, amahuh chauh bawl zong hilouin, midang hutobang bawlte zong a kipaahpih uhi.

Hujiahin, Aw mihing, mi soisel haat koi hita zonglechin suanlam diing himhim nei lou na hi; ajiahchu midang na soiselna tah ah nangmah siamlouh na kitangsah ahi; nang a soiseltu’n zong hutobang silte na bawl thou jiahin.
Hizongleh hutobang sil bawl veute tunga Pathian vaihawmna chu thutah dungjuiin ahi chih i he hi.
Huleh hutobang sil bawl veute soisel a nang lah hute mah bawl thou, Aw mihing, Pathian vaihawmna peel diing a kigingta na hiaimah?
Ahihlouhleh Pathian hoihna in kisiih diingin nang ahung pui chih he louin, a hoihna hauhdan leh jaidohdan leh thuaahtheihdante simmoh na hiaimah?
Hizongleh na lungtang khauh jiah leh, na kisiih nuam louh jiahin, Pathian lungthahna ni leh valhawmna dihtat hung kilat ni chianga diingin na tungah lungthahna na kikholkhawm ahi.
Ama’n chu mi chin a silbawl bang jelun a thuh kiit diing hi.
Sil hoih bawl a kuhkaltaha pang a, loupina leh paahtawina leh manthai theih louhna hawl mite kawmah kumtuang hinna a pe diing a;
Hizongleh soihah a, thutah jui loua, dihtatlouhna juizote tungah chu hehnate leh lungthahnate a um diing,
Thuaahgimna leh lungngaihna nasatah chu silgilou bawlte hagau tungah a um diing hi; Judate hagau tungah a um masa diing a, Grikte hagau tungah zong a um diing hi.
Hizongleh silhoih bawl photmahte kawmah chu loupinate, paahtawinate, huleh hamuanna te piah ahi diing; Judate kawmah piah masat ahi diing a, huleh Grikte kawmah zong piah ahi diing hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian in mi deihsahtuam a nei sih hi.
Koipouh daan nei lou a sil bawlsual chu daan louin a mangthai diing a; koipouh daan nei a sil bawlsual chu daan a vaihawmsah in a um diing hi;
(Ajiahchu daan ja mi hih chauh chu Pathian mitmuh in midih ahi sih a; hizongleh daan banga gamta chu midih ahi diing uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh daan nei lou Jentelte’n a pianpih lungtang va daan silte a bawlun, daan nei sih mahleh uh, hite chu daan in a kineihtawm jel uhi;
A lungtang vah daan silbawl gelh ahi chih a ensah va, huchu a sialepha heetna un a heetpih a, a lungsimte uh kinialin siam leh siamlouh a kitangsah lehleh uhi; )
Ka tanchinpha soi dungjui a Pathian in Jesu Khrist zanga mihingte thuguuh vai a hawmsah ni chiangin.
Ngai in, nang chu Judami kichi na hi a, daan na muang a, Pathian na suang a,
Huleh a deihzawng na he a, daan a hilhin na um a, silhoih zote na khen thei a;
Huleh nangmah ngei chu mittawte puitu leh miala umte diing a vaah hiin na kihe a,
Daan a pilna leh thutah umdan na neih jiahin mingolte hilhtu hiin na kigingta hi.
Hujiahin nang, midangte hilhtu, nang leh nang kihilhlou na hiaimah? nang guuhtaat louh diing ahi chia thusoitu, na gu veu maw?
Nang, aangkawm louh diing ahi chi a hilhtu, aang na kawm veu maw? nang, milem kihdahpa, milem biahna inn a silte na gu veu maw?
Nang, daan suang pa, na daan bohsiat jiahin Pathian na suminse veu maw?
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Pathian min chu nanguh jalin Jentelte lahah soisiatin a umta hi, chia gelh bangin.
Ajiahchu daan juitu na hih inchu zehtan a phatuam ngei a; himahleh daan botsetu na hih inchu na zehtan chu tan louh bang ahung hita hi.
Hujiahin zehtanlou mi’n daan thusehte a juih leh a zehtan louh chu tan banga ngaih ahi sih diai mah?
Huleh piandan a zehtanlou mi’n daan a juihkim leh, nang, lehkhathu leh zehtan daan nei ngal a daan bohsetu chu ahung soisel sih diai mah?
Ajiahchu a polaang chauh a Judami hi chu Judami tah ahi sih a, a kilang a tahsa chauh a zehtan zong zehtan ahi sih hi.

Hizongleh a sungnung lam a Judami hi chu Judami tah ahi; huleh zehtan tah chu lungsim lam a tan ahi, lehkha thu mai a hilouin, hagau ah ahi; amah paahtaat loh chu mihing apat ahi sih a, Pathian apat ahi zaw hi.
Ahihleh Judami’n hamphatna bang ahiai a neih tuan? ahihlouhleh zehtan zong bang ahiai a phattuamna?
Lam chintengah a phatuam hi; a pipenin, Pathian kamsuaahte a kawmva kolsaha a um jiahin ahi.
Ajiahchu khenkhatte’n gingta sih mah le uh bang a chituan diai? A gintaatlouhna un Pathian ginumna bangmahlou a suaahsah diai mah?
Suaahsah lou hial e; Pathian chu midihtat hi henla, mi chin chu zuau thei hizaw heh; Na thusoi a siamtang a na um a, vaihawmsah a na um chianga zong na zoh theihna diingin, chi a gelh bangin.
Hizongleh i dihtat louhna in Pathian dihtatna a suhlat hoih sem leh bang i soi diai? Pathian in mi a gawtin mi dihtatlou ahiai mah? (Mihing bangin ka soi ahi).
Hilou hial; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh huchi hitaleh Pathian in khovel vai bangchi’n a hawmta diai?
Ahihvangin ka zuau soi jiaha Pathian dih jia, amah loupina khophiala a lat sem leh, bang diinga kei zong misual banga siamlouhtansaha um nalai ka hiai?

Huleh bang diinga, (na hung heeh va, khenkhat in ka soi louhpi na hung soisah bang va) Silhoih ahung pawt theihna diingin silhoihlou i bawl diing uh chi a soizaw lou i hiviai? Hutobang mite’n siamlouh a tan uh a dih ahi.
A hihtaahleh bang? amahuh sangin i hoihzaw tuan va ahiai mah? Hoihzaw himhim lou; ajiahchu Judate leh Jentelte a nih un sual nuaia um veh ahi uh chih a ma in i kawhchianta hi.
Hichia gelh bangin, Koimah midihtat mawngmawng a um sih, khatmah zong a um sih.
Koimah hesiam mawngmawng a um sih, koimah Pathian hawl mawngmawng a um sih.
Ahilou lamah a peet zou vehta va, bangmah phatuamlou ahung suaah vehta uh; koimah silhoih bawl mawngmawng a um sih, khatmah zong a um sih.
A lawl uh haan kihong ahi a; a lei un heemna thu a soi va; a muuh vah guulgu a um hi.
A kam uh haanse lohna leh khaatna in a dim a.
A kal uh sisan suah diingin a kinsuan uh;
Manthaina leh gentheihna a lampi vah a um a;
Huleh hamuanna lampi zong a he sih uh;
A mit hah vah Pathian lau na mawngmawng a um sih hi chih.
Huchi'n daan in sil bangpouh a soi photmah chu, kam chinteng hup ahihtheihna diing leh, khovel zousiah Pathian ma a mohtang a, a um theihna diingun, daan nuaia umte kawma a soi ahi chih i he uhi.
Hujiahin daan silbawlte jiahin koimah Pathian mitmuh in siamtangin a um sih diing uh; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh daan jiahin sual kiheetna ahung um hi.
Hizongleh tuin chu daan leh zawlneite’n a heetsah bangun, daan lou a Pathian dihtatna chu suhlatin a umta hi;
Huchu, Jesu Khrist gintaatna jiaha a gingta photmahte diing a suhlata um Pathian dihtatna chu ahi; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh a kilimdanna bangmah a um sih hi;
Ajiahchu mi zousiah in sil a bawlsualta va, Pathian loupina a ching zouta sih uhi.
Khrist Jesu a um tatna jalin a hehpihna in a thawn a siamtansah in a um uh.
Pathian thuaahtheihna jala malaia a sualnate uh kiheetmohbawla a um jiahin, a dihtatna etsahna diingin Khrist Jesu chu a sisana ginna jala sual thuphatawina hi diingin Pathian in a guat a;
Amah chu midihtat ahihtheihna diing leh, Jesu gingta photmahte siamtangsahtu ahihtheihna diing a tulaia a dihtatna etsahna diing ahi.
Ahihleh kisahtheihna diing khoiah a um ei? A um thei mawngmawng sih hi. Bang daan in ahiai? silbawl daan in ahiai? Hilou: ginna daan in ahi zaw hi.
Hujiahin mi’n daan silbawlte jiah hilouin, ginna jiahin siam tangin i ngai ahi.
Pathian chu Judate Pathian chauh ahiai mah? Jentelte Pathian zong hilou maw? Hi e, Jentelte Pathian zong ahi.
Zehtante a gintaat jiah va siamtangsah diing leh zehtanloute a gintaat jiah va siamtangsah diing Pathian khat chauh ahih ngal inchu, Jentelte Pathian zong ahi na sih diai mah.
Ahihleh ginna jiahin daan chu bangmahlou i suaahsah uh ahiai mah? Suaahsah lou hial; ahi, daan i sukipzaw uh ahi.
Ahihleh tahsa daan a i pu uh Abraham in a muh bang ahiai i soi diing uh?
Ajiahchu natoh jiaha Abraham siamtansaha a um leh suan diing a nei hi; hizongleh Pathian lamah chu a nei sih hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Pathian lehkhathu in bang ahiai a soi? Abraham in Pathian a gingta a, hu ginna chu amah diing a dihtatna a ngaih ahi, a chi hi.
Huleh natongtu loh chu hehpihna a ngaih ahi sih a, bat a ngaih ahi zaw hi.
Hizongleh nna tonglou a, Pathian ngaihsahloute siamtangsahpa gingta zaw mi ginna chu dihtatna a ngaih ahi.
Mi, natoh tellou a Pathian in dihtat a, a ngaih a, vang a piah thu chu David in zong,
A bohsiatnate uh ngaihdam a umte leh, a sualnate uh khuh a umte chu a hampha uhi;
Lalpa’n sualna nei a, a seh louhte a hampha uhi, chia a soi bangmahin.
Ahihleh hu hamphatna zehtante tung chauha uhi ahiai, ahihlouhleh zehtan louhte tungah zong? Abraham ginna chu a dihtatna ngaih ahi i chi ngal a.
Ahihleh huchu bangchi kingaih ahiai? a zehtan nungin ahiai, ahihlouhleh a zehtan ma in? A zehtan nungin ahi sih a, a zehtan ma in ahi zaw hi.

Huleh zehtan louha a um laia ginna a, a muh dihtatna heetna zehtan chiamchihna chu a mu a; zehtan louh hizongleh uh a gingta zousiah pa ahihtheihna diingin; dihtatna chu amahuh diing a zong seh ahih theihna diingin.
Huleh zehtan louhte a diing a zehtante pa chauh ahi sih a, i pu uh Abraham zehtan louha a um lai a, a ginna neih banga neite pa zong ahi.
Ajiahchu Abraham aha, ahihlouhleh a haah kawmah khovel gouluahtu ahi diing chih thu daan jiaha chiam ahi sih a, ginna a dihtatna jiahin ahi zaw hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh daan a mite gouluahtu ahih unchu, ginna bangmahlou ahita diing a, thuchiam zong panna bei ahita diing hi.
Ajiahchu daan in lungthahna a siam a; himahleh daan um louhna ah bohsiatna zong a um sih hi.

Hujiahin hehpihna jiaha ahihtheihna diingin, ginna jiahin ahi; haahte zousiah inzong thuchiam chu peelloua, a muhna diingun; daan nei mite chauhin hilouin, i bawnva i pu uh Abraham banga ginna nei zousiah inzong a mu diing uhi.
(Nam tampite pa in ka hung bawl hi, chi a gelh bangin, ) misite suhingtu leh, sil um loute um banga soitu a gintaat Pathian mitmuh ah.
Kinephuaia a um louh inzong ama’n chu kinemtahin a gingta a, nam tampite pa ahung hihtheihna diingin; Huchibangin na haah ahung hi diing, chi a kisoi dungjuiin.
Huleh ginna a haatlou lou in, a sapum sisa banga um leh, (amah chu kum zakhat vel diing mi ahi a) Sarah chih zong a ngaihtuah sih hi;
Ginlelhna jalin Pathian thuchiam tahsanglouin a um sih a; ginna ah a haat a, Pathian a paahtawi hi.
Huleh thu ama’n a chiam phot chu a taangtungsah thei ahi chih he in a gingta tinten hi.
Hujiahin a ginna chu a dihtatna a ngaih ahita hi.
Huleh a ginna chu a dihtatna a ngaih ahi chih, amah jiah chauha gelh ahi sih a;
Hizongleh misi laha kipana i Lalpa uh Jesu kaithoupa i gintaat inchu, eiuh diingin zong dihtatna a ngaih ahi diing hi.
Hu Jesu chu i tatsualnate jiahin piahkhiahin a um a, huleh siam i tanna diingin kaihthohin a um hi.
Hujiahin ginna jiaha siamtansah a um in, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jalin Pathian toh kilemin i um uhi.
Amah jal mahin hi i dinkipna hehpihna huang ah ginna a luut theihna i neita uhi; huleh Pathian loupina a kinemin kipaahin zong i um uhi.
Huleh hu chauh zong hilouin, gimthuaahna in kuhkalna a siam chih he in gimthuaahna ah zong i kipaah uhi.
Huleh kuhkalna in heetchi ana a siama, heetchi ana in kinepna a siam a;
Huleh kinepna in chu a zahtasah sih; ajiahchu hu Hagau Siangthou i kawma ahung piahin Pathian lungsiatna i lungtang vah a leihleetta hi.
Ajiahchu i haat louh laiin, a hun tahin Khrist chu Pathian ngaihsahloute diingin ahung sita hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh midihtat luang a sih mi a ut khol sih diing a, ahiinlah mi hoih luang a sih chu mi khenkhat in a ngap meithei hi.
Hizongleh misualte i hihlaia Khrist i luang a ahung sihna ah Pathian in ahung lungsiatna chu phattuaahin a langsahta hi.
Hubanah, a sisana siamtansaha i um nungin amah jalin lungthahna apatin hutdam in i um diing uhi.
Ajiahchu meelma i hih laia bawn a Tapa sihna jiaha Pathian toh kilemta i hih unchu, kilema i um zohnung un a hinna jiahin hutdam in i um ngei diing uhi.
Huchi chauh zong ahi sih a, tu a tatna i muhna i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jalin Pathian ah zong i kipaah uhi.
Huchihjiahin, mi khat jiaha sual khovel a ahung luut a, sual jiaha sihna ahung luut mahbangin mi zousiah ana sualtaah jiahin sihna in mi zousiah a jelsuahta hi.
Ajiahchu daan umma tanin sual khovel ah a um a; hizongleh daan um louh laiin sual chu sual a ngaih ahi sih hi.
Hizongleh Adam a kipana Mosi tanphain Adam sualna banga sil bawlsual loute tungah zong sihna in vai a hawm hi; Adam chu a hung diingpa etsahna ahi.

Hizongleh silthawnpiah chu giitlouhna toh kibang ahi sih hi. Ajiahchu mi khat giitlouh jala bawn mi tampi a sih va ahihleh, Pathian hehpihna leh, mi khat Jesu Khrist hehpihna jiaha silthawnpiah chu mi tampite tungah vuhin a um ngei diing hi.

Huleh silthawnpiah chu mi khat sual jiaha sil hung um toh a kibang sih hi; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh siamlouh tansahna vaihawmna chu mi khat jiahin ahung um a, hizongleh silthawnpiah chu gilou tampite jiahin siamtansahna diingin ahung um zaw hi.

Ajiahchu mi khat giitlouh jiaha sihna in hu mi khat jiah mah a thuneitah a a um ngal inchu, hehpihna nasatah leh, dihtatna silthawnpiah mute’n mi khat, Jesu Khrist jiahin hinna ah vai a hawm ngei diing uhi.

Hujiahin mi khat giitlouh jiah a siamlouh tansah na vaihawmna chu mi zousiah tungah ahung um a; huchimahbangin mi khat dihtatna silbawl jiahin hinna muhna diingin siamtansah na silthawnpiah chu mi zousiah tungah ahung um hi.
Ajiahchu mi khat thuman louh jiaha mi tampite misual a kihihsah mahbangin, mi khat thuman jiahin mi tampite midihtat hihsah ahi diing uhi.
Huleh giitlouhna a tamsemna diingin daan ahung um behlap nalai a. Hizongleh sual a punna phot ah hehpihna zong a pung zosem hi.
Sualin sihna a vai a hawm mahbang a, hehpihna in dihtatna jala kumtuang hinna tanna diing khop a i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jiaha vai a hawm theihna diingin.
Ahihleh bang i soita diai? Hehpihna a pun semna diingin sual ah i um zing diing uh adiai?
Um zing lou hial diing. Eiuh sual lama sisate bangchi’n sual ah i hing thei nalai lai diai?
Eiuh Jesu Khrist a baptis a um photmahte chu a sihna ah baptis in i um uh ahi chih he lou na hi viai mah?
Hujiahin Pa loupina in misi laha kipan Khrist a kaihthoh banga eihaw zong hinna thah a i hin theihna diingin a sihna ah baptisma in amah toh vui in i um uhi.
Ajiahchu a sihna kibatpiha amah toh i na kizop taah uleh, a thohkiitna kibatpihin zong i kizop diing uhi.
Hikhu he leh uchin, sualna sapum suhmangthaia a um theihna diingin, tu apat a sual natonga i um nawn louhna diingin i mihing lui uh amah toh kilhbehin a umta hi, chih.
Ajiahchu koipouh sita sa chu sual apatin a zalenta hi.
Huleh Khrist toh i sih taah a ahihleh, amah toh hin zong i hinkhawm diing uh ahi chih i gingta hi.
Khrist chu misi laha kipan kaihthoh in a um a, a si nawn sih diing chih he in; sihna in a tungah thu a nei nawnta sih hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh a sihna chu sual lam thu ah khatvei si ahi a; hizongleh a hin ahihleh, Pathian lamah a hing ahi.
Huchimahbangin nanguh zong sual lam thu ah sisa in kingai unla, hizongleh Pathian lamah chu i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jalin hingin kingai un.
Hujiahin na sapum uh si thei ah, a utzawng na juih na diingun sual in vaihawm sih heh.

Na sapum hiangte uh zong dihtatlouhna vanzat diingin sual kawmah pephal sih un; ahihvangin misi laha kipana hing kiit bangin Pathian kawmah kipia unla, na sapum hiangte u’zong dihtatna vanzat diingin Pathian kawmah pe phal zaw un.
Ajiahchu sualin na tungvah thu a neita sih diing hi; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh daan nuaia um na hi sih va, hehpihna nuaia um na hi zaw uhi.
Ahihleh bang chita diing? Daan nuaia um hilou a, hehpihna nuaia um i hih jiahin i sual diing uh ahi diai?

Sual hial lou diing Sihna diing a sual suaah hiin, dihtatna diing a thumanna suaah hitaleh, koi kawm pouh ah zong thumang diing a suaah a na kipiah unchu, a thu na manpa uh suaah na hi uh chih na he sih viai mah?
Hizongleh Pathian kawmah kipaahthu um heh, sual suaah ana himah zong leh uchin, nanguh hung kipia kihilhna thudan chu lungtang tahun na juita uhi.
Suala kipan hahdoha um in, dihtatna suaahte na hung hita uhi.

Na tahsa uh haat louh jiahin mihing daan in ka soi ahi; na sapum hiangte uh sianthou louhna leh giitlouhna kawma suaah diing a nana piah bangun, tuin na sapum hiangte uh sianthouna diingin dihtatna kawmah suaah diingin pia un.
Ajiahchu sual suaahte na hih laiun dihtatnalam apat nana zalen uhi.
Ahihleh tua na sil zumpihte vah hulaiin gah bang ahiaileh na neih uh? Hu silte tawpna lah sihna ahi ngal a.
Hizongleh tuin sual apat zalensaha um a, Pathian suaahte na hung hih nungun, sianthouna khopin na gah uh na nei va, huleh a tawpna ah kumtuang hinna toh.
Ajiahchu sual man sihna ahi a; hizongleh Pathian silthawnpiah chu i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jalin kumtuang hinna ahi.
Unaute, daan in mi a damsung teng a tungah thu a neihkhum ahi chih na he sih viai mah? (daan he mite kawmah ka soi ahi).
Ajiahchu numei pasal nei chu a pasal damsung siah daan a, a pasala kaanin a um ahi; hizongleh a pasal a sih inchu pasal lam thu ah daan a kipan hahkhiahin a um hi.
Huchi'n a pasal dam zing a midang a kiteenpih inchu aangkawmnu a kichi diing hi; hizongleh a pasal a sih inchu hu daan apatin a zalenta a; midang toh kiteeng zong leh aangkawmnu ahi sih diing uh.

Huchihjiahin, ka unaute, Pathian lama gah i suah theihna diing a, midang, misi laha kipana kaihthoha umpa ngei na kiteenpih theihna diingun, Khrist sapum jiahin nanguh zong daan lamah si na hung hita uhi.
Ajiahchu tahsa a i um laiin daan jiaha sualna utna hung suahdohte’n i tahsa hiangte ah sihna khop gah suang diingin a tong veu hi.
Hizongleh tuin chu ahung tupa laha si zouta in, daan a kipan hahkhiah in i umta uh; lehkhagelh lui bangphet hiloua, hagau thaha nna i toh theihna diingin.
Ahihleh bang i soita diai? Daan chu sualna hi adiai? Hilou hial. Himahleh daan jiahin hilouleh sual kichi he lou diing hinga; ajiahchu daan in, Eeng sin, na chi sih leh een kichi he lou diing ka hi.
Hizongleh sualin thupiah jiaha hun lemtaang muin ka sungah eenna chinteng a umsah uh; daan louin sual chu si ahi ngal a.
Ajiahchu tumalam in kei daan louin kana hing a; hizongleh thupiah ahung um tahin sual ahung halhdoha, kei ka sita hi.
Huleh hinna diing a thupiah chu sihna diing ahung hita chih ka hung hedohta hi.
Ajiahchu sualin thupiah jiaha hun lemtaang muin ahung heema, hukhu zangin ahung sulumta hi.
Huchi ahihjiahin daan chu a siangthou hi, thupiah zong a siangthoua, a dih a, a hoih hi.

Ahihleh sil hoih kei diing a sihna hung hita adiai? Hilou hial. Hizongleh sual chu sual a, a kilat theihna diingin sualin sil hoih zangin keimah ah sihna ahung tongdoh hi; sual chu thupiah jiaha sual nasatah ahung hihtheihna diingin.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh daan chu hagaulam sil ahi chih i he a; hizongleh kei chu sa mi, sual suaah a khotsa ka hi.
Ajiahchu sil ka bawl pen a ngaihna ka he sih: bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh sil ka bawl utpen chu ka bawl sih a; hizongleh ka ut louhpen ka bawl zoveu hi.
Ka bawl ut louhpen ka bawl ngalin chu daan a hoih chia jui ka hita diing hi.
Huchi'n a bawltu chu kei ka hita sih a, sual keimaha um bawl ahi zaw hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh keimah ah (chih chu, ka tahsa ah,) sil hoih mawngmawng a teeng sih chih ka he hi; a bawl utna pen chu keimah ah a um a; hizongleh hu a hoih bawl theihna ka mu sih hi.
Ajiahchu silhoih ka bawl utpen ka bawl sih a; hizongleh sil hoihlou ka bawl ut louh pen ka bawlzaw veu hi.
Ka ut louh pen ka bawl inchu, a bawltu keimah ka hita sih a, sual keimaha um bawl ahi zaw hi.
Huchi'n hi daan ka hung hedohta, silhoih ka bawl ut laiin giitlouhna ka kawmah ahung um veu ahi.
Ajiahchu ka lungsimtah inchu Pathian daan tungah ka kipaah hi.
Hizongleh ka tahsa hiangte ah daan tuam khat a um chih ka he hi; hukhuin ka lungsim daan a dou a, huleh ka tahsa hiangte a um sualna daan kawmah suaah in ahung pui veu hi.
Migenthei hina meijen ing e! Hi sihna sapum lah apat kua’n ahiai hung suahtasah diing?
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jalin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi hi. Huchi'n keimah tahin chu ka lungsim in Pathian daan ka tong a; hizongleh ka tahsa in chu sualna daan ka tong hi.
Hujiahin tuin chu Khrist Jesu a um, tahsa daan a um loua Hagau daan a um zote diingin siamlouhtansahna mawngmawng a umta sih hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Khrist Jesu a um hinna Hagau daan in sual leh sihna daan a kipan ahung zalensahta hi.

Ajiahchu tahsa jala haatlouhna jiaha daan in a bawl guallouh chu, Pathian in a tapa ngei, sualna tahsa gilou lim puain, huleh sual thoihna diing a hung sawlin, tahsa a sual um chu siamlouh a tangsahta hi.
Tahsa daan a pai loua, Hagau daan a pai zaw eihaw a daan dihtatnate suhtaangtunga a um theihna diingin.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh tahsa daan a umte’n tahsalam silte a lunggulh veu uhi; hizongleh Hagau daan a umte’n chu Hagau lam silte a lunggulh uhi.
Ajiahchu tahsalam silte lunggulh chu sihna ahi a; hizongleh Hagau lam silte lunggulh chu hinna leh hamuanna ahi.
Salam lunggulh chu Pathian toh kidouna ahih jiahin; huchu Pathian daan nuaiah a um sih a, um zong a um thei lou him ahi.
Huchi'n tahsa a umte’n Pathian a kipaahsah thei sih uhi.
Hizongleh Pathian Hagau nanguh a a um tahzet inchu tahsa a um na hi sih va, Hagaua um na hi zaw uhi. Ahiinlah mi koipouh Khrist Hagau nei lou chu amah a ahi sih hi.
Huleh Khrist nanguh a a um leh sapum chu sual jiahin a si ahi; hizongleh Hagau chu dihtatna jiahin a hing ahi.
Hizongleh misi laha kipana Jesu kaithoupa Hagau nanguh a a um inchu misi laha kipana Khrist kaithoupa’n nanguh a um Hagau jiahin na sapum uh sitheite zong a suhing diing hi.
Hujiahin unaute, bat i nei hi, tahsa daan a um diingin tahsa lahah chu ahi sih.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh tahsa daan a na um unchu na si diing uhi; himahleh sapum silbawlte Hagau a na suhlup jel unchu na hing diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian Hagau puia um photmahte chu Pathian tate ahi uhi.
Laua um kiit diingin suaah hihna hagau na mu uh ahi sih a; ta hihna Hagau na mu uh ahi zaw hi, hu Hagau jiahin Abba, Pa, chi'n i kikou hi.
Hagau ngei in eimah hagau toh Pathian tate i hi chih ahung hesah hi.
Huleh tate i hih inchu, gouluahtute i hi uh; a kawma paahtawi a i um theihna diing a amah i thuaahpih tahzet inchu Pathian gouluahtute, Khrist luahpihtute i hi uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh tulaia thuaahgimnate chu izawchianga eiuh a loupina suhlata um diing toh tehkaah tham in ka ngai sih hi.
Ajiahchu silsiam zousiah in kinem mahmahin Pathian tate kilatna diing a ngaahlah mahmah uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh silsiam zousiahte chu sil thulimlou thuthu a umsah in a umta uh, amahuh ut thu hilouin, kinepna neia amahuh umsahtu jiahin ahi zaw hi,
Ajiahchu silsiam zousiah zong siatna suaah apat suahtaatsaha um in, Pathian tate noplenna loupi a luut diing ahi uhi.
Ajiahchu silsiam zousiah tutandongin thuum leh nauveina thuaahin a um uh chih i he uhi.
Huleh amahuh chauh zong ahi sih a, Hagau gah masa nei eihaw ngei zong, ta hihna, i sapum uh tatna muhna diing ngaah in, eihaw na chiang lungsim in i thuum veu uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh kinepna in ahi hutdama i um uh; hizongleh muhsa zinga kinep chu kinepna ahi sih hi; mi’n a muhsa zing ah bang diingin a kinem nalailai diviai?
Hizongleh i muh louh i kineppih inchu kuhkaltahin i ngaah zoveu hi.
Hutobangmahin, Hagau in i haatlouhnate a panpih jel hi; ajiahchu bangchi banga haamtei diing i hiai chih i he sih a; hizongleh Hagau in thuumna soi guallouhin ahung ngetsah zing hi.
Huleh Pathian deihzawng banga misiangthoute diinga a ngetsah jiahin, amah lungtang entu in Hagau deihzawng bang ahiai chih a he hi.
Huleh Pathian lungsiatte, ama’n a guat banga a kouhte diingin, sil zousiah in a hoihna diingun a tongkhawm chiat hi chih i he hi.
Ajiahchu a heetlawhte chu amah tapa banga um diingin a guatlawh a; a tapa chu unau tampite laha ta masapen ahung hihtheihna diingin.
Huleh a guatlawhte chu kouh zong a kou a; huleh a kouhte chu siam a tangsah a; huleh siam a tansahte chu a paahtawi hi.
Ahihleh hi thute ah bang i soita diai? Pathian i lama apan leh, kua’n ahiai hung dou thei diing?
Amah tapa ngei zong hawi loua, i bawnva diing a hung pepa in bang diingin sil zousiah a thawnin amah toh ahung pekhawm lou diai?
Pathian miteelte kua’n ahiai heeh diing? Siamtangsahtu Pathian ahi ngal a.
Kua’n ahiai siamlouh tangsah diing? A si chu Khrist ahi ngal a; ahi, thou kiit zawta a, Pathian jiatlama um a, hung ngetsahtu zong ahi.

Khrist lungsiatna a kipan kua’n ahiai hung khen diing? gimthuaahna in ahiai, lungngaihna in ahiai, gawtna in ahiai, kialin ahiai, saguahna in ahiai, lauhuaina in ahiai, namsaau in ahiai hung khen diing?
Nangmah jiahin nitum in thahin ka um uh; goh diing belaamte banga ngaih ka hi uh, chia gelh bangin.
Khenlou hial diing; hite zousiah ah ahung lungsiattu jalin gualzoute sanga tungtuang zaw i hi uhi.
Ajiahchu sihna aha, hinna aha, angelte aha, lalnate aha, silbawltheihnate aha, sil um zingte aha, sil hung um diingte aha,
Saanna aha, thuuhna aha, ahihlouhleh silsiam dang mawngmawng in zong i Lalpa uh Khrist Jesu a um Pathian lungsiatna a kipan ahung khen thei sih diing chih dihtahin ka he hi.
Khrist ah thutah ka soi ahi, ka zuau sih, Hagau Siangthou jiahin ka sialepha heetna in zong ahung heetpih hi.
Ka lungtangah hahsatna nasatah leh lungngaihna daai thei lou ka nei hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh ka unaute, tahsalama ka chipihte luang in keimah Khrist kawm apat bawltuam khopa haamse thuaahin um leng ka chi hi.
Israelmi ahi ngal va; ta hihnate, loupinate, thuhunte, daanthu piahnate, Pathian natohnate leh thuchiamte bang amahuh neih ahi a;
Pulepate amahuh a ahi a, huleh tahsalam thu ah Khrist zong amahuh laha kipana hung pawt ahi; amah chu sil zousiah tunga um, kumtuanga paahtawi taah Pathian ahi. Amen.
Hizongleh Pathian thu bangmahlou banga umta ahi sih hi. Ajiahchu Israel haahte a bawnun Israel mi ahi veh sih uhi.
Abraham haahte ahih jiahun zong a bawnun tate ahi veh tuan sih uh; Isaak ah na haah a kichi diing, chih ahi zaw hi.
Huchu, tahsa tate chu Pathian tate ahi sih va; hizongleh thuchiam tate chu Abraham haah a ngaih ahi zaw uh chihna ahi.
Ajiahchu thuchiam hikhu ahi, Tubang hunin ka hung diing a, Sarah in tapa a nei diing, chih.
Huleh hu chauh ahi sih; hizongleh Rebekah in zong, mi khat, i pu uh Isaak laha nau a paai laiin;
Naupangte chu piang nailou in, silhoih leh silsia zong bawl nailou in, teel lam thu a Pathian thuguat a det theihna diingin, silbawl jiah hi lou a, a koutu deih jiah hizaw in;
A kawmah, A upazaw in a naupangzaw nna a tohsah diing, Pathian in a chi hi.
Jakob ka lungsiat a, himahleh Esau chu ka mudah hi, chih gelh bangin.
Ahihleh bang i soita diai? Pathian ah dihtatlouhna a um a adiai? Um lou hial.
Ajiahchu ama’n Mosi kawmah, Ka khotuah ut photmah ka khotuah diing a, huleh ka lungsiat ut photmah ka lungsiat diing, chi'n ana soita hi.
Huchi'n a deihpa jiahin ahi sih a, a taipa jiahin zong ahi diah sih, hizongleh a khotuahtu Pathian jiahin ahi zaw hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian lehkhathu in Pharaoh kawmah, Hi jiahtahin ka hung tungding a, nangmaha ka silbawltheihna ka etsah theihna diing leh, leitung pumpia ka min a than theihna diingin, a chi hi.
Hujiahin Pathian in a ut photmah a khotuah a, a ut photmah zong a soihahsah veu hi.
Nang in ka kawmah, Bang diinga ama’n i dih louhna hung kawh ahiai? A deihzawng kua’n a kalh ei? na chi ahi diing.
Hilou, hizongleh Aw mihing, nang Pathian dawng vialtu koi na hiai? Silsia min a siamtu kawmah, Bang diinga hitobanga hung siam na hiai, a chi diai mah?
Beel kheengtu in beelleitang khat apat beel khat deihum tah a kheeng diing leh, beel khat thulimlou tah a kheeng diing in, beelleitang tungah thu a nei sih eimah?
Huleh lungthahna beel, mangthai taahte tungah Pathian in a lungthahna leh a silbawltheihna latsah ut a a thuaahzoh haamhaam leh bang a khawh diai?
Huleh khotuahna beel, loupina tang diing a malai apat ana guatlawhte tunga a loupina hauhdan a suhlat theihna diingin.
Hu khotuahna beelte chu, Judate lah chauh a kipan hilouin, Jentelte laha kipana zong kouhte, eihaw na chiang i hi uhi.
Hosea lehkhabu a, Ka mi hi ngeiloute chu ka mite ka chi diing a, lungsiat ngei louhnu zong lungsiat nu ka chi diing.
Huleh hichi ahung hi diing a, a kawmvah, Ka mite na hi sih uh, chih a umna ngei ah, Pathian hing tate vuahin a um diing uh, ana chih bangin.
Huleh Isaiah in zong Israelte tungtaang thu ana taangkoupih a, Israelte zaw tui khang lian sehneel bangin tam zongleh uh, a gawt mawh chauh hutdam in a um diing uh;
Ajiahchu Lalpa’n leitung a natoh tomkhat a bawl diing jiahin ama’n hu natoh chu a zou diing a, huleh dihtatna in a sutom diing hi.
Huleh Isaiah mahin, Mipite Lalpa’n chi haahtu diing hung na hawisahlou hileh Sodom khua bangin i umta diing a, huleh Gommorrah banga bawl in i umta diing uhi, chia ana soilawh bangin.
Ahihleh bang i soita diai? Dihtatna delhlou Jentelte’n dihtatna a phata uh ahi, ginna jiaha dihtatna chu.
Hizongleh dihtatna daan delh Israelte’n hu dihtatna chu a phazouta sih uhi.
Bang achih jiahin ahiai? Ginna in a delh sih va, daan silbawl a muhtheih banga a delh jiahun ahi. Ajiahchu puuhna suang ah a puuhta uhi.
Ngai in, Zion ah puuhna suang leh daalna suangpi ka koih hi; koipouh amah gingta chu a zahtasah sih diing hi, chia gelh bangin.
Unaute, Israelte diinga ka lungtang deihpen leh Pathian kawma ka haamteina pen chu, hutdama ahung um theihna diing uh ahi.
Ajiahchu Pathian lamah phatuamngaihna a nei uh chih ka heetpih hi, ahihvangin heetna dungjuiin chu ahi sih uh.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Pathian dihtatna he lou in, amahuh dihtatna suhkip tum in, Pathian dihtatna ah a kituluut nuam sih uhi.
Ajiahchu a gingta photmahte diingin Khrist chu dihtatna muhna diingin daan suhtawpna ahi.
Ajiahchu Mosi in, daan a dihtatna juitu chu hu dihtatna in a hing diing, chih a gial hi.
Hizongleh ginna a dihtatna in chu hichi'n a chih hi, Na lungsim in, Vaan ah koi a kaltou diai? (huchu, tunglam apat Khrist puikhiah diing chihna ahi; )
Ahihlouhleh, Lei nuaiah koi a kumsuh diai? (huchu, misi lah apat Khrist puidoh diing, chihna ahi;) chi sin, chi in.
Hizongleh bang ahiai a soi? Thu in ahung naih hi, na kam leh na lungtang ah a um hi; huchu ginna thu ka soi uh chu ahi.
Na kama Jesu chu Lalpa ahi chia na phuan a, misi laha kipan Pathian in a kaithou chih na lungtang a na gintaat leh hutdam in na um diing hi, chih.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh mi’n lungtang in a gingta va, dihtatna a mu veu uh; huleh ka min a phuang va, hutdamna a tang veu uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian lehkhathu in, Koipouh amah gingta chu a zahtasah sih diing, a chih hi.
Ajiahchu Judate leh Grikte kilimdanna bangmah a um sih hi; a bawnva tunga Lalpa chu khat ahi a, huleh amah kou zousiahte tungah hoihna a hau hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Lalpa min kou photmah chu hutdam in a um diing uhi.
Ahihleh a gintaat louhpi uh bangchi’n a min a kou diviai? huleh a thu a jah louhpi uh bangchi’n a gingta diviai? huleh a soitu um louin bangchi’n a ja diviai?
Huleh sawl ahih louh uleh bangchi’n thu a soi diviai? Ha muanna tanchinpha leh, silhoih kipaahhuai hung utte keeng kilawm hina e! chia gelh bangin.
Hizongleh tanchinpha a bawnun a ngaikhe sih uhi. Ajiahchu Isaiah in, Lalpa ka thusoi uh kua’n ahiai gingta? ana chi hi.
Huchi'n ginna chu jahna jiahin ahung um a, huleh jahna chu Pathian thu jiahin ahung um hi.
Hizongleh ka chi ahi, Israelte’n a ja sih va ahiai mah? Ja tham e, a thawm uh leitung pumpi ah a thangsuaah a, a thu uh kawlmong tandongin a thangta hi.
Hizongleh ka chi ahi, Israelte’n a he sih va ahiai mah? A masapenin Mosi in, Nam a soi thamlouhte zangin ka hung thangsesah diing a, huleh nam ngolte zangin ka hung sulungthah diing hi, ana chi hi.
Huleh Isaiah in, haangsantahin, Ahung hawlloute kawmah muhdohin ka um a; ahung kouloute kawmah suhlatin ka umta hi, a chi hi.
Hizongleh Israelte kawmah chu, Mi thumangloute leh nialhaatte diingin suun nitum in ka baan ka jah hi, chi'n a soi hi.
Ahihleh Pathian in a mite paaikheta ahiai mah? Paaikhe lou hial. Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh kei zong Israelmi, Abraham haah, Benjamin phung a mi ka hi.
Pathian in a mi a heetlawhte a paaikhe sih hi. Pathian lehkhathu in, Elijah thu a soi na he sih viai mah? Ama’n Israelte tung thu Pathian kawmah a tut a,
Lalpa na zawlneite a that va, na maitaamte a suchim va; huleh keimah tangin ka um a, kei zong thah ahung tum uhi, chi'n.
Hizongleh Pathian in a dawnna’n bangchi’n a soi ei? Baal lim ma a khupdin ngei lou mi saang sagih keimah diingin ka kikoihheh hi, chih a dawng hi.
Hutobangin tulaiin zong hehpihna a teel dungjuiin paihmawh honkhat a um nalai hi.

Huleh hehpihna jiah ahih inchu, natoh jiah ahita sih hi; huchilou in chu hehpihna chu hehpihna ahita sih diing hi. Hizongleh natoh jiah ahih inchu, hehpihna ahita sih diing; huchilou inchu natoh zong natoh ahita sih diing hi.
Ahihleh bangchi ahita diai? Israelte’n a hawl uh a mu sih va, hizongleh teelte’n chu a mu uh; a dang zousiah chu suhtawt in a umta uhi.
Pathian in tuni dongin a kawmvah lusuhna hagau a pia a, a muhtheihlouhna diing uh mitte leh, a jah theihlouhna diing uh bilte toh, chih gelh bangin.
Huleh David in, A dohkaan uh chu amahuh diingin thaang leh, pial leh, puuhna leh, phubalahna hung hi heh;
A muhtheihlouhna diingun a mitte uh hung mial henla, huleh nangma’n a nunguh kuunsah zingin, a chih hi.
Ahihleh ka chi ahi, A kisuih uh a puuhdenna diinguh ahiai mah? Hilou hial. Hizongleh a puuh jiahun amahuh thangsiatsahna diingin Jentelte kawmah hutdamna ahung tung zawta hi.
Huleh a puuh uh bawn khovel suhhauhsatna ahih a, huleh a kiamna uh zong Jentelte hauhsatna ahih inchu, a buchinna uh bangchi phet a hauhsatna ahita diai mah?
Hizongleh nanguh Jentelte kawmah ka soi ahi, kei Jentelte sawlleh ka hih jiahin ka natohna ka paahtawi hi.
Bangchizawng ahakhat a ka chipihte ka thangsiatsah a, a lahva khenkhatte beeh ka hutdam theih khaah leh chi'n.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh amahuh paihkhiahna bawn khovel toh kituah kiitna ahihleh, amahuh deihkiitna chu sihna apat hinkiitna loungal bang ahi diai?
Ajiahchu a gah masa a sianthou inchu a lawmpi zong huchimahbangin a siangthou hi; huleh a zung a sianthou inchu a bate zong huchimahbangin a siangthou hi.
Huleh a ba khenkhatte suhtana a um a, nang, olive tahlou a lahva phuhluut a na um leh, olive singa hoihna kikoppih na hih jiahin,
Ba dangte tungah kiuangsah sin. Kiuangsah zonglechin a zung tawmtu nangmah na hi sih a, a zung chu nang hung tawmtu ahi zaw hi.
Ahihleh nangin, Phuhluut a ka um theihna diingin bate suhtana um ahi, na chi ahi diing.
Ahi, a gintaat louh jiahun ahi suhtana a um uh, huleh nang na ginna jiahin na diing ahi. Kiuangsah sinla, lau zaw in.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Pathian in ba tahte bawn a hawi louh inchu, nang zong ahung hawi tuam sih diing hi.
Hujiahin Pathian hoihdan leh thukhauhdan en in: a puuhte tungah a thukhauh ahi; nang lamah chu a hoih ahi, a hoihna a na um zing leh; huchi ahih louh inchu nang zong saatkhiahin na um ve diing hi.
Huleh amah u’zong gingta loua a um zing louh unchu, phuhluut in a um diing uhi; ajiahchu Pathian in amahuh a phutluut thei hi.
Ajiahchu nang, piandan a olive tahlou apat saatkhiah bawn piandan louh a olive sing hoih a phuhluut a na um leh; hi ba tahte chu amahuh olive sing ngei ah phuhluut in naah umsem na unchia?

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh unaute, na kipilsah louhna diingun, hi thuguuh, Jentelte bukimna ahung tun tokalin Israelte tungah heetsiamlouhna hunkhop chiang ahung tung tadih ahi, chih na heet louh uh ka deih sih hi.
Huchi'n Israel mi zousiah hutdam in a um diing uhi; Zion akipanin Hundampa ahung diing a, Jakob akipat Pathian ngaihsahlouhna a sumang diing hi.
Ajiahchu, A sualnate uh ka laahmang tahchianga a kawmva ka thuhun diing chu hikhu ahi, chih gelh bangin.
Tanchinpha lam ngaihtuahin chu nanguh jiahin meelma ahi va; hizongleh teel thu lam ngaihtuahin chu pulepate jiahin deihtahte ahi uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian in a silthawnpiah ah leh a kouhna ah lungsim a kheel ngei sih hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh nidang laiin Pathian na gingta sih va; hizongleh tuin chu amahuh awi louh jiahin khotuahna na muta uhi.
Hutobangmahin nanguh ahung khotuahna jala khotuahna a muh theihna diingun, tuin hite’n zong gingta lou ahita uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian in a khotuah veh theihna diingin, mi zousiah chu thumanlouhna nuaiah a khum vehta hi.
Aw Pathian pilna leh heetna thuuh hina lawmlawm e! A vaihawmnate bawl guallouh leh, a lampite muh guallouh hina meijen e!
Ajiahchu Lalpa lungsim kua’n ahiai he? Ahihlouhleh kua ahiai amah lemguatpihtu a pang ngei?
Ahihlouhleh a dit kiit diing a zong kua’n ahiai a kawma sil pe masa phot?
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh amaha kipan leh, amah jalin leh, amah diinga sil zousiah um ahi; amah kawmah kumtuang in loupina um hen. Amen.
Hujiahin unaute, Pathian kawma na sapum uh kithoihna hing leh, siangthou leh, pomtaah hi diing a kilaan diingin Pathian khotuahna jiahin ka hung ngen hi, huchu na natoh diing va kilawm him ahi.
Hi khovel daan bangin um sih unla; himahleh Pathian deihzawng hoih leh, kipaahpih taah leh, hoih bukim bang ahiai chih na heetchian theihna diingun na lungsim uh a thah a um in hung limdang zawta un.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh ka kawma hung kipia hehpihna jalin, na lahva mi koimah in a kingaihsang diing huntawh val a kingaisang lou in, himahleh Pathian in mi chin kawma ginna a piah hun bang jel a dihtaha ngaihtuah zaw diingin ka chi ahi.
Ajiahchu sapumkhat a hiang tampi i neih a, huleh hiang zousiah natoh a kibat veh louh bangmahin;
Eihaw tampi hizong lehang Khrist ah sapumkhat i hi a; khat leh khat i kihiangtuah chiat uhi.
I kawma hehpihna hung kipia dungjuiin silthawnpiah tuamtuam i nei chiat a, thusoi diing ahihleh i ginna u’toh kihunin i soi diing uh;
Thunatoh diing ahihleh i tong diing uh a; thuhilhtu in zong hilh jel heh.
Hasottu in zong hasot jel henla; sil petu in it hetlouin pia heh; vaihawmtu in taimatahin hawm heh; mi khotuahtu in kipaahtahin khotuah heh.
Lungsiatna chu heembawlna tel louin hi heh; Gilou photmah hua unla, hoihlam photmah tu tinten un.
Unau kilungsiatna in khat leh khat kilainattuah chiat unla; kizahbawlna lamah kideihsahtuah chiat un;
Taimaah lamah thase sih unla; hagaulamah phatuamngai un; Lalpa nna tong in.
Kinepna a kipaah zingin; gimthuaahna ah hahkat un; haamteina a kuhkal zingin;
Misiangthoute taahsapna awng huhsah unla; mikhualte kipaahpih zing un.
Ahung gawtte vangpiah un; vangpiah unla, haamsiat sih un.
Kipaahte kipaahpih unla, kapte kahpih un.
Khat leh khat ngaihtuah kibangin um un. Sil saang talua ngaihtuah sih unla, mi neu tata toh kilawizaw un. Kipilsah sih un.
Koimah giitlouh giitlouhin thuh sih un. Mi zousiah mitmuh ah sil kilawm bawl diing tum un.
Ahihtheih inchu, na thu va ahihtheih laisiah mi zousiah toh kituaahin um un.
Unau deihtahte, phuba kila sih un, himahleh lungthahna chu Pathian ot zaw un; ajiahchu hichibanga gelh ahi, Phubalaah mawngmawng keimah a ahi; keima’n ka thuh na diing, Lalpa’n a chi hi, chih.
Hujiahin na meelma a gilkial leh neeh diing pia in; a dangtaah leh dawn diing pia in; ajiahchu huchibanga na bawl leh a lu tungah mei-am na sekhawm ahi diing hi.
Gilou zohin um sih unla, hoihna in gilou zou zaw un.
Mi chin a tunga vaihawmtute thuthu in um heh. Ajiahchu Pathian thu louin koimah vaihawm a um sih hi; vaihawmtu a umte chu Pathian guat ahi uhi.
Hujiahin koipouh vaihawmtu nial chu Pathian silguat doudaal ahi uhi; huleh a doudaaltute’n amahuh tungah siamlouhtansahna a mu diing uhi.
Vaaihawmtute chu silhoih bawlte diingin lauhuai ahi sih va, hizongleh migiloute diingin lauhuai ahi uhi. Ahihleh vaihawmtu lau lou a um na ut ei? Sil hoih bawl in, huchi’n a paahtaat na loh diing hi.

Ajiahchu amah hi na hoihna diing a Pathian natongtu ahi. Hizongleh sil gilou na bawl inchu lau in; ajiahchu ama’n a namsaau a mawh tawi sih hi; amah chu Pathian natongtu, sil gilou bawlte tunga lungthahna phubalatu ahi.
Hujiahin lungthahna lau jiah chauh hilouin, na sialepha heetna jiahin zong vaihawmtu thuthu a na um diing mawng ahi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh hikhu jiahin leiman zong na pia uh ahi; amahuh chu hi sil ngei bawl diing a Pathian natongtu ahi uhi.

Hujiahin mi zousiah kawmah a tan diing lawm uh pia un; leiman piahna diingpa kawmah leiman pia unla; siah tawina diingpa kawmah siah tawi un; lau diingpa chu lau unla; zahbawl diing a umpa chu zahbawl un.
Kilungsiattuahna loungal chu koimah bangmah ba sih un; ajiahchu amah midang lungsiatpa in daan a juikim veh ahi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh hi thute, aang na kawm louh diing ahi, Tual na thah louh diing ahi, Na guuh louh diing ahi; Heetpihtu dihloua na pan louh diing ahi, Na een louh diing ahi; chin leh, hulou thupiah dang mawngmawng a um leh, hute chu, Nangmah na kilungsiat banga na innveengte na lungsiat diing ahi, chihin a khaikhawm veh hi.
Lungsiatna in a innveengte a bawlse sih a; hujiahin lungsiatna chu daan juihkimna ahi.
Huchiangleh zong i gintaat chiil lai sanga tu a i hutdamna a naizawh taah jiahin, tuin chu ihmu khanloh a hun mahmahta chin hun umdan na he uhi.
Jan a bei dehdehta a, khua vaah diing ahita hi; hujiahin mial a silbawlte paai in vaah thuam in i kithuam diing uhi,
Suuna um bangin dihtahin i um diingun; huhel leh zukham buai a um louin, huuh leh kingaihhaat a um louin, huleh kihau leh kithangsiat a um louin.
Lalpa Jesu Khrist in kithuam unla, na tahsa uh utna supiching diingin bangmah kibawl sih un.
Ginna a haat lou mi chu, a ginlahnate soisel lou in ngai un.
Mi khat in bangkim ne theiin a kigingta a; mi haat louin chu antehlouhing chauh a ne hi.
A nete’n a neloute simmoh sih henla; huleh a neloute’n zong a nete soisel sih heh; Ajiahchu Pathian in amah a kipaahpihta hi.
Midang suaah soiseltu nang koi na hiai? a din leh a puuh a pu a diing ahi. Ahi, amah chu dinsah in a um diing hi; ajiahchu Pathian in amah a dingsah thei hi.
Mi khat in ni khat chu ni dang sangin a ngai poimoh tuam a, midangin ni tengteng kibang chiatin a ngai hi. Mi chin amahuh lungsim chiat ah kihechian u’heh.

Ni tangtu in Lalpa ah a tang a; huleh ni tangloutu in Lalpa ah a tanglou ahi. Bangkim netu in Pathian kawma kipaahthu a soi jiahin Lalpa ah a ne a; huleh a ne loutu in zong Pathian kawma kipaahthu soi in a ne lou ahi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh koimah ei a diing a hing i hi sih a, huleh koimah ei a diing a si zong i hi sih uhi.
Ajiahchu i hin, leh Lalpa a diingin i hing a; i sih, inzong Lalpa a diingin i si uh ahi; hujiahin i hin inzong, i sih inzong, Lalpa a i hi uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh misite leh mihingte Lalpa ahihtheihna diingin Khrist chu a si a, a thou kiit a, huleh suhhing in a um ahi.
Hizongleh nang bang diinga na unau soisel na hiai? ahihlouhleh nang bang diinga na unau simmoh na hiai? Ajiahchu i bawnva Khrist vaihawmna touphah mai a ding diing i hi uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Lalpa’n, Mi zousiah ka ma ah a kuun diing a, lei chinteng zong Pathian kawmah a kiphuang diing uh, chi'n ka chiam hi, a chi; chin gelh ahi.
Huchi'n i bawnun Pathian kawmah eimah tanchin chiat i soi diing uhi.
Hujiahin khat leh khat i kisoisel nawn sih diing a, hizongleh koipouh in a unau kisuihna diing aha, ahihlouhleh kipuuhna diing bangmah bawl louhna diing ngaihtuah zaw hen.
Sil amaha sianglou mawngmawng a um sih chih, Lalpa ah ka hechian a ka tahsang mahmah hi; hizongleh bang khat sianglou a ngaitu diingin, huchu amah diingin sianglou ahi.
Hizongleh na bangkhat neeh jiaha na unau lungsim a nat inchu lungsiatna daan in na gamta lou ahi. A sih luang a Khrist in a sihsahpa chu na bangkhat neehin sumang sin.
Huchi'n na hoihna uh chu gilou a soi in um sih hen.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Pathian gam chu neeh leh dawn thu ahi sih a; himahleh dihtatnate, kilepnate, huleh Hagau Siangthou a kipaahna bang ahi zaw hi.
Hujiahin koipouh hi silte a Khrist natong chu Pathian kipaahpih leh, mihing paahtaat in a um veu uhi.
Hujiahin kilepna diing leh, kisuhhaattuahna diing silte i delh diing uhi.
Na bangkhat neehin Pathian natoh suse sin. Sil zousiah chu a siangthou ngei ahi; hizongleh a bangkhat neeh jiaha mi a lungnopmoh inchu, a netu diingin gilou ahi.
Na unau puuhna diing aha, ahihlouhleh lunghihmohna diing aha, ahihlouhleh suhzawngkhalna diing ana hihin chu sa neeh louhte, uain dawn louhte, huleh sil bangmah bawl louh a hoih hi.
Ginna na nei maw? Pathian ma ah nangmah chauhin kineih in. Amah hoihsah lama siamlouh kitangsahlou mi chu a hampha hi.
Huleh gingleltu in a neeh inchu ginna a neeh louh jiahin siamlouh tangin a um hi; ajiahchu ginna lou a bawl photmah chu sual ahi.
Huchi'n ei a haatte’n eimah nopna diing hawl louin, a haatloute haat louhna i thuaahpih diing uh ahi.
Mi chinin i innveengte khantouhna diing a, a hoihna diingun i sulungkim diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Khrist in zong amah nopna diing a ngaihtuah sih a, hizongleh, Ahung taite taina chu ka tungah a tuta hi, chia gelh bangin ahi zaw.
Ajiahchu malaia ana kigial photmah chu, Pathian lehkhathu a kuhkalna leh hamuanna jala eite’n kinepna i neihtheihna diing a eiuh kihilhna diing a gelh ahi.
Huchi'n kuhkalna leh hamuanna Pathian in Khrist Jesu mahbangin khat leh khat lungsim kibang nei in hung umsah hen;
Pathian; i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pa ngei chu lungsim munkhat pua leh aw khat suah a na paahtawi theihna diingun.
Huchihjiahin Khrist in zong Pathian loupina diing a ahung kipaahpih mah bangin khat leh khat kipaahta chiat un.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh, pulepate kawma thuchiamte sukip diingin Khrist chu Pathian thudih heetsahna diingin zehtante thunatongtu ahung hita hi chitu ka soi ahi.
A khotuahna jiaha Jentelte’n Pathian a paahtawi theihna diingun; Hikhu jiahin Jentelte lahah ka hung paahtawi diing a, na min phatin la ka sa diing hi, chih gelh bangin.
Huleh, Nanguh Jentelte, ka mite toh kipaah un, a chikiit a.
Huleh, Nanguh Jentelte zousiah, Lalpa chu paahtawi un; mi zousiah in zong amah phat un, a chi kiit a.
Huleh Isaiah in, Jesse zungjam a um diing a, Jentelte tunga vaihawm diing a hung diingpa a um diing; amah chu Jentelte’n a kineppih diing uh, a chikiit hi.
Hagau Siangthou silbawltheihna jiaha kinepna na hauh theihna diingun kinepna Pathian in ginna a kipaahna leh hamuanna chintengin hung sudim hen.
Huleh ka unaute, nanguh chu hoihna in na dim va, pilna kim nei in na kihasuantuah thei uh chih kei mahmah in zong ka he hi:
Ahihvangin unaute, Pathian in ahung piah hehpihna jiahin nanguh hung heetdoh sahna tobangin a kal lahlah ah haangsantahin ka gial ahi.
Jentelte kawmah Jesu Khrist thunatongtu ka hihtheihna diing leh, ka Jentel latte Hagau Siangthou a suhsiangthou ahih va, kipaahpih taah ahihtheihna diingun Pathian tanchinpha nna ka tong hi.
Hujiahin Pathian lam silte ah Jesu Khrist ah kiloupisahna diing ka nei ahi.
Ajiahchu Khrist in Jentelte thuawisah diing a thusoi leh natoha keimah zanga a silbawlte loungal bangmah ka soi ngam sih hi,
Chiamchihna leh silmahte in Pathian Hagau silbawltheihna in; huchi'n Jerusalem khua leh a kimvel gam a kipan Illirikam gam tanphain Khrist tanchinpha kimtahin ka soi zouta hi.
Ahi, midang innbulphuhsa tunga inn bawl ka hih louhna diingin, tanchinpha chu Khrist min kilohnasa mun a soi louin;
Himahleh a tanchin soi ngei louhnate’n a mu diing a; a ja ngeiloute’n ahung he diing uh, chih gelh bangin soi ka tum zaw hi.
Hukhu jiahin na kawmva hung diing tampi vei daal in ka umta hi.
Hizongleh tuin chu hi gam kimvel ah mun ka neita sih a, huleh kum tampi na kawmva hung nuamin zong ka umta hi.

Spain gam a ka chiah hunhun chu na kawmvah ka hung diing hi; ajiahchu ka zinna a nanguh hung muh leh, nanguh hung kithuahpih chim phot leng, hu lam ka chiahna ah nangun na hung haah u’zong ka kinem hi.
Hizongleh tuin chu misiangthoute natohsah diingin Jerusalem a chiah phot diing ka hi.
Ajiahchu Makedonia leh Akaia gam a mite’n Jerusalem khua a misiangthoute laha tagahte a diing a sum thohkhawm pha a sata uhi.
Ahi, lungkimtahin ahih uhi, huleh a leiba uh zong ahi mawng uhi. Ajiahchu Jentelte’n a hagaulam silte uh a kikoppih ngal unchu, tahsalam silte a amah uh a panpih ve uh chu ahih diing mawng uh ahi.
Hujiahin hi ka bawl zoh a, gah zong chiantaha ka muhsah zoh chiangin nanguh hung tawnin Spain gam ah ka chiah diing hi.
Huleh na kawmva ka hung chiangin Khrist tanchinpha vangpiahna kim toh ka hung diing chih ka he hi.
Huchi'n unaute, Pathian kawma na hung haamteisahna vah chihtahzeta hung thuaahpih diingin Lalpa Jesu Khrist min leh Hagau Siangthou lungsiatna in ka hung ngen hi.
Judia gam a gingloute laha ka suahtaat theihna diing leh, Jerusalem khua a diing a ka natohna hi misiangthoute kipaahna zawng ahihtheihna diingin;
Pathian deihzawng bang a, kipaahtaha na kawmva ka hunga, i kisuhhalhkhawm chiat theihna diingun.
Ha muanna Pathian na bawnva kawmah um hen. Amen.
Kenkria khua a kouhtuam natongtu, i sanggamnu uh Phoibi na kawmvah ka hung meelheetsah hi;
Lalpa mina misiangthoute bangmaha nana pom va, na panpih uh a ngaihna photmaha na panpih diingun; ajiahchu ama’n zong mi tampi ana panpihta a, keimah ngei zong ahung panpihta hi.
Khrist Jesu a hung panpihte Prisilla leh Akuila chibai hung buuhsah un.
Amahun ka hinna a diingin a ngawng uh a dohta uh a; amahuh tung chauh ah hilouin, Jentel kouhtuam zousiahte tungah zong kipaahthu ka soi hi.
Huchimahbangin a inn va kouhtuam kikhawmte zong chibai hung buuhsah un. Akaia gam a Khrist a gah masapen, ka deihtah Epainita chibai hung buuhsah un.
Na lahva tonggim Mari chibai hung buuhsah un.
Ka chipihte laha ka koltaanpih, sawlleh laha minthangtah, Khrist a zong kei sanga um masazaw Andronika leh Junia chibai hung buuhsah un.
Lalpa a ka deihtah Amphlia chibai hung buuhsah un.
Khrist a i natohpih Urba ne leh, ka deihtah Staki chibai hung buuhsah un.
Khrist a mi tahzet Apelli chibai hung buuhsah un. Aristobala innkuana mite chibai hung buuhsah un.
Ka chipih Herodion chibai hung buuhsah un. Lalpa a um Narkissa innkuan a mite chibai hung buuhsah un.
Lalpa a natong, Triphena leh Triphosa chibai hung buuhsah un. Lalpa a na hahtoh mahmah, deihtah Persi chibai hung buuhsah un.
Lalpa a teel, Rufa leh a nu, kei nu zong hive, chibai hung buuhsah un.
Asinkrita, Phligon, Herma, Patroba, Hermi, huleh a kawmva um unaute chibai hung buuhsah un.
Philologa leh Julia, Neria leh a sanggamnu, huleh Olimpa leh a kawmva misiangthou umte zousiah chibai hung buuhsah un.
Tawp siangthou in chibai kibuuhtuah un. Khrist kouhtuamte’n chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Huleh unaute, kihilhna daan nanguh hung kihilh louh zawng a kikhenna leh puuhna siamdohtute meelchih diing leh kiheisan diingin ka hung ngen hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh hutobang mite’n i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist nna a tong sih va, amahuh gilpi nna a tong zaw uhi; huleh kampha leh kamsia min mimawlte lungsim a heem veu uhi.
Ajiahchu na thumandan uh mizousiah lahah a kithangta a; hujiahin na tungvah ka kipaah hi; hizongleh silhoih lama na pil va, silgilou lama na mawl uh ka deih hi.
Huleh hamuanna Pathian in Setan chu tomkal louin na keeng nuaivah ahung tuandeensah diing hi. I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na tungvah um hen. Amen.
Ka natohpih Timothi leh ka chipihte Lusia, Jason, huleh Sosipater in chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Keimah Tertia, Hi lehkhathot gialpa in Lalpa minin chibai ka hung buuh hi.
Gaia, kei leh kouhtuam zousiah zintunna pa in chibai ahung buuh hi. Khosung sumkoltu Erasta leh unaupa Kuarta in chibai ahung buuh uhi.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na bawnva tungah um hen. Amen.
Tuin amah, ka tanchinpha leh Jesu Khrist thu kitaangkoupihna banga, thuguuh kiphual kiphuandohna dungjui a, hu thuguuh kiphual chu khovel siam chiil akipana phual a um,
Hizongleh tua kumtuang Pathian thupiah dungjuia zawlneite lehkhathu in, ginna thumanna diinga nam zousiah kawma a suhlat leh heetsaha um dungjui a nanguh hung sukip theipa,
Pathian pil chauh kawmah, Jesu Khrist jalin kumtuang in loupina um hen. Amen.
Paul, Pathian deihna jala Jesu Khrist sawlleh diing a kouh leh, i unaupa uh Sostheni in,
Korinth khua a Pathian kouhtuam umte, Khrist Jesu a suhsiang, misiangthou diing a kouhte kawmah, gam china i Lalpa (amahuh leh eite Lalpa) Jesu Khrist min lou zousiah kawmah toh;
I Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawma kipan, hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Jesu Khrist a Pathian hehpihna na kawmva kipia jiahin na tung thu vah Pathian ka paahtawi zing hi;
Silbangkim ah thusoi theihna chinteng leh, heetna chinteng ah amah vangin suhhauhsat in na um uhi.
Huchibangin Khrist thu heetsahna chu nanguh ah suhkip ahita hi.
Huchi'n silpiah mawngmawng ah na lohsapna uh um lou in; i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hung kiitna diing ngaah a um zing na hi uhi.
Ama’n i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist ni chianga soiselbei a na um theihna diingun a tawp dongin zong ahung sukip diing hi.
Pathian chu a muanhuai hi, ama’n a Tapa Jesu Khrist i Lalpa uh kipawlkhawmna ah nanguh ahung kou luutta hi.

Huleh unaute, na bawnva thu khat na soi va, huleh na lahva kikhenna mawngmawng a um louhna diingin lungsim kikhat leh ngaihtuahna kibang a hoihtah a na kizop zawhna diingun Lalpa Jesu Khrist minin ka hung ngen hi.
Ajiahchu ka unaute, na lahvah kikhinna a um chih na tungtaang thu uh Kloe innkuanpihte soina ah ka ja hi.
Ka soi chu hikhu ahi, nanguh michin in, Kei chu Paul lawi ka hi; kei Apollo lawi ka hi; kei Kipha lawi ka hi; huleh kei Khrist lawi ka hi, na chi uhi.
Khrist hawmkhen in a um eimah? Paul nanguh diingin kilhbeh in a um eimah? ahihlouhleh Paul minin baptisma na tang viai mah?
Krispa leh Gaia chih louh na lahva khatbeeh ka hung baptis louh jiahin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi hi.
Huchilouin chu keimah mina ka baptis ahi chi a umkha diing uhi.
Huleh Stephana innkuante zong ka baptis a, hute lou chu midang ka baptis lam ka he sih hi.
Ajiahchu Khrist in baptis diingin ahung sawl sih a, tanchinpha soi diingin ahung sawl zaw hi; pilna thu a soi lou in, huchilouin chu Khrist kros bangmahlou a suaahkha diing hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh kros thu chu mangthaite diingin ngolhuai ahi a; hizongleh eiuh hutdam a umte diingin chu Pathian silbawltheih na ahi.
Ajiahchu, Mipil pilna ka suse diing a, lemhetu lemheetna ka sumang diing hi, chih gelh ahi.
Mipil khoi ah ahiai? lehkhagialtu khoi ah ahiai? hi khovela nialhaat mi khoi ah ahiai? Pathian in hi khovel pilna ngolhuai a suaahsah sih eimah?
Ajiahchu Pathian pilna ah, khovel in pilna zanga Pathian a heet louh nungun, thusoi ngolhuai zanga, a gingtate hutdam chu Pathian in pha a sa hi.
Judate’n chiamchihna a ngeeh va, Grikte’n pilna a hawl uh.
Hizongleh eiun chu Khrist kilhbeh thu i soi uhi, huchu Judate diingin puuhna, huleh Grikte diingin ngolna ahi.
Hizongleh Judate hiin, Grikte hitaleh kouhte diingin chu, Khrist chu Pathian silbawltheihna leh Pathian pilna ahi.
Ajiahchu Pathian ngolna mihing sangin a pilzaw a, huleh Pathian haat louhna zong mihing sangin a haatzaw hi.
