Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh unaute, kouh na hihna uh ngaihtuah dihvua, tahsalama mipil tampite, mihaat tampite, mi lian tampite kouh ahih louhdan uh;
Hizongleh Pathian in mipilte a zahtaatsah na diingin khovel sil ngolte a teel zota a; huleh sil haatte a zahtaatsah na diingin khovel sil haatloute a teel zota hi;
Huleh khovel sil sia leh sil muhsithuaite Pathian in a teel a, ahi, sil um lou tanin a teel a, sil umte bangmahlou a suaahsah theihna diingin;
Huchi'n Pathian ma ah kuamah a kiuangsah thei sih diing hi.
Hizongleh nang u’chu amah vangin Khrist Jesu ah na um uhi, amah chu Pathian apat eiuh diing a pilna, dihtatna, suhsiangthouna, huleh tatdohna diing a bawl ahi;
Huchi'n a kigial bangin, A ki suang phot chu Lalpa ah ki suang heh.
Huleh unaute, kei chu na kawmva Pathian thu heetsahna phuang a ka hung laiin thusoi siamna mahmah leh pilna loupitah toh hung ka hi sih hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh ke’n Jesu Khrist leh, amah kilhbeh a um thu chauhlou chu na lahvah bangmah dang heet ka tum sih hi.
Huleh kei chu haatlou leh lau in, nasataha kithing kawmin na lahvah ka um a.
Ka kamsuaahte leh ka thusoite chu mihing pilna a zawlsiamna thu ahi sih a, Hagau leh silbawltheihna a suhlat in ahi zaw hi.
Huchia na ginna uh mihing pilna a kinga loua, Pathian silbawltheihna a, a kingah zawhna diingin.
Ahiinlah pichingte lahah chu pilna thu zong ka soi jel uhi, ahihvangin hi khovel pilna thu ahi sih a, hi khovel vaihawmtu mangthai diingte pilna thu zong ahi sih hi.
Hizongleh kei un chu Pathian pilna thuguuh, i loupina diing a Pathian in khovel um ma a, a guatsa pilna kiphual thu chu ka soi zaw veu uhi.
Huchu hi khovel vaihawmtute mawngmawngin a he sih uh; ajiahchu na he hitaleh uh loupina Lalpa chu ana kilhbeh sih diing uhi.
Hizongleh, Mit a muh ngei louh, bil a jah ngei louh, huleh mihing lungtang a zong luut ngei lou, Pathian in amah lungsiatte diing a, a bawlsah silte chu, chia gelh bangin.
Hizongleh Pathian in hute chu a Hagau in i kawmah ahung hesahta hi; ajiahchu Hagau in bangkim a hawldoh veh a, ahi, Pathian thugilte zong.
Mihing thute mihinga um hagau loungalin kua’n ahiai he diing? huchimahbangin Pathian thute zong Pathian Hagau loungalin kuamah in a he sih hi.
Huchi'n Pathian in a thawn a ahung piah silte i heettheihna diingin, ei unchu khovel hagau hilou in, Pathiana kuan Hagau chu i tang uh ahi.
Hu silte chu mihing pilna thuhilhna thu a soi louin, Hagau Siangthou thuhilh chu soi zaw in, hagaulam thute hagaumite kawm a hilhchianin i soi veu uhi.
Hizongleh khovel mi’n chu Pathian Hagau lam silte a pom thei sih hi, ajiahchu amah ngaihin hute chu ngolhuai ahi; Hagaua heet ahihjiahin he zong a he thei sih hi.
Hizongleh hagau mi’n chu sil zousiah a hechian veu a, amah ahihleh kuama’n a hechian sih hi.
Ajiahchu amah thuhilh thei diing a kua’n ahiai Lalpa lungsim heta? Hizongleh eiun chu Khrist lungsim i pua uhi.
Huleh unaute, hagau mite kawma soi bangin na kawmvah thu ka soi thei sih a, tahsa mite kawma soi bangin, Khrist a naungeehte kawma soi bang giapin ka soi ahi.
An gum hilou in, nawitui in ka hung vaah a; ajiahchu na neeh theih nailouh jiahun, tuin zong na ne thei nai sih uhi.

Ajiahchu nanguh na tahsami nalai uhi; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh na lahva kithangsiatna leh, kinialna leh, kipawlkhenna a um zing jiahin tahsami hi nalaiin, mihing bang a um nalai hilou na hi u'maw?
Ajiahchu, khat in, Kei Paul lawi ka hi; huleh a dang in, Kei Apollo lawi ka hi, na chih laisiah uh tahsa mi hilou na hi viai mah?
Paul koi ahiai? huleh Apollo koi ahiai? amahuh chu nanguh hung gingta sah thunatongtute giap ahi uh, huzong Lalpa’n michin a piah bang jelin ahi.
Keima’n ka suan a, Apollo in tui a buah a; hizongleh Pathian in a khang sah hi.
Huchi'n a suantu zong bangmah ahi sih a, a tuibuahtu zong bangmah ahi sih; a khang sahtu Pathian loungal chu.
Huleh a suantu leh a tuibuahtu chu kibang ahi uh; huleh mi chinin a tohgim bang jel un kipaahman a kimuh chiat diing uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh kei u’chu Pathian toh natongkhawmte ka hi uh; nang u’chu Pathian louma na hi va, Pathian innlam na hi uhi.
Pathian hehpihna kei hung kipia dungjuiin innlamtu piltah bangin ke’n innbulphuh chu ka lemta a, midangin a tungah inn a lam uhi. Hizongleh michin hu a tunga a innlamdan vah pilvaang chiat u’heh.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh innbulphuh lepsa loungal innbulphuh dang kuama’n a lem thei nawn sih uh, huchu Jesu Khrist ahi.
Huleh hi innbulphuh tungah mi koipouh in sana in aha, dangka in aha, suang manta min aha, sing in aha, hampa in aha, buhpawl in aha lam taleh;
Michin natoh chu ahung kisulang diing hi; ajiahchu a ni in a phuangdoh diing hi, mei a sulat hi diing ahihjiahin; huleh mei in mi chin natoh chu bangchi bang ahiai chih a suchian diing hi.
Koi natoh zong hu a tunga a lam chu a um zing leh ama’n kipaahman a mu diing hi.
Koi natoh zong a kaah inchu manna a thuaah diing hi; hizongleh amah tah chu hutdam in a um diing; ahiinlah mei a paisuaah bangin.
Pathian inn na hi va, huleh na sungvah Pathian Hagau a teeng chih he lou na hi viai mah?
Mi koipouh in Pathian inn a suhbolhhoh inchu, amah Pathian in a suse diing hi; ajiahchu Pathian inn chu a siangthou a, hu inn chu nanguh na hi uhi.
Mi koimah amah leh amah kihem sih heh. Na lahva mi koiaha hi khovel a pil a kisah leh ahung pil theihna diingin mingol hung suaah heh.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh hi khovel pilna chu Pathian ngaihin ngolna ahi. Ajiahchu, Ama’n mipilte a pil lepchiahna vah a man hi.
Huleh Lalpa’n mipilte ngaihtuahna chu a thawn ahi, chih a he hi, chih gelh ahi.
Hujiahin mi koimah in mihing suang sih heh. Ajiahchu sil zousiah nanguh a ahi.
Paul hileh, Apollo hileh, Kipha hileh khovel hileh, hinna hileh, sihna hileh, sil um nalaite hileh, sil hung um diingte hileh; sil zousiah nanguh a ahi.
Huleh nanguh chu Khrist a na hi va; huleh Khrist chu Pathian a ahi.
Huchi'n mi’n kei u’chu Khrist thunatongtute leh Pathian thuguuh enkoltute bangin hung he u’heh.
Hi-ah enkoltu hihna a’chu mi ginum hih a poimoh hi.
Hizongleh nangun na hung etkhiah va, mihing ngaihtuahna a na hung etkhiah uh chu kei diingin sil neutakhat ahi; ahi, kei leh kei zong ka kienkhe sih hi.
Ajiahchu keimah in bangmah ka he sih hi; ahi’nla huin siam ka kitangsah ahi tuan sih; hizongleh ahung enkhetu chu Lalpa ahi hi.

Hujiahin a hun ma in, Lalpa hung masiahin, bangmah enkhe sih un, ama’n chu mial a sil kiphualte vaah ah ahung podoh diing a, huleh lungtang a ngaihtuahte zong ahung sulang diing hi; hu hun chiangin michin in Pathian phatna a tang chiat diing uhi.

Huleh unaute, a kigial bang val a koimah ngaihtuah louh diing chih keiuh apat na zil theihna diing uleh, na lahva kuamah in khat suang a khat na uahsah louhna diingun, hi thute chu nanguh vangin Kei leh Apollo etsahna in ka kipia hi.
Ajiahchu kua’n ahiai nang midang apat hung tuamsah? huleh ahung kipe lou bang ahiai na neih? huchi'n mi piah a nei na hih leh, bang diinga a kipe lou banga kisathei na hiai?
Tuin na vahta va, tuin na hausata uh, keiuh louin lal bangin vai na hawmta uhi; kei un zong nang u’toh vai ka hawm ve theihna diingun tahtah a vaihawm hileh u’chin ka ut hi.
Pathian in keiuh sawllehte hi si diing a guatsa bangin a nunungpen a hung koih hiin ka ngaihtuah hi; hujiahin khovel leh, angelte leh, mihingte mitmuh a etnop silin ka um uhi.
Kei u’chu Khrist jiahin mingol ka hi va, nang u’chu Khrist ah mipil na hi uhi; Kei u’chu ka haat sih va, nanguh, chu na haat uhi; nang u’chu na zahum va, kei u’chu simmoh in ka um uhi.
Tu daahkal dongin ka gilkial un ka dangtaah va, saguah in ka um va, mi khutthah nuulna ka hi uh, teenna mumal bei in ka um uhi;
Huleh ka khut va nna tongin ka gim mahmah uh; housiat a ka um un ka vangpiah va; sawih a ka um un ka thuaah teitei uhi.
Soisiat a ka um un ka zawllungdam va; tuni tanin zong khovel niinnoh, sil zousiah bolhhoh bangin bawl in ka um uhi.
Na zahtaatna diingun hi thute ka gial ahi sih a, ka ta deihtahte bangin ka hung hilhkhawl ahi zaw hi.
Ajiahchu nangun Khrist ah hilhtu saang sawm nei zongleh u’chin, pa chu tampi na nei sih uhi; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh tanchinpha jalin Khrist Jesu ah nanguh ka hung hingkhia hi.
Huchihjiahin ka umdan juitute hi diingin ka hung ngen hi.
Hikhu diing jiahin Lalpa a ka ta deihtah leh ginum. Timothi na kawmvah ka hung sawl hi; ama’n chu gam china kouhtuamte ka hilh veu bangin, Khrist a ka umdante nanguh ahung hedohsah kiit diing hi.
Na kawmva hung nawnlou diing banga hung na ngaihtuahin khenkhat nana kiuangsah uh.
Hizongleh Lalpa’n lem a chihleh na kawmvah ka hung baih diing hi, huchi'n kiuangsahte chu a thusoi uh hilou in, a silbawltheihna uh ka heta diing hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian gam chu thu ah a um sih a, silbawltheihna ah a um zaw hi.
Bang ahiai na deih zawh uh? na kawmvah chiang tawiin ka hung diai, ahihlouhleh lungsiatna leh lungnemna hagau toh ka hung diai?
Na lahvah kingaih a um chih a thang vengvung hi, huchibang kingaih Jentelte laha zong um ngeilou, mi khat in a pa ji a kiteenpih, chih.
Huleh huchibang silbawlpa chu na lah vapata nohdoh diing a lungngaih naahsangin na kiuahsahpih zaw uhi.
Ajiahchu keimah tahsa a ka tel louh vangin ka hagau in ka tel a, hutobanga gamtapa chu na lahva tel tobangin a tungvai ka hawm zouta hi.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist minin, ka hagau leh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist silbawltheihna toh na kikhopkhawm chiangun,
Huchibang mi chu Lalpa Jesu ni chianga a hagau hutdam a, a um theihna diingin, a tahsa suhmangna diingin Setan kawmah piah diing ka chi hi.
Na kisahtheihna uh a hoih sih hi. Tol themchakhat in tanghou beu a pum in a zelsuaah veu hi chih na he sih u'maw?
Hujiahin tol sohlouh na hih bangmahun, tanghou beu thah na hih theihna diingun tol lui chu paaisiang un. Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh ei di’n i chiahkaan uh Khrist chu goh in a umta hi.
Hujiahin gual vaahna nei nihang, tol lui toh chu hilou in, nunsia leh giitlouhna tol toh zong hilou in; hizongleh tahna leh dihna tanghou tol sohlouh toh i nei zaw diing uhi.
Ka lehkhathot ah kingaihhaatte kithuahpihlou diingin ka hung gial hi.

Hi khovela kingaihhaatte toh aha, mi huaihamte toh aha, leepgute toh aha, ahihlouhleh milem bete toh aha kithuah heet louh diing chi chu ka hi sih hi; ajiahchu huchi diing hileh khovel apat na chiahdoh uh ngai diing ahi.

Hizongleh tuin chu, koipouh unau chih hi ngal a kingaih haat aha, huaiham aha, milembia aha, haansan aha, zukham haat aha, a hihlouhleh leepguuh haat aha ahih inchu amah chu kithuahpih lou diingin na kawmvah ka hung gial hi; huchibang mi toh neeh zong nekhawm lou diingin.
Ajiahchu polam mite ke’n ka ngaihtuah khawh diing bang awm ei? a sunga umte hilou maw nangun na ngaihtuah veu uh?
Hizongleh polam a mite chu Pathian in a ngaihtuah veu hi. Hujiahin na lah vapatin hu migiloupa chu nohdoh un.
Na lahva koipouh in midang tungah thubuai nei taleh uchin misiangthoute ma a tut louin, mi dihtatloute ma ah na tut ngam diviai mah?
Misiangthoute’n khovel vaihawm diing ahi uh chih na he sih viai mah? huleh khovel vaihawm diing na hih uleh, sil neupente vaihawm diing a taahlou na hi u'maw?
Angelte vaihawm diing i hi chih na he sih viai mah? huchi a hih inchu hi damsung silte giap i vaihawm talo mahmah diing uhi.
Huchi ahihleh hi damsung silte vaihawm diing na neih un, kouhtuam laha mi simmohhuaipente vaihawm diingin tousah un.
Na zumna diingun ka soi ahi. Na lahvah mipil khatbeeh um lou ahiai mah? khat beeh a unaute kikala vaihawm thei um lou ahiai mah?
Hizongleh unau in unau na heeh va, huzong gingloumi ma ah ahi nalai hi.
Huchi ahihjiahin khat leh khat na kiheehtuah uh hi na khelhna lianpi uh ahi. Bang diinga kimohsah zaw mei lou na hi viai? bang diinga a heem a bawlna thuaah zaw mei lou na hi viai?
Hilou, nanguh mahin na bawlsual va, na heem uh, huleh huzong na unaute uh tungah ahi na bawl uh.
Mi dihtatloute’n Pathian gam a luah sih diing uh chih na he sih viai mah? Heem in um sih un; kingaihhaatte aha, milem bete aha, aangkawmte aha, mihuuhte aha, tohuuhte aha,
Gutate aha, huaihamte aha, zukhamhaatte aha, mi salhhaatte aha, ahihlouhleh leepgute aha in Pathian gam a luah sih diing uhi.
Huleh na lahva khenkhat huchibang nana hi uh; hizongleh Lalpa Jesu Khrist min leh, i Pathian uh Hagaua silsiang na hita uh, suhsiangthou na hita uh, siamtansah na hita uhi.
Sil zousiah kei diingin bawl a sianga, hizongleh sil zousiah bawl a hoih kim sih; sil zousiah bawl kei diingin a sianga, hizongleh bangmah silbawltheihna nuaiah ka um sih diing hi.

Ante chu gilpi a diing ahi a, huleh gilpi zong an a diing ahi; hizongleh a nihin Pathian in a sumang diing hi. Huleh sapum chu kingaihna diing ahi sih a, Lalpa a diing ahi zaw hi; huleh Lalpa chu sapum a diing ahi.
Pathian in Lalpa chu a kaithou a, huleh eiuh zong a silbawltheihna in ahung kaithou diing hi.
Na sapum uh Khrist hiangte ahi chih na he sih viai mah? Ahihleh Khrist hiangte chu la in nohchizuahte hiangin ka bawl diing ahiai mah? Bawl lou hial diing.
Ahihleh, nohchizuah toh kizop photmah chu pumkhat ahi uh chih he lou na hi viaimah? ajiahchu ama’n, A nih un pumkhat ahita diing uh, a chi hi.
Hizongleh Lalpa toh kizop chu hagaua amah toh pumkhat ahi uhi.
Kingaih taisan un. Mihing sualna zousiah chu sapum polam ahi; hizongleh kingaihna sual bawl in chu amah sapum tungah sil a bawl sual ahi.
Ahihleh, na sapum u’chu, na sung va um, Pathian a kuan a na muh uh, Hagau Siangthou inn ahi a, nanguh a zong na hi sih uh chih na he sih viai mah?
Ajiahchu mana lei na hi uhi: hujiahin na sapum uleh, na hagau vah, Pathian paahtawi un, huchu Pathian a ahi.
Tuin ka kawma na hung silgelhte uh thu ah; pasal diingin numei suhkhaah louh a hoih hi.
Ahihvanginlah, kingaihnate a umlouhna diingin pasal chinin amah ji chiat kineih heh, huleh numei chinin zong amah pasal chiat kineih heh.
Pasal in a ji kawmah a tan diing hun chu pia heh; huchimahbangin numei in zong a pasal kawmah pia heh.
Ji in amah sapum tungah thu a nei sih a, a pasal in a nei zaw hi; huchimahbangin pasal in zong amah sapum tungah thu a nei sih a, a ji in a nei zaw hi.

Angawlna leh haamteina a na kipumpiah theihna diing va hun khat sung pha satuaah na hih louhngal uleh, kuamah kikhaam sih un; huleh na kisuum zoh louh jiah va Setan in ahung heem louhna diingin hung umkhawm jel un.
Hizongleh hi thu chu thupiah bang a soi louin, phalsah thuin ka soi zaw ahi.
Ajiahchu mi zousiah keimah bang chiat leuh ka deih hi. Hizongleh mi chinin Pathian apat silpiah tuam chiat i nei uh, khat in hitobangin, a dang in hutobangin.
Hujiahin kiteeng nailoute leh meithaite kawmah hichi'n ka chi hi, Keimah bangin umleh uh amahuh diingin a hoih diing hi.
Ahihvangin a kisuum zoh louh unchu kiteeng u’heh; ajiahchu huuh sangin kiteen a hoihzaw hi.
Huleh kiteengsate kawmah thu ka pia hi, kei piah hilouin, Lalpa piah ahi zaw, Ji in a pasal paisan sih heh;
Hizongleh a paisan inchu pasal nei lou in um zing heh; ahihlouhleh a pasal toh kilem kiit u’heh; huleh pasal in a ji khul sih heh.
Hizongleh a dangte kawmah chu Lalpa hilou in, ke’n ka soi hi; Unau koipouh in gingloumi ji a, a neih a, amahnu a kawma a um nuam zing leh khul sih heh.
Huleh numei, gingloumi pasal a neihin chu, a pasal in a kawma um zing a ut leh nuse sih heh.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh ginglou pasal chu a ji jiahin suhsiangthouin a um a, huleh ginglou ji zong a pasal jiahin suhsiangthouin a um hi; huchi hilouleh na tate uh a siang sih diing hi; hizongleh tuin chu a siangthou uhi.
Ahihvangin a ginglou zawin a khen leh khen mei heh. Unaupa aha, unaunu aha chu huchibang thu ah kaanin a um sih; hizongleh Pathian in eiuh kituaah a um diingin ahung kou hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Aw ji, na pasal na hutdam diing leh diing louh bang na he ei? ahihlouhleh, Aw pasal, na ji na hutdam diing leh diing louh bangchi'n na he ei?
Hizongleh Pathian in mi chin kawma a hawmsahtaah bangin, Lalpa’n mi chin a kouh taah bangin, huchi'n um heh. Huleh huchibangin ke’n zong kouhtuam chinah ka namdet hi.
Zehtansa a kouh mi a um ei? zehtan louh hung hituan sih heh. Zehtan louh a kouh mi a um ei? zehtantuan sih heh.
Pathian thupiah juih chih louhngal, zehtan bangmah ahi sih a, zehtan louh zong bangmah ahi sih hi.
Mi chin kouh a, a umna mah vah um zing u’heh.
Suaah hilai kouh na hiai? poisa sin; hizongleh suaahtaatsah theih diing na hih inchu, huchu zang in.
Ajiahchu suaah hihlaia Lalpa a kouh chu, Lalpa mi zalen ahi; huchimahbangin zalen hihlai a kouh zong Khrist suaah ahi.
Man a leisa na hi va; mite suaah hi sih un.
Unaute, mi chin kouh a, a umna bang chiatin, huah Pathian toh um zing heh.
Huchiangleh nungaah siangthoute tungtaang ahihleh Lalpa thupiah bangmah ka nei sih hi; hizongleh ginum a um diing a Lalpa hehpihna tang ka hih jiahin ka ngaihdan ka soi diing hi.
Huchi'n tulai hahsatna jiahin hichu hoih diingin ka ngaihtuah hi, mi a um ngei va a um zing uh a hoih hi, ka chi hi.
Ji a kaan na hiai mah? kisuutkhiah tum sin. Ji a kaan louh na hiai mah? ji neih tum sin.

Hizongleh ji na neih zongleh sil bawlsual na hi sih; huleh nungaah siangthou inzong pasal nei mahleh sil bawlsual ahi sih. Ahihvangin huchibang mite’n tahsa ah gimna a thuaah diing uhi; hizongleh ke’n chu na thuaah louh uh ka deih hi.
Hizongleh unaute, hikhu ka soi ahi, hun a tomta hi, huchi'n ji neite chu nei lou bangin,
Huleh kapte chu kap lou bangin; kipaahte chu kipaah lou bangin; sil leite chu a nei lou bangin;
Huleh khovel mangte chu mang val lou bangin um heh; ajiahchu hi khovel umtan hi a beimang zing hi.
Hizongleh ke’n chu lungkhamna bei a na um uh ka hung deihsah hi. Ji nei lou in chu Lalpa a kipaahsah theihna diingin, Lalpa lam silte a ngaihsah veu hi.
Hizongleh ji nei in chu a ji a kipaahsah theihna diingin, khovel silte a ngaihsah veu hi.

Pasal nei leh nungaah siangthou zong a kibang sih hi. Pasal nei louin chu sapum leh hagau a siangthoutaha a um theihna diingin Lalpa lam silte a ngaihsah hi; hizongleh pasal nei in chu a pasal a kipaahsah theihna diingin khovel lam silte a ngaihsah veu hi.

Huleh hite chu na hoihna diing va ka soi ahi; nanguh thaang a awhsah tum a ka soi ahi sih a, hizongleh umdan kilawm huna na um theihna diing uleh, Lalpa na buai lou a natoh theihna diing va ka soi ahi zaw hi.
Hizongleh mi koipouh in a ta nungaah siangthou a kuul donga a leensah a, a tunga dihlou kisa a a pasal neih diing khawh a sahleh, hoih a sah bangin bawl heh, a bawlsual sih; pasal neisah mei heh.
Ahihvangin lah lungsim dettah pua a, a khawhna nei lou a, amah lungsim kithunun zou a, a ta nungaah siangthou kep zing a lungtang a tumpa’n chu a bawl hoih hi.
Huchi'n a ta nungaah pasal neisahpa’n a bawl hoih a; hizongleh pasal neisahloupa’n a bawl hoihzaw hi.
Ji chu a pasal a damsung siah daan a kaan ahi; hizongleh a pasal a sih inchu a deih phot a kiteenpih thei hi; Lalpa a um a hih phot inchu.
Hizongleh kei ngaihtuah danin chu a um ngeiin umleh nuam a sa zaw diing hi; huleh keima’n Pathian Hagau nei in zong ka kingaihtuah hi.
Huleh milemte biahna silte tungtaang ahihleh koipouh in heetna i nei chiat uh chih i he uhi. Heetna in mi a kisatheisah a, hizongleh lungsiatna in mi a siam hoih hi.
Mi koipouh in bang aha he a, a kingaihtuah inchu a heet diing bangin a he nailou ahi.
Hizongleh mi koipouh in Pathian a lungsiat inchu, hu mi mah chu Amah heetin a um hi.
Hujiahin milem biahna kithoihna silte neeh lam thu ahihleh, khovelah milem kichi bangmah ahi sih a, huleh khat chauh loungal Pathian dang a um sih chih i he uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh, vaan ah aha, lei ah aha pathian chi a minvohte um mahleh uh (huchibang pathian tampi leh lalpa tampi a um uh),

Eiuh diingin chu Pathian khat chauh, Pa chu a um a, amah a kuanin sil zousiah a um a, ei u’zong amah a um i hi uhi; huleh Lalpa khat chauh, Jesu Khrist a um hi, amah jiahin sil zousiah a um a, ei u’zong amah jiah a um i hi uhi.
Ahiinlah hu heetna chu mi zousiah ah a um sih hi; ajiahchu khenkhat in tutanin milem biahna chu milem biahna banga ngai in na ne zing va, a sialepha heetna uh a haat louh jiahin a subolhhoh veu uhi.
Hizongleh neeh in Pathian paahtaat ahung lohsah ahi sih hi; ajiahchu i neeh jiahun i hoihzaw uh ahi sih a, ne sih zonglei i sezaw uh ahi tuan sih hi.
Hizongleh pilvaang un, huchilouin chu na zalenna uh bangchi aha in mi haatloute diingin puuhna ahung suaahkha diing hi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh, heetna nei nang mi koiaha in milem biahna ankuang uum a tou hung mu taleh, amah sialepha heetna haatloupa chu milem biahna silte ne diing a haansan lohta lou diing ahiai mah?
Huchi'n na heetna jiahin unau haatlou, a sih luang a Khrist in a sihsah chu a mangthai diing hi.
Hizongleh huchia unau tunga na sual va, a sialepha heetna haat lou uh na suhliamsah chiangun, Khrist tungah na sual uh ahi.
Huchihjiahin, neehin ka unau a suhpuuh inchu, ka unau puuh louhna diingin bangchihtan in sa mawngmawng ka ne sih diing hi.
Sawlleh hilou ka hiaimah? zalen hilou ka hiaimah? I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist ka mu sih eimah? nanguh Lalpa a ka natoh hilou na hi viaimah?
Midangte diingin sawlleh hi sih mah zongleng, nanguh diingin chu ka hi ngei mei hi; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Lalpa a ka sawlleh hihna chiamchihna chu nanguh na hi uhi.
Kei hung enkhetute kawma ka dawnna chu hikhu ahi,
Neehna diing leh dawnna diing thu nei lou ka hi viai mah?
Sawlleh dangte leh, Lalpa unaute leh, Kipha banga unaunu khat kipuileh a, ji a nei thei lou ka hi viai mah?
Ahihlouhleh, nna toh louhna diingin kei leh Barnaba chauh thunei lou ka hi viai mah?
Sepaih koi ahiai amah neihsa seeng a gaalkuan ngei? grep hu an bawl ngal a, a gah ne lou koi a um ei? ahihlouhleh ganhon khawi ngal a, a nawi ne lou koi a um ei?
Hi thute mihing ngaihdan chauha soi ka hiai mah? ahihlouhleh daanthu in zong humah a soi sih eimah?
Ajiahchu Mosi daanbu ah, Bawngtal in buh a chil laiin a muuh kaan sin, chih gelh ahi. Pathian in bawngtalte diing chauh ngaihtuah ahiai mah?
Ahihlouhleh ama’n eite diing jiah maha a soi ahiai mah? Eite diing jiaha gelh ahi tahzet hi; leilettu in kinemtahin a let diing ahi a; huleh kinem puma buhvotu in zong a kinepna chu a muh diing ahi.
Keiun na kawmva hagaulam silte tuh ka hih uleh, na tahsalam silte uh aat le’ung sil loupi ahiai mah?
Midangte’n na tungva hi thuneihna tang ahih uleh, kei un zong ka tang sih diviai mah? Ahihvangin hi thuneihna ka zang sih uhi; Khrist tanchinpha ka daal louhna diingun bangkim ka thuaah zaw uhi.
Sil siangthou a biahna natongte’n Pathian biahinn a silte a ne va, huleh maitaam a natongte’n maitaam a silte ah tan a nei uh chih na he sih viai mah?
Huchimahbangin tanchinpha soitute chu tanchinpha maha a hin diing uh chi'n Lalpa’n a guat hi.

Hizongleh ke’n chu hi silte khatbeeh ka zang sih; huleh hi silte ka tungah kibawlleh chia gelh zong ka hi sih hi; ajiahchu koiaha in ka kisuannapen bangmahlou a, a bawl sangin, kei di’n sih a hoihzaw hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh tanchinpha soi zongleng suan diing bangmah ka nei sih hi; bawl louh theih louh ka tunga kinga ahihjiahin; tanchinpha soi sih leng ka tung gih diing ahi.
Ajiahchu hi sil ka utthu a bawl ka hihleh kipaahman muh diing ka nei hi; hizongleh ka utthu lou a bawl ka hih inchu tanchinpha kepna ka khut a piah ka hi diing hi.
Huchi hileh ka kipaahman bang ahitai leh? Tanchinpha ka soi chianga tanchinpha a ka thuneihna a vuum a val a ka zat louhna diing a Khrist tanchinpha a man bei a ka umsah chu ahi.
Ajiahchu mi zousiah apat zalen himahleng, mi tamsem ka laahluut theihna diingin mi zousiah suaahin ka kibawl hi.

Judate ka laahluut theihna diingin Judate kawmah Judami bangin ka um a; daan nuaia umte ka laahluut theihna diingin, daan nuaia umte kawmah daan nuaia umte bangin ka um hi, daan nuaia um lou himah zongleng.
Daan neiloute ka laahluut theihna diingin, daan neiloute kawmah daan nei lou bangin ka um hi, Pathian daan nuaia um lou tuan louin, Khrist daan nuaia um ngal in.
Mi haatloute ka laahluut theihna diingin, mi haatloute kawmah haat lou bangin ka um hi; bangchizawng aha a mi khenkhat beeh ka hutdam theihna diingin mi zousiah kawmah sil bangkimin ka kibawl hi.
Nang u’toh tan ka neih theihna diingin tanchinpha jiahin hichu ka bawl ahi.
Kitaidemte chu a bawnun a tai va, hizongleh khat chauhin kipaahman a mu veu uh chih na he sih viai mah? Na tan theihna diingun huchibang mahin tai un.
Huleh koipouh kidemna a zoh tum mi chu sil zousiah ah a kideeh veu uhi. Amahun vang lallukhuh sethei muhna diingin a bawl uh ahi a; eite’n chu lallukhuh sethei lou diingin ahi.
Hujiahin huchimahbangin ka tai a, jiah bei hilou in; a guaahpi tuum hilouin ka pang hi.
Hizongleh ka sapum ka sawi a, ka thu nuaiah ka koih hi; huchilouin chu midangte kawma tanchinpha ka soi zoh nungin keimah houh paihkhiah in ka umkha diing hi.
Unaute, hite na heet louh uh ka deih sih, huchia i pulepate a bawnva mei nuaia ana um va, huleh a bawnva tuipi a kaan va;
Huleh a bawnva mei ah leh tuipi a Mosi kawm a baptis a a um va;
Huleh a bawnva hagaulam an kibang a neeh va;
Huleh a bawnva hagaulam dawn kibang a dawn chiat uh; ajiahchu amahuh juitu hagaulam suangpi a a dawn chiat uhi; hu suangpi chu Khrist ahi.
Hizongleh a lahva mi tampite tungah Pathian a lungkimta sih a; gamdai ah a puuhlum gamta uhi.
Hite chu ei u’diing a i etton diing uh ahi, silgilou a lunggulh bang va i lunggulh louhna diingun.
A lahva khenkhat milem bemi ahih bangun milem bemi hi sih un; Mipite chu ne diing leh dawn diingin a tou va, huleh kimawl diingin a ding jel uh, chih gelh bangin.
A lahva khenkhat in nungaah a ngai va, ni khat in saang sawmnih leh saang thum a puuhlup loh bangun ei u’chu i kingai sih diing uh.
A lahva khenkhat in a ze-et va, guula suhmang a, a um bangun, eiun zaw Khrist i ze-et sih diing uh.
Huleh a lahva khenkhat a phun va, sumangtu suhmang a a um bangun i phun sih diing uhi.
Huchi'n hite zousiah chu etton diingin a tungvah ana tung ahi; huleh eiuh khovel huntawp hung tunnate kawma thuhilhna diing a gelh ahi.
Huchi ahihjiahin dinga kingaihtuah chu pilvaang heh, huchilouin chu a puuhkha diing hi.

Mihing thuaahzoh val heemna na tungvah a tung ngei nai sih, hizongleh Pathian chu a muanhuai hi, ama’n na thuaahzoh val uh heemna na tuaah diing uh a phal sih diing; na thuaahzoh na diingun heemna toh kitonin taikhiahna lampi zong ahung siamsah zo diing hi.
Hujiahin ka deihtahte, milembiah taisan un.
Mipilte kawma thusoi bangin ka soi ahi; ka thusoi ngaihtuah un.
Vangpiahna nou i dawn uh Khrist sisan kipawlkhawmpihna hilou ahiai mah? Tanghou i balkeeh uh Khrist sapum kipawlkhawmpihna hilou ahiai mah?
Ajiahchu eiuh tampi hingalin tanghou khat, huleh sapumkhat i hi uh; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh hu tanghou beu khatah tan nei chiat i hi uhi.
Tahsa daan a Israelte en un; kithoihna sa nete, maitaam toh tan neikhawm ahi sih viai mah?
Ahihleh bang ahiai ka soi? Milem chu sil bangahakhat ahi a, huleh milem biahna a sil kilaante zong sil bangah a khat ahi chi ka hiai mah?
Jentelte kithoihna chu Pathian kawmah hilou in, dawite kawmah a kithoih uh chih ka soi zaw ahi; nanguh dawite toh na kipawlkhawm uh ka hung deihsah sih hi.
Lalpa nou leh dawite nou na dawnkhawm thei sih diing uh; Lalpa dohkaan a leh dawite dohkaan a zong na nekhawm thei sih diing uhi.
Ahihleh Lalpa thangsiat diing a haantawh tum i hi viai? Amah sanga haatzaw i hi viai mah?
Sil zousiah kei diingin a siang a, hizongleh sil zousiah a hoih kim sih hi; sil zousiah kei diingin a sianga, hizongleh sil zousiah in a siam hoih sih hi.
Mi koimah in amah ngen hoihna diing hawl lou in, midangte hoih na diing hawl zaw heh.
Sa, dawl a kizuah photmah chu, sialepha heetna jiahin bangmah dongse louin ne un;
Ajiahchu leilung leh a sunga um zousiah Lalpa a ahi.
Ginglou mite laha koiaha in an ne diing a ahung chial a, huleh chiah na ut ngal unchu, na ma va a lui phot uh, sialepha heetna jiahin bangmah dongse louin ne mei un.
Hizongleh mi koiaha in, Hichu milem kawma kithoihna ahi, chia ahung hilh leh, amah ahung hilhpa jiah leh, sialepha heetna jiahin ne sih un; ajiahchu leilung leh a sunga um zousiah Lalpa a ahi;
Nangmah sialepha heetna chi ka hi sih a, midang sialepha heetna chi ka hi zaw hi; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh midang sialepha heetna in bang diinga ka zalenna hung awimoh diing ahiai?
Ajiahchu, kipaahtaha ka neeh leh, bang diinga kipaahthu ka soina tunga soisiat a um ka hiai?
Hujiahin na neeh un hileh, na dawn un hileh, na bawl photmah uh Pathian loupina diingin bawl veh un.
Judate aha, Jentelte aha, ahihlouhleh Pathian kouhtuamte hitaleh a puuh na diingun bangmah bawl sih un.
Keimah phattuamna diing hawl loua, hutdam ahihtheihna diing va mi tampite phattuamna diing hawl zaw a, sil zousiaha mi chinteng ka kipaahsah bang mahin.
Kei Khrist umdan latu ka hih mahbangin, nanguh ka umdan latute hi un.
Huleh unaute, sil zousiaha na hung heet zing va, thugousiah ka hung hilh bang jel a na kolzing jiahun ka hung paahta hi.
Hizongleh pasal photmah lutang chu Khrist ahi a, numei lutang chu pasal ahi; huleh Khrist lutang chu Pathian ahi chih na heet uh ka hung deih hi.
Pasal, a lu khuh pum a haamtei aha, ahihlouhleh thusoi aha photmah in a lu a zahbawl lou ahi.
Hizongleh numei, a lu khuh lou a haamtei aha, ahihlouhleh thusoi aha photmahin a lu a zahbawl lou ahi; bang jiahin ahiai chih leh huchibanga bawl chu a kimeet toh kibang giap ahi.
Ajiahchu numei in a lu a khuh louh ngal inchu meet mei heh; ahihvangin numei diing a sam meet ahiai mah, ahihlouhleh meetkiau ahiai a zumhuai inchu kikhuh heh.
Pasal vang chu Pathian lim bang leh a loupina ahihjiahin a lu a khuh louh diing mawng ahi; numei ahihleh pasal loupina ahi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh, pasal chu numei apat siam ahi sih a; numei ahihleh pasal apat siam ahi zaw hi.
Pasal chu numei a diing a siam zong ahi sih a; numei chu pasal a diing a siam ahi zaw hi.
Hikhu jiahin numei in pasal thuneihna chiamchihna angelte jiahin a khuh diing ahi.
Hizongleh Lalpa ah chu pasal lou in numei a um sih a; numei lou in pasal a um sih hi.
Ajiahchu numei hi pasal apat siam ahihbang mahin pasal zong numei jiah a piang ahi; hizongleh sil zousiah Pathian a kuan veh ahi.
Nangun kingaihtuah un; numei in a lu khuhlou a Pathian kawma a haamtei a kilawm eimah?
Pasal in sam saau a neih leh amah diingin a zumhuai hi, chih ngeina dan inzong ahung hesah sih eimah?
Hizongleh numei in sam saau a neih inchu amah diingin loupina ahi zaw hi; ajiahchu a sam chu khuhna diing a piah ahi.
Hizongleh mi koiaha in a nial nuam inchu huchibang tawndan i nei sih uh, Pathian kouhtuam pawlte’n zong a nei sih uhi.
Ahihvangin, nanguh hi thu ka hung hilhna ah ka hung phatthei sih hi, hoihzawhna sem diing a kikhawm lou in, siatzawh semna diingin na kikhawm veu uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh a masapenin, kouhtuam a na kikhop chiangun na lahvah kilangkhenna a um veu chih ka ja hi; huleh gin zong ka gingta hi.
Ajiahchu a taha kipomte a kilat theihna diingin na lahvah gindan tuamtuam zong a um diing mawng ahi.
Hujiahin mun khat a na kikhop chiangun Lalpa nitaah an neehna gual ahi sih hi.
Ajiahchu na neeh chiangun mi chinin midangte ma in nanguh nitaah an na kineeh chiat uh; huchi'n khat a gilkial a, a dangin a kham hi.

Bangchidan ahiai? Neehna diing leh dawnna diingin kineih lou na hi viai mah? ahihlouhleh Pathian kouhtuam na musit un, bangmah neiloute na selphou uh ahiai mah? Na kawmvah bang ahiai ka soi diing? Hi thu ah ka hung paahta diing adiai? Ka hung paahta hial sih hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Lalpa kawm apat ka muh chu nanguh ka hung hilhsawn ahi, huchia Lalpa Jesu’n matsaha a um jan a, tanghou a laah a;
Huleh kipaahthu a soi zoha a balkeeh a, La unla, ne un; hichu ka tahsa, nanguh diing a kipia chu ahi; na hung heet zing na diingun hichu bawl jel un, a chih.
Huchimahbanga an a neeh zoha nou zong a laah a, Hi nou chu ka sisana thuhun thah ahi; na dawn teng va na hung heetzingna diingun hichu bawl jel un, a chih.
Ajiahchu hi tanghou na neeh va, hi nou na dawn tengun a hung kiit masiah Lalpa sihna na ensah jel uh ahi.
Hujiahin mi koipouh taah loupia Lalpa tanghou ne leh nou dawn chu, Lalpa tahsa leh sisan tungah siamlouh a tang diing hi.
Hizongleh mi amah kienchian zaw heh, huchi'n tanghou chu ne henla, nou chu dawn heh.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Lalpa tahsa ngaihtuah lou a, ne taah lou leh dawn taah loupia ne leh dawn inchu, amah siamlouh kitanna diingin a ne in a dawn ahi.
Hikhu jiahin na lahva mi tampi na zawngkhal va, na china uh; huleh tampi na ihmuta uhi.
Ajiahchu eimah le eimah ki vaihawm lei chu, vaihawmsaha um lou diing i hi.
Ahihvangin vaihawmsah a i um in zong khovel toh siamlouh tang a i um louhna diingin Lalpa taihilh in i um veu uhi.
Hujiahin ka unaute, ne diing a na kikhop chiangun khat leh khat kingaah chiat un.
Huleh na kikhop uh vaihawmna na thuaahloh louhna diingun mi koipouh a gil a kial leh a inn lamah ne heh. Huleh thu dangte chu ka hung chiangin ka lem veh na diing hi.
Huleh unaute, hagaulam silpiah tungtaang zaw, he lou a na um uh ka deih sih hi.
Jentelte na hih laiun, pui a na um bang jelun, hi milem haam theiloute lamah puimang in na um veu uh chih na he uhi.
Hujiahin kuama’n Pathian Hagau a thu soi in, Jesu chu haamsethuaah ahi, a chi ngei sih hi; huleh kuama’n Hagau Siangthou louin Jesu chu Lalpa ahi, a chih thei ngei sih hi, chih ka hung hesah hi.
Huchi'n silpiah tuamtuam a um a, hizongleh Hagau khat ahi.
Huleh thunatohna tuamtuam a um a, hizongleh Lalpa khat ahi.
Huleh natohdan tuamtuam a um a, hizongleh bangkim a bangkim bawltu Pathian khat ahi.
Hizongleh phattuampih chiatna diingin Hagau kilatna chu michin kawmah piah ahi.
Ajiahchu mi khat kawmah Hagau in pilna thu piah ahi a; midang kawmah hu Hagau mahin heetna thu piah ahi;
Midang kawmah hu Hagau mahin ginna piah ahi a; midang kawmah hu Hagau mahin suhdamtheihna silpiahte piah ahi;

Midang kawmah silmah bawltheihnate piah ahi a; midang kawmah thusoitheihna piah ahi; midang kawmah hagaute heetkhentheihna piah ahi a; midang kawmah haam tuamtuam a thusoitheihna piah ahi; midang kawmah haam tuamtuam lehdohtheihna piah ahi;
Hizongleh hute zousiah chu Hagau khat mahin mi chin kawma a deih bangjel a hawm chiat in a tong hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh sapum chu khat ahi a, hiang tampi a nei hi, hiang zousiahte chu tam mahleh uh sapumkhat ahi uh; huchimahbangin Khrist zong ahi.
Ajiahchu eiuh Judate hiin, Jentelte hitalei, suaah hiin, suaahlou hilei, i bawnun sapumkhat a um diingin Hagau khat a baptis in i um uhi; huleh i bawnun Hagau khat mah dawnsah in i umta uhi.
Sapum chu hiang khat chauh ahi sih a, hiang tampi ahi zaw hi.
Keeng in, Khut ka hih louh jiahin sapum a pang ka hi sih, chileh; hi jiahin sapum a pang lou ahi diai mah?
Huleh bil in, Mit ka hih louh jiahin, sapum a pang ka hi sih, chileh; hi jiahin sapum a panglou ahi diai mah?
Sapum chu a pumpiin mit hitaleh, khojahna khoiah a umta diai? A pumpi in khojahna hitaleh gimnam heetna khoiah a umta diai?
Hizongleh Pathian in hiang chinteng chu pha a sah bangin sapum ah a koih hi.
Huleh a bawnun hiang khat chauh hitaleh uh, sapum khoiah a umta diai?
Hizongleh tuin hiang tampi hizongleh uh, sapumkhat chauh ahi.
Huleh mit in khut kawmah, Bangmahin ka hung mamoh sih, a chi thei sih; lutang in zong keeng kawmah, Bangmahin ka hung mamoh sih, a chi thei tuan sih hi.
Chi thei lou, chihtaah sangin sapum hiang haat lou a kilangte a mamoh zaw mahmah hi.
Huleh sapum hiang ngaihsah tham louh a i guatte naahtahin i zahbawl zaw a, huleh i hiang kilawmloute’n naahpitahin kilawmna a nei zaw uhi.
I hiang kilawmte’n chu huchibang a kiphamoh sih uhi; hizongleh Pathian in poimoh thamlou hiangte chu zahbawl semin, sapum chu a lemkhawm hi.
Huchia sapum a kikhenna a um louh a; hizongleh hiangte chu khat leh khat a kingaihsah chiat theih zawhna diingun.
Huleh hiang khat in a thuaah in zong hiang zousiah in a thuaahpih jel a; huleh hiang khat paahtawi a, a um leh hiang dang zousiah in a kipaahpih jel uhi.
Tuin nanguh chu Khrist sapum na hi va, a mimalmal in a hiangte na hi uhi.

Huleh Pathian in khenkhat kouhtuam ah ahung koih a, a masapenin sawllehte, a nihna ah zawlneite, a thum na ah thuhilhtute, hubanah silmah bawltute, huzohin suhdamtheihna silpiahte, panpihtheihnate, vaihawmsiamnate, haam tuamtuam a haamtheihnate.
A bawnun sawlleh ahi viai? a bawnun zawlnei ahi viai? a bawnun thuhilhtu ahi viai? a bawnun silmah bawltute ahi viai?
A bawnun suhdamtheihna silpiahte a nei viai? a bawnun haam heet louhin thu a soi viai? a bawnun haam heet louh a let thei viai?
Hizongleh silpiah hoihpente chu lunggulh zaw un; huchi'n lampi hoihzaw ka hung musah diing hi.
Mihing haamte leh angel haamte in thu soi mahleng lungsiatna ka neih louh inchu sumeng tumging aha, ahihlouhleh daah khutbeh ging aha bang giap ka hi diing hi.
Huleh thusoitheihna silpiah nei in, thuguuh zousiah leh heetna zousiah he veh mahleng, huleh taang kisuansah theihna khop ginna nei mahleng, lungsiatna ka neih louh inchu bangmah ka hi sih hi.
Huleh ka neih zousiah migentheite vaahna diingin peveh in, huleh ka sapum haaltum diingin pe ngam mah zong leng, lungsiatna ka neih louh inchu bangmah a phatuam sih hi.
Lungsiatna in a thuaah thei a, huleh a ching a; lungsiatna in a thangse sih a; lungsiatna chu a kiphat sih a, a kiuangsah sih hi,
A kilawmlouin a gamta sih a, amah diing chauh a ngaihtuah sih a, a lungthah baih sih a, silgilou a ngaihtuah sih hi;
Dihtatlouhna ah a kipaah sih a, hizongleh thutah ah a kipaah hi;
Sil zousiah puaahdan a siam a, sil zousiah a gingta a, sil zousiah a lamen a, sil zousiah a thuaah mualsuaah hi.
Lungsiatna chu bangchihmahin a bei sih diing; hizongleh thusoitheihnate um mah zong leh ahung bei diing a; haam heetlouhte um mah leh ahung tawp diing a; heetnate um mahleh ahung mang diing hi.
Ajiahchu a kimlouin i he a, a kimlouin i soi uhi.
Hizongleh a bukim ahung tun chiangin a kimlou chu suhbei ahita diing hi.
Ka naupan laiin naupang haam in ka haam a, naupang heet in ka he a, naupang ngaihtuah in ka ngaihtuah hi; hizongleh ka hung pichin phetin chu naupanlai silte ka paaita hi.

Ajiahchu tuin limlang a et bangin chianloutahin i mu a; hizongleh hu hun chiangin chu kimaaituah in i muta diing hi; tuin chu a kimlouin ka he a, hizongleh hu hun chiangin chu kei hung kiheet bangin ka heta diing hi.
Huleh tuin ginna toh, kinepna toh, lungsiatna hiteng thum a um zing hi; hizongleh hiteng laha lianpen chu lungsiatna ahi.
Lungsiatna chu delh jel unla, huleh hagaulam silpiahte, a diahkholin thu na soi theihna diing uh lunggulh zaw un.
Ajiahchu haam heetlouh a haam in chu mi kawma thusoi hilou in, Pathian kawmah a soi ahi zaw hi; koimah in a soi a heet louh jiahin; hizongleh hagau ah chu thuguuh a soi ahi.
Hizongleh thusoimi inchu mihing kawmah siamhoihna thute, hasotna thute, huleh hamuanna thute a soi ahi.
Haam heetlouh a thusoi inchu amah chauh a kisiam hoih a; hizongleh thusoimi inchu kouhtuam a siamhoih hi;

Na bawnva haam heetlouh a na haam uh chu ka hung deihsah a, hizongleh thu na soi theih uh ka hung deihsah sem hi; ajiahchu kouhtuam siamhoihna diing a a letdoh ngal louhleh, haam heetlouh a haam sangin thusoimi chu a hoihzaw hi.

Tuin, unaute, haam heetlouh a thusoi in na kawmvah hungta leng, kilaahna in aha, heetna in aha, thusoitheihna in aha, ahihlouhleh thuhilhna in aha na kawmvah soi sih leng bangin ka hung suphatuam diai?
Sil, hinna nei lou gingthei, theile aha, ahihlouhleh tingtang aha ngei zong umzia nei a a gin louhleh bang kimuut a, bang kitum chih bang a chi kiheet theih diai?
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh pengkuul mumal beiin kimuut leh koi ahiai gaal kuan diing a kisa diing?
Huchimahbangin nanguh zong haam heet baihlama na soi louh uleh, bang kisoi ahiai chih bang a chih kiheet diai? ajiahchu huihkhua a haam na hi giap diing uhi.
Khovel ah haam chi tuamtuam tampi a um ahi meithei, hizongleh umze nei lou khatmah a um sih hi.
Hujiahin hu haamging in a soi ka heet louh inchu hu thusoipa diingin kei chu meelmah ka hi a, huleh kei diingin a soipa zong meelmah ahi diing hi.
Huchimahbangin huchilawma hagaulam silpiahte a na phatuamngaih bangun kouhtuam siamhoihna diing a na hung khan theihna diing uh hawl un.
Huchihjiahin haam heetlouh a thusoi in a lehdoh theihna diingin ngen heh.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh haam heetlouh in haamtei leng ka hagau chu a haamtei a, hizongleh ka heetna chu a suphatuam sih hi.
Ahihleh bangchi'n ahita diai? Hagau in ka haamtei diing a, heetna in zong ka haamtei diing hi; hagau in la ka sa diing a, heetna in zong ka sa diing hi.
Huchilouin chu hagau a na vangpiah chiangin bangmah heloute umna a umpa in na kipaahthu soi ah bangchi’n, Amen, a chi thei diai, na thusoi he loupi in?
Nang in chu kipaahthu na soi hoih ngeel a, hizongleh midang chu a siamhoih tuan sih hi.
Nanguh zousiah sanga haam heetlouh a thu ka soi tam zawh jiahin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi hi.
Ahiinlah kouhtuam lahah chu haam heetlouha thu saang sawm ka soi sangin, ka thu soi a midangte ka hilh theihna diingin ka heetna in thu teng ngaa ka soi zaw diing hi.
Unaute, heetsiamna lamah naupang sih unla, hizongleh giitlouhna lamah chu naupang un; heetsiamna lamah piching un.
Daan lehkhabu ah, Haam dang mite leh gamtuam mite ka min hi mite kawmah thu ka soi diing a, huchi'n zong ka thu a ngaikhe tuan sih diing uhi, Lalpa’n a chi, chih gelh ahi.
Hujiahin haam heet louh chu gingtute diingin hilouin, gingloute diingin chiamchihna ahi; hizongleh thusoitheihna chu gingloute diingin ahi sih a, gingtute diingin ahi zaw hi.
Hujiahin kouhtuam pumpi mun khata na kikhopna vah mi zousiah haam heetlouh in haam taleh u’chin, huleh hutah ah a he nailou leh gingloumi hung leh, nanguh chu mingol ahung chi sih diviai mah?
Hizongleh mi zousiah in thu soi leh uchin, ginglou mi ahiai, ahihlouhleh heloumi khat huah hung leh, a giit louhdan na bawnva heetsah in a umta diing a, na bawnva awimoh ahung hita diing hi.
Huchi'n a lungtang thuguuhte chu suhlat in a umta diing a; huleh khupboha puuhin Pathian a be diing a; na lahvah Pathian a um tahzet hi chi'n a soisawn diing hi.

Bangchih diing ahita diai, unaute? na hung kikhop chiangun mi chinin phatna la bang, thukihilhna bang, haam heet louh bang kilaahna bang, haam letdohna bang na nei chiat uh. Sil zousiah chu siamhoihna diing a bawl hi heh.
Mi koipouh in haam heetlouh a thu a soi leh, nih in aha, ahihlouhleh a tam tawpin thum in aha soi heh, huzong kikheel jelin hi heh; huleh mi khat in letdoh heh.
A lettu diing a um louh inchu, kouhtuam kikhopna ah haam louin um mei heh; amah leh Pathian kawmah kisoi heh.
Thusoitute chu nih aha, thum aha in soi u’henla, a dangte’n a soi uh ngaihtuah u’heh.
Hizongleh a kawm a tou midang khat kawma bang aha ahung kilaahin chu a masapen sip heh.
Ajiahchu mi zousiah in a heet a, mi zousiah hamuang a, a um theihna diingin, na bawnun khatkhat in thu na soi thei uhi.
Huleh thusoitute hagau chu thusoitute thuthu in a um uhi.
Pathian chu buaina Pathian ahi sih a, misiangthoute kouhtuam zousiah a ahih bangin hamuanna Pathian ahi zaw hi.
Na numeite uh chu kouhtuam kikhopnate ah sip u’heh; ajiahchu amahuh diingin thusoi phal ahi sih hi; daan lehkhabu in zong a soi bangin thumanna nuaiah um zaw u’heh.
Huleh bang aha heet nuam a neih unchu inn lamah a pasalte uh dong u’heh; ajiahchu kouhtuam kikhopna a numei thusoi chu a zumhuai ahi.
Bang ahiai? Pathian thu nanguh apat hung suaah ahiai mah? ahihlouhleh nanguh kawm chauha hung tung ahiai mah?
Mi koipouh in thusoitu ahiai mah, ahihlouhleh hagaumi ahiai mah a, a kingaihtuahleh na kawmva ka thugelhte chu Lalpa thupiah ahi chih he u’heh.
Hizongleh mi koipouh a he lou a umleh, amah chu he lou in um mei heh.
Hujiahin unaute, thusoi chu lunggulh unla, haam heetlouh a haam zong khap sih un.
Sil zousiah hoihtah leh kituuptaha bawl hi hen.
Huleh unaute, na kawmva ka tanchinpha soi, pom zong na pom va, huleh humaha na dinna uh chu ka hung hesah ahi.
Na kawmva ka thusoi na pomdet uleh humah a hutdam zong na hi uhi, huchi ahih louh inchu a thawnin na gingta uh ahi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh a masapenin ke’n zong ka muh chu nanguh ka hung hilhsawn hi, chihchu, Pathian lehkhathu dungjuiin Khrist chu i sualnate jiahin a si a;
Huleh vui in a um a, Pathian lehkhathu dungjuiin ni thumni in a thou kiitta hi.
Huleh Kipha kawmah a kilaah a, huzohin sawmlenihte kawmah;
Hunungin unau ja ngaa sanga tamzaw kawmah khatvei thuin a kilaah a; a lahva tamzaw chu tutanin a dam nalai uh, hizongleh khenkhat chu a ihmuta uhi.
Hunungin Jakob kawmah a kilaah a; huin sawlleh zousiah kawmah.
Huleh a tawp pen ah, a hun lou banga piang kei kawmah zong a kilaah hi.
Ajiahchu sawllehte laha a neupen ka hi a, Pathian kouhtuam ka sawih jiahin sawlleh minvoh taah zong ka hi sih hi.

Hizongleh Pathian hehpihna jiahin ka hihhih diing ka hita; huleh a hehpihna hung piah chu a thawnin a um sih a; hizongleh amahuh haw zousiah sangin ka tonggim zaw hi; ahiinlah kei toh ahi sih a, Pathian hehpihna ka kawma um in a tong zaw ahi.
Hujiahin kei hiin, amahuh hitaleh, huchi'n ka soi va, huchi'n nangun na gingta uhi.
Ahihleh tuin Khrist chu misi lah apat a thou kiit chih a kisoi ngalleh, bang chidana na lahva mi khenkhat in misi thohkiitna a um sih na chih uh ahiai?
Hizongleh misi thohkiitna um lou ahih inchu Khrist zong kaihthoh in a um sih diing hi.
Huleh Khrist kaihthouh a um lou ahih inchu, ka thusoi uh a thawn ahi diing a, na ginna uh zong a thawn ahi diing hi.

Ahi, Pathian in Khrist a kai thou hi chi a, Pathian heetpihtu hi a thu ka soi jiahun, kei u’chu Pathian heetpihtu dihlou bangin ka kilangta uh; misite thou kiit lou ahih unchu amah zong a kai thou sih diing hi.
Ajiahchu misite a thohkiit louh inchu, Khrist zong kaihthoh in a um sih diing hi.
Huleh Khrist kaihthoh a, a um louh inchu, na ginna uh a thawn ahi diing a; na sualna vah na um nalai diing uh.
Huchiangleh Khrist a ihmutate a mangthai ahita diing uhi.
Tu damsung chauha Khrist a kinepna i neih inchu, mi zousiah laha mi lungsiathuaipen i hi diing hi.
Hizongleh tu’n Khrist chu misi laha kipan kaihthoh in a umta a, ihmute laha gahmasapen ahung hita hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh mihing jiaha sihna ahung um jiahin, mihing jiah mahin misi thohkiitna zong ahung umta hi.
Ajiahchu Adam a mi zousiah a sih mahbangun, Khrist ah mi zousiah suhhing in a um diing uhi.
Hizongleh mi chin amah hun chiat ah; Khrist chu gah masapen ahi a; hunung chiangin ahung kiitna ah Khrist a te ahi diing uh.
Huzohchiangin a tawp ahung tung diing, hu hun chiangin vaihawmna zousiah leh thuneihna leh silbawltheihna zousiah sumangin Pathian, Pa kawm ngeiah lalgam chu a peta diing hi.
Ajiahchu a meelmate zousiah a keeng nuaia a koih masangsiah ama’n vai a hawm diing ahi.
Meelma nunungpen suhmanga um diing chu sihna ahi.
Ajiahchu ama’n sil zousiah a keeng nuaiah a koihta hi. Hizongleh sil zousiah a thunuaiah a koih a chihin, a thunuaia sil zousiah koihpa chu a huam sih chih a kilang hi.
Huleh sil zousiah a thunuai a a um chiangin, Tapa ngei zong sil zousiah a thunuai a koihpa nuaiah a kituluutta diing a, Pathian chu bangkim a bangkim a hihtheihna diingin.
Huchi ahihlouhleh misite a diing a baptisma a tansah uh bang diing a tadiai, misite thou kiit mawngmawng lou ahih uleh? bang diinga misite a diinga baptisma tansah ahi viai?
Huleh bang diinga eite zong daahkal china lauthawng a um zing i hi viai?
Jesu Khrist i Lalpa u’a ka hung suanna sial in, Nitengin ka si, chih hahtahin ka soi ahi.
Mihing tatdan bang a Ephesa a gamsate kisualpih ka hihleh, kei diingin bang a phatuam diai misite thou kiit lou ahihleh? nein i dawn diing uh; ajiahchu jing chiang a si diing i hi.
Heemin um sih un; lawm gilou in umdan hoih a suse veu hi.
Dihtatna lamah halh unla, sual sih un; ajiahchu khenkhat in Pathian heetna a nei sih uhi; hichu na zahtaat na diing va ka soi ahi.
Hizongleh mi koiaha in, Misite bangchi'n kaihthoh ahi diing viai? bangchi bang sapum nei in ahung pawt diviai? a chi ahi diing.
Nang mingol, na haichi tuh zong a sih louh a ahihleh a pou sih hi.
Huleh na tuh in a kung hung um diing khu na tuh sih a, gehu hiin, haichi dangdang hitaleh a tang mah ahi na tuh.
Hizongleh Pathian in pha a sah bang jelin a kung a pia hi, haichi chin kawmah amah kung chiat.
Tahsa zousiah chu tahsa kibang ahi sih a, hizongleh mihing tahsa a tuam ahi a, gamsate tahsa a tuam a, ngate tahsa a tuam a, huleh vate tahsa a tuam hi.
Vaanlam sapum a um a, leilam sapum zong a um hi; hizongleh vaanlam sapum loupina a tuam a, leilam sapum loupina a tuam hi.
Niin loupina tuam a nei a, ha in loupina tuam a nei, huleh aahsite’n zong loupina tuam a nei uhi; aahsi leh aahsi zong loupidan ah a kibang sih uhi.
Huchibang mahin misi thohkiitna zong ahi. Muatthei a tuh in a um a; muatthei lou a kaihthoh in a um hi;
Simmohumtaha tuh in a um a; loupitaha kaihthoh in a um hi; haatloutaha tuh in a um a; silbawltheitaha kaihthoh in a um hi;
Tahsalam sapum a tuh in a um a; hagaulam sapum nei a kaihthoh in a um hi. Tahsalam sapum a um a, hagaulam sapum zong a um hi.
Huchi'n, Mi masa Adam chu hinna nei mi a siam ahi, chih gelh ahi; Adam nunung chu hinna petu Hagau ahi.
Ahihvangin hagaulam chu a um masa sih a, tahsalam a um masa hi; hunungin hagaulam ahung um hi.
Mihing masa chu lei a siam, leimi ahi a; mihing nihna chu vaan a kuan Lalpa ahi.
Lei a siam mite chu lei a kisiampa bang ahi va; vaanlam mite chu vaan a mi bang ahi uhi.
Huleh lei a kisiam meel i put bangin, vaan mi meel zong i paw diing uhi.
Hizongleh unaute, hichu ka soi ahi, tahsa leh sisanin Pathian gam a luah thei sih a; muatthei in zong muattheihlouhna a luah thei sih hi, chih.
Ngai un, thuguuh ka hung hilh diing hi; i bawnun i ihmu veh sih diing va, hizongleh i bawnun suhlimdang in i um veh diing uhi.
Thakhatin, mitphetkallou in, pengkuul nunungpen gin chian; ajiahchu pengkuul ging diing ahi a, huleh misite chu muatthei lou a kaihthoh in a um diing va, eite zong suhlimdang in i umta diing uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh hi muatthei in muattheihlouhna a silh diing ahi a, huleh hi si thei in sihtheihlouhna a silh diing ahi.
Huchia, hi muatthei in muattheihlouhna a silh a, huleh hi sithei in sihtheihlouhna a silh hun tahchiangin, Zohna in sihna chu a valh zouta, chia kigial chu ahung taangtungta diing hi.
Aw sihna, na guu khoiah a um tai? Aw haankhuuh, na gualzohna khoiah a um tai? chih.
Sihna guu chu sual ahi a, huleh sual thaneihna chu daan ahi.
Hizongleh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jala gualzohna hung pepa Pathian kawmah kipaahthu um heh.
Hujiahin, ka unau deihtahte, dettahin, suhliing guallouh in, Lalpa natoh phatuamngaitaha tong ngiitngeet in um un; na tohgimna uh chu Lalpa ah a thawn sih diing chih na he ngal va.
Huleh misiangthoute diing a thohlawm thu chu, Galatia gam a kouhtuamte thu ka piah bangin nangun zong bawl un.
Ka hung chiang a thohlawm donna a um louhna diingin, ni sagihni masapenin Pathian in a vangpiah bangin mi chinin na khut vah na koih khawl chiat un.
Huleh ka hung chiangin, koi hitaleh pha na sahsah uh na silpiah uh va thah diingin na lehkha u’toh Jerusalem ah ka sawl diing hi.
Huleh kei zong ka chiah a lem leh, kei toh kitonin a chiah diing uhi.
Makedonia gam ka totsuaah zoh chiangin na kawmvah ka hung diing hi, ajiahchu Makedonia gam totsuaah ka sawm hi.
Huleh ka chiahna diing photmaha na hung thah leh theihna diingun na kawmvah tomkhat, ahihlouhleh phalbi sung siah aha ka taam meithei hi.
Ajiahchu tua zin kawma hung muh malam ka ut sih hi; hizongleh Lalpa’n lem a sah leh sawtdeuh na kawmva taam ka kinem hi.
Hizongleh Pentikost dongin Ephesa khua ah ka taam diing hi.
Ajiahchu kot lianpi leh phatuamtah kei diingin a kihong a, doutute zong tampi a um uhi.
Huchi'n Timothi a hung a ahihleh, lauthawng lou a na lahva a um theihna diing ngaihtuah un; ajiahchu kei tobangin ama’n Lalpa nna a tong hi.
Hujiahin koima’n musit sih henla; ka kawma ahung theihna diingin lungmuangtahin ha zaw un; ajiahchu unaute toh ka kawma ahung uh ka kinem hi.
Unaupa Apollo thu ahihleh, unaute toh na kawmva hung diingin ka deih mahmah a; hizongleh tutaha hung diing chu amah deihdan ahi sih hi; hizongleh hun lemtaang a neih chiangin ahung diing hi.
Kiveeng unla, ginna ah dingkip un, pasalpha bangin um unla, haattahin um un.
Na silbawl photmah uh lungsiatna a bawl hi heh.
Unaute, (Stephana innkuanpihte chu Akaia gam a, Pathian thu a gah masapen ahi va, misiangthoute natohsah diingin a kipia uh chih na he uhi),
Huchibangte kawm a leh mi chin keiuh toh huhna a tonggimte kawma kituluut diingin ka hung ngen hi.
Stephana leh Fortunata leh Akaika hung chu ka kipaah hi; ajiahchu amahun na um louh awng uh a hu uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh amahun kei lungsim leh nanguh lungsim ahung suhhalhsah uhi; hujiahin huchibang mite chu hesiam un.
Asia gam a kouhtuamte’n chibai ahung buuh uhi. Akuila leh Prisilla in a inn va kouhtuam kikhawmte toh Lalpa ah chibai hoihtah ahung buuh uhi.
Unaute zousiah in chibai ahung buuh uhi. Tawp siangthouin khat leh khat chibai kibuuhtuah un.
Kei Paul in keimah khut ngei a chibai ka hung buuhna ahi.
Mi koipouh in Lalpa Jesu Khrist a lungsiat louhleh haamse thuaah in um heh. (Anathema), Lalpa ahung hi. (Maranatha).
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na kawmvah um hen.
Khrist Jesu a ka hung lungsiatna na bawnva kawmah um hen. Amen.
Paul, Pathian deihlama Jesu Khrist sawlleh leh, i naupa uh Timothi in, Korinth khua a um Pathian kouhtuamte leh, Akaia gam pumpi a misiangthoute zousiah kawmah;
Pathian i Pa uleh, Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawma kipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Pathian, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pa ngei, khotuahna Pa leh lungmuanna zousiah Pathian chu paahtawi in um hen.
Pathian in keiuh ahung lungmuanna ngei khu a kei un zong hahsatna photmah a umte ka lungmuan theihna diingun, ama’n ka gimthuaahna zousiah vah ahung lungmuan veu hi.
Ajiahchu Khrist thuaahgimnate ka tungva a dimlet bangin, Khrist jiahin ka kihehnepna uh zong a dimlet hi.

Huleh gimthuaah a ka um un aha, ahihlouhleh lungmuan a ka um un aha zong, hichu nanguh hehnepna diing leh hutdama na umna diing uh ahi a; huin chu gimthuaahna ka thuaah banguh kuhkaltaha thuaahzohna a siamdoh hi.
Huleh nanguh gimthuaahna tangtute na hih bangun, hehnepna tangtute zong na hi uh chih he in ka hung kineppihna uh a det hi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh unaute, Asia gam a ka tungva gimthuaahna hung tung chu na heet louh uh ka ut sih uh, hin zong kinem zou nawn lou khopin huchilawma nasataha thuaahzoh guallouh a bawlsiat in ka um uhi.
Hizongleh kei uleh keiuh kimuang loua, misi kaithou thei Pathian ka muan zawhna diingun, si diing a thupuuhsa chu keiuh ah ka kineih uhi.
Ama’n chu huchituha sihna nasatah lah apat ahung hundohta a, huleh ahung hundoh zinga; huleh ahung hundoh nalai diing chi'n amah ah ka kinem uhi.
Mi tampite apata ka silpiah muh jiah va mi tampi in keiuh diing a kipaahthu a soi theihna diingun, nangun zong keiuh diing a na hung haamteisahna un na hung panpih uhi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh ka suan u’chu hikhu ahi, ka sialepha heetna uh hung heetpih, sianthouna leh Pathian dihna nei in, tahsa pilna a hilouin, Pathian hehpihna a hi zaw in, khovel ah, huleh a diahkhol inchu nangu lamah ka khohei uhi.
Ajiahchu na sim va, pom zong na pom uh, hukhu loungal na kawmvah thu dang bangmah ka gial sih uhi; huleh a tawp dong a na pom zing uh ka kinem hi;
Lalpa Jesu ni chianga nanguh ka suante uh na hih diing bang va, kei u’zong na suante uh ka hih diing uh chih heetna chiang na hung neih bang un.
Huleh hi gintaatna tah nei in, phattuamna nihveina na neih theihna diingun, na kawmva hung masat ka tum hi.
Huleh nanguh hung tawn malam a Makedonia gam a chiahsuaah in; huleh Makedonia gam apat na kawmva hung kiit in, huleh nangun Judia gam lama ka chiahna diing ah hung thah leuchin ka chi hi.
Hujiahin huchibang ka ngaihtuah laiin, ka lungsim det louhdan sulang ka hiai mah? Ahihlouhleh, ka lungsim a ka silguatte chu tahsa thu bang a, ahihleh hi, ahihlouhleh hilou, chi ka hiai mah?
Hizongleh Pathian a thutah bangin, nanguh lama ka thu uchu, ahi, chih leh, hilou, chih ahi sih hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh na lahva keiuh, keimah ngei leh, Silvana leh Timothi in a thu ka soi uh Pathian Tapa Jesu Khrist chu, ahi leh hilou, chih ahi sih a, amah ah chu ahi chih ahi zaw hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian thuchiam zousiah chu amah ah ahi chih ahi a, huleh keiuh jiaha Pathian loupina diingin amah ah Amen ahi hi.
Huleh Khrist a nang u’toh hung sukiptu leh, keiuh thau hung nuhtu chu Pathian ahi.
Ama’n chu chiam zong ahung chiamchihta a, huleh i lungtang vah khaamna Hagau ahung peta hi.
Himahleh ka hinna tunga heetpihtu diingin Pathian ka kou ahi; nanguh hung hawi diing a Korinth khua a tutana ka hung louh ahi.
Na ginna tungva thu hung neihkhum hilou in, na kipaahna uh panpihtu ka hizaw uhi; ajiahchu ginna in na dingdet uh ahi.
Hizongleh tukal lungkham kawma na kawmva hung kiitta lou diing chih keimah thu in kana tum hi.
Ajiahchu ke’n nanguh hung sulungkham leng, ka suhlungkhamte mah chih louh koi in ahiai kei hung kipaahsah diing?

Huleh na kawmvah hi thu mah ahi ka hung gelh, huchilou inchu, ka hung chiangin ka kipaahna diingte lahah lungkhamna ka mu zaw kha diing hi; ka kipaahna chu na bawnva kipaahna hi diingin ka hung gingta ngal a.
Ajiahchu lunggimna leh lungkhamna nasatah apat, mittui tampi toh ka hung gelh ahi; suhlungkhama na um louh va, na tungva lungsiatna nasatah ka nei hi chih na heet zawhna diingun ka gelh zaw hi.
Hizongleh mi koipouh in lungkhamna a siam leh, kei chauh ahung sulungkham ahi sih a, ka hihtaatluat louhna diingin na bawnun ahung sulungkham chiat phet ahi zaw hi.
Huchibang mi a diingin chu mi tampiin a piah uh hi gawtna a huntawh hi.
Huchi'n na ngaihdam diing va, na hamuan zawh diing uh ahi, huchilou inchu, huchibang mi chu a lungkham taahluatna in a valhzoukha diing hi.
Huchi ahihjiahin amah lama na lungsiatna uh sukip diingin ka hung ngen hi.
Hikhu jiah mahin zong ka gial ahi, sil zousiah a thu na man uleh na man louh uh ka heetchetna diingin.
Bangma pouh a mi na ngaihdam u’chu ke’n zong ka ngaidam hi; ajiahchu sil bangpouh ka ngaihdam leh, hi ka ngaihdamna mi chu nanguh jiahin Khrist ah ka ngaidamta hi.
Huchilou inchu Setan in eiuh ah hun lemtaang a mukha diing; ajiahchu a lungtup i haih sih uhi.
Huleh Khrist tanchinpha soi diing a Troas khua a ka hungin Lalpa’n kei diingin kot khat ahung honsah a,
Ka unaupa Tita ka muh louh jiahin kaha a muang thei sih a; huchi'n amahuh kampha a ha in, hu apatin Makedonia gam ah ka chiahta hi.
Himahleh Khrist a gualzohna hung pe zingtu leh, keiuh zang a mun chin a amah heetna gimnamtui phuangdohtu Pathian kawmah kipaahthu um heh.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh hutdama umte leh mangthaite ah Pathian a diingin Khrist gimnamtui ka hi uhi.
Lawi khat kawmah sihna diing a sihna gimnam ka hi va; huleh lawi dang kawmah hinna diing a hinna gimnam ka hi uhi. Huleh hi silte diing a chingzou koi ahiai?

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh mi tampiin Pathian thu mite heem a sumkawlveina a, a zat bangun kei un chu ka zang sih uh; hizongleh chihtahzetin Pathian a bang zawin, Khrist ah Pathian mitmuh ah thu ka soi uh ahi.
Kei uleh keiuh kisoiphapan kiit ka hita viaimah? Ahihlouhleh, kei un midangte bangin, na kawmvah, ahihlouhleh, nanguh apat, soiphatna lehkha poimoh, ka hi viaimah?
Nang u’chu ka lehkhathot uh, ka lungtang va gelh, mi zousiah heet leh sim na hi uhi.
Khrist lehkhathot, keiuh gelh, lehkhatui a gelh hilou a, Pathian hing Hagau a gelh; suang peeh a gelh hilou a, tahsa lungtang peeh a gelh na hi zaw uh chih chiantah a suhlat na hi uhi.
Huleh huchibang muanna Khrist jalin Pathian lamah ka nei uhi;
Bang sil ahakhat keiuh apat ahi chi diingin keiuh chauhin ka chin sih va; ka chinna u’chu Pathian a kuan ahi zaw hi.
Ama’n chu keiuh thuhun thah natong thei diingin ahung bawl a; lehkhajem a hilou in, Hagau a natong diingin ahi zaw; ajiahchu lehkhajem in a sulum veu a, Hagau in chu hinna a pia hi.
Hizongleh suhbei a um diing loupina a suhloupi a a um jiaha Israel tate’n Mosi maaitang entang thei lou khopa sihna natohna, suangpeeha sut a gelh bawn a loupi inchu;
Hagau natohna chu bangchi'n a loupizaw lou thei diai?
Ajiahchu siamlouh tansahna natohna bawn a loupi inchu, dihtatna natohna chu nasatahin a loupizaw diing hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh loupina umsa chu loupina na sazaw in a khumkhel jiahin hilam thu ah chu loupina a nei nawn sih hi.
Ajiahchu suhmanga um bawn a loupi a ahihleh, a um zing khu chu nasatahin a loupizaw sem ahi.
Hutobang kinepna ka neih ziahun, haangtah a thusoi ngamna ka nei uhi.
Huleh a kiam hiaihiai chu a tawptana Israel tate’n a et tang theihlouhna diing va a maaitang puan a khuh Mosi bang chu ka hi sih hi.
Hizongleh a lungsim uh suhmial in a um a; ajiahchu tuni tanin thuhun lui a sim chiangun hu maaikhuhna chu hawhkhiah louhin a um zing a; hu maaikhuhna chu Khrist ah suhbei in a umta hi.
Hizongleh tuni tanphain, Mosi lehkhabu a sim chiangun, a lungtang vah maaikhuhna chu a um zing hi.
Ahihvangin Lalpa lama a kihei phaatphaat chiangun hu maaikhuhna chu laahmang ahita diing hi.
Huleh Lalpa chu hu Hagau ahi a; Lalpa Hagau umna photah zalenna a um hi.
Hizongleh ei uchu i bawnun, maai khuhlouh in, limlanga muh banga Lalpa loupina chu en zingin, huto kibang ngei a um diingin Lalpa Hagau in loupina apat loupina ah ahung sulimdang zing hi.
Hujiahin khotuahna ka muh bang va, hi natohna ka tan jiahun, ka chau sih uhi.

Hizongleh sil zumhuai kiphualte ka paampaihta va, doh a lungsim po louin, Pathian thu mi heemna a zang louin; hizongleh thutah suhlatna a zang zaw in, Pathian mitmuh ah mi chin sialepha heetna mit ka sutung zaw uhi.
Hizongleh ka tanchinpha uh phual a a um leh, mangthaite kawmah ahi phual a, a um,
Pathian lim batpih, Khrist tanchinpha loupina vaahin amahuh a salhvaah theih louhna diingin, hute ah hi khovel Pathian in a gingta loute lungsim a suhmialsahta hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh keiuh leh keiuh ka kisoithang sih va, Khrist Jesu chu Lalpa ahi chih leh, keiuh chu Jesu ziahin na suaahte uh ka hi uh chih ka soi zaw uhi.
Ajiahchu, Jesu Khrist meel a Pathian loupina heetna vaah hung pe diingin, mial laha kipana vaah hung vaahdoh diing a thupetu Pathian in ka lungtang uh a salhvaahta hi.
Hizongleh silbawltheihna loupina chu keiuh apat hilou a, Pathian apat ahih zawh theihna diingin hu gou chu lei beel ah ka kem uhi.
Lehlamlehlam ah nehthop in ka um va, hizongleh ka chimoh nai sih uh; lungdong in ka um va, hizongleh ka lungke tuan sih uh;
Sawih in ka um va, hizongleh taisan in ka um sih uh; paihkhiah in ka um va, hizongleh suhmang in ka um nai sih uhi.
Jesu hinna ka sapum va suhlata a um theihna diingin, bangchih laipouh in Lalpa Jesu sihna ka sapum vah ka po lehleh uhi.
Ajiahchu Jesu hinna zong ka tahsa uh si thei a suhlat a a um theihna diingin, kei uh a hing nalaite chu bangchih laipouhin Jesu jiaha si diing a piahkhiah in ka um uhi.
Huchi'n keiuh ah sihna in a tong a, hizong leh nanguh ah chu hinna in a tong hi.
Ka gingta a, hujiahin ka soita hi, chih gelh bangin, hu ginna hagau mah chu nei in, kei un, zong ka gingta va, hujiahin ka soi uh ahi.
Ajiahchu Lalpa Jesu kaithou kiit pa in kei u’zong Jesu toh ahung kaithou diing a, nang u’toh a maaima ah ahung tut diing hi, chih ka he uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Pathian loupina diing a mi tampite kipaahthu soina jala hehpihna a punsem theihna diingin sil zousiah nanguh diing jiaha um veh ahi.
Hukhu jiahin ka chau sih uh; hizongleh ka polam mihing uh kiam hiaihiai zongleh, ka sunglam mihing u’chu ni china siamthah in a um zing hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh miphetkal sung chauh ka gimthuaahna uh jangtakhat in kumtuang loupina gihtah mai na sa zawsem ahung bawlsah zing hi.
Sil muhtheihte en louin, sil muhtheih louhte ka en zaw uhi; ajiahchu sil muhtheihte chu tomtakhat sunga diing ahi a; hizongleh sil muhtheihlouhte chu kumtuang a diing ahi zaw hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh hi puanbuuh i lei inn uh suhsiat in um mah zongleh, khut a bawl hilou, Pathian khut a kuan kumtuang inn det vaan ah i nei uh chih i he uhi.
Ajiahchu vaan akipan a i inn diing uh silhthuaahsaha um ut mahmah in hi sungah i thuum zing uhi.
Huchibang a silhthuaahsaha i um inchu saguah in i um sih diing uhi.
Ajiahchu eiuh hi puanbuuha umte chu puaahgih pua in i thuum zing uh; silhlou a i umna diingun hilou in, si thei chu hinna valhzoha a um theihna diing a silhthuaahsaha i um ut jiahin ahi zaw hi.
Huleh hukhu diing a eiuh hung siamtu chu Pathian ahi a, khaamna Hagau hung petu zong ahi.
Hujiahin sapum inn a i um laisiah uh, Lalpa kawma um lou i hi uh chih he in, bangchih laipouhin muangtahin i um uhi.
(Ajiahchu muhtheiha pailou in, ginna in i paizaw uhi).
Muangtahin i um uh, ka chi ahi, sapum a um lou a, Lalpa kawma um i utzaw uhi.
Huchihjiahin um in um lou zong lehang amah kipaahpih zawng i hihtheihna diingun i tonggim uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh mi chinin a sapum a a silbawlte asia apha, a bawl bang banga a muhtheihna diingin Khrist vaihawmna touphah ma-ah i bawnun suhlat in i um diing uhi.
Hujiahin Lalpa lauhuaidan he in mite ka zawl teitei uhi; hizongleh Pathian kawmah suhlat in ka um va; huleh na sialepha heetna va suhlat a ka um uh zong ka kinem hi.

Ajiahchu na kawmvah ka hung kisoipha kiit uh ahi sih a; lungsung lama hilou a, a polaang a ki suang te na dawnna diing uh bang aha na neih theihna diingun, keiuh lama kisuan theihna hung bawlsah in ka soi zaw uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh ka ngol uleh Pathian a diing in ahi a; ka pil uleh nanguh diingin ahi.
Khrist lungsiatna in ahung sawl teitei hi; ajiahchu hichi'n ka ngaihtuah uhi, mi zousiah sih luang a mi khat a sih inchu, mi zousiah si ahita hi.
Huleh a hingte zong amahuh diinga a hin nawn taahlouh va, a sih luang va si a, huleh thou kiitpa a diinga a hin zawhna diingun, amah chu mi zousiah diingin a si ahi.
Huchihjiahin tukalsiah chu tahsalamah koimah ka he nawn sih uhi; ahi, tahsadan in Khrist na he zong le’ung, tuin chu ka he nawn sih uhi.
Hujiahin mi koipouh Khrist a, a um inchu, silsiamthah ahita hi; sil luite a beita a; ngai un, sil zousiah ahung thah vehta hi.
Huleh sil zousiah chu Pathian a kuan ahi a, ama’n Jesu Khrist in amah toh kilem in ahung bawl a, huleh ka kawmvah kilepna natohna ahung pia hi.
Huchi'n Pathian chu Khrist a um in, khovel amah toh kilem in a bawl a, a tatsualnate uh tatsualna a sehsah louin; ka kawmvah kilepna thu ahung kolsahta hi.
Hujiahin kei u’chu Khrist palaite ka hi va, Pathian in keiuh manga nanguh hung ngen bangin, Pathian toh kilem un chi'n, Khrist luang in ka hung ngen uhi.
Ajiahchu amah a Pathian dihtatna i hung hihtheihna diingin, sualna mawngmawng he lou amah chu Pathian in eiuh jiahin sual in a bawlta hi.
Huleh keiuh amah toh tongkhawmte hi in, Pathian hehpihna chu phattuamna bei a na muh louhna diingun ka hung ngen uhi.
(Ajiahchu ama’n, Hun kipaahhuai ah ka hung ngaikhia a, hutdamna ni ah ka hung panpih hi, a chi hi; ngai un, tu hun kipaahhuai ahi a; ngai un, tu hutdamna ni ahi).
Ka thunatohna uh dem a a um louhna diingin sil bangmah ah puuhna diing ka bawl sih uhi;
Himahleh Pathian thunatongtute ka hi uh chih sil zousiah ah ka suchian va, kuhkalna mahmah ah bang, hahsatna ah bang, taahsapna ah bang, lungkhamna ah bang;
Jepna ah bang, suangkul taanna ah bang, buaina ah bang, tohgimna ah bang, ihmut louhna ah bang, an ngawlna ah bang;
Sianthouna in, heetna in, thuaahtheihna in, chitna in, Hagau Siangthou in, lungsiatna dihtahin,
Thutah thu in, Pathian silbawltheihna in, jiatlevei a dihtatna gaalvan in,
Zahbawlna leh zahbawl louhna in, soisiatna leh soiphatna in; mi heemtute bangin, midihtah hi ngal in;
Heetphaah louh bangin, minthangtah hi ngal in; si diing bangin, ngai un, ka hing uhi; vuaahthop bangin, thah chu hilouin;
Lungkhamtah bangin, kipaah zing ngal in; genthei bangin, mi tampi hausah ngal in; bangmah nei lou bangin, sil zousiah nei ngal in.
Aw nanguh Korinthte, na kawmvah ka kam uh ka kaah va, ka lungtang uh ka hong lian uhi.
Keiuh nehgawpa um na hi sih va, na lungsim va nanguh kinehgawp na hi uhi.
Huleh ka hung piah bang na hung piah theihna diingun (tate kawma soi bangin ka soi ahi), nanguh zong kihong lian un.
Ginglou mite toh kituaah louin ngawngkol pokhawm in um sih un: ajiahchu dihtatna leh dihtat louhna in bang kikopna a nei ei? huleh vaah leh mial in bang kithuahna a nei viai?
Huleh Khrist leh Belial in bang kituaahna a nei viai? ahihlouhleh gingtu leh ginglou mi’n bang tankhawm a nei viai?

Huleh Pathian biahinn leh milemte’n bang kizopna a nei viai? Ajiahchu nang u’chu Pathian hing biahinn na hi uhi; Pathian in, Amah u’ah ka teeng diing a, amahuh ah ka vaahleh diing a; huleh a Pathian uh ka hi diing a, amah u’zong ka mite ahi diing uh, a chih bangin.
Hujiahin a lahva kipan hung pawtdoh unla, a tuam in um un, Lalpa’n a chi, huleh sil sianglou khoih sih un; huchi'n ka hung pom thei diing a.
Huleh nanguh diingin na Pa uh ka hi diing a, nanguh chu ka tapate ka tanute na hi diing uh, Lalpa silbangkim bawlthei in a chi hi.
Hujiahin unau deihtahte, hi thuchiamte i neih jiahun, Pathian launa a sianthouna subukim in, tahsa leh hagau bolhhohna zousiah apat i kisusiang diing uhi.
Ka lam u’ah na lungsim uh hong un; koimah a lam louin ka bawl sih uh, koimah ka suse sih uh, koimah ka heembawl sih uhi.
Nanguh siamlouhtansahna diing a hi thu ka soi ahi sih; i sih leh sikhawma, i hin leh hingkhawm diingin ka lungtang vah na teeng uh chih, tuma in ka soita hi.
Nanguh lamah ka haam ngamdan a loupi a, nanguh a ka kisuanna a loupi ahi; lungmuanna in ka dim a, ka gimthuaahna zousiah vah nasatahin ka kipaah ahi.
Ajiahchu Makedonia gam ka hung tun un, ka tahsa un khawldamna a nei sih a, lehlam lehlam a suhbuai in ka um zaw uhi; polamah kisualnate a um a, sunglamah launate a um hi.
Hizongleh paampaih a umte hamuantu Pathian in Tita hungna in ahung hamuanta hi.

Huleh amah hungna chauh hilou in, ama’n nanguh a hamuanna a neihdan, nangun kei na hung ngaihdan uh, na hung hasiatpihdan uh, kei diinga na phatuamngaih dan uh ahung hilh phetin ahung hamuangsahta a; huchi'n ka kipaah semta hi.

Ajiahchu keima’n ka lehkhathot in hung sulungkham zongleng, ka kisiih sih hi, na kisiihta himah leng; ajiahchu hu lehkhathot mahin nanguh, tomtakhat sung chauh hizongleh, ahung sulungkham chih ka he hi.

Tuin chu ka kipaah ahi, suhlungkham a na um jiah uh hilou in, kisiihna diing a na lungkham jiahun ahi zaw; ajiahchu nangun keiuh jiaha siatna bangmah na tan louh na diing va Pathian deihlam banga suhlungkham a um na hi uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian deihlam banga lungkhamna in hutdam a umna diingin kisiihna tun lou kisiihna a bawl zaw hi; hizongleh khovel lungkhamna in chu sihna a bawl veu hi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh ngai un, Pathian deihlam banga hi na lungkhamna uh ngei in bangchituha nanguh a pil va ana bawldoh a taimah; ahi, nanguh kisuhsiangnate, ahi, lungthahnate, ahi, launate, ahi, lunggulhnate, ahi, phatuamngaihnate, ahi, phubalahnate! hi silte zousiah ah na siang uh chih na muchiansahta uhi.

Huchi'n na kawmvah gial zongleng, a dihlou bawlpa jiaha gelh ahi sih a, dihloutah a thuaahpa jiaha ka gelh zong ahi sih a, ka tungva na phatuamngaihdan uh Pathian mitmuha na kawmva suhlat a, a um theihna diing a ka gelh ahi zaw hi.
Hujiahin na hamuanna vah ka hamuangta uhi; ahi, Tita kipaahna jiahin ka kipaah tungtuang uhi, na bawnva a lungsim na tohhalhsah jiahun.
Ajiahchu a kawmah nanguh bang aha a hung suanna neita leng ka zum sil hi; hizongleh thutah a sil zousiah na kawmva ka soi bangun, Tita ma a ka hung suanna zong thutah ahi mawng hi.
Huleh nanguh na bawnva na thumandante uh, lau leh kithing pum a amah na kipaahpihdante uh a geeldoh chiangin, a lungsunga nanguh ahung lungsiatna a zual deuhdeuh hi.
Hujiahin sil zousiah a na tungva muanna ka neih jiahin ka kipaah hi.
Huchiangleh unaute, Makedonia gam a kouhtuam pawlte tunga Pathian hehpihna piah chu ka hung hesah diing hi;
Huchia hahsatna a ze-etna loupi a a kipaahna uh dimlet leh, a zawn mahmah na u’chu a silphalna loupi uh ahung hihdan chu.
Ajiahchu ahih zoh bangun, ahi, ahih zoh saang va zong loupizaw in, amahuh utthutah in a pia uhi chih ka heetpih hi;
Hu silpiah chu pomsah diingin leh, misiangthoute natohna a, a tel theihna diingun hah nget in ahung ngen uhi.
Huleh hichu ka kinep bang va hilou in, Pathian deihlam in, amahuh mahmah Lalpa kawm ah leh keiuh kawmah a kipe masa phot uhi.
Huchi'n tuma a, a patsa, hu hehpihna chu na lahva bawl zou diingin Tita chu ka ngen hialta uhi.
Hujiahin sil bangkim a, ginna a, thusoitheihna a, phatuamngaihna zousiaha, huleh keiuh na hung lungsiatna va na hauh bangun, hi hehpihna a zong na hauh na diinguh ngaihtuah un.
Thupia bangin chu ka soi sih a, midangte phatuamngaihna in, na lungsiatna uh tahzia zong chiansah diingin ka soi ahi zaw hi,
Ajiahchu i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna chu na he uh; a gentheihna jiaha na hung hauhsat theihna diingun, amah chu hausa mah zongleh, nang u’ jiahin ahung gentheita hi.
Huleh hi-ah ka hoihsahdan ka soi ahi; ajiahchu hikhu nanguh diingin a hoih hi, kumkhat ma a bawlpan masa na hi va, na bawlpat chauh uh hilou in, phatuamngaih zong na ut uhi.
Hujiahin ut diing a kipeihna a um bangin, na neih bang jel va taangtunna zong a um theihna diingin, tuin bawltaangtungta un.
Ajiahchu utna lungsim a um masat photleh, mi a neih louhdan dungjui a hilou in, a neihdan dungjui a pomsah ahi.
Ajiahchu midang a gim louh va, nanguh na gimna diingun ka chi ahi sih hi.

Hizongleh tuhuntaha na neih val u’chu amahuh taahsap awnghuhna ahung hih a, amahuh neih val zong nanguh taahsap awnghuhna ahung hih theihna diing in, kibatgualna diing in ka chi ahi zaw hi; huchi'n kibatgualna ahung um thei diing hi.
A lakhawm tam in a val in a nei sih a, a lakhawm tawm in lah a tasam tuan sil, chih gelh bangin.
Hizongleh na tungva huchibang mah phatuamngaihna Tita lungtang a umsahtu Pathian kawmah kipaahthu um heh.
Ajiahchu keiuh chiilna mang chu ahi ngei a; hizongleh amah mawng a phatuamngai a, amah utthu a na kawmva hung ahi.
Huleh amah toh tanchinpha lama a phatna thu kouhtuam pawt zousiah a kithang unaupa chu ka hung sawl uhi.
Huleh huchi chauh zong hilou in, Lalpa loupina diing leh, ka lungsim kipeihdan uh etsahna a, a nna ka toh uh, hi hehpihna thu a kei u’toh zinkhawm jel diing a kouhtuam pawlte guatsa mawng ahi.
A nna ka toh uh, hi silpiah tampi lam thu a koima’n ahung dem louhna diing va pilvaang in;
Lalpa mitmuh chauh ah hilouin, mihing mitmuh ah zong sil kilawm ka ngaihtuah jel uhi.
Huleh amahuh toh i unaupa uh ka sawl va, amah chu sil tampiah a phatuamngaihdan ka hechianta va, tu diahin na tungva tahsanna liantah a neih jiahin phatuam a ngai nasa sem ahi.
Tita tungtaang thu ahihleh, amah hi nanguh lam thu a ka lawm leh ka natohpih ahi; huleh i unaute uh ahihleh, kouhtuam pawlte thupotu leh Khrist loupina ahi uhi.
Hujiahin amahuh kawm leh kouhtuam pawlte ma-ah na lungsiatna uh heetchi ana leh nanguh ka hung suanna u’chu ensah un.
Ajiahchu misiangthoute diing a natohna lam thu chu na kawmva ka hung gelh a ngai sih hi;

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh na lungsim kipeidante uh ka he a, hu thu ah, Akaia gam kipeihsa a, a umna kumkhat ahita chi'n Makedonia gam a mite kawmah ka hung suang a; huleh na phatuamngaihna un mi tampite a suthathou hi.
Ahihvangin hichilam thu a nanguh ka hung suanna a thawn ahih louhna diingin unaute ka hung sawl hi; ka soi bangtah a kipeihsa a na um theihna diingun;
Huchilou inchu Makedonia gam a mite ka kawm a hungin, nanguh kimansa louin hung mu tale uh, keiuh (nanguh ka hung chi sih uh) hi hung tahsanga ka hung suanna lam vah ka mualphoukha diing uhi.
Hujiahin malai a na chiamsa uh silpiah chu, laahsah thoh hilou a, phaltaha pe zaw a, mansa diam a na koihna diingun, a hun ma in unaute chu na kawmva hung masa diing a hasot ngai in ka ngaihtuah hi.
Hizongleh hichu ka soi ahi, A theh tawm in a aat tawm diing a, a theh tam in a aat tam diing hi.
Mi chinin a lungtang a, a tup bang jel in pia heh; phal lou sasa a, ahihlouhleh piah louhtheihlouh a ngai a pe louin; ajiahchu Pathian in kipaahtaha petu chu a lungsiat hi.
Huleh Pathian in hehpihna zousiah na tungvah ahung vuh thei hi; huchi'n nanguh bangchih laipouhin sil hoih zousiaha buchinga um zingin, natoh hoih chinteng na tong thei diing uhi.
(A thehjah a; migentheite kawmah a pia a; a dihtatna chu kumtuang in a um zing hi, chih gelh bangin.
Huleh a thehtupa kawma haichi petu in na neeh diinguh tanghou ahung pia a, na haichi theh uh a pungsah a, huleh na dihtatna gah uh zong a khang sah hi; )
Sil phal diing a bangkim a suhhauhsat a um in, huin chu keiuh jalin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu soina a umsah hi.
Ajiahchu hi natohna in misiangthoute taahsap awng a huhsah chauh ahi sih a, Pathian kawma kipaahthu soina tampi in a luang let hi.
Hi natohna apat Khrist tanchinpha nuai a na kituhluutna uleh, amah uleh midang zousiah kawma na silphal dan uh kilat jiahin amahun Pathian a paahtawi uhi.
Huleh amahun zong nanguh diing a hung haamteisahna in, na tungva Pathian hehpihna loupitah jiahin nanguh ahung ngai mahmah uhi.
A silthawnpiah soiseeng guallouh jiahin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu um heh.
Huleh na lahva thunuaigolhtaha um a, na umlouhna va nanguh lama hahkat, kei Paul in, Khrist jaidamna leh nunnemna in ka hung ngen ahi;
Hizongleh tahsalama um hia keiuh hung ngaihtuah khenkhatte tunga hahkat diing ahi chia ka ngaihtuah chu, na kawmva ka um chianga huchia ka hahkat louhna diingin ka hung ngen hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh tahsa in um mahleh ung, tahsa dou in ka dou sih uhi;
(Ajiahchu ka gaaldou na gaalvan u’chu tahsa ahi sih a, kulhpi dettah suhchimna diing a Pathian jala silbawltheitah ahi zaw hi).
Suangtuahnate leh Pathian heetna doudaal a loupitah a kibawl sil saang chintengte paaikhia in, ngaihtuahna chinteng Khrist thumanna suaah a pui in;
Huleh na thumanna uh suhbukim ahih chianga, thumanglou zousiah phuba la diing a kipeihsa a um in.

Nangun sil a polama kilatdan a en na hi viai mah? Mi koipouh in Khrist a hi a amah leh amah a kiheet a ahihleh, hichu ama’n ngaihtuah kiit heh, amah Khrist a ahih bangin, keiuh zong Khrist a ka hi uhi.
Ajiahchu nanguh suhsiatna diing hilou a, bawlhoihna diing zaw a Pathian hung piah ka thuneihna uh hahtahin suang zong le’ung ka zahta sih diing hi.
Lehkhathot a nanguh hung suhlau tum banga ka lat louhna diingin.
Ajiahchu amahun, A lehkhathotte zaw a gih in, a haat a; hizongleh a mun ah a sapum a zawngkhal a, a thusoi zong a hawmthoh huai hi, a chi uhi.
Huchibang mi'n hikhu ngaihtuah heh, na kawmva ka um louh lai va, lehkha a, thu a ka um bangun, na kawmva ka um chiangun zong silbawl in ka um diing uhi.

Ajiahchu kei u’chu amah leh amah kiphatte lahah ka kisimtel ngam sih va, amahuh toh teh zong ka kitehkaah ngam sih uhi; hizongleh amahuh chu amah uleh amahuh kitehtuah in, amah uleh amahuh kitehkaah in, lungsim nei louin a um uhi.
Hizongleh kei u’chu ka tehna hun val un ka uang sih diing uhi, hizongleh Pathian hung hawmsah, nanguh zong huap diing a tehna, hu bang jelin ka uang zaw diing uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh kei un nanguh hung baanpha lou bangin, ka tehna kal val un ka kizankhe sih uhi; ajiahchu Khrist tanchinpha soi in nanguh kawm tanphain ka hung uhi.

Ka tehna val uh sil, chih chu, midangte tohsa a ki suang ka hi sih va, hizongleh na ginna uh a khan chiangleh ka huap chiang bang jelun nanguh jiahin naahtah a suhlet in ka um diing uh chih ka kinem zaw uhi;
Na gam kal lam uh tanpha a tanchinpha soi diingin, huleh ka khut va ka bawlsa silte thu a midang bial sunga ki suang lou diingin.
Hizongleh a ki suang taphot, Lalpa ah ki suang heh.
Ajiahchu amah kiphat chu phatin a um sih a, Lalpa’n a phat chu mipha ahi zaw hi.
Ka ngol deuhna ah nangun na hung thuaahtheih uh ka deih hi; huleh na hung thuaahthei ngei uh.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Pathian thangsiatna in na tungvah ka thangsia hi; ajiahchu Khrist kawma nungaah siangthou banga ka hung piah theihna diing in, na pasal diing uh khat ka hung hualsah hi.
Hizongleh guul in a doha a Evi a heem bangin, Khrist a tahna leh siangthouna apat bangchi ahakhat in na lungsim uh suhsiatin a umkha diing ka lauthawng hi.
Ajiahchu ahung penin ka soi louh uh Jesu dang a soi a, na muh ngei louh uh hagau dang na muh va, ahihlouhleh na pom ngei louh uh tanchinpha dang na pom va ahihleh amah chu na ngaisiam uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh sawlleh lianpen tahpa sanga nengtakhata zong neuzawin ka kingaihtuah sih hi.
Himahleh thusoi ah kamsiam sih zongleng heetna lamah chu ka huchi sih hi; hizongleh sil bangkimah na lahvah suhlatin ka um uhi.
Na kawmva Pathian tanchinpha a thawn a ka soi a, tawisang a na um theihna diing va ka kisuhngiam in sil bawlsual ka hiai mah?
Nanguh nna ka hung tohsah theihna diingin, amahuh apat loh la in, kouhtuam pawl dangte chu a neih uh ka laahsah hi.
