Huleh na kawmva ka umlai a, ka taahsap in, koimah ka hung subuai sih hi; ajiahchu Makedonia gam apat hung unaute’n ka taahsap awng ahung huhsah uhi; huleh sil bangkimah nanguh subuai lou diingin ka kibawl a, huchi bangin ka kibawl jel diing hi.
Khrist thutah keimaha a um jiahin, Akaia gam sunga hi ka kisuanna chu koima’n ahung sutawp sih diing hi.
Bangchih jiahin? nanguh ka hung lungsiat louh jiahin maw? Pathian in a he hi.
Hizongleh lemtaanna deihte apat lemtaanna ka saattan theihna diingin, ka bawl chu ka bawl jel diing hi; a kisuanna va keiuh banga ahung um theihna diingun.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh huchibang mite chu Khrist sawllehte a kibawlthuh, natongtu heemhaatte, sawlleh tahloute ahi uhi.
Huleh hichu a limdang sih; ajiahchu Setan ngei zong vaah sawllehin ana kibawlthuh hi.
Hujiahin a natongtute zong dihtatna natongtute in kibawl le uh huchu sil loupi ahi sih hi; a tawpna u’chu a natoh bang dungjuiun ahi diing hi.
Ka soi kiit ahi, koima’n mingolin hung ngaihtuah sih uheh; ahih louh vanglah leh, keimah neukhat beeh ka kisuan theihna diingin mingol bangin hung pom un.
Ka thusoi chu Lalpa bangin ka soi sih a, hi kisahtheihna ah ngoltah bangin ka soi zaw hi.
Mi tampi tahsalama a kisuan jiahun kei zong ka ki suang diing hi.
Ajiahchu nanguh mipil na hi va, mingolte kipaahtahin na thuaah zou jel uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh mi’n suaah in hung bawl le uh, hung negam le uh, hung hingmat le uh, amah leh amah kiliansah le uh, na maai vah hung beeng le uh, na thuaah zou jel uhi.
Haatlou ka hi uh chitobangin, keimah kisit in ka soi ahi. Hizongleh midang ngamna ah chu (mingol bangin ka soi ahi), kei zong ka ngam ahi.
Hebraimi ahi u'maw? Kei zong ka hi. Israelte ahi u'maw? Kei zong ka hi. Abraham haahte ahi u'maw? Kei zong ka hi.
Khrist natongtute ahi u'maw? (mingol bangin ka soi ahi, ) kei ka hi sem hi; tohgimna bangah a tamzaw sem in, vuaahna bangah a tuang a val in, suangkul taanna bangah mun semin, sihna bangah tampi vei.
Judate lahah vuaah na sawmli chinna diing khata sam ngaavei ka tuaah a.
Thumvei chianga jepin ka um a, khatvei suang a seh in ka um a, thum vei kuang siatna ka tuaah a, jan khat leh suun khat tuithuuh laiah ka um a;

Khualzinna ah tampivei, tuitung a lauhuai ah, suamhaatte laha lauhuai ah, ka chipihte laha lauhuai ah, Jentelte laha lauhuai ah, khopi sunga lauhuai ah, gamdai a lauhuai ah, tui khang lian a lauhuai ah, unau tahloute laha lauhuai ah;
Tohgimna leh hahsatna ah, tampivei ihmut louhna ah, gilkialna leh dangtaahna ah, tampivei anngawlna ah, dap thuaahna leh saguah na ah.
Polama hu silte chih louh zong, kouhtuam pawlte ka ngaihtuahna nichina hung net zing ka tungah a um hi.
Koi haat louhna ka haat louhpih a um ei? koi puuhna ka tawmpih louh a um ei?
Ki suang diing ka hih taah a leh ka haat louhna lam silte ka suang diing hi.
Pathian leh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pa, kumtuanga paahtawi a um in ka zuau louh a he hi.
Damaska ah kumpipa Areta nuaia gamoptupa’n kei hung matsah tum in Damaskate khopi a veengsah a;
Huleh kotta ah bawmin kulhpangah ahung khaikhesuh va, huchi'n a khut apat ka suaahtata hi.
Kei diingin kiuahsah phatuam sih tamahleh; Silmuh leh Lalpa kilaahna ka hung soi diing hi.
Kum sawmleli ahita, Khrist a um mi khat ka he a, (sapum in ahiai a um ka he sih; sapum louin ahiai a um ka he sih; Pathian in a he hi; ) huchibang mi khat chu vaan thumna tanah laahtouhin a um a.
Huleh huchibang mi khat chu ka he a, (sapum in ahiai, sapum louin ahiai a um ka he sih; Pathian in a he hi; )
Amah chu paradis ah laahtouh in a um a, mihing diing a soi sianglou, soi guallouh thu a va ja hi.
Huchibang mi chu ka suang diing hi; keimah ka hihleh, ka haatlouhna loungal ka suang sih diing hi.

Ajiahchu kisuan ut mahleng mingol ka hi sih diing; thutah soi diing ka hi ngal a; hizongleh mi koi aha in ahung muh bang leh ka thu a jah bang sanga ahung ngaih loupi louhna diingin ka kideeh diing hi.
Huleh kilaahnate nasat beehseehna jala ka kingaihsang taatluat louhna diingin, Setan sawlleh ahung tuum diing ling khat ka tahsa ah ahung kipia hi; huchilouin chu ka kingaisang talokha diing hi.
Kei apat a chiahmangna diingin, hi sil jiahin Lalpa kawmah thumvei ka ngen a.

Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, Ka hehpihna nang a diingin a huntawh hi; ajiahchu ka haatna chu haat louhna ah suhbukim in a um hi, a chi a. Hujiahin Khrist silbawltheihna ka tunga a um theihna diingin, kipaahtahin ka haatlouhnate ka suang zaw diing hi.
Hujiahin haat louhnate ah, suhduhdahnate ah, taahsapnate ah, sawihnate ah, hahsatnate ah Khrist jiahin ka kipaah hi; ajiahchu ka haat louh hun tahchiangin ka haat hi.

Kiuahsahna in mingol ka hung suaahta; nangun huchilou thei louin na hung bawl uhi; ajiahchu na hung paahtawi zawh diing uh ka hi a; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh bangmah hi sih zongleh sawlleh lianpentahpa ka phaahlelhna bangmah a um sih hi.
Tahzetin sawlleh hihna chiamchihnate chu kuhkalna chintengin, chiamchihnate in, silmahte in, silbawl loupite in na lahvah bawl ahi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh ke’n nanguh ka hung suhbuai louh chih louh, bang lamah ahiai kouhtuam pawl dangte sanga nuainungzaw a na um uh? hi suhkhelhna hung ngaidam un.

Ngai un, na kawmva hung diing a ka kipeih a thum veina diing ahi; ka hung subuai sih diing hi; bang jiahin ahiai chihleh na sil neih uh hawl ka hi sih a, nanguh hung hawl ka hi zaw hi; ajiahchu tate’n nulepa diing a, a kholkhawm diing uh ahi sih a, nulepate’n tate diing a, a kholkhawm diing uh ahi zaw hi.
Huleh ke’n chu nanguh diingin kipaahtahin ka seeng diinga, ka kiseeng bei diing hi; ke’n nanguh hung lungsiat sem in, nangun kei hung lungsiat moh sem zongleh u’chin.
Hizongleh ahi hi hitaleh, nanguh ka hung subuai sih hi; ahihvangin lungsim siam a doha a ka hung mat na hi uhi.
Na kawmva ka hung sawlte laha koiaha zangin nanguh apat punna ka siamkha eimah?

Tita chu na kawmva hung diingin kana deih ngei a, huleh amah toh unaupa khat ka hung sawl hi. Tita in nanguh ah punna a siamkha moleh? hagau kibangin ka gamtakhawm sih viai mah? kalsuan kibanga chiah hilou ka hi viai mah?
Na lahva kei uleh keiuh kiphelhna diing hawl a hung ngaihtuah na hi u'maw? Khrist ah Pathian ma ah thu ka soi uh; hizongleh deihtahte, sil zousiah chu nanguh hoihna diingin ka bawl uhi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh ka hung chianga nanguh ka hung muh diing banga ka hung muh louhkha diing leh, kei na hung muh louh diing bang va na hung muh khaah diing ka lau hi; huchilou inchu kinialnate, kithangsiatnate, lungthahnate, kikhinnate, kisoisiatnate, kiguuhhounate, uanghaamnate, huleh buainate ahung umkha diing hi.

Huleh ka hung kiit chiangin ka Pathian in na lahvah hung sumualphou in, tuma a na sualta sa, hizongleh si an louhna leh kingaihna leh huuhnate ana bawltaah vapat kisiih lou mi tampite ka kahkhumkha diing hi.
Hichu na kawmva ka hung a thumveina diing ahi. Heetpihtu nih leh thum kamah thu chinteng suhkip in a um diing hi.

Tuma in ka hung hilhta hi, a nihveina a na kawmva ka umlai a ka soi bangin, tuin na kawmva um louin, tumalama sil bawlsualte leh midang zousiah kawmah ka hung ma soi ahi, ka hung kiit inchu ka hawi sih diing hi.
Nangun Khrist, keimaha thusoi chu heetchi ana na bawl jiahun, amah nanguh lamah a haatlou sih a, na lahvah silbawltheitah ahi zaw hi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh haatlouhna jalin kilhbeh in um mahleh, Pathian silbawltheihna in a hing zing ahi. Ajiahchu keiuh zong amah ah haat lou ka hi va, hizongleh Pathian silbawltheihna in nanguh lamah amah toh ka hingkhawm diing uhi.
Ginna ah na umna viai mah nang uleh nanguh kienkhia unla; nanguh mimal kienchian un. Nang u’ah Jesu Khrist a um chih nanguh ngei in kiheet lou na hi viai mah? deih louh na hih louhngal uleh.
Hizongleh kei u’chu deih louh ka hi sih uh chih na he diing uh chih ka gingta hi.

Huleh silgilou na bawl louhna diingun Pathian kawmah ka ngen hi; huchu keiuh deihhuai a ka kilat theihna diing uh ahi sih a, nangun keiuh deih louh hitamah le’ung, a kilawm photmah na bawl theihna diing uh ahi zaw hi.
Ajiahchu thutah a diing chih louh chu, thutah dou diingin bangmah ka bawl thei sih uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh keiuh ka haat louh va, nanguh na haat chiangun ka kipaah uhi; huleh na hoih bukimna diing u’zong ka ngen veu uhi.
Hujiahin suse diing hilou a, bawl hoih diing zaw a Lalpa hungpiah thuneihna dungjuia ka hung vau louhna diingin, na kawmva ka um louh laiin hi silte ka hung gial hi.
A tawp pen in, unaute, kipaahtahin um un. Hoihbukim in um unla, hamuangtahin um unla, lungsim munkhat pua unla, kituaahtahin um un; huleh lungsiatna leh hamuanna Pathian na kawmvah a um diing hi.
Kitawp siangthou in khat leh khat chibai kibuuh un.
Misiangthoute zousiah in nanguh chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Lalpa Jesu Khrist hehpihna leh, Pathian lungsiatna leh, Hagau Siangthou kipawlpihna na bawnva tungah umta hen. Amen.
Paul, sawlleh, (mihing apat hilou, mihing vanga zong hilou, Jesu Khrist leh Pa Pathian, misi lah akipana amah kaithoutu vang a hizaw) in,
Huleh ka umpih unau zousiahte’n, Galatia gam a kouhtuamte kawmah;
Pa Pathian leh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist kawma kipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen,
Amah chu Pathian leh i Pa uh deihdan dungjuiin tulai khovel giloutah lah akipan ahung suahtaatsah theihna diingin i sualnate luang in a kipeta hi.
Pathian kawmah loupina kumtuang kumtuang in um zingta hen. Amen.
Khrist hehpihna a nanguh hung koutu apat tukikal a tanchinpha danga na kituan mei uh thumah ka sa hi;
Huchu tanchinpha dang ahi sih a; hizongleh nanguh hung subuai in Khrist tanchinpha ahilou zawng a hei ut mi khenkhat a um ahi.
Hizongleh keiuh hiin, vaan apat angel hitaleh, tanchinpha na kawmva ka soi uh loungal tanchinpha dang mawngmawng na kawmva hung soi a umleh haamseloh in um heh.
Tuma a ka soi mahbangun tuin zong ka soi jel ahi, tanchinpha na muhsa pen uh loungal tanchinpha dang mi koipouh in na kawmva ahung soi leh haamseloh in um heh.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chihleh ke’n tuin mihing ahiai ka zawl, Pathian ahiai? ahihlouhleh mihing suhlungkim tum ka hiai mah? mihing suhlungkim tum nalai hitaleng Khrist suaah ka hi sih diing hi.
Huchi'n unaute, ka tanchinpha soi chu mihing lam thu ahi sih chih ka hung hesah ahi.
Ajiahchu mihing apat ka muh zong ahi sih a, mi hung hilh zong ka hi sih, hizongleh Jesu Khrist kilaahna jiaha ka muh ahi zaw hi.
Ajiahchu malai a Juda mite biah dana ka umlai a ka tungtaang, bangchi banga Pathian kouhtuamte theihtawpa sawi a, subuaitu ka hihdan na zata uhi.
Huleh ka pulepate thugousiah a phatuam ka ngaih diahkhol jiahin Judate biahdan lama zong ka chipihte laha ka khangual tampi kana khup hi.
Hizongleh ka nu gilsunga ka umlai apat hung koihtuamtu leh, a hehpihna a hung koutu Pathian in,
Jentelte laha a tanchinpha ka soi theihna diingin a Tapa chu keimaha kilaahsah pha a sah laiin tahsa leh sisan ka dong sih a,
Jerusalem khua ah, kei sanga sawlleh hi masate kawma zong ka chiahtou sih a; Arabia gam ah ka chiah zaw a, huin Damaska khua ah ka hung kileh kiitta hi.
Huin kum thum nungin Jerusalem ah Peter kimuhpih diingin ka chiahtou a, a kawmah ni sawm leh ni ngaa ka va um hi,
Hizongleh Lalpa sanggampa Jakob chih louh sawlleh dangte khatbeeh ka mu sih hi.
Tuin na kawmva ka thu gelhte, en un, Pathian ma ah ka zuau lou ahi.
Hunungin Syria leh Silisia gam ah ka hungta hi.
Huleh Judia gam a Khrist a um kouhtuamte meelheet louhin ka um nalai hi.
Hizongleh, tuma a eiuh hung sawipa’n khatvei laia a suhsiat taah ginna chu tuin a taangkoupihta, chih thu chauh a ja uhi.
Huleh amahun keimah ah Pathian a paahtawita uhi.
Huin kum sawm leh kum li nungin Barnaba toh Jerusalem ah ka chiahtou kiit a, huleh Tita zong ka pui uhi.

Huleh kilaahna dungjuiin ka chiah tou a, Jentelte kawma ka tanchinpha soi chu a kawmvah ka hilh a, hizongleh mi zahum deuhte chu a tuamin ka hilh hi, huchilou inchu bangchi aha in a thawn a tai ka hikha diing hi.
Hizongleh ka tonpih Tita chu Grik mi ahihvangin zehtansah teitei in a um sih hi.
Huleh huchu suaah ahung tansah theihna diing va, Khrist Jesu a i zalenna neih uh enkhe diing a guuhsima hung luut unau tahloute jiah giap ahi.
Tanchinpha thutah chu na kawmva a um zing theihna diingin pung khat sung jiang zong a thunuai va kipeluut lou hial ka hi uh.
Hizongleh mi zahum deuh a kisoite lahah chu (bangtobang hita le uh kei diingin a poi sih; Pathian in koimah deihsah tuam a nei sih) mi zahum deuh a kisoite’n bangmah ahung soisah tuan sih uhi.
Soisah naah sangin, zehtante tanchinpha Peter kawma kepsah a, a um bangin zehtan louhte tanchinpha ka kawmah kepsah in a um chih a he uhi.
Ajiahchu zehtante sawlleh hi diing a Peter a silbawltu ngei in, Jentelte sawlleh hi diingin keimah ah sil nasatahin a bawl hi.

Huleh khuam bang hial a um Jakob leh Kipha leh John in ka kawma hehpihna hung kipia a heet phetun, keiuh Jentelte kawma chiah a, amahuh zehtante kawma chiah diingin kei leh Barnaba chu kipawlkhawmna khut jiatlam ahung pia uhi.
Migentheite ka heet zing uh a deih va, huchu ke’n zong bawl ka tup zing mawng ahi.
Hizongleh Antiok khua a Peter a hung in demna a um jiahin a maaitang ah kana salh hi.
Ajiahchu ama’n Jakob kawm apata mi koite aha ahung ma un Jentelte kawmah an a ne veu a; hizongleh amahuh a hungtahun zehtante a lau jiahin a nungtawl a, a um tuamta hi.
Huleh Judami dangte zong huchibangin amah toh a lepchiah va; huchi'n Barnaba nasan zong a lepchiahna va puimang in a umta hi.

Hizongleh tanchinpha thutah bangin a um sih uh chih ka muh in, Peter kawmah, a bawnva ma ah, Nang Judami hi a, Judate um banga um lou a, Jentelte um banga na um ngal leh, bang diinga Jentelte Judami um banga umsah tum na hiai mah? ka chi a.
Kei u’chu Jentel misualte hilou in, Judami mawng a piang ka hi uh.

Daan silte bawl jiahin mi siamtang in a um sih a, Jesu Khrist gintaat jiah chauhin siamtang in a um uh chih i he a, en zong daan silbawl jiah hilou a, Khrist ginna jiaha siamtang a i um theihna diingin Khrist Jesu chu i gingta ahi; ajiahchu daan silte bawl jiahin koimah siamtang in a um sih diing hi.
Hizongleh Khrist ah siamtang a um tum kawmpi a eimah ngei zong misualte i na hih leh, hujiahin Khrist sualna natongtu ahiai mah? Hi dawilou.
Keima’n ka sil suhsiatte bawlpha kiitta leng, daan botsetu ka hi chih ka kihesah phet ahi diing hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian lama ka hin theihna diingin, kei chu daan jiahin daan lamah ka sita hi.

Khrist toh kilhbeh in ka um hi; hizongleh ka hing ahi; keimah hing hi nawn louin, Khrist keimah ah a hing ahi zaw hi; huleh tu a tahsa a ka hin chu, ahung lungsiat a ka luang a kipepa Pathian tapa ginna a hing ka hi.
Pathian hehpihna chu bangmahlou ka suaahsah sih; ajiahchu daan jiaha siamtanna a um inchu Khrist a thawn a si ahi diing hi.
Aw Galatia mingolte, na lahva, na mitmuh ngei va Jesu Khrist chu kilhbeh a chiantah a kipuangta, hu thutah chu jui lou diing a kua’n hung bumngol ahitai?
Na lahva kipan hi chauh ka he nuam hi, Daan silte bawl jiahin ahiai Hagau chu na muh uh, ahihlouhleh na ngaihkhiah va na gintaat jiahun?
Hichi lawmin na ngol uh ahi maw? Hagau a pan zouta in, tahsa a subukim diing na hi uh maw?
Sil huzahpi a thawn a thuaah na hi viai mah? a thawn bang hitaleh.
Hujiahin na kawmva Hagau hung petu leh, na lahva silmah bawltu in daan silte bawl jiahin ahiai a bawl, ahihlouhleh na ngaihkhiah va na gintaat jiahun?
Abraham in Pathian a gingta a, huchu a dihtatna a sehsah ahih mahbangin.
Hujiahin ginna a umte, hute mah chu Abraham tate ahi uh chih he un.
Huleh Pathian lehkhathu in, ginna jiahin Pathian in Jentelte siam a tangsah diing chih helawh in, Abraham kawmah, Nangmah ah nam zousiah vangpiahin a um diing uh, chih tanchinpha ana soita hi.
Huchi ahihjiahin ginna a umte chu mi ginum Abraham toh vangpiahkhawm in a um uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chihleh daan silbawlte a um photmahte chu haamse nuai a um ahi uh; ajiahchu hichibanga gelh ahi, Daanbu a bawl diing a kigial zousiah jui zing lou chu haamsiat in a um uhi.
Hizongleh Pathian mitmuh in koimah daan a siamtang a um sih uh chih a lang chian hi; ajiahchu, Midihtat chu ginna in a hing diing, chih ahi.
Huleh daan chu ginna a suaah ahi sih a, hizongleh, Huchibang a bawltu chu hute ah a hing diing hi, chih ahi zaw hi.
Khrist chu ei luang a haamsiata hung um in, daan haamsiatna apatin ahung tandohta hi; ajiahchu hichibanga gelh ahi, Singdawna khailup photmah chu haamse thuaah ahi uh.
Huchi'n Abraham tunga vangpiahna chu Jesu Khrist jala Jentelte tunga ahung um a, eihawn Hagau chiam chu ginna jala i muhtheihna diingun ahi.
Unaute, mihing daanin ka soi ahi; hichu mihing thuhun hitamahleh, suhkip ahih inchu koima’n a phel ngei sih a, beh zong a behlap ngei sih uhi.
Huleh Abraham leh a haah kawmah ahi thuchiam chu na kipia. Ama’n tampite soina bangin, Chihaahte kawmah, a chih sih a, mi khat tungthu soi bangin, Na chihaah kawmah, a chih zaw hi, huchu Khrist ahi.
Huleh hichu ka soi ahi, Pathian in Khrist a, a suhkipsa thuhun chu, kum ja li leh kum sawmthum nunga hung um daanin thuchiam chu bangmahlou suaah diingin a sumang thei sih hi.
Gouluah diing chu daan jiah ahihleh, thuchiam jiah ahita sih diing hi; hizongleh Pathian in thuchiam jiahin Abraham ana peta hi.
Ahihleh bang diinga daan um ahiai leh? Hichu, chihaah, a kawma thuchiam piah a umpa ahung masiah, bohsiatna jiahin behlap in a um a, angelte zanga palai khut a suhkip ahi.
Huleh palai chu mi khat chauh palai ahi sih a, Pathian ahihleh khat ahi.
Ahihleh daan chu Pathian thuchiam kalh ahiai mah? Hi lou hial; hinna pe thei daan ana kipeta hitaleh siamtansahna chu daan jiahin a um ngei diing hi.
Hizongleh Jesu Khrist gin jiaha thuchiam chu a gingtate a kipiah theihna diingin, Pathian lehkhathu in mi zousiah sualna nuaiah a khaahkhumta hi.
Hizongleh ginna ahung tun ma in daan nuai a kol in ina um a, hung kilang diing ginna ah khaahkhum in i na um uhi.
Huchi'n daan chu, ginna jiaha siam i tantheihna diing a Khrist kawma hung pui diing, i hilhtupa uh ana hi hi.
Hizongleh ginna ahung tun nungin hilhtupa nuaiah i um nawnta sih uhi.
Ajiahchu na bawnun Khrist Jesu ginna jiahin Pathian tate na hi uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chihleh na lahva Khrist a baptisma tang photmah chu Khrist a kithuam na hita uhi.
Huah chu Judami, Grik mi a um nawn sih; saltaang leh zalen zong a um nawn sih; huleh pasal leh numei zong a um nawn sih hi; ajiahchu na bawnun Khrist Jesu ah pumkhat na hita uhi.
Huleh Khrist a na hih unchu, Abraham haah, thuchiam dungjui a gouluah diingte na hi uhi.
Hizongleh hichi'n ka chi hi, Gouluahtu diing chu bangkim tunga houtu hizongleh naupang ahih laisiah, suaah toh kilimdanna a nei tuan sih hi.
A pa hunguat a tun masiahin a dontute leh a enkoltute nuaiah a um zaw hi.
Huchibang mahin ei zong naupang i hih laiin khovel thubulte nuaiah suaah in ina um uhi.
Hizongleh a hunbi ching ahung tuntahin, Pathian in a Tapa, chu numei suanin, daan nuai a bawl in ahung sawlkheta hi,
Ta hihsahna i muhtheihna diing a, daan nuai a umte tankhe diingin.
Huleh ta na hih jiahun Pathian in a Tapa Hagau chu, Abba, Pa, chia kikou in na lungtang vah ahung sawlkheta hi.
Huchi'n suaah na hi nawn sih a, ta na hi zawta hi; huleh ta na hihleh, Khrist jala Pathian gouluahtu diing zong na hi hi.
Huchi hitamahleh, Pathian na heet ma un, a pianzia mawng va pathian hiloute nna nana tong uhi.
Hizongleh tu a Pathian na hung heet nung va, ahihlouhleh Pathian heet mi na hung hihzawh mah nung va, bang diinga thubul zawngkhal leh manlouhte suaah a luut kiit ut a, kiheikiit na hi viai?
Nite, hate, hunte leh kumte na tang veu uh.
Bangchi aha in na tungvah ka tonggim thawnkha diing chih ka hung lausah hi.
Unaute, ka hung ngen hi, keimah bangin um un; ajiahchu kei zong nanguh bangin ka um hi; ka bangmah na suse hial sih uhi.
Na kawmva tanchinpha ka soi masatna pen chu ka tahsa haatlouhna pum in ahi chih na he uhi.
Huleh ka tahsa a nanguh diing a ze-etna um chu na musit sih va, nual zong na nual sih uh, hizongleh Pathian angel bang leh, Khrist Jesu bang hialin na hung pom zaw uhi.
Ahihleh vangpha na kisahna uh khoi a um ahitai? Ajiahchu, hithei hile bawn na mit uh kheidoh in na hung pe hial diing uh chih heetpihna ka hung nei hi.
Huchi a thutah ka hung hilh jiahin na meelma uh hung hita ka hiai mah?
Amahun phatuamngaitahin nanguh ahung hawl va, a hoih lamin ahi sih hi; nangun amahuh na hawl theihna diing va, hung poseh tum ahi zaw uhi.
Hizongleh bangchihtan a a hoih lam a phatuamngaitah a hawl a um zing chu a hoih hi, na kawmva ka um sung chauh hilou in.
Ka naute aw, nanguh a Khrist siam piching a a um masiah nausuaahnat thuaahin ka hung thuaah kiit hi,
Tuin na kawmva um a, ka aw suhlimdang ka ut ngei mai; ajiahchu na tung thu uh ka hung lauthawngpih hi.
Hung hilh un, nanguh daan nuaia um utte, daanthu ngaikhe lou na hi viai mah?
Ajiahchu hichibang a gelh ahi, Abraham in tapa nih a nei a, khat chu a suaahnu toh, huleh khatpen chu a suaahlounu toh.
Hizongleh suaahnu laha chu tahsa daan a piang ahi a; suaahlounu laha pen chu thuchiam jiaha piang ahi, chih.
Hi thu hi tehkhinna ahi; hi numei nihte chu thuhun nihte ahi uh; khat chu Sinai taang apat sala taang diinga ta neinu ahi a, huchu Hagar ahi.
Huleh Hagar chu Arabia gam a Sinai taang ahi a, tulaia um Jerusalem, huleh a tate toh sala taang khawm kisoina ahi.
Hizongleh tunglam Jerusalem chu a zalen a, huchu i bawnva nu ahi.
Ajiahchu hichi'n a kigial hi, Nang, ta nei lou a chiingnu, nuamin; nang, nausuaahnat thuaahlounu, ngaihtahin kikoudoh in; ajiahchu pasal neinu sangin a tang a umnu in ta a nei tamzaw hi chih.
Huchi'n unaute, eiuh chu Isaak banga thuchiam tate i hi uhi.
Hizongleh hulaia tahsa daan a piangin Hagau daan a piang a sawi bangin tuin zong huchi ahi.
Ahihvangin lah Pathian lehkhathu in bang ahiai a soi? Suaahnu chu a tapa toh delhmang un; suaahnu ta pa in suaahlounu tapa toh gou a luahkhawm sih diing hi, a chi hi.
Huchi'n unaute, suaahnu tate i hi sih a, suaahlounu tate i hi zaw uhi.
Hujiahin suaah hi nawn lou diing a Khrist in ahung zalensahna ah ding kip unla, suaah ngawngkol ah taang kiit nawn sih un.
Ngai un, kei Paul in na kawmva ka soi ahi, zeh na tan uleh Khrist nanguh diingin bangmah phatuam lou diing ahi.
Ajiahchu zehtante zousiah kawmah, daan zousiah juih diing na bat ahi, chih ka hung hesah kiit hi.
Nanguh, daan a siam kitangsah pouhmahte, Khrist chu nanguh diingin a phatuam lou ahita a, hehpihna na puuhsanta uhi.
Ajiahchu kei un Hagau jalin ginna a siamtanna kinepna chu ka ngaah uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chihleh Jesu Khrist ah zehtan bangmah a phatuam sih a, zehtan louh zong bangmah a phatuam sih hi; lungsiatna a tong ginna chu a phatuam hi.
Hoihtahin na tai uh ka sa a, thutah jui lou diingin kua’n ahiai nanguh hung daal?
Hi heemna chu nanguh hung koutu apat ahi sih hi.
Tol tawmtakhat in tanghou beupi a jelsuaah hi.
Nangun lungdang na geel sih diing uh chih Lalpa ah ka hung muang hi; hizongleh nanguh hung subuaitu in, koi hita zongleh, a tunga thupuuh chu a thuaah diing hi.
Huleh unaute, ke’n zehtan thu soi nalai hileng, bang diinga sawihna thuaah nalai ka hiai? Huchi ahihleh kros a kipalpuuhna chu suhbei ahita diing hi.
Nanguh hung subuaite kisaatkhe hial maileh ka ut hi.
Ajiahchu, unaute, zalen diing a kou na hi uh a, na zalenna uh tahsa diing a lemtaanna in zang sih unla, lungsiatna in khat leh khat nna kitohsah zaw un.
Ajiahchu, nangmah na kilungsiat bangin na inn veengte na lungsiat diing ahi, chih thuteng khatah daanthu zousiah suhbukim in a um hi.
Hizongleh na kikeih va, na kineehtuah uleh na kisuhmang louhna diingun pilvaang un.
Huchi'n hi ka soi ahi, Hagau ah um un, huleh tahsa utna na sutaangtung sih diing uhi.
Ajiahchu tahsa in Hagau a dou a, Hagau in tahsa a dou hi; sil na bawltumte uh na bawl theih louhna diingun, hite chu a kikalhtuah veu uh ahi.
Hizongleh Hagau pui a na um unchu daan nuaia um na hi sih uhi.
Huleh tahsa silbawlte chu a kilang hi, huchu hite ahi; aangkawmna, kingaihna, thanghuaina, huuhna.
Milimbiahna, bumna, muhdahna, kihauna, thangsiatna, lungthahna, kilanna, kikhinna, gintuamna,

Deihgohna; tualthahna, zukhamna, eltol gualnop bawlna leh huchibang dangdangte ahi; huchibang silbawlte’n Pathian gam a luah sih diing uh, chi a malai a ka hung hilh taah mah bangin, ka hung hilh khawl hi,
Hagau gah ahihleh, lungsiatna, kipaahna, hamuanna, thuaahtheihna, jainemna, hoihna, ginumna,
Thunuaigolhna, kisuumtheihna, ahi; hichibangte kalhin daan a um sih hi.
Huleh Khrist a hi mite’n tahsa chu a lunggulhna leh a duhgawlna toh a kilhbehta uhi.
Hagau a hing i hihleh, Hagau mah ah i um diing uh,
Khat leh khat kilang leh kithangsiat a um louin, a mawh a kiloupisah i tum sih diing uhi.
Unaute, mi kua aha a suhkhelhna a matdoha a um leh, nanguh hagau mite’n, nangmah ngei zong heemna na tuaahkha diing chih ngaihtuah in, huchibang mi chu thunuaigolhtahin tung diing kiit un.
Khat leh khat na puaahgih uh kidawn chiat unla, huchi'n Khrist daan juikim un.
Ajiahchu mi bangmah hiloupi a a kingaih saang leh amah leh amah a kihem ahi.
Hizongleh mi chinin amah natoh kietchian chiat zaw heh, huchi'n midang tung hilou in, amah chauh tungah suan diing a nei diing hi.
Ajiahchu mi chinin amah puaah chiat kipuaah diing ahi.
Thuhilh a umpa in a hilhtu kawmah sil hoih zousiah pephal heh.
Heem in um sih un; Pathian chu muhsit gual ahi sih hi; ajiahchu mi’n a tuh phot uh, humah chu a aat kiit diing uhi.
Ajiahchu tahsalama tuhpa’n tahsalama siatna a aat diing a; hizongleh Hagau lama tuhpa’n chu Hagau a kumtuang hinna a aat diing hi.
Huleh sil hoih bawl i chimtaah sih diing uh; ajiahchu i lungkiah louhleh a hun tahin i aat diing uhi.
Hujiahin hun lemtaang i neih bangjelin mi zousiah kawmah sil hoih i bawl diing uh, a diahkhol in ginna a i innkuanpihte kawma i bawl diing uhi.
Keimah khut ngei a, na kawmva jem golpipia lehkha ka hung gelh en un.
Tahsa a kilat hoih tum photmahte’n zehtan diingin nanguh ahung sawl teitei uh; bangmah dang hilou in, Khrist kros jiaha sawihna a thuaah louhna diingun ahi.
Ajiahchu, amahuh zehtante mawngin zong daanthu a jui tuan sih uhi, na tahsa va suan diing a neih theihna diingun zehtan le u’chin chih a deih phet uh ahi.
Hizongleh ke’n chu i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist kros loungal ka suang het sih diing hi; amah jiahin khovel kei diingin kilhbeh ahita a, kei khovel diingin kilhbeh ka hita hi.
Ajiahchu Khrist Jesu ah chu, siamthahna loungal, zehtan bangmah a phatuam sih a, zehtan louh zong bangmah a phatuam sih hi.
Huleh hi daan banga umte tengteng tungah hamuanna leh khotuahna um hen, huleh Pathian Israelte tungah zong.
Tua kipanin koima’n hung subuai nawn sih heh, ajiahchu ka tahsa ah Lalpa Jesu chiamtehna ka pua hi.
Unaute, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na hagau uh kawmah um hen. Amen.
Paul Pathian deihzawng a Jesu Khrist sawlleh in, Ephesa khua a um misiangthoute leh Khrist Jesu a mi ginumte kawmah;
Pathian i Pa uleh Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawma kipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Vaanmunte a Khrist a hagaulam vangpiahna chinteng a vang hung pepa i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pathian leh Pa chu phatin um hen:
A ma a siangthou leh soiselbei a i um theihna diing a leilung pian ma a lungsiatna a Khrist a ahung na teel dungjuiin;
Amah lungguat leh deihzawng bangin, Jesu Khrist jiaha amah a diinga ta a bawl diingin ahung na guatlawhta hi,
A hehpihna loupidan paahtawi diingin, hu hehpihna a’chu a lungsiat mahmahpa ah deihtaah in ahung siamta hi.
Amah ah a sisan jalin tatkhiahna i nei a, a hehpihna hauhdan dungjui a i sualnate ngaihdamna.
Hu hehpihna ah ama’n pilna leh lemheetna zousiah in ahung vuh hi.
Ama’n a lungdeihzawng a amah a bawl a tup bangin a lungguat thuguuh i kawma hung hesah in;
Hunbi khenna kim ahung hun chiang a amah ngei a vaan a sil umte leh, leitung a sil umte a bawna Khrist a khata a suhtuahkhawmna diingin,
Amah lunggel bang jel a sil zousiah bawlpa tup banga guatlawhsa hi in, amah ah gouluah diing a siam i hi uhi.
Eiuh Khrist a na ging masate, a loupidan paahtawina i hihtheihna diingin.
Amah ah nanguh zong thutah thu, na hutdamna tanchinpha uh na ngaihkhiah va, gin zong na gintaat nungun, amah ah chiamna Hagau siangthou a chiamchih in na um uhi,
Huchu Pathian loupidan paahtawina diing a gou leisa tatkhiahna hun masiah diing a i gouluah diing uh khaamna ahi.
Hujiahin ke’n zong Lalpa Jesu a na ginna uleh, misiangthoute zousiah tung a na lungsiatna uh ka na jah in,
Ka haamteinate ah na min uh lou in, nanguh jiaha kipaahthu soi ka tawp sih hi;
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pathian, loupina Pa in amah heetna lam thu a pilna leh kilaahna hagau nanguh ahung piah theihna diingin;
Na lungsim mitte uh suhvaah a hung um a, a kouhna kinepna bang, misiangthoute a, a goutan diing loupina hauhzia bang,
Huleh a silbawltheihna haatna natoh dungjui a ei a gingtate lama a silbawltheihna nasatdan bang na hung heettheihna diingun.
Misi laha kipana a kaihthoh lai leh, vaan munte a, a jiatlam a,
Lalnate leh silbawltheihnate leh, haatnate leh, vaihawmnate leh, hi khovel chauh hilou a khovel hung tung diing a zong min kiphuaah zousiah tunglam peha a tousah lai a Khrist a, a bawl chu.
Huleh sil zousiah a keeng nuaiah a koihta a, amah chu sil zousiah tungah lutang hi diingin kouhtuam kawmah a pia hi,
Huchu a tahsa ahi, a taangchinna a bangkim zousiah sudimpa ngei.
Huleh nanguh na bohsiatna uleh na sualna uh jiaha si chu ahung hundam a;
Hu a chu, tumalaiin hi khovel daan bangin na um va, huihkhua a thuneitu lal, tu a thumanglou tate sunga tong zingtu hagau daan bangin;
Hute lahah eiuh zong tumalaiin i tahsa utna ah, i tahsa leh i lungsim deihzawng supiching in i um va; huleh mi dangte banga piandan mawng a lungthahna tate i na hi uhi.
Hizongleh Pathian, khotuahna haupa’n, a lungsiatna nasatah a eite ahung lungsiatna jiahin,
Sual a si i hih laiun zong Khrist toh ahung suhingkhawmta a, (hehpihna a hutdamna hi uh; )
Huleh amah toh ahung kaithoukhawmta a, vaan munahte Khrist Jesu ah ahung toukhawmsahta hi.
Huchi'n hun hung tung diingte ah Khrist Jesu jala i tunga a chitna a a hehpihna hauh nasatdan a ensah thei diing hi.
Ajiahchu hehpihna a ginna jala hutdam na hi uh; hu zong nanguh a suaah ahi sih a; Pathian silthawnpiah ahi;
Natoh jiahin ahi sih, huchilou inchu mi’n a suang kha diing uh.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh, Pathian in malai peha i umna diing a ana guatkholh Khrist Jesu a nna hoih tong diing a siam, amah khutsuaah i hi uhi.
Hujiahin nanguh tumalam a tahsa a Jentelte, tahsa khuta tan zehtan a chihte un zehtanlouh ahung chihte uh,
Huchih lai a Khrist nei lou a, Israel khua leh tui toh kimat loua, khovel a kinepna bei leh Pathian nei lou a na um va, chiamna thuhunte laha mikhual a ana um na hih uh he zing un.
Hizongleh tuin chu Khrist Jesu ah, nanguh ni danga gamlapia umte, Khrist sisan a suhnai in na umta uhi.
Ajiahchu amah hi i kilemna uh ahi a, i kikala kidaidanna baang chu suchim in, nihte chu pumkhat in a siamta hi;
Biahna silbawlte a thupiah dan umte kimeelmatna chu a tahsa a sumang in, amah ah nihte chu mihing thah khata siam diingin kilemna a bawl hi.
Kimeelmatna chu kros a sulum in, humah in nihte chu sapumkhat a Pathian toh a kilepsah theihna diingin.
Huleh amah chu hungin, nanguh gamlapia umte kawmah lemna tanchinpha ahung soi a, huleh naitakhat a umte kawma zong ahung soi hi.
Ajiahchu amah jiahin eihaw’n Hagau khat in Pa kawma luut theihna i nei tuaah uhi.
Hujiahin tuin chu mikhual leh gamtuammi na hi nawn sih va, misiangthoute toh khotual khat leh Pathian innkuante na hi zota uhi.
Huleh Jesu Khrist ngei chu a ninga suang poimohpen hiin, sawllehte leh zawlneite innbullep tung a lam na hi uhi.
Amah ah chu inn lam zousiah kituaahtah a suhtuah in, Lalpa ah biahinn siangthouin a khang tou ahi.
Amah ah nanguh zong Hagaua Pathian teenna diing a lepkhawm na hi uhi.
Hikhu jiahin kei Paul, nanguh Jentelte diing a Jesu Khrist suangkul taang in,
Nang u’diing a Pathian hehpihna kepna nna piah ka hih na jata ngei diing va;
Huchia kilaahna a thuguuh kiphual ka kawma ahung heetsah, (tuma a tomtakhat a ka gelh thute bang.
Huchu na sim chiangun Khrist thuguuh kiphual ka heetdan na hesiam diing uhi).
Huchu tulai a sawlleh siangthoute leh zawlneite kawma Hagau a heetsaha a um bangin, nidang laiin mihing tate kawmah heetsah in a um ngei sih hi;
Huchu hi ahi, tanchinpha jiahin Khrist ah Jentelte chu gouluahpihte, tahsa khata umte, thuchiam tanpihte ahi diing uh.
A silbawltheihna natohna a, a thawna Pathian hehpihna hung kipia dungjui a hu tanchinpha natong diing a siam ka hi.
Jentelte kawma Khrist hauhsatdan hawldoh seeng guallouh thute soi diing a kei misiangthoute zousiah laha neupen sanga neuzaw kawmah hi hehpihna chu piah ahi.
Kumtuanga kipana Jesu Khrist mang a sil zousiah siamtu Pathian a phual a um thuguuh kiphual kipawlkhawmna chu mi zousiah musah diingin;
Huchi'n tu a vaan munte a lalna leh thuneihnate kawmah Pathian pilna chinteng kouhtuam jiaha heetsaha a um theihna diingin.
I Lalpa uh Khrist Jesu a bawl a tup, a kumtuang silguat bang ngei in;
Amah ginna jiahin eihaw’n amah ah haansanna leh muangtah a luut theihna i nei uhi.
Hujiahin nanguh diing a ka gimthuaahte jiaha lungthuai lou diingin ka hung ngen hi, huchu na loupina uh ahi.
Hikhu jiahin i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pa ma ah ka khupdin a,
Lei leh vaan a innkuan chinteng min phuaahkhiahnapa ma ah,
A loupina hauhdan bang jel a, a Hagau jiaha mihing sungnung lama silbawltheihna a suhhaat a ahung umsah theihna diingin;
Khrist chu ginna a na lungtang va a teen theihna diingin; nanguh lungsiatna a zungha leh kiptah a um a,
Misiangthoute zousiah toh a letdan, a saudan, a saandan, huleh a thuuhdante na heetchian theihna diing uleh,
Khrist lungsiatna heetphaah guallouh na hung heet va, Pathian taangchinna zousiaha suhdim a na um theihna diingun.
Huchi'n eimaha tong jel silbawltheihna dungjui a i nget leh i ngaihtuah sanga loupizaw a bawltheitu kawmah,
Khrist Jesu jiahin kouhtuam ah kumtuang in, a khang a khang in loupina umta hen. Amen.
Hujiahin kei, Lalpa a mitaang in, kouh a na umna utoh kilawm tawh a gamta diingin ka hung ngen hi.
Kingaihngiamna leh thunuaigolhna zousiah, thuaahtheihna toh, lungsiatna a kithuahzoutuah chiat in;
Lemna gui a kaankhawm a Hagau kipumkhatna chu vom tinten in.
Kouh a na umna pen uh kinepna, mun khat a kouh na hih bangmah un, sapumkhat leh Hagau khat,
Lalpa khat, ginna khat, baptisma khat,
Pathian khat leh mi zousiah Pa, bangkim tunga um leh, bangkima um, huleh nanguh zousiaha um, a um hi.
Hizongleh Khrist silthawnpiah tehna bangjelin hehpihna chu i kawm chiat ah piah in a um hi.
Hujiahin ama’n, Tunglama a kaltouh laiin matte chu sal in a pui a, huleh mihingte kawmah silpiahte a pia hi, chi'n a soi hi.
(Huchi'n, a kaltou chihchu, a masa in leimun ngiampente ah a kumsuh chih louh bangdang chihna a diai?
A kumsuh pen chu sil zousiah a suhbukim theihna diing a vaan zousiah tungpeh a kaltoupa mah ahi).
Huleh ama’n khenkhatte chu sawlleh, khenkhatte zawlnei, khenkhatte tanchinpha soitu, khenkhatte pastor, huleh khenkhatte chu thuhilhtu a pia hi.
Misiangthoute suhbukimna diing leh, thunatohna natohna diing leh, Khrist sapum bawl hoihna diingin:
Ginna leh Pathian tapa heetna lama kithutuaah a, piching a, Khrist taangchinna dungtan i phaah chiat masiah uh;
Huchi'n dihlouhna heemna bangin, lepchiahpil a mihing heem a um a, thuhilhna huih chintenga lehlam lehlam a muutleeng lehleh naupangte hi nawnta louin,
Hizongleh lungsiatna a thutah soi in, sil zousiah ah amah ah i khang tou thei zaw diing hi, amah chu lutang ahi, Khrist chu.
Amah apat sapum pumpi kituaahtaha zopkhawm a um in, guhtuah chintengin sahiang dang chinteng natohna a piahdan dungjui chiat a, sapum chu lungsiatna a kibawl hoihin a khang tousah ahi.
Hujiahin hi ka soi hi, huleh Lalpa ah ka hung hesah hi, Jentelte a lungsim tavai uh pua a, a um bangun um nawn sih un,
A heetsiamna uh suhmial a um in, a sungva heetlouhna uh jalin Pathian hinna apat khen in a um uh, a lungtang uh ngon jiahin.
Amahun heettheihna mawngmawng a neih nawn louh jiahun sil sianglou chinteng huaihamtah a bawl diingin huuhna ah a kipumpiahta uhi.
Hizongleh nangun chu Khrist thu huchi bangin na zil sih uhi.
Jesu a um, thutah dungjuia amah thu ja a amah thuhilh a um na hih photmah uleh,
Na nidanglai umdan va mihing lui, heemna duhgawlna banga hoihlou deuhdeuh chu hawhkhia unla.
Na lungsim hagau vah a thah in hung um un,
Mihing thah, dihtatna leh siangthouna tah a Pathian banga siam in kithuam le u’chin, chih.
Huchi'n zuau soi tawpsan in, mi chinin a veengte kawmah thutah soi chiat un; ajiahchu eihaw khat leh khat kihiangtuah chiat i hi uhi.
Lungthah unla, sual chu sual sih un; na lungthahna uh ni in tumkhum sih heh.
Diabol zong mun ot sih un.
Guta in gu nawn sih henla, tasam kawm a piah diing a neih theihna diingin, a khuta sil hoih bawl in tonggim zaw heh.
Na kam vapat thusia pawt sih henla, hizongleh a ngaikhetute kawma hehpihna a piah theihna diingin, bawl hoihna diingin thu hoih pawt zaw heh.
Huleh Pathian Hagau Siangthou sulungngai sih un, tatna ni a diinga amah a chiamchih na hi uh.
Khaatnate, lungthahnate, hehnate, haanate, kisoisiatnate, hite zousiah na lah vapat koihmang in umta heh, giitlouhna zousiah toh;
Khat leh khat kingainatuah chiat unla, lungnem unla, Pathian in Khrist jiaha nanguh ahung ngaihdam bangin, nanguh zong kingaidamtuah chiat un.
Hujiahin ta deihtahte bangin Pathian umdan juitute hi un;
Khrist in ahung lungsiat a, ei u’diing a Pathian kawma silpiah leh kithoihna namtui diinga a kipiah bangin, lungsiatna ah um un.
Hizongleh misiangthoute umdan diinga kilawm him in, kingaihnate leh bolhhohna zousiah, huaihamna toh na lahvah lohkhaah in um sih heh;
Zahmohthute, thu ngolhuai a houlimte, chiamnuih thute bang zong kilawm lou ahi; hute sangin kipaahthu soi zaw un.
Ajiahchu kingaihhaat leh, mithanghuai leh, mihuaiham in (huchu milim bia ahi), Khrist leh Pathian gam ah tan mawngmawng a nei sih uh chih na he uhi.
Mi koimah in thu meimei pouhin hung heem sih u’heh; ajiahchu hi silte jiahin Pathian lungthahna chu thumanglou tate tungah a tung veu hi.
Hujiahin amahuh kithuahpih sih un.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh, nanguh tumalai in mial na hi va, tuin chu Lalpa ah vaah na hita uh; vaah tate bangin um un.
(Ajiahchu, Hagau gah ahihleh hoihna chinteng leh dihtatna leh thutah ah ahi).
Lalpa deihzawng bang aha chih en chian in.
Huleh mial natoh gah neiloute toh kithuahkhawm na nei sih unla, hizongleh a dih louhdan hesah zaw un.
Ajiahchu a guuh a, a silbawlte uh chu a soi zong a zumhuai hi.
Hizongleh sil zousiah a dih louhdan heetsah a um chu vaah suhlat ahi; ajiahchu sil sulang photmah chu vaah ahi.
Hujiahin ama’n, Nang ihmu khang inla, misi laha kipanin thou in, huchi'n Khrist in ahung salhvaah diing hi, a chi hi.
Huchi'n na umdan uh pilvaang un, mingolte banga um louin, mipilte bangin um un.
Nite a hoih louh jiahin hunlemtaang lei un.
Hujiahin ngol sih unla, Lalpa deihzawng bang ahiai chih hesiam zaw un.
Huleh uain kham in um sih unla, hu a’chu kisuum louhna a um hi; hizongleh Hagau a dim in um zaw un.
Phatna late, Pathian late, huleh hagaulam late a nang uleh nanguh kihou in, na lungtang vah Lalpa diingin kituaahtah leh kilawmtahin la sa un.
Bangkim tungah i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist minin Pathian leh Pa kawmah kipaahthu soi ngiitngeet un.
Pathian laudan siamna ah khat leh khat kituluuttuah chiat un.
Jite haw, Lalpa kawma bangin na pasalte uh kawmah kituluut un.
Ajiahchu Khrist kouhtuam lutang ahih a, sapum hundampa ahih bangin, pasal chu ji lutang ahi.
Hujiahin kouhtuam Khrist kawma a kituhluut mahbangin, jite chu sil bangkimah a pasalte uh kawmah kituluut u’heh.
Pasalte haw, Khrist in kouhtuam a lungsiat a, a luang va a kipiah bangin, nangun zong na jite uh lungsiat un.
Amah u’chu tui a sil a, thu a, a suhsianga a sawpsiang theihna diingin,
Huchia amahuh chu buahbaanglou, meelhemlou leh huchibang mawngmawng um lou; hizongleh siangthou leh soisiat bei, kouhtuam loupitah amah a kipiah theihna diingin.
Hujiahin pasalte’n chu amahuh sapum bangin a jite uh a lungsiat diing uh ahi; A ji lungsiatpa chu amah kilungsiat ahi.
Ajiahchu koimah in amah tahsa a haw ngei nai sih; Khrist in kouhtuam a chawm a, a deihthoh bangin, a chawm in a deihthoh zaw hi.
Ajiahchu eite chu amah sapum leh, tahsa leh, guh hiangte i hi uhi.
Hikhu jiahin pasal in a pa leh a nu a nuse diing a, a ji toh a kizop diing, huleh a nih un tahsa pumkhat ahung hita diing uhi.
Hichu thuguuh kiphual loupitah ahi; hizongleh ke’n chu Khrist leh kouhtuam thu ahi ka soi.
Banghitaleh, na lahva koipouh in amah a kilungsiat bangin a ji lungsiat heh; huleh ji chu a pasal zahtaat diingin pilvaang heh.
Naupangte haw, Lalpa ah na nulepate uh thu mang un; hichu sildih ahi.
Na pa leh na nu zahtaat in; huchu chiam nei thupiah masapen ahi.
Huchi'n nang a diingin a hoih diing a, leitung ah na damsawt diing hi.
Huleh nanguh pate haw, na tate uh sulungthah sih unla, Lalpa thununna leh thuhilhna in enkol zaw un.
Suaahte haw, Khrist thu na man bangun, laudan siam leh kiliing pum in lungsiangtahin tahsa daana na pute uh thu mang un.
Mihing kipaahsah diing a mitmei chauh veeng hilou in, Khrist suaah bang a lungtang a Pathian deihzawng bawl zaw in:
Mihing kawm a hilou in, Lalpa kawm a hoihlam deih a natong hiin;
Mi chin in, suaah hiin, suaahlou hitaleh, sil hoih a bawl phot uh Lalpa kawm apatin humah a mu kiit diing uh chih he in.
Huleh nanguh pute haw, huchimahbangin a kawmvah bawl un, amah uleh nanguh pu chu vaan ah a um chih leh, ama’n mi deihsah tuam a nei sih chih he in, vaubawl sih un.
A tawppenin, ka unaute, Lalpa ah leh a haatna silbawltheihna ah haattahin um un.
Diabol zeheemnate na dou zoh theihna diingun Pathian gaalthuam bukim in kithuam un.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh i dou uh chu tahsa leh sisan ahi sih a, lalnate, thuneihnate, hi khovel mial tunga vaihawmtute leh, vaan mun a hagau gilou umte ahi zaw uhi.
Hujiahin ni hoihlou na douzoh na diing uleh, na bawl zohveh nung va zong na din theihna diingun, Pathian gaalthuam bukim la un.
Hujiahin, na kawnguh thutah a gaah in, dihtatna awmphaw but in,
Lemna tanchinpha kisahkhawl na chu na keeng va but in ding un.
A bawn a tungah, ginna lum la un, hukhuin giloupa thal kuang thei zousiah na sumit thei diing uhi.
Huleh hutdamna siihlukhuh leh Hagau namsaau Pathian thu la un;
Haamteina leh ngetna chintengin bangchihlaipouhin Hagau a haamtei zing a um in, hulam pangah chu misiangthoute zousiah diingin thuaah haatna leh ngetsahna toh ngaihsah zing in um un.
Huleh kei diingin zong, tanchinpha thukiphual hesah diing a haangsantaha ka kam ka kaah a, thusoitheihna piah a ka um theihna diingin.
Hu diing a siihkolbut palai ka hi ngal a; huchia hulampang ka soi diing banga haangsantaha ka soi theihna diingin.
Hizongleh nangun zong bangchibanga ka um ka tanchin na heet theihna diingun, Tikika, Lalpa a unau deihtah leh thunatongtu muanhuai in bangkim ahung hilhpah diing hi;
Ka tanchin uh na heetna diing uleh, na lungtang uh a hamuan theihna diing chi a amah na kawmva ka hung sawl ahi.
Pa Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawma kipan hamuan na, huleh ginna leh lungsiatna unaute kawmah um hen.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist chihtahtah a lungsiatte zousiah kawmah hehpihna um hen. Amen.
Paul leh Timothi, Jesu Khrist suaahte’n, Philippi khua a um Khrist Jesu a misiangthou zousiah kawma leh, kouhtuam houtute leh upate kawmah;
I Pa uh Pathian leh, Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawm a kipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Nanguh ka hung geeldoh chintengin ka Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi hi.
Na bawnva diing a kipaahtah a hung ngetsah a ka haamteina chinteng ah,
A patni apat tuni tanpha a tanchinpha a na hung kipawlkhawmpihna uh jiahin;
Amah na sungva na hoih pantu in, Jesu Khrist ni tanphain huchu a bawl mualsuaah ngei diing chih dettahin ka gingta hi.

Na bawnva tungtaang thu a keima’n hichibang lungsim ka neih chu a dih mawng ahi; ajiahchu nanguh ka lungtang ah ka hung vom zing hi; ka kolbuhna leh, tanchinpha dihna thu leh suhkipna thu a ka hehpihna tanpihte na hi veh uhi.
Ajiahchu, Jesu Khrist lainatna in nanguh na bawnun ka hung ngai mahmah chih Pathian ahung heetpihtu ahi.
Huleh heettheihna leh heetkhenna zousiah a na lungsiatna uh ahung tam semsem diing, hichu ka ngen ahi.
Huchia sil hoih mahmahte na hung heettheih va; Khrist ni tan a, a tahtah leh suhsualbei na hung hihtheihna diingun.
Pathian loupina leh paahtawina diinga Jesu Khrist a um dihtatna gah a dim in.
Hizongleh, unaute, ka tunga siltungte hi tanchinpha dalh semna diing a hung tung ahi chih na heet uh ka deih hi;
Huchi'n Kaisar innpi sungteng leh, mundang zousiah a mite kawmah Khrist a ka kolbuhna chu a langchianta hi;
Huleh Lalpa a unau tamtahin ka kolbuh jiaha gingkip in, Pathian thu lau lou a soi diingin a haangsan deuhdeuhta uhi.
Khenkhatte’n chu thangsiatna leh kinialna jiahin Khrist a taangkoupih va; huleh khenkhatte’n deihsahna jiahin zong a soi uh;
Pawl khatte’n chu ka kolbuh a thuaahna belapsah tum in, a tahtah hilou in, kikalhna diingin Khrist a taangkoupih uh;
Hizongleh pawl khat in chu tanchinpha gum diing a um ka hindan he in, lungsiatna jiahin a soi uhi.
Bang a khawh ei? Lam chinteng ah, a heem hiin, a tah hileh, Khrist chu taangkoupih in a umta himhim ahi; huleh hu a’chu ka kipaah hi, ahi, ka kipaah diing hi.
Ajiahchu hikhu in na haamteina uleh, Jesu Khrist silpiah jalin ka hutdamna ahung suah ngei diing chih ka he hi,

Ka lametna mahmah leh ka kinepna dungjuiin bangmah ah suhzum in ka um sih diing a, hizongleh ka bawl zing mah bangin, tuin zong, ka hinna in aha, ka sihna in aha, Khrist chu ka sapum ah haansanna kimin suloupi in a um diing hi.
Ajiahchu kei diingin hin Khrist ahi a, sih chu punna ahi.
Hizongleh tahsa a hin hi ka tohgah ka tan diing hileh teel zawh diing ka he sih hi.
Ajiahchu nih saikaah in chih diing zosaang he lou in ka um hi; chiahmang a Khrist kawma um utna ka nei a; huchu a hoihzaw mahmah a;
Himahzongleh tahsa a um chu nanguh jiahin a poimohzaw hi.
Huleh hi ginkipna nei in, na ginna uh khanlet na diing leh, na ginna va na kipaahna diingun ka um zing phot diing chih ka he hi.
Na kawmva ka hung kiitna jiaha, kei diing a Khrist Jesu a na kipaahna uh a tamsem theihna diingin.

Na umdan uleh Khrist tanchinpha kituaahsah phot un; hunga nanguh ka hung muh ahiai, ahihlouhleh ka um louha zong na tanchin uh, hagau khat a na dinkipdan uleh, lungsim khat nei a, tanchinpha thuginna a na pandan uh ka jah theihna diingin;
Huleh bangmah ah na meelmate uh sulau in um sih un; huchu amahuh diing a manthaina chiamchihna dihtah ahi a, hizongleh nanguh diingin chu hutdamna, huleh huchu Pathian a kipan ahi.
Ajiahchu, Khrist jiaha nangun amah na gintaat chauh uh hilou a, amah vang a thuaah zong na thuaah diing uh ahi chih piah na hi uhi.
Keimaha hichibang kidouna na muhsa bang uleh, tu a keimaha um diing na jah bang uh, nangun zong na nei uhi.
Hujiahin Khrist a kihehnepna bang, kilungsiatna hamuanna bang, Hagau a kipawlkhawmna bang, huleh kilainatna leh kikhotuahna bang a um leh,
Lungsim kibang a um in, lungsiatna kibang nei in, tup kibang leh lungsim khat nei a um in ka kipaahna subukim un.
Kinialna aha, ahihlouhleh kiloupisahna jiah aha in bangmah bawl hi sih heh; hizongleh lungsim ngiamtahin mi chinin amah sangin midang hoihzaw in ngai chiat heh.
Na lahva mi koipouh in amah a chauh en sih henla, midang a zong en u’heh.
Khrist Jesu a zong um hi lungsim chu nanguhah um heh;
Amah chu Pathian bang a um hiin, Pathian toh kibang a um chu sil khiahlahhuai in a ngaihtuah sih a;
Hizongleh amah chu hung kikoihngiam in, suaah bangin ahung um a, mihing banga siam in ahung um a;
Huleh mihing limlemeel bang hung pua in, ahung kingaingiam a, sihna tanpha in thu ahung mang hi, kros sihna ngei chu.
Huchihjiahin Pathian in zong amah chu nasatah in a tawisangta a, min lahlah a min tungnungpen a peta hi;
Huchia Jesu min a mi zousiah, vaan a sil umte, lei a sil umte, huleh lei nuai a sil umte a khupdin a,
Lei chinteng in, Jesu Khrist chu Pa Pathian loupina diinga Lalpa ahi chih a phuan theihna diingun.
Huchihjiahin, ka deihtahte, ka um peet chiang chauh hilou a, tua ka um louh lai a zong, thu na man veu mah bangun, lau leh liing pum in na hutdamna chiat uh tongdoh un.
Ajiahchu, amah lungdeihlam bawl diinga nanguh hung utsahtu leh hung tongsah diing a bawltu chu Pathian ahi hi.
Sil zousiah phun lou leh nial lou in bawl un.
Khangthah gilou leh chihmohte lah a khovel a vaahte banga na vaahnate lahva soiselna bei, suhsiat nei lou Pathian tate na hihtheihna diingun;
Hinna thu chu taahlang in; Khrist ni chianga ke’n a thawn in ka tai sih a, huleh a thawn in ka tonggim sih chia ka kipaah theihna diingin.
Ahi, na ginna kipumpiahna uleh, nna natohna tungvah kei piahdoh in umta leng ka kipaah a, huleh na bawnun ka hung kipaahpih hi.
Hukhu jiah mahin nanguh zong kipaah unla, kei zong hung kipaahpih un.
Hizongleh Timothi na kawmva hung sawlpah diingin Lalpa Jesu ah ka kinem hi, na tanchin uh ka heet chianga kei zong lungmuangtaha ka um theihna diingin.
Ajiahchu ka kawmah huchibang a na umdan uh hung ngaihtuah diing awm midang ka nei sih hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh mi zousiah in Jesu Khrist silte hawl louin, amahuh a diing chiat a hawlta uhi.
Hizongleh tapa in a pa nna a toh bangin, ama’n chu tanchinpha ah kei ahung tohpih chih heetchi ana amah ah na nei uhi.
Hujiahin bangchi banga ka um diing ka heetchian hunhun in amah hung sawlkhiahpah ka kinem hi;
Hizongleh, keimah ngei zong hungpah diingin Lalpa ah ka kigingta hi.
Ahiinlah ka sanggam leh, natohpih leh, sepaihpih, na sawlleh uleh ka taahsapna a hung kithuahpihtu Epaphrodita na kawmva hung sawl kiphamoh ka sa hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh, na bawnun ahung ngai mahmah a, a damlouh thu na jah jiahun a lungkham mahmah hi.
Ajiahchu si dehtahin a china ngei mah a; hizongleh Pathian in a khotuah a; ahi, amah chauh hilouin kei zong ahung khotuah hi, kei diinga lungkhamna tunga lungkhamna a um sawn louhna diingin.
Hujiahin amah chu khawhsatahin ka hung sawl hi, amah na muh kiit chiang va na kipaah va, huleh kei lungkhamna zong a daih deuhna diingin.
Hujiahin amah chu kipaahtahin Lalpa ah na pom un; huleh hutobangte chu zahbawl un.
Ajiahchu kei diinga na hung tohsahna uh kimloute suhkimna diingin Khrist natohna ah ama’n chu a hinna zong khawhsa louin ana si dehtah ahi.
A tawppen in, ka unaute, Lalpa ah kipaah un. A ngeimah gelh chu kei diingin chimtaah a huai sih a, nanguh diingin a hoihzaw hi.
Uite lahah kiveeng un, silgilou bawlte lahah kiveeng un, tahsa kisoisate lahah kiveeng un.
Ajiahchu ei u’chu hagau a Pathian bia zehtante i hi a, huleh Khrist Jesu ah i nuam mahmah a, tahsa ah chu suan diing i nei sih hi.
Tahsalamah chilei zong suan diing ka nei mei thei. Midang koiaha in tahsalama suan diing neia a kiheet inchu, ke’n ka nei sem hi.
Ni giatni a zehtan, Israel chi, Benjamin phung, Hebraite laha Hebrai tahzet, daan heetlam a Pharisai;
Phatuamngaih lama kouhtuam sawitu; daanbu a dihtatna lam a soiselbei ka hi.
Hizongleh sil kei diing a lawhna zousiah chu Khrist jiahin manna in ka ngaita hi.

Ahi, tahzetin, Khrist Jesu, ka Lalpa heetna hoih jiahin sil zousiah chu manna giapin ka ngai ahi; amah jiahin sil zousiah ka taanta a, huleh hute chu eeh bang giapin ka ngai hi, Khrist ka tan theihna diingin,
Huleh daanbu a um banga keimah dihtatna nei hilou a, Khrist gin jala um, ginna a Pathian dihtatna chu nei a amaha muh a ka um theihna diingin.
Huchia, a sihna toh kituaahtou jel a, amah leh, a thohkiitna silbawltheihna leh, a gimthuaahna kikoppihna bang ka heet theihna diingin.
Bangchi zawng aha beeh a misi lah apat thohkiitna ka tan theih khaahleh chi'n.
Ka tang zouta ahi sih a, bukima um zouta zong ka hi sih; hizongleh Khrist Jesu in kei ahung matna, humah chu ka mat ve theihna diingin ka delh ahi.
Unaute, kei chu man zouta in ka kisep sih a; hizongleh hi sil khat chu ka bawl hi, nunglama sil umte chu mangngilh in, huleh malam a sil umte chu delh in,
Khrist Jesu a Pathian kouhna saang kipaahman mu diingin phaahtawpna chu ka delh ahi.
Hujiahin eiuh a piching deuh tengin hitobang lungsim i nei chiat diing uh; huleh sil dang khat a lungsim dang na neih uleh, hizong Pathian in na kawmvah ahung hesah diing hi.
Hizongleh i phaahna chiangchiang ah, hudan mahin gamta nihang in, lungsim kibangin um ni.
Unaute, ka umdan hung juite hi chiat unla, huchibang a umte etton diing a na hung neihte uh chiamchih un.
(Ajiahchu mi tampi a um uh, amahuh umdan ka hung hilh veuta hi, tuin zong kappum in ka hung hilh hi, amahuh chu Khrist kros meelmate ahi uhi.
A tawpna u’chu manthaina ahi a, a Pathian u’chu a gilpi uh ahi, huleh a loupina u’zong a zumna uh ahi, leilam silte a ngaihtuah uhi).
Ajiahchu eihaw khualetui hihna chu vaan ah ahi a, hu a kipanin Lalpa Jesu Khrist, Hundampa chu i ngaah uh ahi.
Ama’n chu, sil zousiah amah thuthu a, a umsah theihna natohdan dungjuiin i tahsa thulimlou chu amah tahsa loupitah batpih in ahung bawl thahsah diing hi.
Hujiahin, ka unau deih leh ngaihtahte, ka kipaahna leh ka lallukhuhte, huchi'n Lalpa ah ding kip un, ka deihtahte.
Lalpa a lungsim khat hi diingin, Euodia ka ngen a, Sintiki ka ngen hi.
Huleh nang, ka ngawngkol puaahpih muan um zong ka hung ngen hi, tanchinpha a ka natohpih numei haw le Klement zong, huleh hinna lehkhabu a min tuang, ka natohpih dangte panpih in.
Lalpa ah kipaah ngiitngeet un; ka chi jel diing, Kipaah un.
Na chitna uh mi zousiah heet hihen. Lalpa a nai hi.
Bangma ah lungdonna nei sih unla; hizongleh sil bangkimah haamteina leh ngetna in kipaahthusoina toh, na sil deihte uh Pathian kawmah hesah un.
Huchi'n Pathian hamuanna heetphaah guallouh in, Khrist Jesu jalin na lungtangte uleh na lungsimte uh ahung veensah diing hi.

A tawppen in, unaute, thutah photmah, sil zahum photmah, sil dih photmah, sil siangthou photmah, sil hoih photmah, a thang kilawm photmah; hoihna bang a um a, paahtawina bang a um leh, hi silte ngaihtuah un.
Keimah a na zilsa uh, na tansa uh, na jahsa uh, huleh na muhsa uh, hu silte chu bawl un; huchi'n hamuanna Pathian in ahung umpih diing hi.
Hizongleh, tu a tawplam a kei na hung ngaihtuahna uh ahung kilat jel jiahin Lalpa ah nasatah in ka kipaah ahi; hu a chu na ngaihsah mahmah va, hizongleh hun lemtaang na mu sih va ahi.
Taahsap jiaha hi thu ka soi ahi sih; ajiahchu bangchibangin um zongleng, hu ah lungkimtah a umdan ka hedohta hi.
Tasamtaha umdan ka he a, kiningchingtaha umdan zong ka he hi; mun chin leh sil zousiah ah gil vah leh gilkial a um theihna leh, hautah leh tasam a umdan hilhin ka umta hi.
Amah ahung suhaatpa Khrist jalin sil zousiah ka bawl thei hi.
Ahihvangin ka gentheihna a na hung lungkhampih jiahun na bawl hoih uhi.

Huleh nanguh Philippite’n tanchinpha hung um chiil a, Makedonia gam apat ka chiahdoh lai in, nanguh chih louh, kouhtuam dang koimah in piah leh laah lam thu ah bangmahin ahung kithuahpih sih uh chih zong na he uhi.
Ajiahchu, Thessalonika khua ngei ah zong ka taahsap panpihna na hung thot kiit jel uhi.
Silpiah ka deih jiah ahi sih a; nanguh diing a gahpung ka bawl ahi zaw hi.
Hizongleh sil bangkim ka nei a, ka hau hi; nanguh apat hung kithot silte, gimnamtui, kithoihna deihhuai, Pathian lungkimna chu, Epaphrodita khut apatin ka na muta a, ka kiningchingta hi.
Huleh ka Pathian in Khrist Jesu a loupina a, a hauhsatna dungjuiin na taahsap zousiah uh ahung pe diing hi.
Tuin Pathian leh i Pa uh kawmah kumtuang kumtuang in loupina um hen. Amen.
Khrist Jesu a misiangthou zousiah chibai hung na buuhsah un. Ka kawma um unaute’n chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Misiangthou zousiah in, a diahkhol in Kaisar innsung mite’n chibai ahung buuh uhi.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na bawnva tungah um hen Amen.
Paul, Pathian lungguata Jesu Khrist sawlleh leh, i unaupa uh Timothi in,
Kolossi khua a um, Khrist a misiangthoute leh unau ginumte kawmah; I Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist a kipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Nanguh diinga haamtei ngiitngeet in Pathian, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pa kawmah kipaahthu ka soi uhi,
Khrist Jesu a na ginna uleh, misiangthoute zousiah tung a lungsiatna na neihdan uh ka jah nungsiah un,
Vaan a nanguh diinga kinepna hung kikoihsah jiahin, hu kinepna thu chu tanchinpha thutah thu ah tumalaiin na zata uhi;
Hu tanchinpha chu khovel pumpi a gah a, a khan jel mahbangin, na jah va, thutah a Pathian hehpihna na hung heet ni vapat in na lahvah gah a pung jelin na kawmvah ahung tungta hi.
Epaphra, ka suaah tanpih uh ngaihtah, nanguh diinga Khrist natongtu ginumtah apat zong na heet taah mahbangun.
Ama’n chu Hagau a na hung lungsiatdan uh zong ka kawmvah a phuangdoh hi.
Hikhu jiahin keiuh zong, hi ka jah ni vapatin, nanguh diing a haamteisah leh, pilna leh hagaulam heetchi ana zousiah a amah deihzawng heetna a na hung dimna diing uh ngetsah ka tawp sih uhi.
Huchia Lalpa diinga kilawmtawh leh sil zousiah a deihhuai a na gamtat va, natoh hoih chintenga hung gah a, huleh Pathian heetsiamna lama na hung khantouhna diing uleh;
A silbawltheihna loupitah dungjui a kipaahna toh kuhkalna leh thuaahhaatna lama haatna zousiah a suhhaat a um in.
Vaah a misiangthoute gou tankhawmpih diinga hung bawltu Pa kawma kipaahthu soi in.
Ama’n chu mial silbawltheihna a kipanin ahung hundoh a, a Tapa deihtah gam ah ahung luutsahta hi.
Amah ah a sisan jalin tatdohna i mu hi, i sualna uh ngaihdamna ngei chu.
Amah chu muhtheihlouh Pathian meelpua, silsiam zousiah laha piang masapen ahi;

Ajiahchu amah mang a sil zousiah siam ahi a; vaan a umte leh lei a umte, muhtheih leh muhtheihlouh, laltouphah hiin, lalgam hitaleh, vaihawmnate leh thuneihnate hizongleh; sil zousiah amah siam ahi a, amah diinga siam ahi.
Huleh amah chu sil zousiah umma in a um a, amah ah sil zousiah a umkhawm hi.
Amah chu tahsa, chihchu, kouhtuam lutang ahi; sil bangkim a masapen hihna mun a tan theihna diingin, bulpipen, misi laha kipana piang masapen ahi.
Ajiahchu amah a taangchinna zousiah a um chu Pa deihzawng ahi.
Huleh a kros sisan jala lemna bawl zou in, amah in sil zousiah amah toh a kilemsah hi; amah in, ka chi ahi, lei a sil umte hiin, vaan a sil umte hitaleh.
Huleh nanguh, nidanglaia na natoh uh giloute a amah apat khen a um a, na lungsim va meelma na hi va, hizongleh tuin ama’n,
A tahsa pumpi ah a sihna jalin ahung kilemsahta hi, a mitmuh a siangthou leh, soisel bei leh, taina diing bei a ahung dinsah theihna diingin;

Ginna a na um zing va, kingahna nei a na kip va, huleh tanchinpha na jah uh kinepna apat na kitawlmang louh uleh; hu tanchinpha chu vaan nuai a silsiam zousiah kawma taangkoupih ahi a; kei Paul hu thunatongtu diing a siam ka hi.
Nanguh diinga ka gimthuaah ah tuin ka kipaah hi, huleh Khrist gimthuaah baan chu a tahsa jiahin ka sa ah ka sunzom jel hi, hu tahsa chu kouhtuam ahi.
Pathian thu subuching diingin, nanguh diing a ka kawma hung kipia Pathian hunbi khenna dungjuiin thunatongtu diinga siam ka hi.
Hu Pathian thu chu kumtuang a a khang a khang a thuguuh kiphual ana hi a, hizongleh tuin chu a misiangthoute kawmah suhlat in a umta hi.
Hute kawmah Pathian in Jentelte laha hu thuguuh loupina hauhdan a hesah nuam mawng ahi; huchu, nanguh a Khrist um, loupina kinepna chu ahi.
Mi chin Khrist Jesu a hoih bukima ka piah theihna diing va mi chin kiveeng diing a hilh a, pilna chinteng a zilsah a, a tanchin ka soi pa uh ahi.
Huchibang diingin ke’n zong, keimah a nasataha tong, hu a tohna dungjuiin hahpana pangin ka tonggim ahi.
Ajiahchu nang uleh Laodisia khua a umte leh tahsa a ka meel mu nailou photmahte diing a ka kihahbawl dan he leh u’chin ka ut hi;
Pathian leh, Pa leh, Khrist thuguuh hedoh diing a heetsiamna kichiantah hauhsatna zousiah lama lungsiatna a khuikhawma a um va, a lungtangte uh hamuangtah a, a um theihna diingin.
Hu Khrist ah pilna leh heetna gou zousiah phual in a um hi.
Huleh hichu, koimah in kamsiam thu a ahung heem louhna diingun, ka soi ahi.
Ajiahchu tahsain na kawmvah um sih zongleng, kipaahtahin, na kizendan uleh, Khrist a na ginna kipdan uh en in, hagau in na kawmvah ka um hi.
Hujiahin Khrist Jesu, Lalpa chu na pomtaah mahbangun, amah ah um un;
Amah ah zungha leh lamtouh a um in, ahung kihilhta mahbanga ginna a kipaahtaha um in, huah chu kipaahthu soina a dimin um un.
Pilvaang un, huchilou inchu mi koiaha in Khrist thu bang hilou in, mihing thugousiah leh, khovel thubulte bang zaw in, khovel pilna leh heemna mai in gaallaah in ahung lakha diing uh.
Ajiahchu amah ah Pathian taangchinna zousiah sapum nei in a teeng hi.
Huleh nanguh amah ah na bukimta uhi, amah chu lalna leh thuneihna zousiah lutang ahi;
Amah ah nanguh chu khut a tan hilou a, tahsa sualna sapum paikhia a Khrist zehtanna a zehtan na hi uhi.
Baptisma ah amah toh vui na hita va, humah ah misi laha kipana amah kaithoutu Pathian natoh gintaat jalin amah toh kaihthoh na hita uhi.
Huleh nanguh, na sualnate uleh na tahsa va zehtanlouhna jiah a si chu, na bohsiatna zousiah uh hung ngaidam in, ama’n amah toh ahung suhingkhawmta hi;
Daanthu, ei uh hung lang zawng leh ei toh kikalh lam a gelh chu nawtmang in, a kros dawn a kilhbeh in a lamangta hi;
Huleh lalnate leh thuneihnate susia in, kros a hute chu zou in, a langtang in etsahna’n a bawlta hi.
Hujiahin mi koimah in, neeh thu aha, dawn thu aha, ni siangthou thu aha, ha thah thu aha, ahihlouhleh khawlni thu aha in nanguh hung dem sih u’hen.
Hute chu sil hung tung diingte liim ahi a; hizongleh a tahsa chu Khrist ahi.
Mi koimah in, a sil muh ngeilouhte a um zingin, a tahsa lungsima kimawhsahtheih in, mahni siamthuh kingaihtawm na leh angelte biahna zangin na kipaahman muh diing uh hung laahsah sih heh.
Huleh tahsa zousiah in kivaah khang na nei a, kizopkhawm leh kikaankhawm a nna tong a, huleh kihuuikhawm a Pathian khanna a, a khanletna lutang chu a tudet sih hi.
Huchih jiahin khovel thubulte apat Khrist toh si na hih taah uleh bang diinga khovel a hing banga daan thupiahte nuaia kituluut na hi viai?
(Sukha sin; chiam sin; khoih sin; chihte
Hite chu zatpum a mangthai veh diing ahi;) hite bawl chu mihing thupiah leh thuhilhna juih ahi.
Hi silte chu utthu a biah leh, kingaihtawm leh, tahsa khawhsa lou a silbawl ah pilhuai a bangna a; hizongleh sa deihzawng suhpichingna lamah bangmah a phatuam sih hi.
Huchi'n Khrist toh kaihthoh khawm na hih taah uleh, tunglam a Pathian jiatlama tou Khrist umna a sil umte chu hawl un.
Tunglam a sil umte ah na lungsim uh nga un, lei a sil umte a nga louin.
Ajiahchu, na sita va, na hinna uh Khrist toh Pathian ah phual ahita hi.
Khrist, i hinna uh ahung kilat chiangin nanguh zong amah toh loupiin na kilang diing uhi.
Hujiahin na tahsa hiang uh lei a umte sulum un; kingaihnate, bolhhohnate, kietlahna hoihloute, utna giloute, huleh duhaamnate, (duhaamna chu milembiahna ahi),
Ajiahchu hu silte jiahin Pathian lungthahna chu thumang lou tate tungah a tung veu hi;
Nanguh zong tumalam a hu silte a na hin laiun, hute ah na na um uhi.
Hizongleh tuin chu nangun zong lungthahnate, thangtawmnate, huatnate, soisiatnate, houlimna thanghuaite, hihaw zousiah na kam vapat koihmang un.
Mihing lui chu a silbawlte toh na hawhkheta uh chih he in, khat leh khat kihemtuah sih un.
Mihing thahin na kithuamta va, huchu heetsiamna neia a siamtu batpiha siamthah in a um ahi.
Huah chu Grik mi leh Judami, zehtan leh zehtan louh, Meelmahmi leh Skithiami, huleh saltaang leh taanglou zong a um tuan sih hi; Himahleh Khrist chu bangkim ahi a, bangkim ah a um hi.
Hujiahin, Pathian miteel, mi siangthou leh deihtahte bangin lainatna lungtangte, chitnate, kingaihngiamna lungsimte, jaidamnate, huleh thuaahtheihnate in kithuam un;
Khat leh khat kithuahtheituah unla, kingaidamtuah un; khat in khat tunga thubuai bang na neih uleh, Khrist in nanguh ahung ngaihdam bangin nanguh zong kingaidam un.
Huleh hi silte zousiah tungah lungsiatna silhthuaah un, huchu bukimna kaangawmna ahi.
Huleh Pathian hamuanna na lungtang vah vaihawmsah un, huchibang hi diingin tahsa khat a kouhna hi uhi; huleh kipaahna taang zong he un.

Khrist thu chu pilna zousiah in nanguh ah tampiin umsah un; phatna la bang, Pathian la bang, huleh hagaulam la bang kizilsah in, kihilhtuah unla, na lungtang va hehpihna nei in Lalpa chu la sahsah un.
Huleh na bawl photmah uh, thusoi in hileh natohin hileh, a bawnin Lalpa Jesu minin, amah jiaha Pa Pathian kawma kipaahthu soi kawmin bawl veh un.
Jite, Lalpa a, a kilawm hun bangin na pasalte uh kawmah kituluut un.
Pasalte, na jite uh lungsiat unla, a tungvah gilou sih un.
Tate, sil zousiah ah na nulepate uh thu mang un; huchu Lalpa ah kipaahhuai ahi ngal a.
Pate, na tate uh sunuaah in lungthahsah sih un, huchilou inchu a lungkekha diing uhi.
Suaahte, sil zousiah ah, tahsa a na houtute uh thu mang un; mit natong a mihing kipaahsah diing giap hilou in; himahleh lungsim siangthoutahin leh Pathian laukawm zaw in.
Huleh na bawl photmah uh mihingte diing a bawl bang hilou in, Lalpa a diing bangin lungluuttahin bawl un.
Lalpa kawm apatin kipaahman diing gou chu na mu diing uh chih he in; ajiahchu Lalpa natohsah na hi uh.
Hizongleh sil dihlou bawltu in chu a sil dihlou bawlman a mu kiit diing hi; kideihsahtuamna bangmah a um sih hi.
Houtute, nangun zong vaan ah houtu na nei uh chih he in, na suaahte uh tunga a dih leh a kilawm hun chu bawl un.
Haamtei zing unla, huah chu kipaahthu soi kawmin kiveeng zing un.
Ka an a ka umna pen, Khrist thuguuh soi diing a Pathian in keiuh diing a thusoina kot ahung honsah theihna diingin kei uh diingin zong hung haamteisah un.
Ka soi diing bangtah a, huchu ka soi thei na diingin.
Hun lemtaang lei in, polam mite laha pilvaangtahin um un.
Mi chin bangchibang a dawn but diing ahiai chih na heet theihna diingun na haam kamsuaah uh chu hehpihna tel, chi kisoh hi zing hen.
Ka tanchin zousiah chu unau deihtah Tikika, natongtu ginum leh Lalpa a ka suaah hihpihin nanguh ahung hesah veh diing hi.
Hu diing mahin amah chu na kawmvah ka hung sawl ahi, na tanchin uh a heet a, huleh na lungtang uh a suhhamuan theihna diingin;
Onesima, unau ginum leh ngaihumtah, nanguh laha mi mah toh. Amahun hilam sil umtan zousiah ahung hesah diing uhi.

Aristarkha, ka suangkultaanpih in chibai ahung buuh hi, huleh Mark, Barnaba sanggamnu tapa in zong chibai ahung buuh hi, (amah tungtaang ah thupiah na mu uh; na kawmva ahung leh kipaahtahin ana pom un).
Huleh Jesu, Justa a chih uh, zehtan mi in nanguh chibai ahung buuh hi. Hite chauh Pathian gam thu lam a ka natohpih, ahung hamuantute ahi uhi.
Epaphra, na lahva mi, Khrist suaah in nanguh chibai ahung buuh hi; Pathian deihlam zousiah a hoihkim leh bukim a na dindet theihna diingun amah chu haamteinate ah theihtawp suah in a pang hi.
Ajiahchu ama’n nanguh diing leh, Laodisia leh Hierapoli khua a umte diingin phatuam a ngai mahmah chih ka heetpih hi.
Luke, doctor deihtah leh Dema in nanguh chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Laodisia khua a unau umte leh, Nimpha leh a inn a kouhtuamte chibai hung na buuhsah in.
Huleh hi lehkhathot na lahva na sim zoh chiangun Laodisia kouhtuamte lahah zong na simsah un; huleh nangun zong huchibangmah in Laodisia khua a lehkhathot na sim ve un.
Huleh Arkippa kawmah, Lalpa a natohna na muh chu subuching diingin pilvaang in, na chi un.
Kei Paul in, keimah khut a chibai ka hung buuh na ahi. Ka kolbuhte he zing un. Hehpihna na kawmvah um hen. Amen.

Paul leh, Silvana leh, Timothi in, Pa Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist a Thessalonika khua a um kouhtuamte kawmah; i Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawm apat hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Ka haamteina va na min uh lou in, nanguh zousiah jiahin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi zing uhi.
I Pathian leh Pa ma ah na ginna natohte uh, lungsiatna natohgimte uh, huleh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist a kinepna jiaha na hahkatnate uh bang mangngilh lou a he zing in,
Unau deihtahte, Pathian teel na hihna uh he in.

Ajiahchu ka tanchinpha uh thu mai a na kawm uh tung lou a, silbawltheihna leh Hagau Siangthou leh heetchetna nasatah toh hung tung hi a; nanguh jiahin na lahva mi bangtobang ka hi va chih na heet bangun.
Huleh hahsatna thuaahpum in, Hagau Siangthou a kipaah kawmin thu chu pom in, kei uleh Lalpa juite na hi uhi.
Huchi'n Makedonia leh Akaia gam a gingtu zousiah diingin etton diing na hita uhi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh nanguh a kipanin Lalpa thu chu a thang kheta a, Makedonia leh Akaia gam chauh ah hilou in, mun chinah Pathian lam a na gindan uh a thangta hi; kei un bangmah ka soi uh a ngai nawn sih hi.
Ajiahchu amahuh ngei in na lahva bangtobang luutna aha ka muh uh, ka tanchin uleh, Pathian hing leh dih be diing a milimte a kipana Pathian lam na ngatdan bang uh ahung hesah uhi.
Huleh a Tapa, misi laha kipana a kaihthoh, lungthahna hung tung diing lah a hung suaahta sahpa Jesu vaan apat na ngaah diingin.
Ajiahchu unaute, na lahva ka luutna uh a thawn ahi sih chih nanguh ngei in na he uhi;

A thawn hihmalah in, hu ma in, na heetsa mahbangun, Philippi khua a zumhuaitaha bawlgawp a ka um nungun buai pumpum in zong Pathian tanchinpha na kawmva soi diingin ka Pathian vah ka na haangsan zaw mah uhi.
Ajiahchu, ka thusoi uh zuau a pawt ahi sih a, sianglou a pawt zong ahi sih a, huleh heembawlna in zong ahi sih;
Tanchinpha kolsah a um diing a Pathian phatsah mi ka hih bang ngeiun mihing kipaahsah diing bang hilou a ka lungtang uh endihtu Pathian kipaahsah hi zaw in, thu ka soi jel uh ahi zaw hi.
Ajiahchu bangmah chihin zong kimaitangphatna leh duhaamna thu aha ka zang ngei sih uh chih na he uh; Pathian ahung heetpihtu ahi.
Khrist sawllehte ka hihna un thuneihna zang thei hi zongle ung, mihing tung leh, nanguh tung leh, midangte tungah zong, paahtawina ka hawl ngei sih uh.
Nuin a tate a duatbawl bangin na lahvah jaidamtahin ka um zaw uhi.
Huchi'n, ka deihtahte uh na hung hihtaah jiahun nanguh hung ngaina mahmah in Pathian tanchinpha chauh hilou in, keiuh hinna tanpha hung piah ka ut uhi.
Ajiahchu unaute, ka tohgimdan uleh ka tawldan uh na he zing uhi, na lahva koimah ka suhbuai louhna diingun suun leh jan a tong in Pathian tanchinpha nanguh ka hung hilh uhi.
Nanguh gingtute laha siangthoutah leh dihtah leh soisel bei a ka gamtatdan uh ahung heetpihtute na hi uh, huleh Pathian zong.
Pain a tate tunga a bawl bangin, nanguh hung hasot in, hung hamuan in, huleh hung hilhin na tungva ka bawldan uh na he uhi.
A lalgam leh a loupina a nanguh hung kouluutpa Pathian mi hitaah a na um theihna diingun.

Hi jiahin Pathian kawmah tawplou in kipaahthu ka soi uhi, ajiahchu Pathian thu kei u’a kipana na jah uh na pom laiun, mihing thu banga pom louin, thutah, nanguh a gingtate a zong nasataha natong thei Pathian thu bangin na pom zaw uhi.
Ajiahchu, unaute, Judia gam a Pathian kouhtuam pawl Khrist Jesu a umte juitute na hi va; amahun Judate laha a thuaah bangun, nangun zong na gam mite uh lahah na thuaah ve uhi.
Hu Judate’n chu Lalpa Jesu leh a zawlneite a that va, keiuh zong ahung sawi uh; huleh Pathian a sulungkim sih va, mi zousiah a kalh uhi.
Hutdam ahihtheihna diing va Jentelte kawma thusoi ahung khap va, a sualna uh suhdim zingna diingin; hizongleh Pathian lungthahna chu a khawh theitawpin a tungvah ahung tungta hi.
Hizongleh kei u’chu, unaute, tomchakhat sung lungtang lam hilou a, meel lam chauh a kikhen a i um jiahin, kilawptah a na meel uh mu diingin ka hahpan sem uhi.
Huchih jiahin na kawmva hung ka tum ten va, kei Paul ngei in zong nihvei jen hung ka tumta a; hizongleh Setan in ahung daal veu hi.
Ajiahchu ka kinepna uh aha, ka kipaahna uh aha, ahihlouhleh ka kipaahna lallukhuh uh bang ahiai? A hung chianga i Lalpa Jesu ma ah nanguh ngei na hi sih diviai mah?
Nanguh chu ka suan uleh ka kipaahna uh na hi uhi.
Hujiahin ka thuaah zoh nawn louh phetun Athen khua ah keiuh chauh nuutsiat in um leung hoih ka sa va,
Huleh i unaupa uh Timothi, Pathian natongtu, Khrist tanchinpha lama ka tohpih uh, nanguh hung sukip diing leh na ginna lam va hung hamuan diingin ka hung sawl uhi.
Hi gimthuaahnate jiaha koimah a kiliin louhna diingin; ajiahchu hi silte thuaah diing mawng a guat i hi uh chih nanguh ngei in na he uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh na kawmva ka um laiun sawihna thuaah diing i hi uh chih ka hung hilh khawlta uh; huchibang ngei in a tungta hi, huchu na he uhi.
Hi jiahin ka thuaah zoh nawn louh phetin, heemtu’n nanguh ahung heempuuhkha diing a, ka tohgimna uh a thawnkha diing chi'n na gindan uh he diingin mi ka hung sawl hi.

Hizongleh tu a Timothi na kawm vapat ka kawm uh ahung tunin na ginna uleh na lungsiatna uh, huleh kei un nanguh ka hung muh nuam mahmah bangun nangun zong keiuh hung mu nuam mahmah in na hung he zing uh chih tanchin kipaahhuaitah ahung puaah hi.
Hujiahin, unaute, ka thuaahgimna uleh, ka hahsatna zousiah vah na ginna jiahun na tungvah hamuangtahin ka um uhi.
Ajiahchu tuin ka hingta uh, Lalpa a na dinkip phot uleh.
I Pathian uh ma ah na tungva ka kipaahna zousiah uh jiahin nanguh lam thu ah Pathian kawmah bangtobang kipaahthu ka soi thei taphet diviai?
Na meel uh ka muh theihna diing uleh, na ginna lam va na taahsap uh ka hung suhbuchinsah theihna diingun suun leh jan a nasataha haamtei in.
Huchi'n Pathian ngei leh i Pa un, huleh Lalpa Jesu Khrist in na kawm lam vah hung pui hen.
Huleh nanguh lama lungsiatna ka hauh bangun, Lalpa’n nanguh khat leh khat kilungsiattuahna leh, mi zousiah na lungsiatna uh hung supung in, hung hausahta hen.
Huchi'n i Lalpa Jesu Khrist, a misiangthoute zousiah toh ahung chiangin Pathian, i Pa uh ngei ma ah na lungtangte uh sianthouna lama soisel beiin ahung sukip thei diing hi.
Huchi'n unaute, a tawppen in, na umdan diing uleh, Pathian na kipaahsahdan diing uh, ka kawmva kipan a na laah bangun na hauh semna diingun Lalpa Jesu minin ka hung ngen un, ka hung hasot uhi.
Ajiahchu Lalpa Jesu jalin bangtobang thu ka hung piah uh na he uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Pathian deihzawng, na sianthouna diing u’chu hi ahi, kingaih tawpsan un;
Mi chinin siangthou leh jahtaha a beel chiat uh kepdan na heet diing uh;
Pathian he lou Jentelte banga huuhna lama kipe lou in;
Hulam thu ah chu koima’n a val a gamta in a unau tungah sil gilou bawl sih heh; Lalpa chu hutobang silbawlte zousiah phulatu ahih jiahin, kei un zong ka hung hilh khawl un ka hung hesah zouta uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian in sianglou diingin ahung kou sih a, hizongleh siangthou diingin ahung kou zaw hi.
Hujiahin a musit chu mihing musit ahi sih a, Pathian, a Hagau Siangthou hung pepa musit ahi zaw hi.
Hizongleh unau kilungsiatdan lam thu ah gelhsah na ngai sih uh; ajiahchu kilungsiattuah chiat diingin nanguh ngei Pathian hilhin na um uhi;
Makedonia gam pumpia unau um zousiah tungah huchu na bawl ngei uhi; hizongleh unaute, hung khang semsem diingin ka hung hasot uhi.
Thu ka hung piah bang va kam tawm deuh a um a, na nna chiat uh kitoh a, huleh na khut ngei va nna toh diing tum in;
Huchi'n polam mite lama kilawmtah a na um theihna diingun leh, bangmah taahsap na neih louhna diingun.
Hizongleh unaute, midang kinepna himhim neiloute banga na lungkham louhna diingun ihmute tungtaang na heet louh uh ka deih sih hi.
Ajiahchu, Jesu a si a, a thou kiit chih i gintaat leh, Jesu a ihmute zong Pathian in amah toh ahung puikhawm diing hi.
Hichu Lalpa thu in na kawmvah ka soi uh ahi, eite Lalpa hung pai dong a hing a na um nalaite’n ihmute i makhelh sih diing hi.
Ajiahchu Lalpa ngei chu kikou aw toh, angel tungnungpen aw toh, huleh Pathian pengkuul ging toh vaan akipat hung kumsuh diing ahi a, huleh Khrist a site a thou masa diing uh;
Huzohchiangin ei hing a na um nalaite huihkhua ah Lalpa tuaah diingin amahuh toh meipi lahah laahtouh in i um diing a; huchi'n kumtuang in Lalpa kawmah i umta diing hi.
Huchihjiahin hi thutein kihamuantuah chiat un.
Hizongleh a hun leh a ni lam thu chu unaute, gelhsah na ngai sih uhi.
Ajiahchu nanguh mahin Lalpa ni chu jan a guta bangin ahung tung diing hi chih chiantah in na he uhi.
Muanna leh bitna, chia a soi laitahun numei nauvei bangin thakhat in manthaina a tungvah a tung diing a; a suaahta hial sih diing uhi.
Hizongleh unaute, nanguh chu hu niin guta bang a ahung phawn diingin mialah na um sih uhi.
Na bawnun vaah tate leh suun tate na hi uhi; jana mi i hi sih a, mial a mi zong i hi sih hi.
Hujiahin midangte bangin i ihmu sih diing uh; kigingin i ngaihsah zaw diing uh.
Ihmute chu jan ah ahi a ihmut uh; huleh zukhamte zong jan ah ahi a kham uh.
Hizongleh ei suun a mite’n chu ginna leh lungsiatna phaw silh in, hutdamna kinepna chu lukhuh a khuh in i ngaihsah diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian in lungthahna tuaah diing hilou in, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist vang a hutdamna mu diingin ahung guat ahi zaw hi.
Amah chu i luang in a si a, i hah in zong, i ihmut in zong, amah toh i hinkhawm theihna diingin.
Hujiahin na na hih veu mah bangun kisuhamuang khawm chiat unla, kisuhaattuah chiat un.
Huleh unaute, na lahva tonggimte leh, Lalpa a na houtute uleh, nanguh hung hilhtute he diingin;
Huleh a natoh jiah va amahuh nasataha lungsiatna a ngaisang diingin ka hung ngen uhi. Kituaah chiatin um un.
Tuin unaute, ka hung hasot uhi, daan banglou a umte hilh unla, lungkete hamuan unla, haatloute panpih unla, mi zousiah lamah thuaahzoutahin um un.
Koimah in koi giitlouh zong giitlouh a thuh lou diingin pilvaang un; hizongleh nang u’lah hiin, mi zousiah lamah hitaleh a hoih taphot jui un.
Kipaah zingzing un.
Tawplou in haamtei un.
Sil bangkimah kipaahthu soi zing un; ajiahchu nanguh lam thu ah Khrist Jesu ah hichu Pathian deihzawng ahi.
Hagau sumit sih un.
Pathian thu kisoi musit sih un.
Sil zousiah enchian unla, a hoihlam photmah tudet un.
Sual a kilang zousiah apat kihemkhia un.
Huleh hamuan na Pathian ngei in napumun hung susiangthou heh; huleh na hagau uleh, na lungsim uleh, na tahsa uh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hung chiang a soiselbei diingin humbit in um hen.
Nanguh hung kou pa a ginum a, bawl zong a bawl diing hi.
Unaute, hung haamteisah un.
Unaute zousiah tawp siangthou in chibai na buuh un.
Hi lehkhathot unau siangthoute zousiah kawma simsah diingin Lalpa minin thu ka hung pia hi.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na kawmvah um hen. Amen.
Paul leh, Silvana leh, Timothi in, i Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist a Thessalonika khua a um kouhtuam kawmah:
I Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist a kipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Unaute, na ginna uh nasatah a a khanlet a, na bawnva na kilungsiattuahna uh a punsem jiahin, na tung thu vah, hihtuaah ahih mahbangin, Pathian kawma kipaahthu soi zing diing mawng ka hi uhi.
Huchi'n mi’n nanguh ahung sawihnate uleh, na gimthuaahnate zousiah va na kuhkal dan uleh, na gindan zousiah uh jiahin Pathian kouhtuam pawlte lahah ka hung suang uhi.
Hichu Pathian gam mi hitaah a guat na hihtheihna diing va Pathian vaihawmna dihtah chiamchihna chiantah ahi, hu diing maha zong thuaah na hi uhi;
Nanguh hung subuaite gimthuaahna a thuh chu Pathian a diing a sil dihtathuai ahi chih he in;
Huleh nanguh suhgim a umte chu, Lalpa Jesu vaan a kipan a, a vaansawlleh haatte toh ahung kilaah chiangin, kei u’toh khawlna a thuhkiit in,
Mei kuang a ahung kilaah chiangin, Pathian heloute leh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist tanchinpha awiloute tunga phuba la in;
Amah u’chu Lalpa ma leh a silbawltheihna loupitaha kipanin kumtuang manthaina ah gawt in a um diing uh.
Hunia a misiangthoute a suhloupi a um diing leh, a gingta zousiahte a (ajiahchu ka hung thuheetsah uh na gingta uh) limdangsah a um diinga ahung chiang in.

Hujiahin i Pathian un nang u’chu ahung kouhna toh kiphutawh mawng ahung sah theihna diing leh, hoih utna zousiah leh ginna natoh zousiah a silbawltheihna toh ahung buchinsah theihna diingin, nanguh diingin zong ka haamtei ngiitngeet uhi.
I Pathian uleh Lalpa Jesu Khrist hehpihna dungjui a, i Lalpa uh Jesu min chu nanguh a, huleh nanguh amah a suhloupia a um theihna diingin.
Hizongleh unaute, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hungna diing leh, a kawma i va kikhopna diing thu ah, ka hung ngen uhi,
Lalpa ni chu ahung tung zouta chihna hagau in aha, thu in aha, huleh kei u’a kipana lehkhathot in aha a na lungtang uh suhliing a umpah a, ahihlouhleh buai lou diingin.
Koima’n bangmahin hung heem sih heh; ajiahchu puuhsaanna tah ahung tun masat a, sualna mipa, mangthai tapa ngei ahung kilat phot louhleh hu ni chu hung tung lou diing ahi;
Ama’n chu Pathian chih a um zousiah leh, a kibia zousiah dou a, a tungva um tum in a kisuloupi diing a; Pathian biahinn a tou in, Pathian in a kibawl diing hi.
Na kawmva ka um laiin hi thute ka hung hilhta chih he nawn lou na hi viai mah?
Huleh tuin amah chu amah huntah a ahung kilat diing, bangin ahiai daal chih na he uhi.
Ajiahchu bohsiatna thuguuh in a tong panta hi; a daaltu lampi apat laahmang ahih masiah in a daal zing diing hi.
Laahmang ahih chiangin migiloupa chu ahung kilang diing a, Lalpa Jesu’n amah chu a kam huin a kaangtum diing a, ahung kilaahna vaah in a sumang diing hi.
Hu amahpa hungna chu Setan natoh dungjui a silbawltheihnate, chiamchihnate, silmah zuautheite,
Huleh mangthaite diingin dihtatlouhna heemna zousiah toh ahi diing hi; hutdama a um theihna diing va thutah ngaihnatna a pom louh jiahun.
