Huleh hikhu jiahin zuauthu a gintaatna diingun Pathian in dihlouhna natoh haattah a kawmvah a sawl diing hi;
Thutah gingta lou a, dihtatlouhna kipaahpih zawte a bawnva siamlouh tansaha a um theihna diingun.

Hizongleh unau, Lalpa deihtahte, Hagau suhsiangthouna leh thutah gintaatna jala hutdama um diing a, a tuung a kipat Pathian in nanguh ahung teel jiahin keiuh chu na tung thu vah Pathian kawmah kipaahthu soi zing diing mawng ka hi uhi.
Huchibang diingin ama’n i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist loupina tang diingin ka tanchinpha un nanguh ahung kou hi.
Hujiahin unaute, ding kip unla, thusoi in hiin, ka lehkhathotun hileh, thugousiah nanguh hung kihilhte chu tukip un.
Tuin i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist ngei leh, Pathian, i Pa uh ngei, eite hung lungsiat a, hehpihna jala kumtuang hamuanna leh kinepna hoih hung pepa’n,
Na lungtang uh suhamuang in, thusoi leh natoh hoih chintengah hung sukipta hen.
A tawpnapen in unaute, Lalpa thu chu nanguh a, a um bang a khang a, suhloupia a um theihna diing leh,
Misuahsualte leh migiloute laha ka bit theihna diingun hung haamteisah un; ajiahchu mi zousiah in ginna a nei veh sih hi.
Hizongleh Lalpa chu a ginum a, ama’n nanguh ahung sukip diing a, migilou lahah ahung veeng diing hi.
Huleh ka hung thupiahte uh na bawl va, na bawl jel diing uh chih Lalpa ah ka hung muang uhi.
Huleh Lalpa’n na lungtangte uh Pathian lungsiatna ah leh, Khrist diinga ngaah kuhkalna ah hung pui heh.
Huchi'n unaute, Kei u’a kipan a na muh uh thugousiah banga um lou a, daan banglou a gamta unaute zousiah laha kihemkhe diingin i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist minin thu ka hung pia uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh nanguh ngei in na hung juihdan diing uh na he uhi; ajiahchu na lahvah daan banglou in ka gamta ngei sih uh;
Koima tanghou zong a thawnin ka ne ngei sih va; na lahva koimah ka hung suhbuai louhna diingin suun leh janin tawltahin ka tonggim zaw uhi.
Thuneihna ka neih louh jiah uh ahi sih a, na hung juih diing va etton diingin ka kibawl uh ahi zaw hi.
Na kawmva ka um laiun zong hi thu ka hung pia uhi; koipouh in na a toh nuam louhleh ne zong ne sih heh, chih.
Ajiahchu na lahvah daan banglou a gamta, nna mawngmawng tong lou a, mi natoh soisel mi khenkhat a um uh chih ka ja uhi.
Hutobang mite chu nna tong kinke'n diing leh, amahuh tanghou kineeh diingin Lalpa Jesu Khrist minin thu pia in ka hasot uhi.
Hizongleh unaute, nangun zaw sil hoih bawl chimtaah sih un.
Huleh koipouh in hi lehkhathot a ka thu uh a zop louhleh hu mi chu chiamchih unla, kithuahpih sih un, a zum theihna diingin.
Ahihvangin chu meelma bangin bawl sih unla, unau bangin hilh zaw un.
Tuin hamuanna Lalpa ngei in bang lam pouh ah, bangchih laipouhin nanguh hamuanna hung pe zingta hen. Lalpa’n na bawnun hung umpihta hen.
Hi ka chibaibuuhna lehkha hi kei Paul in ka khut ngei a ka gelh ahi, ka lehkhathot chinah chiamchihna ahi, hichibang a ka gelh veu ahi.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na bawnva kawmah um hen. Amen.
Paul, i Hundampa uh Pathian leh, i kinepna uh Lalpa Jesu Khrist thupiah banga Jesu Khrist sawlleh in;
Ginna a ka tapa tahzet Timothi kawmah; Pathian i Pa uleh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist kawma kipan, hehpihna leh, khotuahna leh, hamuanna umta hen.
Makedonia gam a ka chiah diing kuan a, Ephesa khua a um zing diing a, mi khenkhat in kihilhna dihlou a hilh louhna diing uleh,
Ginna a Pathian ngaihsah khosahdan um suhkhang sang a kinialna siam zoveu, taangthu pouh leh khang thu suiseenglouh meimei a ngaihsahlouhna diing va kawh diing a ka hung nget bangin, huchi'n bawl in.
Huleh thupiah kipiahnasan chu, lungtang siangthou leh, sialepha heetna hoih leh, ginna dihtah akipan lungsiatna neih ahi.
Mi khenkhatte a chiah kawi jiahun huchu a peetsan va, thulimlou soina lamah a chiahta uhi.
A thusoi uh umdan leh a chihtahna uh he lou in daan hilhtute hih a ut uhi.
Hizongleh daan chu a hoih chih i he ngal a, mi’n daan bangtah a, a jat inchu.

Hichu he in, daan chu midihtatte diinga bawl ahi sih a, daan poisalou leh, daan bohsete a diing, Pathian ngaihsahlou leh misualte a diing, misianglou leh Pathian zahloute a diing, pate thatte leh nute thatte a diing, mihing thatte a diing,
Kingaih haatte a diing, pasal kisubuahtuahte a diing, mihing gute a diing, zuau haatte a, diing, zuau a kihaahsialte a diing, huleh thugin dih toh kikalh sildang a um leh, hute a diingin ahi;
Ka kawma kolsah a um, paahtawitaah Pathian loupitah tanchinpha dungjuiin.
Huleh thunatongtu a hung koih a ginum a ahung sim jiahin, ahung suhaattu, Jesu Khrist, i Lalpa u’chu ka phat ahi.
Tumalaiin Pathian soisetu leh suduhdahtu leh sunatu ka na hi a; hizongleh khotuahna ka muta hi, ginlouhna a he lou a na bawl ka hih jiahin.
Huleh i Lalpa uh hehpihna chu Khrist Jesu a um ginna leh lungsiatna in a dimlet ahi.
Khrist Jesu chu misualte hundam diingin khovel ah ahung hi chih hi thu gintaat umleh, pomtaah mahmah ahi; hu misualte laha lianpen ka hi.
Hijiangzongleh, tunungsiah a kumtuang hinna diinga amah hung gingta diingte etsahna diingin Jesu Khrist in a thuaahzohdan keimah a, a suhlat masat theihna diingin hikhu jiahin khotuahna ka mu hi.
Tuin kumtuang kumpipa si thei lou, muhtheihlouh, Pathian pil chauh kawmah zahna leh loupina um zingta hen. Amen.
Ka tapa Timothi, tuma a na kawma tanchin kisoilawh thute dungjuiin hi thupiah chu ka hung pia ahi, hute a kidouna hoih na dou theihna diingin.
Ginna leh sialepha heetna hoih chu tukip in; huchu mi khenkhatte’n a paaikhia va, ginna lamah kuang sia bangin a keehgawpta uhi;
Amahuh lahah Himena leh Alexander ahi uh; Pathian soisiat louh a zil theihna diingun amahuh chu Setan kawmah ka peta hi.
Hujiahin a masapen in, silngetnate, haamteinate, haamteisahnate, huleh kipaahthusoinate mi zousiah diing a bawlsah diingin ka hung hasuan hi;
Kumpipate leh thuneihna mun a um zousiahte a diingin zong; huchia Pathian ngaihsah leh zahumtah a hinkhua kituaah leh hamuanhuai i man theihna diingun.
Hichu i hundampa uh Pathian mitmuh in a hoihin a pomtaah hi.
Ama’n chu mi zousiah hutdama um diing leh thutah hung he diingin a deih hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian khat a um a, huleh Pathian leh mihing kikal a palai khat a um hi, mihing Khrist Jesu chu;
Amah chu mi zousiah tatdohman diingin ahung kipia hi; a huntaha heetsah a um diingin.
Hu diing a thusoitu leh sawlleh a guat ka hi; (Khrist ah thutah ka soi hi, ka zuau sih hi). Ginna leh thutah a Jentelte hilhtu ka hi hi.
Hujiahin pasalte’n mun chinah khut siangthou jah in, lungthah lou leh ginglel lou in haamtei le’uh ka deih hi.
Huchimahbangin numeite chu puansilh kilawmhun leh zumtheihna leh umtansiam in kithuam le uh; sam pheehkiil aha, sana aha, tuikep suang aha, ahihlouhleh sil mantam a kithuam lou in.
Hizongleh (numei Pathian ngaihsah kichite a hun giapin) silbawl hoihin kithuam le’uh ka deih hi.
Numei in thumangtahin sipkhian in zil u’heh.
Hizongleh numei in thu a hilh chu ka phal sih, huleh pasal tunga thu a neih zong ka phal sih hi, sipkhian in um zaw u’heh.
Ajiahchu Adam siam masat ahi a, hunungin Evi siam ahi.
Huleh Adam heem in a um sih a, hizongleh numei chu heem in a um a, bohsiatna ah a puuhta hi.
Hizongleh ginna leh lungsiatna leh siangthouna nei a umtansiamtah a, a um zing uleh naupaaina ah hutdam in a um diing hi.
Koipouh kouhtuam houtu a pan ut chu, natoh hoih ut ahi, chih a dih ahi.
Huchi'n kouhtuam houtu chu, soiselbei, ji khat nei, kisuumthei, pilvaangtah, gamtathoih, mitaangphal, thuhilh siam;
Uain khamhaat lou, mivuaah chiing lou, punna niin a huaiham lou, mithuaahthei, minialhaat lou, eenhaat lou;
Amah innsung vaihawm siam, zahumtah a, a tate thununsiam mi ahi diing ahi.
(Ajiahchu mi’n amah innsung bawn vaihawmdan a heet louhleh, bangchi’n Pathian kouhtuamte a enkol thei diai?)
Gingthah mi ahilou diing ahi, huchilou inchu a kisatheikha diing a, diabol siamlouh tanna a tangve kha diing hi.
Hulou zong polam mite soiphat ahih ngei diing ahi; huchilou inchu soisiat a um in diabol thaangah a awhkha diing hi.
Huchimahbangin, kouhtuam upate chu mi zahum, kamtam lou, uain hai lou, punna niin a huaiham lou ahi diing uh ahi.
Sialepha heetna siang in ginna thuguuh kem mi ahi diing ahi.
Huleh hite ah etchian in um masa u’henla, hunungin soiselbei ahih uleh kouhtuam upa nna tong u’heh.
Huchimahbangin a jite u’zong mi zahum ahih ngei diing uh ahi, kamtam lou, kisuumthei, sil zousiah a ginum ahi diing uh ahi.
Kouhtuam upate chu ji khat nei, a tate uleh a innsung uh feltah a vaihawmsiam mi hi heh.
Ajiahchu kouhtuam upa na hoihtah a tongte’n dinmun hoihtah leh Khrist Jesu a um ginna lama haansanna loupitah a kisiam uhi.
Sawtloukal a na kawm a hung kinem in hi thute na kawmah ka hung gial hi;
Hizongleh ka hung um sawt khaah leh, Pathian inn sunga bangchibang a gamta diing na hiai chih na heetna diingin ka hung gial ahi, huchu Pathian hing kouhtuam, thutah khuam leh kingahna ahi uhi.

Huleh Pathian ngaihsahna thuguuh chu nial guallouh in a loupi ahi; Pathian chu tahsa in ahung kilang a, Hagau in siam a tang a, angelte’n a mu va, Jentelte kawma taangkoupih in a um a, khovel a gintaat in a um a, loupina a puitouh in a umta hi.
Hizongleh hun nunung lam chiangin mi khenkhatte’n puimangna hagaute leh dawite thuhilhna ngaihsah in, ginna chu a tawpsan diing uh chih Hagau in chiantahin a soi hi;
Lepchiahna a zuauthu soi in; a sialephaheetna uh siih aam a bih a um in;
Kiteen khaam in, huleh neeh diingte, thutah gingta a hete’n kipaahthu soi a saan diing a Pathian in a siamte chu ne lou diingin thu a pia uhi.
Pathian silsiam zousiah chu a hoih hi, kipaahthu soi a saan ahih photleh bangmah nual diing a um sih hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian thu leh haamteina a suhsiangthou ahita hi.
Hi silte unaute na heetsah leh, nang chu Jesu Khrist thunatongtu hoih, ginna leh thuhilhna hoih tutan a na zop thu a vaah khang a um na hi diing hi.
Hizongleh Pathian zahlouhna thu leh piteehte taangthu deih sinla, Pathian ngaihsahna lamah kithunun in.
Ajiahchu tahsa kithununna ahihleh them khat chauh a phatuam a; hizongleh Pathian ngaihsahna chu, hinna, tu a um zing leh hung um kiit diing piah thuchiam a neih jiahin sil zousiah ah a phatuam hi.
Hi chu thu gintaat umleh pomtaah mahmah ahi.
Ajiahchu huchia Pathian hing i muan jiahin i tonggim a, i pang teitei uh ahi; amah chu mi zousiah Hundampa ahi a, a gingtate a ahi diahkhol hi.
Hi thute chu pia inla, huleh hilh in.
Na naupanna koimah in musit sih heh; hizongleh haam kamsuaah ah, gamtatdan ah, lungsiatna lam thu ah, hagaulam thu ah, ginna thu ah, sianthouna lam thu ah, gingtute etton diing hizaw in.
Ka hung masiah lehkhasim leh, hasot leh, thuhilh ngaihsah in.
Nangmaha um silpiah, soilawhna a piah, upate khut ngah a Pathian in nang ahung neihsah chu thahdah sin.
Mi zousiah kawma na phattuamna a lat theihna diingin hu silte ngaihtuah inla, hute ah kizang zou in.
Nangmah leh na thuhilh ah pilvaang in; hu silte ah um zing in; huchibang hihna jalin nangmah leh na thu jate na hundam diing hi.
Teehsete chu tai sinla, hizongleh pa bangin, tangval deuhte chu unau bangin;
Piteehte chu nute bangin, nungaah deuhte chu sanggamnu bangin, siangthoutahin hasot in.
Meithaite, meithai tahzette chu zahbawl in.

Hizongleh meithai koipouh in tate aha, tute aha a neih inchu, amahun innsungah Pathian ngaihsah dan leh a nulepate uh zahdan zil masa u’heh; ajiahchu Pathian muh in huchu a hoih a, huleh a pomtaah hi.
Huleh meithai tahzet, amah tang a um in chu Pathian ah kinepna a nei a, suun leh jan a ngen in a haamtei zingzing hi.
Hizongleh amah nopsahna a hingnu chu, a damlai in zong si ahi.
Huleh soiselbei a, a um theihna diingun hi thute pia in.
Hizongleh koipouh in amah mite a diing, a diahkhol a amah innkuanpihte a diinga ngaihtuah kholh louhleh ginna chu a zuausan a, ginglou mi sangin a gilou zaw ahi.
Meithai kum sawmguup nuailam, mi khat ji na hita chu meithai a sim louh diing ahi.
Sil hoih bawl lam a mi paahtawi a um a; tate khoi lian a, mikhualte na zintun a, misiangthoute keeng na silta a, mi gimthuaahte na panpihta a, sil hoih photmah thanuamtaha na bawl zou ahihleh.
Hizongleh meithai nungaah deuhte zaw gial sin; ajiahchu Khrist lam a ahung kip louh chiangun pasal neih a ut veu uhi.
A ginna masa uh a paih jiahun siamlouh tangin a um veu uhi.
Hulou zong, inn chinah a vaahleh va, thasiat a chiing veu uhi; huleh thasiat chauh zong hilou in, a soi louhlouh diing uh soi in kamtam leh mi demhaat ahi veu uhi.
Hujiahin, meithai nungaah deuhte’n chu pasal nei u’henla, soiselna diing lemtaang mawngmawng meelma musah sih leuh ka deih hi.
Ajiahchu tuin zong mi khenkhat Setan lamah a peetkheta uhi.
Gingtu numei aha, pasal aha in meithai a neihleh somdawl u’heh; meithai tahzette a somdawl theihna diingin kouhtuam suhbuai in um sih heh.
Kouhtuam upa vaihawm hoihte chu a leh niha zahbawltuaah a seh hi u’heh, a diahkhol in thu leh thuhilhna lama tonggimte chu.
Ajiahchu Pathian lehkhathu in, Bawngtal in buh a chil laiin a muuh kaan sin; huleh natongtu chu loh mutaah ahi, a chi hi.
Kouhtuam upa a heehna u’chu heetpihtu nih aha, thum aha louin pom sin.
Misualte chu, midangte’n zong a lau theihna diingun, mi zousiah ma-ah taihilh in.
Khentuam nei a bangmah bawllou a, deihsahtuam nei lou a hi thute jui diingin, Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist leh angel teelte mitmuh ah thu ka hung pia hi.
Mi koimah tungah khut nga pahpah sinla, midangte sualna ah zong kikum sin; siangtahin kikoih zingin.
Na gilpi jiahin leh na damlouh veu jiahin, tui chauh dawn nawn sinla, uain themkhat khat zang veu in.
Mi khenkhatte sualna chu a malat a, vaihawmna ah a tung masa veu hi; hizongleh mi khenkhatte chu a nung vah a jui hi.
Huchimahbangin khenkhatte sil hoih bawl kilangmasa a um a; huchibang loute zong phual theih ahi sih hi.
Pathian min leh a thuhilhna soisiat a, a umlouhna diingin suaah ngawngkol baat photmahte’n amahuh pute chu bangkimah zahbawltaah in sim u’heh.
Huleh gingtu mi pu a neite’n unau ahihjiahun musit sih u’heh; ahihvangin ginum leh deihtahte leh, phattuamna mute ahihjiahun a nna uh tohsah u’heh. Hi thute hilh inla, hasot in.
Mi koipouh in thuhilhna dang a hilh a, thutah, i Lalpa Jesu Khrist thu leh, Pathian ngaihsahna lam thuhilhna hoih a sah louhleh;
Amah chu a kisathei ahi a, bangmah he lou ahi; heet malah in kinial leh thukalh lamah a ngol zota hi; huchibanga kipanin thangsiatna, kinialna, daalna, kiginmohna hoihloute,
Lungsim gilou nei a, thutah nei lou minialhaatna bang ahung suaah veu hi; huchibang mite chu Pathian ngaihsah punna a ngai mi ahi uh; huchibang mi apat kihemkhia in.
Hizongleh lungkimna toh Pathian ngaihsah chu punna nasatah ahi.
Ajiahchu khovel ah bangmah i poluut sih a, bangmah i podoh het sih diing uhi.
Huchi'n neeh diing leh silh diing nei in hute ah i lungawi diing uh.
Hizongleh hauhsat tumte chu heemna leh, thaang ah, utna ngolhuai leh, susethei tampi bangah a puuhluut veu va, hute’n chu siatna leh manthaina ah mite a sutum veu uhi.
Ajiahchu sum ngaihnat hi gilou zousiah bulpi ahi; huchu khenkhat in a deihgoh va, ginna a paimangsan uh, huleh amahuh leh amahuh lungkhamna tampi in a kisunlet uhi.
Hizongleh, Aw nang Pathian mipa, hi silte taisan inla, dihtatna bang, Pathian ngaihsahna bang, ginna bang, lungsiatna bang, dohtheihna bang, thunuaigolhna bang delh zaw in.
Ginna kidouna hoih dou inla, kumtuang hinna chu tu in; hu tang diing a kouh zong na hi a, huleh heetpihtu tamtah mitmuh in gupna hoih chu na gumta hi.
Sil bangkim suhingtu Pathian leh, Pontia Pilat ma a gupna hoih gumpa Khrist Jesu mitmuh in thu ka hung pia hi.
I Lalpa Jesu Khrist hung kilat masiah hi thupiah chu siangthou leh soiselbei a kol diingin;
Hu kilatna chu, amah huntah ah, phattuaah Thuneipa chauh, kumpipate Kumpipa, lalpate Lalpa’n ahung lah diing hi;
Amah chauh in sihtheih louhna a nei a, koimah naih theih louh vaah ah a um a, amah chu koima’n a mu ngei sih a, mu zong a muthei sih hi; amah kawmah kumtuang loupina leh silbawltheihna um hen. Amen.
Hi khovel a mihausate chu kisathei lou diing leh, hauhsatna kiplou a muanna nga loua, sil zousiah i kipaahna diing a kichingtah mei a hung petu Pathian tunga nga zaw diingin;
Sil hoih bawl diingin, silhoih bawl hau diingin, silphal diingin, kihop ut diingin;
Kumtuang hinna a tuuhdet theihna diing va hun hung tung diing a diing innbulkip hoihtah amahuh diing a kholkhawm diingin hilh in.
Aw Timothi, na kawma kolsah a um chu kol hoih in, Pathian zahlouhna thusoi meimei leh, dihloutaha pilna kichi kikalhna chu pumpelh in.
Huchu khenkhat in nei a kisa va, ginna lamah a sukhialta uhi. Hehpihna na kawmah um hen. Amen.
Paul, Khrist Jesu a um hinna thuchiam dungjuia Pathian deihzawng a Jesu Khrist sawlleh in;
Ka ta deihtah Timothi kawmah; Pa Pathian leh Khrist Jesu i Lalpa uh kawma kipan hehpihna leh, khotuahna leh, huleh hamuanna um hen.
Suun leh jana tawplou a ka haamteinate a ka hung heet zing jiahin, ka pilepute a kipana sialepha heetna siangtah neia a nna ka toh zingpa ka Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi hi.
Kipaahna a ka dim theihna diingin, na mittuite he zingin, nangmah hung muh ka ut mahmah hi;
Ginna tuailou nangmah a um chu ka ngaihtuah tahchiangin, hu ginna chu a masapenin na pi Lois ah a um a, na nu Eunisi ah zong a um a, huleh nangmah ah zong a um chih dihtahin ka he hi.
Hujiahin ka khutngah jiaha Pathian silpiah nangmah a um chu muut kuang diingin ka hung henonsah hi;
Ajiahchu Pathian in launa hagau ahung pe sih a; hizongleh silbawltheihna leh, lungsiatna leh, lungsim sianthouna hagau ahung pe zaw hi.
Hujiahin i Lalpa thuheetpihna chu zumpih sinla, amah mitaang kei zong hung zumpih sin; ahihvangin Pathian silbawltheihna bang jel a tanchinpha jiaha gimthuaahna thuaahpihtu hizaw in.
Ama’n chu i silbawlte dungjui hilou in, amah guat leh a hehpihna dungjuiin ahung hundam a, kouhna siangthou in ahung kouta hi, huchu leilung pianma a Khrist Jesu a ahung piah ahita hi.
Hizongleh ahung hundampa Jesu Khrist kilaahna jiahin tuin suhlat in a umta hi, ama’n chu sihna sumang in, tanchinpha jalin hinna leh sihtheihlouhna chu vaah ah ahung tunta hi.
Hu tanchinpha thu chu Jentelte hesah diingin thusoitu diing leh, sawlleh diing leh, hilhtu diing a guat ka hi hi.
Hujiahin ahi hi silte zong ka thuaah; hizongleh ka zum sih hi; ajiahchu ka gintaatpa ka he hi, huleh a kawm a ka kolsah chu hu nia diingin a kolbit thei chih chiantahin ka he hi.
Khrist Jesu a um ginna leh lungsiatna nei in, thu dihdan ka kawma na jahte chu tukip in.
Sil hoih na kawm a kolsaha um chu i sunga Hagau Siangthou um in kol hoih in.
Asia gam a um zousiahte’n ahung nungheisan uh chih na he hi; a lahvah Phigela leh Hermojini a tel uhi.
Lalpa’n Onesiphora innkuanpihte kawmah khotuahna pia heh; ajiahchu ama’n ahung suhalh jeljel a, ka khainiang buh zong a zumpih sih hi;
Rome khua a a um laiin houh nguntahin ahung hawl a, ahung mudoh hi.
Hu ni chianga Lalpa kawma khotuahna a muh diing Lalpa’n phalsah hen; huleh Ephesa khua a sil tampi a ka na a tohzia hoihtahin na he hi.
Hujiahin, nang ka ta, Khrist Jesu a um khotuahna haattahin um in.
Huleh heetpihtu tampi laha ka kawma thu na jahte, hute chu mi muanhuai, midangte zong hilhsawn thei diingte kawmah kemsah in.
Huchi'n Jesu Khrist sepaih hoihtah bangin gimthuaah hung thuaahpih in.
Sepaih hi diing a teelpa a kipaahsah theihna diingin sepaih koimah kidou laiin hi damsung khosahnate in a kisubuai ngei sih hi.
Huleh kidemnate bangah mi pang mahlezong daan banga a bawl louhleh khuhsah in a um ngei sih hi.
Lou neitu tonggim chu a gah tang masapa ahi diing ahi.
Ka thusoi chu ngaihtuah in; Lalpa’n nang chu sil zousiah ah heetsiamna ahung pe diing hi.
Jesu Khrist, David suan a mi chu, ka tanchinpha soi dungjuiin misi lah akipat kaithoh in a um hi chih he zing in.
Hu tanchinpha jiahin silgilou bawltu bangin kaanna tanpha hahsatna ka thuaahpih hi; hizongleh Pathian thu chu kaan in a um sih hi.
Hujiahin Khrist Jesu a um hutdamna chu kumtuang a loupina toh a muh ve theihna diingun teelte jiahin sil zousiah ka thuaah ahi.
Hi thu chu a gintaathuai hi; Ajiahchu amah toh sita i hihleh, amah toh i hing khawm diing a;
I thuaah leh amah toh vai i hawm khawm diing a; amah i kiheetmohbawl leh ama’n zong ahung kiheetmohbawl diing;
Eite ginum sih zonglei amah chu a ginum zing a, amah leh amah a kiheetmohbawl thei ngal sih a, chih hi.
Thu phatuamlou, a ngaikhetute diing a beimangna higiap thu a kinial lou diingin hi thute hesah zing inla, Lalpa ma-ah thu pia in.
Thutah thu dihtaha khen in, zumna diing nei lou natongtu banga, Pathian ngaih a hoih a kimusah diingin kingaihtuah in.
Hizongleh Pathian zahtaat louhna thusoi meimeite nungheisan in, ajiahchu huchibangte’n mite Pathian ngaihsah louhna lamah a puigamla deuhdeuh uhi.
Huleh a thu un meimasia neeh bangin amahuh a ne diing hi; a lahvah Himenai leh Phileta a pang uhi:
Hute’n chu thutah a paisan va, thohkiitna a um zouta chi'n, mi khenkhatte ginna a sumang uhi.
Hizongleh Pathian innbulkip chu a ding zinga, hi chiamchihna a nei hi, Lalpa’n amah a hite a he hi. Huleh michin Khrist min lou photmah in giitlouhna paisan heh, chih.
Hizongleh inn loupi sungah sana leh dangka beelte chauh a um sih a, sing beel leh lei beelte zong, huleh khenkhat ittuaah, khenkhat ittuaah lou zong a um hi.
Hujiahin mi hi silte laha a kihepkhiah leh beel ittuaah, siangthou, a pu diing a zattaah, silhoih chinteng a kipeihsa ahi diing hi.
Teilawl utnate zong taisan inla, hizongleh lungtang siangthou a Lalpa min lamte toh dihtatnate, ginnate, lungsiatnate, kilepnate delh zaw in.
Hizongleh, kikhinna a siam veu chih he in, kinialna ngolhuai leh pilhuailou ah pang sin.
Lalpa suaah inchu a khing diing ahi sih a, hizongleh mi zousiah tung a jaidam, thuhilh siam, thuaahthei ahi zo diing ahi.
Pathian in thutah a heetna diing va kisiihna a piah khaahleh chi'n a kalhtute chu thunuaigolhtahin a thuhilh diing ahi;
Huleh diabol in sala a matte, Pathian deihzawng bawl diing a, a thaang apat ahung suaahtaat theihna diingun.
Huleh hizong he in, ni nunung lamah hun hahsa tahtahte ahung um diing hi.
Ajiahchu mi amahuh kilungsiatte, sumngainate, kiuangsahte, kisatheite, Pathian soisete, nulepa thumangloute, kipaahnataang heloute, siangthouloute;
Itna pianpih neiloute, buaina bawlte, zuau a miheehte, kideehthei loute, mi huhamte, hoih mawngmawng deihloute,
Leptatte, ngongtatte, kingaisangte, Pathian lungsiat sanga amahuh kipaahna ngaina zote bang ahi diing uhi.
Pathian ngaihsah batna a nei diing va, hizongleh a silbawltheihna a tahsang sih diing uh; huchibangte chu nungheisan in.
Ajiahchu huchibangte laha mi chu innte banga luut a, numei sualgih pua ngol deuhte sala man a, duhgawlna chinteng a puimangte;
Zil zing napi a thutah hepha hetloute ahi uhi.
Huleh Jaanni leh Jambri in Mosi a khin bangun hite’n zong thutah a doudaal zing uhi; lungsim sesuaah mi, ginna lama Pathian deih louh mi ahi uhi.
Hizongleh hu kaan a bawl thei sih diing uhi; ajiahchu a ngoldan uh mi zousiah kawmah ahung kilang diing hi, hute a ahung kilat mahbangin.
Hizongleh nang chu ka thuhilh, ka hindan, ka siltup, ka ginna, ka thuaahtheihdan, ka lungsiatna, ka kuhkaldan,
Antiok khua leh, Ikonium khua leh, Listra khua a sawina ka thuaahte na he kim veh hi; hizongleh hute zousiah ah Lalpa’n ahung hundohta hi.
Ahi, mi Khrist Jesu a Pathian ngaihsah a umtum zousiah in sawina a thuaah diing mah ahi.
Hizongleh migilou leh mi heemhaatte chu mi heem leh heem a um in a sesuaah deuhdeuh diing uhi.
Hizongleh nang chu, koi kawm apat na zil ahiai chih he in, na zil sa leh heetchiansah a na umna silte ah um zing in.
Huleh nang chu na naupan lai apat, Khrist Jesu a ginna jiaha hutdamna mu khopa nang hung hilhpilthei lehkha siangthou he na hita hi.
Pathian lehkhathu zousiah chu Pathian huhaihkhum a piah ahi a, thuhilhna diing bang, kitaihilhna diing bang, kisuhdihna diing bang, huleh dihtatna lama thuhilhna diing bangin a phatuam hi.
Pathian mi chu na hoih zousiah tong diing a kimtaha kithuama a bukim theihna diingin.
Hujiahin Pathian ma leh, amah leh a lalgam hung kilat chianga mihing leh misite vaihawmsah diingpa, Lalpa Jesu Khrist ma-ah thu ka hung pia hi;
Thu chu soi in; a hun ah bang, a hun lou ah bang pang jel in; thuaahtheitaha thuhilh pum in a siam louhdan uh hesah inla, taihilh inla, hasot in.
Ajiahchu thuhilhna dih a ngaihkhiah peih louh hun uh hung tung diing ahi a; a bilte uh a lawp jiahin amahuh deihzawng bangin a kawmvah houtu a khawm diing uh,
Huleh a bilte uh thutah lam apat a heimang diing va, taangthu lam nga in a dohta diing uhi.
Hizongleh nang chu sil zousiah ah pilvaang inla, gimthuaah inla, tanchinpha soitu nna tong in, na natohna chu sutaangtung in.
Ajiahchu tuin kei chu lat diing jiang a um ka hita a, ka paikhiah hun a tungta hi.
Kidouna hoih chu ka douta a, kitaidemna chu ka zouta hi, ginna chu ka kemta hi.

Tuin chu dihtatna lallukhuh kei diingin koih in a umta, huchu Lalpa vaihawmtu dihtahin hu ni chiangin ahung pe diing hi; huleh kei kawmah chauh hilouin, amah kilaahna ngaina photmahte kawma zong a pe diing hi.
Kintahin ka kawmah hung teitei in;
Ajiahchu Dema in tulai khovel a ngaihnat jiahin ahung paisanta a, Thessalonika khua ah a chiahta hi; Kresen chu Galatia gam ah a chiahta hi; Tita chu Dalmatia gam ah a chiahta hi.
Luke chauh ka kawmah a um hi; Mark zawn inla, hung tonpih in; ajiahchu thunatohna lamah amah kei diingin a phatuam mahmah hi.
Tikika chu Ephesa khua ah ka sawlta hi.
Na hung chiangin Troas khua a Karpa kawma puannaahtual ka nuutsiat khu lehkhabute toh hung pua in, a diahkholin savun lehkhabute khu.
Alexander, sumsungpa ka tungah a gilou mahmah hi; Lalpa’n a natoh bangjelin a thuh diing hi.
Amah apat nang zong pilvaang in; ajiahchu ama’n i thute a dou naah mahmah hi.
Ka siamna thu ka soi masatpen laiin koima’n ahung panpih sih a, mi zousiah in ahung taisan veh zota uhi; a moh u’chu puaah tuan dah u’heh chi'n Pathian kawmah ka ngen hi.

Hizongleh Lalpa’n ahung dinpih a, ahung suhaatta hi, tanchinpha kisoi chu kei jiaha kintaha heet a, a um a, Jentelte zousiah in a jah theihna diingun; huleh humpibahnei kam apatin suahtaatsah in ka umta hi.
Huleh Lalpa’n migilou chinteng laha kipanin ahung suahtasah diing a, a vaangam ah bittahin ahung tut diing hi; a kawmah kumtuang kumtuang in loupina umta hen. Amen.
Priska leh Akuila, huleh Onesiphora innkuanpihte chibai hung buuhsah in.
Erasta chu Korinth khua ah a um zingta hi; Trophima ahihleh Miletam khua ah damlou in ka nuseta hi.
Phalbi ma in hung tum teitei in. Eubula te, Puden te, Lina te, Klaudia te leh unau zousiah in chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Lalpa Jesu Khrist chu na hagau kawma um hen. Hehpihna na kawmah um hen. Amen.
Paul, Pathian suaah leh, Pathian miteelte ginna dungjui leh, Pathian ngaihsahna banga thutah heetna lama Jesu Khrist sawlleh in;
Zuautheilou Pathian in khovel um mapeh a, a chiamsa kumtuang hinna kinepna ah;
Hizongleh Pathian i Hundampa uh thupiah dungjui a ka kawma kolsaha um thu taangkoupihna jalin a huntah ah a thu chu suhlat in a umta hi.
Ginna munkhatlam thu a ka tapa ngei Tita kawmah; Pa Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist i Hundampa uh kawm a kipan hehpihna, khotuahna huleh, huleh hamuanna um hen.
Hikhu jiahin ahi Krit tuikulh gam a ka hung nuutsiat, sil bawlzohlouh a umte na bawlzohna diing leh, ka hung thupiah banga khochin a upate na guat theihna diingin;
Koi hitaleh, demna bei, ji khat nei, Pathian gingta tatsiatna leh thununlouhna nei lou tate nei a hihphot unchu.

Ajiahchu kouhtuam houtu chu Pathian sumkoltu ahihjiahin demna bei ahih ngei diing ahi; thusuaah tum lou, lungthah baih lou, uain kham haat lou, mivuaah chiing lou, punna niina huaiham lou mi ahih diing a;
Mitaangphal hih ut, mihoihte ngaina, lungsimdih, midihtat, misiangthou, mikisuumthei ahih diing ahi.
Thugin dihtaha nialkalhtute a hasot theihna diing leh, a siam louhdan uh a heetsah theihna diingin amah kihilh nasa banga thu chu a tuuhkip zing diing ahi.
Ajiahchu mi thunung lou, thulim lou, soisiat haat leh mi heemhaatte tampi a um uhi, amahuh chu zehtan haw laha mi ahi diahkhol uhi.
Hute kam chu hupsah diing ahi, punna niin deih man in thu a hilh louh diing uh a hilh va, mi innkuan sung a tohbuai veu uhi.
Amahuh laha khat, a zawlnei ngei uh khat in, Krit gam mite chu zuau soi zingte, gamsa giloute, thase anhaite ahi uh, chi'n a soi hi.
Hi heetpihna thu a dih ahi. Hujiahin ginna a ahung lamzan theihna diingun naahtahin taihilh in;
Judate taangthu leh, thutah nungheisante thupiah a ngaihsah louhna diingun.
Mi siangthou a diingin sil zousiah a siangthou hi; hizongleh mi bolhhoh leh gingloute a diingin bangmah a siang a um sih hi; a lungsim uleh a sialepha heetna nasan uh sianglou ahita hi.
Pathian ka he chi'n a kam un a phuang va; hizongleh a silbawl un a nual uhi, kihdah umte, thumangloute, sil hoih bawl lam photmah a Pathian deih louh lam mite ahi uhi.
Hizongleh nang chu thugin dih toh kilawm thute soi in;
Puteehte chu lungsim dihtah, zahum, kisuumthei, huleh ginna leh, lungsiatna leh, kuhkalna a dihtah hi diingin hilh in.
Piteehte zong huchibangmah in siangthouna toh kilawma gamta diing leh, dihloutaha miheeh haat leh uain haite hilou a, sil hoih hilhtute hi diingin hilh in.
Huchia amahun numei khanglaite chu lungsim dihtah nei a, a pasalte uh lungsiat a, a tate uh lungsiat a,
Pathian thu chu soisiata a um louhna diing a kiveeng a, siangthou a um a, innsung nna tong a, hoihtah a um a, a pasalte uh thu mang a um diinga a hilh theihna diingun.
Huchimahbangin tangvalte chu lungsim dihtah nei diingin hasot in.
Sil zousiah ah sil hoih bawlna lam a etton diingin kimusah inla; thugin ah siatna um louhdan, a kipdan, a tahdan bang ensah in.
Thusoi dihtah, soisel guallouh bang a kilat a, lehlam a pangte na tunga sil gilou soi diing nei lou a, a zahtaat theihna diingin.
Suaahte chu a pute uh thu mang diing leh, sil zousiaha a kipaahna zawng va um diingin hasot in; mi dawn haat lou diingin.
Pathian i Hundampa uh thuhilhna thu chu sil zousiaha a zephoih theihna diing va khutthem nei loua, ginumna hoih zousiah musah zaw diingin.
Ajiahchu hutdamna hung tut Pathian hehpihna chu mi zousiah kawmah ahung kilangta hi,
Hu inchu Pathian ngaihsah louhna leh khovel utnate tawpsan a, hi tulai khovel a lungsim siang leh, dihtattah leh, Pathian ngaihsaha um in;
Hu kinepna kilawphuaitah, Pathian loupi leh i Hundampa uh Jesu Khrist hung kilatna diing loupitah chu ngaah in i um diing uh ahi chih ahung hilh hi;
Ama’n chu giitlouhna zousiah apat ahung tat theihna diingin leh, amah diing a sil hoih bawl a phatuamngai leh teeltuam hi diing a ahung suhsiangthou theihna diingin i luang in a kipeta hi.
Hi thute soi inla, huleh thuneitahin vau in. Koima’n nang hung musit sih heh.
Amahuh chu vaihawmtute leh thuneitute kawma kituluut diingin, thukhentute thu mang diingin, sil hoih taphot bawl diing a kigingsa a um diingin,
Mi koimah soise lou diingin, thupawt bawl lou diingin, nunnem a, mi zousiah kawma thunuailuutna ensah zaw diingin hilh pha in.
Ajiahchu eite ngei zong malaiin mingolte, thumangloute, heema umte, utna leh nopna chituamtuam bawlte, gilou leh thangse zing a umte, kihdahhuaite, huleh khat leh khat kimudahte i na hi uhi.
Hizongleh mihing tunga i Hundampa uh Pathian chitna leh lungsiatna ahung kilat nungin,
Dihtatna natoh, eiuh bawlte jiah hilou in, pianthahna silna leh, Hagau Siangthou siamthah kiitna in, a khotuahna dungjuiin ahung hundamta hi;
Hu Hagau Siangthou chu Jesu Khrist i Hundampa uh jalin i tungvah naahpitahin ahung leihbua hi.
A hehpihna a siamtansah a um in kumtuang hinna kinepna dungjuiin gouluahtu diing a siamin i um ngei diing uhi.
Pathian gingtasate’n sil hoih bawl zing diing ngaihtuah u’heh chih thu hi a ginum ahi, huleh hi thute chu khauhtaha na soi zing ka deih hi. Hite chu mihing diingin a hoih a, huleh a phatuam hi.
Hizongleh thudoh ngolhuaite leh khang thu suutte leh, kinialnate leh, daanthua kikalhnate chu kiheimangsan in; ajiahchu hute hi sil phatuamlou leh bangmahlou ahi.
Gindan dihlou nei mi chu khatvei nihvei na hilh nungin nual in.
Huchibang mi chu a sia in, a sual a, amah leh amah siamlouh kitangsah ahi chih na he hi.
Artema aha, Tikika aha na kawma ka hung sawl chiangin Nikopoli khua ah ka kawmah hung teitei tum in; ajiahchu hu munah phalbi sung um ka tum hi.
Zena, daanhetu leh, Apollo a khualzinna va bangmah a taahsap louhna diingun phatuamngaitahin hung pui in.
Huleh eimah mite zong gahlou a, a um louhna diingun a poimohna a zat diing sil hoih bawl zing diingin kizilsah in.
Ka kawma umte zousiah in nang chibai ahung buuh uhi. Ginna a ei hung lungsiatte chibai na buuh in. Na bawnva kawmah hehpihna um hen. Amen.
Paul, Jesu Khrist mitaang leh, i unaupa uh Timothi in, ka deihtah uleh ka natohpih uh Philemon kawmah,
Huleh ka deihtah uh Apphia leh ka sepaihpih uh Arkippa kawmah, huleh na inn a kouhtuam kikhawmte kawmah;
I Pa uh Pathian leh, Lalpa Jesu Khrist akipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Ka haamteinate a na min lou zingzing in ka Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi hi,
Lalpa Jesu lam leh misiangthoute zousiah lama lungsiatna leh ginna na neihdan ja in;
Na ginna kikoppihna chu Khrist Jesu a nangmah a um sil hoih chinteng heetkimna lama ahung phattuam theihna diingin.
Ajiahchu na lungsiatna ah nuamna leh hehnepna loupitah ka nei uhi, bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh nangmah jiahin misiangthoute lungtang a halhta hi, unaupa.
Hujiahin a kilawm hun bawl diing a thu hung piah chu Khrist ah kingam mahmah zong leng,
Lungsiatna jiahin keimah Paul, teehsepu leh, tu a zong Jesu Khrist mitaang in ka hung ngen zaw ahi.
Ka kol taanna a ka hinkhiah, ka tapa Onesima a diingin ka hung ngen hi;
Amah chu tumalaiin nanga diingin a phatuam sih a, hizongleh tuin chu nang leh kei diingin a phatuamta hi;
Amah chu ka hung sawl kiitta a; hujiahin, ka lungtang peetmah ahi a, kipaahtahin na pom in.
Amah chu ka tanchinpha kolbuhna a nangmah luang a na hung tohsah diingin ka kawma umdensah ka ut mahmah a;
Hizongleh na chitna chu chitsah teitei hilou a, na ut thua hih ahihzawh theihna diingin na thu louin bangmah ka bawl nuam sih hi.
Ajiahchu hun tomkhat sung nang ahung khen chu kumtuang a amah na neih zawh na diing zong ahi meithei hi;
Ahi’n tuin chu suaah bang a hilou in, suaah sang a hoih, unau deihtah bangin, kei diingin chu deihtuam ahi a, nang diing semin houh, tahsa ah leh Lalpa ah bangchi hih diahkhol a ta’imah?
Hujiahin na kithuahpih banga na hung geel leh, keimah ngei bangin na pom in.
Na tunga bawlkhial a neih a, bat bangmah a neih lezong keimah batin na koih in;
Keimah Paul in hikhu ka khut ngei a ka gelh ahi, keima’n ka ditsah diing hi; ahi’nchu kei kawmah bat na nei a, nangmah ngei zong na kiba chia ka soina ahi sih hi.
Ahi, unaupa, nang a kuan a nuamna Lalpa ah hung neisah in; Khrist ah ka lungtang hung suhalh in.
Na thumanna a kimuang in leh, ka soi sanga loupizaw a na bawl diing gingta in na kawmah ka hung gial hi.
Bang hitaleh kei diingin zong tunna inn khat hung na ngaihtuahsah in; ajiahchu na haamteinate uh jalin na kawmva piah a ka um diing ka gingta hi.
Khrist Jesu a ka koltaanpih Epaphra in chibai ahung buuh hi;
Mark, Aristarkha, Dema, huleh Luka, ka natohpihte’n zong.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na hagau uh kawmah um hen. Amen.
Pathian, nidanglaia i pulepate kawma lam tuamtuam leh, ze tuamtuam a zawlneite zanga thu na soi pa in,
Hi ni nunungte ah a Tapa in i kawmah thu a soita hi, amah chu sil zousiah luahtu diingin a guat a, khovelte zong amah mah in a siam hi;
Amah chu a loupina vaah leh, a umze kibatpih lim ngei hiin, sil zousiah a silbawltheihna mu a tuding in, amah mah in i sualnate a silsiang zoh nungin, tunglama Loupipen jiatlam ah a touta hi.
Angelte sang a minpha zaw a muh bang ngei in, amahuh sanga hoihzaw mahmah a siam ana hita him hi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chihleh angelte lahah khoipen kawmah ahiai hi thute soi khaahna ana neih ngei, Nang chu ka Tapa na hi a, tuniin ka hung hingkheta hi, chih leh. Amah diingin Pa ka hi diinga, kei diingin amah chu Tapa ahi diing hi, chih.
Hulezong, ta masapen khovel a ahung puiluut laiin, Pathian angelte zousiah in amah bia u’heh, a chi hi.
Huleh angelte tungtaang thu ah chu hichi'n a chi hi, Ama’n a angelte chu huih in a siam a, huleh a natongtute zong mei kuang in a siam hi, chi'n.
Hizongleh Tapa tungtaang thu chu hichi'n a soi hi, Aw Pathian, na laltouphah chu kumtuang kumtuang in a um diing hi; dihtatna lalchiang zong na gam lalchiang ahi.
Nangma'n dihtatna na deih a, giitlouhna na hua hi; hujiahin Pathian, na Pathian ngei in nang chu na lawite tung daihah kipaahna thau ahung nuhta hi.
Huleh, Lalpa, Nangma'n, a chiilin leilung kingahna na phuumta a; huleh vaante zong na khutsuaah ahi;
Amah u’chu ahung mang diing a; hizongleh nang chu na um zingzing hi; amahuh chu a bawnun puansilh bangin ahung lui diing a;
Huleh puanthuaah bangin na jial diing a, a kihengta diing uh; hizongleh nang chu a ngeimah na hi a, na kumte’n zong beini a nei sih diing hi, chi'n.
Hizongleh angelte laha khoipen kawmah ahiai hi thute soikhaahna ana neih ngei, Na meelmate na keeng ngahna a ka siam masiah ka jiatlam ah touin, chih.
Amahuh haw zousiah chu, hutdamna gouluah diingte natohsah diing a sawldoh natohna hagaute ahi sih viai mah?
Hujiahin i thu jahsate ah lungluuttaha phatuam i ngaih sem diing uh ahi, huchilou inchu i tolhmangsah zenzenkha diing uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh angelte zanga thu kisoi bawn a na kip a, bohsiatna leh thumanlouhna chintengin thuhna dihtattah a muh un chu.
Huchilawma hutdamna loupi ngaihsah sih lei, bangchi’n ahiai i suaahtaat diing uh? hu hutdamna thu chu a chiilin Lalpa zanga soi pat ahi a, huleh a thu jatute’n i kawmah a sukip uhi.
Pathian in zong chiamchihnate leh, sillimdangte leh, silmah leh Hagau Siangthou silpiah tuamtuamte in amah deihdan dungjuiin amahuh a heetpih hi.
Ajiahchu ama’n a tanchin i soi uh, tunung a hung um diing khovel chu, angelte nuaiah a koih sih a.
Hizongleh mi khat in, khoimun aha ah, Mihing bang ahi a, na ngaihtuah zing? Ahihlouhleh mihing tapa zong bang ahi a, na veh veu?
Nangma'n amah chu angelte sanga themkhat nuainungzaw in na siam a; loupina leh paahtawina na khuhsah a, na khutsiamte tungah na koihta hi;

Sil zousiah a thuthu a um diingin a keeng nuaiah na koihta hi, chi'n ana hesahta hi. Ajiahchu sil zousiah a thuthu a um diing a, a nuai a, a koih jiahin, a nuai a, a koih louh bangmah a um sih hi hizongleh tu inchu sil zousiah a nuai a kikoih in i mu nai tadih sih hi.

Hizongleh Jesu chu, Pathian hehpihna jiaha michin a diinga sihna a chep theihna diing a, sihna thuaahna diing jiah a angelte sanga themkhat nuaizaw a bawl a um a, loupina leh paahtawina khuhsah a um in i mu zaw uhi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh a diing a sil zousiah um a, a vang a bangkim umpa a diingin chu, ta tampite loupina a puiluutna a a hutdamna uh siamtu chu gimthuaahnate jala suhbukim hi a kilawm mawng ahi.
Ajiahchu susiangthoutu leh suhsiangthoute chu khat apat ahi va; hujiahin ama’n amahuh chu unaute chih a zum sih hi,
Ka unaute kawmah na min ka soiphuang diing a, kouhtuam pawlte lahah la sa in ka hung phat diing hi, chi'n.
Huleh, Amah ah ka ginna ka nga diing hi, a chi kiit hi. Huleh, En un, kei leh Pathian hung piah naupangte, a chi kiit hi.
Huchi'n naupangte chu tahsa leh sisan tangkhawm ahih jiahun, amah ngei in zong hubangmah ahung tang hi; sihna jala sihna thuneitu, diabol, a suhmang theihna diingin leh;
Sih lau jiaha a damsung teng uh suaah a um zousiah haw a suahtaatsah theihna diingin.
Ajiahchu ama’n angelte limlemeel bang a po sih a, Abraham haahte limlemeel bang a po zaw hi.

Huchihjiahin mite a diinga sual thuphatawina diinga, Pathian lam silte a siampulal mi khotuah thei leh ginumtah ahih theihna diingin, sil zousiah a, a unaute bangbang a bawl a ahung um chu amah diingin a poimoh him ahi.
Ajiahchu amah ngei in zong heemna tuaah a ana thuaah taah jiahin, heemna tuaahte chu a panpih thei hi.
Huchihjiahin, unau siangthou, vaan kouhna tangte haw, i thugin uh Sawlleh leh Siampu Lal, Khrist Jesu chu ngaihtuah un;
Pathian innsung mite zousiah laha Mosi chu a ginum bangmahin, amah chu amah guattu kawmah a ginum hi.
Ajiahchu inn sanga a satu paahtawi a, a um zawh bang ngei in, amah chu Mosi sanga loupizaw diing a sim ahita hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh inn chinteng chu mi koi aha khat sah ahi veu a; hizongleh sil zousiah satu chu Pathian ahi.
Huleh Mosi chu, khonung a thu hung kisoi diingte heetsahna diingin, Pathian innsung mite zousiah lahah, natongtu bangin, a ginum ngei ahi.
Hizongleh Khrist chu Tapa bangin amah innsung ngei ah a ginum ahi; a tawp dong a i hahkatna uleh i kinepna kipaahna uh i tuuhdet phot uleh, a innsung mite i hi uhi.
Huchihjiahin (Hagau Siangthou soi bangin, Tunia a aw na jah uleh.
Gamdaai a heemna ni a a suhlungthah bangun, na lungtang uh khauhsah sih un;
Hulaiin na pulepate un ahung heem va, ahung ze-et va, huleh kum sawmli sung ka silbawlte a mu uhi.
Huchihjiahin hu haahte tungah ka lungkimta sih a, huleh, Amahun a lungtang un a ngaihtuahkhial zing va, ka lampite zong a he sih uhi, ka chi a.
Huchi'n ka lungthahna in ka kihaahsial a, ka khawldamna ah a luut sih diing uhi, chi'n).
Pilvaang un, unaute, huchilou inchu Pathian hing apat paikhe diingin, na lahva mi khattou sungah ginlouhna lungtang gilou ahung umkha diing hi.
Hizongleh Tuni, a kichih laiin, khat leh khat kihasottuah zaw un; huchilou inchu na lahva mi khattou sual heemna a suhkhauh in na umkha diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Khrist tanpihtute a siam i hita a, i ginna kipatna uh a tawpdong a i tuuhdet phot leh;
Tuni a, a aw na jah uleh, a suhlungthah laiuh bangin, na tungtaang uh khauhsah sih un, chih ahihlai in.
Ajiahchu khenkhat in, a jah vangun zong a sulungthah uh; ahiinlah Aigupta gam apat Mosi puidohte ahi veh sih uhi.
Hizongleh kuate tungah ahiai kum sawmli sung lungkim lou a, a um? silbawlsual, gamdai a, a luang uh lumte tungah hilou ahiai mah?
Huleh a gingta loute kawm loungal, koi kawmah ahiai a khawldamna ah a luut sih diing uh chia a kihaahsial?
Huchi'n gintaatlouhna jiahin a luut theita sih uh, chih i mu uhi.
Hujiahin i lau diing uh, huchilou inchu a khawldamna a luutna diing thuchiam um zing napi in, na lahva mi khattou chinglou bangin na umkha diing uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh amahuh kawm a soi a hihbangin, tanchinpha chu i kawma soi ahi a; hizongleh a thu jatute a ginna toh a kizop louh jiahin, a thu jahte u’chu amahun a phattuampih sih uhi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh eiuh a gingtasate chu khawldamna ah i luut uhi, Ka lungthah a ka kihaahsial bangin, leilung siam chiil apat nnate tohzohsa hita mahleh, ka khawldamna ah a luut sih diing uh, chia a soi bangin.
Ajiahchu ama’n mun khat ah ni sagihni thu hichibangin a soi hi, Huleh Pathian in ni sagihni in a natoh zousiah a khawlsanta, chi'n.
Huleh hi munah, Ka khawldamna a, a luut taah uleh, a chih kiit hi.
Hujiahin mi khenkhat khawldamna a, a luut diing uh thuchiam a um naahlai jiah leh, nidang a tanchinpha soi masatnate gintaatlouhna jiaha a luut louh jiahin;
Hun sawttah nungin David zangin, Tuni, chi'n, bang ni ahakhat a guat kiit a, Tuni a a aw na jah uleh, na lungtang uh khauhsah sih un, chi a kisoi bangin.
Ajiahchu Joshua in amahuh na khawldamsahta hileh, hunungin ama’n ni dang thu a soi sih diing hi.
Hujiahin Pathian mite a diingin khawldamna khat a um nalai hi;
Ajiahchu Pathian a natohna apat a khawldam bangin, amah khawldamna a luut in zong a natohte apat a tawpta ahi.
Hujiahin hu khawldamna a luut diingin i hahpan diing uh, huchilou inchu mi khattou hu gintaatlouhna etsahna bang a um in a puuhkha diing hi.

Ajiahchu Pathian thu chu a hing a, sil a bawlthei a, namsaau hiamtuah sangin a hiamzaw a, hinna leh hagau, huleh guhtuah leh chintuiguh khen thei khopin a sun thei a, lungtang a ngaihtuahte leh tupte hekhentu ahi.
Silsiam khat mah amah mitmuha kilang lou mawngmawng a um sih a; a kawma i tanchin i tutna diingpa mitmuh a’chu bangkim saguah leh kihongsa ahi.
Huchi'n vaante haw a paisuaah Siampu Lal loupitah, Jesu Pathian Tapa i neih jiahin i thugin uh i pomkip diing uhi.
Ajiahchu i haatlouhnate uh hung thuaahpih pha lou Siampu Lal nei i hi sih a; himahleh eihaw banga lam chintenga heemna tuaahsa, sual ahihleh sual lou, nei i hi zaw uhi.
Hujiahin khotuahna i tan theihna diing uleh, taahsap hun chianga panpihna diinga hehpihna i muh theihna diingun, haangsantahin hehpihna laltouphah chu i naih diing uhi.
Ajiahchu siampu lal, mite laha kiladoh photmah chu, sualnate jiaha silpiahte leh kithoihnate a latkhawm theihna diingin, Pathian lam silte a mite a diinga pansah ahi uh.
Ama’n chu bangmah heloute leh, lamkhialte tungah hehpihna a nei thei hi; ajiahchu amah ngei zong haatlouhna a tuamvelin ana umta hi.
Huleh hikhu jiahtahin mite a diing a a latsah bangin, sualnate jiahin amah a diing ngei zong a lat a kiphamoh hi.
Huleh hu paahtawina chu, Aaron a kouh banga Pathian in a kouh loungal, mi koimah in amah diingin a kilaah ngei sih hi.

Huchibang mahin Khrist zong siampu lal a siama um diingin amah leh amah a kitawisang sih hi; hizongleh a kawmah Nang chu ka Tapa na hi a, tuni’n ka hung hingkhia ahi, chi a soitu’n a tawisang ahi zaw hi.
Ama’n mun tuam khat a, Nang chu Melkisedek umdan banga kumtuang a siampu na hi, chia a soi mahbangin.

Ama’n chu tahsa a a um lai nitein, sihna laha amah huuhhing theipa kawmah naahpitaha kap leh mittui luang pum a haamteina leh ngetnate a lat nungin, Pathian laudan a siam jiahin ngaihkhiah in a um hi.
Tapa himahzongleh, a silthuaahte haw in thumandan a zilta hi;
Huleh suhbukima hung um in, a thumangte zousiah diingin kumtuang a hutdamna siamtu ahung hita hi;
Melkisedek umdan bang a Siampu lal, Pathian chih in a umta hi.
Amah tungtaang soi diing tampi ka nei va, na ngaihkhiah peih louh jiahun a soichet zong a hahsa hi.
Ahun lam ngaihtuah inchu houtute na hihtaah diing uh ahi a, Pathian thubulte khat in ahung hilh kiit ngai na hita uh; huleh angum hilou a nawitui kiphamoh bang na hung hita uhi.
Nawitui ne photmah chu naungeeh ahih jiahun, dihtatna thu ah heetna bangmah a nei sih uhi.
Hizongleh angum chu mi pichingte, a ngaihtuahna ah zanga, sialepha hekhen diing a a heettheihna ah sawizoita haw a diing ahi.
Hujiahin Khrist thubulte chu nusia in, pichinlam i manoh diing uh; silbawl sisa apat kisiihnate, Pathian lam a ginnate,
Baptisma thute leh, khutngah thute leh, misi thohkiitna thute leh, kumtuang vaihawmna lam thuhilhnate chu bulphuh kiit nawnlou in.
Huleh Pathian in pha a sah inchu hichibang i bawl ngei diing uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh khatvei suhvaah a um a, vaan silpiah chiamta a, Hagau Siangthou tansah a um a,
Huleh Pathian thu hoih leh hun hung um diing a silbawltheihnate chiam haw chu,
A puuh va ahihleh, hute chu kisiih diing a siamthah gual ahi sih uhi; Pathian Tapa chu amahuh tuma kikilhbeh thah leh sumualphou ahihjiahun.
Ajiahchu lei, a tung a ju guahtui na dawnin, amahuh diing a lou na kihohte diinga anteh louhing neehtheih hung suah in, Pathian apat vangpiahna a mu hi.
Hizongleh lingkung leh hampa lingnei suahdoh chu deih louh in a um a; huleh haamse dong phial in a um hi; a tawpna chu mei a haal ahi.
Hizongleh, deihtahte, huchibangin soi mah le’ung, nangun chu huchibang silte sang a hoihzaw leh hutdamna toh kithuahkhawm silte na bawl uh ka hung gingta uhi.
Ajiahchu a min a na natoh uleh, na lungsiatna suhlat uh, misiangthoute na natohsah va, huleh tua zong na toh zing u’chu mangngilh diingin Pathian chu a dihtatlou sih hi.
Huleh nanguh kuapouh in, kinepna heetchi ana kim tang diingin, a tawp dongin thanop suah chiat leh u’chin ka hung deih mahmah uhi.
Na kithahdah louh va, ginna leh kuhkalna jiaha thuchiam gouluahtute umdan juitute na hih uh ka hung deih uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Pathian in Abraham kawma thu a chiam laiin, amah sang a lian zawa a kihaahsial theih louh jiahin, amah le amah in a kihaahsial a,
Tahzetin vang ka hung pe diing a, suhpung zong ka hung supung diing hi, chi'n.
Huchi'n ama’n kuhkaltaha a thuaah mualsuaah nungin silchiam chu a muta hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh mihingte chu amahuh sanga lianzaw in a kihaahsial veu uh; huleh thu namdetna diing a kihaahsialna chu amahuh diingin kinialna zousiah suhtawpna ahi.
Hubangin Pathian in silchiam luah diingte kawmah a lunggel kihenkit theih louhdan nasatah a ensah nuam in, huchu kihaahsialna in a sukipta hi.
Huchu Pathian zuauthei ahih louhna kihengkiit thei lou sil nihte jiaha, eiuh kihumbitna diinga i ma a kinepna kikoih tu diinga taite’n hasotna nasatah i neihna diingun ahi.
Hu kinepna chu hinna siihka kipin i nei a, chiantah leh kiptah, huleh puanjah sunga luut chu ahi.
Huah chu Jesu Melkisedek umdan bang a kumtuang a siampu lal a siam in, eiuh diing a ma puitu in ana luut masata hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh, hi Melkisedek, Salem kumpipa, Pathian tungnungpen siampu, kumpipate va that zou a hung pai kiit Abraham na dawnpa in, amah chu a vangpiah a;
A kawmah Abraham in a neih zousiah sawm a khat a pia hi; a min umzia chu, a masapen in, dihtatna Kumpipa, hu baan ah Salem Kumpipa chihna ahi a, huchu lemna Kumpipa chihna ahi.
Amah chu pa nei lou, nu nei lou, khanggui nei lou, um patni nei lou, hintawp ni zong nei lou; hizongleh Pathian Tapa bang a siam, tawpni nei lou a siampu a um zing ahi.
Tuin chi haahtu Abraham ngei in gaal laah thuampuate sawm a khat a piahnapa, hipa loupidan ngaihtuah dihvua.
Huleh Levi haahte laha siampu natohna mu photmahin daan thu dungjuiin mite lah apat sawmakhat laah diing thu a mu ngei uhi, chih chu, a unaute lah apat ahi, Abraham khaal a pawt himahleh uh.
Hizongleh amahuh a kipana a khanggui suitel a umloupa’n chu Abraham apat sawmakhat a la a, thuchiamte neipa chu a vangpiahta hi.
Huleh a neuzaw chu a lianzaw in vang a pia hi chih nialguallouh ahi.
Huleh hi-ah chu mihing si jelte’n sawmakhat a tang uh; hizongleh huah chu amah a hing zing hi, chia a tanchin heetsah a umpa in a tang hi.
Huleh Levi, sawmakhat tangtu in zong Abraham ah sawmakhat a pia hi, ka chi thei hi.
Ajiahchu Melkisedek in a va lamtuah laiin, amah chu a pa khaal ah a um nalai hi.

Hujiahin Levite siampu hihna a bukimna muhtheih hitaleh, (ajiahchu hi nuaiah mite’n daanthu ana mu uhi) Aaron umdan bang a chih hilou a, Melkisedek umdan bang a siampu dang ahung um a ngaihna bang ahiai?
Ajiahchu siampu hihna ahung kihentaah jiahin, daanthu zong a kihen ahung kiphamohta hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh a tungtaang a hi thute kisoinapa chu namtuam a mi ahi a, hu nam laha mi chu kuamah maitaam a na tong a um ngei sih uh.
Ajiahchu i Lalpa u’chu Juda nam apat hung piang ahi chih chiantahin a lang hi; hu nam thu ah chu Mosi’n siampu lam thu bangmah a soi sih hi.
Huleh Melkisedek umdan banga siampu dang ahung um jiahin, ka thusoi uh a kichian sem hi.
Amah chu tahsa thupiah daanthu bang a siam hilou in, hintawp nei lou silbawltheihna bang a siam ahi zaw hi.
Ajiahchu, ama’n, Nang chu Melkisedek umdan bang a kumtuang a siampu na hi, chi'n a hesah hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh thupiah um masa chu haatlouhna leh phattuamna bei jiahin paihin a umta hi.
Ajiahchu daanthu in bangmah a subukim sih a, hizongleh kinepna hoihzaw chu ahung poluut hi; hukhuin eihaw’n Pathian i naih uh ahi.
Huleh kihaahsialna lou a hilou ahihjiahin amah chu siampu a siam ahita hi.

Ajiahchu hu siampute chu kihaahsialna lou a siampu a siam ahi va; hizongleh amah chu, a kawm a, Lalpa a kihaahsial a, a lunghei kiit sih diing, Nang chu Melkisedek umdan bang a kumtuang a siampu na hi, chi a soitu kihaahsialna a siam ahi.
Huchimahbangin Jesu chu thuhun hoihzaw sukiptu a siam ahung hita hi.
Huleh amahuh chu sihna jiaha pandensah theih louh ahih jiahun, siampu chu ana tam ngei uhi;
Hizongleh hi pa’n chu, kumtuang a um zing ahihjiahin siampu hihna hen theih louh a nei hi.
Huchi'n amah a Pathian kawm a hungte chu, amahuh diing a ngetsah diing a, a hin zing jiahin, a tawpkhawh tanin a hundam thei hi.
Ajiahchu huchibang siampu lal, misiangthou, nun se lou, buah baang lou, misualte laha kituamkoih, huleh vaante sanga saangzaw a siam chu eihaw a diingin a kilawm mawng ahi.

Ama’n chu hu siampu lalte banga, nichin amah sualna jiaha kithoihna laan masa zet a, huzoh chianga mite sualna jiaha a lat a ngai sih hi; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh ama’n hichu amah leh amah a kilat in setden diingin khatvei in ana zouta hi.
Ajiahchu daanin mihing haatlouhna neite siampu in a siam veu hi; hizongleh kihaahsial thu, daan nung a hung um in chu, Tapa, kumtuang a diing a suhkimsa chu a guat zawta hi.
Huchi'n i thusoite laha a poimoh pen chu hikhu ahi; vaante a Tungnungpen laltouphah jiatlam a tou, huchibang siampu lal i nei ahi.
Mihing bawl hilou a, Lalpa bawl, mun siangthou leh biahbuuh tahzet a thunatongtu chu.
Ajiahchu siampu lal zousiah chu silpiahte leh kithoihnate laan diing a guat ahi va; huchihjiahin hi siampu lal in zong bang ahakhat lat diing a neih a kiphamoh hi.
Leitunga ana um hile zaw, daan thu bang jel a silpiahte laantu siampute ana um jiahun, siampu in a pang hial sih diing hi.

Hute chu vaan silte etsahna leh a liima zat ahi a, Mosi’n biahbuuh bawl diing a, a kisah lai a, Pathian in a hasot bangin; ajiahchu ama’n, taang tunga etton diing a hung kimusah dungjuiin sil zousiah bawl diingin pilvaang in, a chi hi.
Hizongleh tuin chu thuchiam hoihzawte tung a siam thuhun hoihzosem palai ahih bang jelin natohna hoihzaw ana tangta hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh hu thuhun masapen demna bei ana hitaleh, a nihna pen diing mun kingaihtuah lou diing ahi.
Ajiahchu ama’n amahuh dem in, ngai un, Israel innkuante leh Juda innkuante toh thuhun thah ka siam hun diing nite hung tung diing ahita, Lalpa’n a chi hi;

Aigupta gam a kipana a pulepate uh puidoh diing a a khut va ka tuuh ni a a kawmva ka thuhun pen bang hilou in; ajiahchu amahuh ka thuhun ah a um zing sih va, huleh ke’n amahuh ka ngaihsah sih hi, Lalpa’n a chi hi.

Ajiahchu hu nite nung chianga Israel innkuante kawma ka thuhun diing chu hikhu ahi, Lalpa’n a chi hi; A lungsim vah ka daan thupiahte ka koih diing a, a lungtang vah ka gial diing; huleh amahuh diingin a Pathian uh ka hi diing a, kei a diingin amahuh chu ka mite ahi diing uhi.
Huleh amahun michinin, Lalpa he in; chih a innveengte leh, a unaute a thuhilh nawn sih diing hi; ajiahchu a neupen apat a lianpen tanin a bawnun ahung heta diing uhi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh a dihtatlouhnate vah ka khotuah diing a, a sualnate uleh a bohsiatnate u’zong ka he zing nawn sih diing hi, chi'n.
Ama’n, Thuhun thah, chi a a soi jiahin, a masapen chu a luisahta hi. Huchia hung lui a, hung upa chu a mang diingkuan ahita hi.
Huchiangleh thuhun masapen in zong Pathian natohna daante leh hi khovela mun siangthou chu ana nei ngei hi.
Ajiahchu biahbuuh a kibawl a, a masapen chu khawn vaah koihna leh, dohkaan leh, tanghou siah umna mun siangthou kichi chu ahi.
Huleh puanjah nihna banah, Mun siangthoupen, kichi biahbuuh chu a um hi.
Huah chu gimtui haalna sana bawm leh, thuhun sing kuang sanatui a luankhum, a sunga manna umna sana beel leh, Aaron chiang sel khu leh, thuhun suang peehte umna a um hi;
Huleh a tungah chu khotuahna touphah liah in loupina cherubte a um uh; hute tungthu chu tuin a kimkeei in i soi thei sih diing uhi.
Huleh hi silte hitobang a guatzoh ahih chiangin, siampute’n Pathian nna tongin biahbuuh pindan masapen ah a luut veu uhi.
Hizongleh pindan nihna ah chu siampu lal chauh kum chinin khatvei, amah khelhna leh mite khelhna a diinga a lat diing sisan tawi in a luut veu hi;
Hi in chu, Hagau Siangthou in, biahbuuh pindan masapen a um laisiah mun siangthoupen a luutna lampi a kilang nailou ahi, chih ahung hesah hi.
Huchu tulai hun tehkaahna ahi, huah chu, sialepha heetna lam thu a a betu hoih bukimsah thei lou silpiahte leh kithoihnate a laan veu uhi.
Hute chu neehte, dawnte, kisuhsiangna tuamtuamte, leh tahsalam daante giap ahi a, siamphat kiit hun toh kal a zat diing a bawl ahi.
Hizongleh Khrist chu sil hoih hung um diingte siampu lal diinga hung in, biahbuuh loupizaw leh bukim zaw, khuta sahlouh ah, huchu hi silsiam lah a ahi sih chihna ahi;
Keelte leh bawngnoute sisan a hilou in, amah ngei sisan a eite diing a kumtuang a tatkhiahna muin mun siangthou ah setden diingin khatvei chauh a luutta hi.
Ajiahchu bawngtalte leh keelte sisan leh bawngla vut vaam mi niin tung a thehin bawn tahsa siang khop a a suhsiangthou inchu;
Khrist, kumtuang Hagau jala soiselbei a Pathian kawma kilaan sisanin Pathian hing nna tong diingin, silbawl sisa apatin na sialepha heetna uh bangchituhin a susiangthouta diai?

Huleh hikhu jiahin amah chu thuhun thah palai ahi, thuhun masa nuai a tatsualnate lah apat a tatkhiahna diing a a sih taah jiahin, kouhte’n kumtuang a gouluah diing thuchiam chu a tang thei diing uhi.
Ajiahchu thusiah umna photah a siahtu sihna zong a um ngeingei diing ahi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh mite a sih nungun thusiah in thu a nei chauh hi; a siahtu damsung siah vang thu mawngmawng a nei sih hi.
Huchi'n thuhun masa zong sisan lou in suhkip ahi sih hi.
Ajiahchu Mosi in daanthu dungjui a thupiah photmah mite kawma a soi zohin, bawngnou leh keel sisan, tui toh, sawnsan toh, hussop toh a la a, huleh lehkhabu leh mipite zousiah chu a theh a,
Hichu Pathian in na kawmva ahung piah thuhun sisan chu ahi, chi'n.
Hubanah zong ama’n biahbuuh leh, natohna vanzat zousiah chu sisan a theh hi.
Huleh daanthu in sil zousiah chihphial sisan a suhsiangthou in a um a; sisan suah louin ngaihdamna a um sih hi.
Hujiahin vaan a sil umte batpihte chu hihaw a suhsiang a, a um ngei diing ahi; hizongleh vaan sil tahzet haw chu hite sang a kithoihna hoihzawte a suhsiangthou a a um diing ahi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Khrist chu a tahzet etsahna, khuta bawl mun siangthou ah a luut sih a; tuin Pathian ma-ah i luang va kilang diingin vaan ngeiah a luut zawta hi.
Siampu lal, kum china amah sisan hilou tawikawm a munsiangthou a a luut veu bangin, amah chu amah le amah kilaan diingin a luut sih hi.
Huchi hilouleh leilung siam chiil apat tampi vei a thuaahta diing hi; hizongleh tu huntawp ah amah chu sualna suhbeina diing a amah kipetawm diingin khatvei ahung kilangta hi.
Huleh mihingte diing a khatvei sih diing, hizongleh huzoh chianga vaihawmna um diing guatsa ahi;
Huchimahbangin Khrist zong mi tampite sualna pomang diing a khatvei lat in a um a; huleh amah na ngaahtute kawmah sualna tellouin hutdamna mu diingin a nihveina ahung kilang kiit diing hi.
Daanthu chu sil hoih hung um diingte liim giap ahi a, a kibatpih tah ahih louh jiahin, hu kum chin a kithoihna a lat veute un ahung naihtute a bukimsah zou sih hi.
Huchi hilouleh a lat uh tawpta lou diing ahiviai mah? Ajiahchu a betute chu khatvei suhsiangthou a um in sual kiheetna a nei nawn sih diing uhi.
Hizongleh hu kithoihnate ah chu kum chinin sualnate heetdoh kiitna a um veu hi.
Ajiahchu bawngtalte leh keelte sisanin sualnate la mangthei gual ahi sih hi.
Huchihjiahin khovela ahung lai in, ama’n, Kithoihna leh sillat na deih sih a, hizongleh sapumkhat na hung bawlsah zaw hi;
Pumhaal silpiahte leh sualna kithoihnate ah nangma’n kipaahna na nei sih hi, a chi a.
Huin keima’n, ngai in, (lehkhabujial a keimah thu gelh ahi, ) na deihzawng bawl diingin ka hung hi, Aw Pathian, ka chi a.
A tungah, Kithoihna leh silpiah leh pumhaal sillatte leh sualna kithoihna na deih sih a, huah kipaahna zong na nei sih hi; hute chu daanthu banga lat ahi, a chih phetin,
Ama’n, ngai in, na deih zawng bawl diingin ka hung hi, Aw Pathian, a chi hi. A nihna a tunding theihna diingin ama’n a masapen chu a lamangta hi.
Hu deihzawng lam a Jesu Khrist sapumkhatvei setden diing a lat jiahin suhsiangthou in i umta uhi.
Huleh siampu chinin niteng a nna tongin sualnate lamang theilou kithoihna ngeimah laan in a ding zing uhi.
Hizongleh ama’n chu kumtuang a diinga sualnate diinga kithoihna khat a lat nungin Pathian jiatlam ah a touta hi.
Hunung siah chu a meelmate a keengngahna a bawl ahih masiah uh a ngaah zingta hi.
Ajiahchu ama’n sillat khat in suhsiangthousate chu kumtuang a diingin a subukimta hi.
Huleh Hagau Siangthou in zong i kawmah ahung hesah hi; ajiahchu ama’n,
Hu nite nung chianga a kawmva ka thuhun diing chu hi ahi, Lalpa’n a chi, A lungtang vah ka thupiahte ka koih diing a, huleh a lungsim vah ka gial diing hi, a chih zoh nungin,
A sualnate uleh a tatleehnate u’chu ka he zing nawn sih diing hi, a chitou nalai hi.
Huchi'n huchibangte ngaihdamna umna photah sualna a diinga sillat a um nawn sih hi.
Hujiahin unaute, Jesu sisan jiaha mun siangthoupen a luut ngamna nei in,
Eiuh diing a ahung bawlsah lamthah le hing ah puanjah (huchu a sapum chihna ahi,) kaantan in;
Huleh Pathian innkuanpihte tunga siampu lal khat i neih jiahin;
Sialepha heetna hoihlou apat i lungtang uh thehsiang a um in, i sapum u’zong tui chiima sil a um in, huleh ginna heetchi ana lungtang dihtah toh i naih diing uhi.
I ginna thuphuan pen uh lawng lou keeiin i tudet diing uhi; Ajiahchu amah thuchiam hung petu chu a ginum hi.
Huleh lungsiatna leh silhoih bawlna lama kitohthou diingin khat leh khat i kingaihtuah diing uh.
Khenkhatte banga i kikhopnate uh tawpsan lou in; himahleh khat leh khat kihasottuah zaw in; huleh ni ahung nai hulhul chih na heet un kihasottuah sem un.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh thutah heetna i neih nung a i sual teitei inchu, sualnate diing a kithoihna a um nawnta sih a,
Hizongleh vaihawmna ngaah zing lauhuai bang aha leh, doutute kaang mang diing lungthahna mei a um zawta diing hi.
Mosi daan poisa lou mi chu heetpihtu nih leh thum thu in lainatna bei in a si veu uhi.

Pathian Tapa tuandeen a, thuhun sisan amah suhsiangthouna chu sil sianglou a ngai a, huleh hehpihna Hagau simmohbawl chu, hu sanga bangchituha gawtna loupizaw ahiai thuaahleh kilawm a na ngaihtuah uh?
Ajiahchu, Phuba mawngmawng kei laah diing ahi, keima’n ka thuh diing hi, Lalpa’n a chi, chih leh, Lalpa’n a mite vai a hawmsah diing, chia soitu amah chu i he uhi.
Pathian hing khuta puuh chu sil lauhuaitah ahi.
Hizongleh masang laia, suhvaah a na um nung va, thuaahna hahsatahte na thuaah lai nite uh ngaihtuah kiit un;
Thu khat a’chu muhsitna leh hahsatnate thuaah in na um va; thu khatah ahihleh, huchibang a bawl a umte thuaahpihtute na hung hi uhi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh, nangun ka kolbuhnate ah na hung lainat va, vaan ah gou hoihzaw leh, um zing diing na neih uh kiheet in, na thuampua uh hung laahsahte u’zong kipaahtahin na thuaah zota uhi.
Hujiahin kipaahman loupitah mai mu diing a na muanna u’chu paaikhe hial sih un.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Pathian deihzawng na bawlzoh va, silchiam chu na muhtheihna diingun na kuhkal uh a ngai hi.
Ajiahchu tomkhat zohchiangin ahung diingpa chu ahung diing hi, sawt a hal nawn sih diing hi.
Huchi'n midihtat chu ginna in a hing diing a; hizongleh a nungtolh inchu ka lungsim in amah ah kipaahna a nei sih diing hi.
Hizongleh eiuh chu mangthai diing a nungtolh haw laha mi i hi sih va; hinna humbit diing a gingtahaw laha mi i hi zaw hi.
Huleh ginna chu sil kinepnate heetchetna, sil muhlouhte um ngei a heetna ahi.
Ajiahchu hi thu ah upate’n paahtaat a loh uhi.
Ginna jalin khovelte chu Pathian thu a suhtuah khawm ahi chih i he a, huchi'n sil kimute zong sil kilangte a siam ahi sih hi.

Ginna in Abel in Kaina sangin kithoihna hoihzaw Pathian kawmah a laan a, hukhu jiahin midihtat ahi chih heetsahna a loh a, Pathian in a silpiah thu ah a heetpih a; hukhu jiahin sita hinapi in thu a soi nalai hi.
Ginna in Enok chu sihna mulou diingin laahmang in a um a; huleh Pathian in a laahmang jiahin muh in a umta sih; laahmang a, a um ma in Pathian a kipaahsah hi chih heetsahna a nei hi.
Hizongleh ginna louin chu amah kipaahsah gual ahi sih hi; ajiahchu Pathian kawma hung inchu amah a um chih leh, amah guntuhtah a hawltute kawma kipaahman petu ahi chih a gintaat diing ahi.

Ginna in Noah chu sil muh nailouhte thu Pathian hilh a na um in, a lau a, a innkuanpihte hutdamna diingin kuang a bawl a; hukhuin khovel siamlouh a tangsahta a, ginna jiaha um dihtatna gouluahtu ahung hita hi.
Ginna in Abraham chu, a nung chianga gou a hung tan diing mun a chiah diing a kouh a, a um laiin a thumang a; huleh a chiahna lam diing zong he lou in a chiahdoh hi.
Ginna in gam chiamah mi gam a taam bangin ana taam zing a, thuchiam kibang a a gouluahpih diingte Isaak leh Jakob toh puaninn a teeng khawmin;
Ajiahchu ama’n innbul kiptah nei, Pathian sah leh bawl khopi chu a ngaah ahi.
Ginna in Sara in zong naupaai theihna a nei a; a chiamtu chu muanhuai a, a seh jiahin a teeh nungin ta a nei hi.
Huchi'n a sisa tobang mi khat apatin vaan a aahsite bang a tam leh, tui khang lian gei a piauneel banga simseeng louh ahung suaahta hi.
Hutehaw zousiah chu ginna nei in a sita va, silchiamte chu tang louin, hizongleh gamlatah apat gaalmuh in a pomkip va, leitung ah chu mikhual leh khualzin ahi uh chih ana phuangta uhi,
Ajiahchu hutobang thu soite’n chu gam tuam khat a hawl uh chih chiantahin a sulang uhi.
Huleh amahun ahung pawtna gam uh lunggulh leh u’chu, kihkiitna hun lemtaang ana muta tham diing uhi.
Hizongleh gam hoihzaw deih ana hi va, huchu vaan gam ahi a; hukhu jiahin Pathian chu a Pathian uh chih a kouh a zum sih hi; ajiahchu amahuh diingin khopi khat guatsa’n a koihta hi.
Ginna in Abraham in, ze-et a, a um in, Isaak a laan a; thuchiamte tangpa’n a tapa neihsun a laan hi.
Isaak ah na haahte a kichi diing, kichipa ngei chu.
Pathian in misi lah apatin zong a kaithou thei hi chi a geel in; hua kipanin etsahna in muh zong a mu kiitta ngei hi.
Ginna in Isaak in sil hung tung diingte thu ah Jakob leh Esau a vangpiah hi.
Ginna in Jakob in a sih kuanin, Joseph tate geel a vangpiah a; a chiangphut dawn a kinga in Pathian a bia hi.
Ginna in Joseph in a sih diing kuanin Israel tate pawtkhiah diing thu a soi a; huleh a guhte tungtaang ah thu a pia hi.
Ginna in, Mosi chu a pianlai in, naungeeh meel hoihtah ahi a chih jiahun, ha thum sung a nulepa phualin a um a; kumpipa thupiah zong a lau sih uhi.
Ginna in, Mosi in ahung pichin nungin, Pharaoh tanu tapa chiha um diing a ut sih a.
Tomchakhat sung sual nopna mun sangin, Pathian mite toh bawl gentheihna thuaah a teel zota hi;
Khrist kimuhsitna chu Aigupta gam goute sanga hauhsatna loupizaw a ngaiin; ajiahchu a kipaahman muh diing lam chu a en zing hi.
Ginna in ama’n kumpipa lungthahna lau louin Aigupta gam a nusia a; muhtheih louhpa chu muhtheih banga sepin a thu ah mualsuaah hi.
Ginna jalin chiahkaan kuut leh sisan thehna a bawl hi, ta masa sulumtu in amahuh a khoihkhaah louhna diingin.
Ginna in amahun leigaw tunga pai bangin Tuipi san a kaan va; Aigupta mite’n hubangin bawl a tum va, tui ah a tumta uhi.
Ginna in Jeriko kulhbaang chu ni sagih a velh nungun a chimta hi.
Ginna in nohchizuahnu Rahab zong ginglou mite toh a mangthaikhawm sih hi, ama’n enkhetute hamuangtah a ana zintun jiahin.
Huleh bang ahiai ka soi naahlai diing? Gideon thute, Barak thute, Samson thute, Jephtha thute, David thute, Samuel thute leh zawlneite thu soi diing chileng, hunin ahung daih sih diing hi.
Hute’n chu ginna in gamte a la va, dihtatna a bawlkhia va, thuchiamte a tang va, humpibahneite kam a chihsah va,
Mei silbawltheihna a sudaai va, namsaau mahiam a peel va, haatlouhna apatin haatsah in a um va, kidouna ah a haat mahmah va, a gaalte uh pangkhawm a delhjah uhi.
Numeite’n a misi uh thou kiit a mu va; mi dangte zong gimthuaahsah in a um va, thohkiitna hoihzaw a muhna diingun, hutkhiahna a deih sih uhi.
Huleh mi dangte’n chu nuihzat bawlna leh vuaahna bang a thuaah va, ahi, hulou zong kolbut leh suangkul a khum bangin a um uh;
Suang a seh in a um va, singaat a aattan in a um va, namsaau a saatlup in a um va; belaam vun leh keel vun silh in a vaah vai va; gentheitahin, gimthuaah in, sawih in a um uhi.
(Hute a diingin chu khovel umna taah ahi sih hi; ) gamdaite ah bang, taang ah bang, kawlbuuh ah bang, leikohawm ah bang a vaah lehleh uhi.
Huleh hite zousiah in a ginna jiah va phatna loh zou in, silchiam a tang sih uhi.
Ajiahchu eihaw tellou a amahuh suhbukim a, a umlouhna diingin Pathian in eihaw diingin sil hoihzaw khat guatsa in a koih hi.
Huchihjiahin eiuh zong heetpihtu meipi nasatah uum kiimvel a i um uh he in, ahung gihsah photmah leh, sual eimaha belh zing chu i koihkhe diing va, i ma a kitaidemna um ah kuhkaltahin i tai diing uh,
I ginna siamtu leh subukimtu Jesu lam en in; ama’n chu a ma a um kipaahna jiahin zumnate zong poisa lou in, kros a gimna a thuaah a, Pathian laltouphah jiatlam ah a va touta hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh na lungsim va na tawl va na chauh louhna diingun, amah tunga misualte nialkalhna thuaahzoupa chu ngaihtuah un.
Sual dou in sisan pawt khopin na pang nai sih uhi.
Huleh hasotna thu, tate hilh banga na kawmva kisoi chu na mangngilhta uhi, Ka ta, Lalpa sawina ngaineep sinla, a taihilha na um in zong lungke sin;
Ajiahchu Lalpa’n a lungsiatte a sawi a, huleh ta a deih photmah chu a jep veu hi.
Sawina na thuaah uleh Pathian in a tate bawl a hung bawl ahi; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh pa sawi louh ta kua a um ngei ei?
Hizongleh ta zousiah tan ngei sawina na thuaah louh unchu, jauta na hi va, ta tah na hi sih uhi.
Hubanah zong eihaw hung sawitu tahsa a pate i nei va, huleh amahuh chu i zahtaat uhi; hu sanga hagaute Pa thuthu a i um zawh sem va, i hin diing uh hilou ahiai mah?
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh amahun ni tomtakhat diinga hoih a sah bang jel va ahung sawi uh ahi a, hizongleh ama’n chu eite phattuamna diing a, sianthouna i tan theihna diingin ahung sawi hi.
Sawina chu a kithuah laiin kipaahhuai a bang sih a, hasiat a huai zaw hi; himahleh a nung chiangin chu huchia soihzoi a umte diingin dihtatna gah hamuan umtah a suah veu hi.
Huchihjiahin khut kaikhete leh khup zoite chu phong tang un;
Huleh na keengte uh diingin lampi tang siam un, huchilou inchu keengbaite lampi apat a peetmangkha diinguh; hizongleh hute chu sudam zaw un.
Mi zousiah toh kituaahna leh siangthouna delh un, hu siangthouna lou inchu kuama’n Lalpa a mu sih diing hi.
Pilvaangtahin en un, huchilou inchu mi khattou Pathian hehpihna ching zou lou na umkha diing va; khaatna zung bang aha hung selnou in, hukhu in mi tampite suhbuah in a umkha diing uhi.
Khatvei neeh mana a ta upa hihna zuahpa Esau bang a kingaihhaat aha, Pathian jahlou mi aha a umkha diing hi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh a nunglamin vangpiahna gou chu luah tum in mit hi luang pum in phatuamngaitahin hawl mahleh kisiihna mun a muh louh jiahin deih louh in a umta chih na he uhi,
Ajiahchu nanguh chu taang khoihkhaah theih leh mei a kaang, vomna leh mialna leh huihpi nunna mun,
Huleh pengkuul ging leh thusoi gingte umna a hung na hi sih uh; hu awging jate haw in chu a kawmva hu thu a kisoi kiit nawn louhna diingin a ngen uhi.
(Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh sa nasanin zong hu taang chu a suhkhaah leh suang a sehlup aha, ahih louh leh tei a sutlup diing ahi chih thupiah chu amahun a thuaahzouta sih uhi.
Huleh hu a silmuh uchu a lauhuai mahmah a, Mosi’n, Ka lau naah mahmah a, ka kithing top hi, a chi hi).
Hizongleh nang u’chu, Zion taang leh Pathian hing khopi, vaan Jerusalem, simseeng louh angel honpi leh,
Khawmpi lian leh vaan a min kigialta piang masa kouhtuam kawm a leh, mi zousiah vaihawmtu Pathian kawm leh, midihtat suhbukim a umte hagau kawmah bang,
Huleh thuhun thah palai Jesu kawm a leh, Abel a sanga sil hoihzaw soi sisan theh kawm a hung na hi zaw uhi.
Thusoitu chu na deih louh khaah diing uh pilvaang un. Ajiahchu leitung a thusoitu a deih louh va bawn suaahtalou ahih uleh, vaan a kipana thu hung petu i kiheisan inchu i suaahta moh sem diing uhi;
Hulaiin a aw in lei a suliing a; hizongleh tuin chu khatvei lei chauh hilou in, vaan zong ka suliing kiit diing, chi'n thu a chiamta hi.
Huleh hi thu, khatvei ka suliing kiit diing chih in, sil kiliingloute a um zing theihna diingin, sil kiliingte chu silsiam bang a suanmangin a um diing chih a hesah hi.
Huchi'n gam suhliing guallouh i tan jiahun, jahtah leh, Pathian laudan siam kawma pomtaahtaha Pathian nna i toh theihna diingun hehpihna i nei diing uhi;
Ajiahchu i Pathian u’chu kaahtum haat mei ahi.
Unau kilungsiatna umsah zing un.
Mikhualte hoihbawl diing mangngilh sih un; ajiahchu huchibang bawl in mi khenkhatte’n he loupi in angelte ana zintun uhi.
Suangkul a kaan a umte chu amahuh toh kaankhawm a um bangin he zing un; huleh suhgentheih thuaahte chu nanguh zong sapum a um na hih jiahun he zing un.
Mi zousiah lahah kiteenna chu zahbawl in um henla, huleh lupna zong suhbuah louh in um heh; himahleh tohuuhte leh aangkawmte chu Pathian in vai a hawmsah diing hi.
Na umdan u’chu sumngaihnatna tellou hi heh; na sil neih tungvah lungkim un; ajiahchu ama’n, Bangma chihin ka hung nuse sih diing a, tai zong ka hung taisan sih diing hi, a chi hi.
Huchi'n haangsantahin, Lalpa chu ahung panpihtu ahi a, ka lau sih diing hi, mihingin bang ahung loh diai? i chi ngam uhi.
Na tungva thuneitute leh Pathian thu na kawmva soitute chu he zing un; a umdan va sil hung umdohte ngaihtuah unla, a gindan uh jui un.
Jesu Khrist chu jan ni toh, tuni toh, huleh kumtuang in a ngeimah ahi.
Thugin tuamtuam leh limdangte tohmangin um sih un. Ajiahchu lungtang hehpihna a suhkip chu a hoih ahi; neeh diing a suhkip diing ahi sih, huchibang lungkhamte’n hute ah phattuamna a mu tuan sih ahi.
Biahbuuh natongtute’n a neeh theihlouhna uh maitaam i nei uh ahi.
Siampu lalin sual thoihna diing a mun siangthou a sisan a luutpih veu gante luang haw chu khogei lamah a haalmang veu uhi.
Huchihjiahin Jesu’n zong, amah sisan ngei a mite a suhsiangthou theihna diingin kulh kotkhaah polamah a thuaahta hi.
Hujiahin amah a muhsitna uh pua in a kawmah, khogei lamah i chiahdoh diing uh.
Ajiahchu hitah ah khomundet i nei sih va, khopi hung um diing chu i hawl uh ahi zaw hi.
Hujiahin amah vangin paahtawina kithoihna chu Pathian kawmah tawplou in i laan diing uhi, huchu a mina i kipaahna phuandohna muuh gahte ahi.
Hizongleh sil hoih bawl leh silphal chu mangngilh sih un, ajiahchu huchibang kithoihnate ah Pathian a kipaah mahmah hi.

Na tungva thuneitute thu mang unla, a thuthu un um un; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh na tungtaang thu uh soi diingte bangin na hagau uh ahung veensah uh ahi, huchu lunggimtah a bawllou a, kipaahtaha a bawl theihna diingun; lunggimtaha a bawl u’chu nanguh diingin a phatuam sih ahi.
Keiuh diingin hung haamteisah un; ajiahchu sil bangkimah dihtaha gamtat utin sialepha heetna hoihtah ka nei uh chih ka gingta uhi.
Hizongleh kintaha na kawmva sawl kiit a ka um theihna diingin, huchu ka hung ngen diahkhol hi.
Tuin hamuanna Pathian, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist misi laha kipana kaithoupa, kumtuang thuhunna sisan jala Belaampu loupitah in,
Jesu Khrist jala a mitmuh a, a deihzawng photmah bawl diingin sil hoih chinteng ah nanguh hung subukim hen; amah kawmah loupina kumtuang kumtuang in umta hen. Amen.
Huleh unaute, hasotna thu ngai thei teitei diingin ka hung ngen hi; ajiahchu thu tawmtakhat in na kawmvah ka hung gial hi.
I unaupa uh Timothi hahdoh in a umta chih ana heta un; ahung paipah leh, amah toh nanguh ka hung mu diing hi.
Nanguh hung heute zousiah leh misiangthoute zousiah chibai hung na buuhsah un. Italy gam a mite’n chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Na bawnva kawmah hehpihna um hen. Amen.
Jakob, Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist suaah in, nam sawmlenih kithehdalhte chibai a buuh hi.
Ka unaute, ze-etna chituamtuam na tuaah chiangun nuamna ngenin ngai un;
Na ginna uh etkhiahna in kuhkalna a siam chih he in.
Hizongleh, bangmah tasamlou a, na pum va na bukim theihna diingun kuhkalna in tong bukim heh.
Na lahva koipouh in pilna a taahsap leh, mi zousiah kawma tailou leh it loua petu Pathian kawmah ngen heh; huchi'n a kawmah piah ahi diing hi.
Hizongleh, ginglel hetlou in ginna nei in ngen heh. Ajiahchu ginglel mi chu tui khang lian kinawh, huih muut leeng lehleh bang ahi.
Hujiahin, huchibang min chu Lalpa apat bangmah muh kigingta sih heh.
Lungsim bulbaal nei lou mi chu a silbawl zousiah ah a kip sih hi.
Daikawmkal a um unau chu paahtawi a, a um jiahin kipaah heh;
Hizongleh mihausa chu suhneu a a um jiahin kipaah heh; ajiahchu hampa paah banga mang diing ahi hi.
Ajiahchu, niin a satna toh ahung suaah chiangin, hampa chu a haaivul a, huleh a umdan hoih chu a mangta hi; huchimahbangin mihausa zong a paina ah a vuai diing hi.
Ze-etna thuaah teitei mi chu a hampha hi, bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh etkhiah a a um zoh chiangin Lalpa’n amah lungsiattute kawma piah a chiam, hinna lallukhuh chu a mu diing hi.
Mi koimah in heem a a um chiangin, Pathian heem ka hi chi sih heh; ajiahchu Pathian chu giitlouh a heem gual ahi sih a, ama’n zong koimah a heem ngei sih hi.
Hizongleh michin amah utna a puimang leh hiip a, a um chiangin heem in a um ahi zaw hi.
Huleh utna in nou a paai chiangin, sual ahung hingkhia a, huleh sualin ahung pichin chiangin sihna ahung hingkhia hi.
Ka unau deihtahte, heemin um sih un.
Silpiah hoih leh silpiah bukim photmah chu tunglam a kipan ahi a, vaahte Pa kawm apat hungsuh ahi, amah ah chu lamdanna leh kiheina liim mawngmawng a um sih hi.
A silsiamte laha a gah masa lawikhat i hihtheihna diingun, a utthu a thutah a ahung hin i hi uhi.
Huchihjiahin, ka unau deihtahte, michin ngaihkhiah lamah kilawp henla, thusoi lamah kilawp sih henla, lungthah baih sih heh.
Ajiahchu mihing lungthahna in Pathian dihtatna a siam sih hi.
Huchihjiahin bolhhoh zousiah leh giitlouhna dimlet chu koihmang unla, na hinna uh hundam thei thu kipsa chu thunuailuuttahin pom un.
Hizongleh nanguh leh nanguh kihem in, thu ngaikhetu chauh hilou in, thu juitute hi zaw un.
Ajiahchu koipouh thu ngaikhia chauh ahih a, a juitu ahih louh inchu, amah chu mi limlang a, a pianpih maai kien bang giap ahi.
Ajiahchu a kien a, huleh a chiah mang a, bangchibang mi ahih a kimanghilhpah hi.
Hizongleh koipouh zalenna daan bukim en a, hu a um zing a, mangngilhhaat thungaikhia hilou a, thu tongtu hizaw chu, hu mi chu a natoh ah vangpiah in a um diing hi.
Na lahva mi koipouh sahkhomitah bang a um a, a lei veeng hoih loua, amah lungtang kihem zaw chu, hu mi sahkho biah chu a thawn ahi.
Pathian leh Pa mitmuh a sahkho biah siangthou leh buahbaang lou chu, nubei pabeite leh meithaite a gimthuaah lai va veh leh, khovel a niin baang lou a kikoih zing ahi.
Ka unaute, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist, loupina Lalpa gingta kawmin, mi khentuam nei sih un.
Ajiahchu na kikhopna vah sana zungbuh but, puan hoihtah silh khat hung luut henla, huleh mizawng khat puansetah silh in hung luutta leh;

Huchi’n puan hoih silhpa chu na zahbawl va, a kawmah, Nang hi mun hoih ah tou in, na chi va; huleh mizawngpa kawmah chu, Nang hutah ah dingin aha, ahihlouleh, Hiah ka keeng ngahna nuaiah tou in, na chi uhi;
Huchi'n na lungsim vah khentuam nei a, ngaihtuahna gilou a soiseltute hilou diing na hi viai mah?
Ngai un, ka unau deihtahte, Pathian in hi khovela mizawngte chu ginna a hausa diing leh, amah lungsiatte a chiam lalgam luah diing a teel hilou ahiai mah?
Hizongleh nangun chu mizawngte na musit uhi. Mihausate’n nanguh ahung bawlse veu un, vaihawmna ah ahung kailuut veu sih viai mah?
Amahun na kikouhna uh min zahumtah chu a soise sih viai mah?
Pathian lehkhathu dungjui a, Nangmah na kilungsiat banga na innveengte na lungsiat diing ahi, chih lal daan na zop uleh na bawl hoih uhi.
Hizongleh mi khentuamna neih unchu, sil na hihsual va, huleh daan in bohsetu na hih uh ahung hesah hi.
Ajiahchu mi koipouh in daan jui kim henla, mun khatah khialta leh, a bawn a mohtangin a um ahi.
Ajiahchu, Aangkawm sin, chipa’n, Tual that sin, zong a chi thou hi. Huchi'n aangkawm sih zong lechin, tual na thah inchu, daan botsetu na hita thou hi.
Hujiahin zalenna daan a vaihawmsah diingte bangin thu soi unla, sil bawl un.
Ajiahchu khotuahna nei lou mi chu khotuahna bei a vaihawmsah in a um diing hi; huleh khotuahna chu vaihawmna ah a kisathei veu hi.
Ka unaute mi’n ginna ka nei chi henla, natoh nei sih leh, bang a phatuam diai? huchibang ginna in amah a hundam thei diai mah?
Unaupa aha, unaunu aha khat saguah in um henla, nichin anneeh ta samta leh,
Huleh na lahva khat in, Hamuangtahin um inla, lumtah leh vahtahin um in, chi henla; sapum diing a sil poimoh pe tuan sih leh; bang a phatuam diai?
Huchimahbangin, ginna chu natoh bei a amah chauha a um leh, si ahi.
Ahi, mi khat in, Nang ginna na nei a, ke’n natoh ka nei ahi; na ginna chu natoh tel lou in hung ensah inla, ke’n ka ginna ka natohin ka hung ensah diing,
Pathian khat a um chih na gingta maw; na bawl hoih hi; dawite’n zong a gingta va, a kiliing hial uhi, a chi thei hi.
Hizongleh aw mi thulimlou, natoh tel lou a ginna chauh chu si ahi chih na he nuam ei?
I pu uh Abraham in a tapa Isaak maitaam tunga a lat laiin silbawl jiah a siamtang hilou ahiai mah?
Ginna in a silbawlte toh a tongkhawm a, huleh silbawlte jiahin ginna chu a bukimta ahi chih na mu hi.
Huleh Pathian lehkhathu, Abraham in Pathian a gingta a, huchu a dihtatna sim ahi, chih thu a taangtung a; huleh amah chu, Pathian lawm chih ahita hi.
Huchi'n ginna jiah chauh hilou in, natoh jiahin mi’n siam a tang uh chih na mu uhi.
