Huchimahbangin, kizuahnu Rahab in zong, thupotute ana zintun a, amahuh lam tuam a, a sawlkhiah laiin, silbawl jiaha siamtang hilou ahi maw?
Hagau bei sapum a si ahih bangin, natoh bei ginna chu si ahi.
Ka unaute, mohtanna lianzaw tang diing i hi uh chih he in, mi tampi houtu in hung pang sih un.
Ajiahchu sil tampi ah i bawnun i gilou uhi. Mi koipouh thusoi lama a giitlouh louh leh, hu mi chu piching ahi a, a sapum veeng thei mi zong ahi.
Ngai un, i thu a juihna diingun sakolte kam ah siihbah i bah va; huleh a sapum uh a pumin i kaihei thei hi.
Ngai un, jahaatte zong a lian mahmah na va, huih haattah muutleengin a um va, hizongleh a heehtu in a heehna neutakhat in a utna lamlamah a kiheisah hi.
Huchimahbangin lei zong sapum hiang neutakhat ahi a, nasatahin a kiuangsah veu hi. Ngai dua, mei neutakhat in sil kaang nasa thei hina e!

Huleh lei chu mei ahi a, i sapum hiangte lah a tatsiatna lompi chu lei ahi; huchi'n leiin sapum a bawnin a subolhhoh a pianpih hinkhua lampi chiah kualvelna chu a kaangsaha; huleh amah chu gawtmun mei in a kaang veu hi.
Ajiahchu sa namkim, va namkim, guul namkim, tuilianpi a ganhing namkim khawijual theih ahi a, mite’n a khawijual thei uhi.
Hizongleh lei chu koima’n a khawijual thei sih uhi; gilou um kinken thei lou, sihna gu a dim ahi.
Hukhuin Pathian leh Pa ngei chu i phat va; huleh humahin Pathian batpih a siam mihingte i haamsiat jel uhi.
Kamsung khatmah a kipatin phatna leh haamsiatna a pawtkhe veu hi. Ka unaute, hi silte chu huchibang diing hilou ahi.
Tuikhuuh in naah khat ah tui tuui leh tuui loua pawtkhesah ngei eimah?
Ka unaute, theipi kungah olive a gah thei eimah? grep gui ah zong theipi a gah thei eimah? huchimahbangin chikhuuhin tuial leh tuitam a pawtkhesah thei sih hi.
Na lahva koi ahiai pila thu hethei um? thunuaigolhtah leh piltahin a silbawlte chu umdan hoih in ensah heh.
Hizongleh na lungtang va thangsiatna nasatah leh kinialna na neih uleh, uang sih unla, thudih zuausan sih un.
Hutobang pilna chu tunglam a kipan ahi sih a, khovel leh, sapum utna leh, dawi a hung kipan ahi.
Ajiahchu thangsiatna leh kinialna umna photah, buaina leh sualna chinteng a um veu hi.

Hizongleh tunglam a hung kipan pilna chu a masapenin a siangthou phot a, huzohchiangin kilep a ut a, a nunnem a, a hounuam a, khotuahna leh gah hoih in a dim a, khentuam a nei sih a, a lepchiah sih hi.
Huleh dihtatna gah chu kilepna bawlte apat a kilepna a tuh ahi.
Na lahva kidounate leh kisualnate khoia kipana hung kuan ahiai? na sapum hiangte va kidou veu, na tahsa utnate va kipana hung pawt hilou ahi maw?
Na lunggulh va, na nei tuan sih uhi; tual na that va, na deihgoh va, na nei zou tuan sih uh; na kidou va, gaal na bawl uh, na nei diah sih uh, na nget louh jiahun.
Na ngen va, na nget dih louh jiahun na mu sih uh, na nopsahna diing va zat na tup jiahun.
Nanguh aangkawmpate leh aangkawmnute, khovel lawm hihna chu Pathian toh kimeelmaatna ahi chih he lou na hi uh maw? hujiahin koipouh khovel lawm hih ut chu Pathian meelma ahi.
Hagau eimaha teengin thangse khopin ahung deih hi chih, Pathian lehkhathu in a mawh soi hi diing a gingta na hi u'maw?
Hihmalahin hehpihna tamsem ahung pia hi. Hujiahin Pathian lehkhathu in, Pathian in mi kisatheite a doudaal a, kingaingiamte kawmah hehpihna a pe veu hi, a chi hi.
Hujiahin Pathian kawmah kituluut un. Diabol chu doudaal un, huchi'n ahung taimangsan diing hi.
Pathian naih un, huchi'n ama’n ahung naih diing hi. Misualte, na khut uh silsiang un; lungsim mumal neiloute na lungtang uh susiangthou un.
Hahsa sa unla, lungdong unla, kap un; na nuihna uh lungdonna suaah henla, na nuamna uh dahna suaah heh.
Pathian mitmuh in kingaingiam un, huchi'n ama’n ahung tawisang diing hi.

Unaute, khat leh khat kisoisetuah sih un. Mi a unau soisia a, huleh a unau soisel chu daan soisia a, daan vaihawmkhum ahi; hizongleh daan na soisel inchu, daan juitu na hi sih a, vaihawmtu na hi zaw ahi.
Daan petu khat a um a, ama’n chu a hundam thei a, a suseveh thei hi; mi dang soiseltu nang koi na hiai?
Tuin ngai un, nanguh, Tuni aha, jingchiang aha in, hu khopi ah i chiah diing a, hu mun ah kumkhat i va taam diing a, leiin i zuah diing va, i pung diing uh chitute:
Ahiinlah jing chianga bang ahung um diing na he sih uhi. Na hinna uh bang ahiai? Hichu meilum tomtakhat hung kilang a, mangkiitpah bang giap ahi.
Hu sangin, Lalpa’n pha a sah leh i hing diing a, hikhu aha, hukhu aha, i bawl diing, na chi diing uh ahi.
Hizongleh tuin na kiuahsahnate vah nuam na sa uh; huchibang nopsahna zousiah chu sual ahi.
Hujiahin, mi sil hoih bawl diing he a, bawl tuan lou chu, amaha diingin sual ahi.
Nanguh mihausate, tu in ngai un, na tungva hahsatna hung tung diingte jiahin kap unla, peng guaiguai un.
Na hauhsatnate uh a segawpta a, na puante uh ngetin a ne zouta hi.
Na sana uleh na dangka uh a tui-eeh vehta hi; hute siatgawpna chu na sualdan uh heetsahna ahi diing a, na tahsa uh chu meikaah bangin a ne zou diing hi. Hun nununglam a diingin gou na kholta uhi.
Ngai un, na lou va buh aat a kilohte loh, amahuh heem a na piah louh uh a kikou va; huleh a aattute kikou aw chu mipite Lalpa bil ah a luutta hi.
Khovel ah nuamsatahin na um va, na kimawh zat meimei va; goh ni a bangin na lungtangte uh na thausah uhi.
Midih chu siamlouh na tangsah va, na thatta uh; huleh ama’n chu ahung doudaal sih hi.
Hujiahin unaute, Lalpa hung masiah in kuhkaltahin um un. Ngai un, lounei mi’n lei gah luultah chu a ngaah a, guah masa leh guah nunung a muh masiah kuhkaltahin a ngaah veu hi.
Nanguh zong kuhkaltahin um un; na lungtang uh sukip un; ajiahchu Lalpa hungna diing a naita hi.
Unaute, khat leh khat kiphunsan sih un, siamlouh tansah in na umkha diing uhi; ngai un, vaihawmtu chu kotkhaah bulah a um ahi.
Ka unaute, Lalpa mina thusoi zawlneite chu gimthuaahna leh kuhkalna lama etton diingin zang un.
Ngai un, a thuaahaatte chu hampha in i sep uhi. Job kuhkaldan na ja va, Lalpa’n a tawp a, a bawldan: Lalpa chu hehpihna leh khotuahna dim ahih zong na mu uhi.

Hizongleh ka unaute, sil zousiah sanga a thupipen chu kihaahsial sih un, vaan lou in aha, lei lou in aha, kichiamna dang mawngmawng in aha kihaahsial sih un; hi, na chih uh hi, hisah unla; hilou, na chih uh, hilou, hisah zaw un; huchilou in zaw siamlouh tang in na umkha diing uhi.
Na lahva hahsatna thuaah a um ei? haamtei heh. Kipaah a um ei? phatna la sa heh.
Na lahva damlou a um ei? kouhtuam upate kou henla, amahun Lalpa mina thau nuh in haamtei u’heh;
Huleh ginna a haamteina in damlou chu a hundam diing a, Lalpa’n amah chu a kaithou diing hi; huleh silsual ana bawl a ahihleh hute chu ngaihdamsah ahi diing hi.
Suhdam a na um theihna diingun, na khelhnate uh thupha kitawituah unla, khat leh khat kihaamteisah un. Midihtat guntuhtaha haamteina chu a phatuam mahmah hi.
Elijah chu eimah bangthou mihing ahi a, ama’n chu guah zut louhna diingin phatuamngaitahin a haamtei a; huleh kum thum leh ha guup sung leitung ah guah zu louin a umta hi.
Huleh a haamtei kiit a, vaanin guah a zusah a, lei in a gahte ahung suahsahta hi.
Unaute, na lahva mi koipouh thutah akipat na mangta henla, mi khat in pui kiitta leh;
Amah misual a lammanna akipan kiheisahtu in sihna apat hagau khat a hundam diing a, sual tampite a khuhmang diing ahi chih kiheet heh.
Peter, Jesu Khrist sawllehin, Ponta gamte, Galatia gamte, Kappadosia gamte, Asia gamte leh Bithinia gamte a kithehdalh mi vaithaamte,
Thumang diing leh, Jesu Khrist sisan theh tang diing a Hagau hihsiangthou jala Pa Pathian heetlawhna dungjui a teelte kawmah Hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah suhkhang in umta hen.
Misi laha kipana Jesu Khrist thohkiitna jiaha a khotuahna loupitah dungjui a kinepna hing tang diing a eiuh hung hingkhe kiitpa Pathian leh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pa chu phat in um hen,
Goutan sethei lou, huleh tuaithei lou, vaan a nanguh diinga siit mu diingin,
Hun nunung chianga kilang diing hutdamna mu diing a ginna jala Pathian silbawltheihna a kol na hi uhi.
Huah chu nasatahin na kipaah va, tuin tomkhat sung a poimoh leh, ze-etna jat tuamtuam in lungkham tadih mahleh u’chin;
Na ginna etkhiahna u’chu, sana mei a etkhiah ahih nung a zong mangthang jel sanga luul zaw, Jesu Khrist hung kilaahni chianga paahtawina leh, zahbawlna leh, loupina a muh a, a um theihna diingin.
Mu ngei loupiin amah chu na lungsiat va; tuin amah mu sih zong leh u’chin na gingta va, kipaahna soi guallouh leh loupina a dimin na kipaah uhi;
Na ginna uh buchinna, na hagau uh hutdamna ngei chu mu in.
Hu hutdamna thu chu, na kawmva hehpihna hung tung diing thu na soilawh zawlneite’n a kan va, phatuamngaitahin a hawldoh uh;
Khrist thuaahna leh, a nung a hung jui diing loupina thu ana ma heetsah laiun, Khrist Hagau amah va um in bangchihlai hun ahiai, ahihlouhleh bang tobang hunin ahiai a heetsah chih hawldoh tum in.

Vaan akipana Hagau Siangthou hung kisawlkhia panpiha na kawmva tanchinpha soitute’n amahuh diing chauh hilou in, eiu diingin tua na kawmva thu kisoisawnte nna a tong uh chih a kawmvah suhlat in a um hi; hu silte chu angelte’n zong etvel a ut uhi.
Huchihjiahin na lungsim kawng uh gaah unla, pilvaang un; huleh Jesu Khrist hung kilaah chianga nanguh hung kipuaahsah diing hehpihna chu a tawpdongin lamen un;
Ta thumangtahte bangin, na heet louh lai va na nidanglai utnate uh bang a um louin;
Hizongleh nanguh hung koupa a sianthou bangin nanguh zong na gamtatdan zousiah vah siangthou un:
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh, Nanguh siangthou un; ajiahchu kei ka siangthou hi, chih gelh ahi.
Huleh deihsahtuam nei lou a mi chin a natoh dungjui a vaihawmsahtu chu Pa chia kouna hih uleh, hitaha na vaithaam lai hun uh laudan siam in zang un:
Na pulepate vapat tawndan a na muh uh na umdan uh bangmah hilou apat silsethei, dangka leh sana a tat na hi sih va.
Hizongleh belaamnou demna bei leh niin baang lou sisan banga Khrist sisan luul a tat na hi zaw uhi.
Amah chu khovel kisiam ma pehin guatlawh in a um ngei a, hizongleh hi hun nunungte ah nanguh diingin suhlat in a umta hi.
Amah jiahin misi laha kipana amah kaithoupa leh loupina pepa Pathian na gingta uhi; na ginna uleh na kinepna uh Pathian a ahih theihna diingin.
Unaute tunga lungsiatna daai lou nei diing khopa Hagau jala thutah jui a na hagau uh na suhsiangthou taah jiahun, phatuamngaitahin khat leh khat lungtang siangthou in kilungsiattuah un.
Chi sethei laha hilou in, chi sethei lou, Pathian thu kumtuang a hing zing leh um zing laha piangthah na hi zaw uhi.
Ajiahchu mihing zousiah hi hampa bang ahi a, huleh mihing loupina zong hampa paah bang ahi. Hampa chu a vul a, a paah zong a pulh hi.
Hizongleh Lalpa thu chu kumtuang in a um zing hi. Huleh hi chu na kawmva tanchinpha mang a thu kisoi chu ahi.
Huchihjiahin giitlouhna zousiahte, heembawlna zousiahte, lepchiahnate, kithangsiatnate, huleh kisoisiatna zousiahte tawpsan unla.
Naungeeh suahthahte bangin na khantouh theihna diingun Pathian thu nawitui bangmah toh hal louh lunggulh un;
Lalpa chu mi hehpihsiam ahi chih na heetkhaah taah va ahihleh.
Amah, mite deih louh, hizongleh Pathian teel leh luul suangpi hing kawm a banga hung in,
Nanguh zong suang hingte bangin, Jesu Khrist jiaha Pathian deihzawng hagaulam kithoihna laan diing a siampu siangthou leh hagaulam inn a lamtouhna hi uhi.
Huchihjiahin Pathian lehkhathu ah zong, Ngai un, Zion ah a ning a suang poimohpen, teel, huleh luultah ka lem hi; amah gingta phot chu a mualphou sih diing hi, chih gelh ahi.
Hujiahin nanguh a gingtate diingin amah chu a luul ahi; a gingta loute diingin chu, inn lamtute suang deih louh, hu ngei chu a ning a suang poimohpen ahung hita hi,
Kipalna suang leh kipuuhna suangpi toh; ajiahchu a thuman louh jiahun thu ah a kipal uh; huchibang diinga guat him zong ahi uhi.
Hizongleh a vaahna limdangtah a luut diing a mial a kipana nanguh hung koudohpa paahtawina na suhlat theihna diingun nanguh chu chi teel, lal siampu, nam siangthou, Pathian mituamte na hi uhi;
Nidang laiin mi mawngmawng na hi sih va, hizongleh tuin chu Pathian mite na hita uh; khotuahna tangloute na hi va, hizongleh tuin chu khotuahna na muta uhi.
Deih mahmahte, mikhual leh khualzin bang na hih jiahun hagau doudaal zing tahsa utnate tawpsan diingin ka hung ngen hi;
Sil gilou bawlte bang a ahung soisiat chiang va, na natoh hoih uh a muhte uh jiaha veha a um ni chiang va Pathian a paahtawi theihna diingun, Jentelte lahah na gamtatdan uh kilawmtahin um un.
Lalpa jiahin mihing daan siam photmah nuaiah kituluut un; lalpen ahihjiahin kumpipa kawmah aha,
Ahihlouhleh silgilou bawlte gawt diing leh, silhoih bawlte phat diing a Amah hung sawl ahihjiahin gamoptute kawmah zong.
Ajiahchu na silhoih bawl va mingolte ngolna na suhdaih uh Pathian deihzawng tah ahi.
Mi zalente bangin, huleh na zalenna u’chu giitlouhna khuhkhumna diing a zang louin, hizongleh Pathian suaahte bangin um un.
Mi zousiah zahbawl un. Unaupihte lungsiat un. Pathian lau un. Kumpipa zahbawl un.
Suaahte, laudan siamin na pute uh kawmah kituluut un; a hoihte leh a jainemte kawm chauh ah hilou in, lungtang khauhte kawmah zong.
Ajiahchu Pathian lama sialepha heetna jiaha mi’n gimna leh dihloutaha bawlna a thuaah leh hichu paahtaat taah ahi.

Bang jiahin ahiai i chileh na dihlouhna jiah va khuttum a suh na tuaah un kuhkaltahin thuaah mah leh u’chin paahtaat bang ahiai na loh uh? hizongleh silhoih na bawl un, hukhu jiahin thuaahloh unla, kuhkaltahin thuaah leh u’chin, hichu Pathian kipaahpih zawng ahi.
Huchibang hih diing a kouhna hi ngal va; ajiahchu Khrist in zong a khaap a na juih diing uh, etton diing hung nuutsiat in eiuh luang in ana thuaahta hi.
Ama’n chu sual mawngmawng a bawl sih a, huleh a kam ah zong heemthu a kimu sih hi.
Vau a, a um laiin a vauthuh sih a; a thuaah laiin zong a tai sih; hizongleh dihtattaha ngaihtuahpa kawmah a kikemsah zaw hi;
Eiuh sual lama si a, hizongleh dihtatna lama i hin theihna diingin ama’n amah sapum ah i sualnate sing dawnah a pua a; amah kivuah hualte ah suhdam in na umta uhi.
Ajiahchu belaam bangin nana lammangta uh a; hizongleh tuin chu Belaampu leh na hagau uh veengtu kawmah na hung kih kiitta uhi.
Huchimahbangin, nanguh jite, na pasalte uh kawm chiatah kituluut un, huchi'n koiaha in thu gingta sih mahleh, thu lou a, jite gamtatdan a zohin a um thei diing hi;
Laudan siam kawm a na gamtatdan siangthou uh a et chiangun.
Na kicheina u’chu polam kicheina sampheehte leh sana khi ohte, ahihlouhleh puansilh a kicheite hilou in;
Lungtang a mihing thuguuh, lungsim thunuaigolh leh nunnem puansilh sethei lou hi heh, huchu Pathian mitmuh in a manpha mahmah hi.
Ajiahchu hutobangmah in malai a numei siangthou, Pathian gingtate zong, amahuh pasalte thuthu a um in ana kichei uhi;
Sara ngei in Abraham chu lalpa chia kou a a thu a man bangin: silhoih bawl a, heemlauna mawngmawng lau lou a na um laisiah uh Sara tate na hi uhi.

Huchimahbangin, nanguh pasalte, na haamteina uh daal a, a umlouhna diingin, hinna hehpihna tangkhawm diing na hih jiahun, numei chu beel keehbaih zaw bang a ngai in, na jite u’chu paahtawi kawmin, heetna dungjuiin amahuh toh umkhawm un.
A tawppen in, khat leh khat kilainattuah in, lungsim mun khat pua unla, hehpih siam unla, lungnem un;
Giitlouhna giitlouhna a thuh louin, taina zong taina a thuh lou in, hizongleh vangpiahna tang diing a kouh na hi uh chih he in vangpiah zaw un.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh, hinna deih leh, ni hoihte muh ut in gilou apat a lei veeng henla, a muuh zong heemthu soilou diingin veeng hen.
Gilou tawpsan henla, silhoih bawl hen; kilemna hawl henla, delh jel hen.
Ajiahchu Lalpa mit chu midihtatte tungah a tu a, huleh a bil zong a haamteina lam vah a kidoh hi; hizongleh Lalpa meel chu silgilou bawlte tungah a um veu hi.
Huleh silhoih bawltute na hih uleh koi ahiai nanguh poi hung khoih diing?
Hizongleh dihtatna jiaha na thuaah uleh na hampha uhi; ahung vauna uh lau sih unla, lung zong lungkham sih un.
Hizongleh na lungtang vah Lalpa Pathian chu hihsiangthou unla; huleh nanguha um kinepna jiah hung dong photmahte thunuaigolh tah leh laudansiam a dawng diingin bangchih laipouhin kipeih zing un.
Khrist a na gamtatdan hoih uh dihloutah a hung demte, silgilou bawl banga ahung soisiatna va a zum theihna diingun sialepha heetna hoihtah nei un.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Pathian lemsah ahih inchu, silgilou bawl jiaha thuaah sangin silhoih bawl jiaha thuaah a hoihzaw hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian kawma ahung pui theihna diingin Khrist in zong sualnate jiahin khatvei a thuaahta a, midih in midihlou luang in, tahsa in suhlup in a um a, hizongleh Hagau a suhhing in a um hi.
Hu Hagau in a va chiah a, suangkul a um hagaute kawmah thu a va soi hi;
Hute’n nidanglai a Noah damlai a kuang bawl sung teng Pathian thuaahzohna in a ngaah laiin a thumang sih va, hu kuang ah mi tawmtakhat, huchu, mi giat tuia hutdam in a um uhi.
Hu lim etsahna in baptisma in zong tuin (tahsa nitna koihmang hilou in, Pathian lama sialepha heetna hoih suhlungkimna hizaw in) Jesu Khrist thohkiitna in ahung hundam hi.
Amah chu vaan ah a chiahta a, angelte leh thuneihnate leh silbawltheihnate a thunuai a koih in Pathian jiatlamah a umta hi.
Huchi'n eiuh diinga Khrist in tahsa a hung thuaahsahta ahihjiahin nanguh zong huchibang lungsim in kithuam un; ajiahchu koipouh tahsa a thuaahsa in chu sual a tawpsanta hi;
Ahun umna laiteng tahsa a mihing utna lam banga hingta lou a, Pathian deihzawng a a hinzawh na diingin.
Ajiahchu huuhnate, utnate, uain hainate zumun nopnate, ankuang luinate, huleh milem biahna kihdahhuaite a i umlai a, Jentelte deihzawng bawlna i tumalai hinkhuate uh a hunta hi;
Hu ah chu amahuh nopbawl luatna banga na bawlve louh uh thumah a sa va, nanguh ahung soise veu uhi.
Hute’n mihing leh misite vaihawm diing a kipeihsapa kawmah a tanchin uh a soi diing uhi:
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh, tahsa a um mihingte banga vaihawmsaha a um va, hagau a Pathian banga a hin theihna diingun hikhu jiahin a kawmvah tanchinpha soi in a um ahi.
Hizongleh sil zousiah tawpna diing chu a naita hi; hujiahin lungsim dihtah pua unla, haamtei kawmin pilvaang un.
Huleh sil bangkim tungah phatuamngaitahin kilungsiattuah chiat un; ajiahchu kilungsiatna in sualna tampi a khuhkhum hi.
Phunchiah louin khat leh khat kizintuntuah un.
Mi chinin silpiah na muh bang jelun Pathian hehpihna chi tuamtuam kemtu hoihtahte bangin, hutein na kitohsahtuah chiat un.

Mi koipouh in thu a soi leh Pathian kam a thupawt bangin soi heh; mi koipouh in thu na a toh leh Pathian in haatna a piah bang jelin tong heh, Jesu Khrist jala Pathian chu sil bangkima paahtawia a um theihna diingin, Amah kawmah kumtuang kumtuang in paahtawina leh lalna umta hen. Amen.
Deihtahte, nanguh ze-et diinga na tungva ze-etna hung tung chu sil limdang bang aha hung tung bangin ngaihtuah sih un;
Hizongleh Khrist thuaahnate kikoppih na hih jiahun kipaah un; huchi'n a loupina ahung kilat chiangin nanguh zong naahpitaha nuamin na kipaah thei diing uh.

Khrist min jiah a tai na hih uleh na hampha uhi; ajiahchu loupina Hagau leh, Pathian Hagau na tungvah a um hi; amahuh lam thu ah amah chu soisiat ahi a, hizongleh nanguh lam thu ah chu paahtawi in a um ahi.
Hizongleh na lahvah koimah in tualthat bangin aha, guta bangin aha, silgilou bawl bangin aha, ahihlouhleh midangte silbawl soisahmi ahihjiah bangin aha thuaah sih heh.
Ahihvangin koipouh in Khristian ahihjiaha a thuaah leh zum sih heh; hizongleh hi tungtaang jiahin Pathian paahtawi zaw heh.
Ajiahchu Pathian innkuante lahah vaihawmna apat hun ahung tungta hi; huleh eiuh apat ahih inchu Pathian tanchinpha gingta loute tawpna chu bang ahita diai?
Huleh midihtat bawn hutdam ahih haamhaam inchu Pathian ngaihsahloute leh mi sualte khoiah a kilangta diai?
Huchihjiahin koipouh Pathian lemsah dungjui a thuaahte’n silhoih bawl in a hagau uh Siamtu ginumtah kawma bangin a kawmah kolsah u’hen.
Na lahva upa umte chu, kei na upa hihpih uleh, Khrist thuaahna heetpihtu leh, loupina hung kilang diing zong tanpihtu in ka hung hasot hi;
Na lahva Pathian belaam pawl umte vaah un, hih louh theih louh ahihjiah hilou in, ut thu hizaw in, punna niin deih jiah hilou in, lungsim kipeihsa kawm hizaw in;
Pathian goutante tunga kisulal lou a, hizongleh pawlte etton diing a um zaw in.
Huchi'n Belaampu lianpen ahung kilat chiangin loupina lallukhuh mualtheilou na mu diing uhi.

Huchimahbangin nanguh khanglaite, upate nuaiah kituluut un. Ahi, na bawnun khat leh khat kithumangtuah chiat unla, kingaihngiamna in kithuam un; ajiahchu Pathian in mi kiliansahte a doudaal a, mi kingaingiamte chu hehpihna a pia hi.
Hujiahin a huntaha nanguh ahung paahtawi theihna diingin Pathian khut haattah nuaiah kingaingiam un.
Ama’n ahung ngaihsah zing jiahin na lungkhamna zousiah uh a tungah nga un.
Pilvaang unla, kiveeng zingin um un; ajiahchu na khingpa uh diabol chu huumpibahnei hawh bangin a neeh theih diing hawl in a vaah lehleh hi;
Na unaute uh khovela umte tungah huchibang thuaahnatnate a tungve chih he in, amah chu ginna a kiptah a um in dou un.

Hizongleh Khrist Jesu mang a kumtuang loupina tang diing a eiuh hung koupa, hehpihna Pathian in, tomkhat sung na thuaah nungun nanguh ahung hoihbukimsah in, ahung sukip in, ahung suhaat in, ahung umdetsah diing hi.
Amah kawmah kumtuang kumtuang in paahtawina leh lalna umta hen. Amen.
Unaupa ginumtah a ka heet Silvana khut in nanguh hasotna leh, hichu Pathian hehpihna i dinna uh ahi chih hesah kawmin na kawmvah tomtakhat in ka hung gial ahi.
Nanguh toh teel khawm Babylon a um kouhtuamte’n chibai ahung buuh uhi; huchimahbangin ka ta Mark in zong ahung buuh hi.
Lungsiatna kitawp in khat leh khat chibai kibuuh un. Khrist Jesu a um nanguh zousiah kawmah hamuanna um hen. Amen.
Simon Peter, Jesu Khrist suaah leh sawlleh in, Pathian leh i Hundampa Jesu Khrist dihtatna jala ginna manpha i tan bang tangte kawmah:
Pathian leh i Lalpa Jesu heetna jiahin, na tungvah hehpihna leh hamuanna suhpung in um hen;
Amah loupina leh hoihna a ei hung koupa heetna jiahin a Pathian silbawltheihna bangin hinna leh Pathian ngaihsahna lam thu ah sil zousiah ahung pia hi.
Hujiahin thuchiam manpha leh loupi mahmah chu ahung pia hi: huchi'n utna jiaha khovela siatna um chu taikhiahsan in Pathian hinna kikoppihte na hung hi thei diing uhi.
Hujiahmahin, thanop suah himhim in, na ginna vah hoihna hal unla; na hoihna vah heetna hal unla;
Na heetna vah kideehtheihna hal unla; na kideehtheihna vah kuhkalna hal unla; huleh na kukalna vah Pathian ngaihsahna hal unla;
Na Pathian ngaihsahna vah unaute kideihsahna hal unla; huleh na unaute kideihsahna vah lungsiatna hal un.
Ajiahchu hite nanguh a, a um a, a khan jel leh, i Lalpa Jesu Khrist heetna lamah chiing leh gahlou a um louin ahung bawl diing uhi.
Hizongleh hi silte nei lou chu mittaw ahi a, gamlapi a mu thei sih a, huleh a nidanglai sualte apata silsiang a a umna zong a mangngilhta hi.
Hujiahin unaute, nanguh hung kikouhna leh teelna suchian diingin thanop hung suah un: ajiahchu hite na bawl uleh chu na puuh ngei himhim sih diing uhi:
Ajiahchu, huchi'n Jesu Khrist i Lalpa uleh Hundampa kumtuang gam a luutna nanguh kawmah ahung musah na sa mahmah diing hi.
Hujiahin hi silte he in, thutah na kawmva um a na kipna vah hu silte chu hung heetpih gige diingin, ngaihsah louin ka um himhim sih diing hi.
Ahi, hi bawhinn a ka um sung teng nanguh hung heetpih in hung tohhalh zing hoih ka sa hi;
I Lalpa Jesu Khrist hung heetsah mahbangin, hi ka bawhinn koihmangna ahung tungpah diing chih ka he ngal a.
Ahi, ka paikhiah nung chiang a hi silte na heetzingna diingun ka hahkat diing hi.
Ajiahchu i Lalpa Jesu Khrist silbawltheihna leh ahung paikiitna thu ka hung heetsah laiun, taangthu piltaha ngaihtuah khiah juite ka hi sih va, a loupina mute ka hi zaw uhi.

Ajiahchu ama’n chu Pa, Pathian kawma kipatin paahtawina leh loupina a mu a, huchihlaiin loupina nasatah apatin hichibang aw a kawmah ahung tung a, Hichu ka Tapa deihtah, ka kipaahna mahmah ahi, chi'n.
Huleh taang siangthou a, a kawma ka um laiun, hi aw chu vaan akipata hung pawt keiuh ngei in ka ja uhi.
Soilawhna thu kip zaw sem zong i nei uhi: khua ahung vaah a, na lungtang va jingsol aahsi ahung suaah masiah mun mial a vaah um a ngaihsah bang va na hih uleh na bawl hoih uh ahi diing hi.
Pathian lehkhathu a thusoilawh himhim koima’n a tum a a letdoh diing ahi sih chih he masa un.
Ajiahchu thusoilawh himhim nidanglaiin mihing deihdan a pawt ahi sih a, Pathian misiangthoute’n Hagau Siangthou phuut ahih bang jelun ana soi uh ahi zaw hi.

Hizongleh mite laha zawlnei tahloute zong ana um veu mah bangin, na lahva zong houtu tahloute ahung um diing uh a, amahun chu, amahuh leipa Lalpa hilhial kiheetmohbawl in, siamlouh tangsah thei gintuamnate a guuh in ahung luutpih diing va, amahuh tungah thakhat a siatna a tungsah diing uhi.
Huchi'n mi tampiin a huuhna lam sil uh ahung chiing diing va; amahuh jiahin lam dih chu soisiat ahi diing hi.
Huleh huaihamna jiahin zuauthu in sumkolveina diingin nanguh ahung nei diing uh: nidanglai a, a tungva vaihawmna chu a khawl sih a, a siamlouhtanna uh zong a ihmu sih hi.
Ajiahchu, angelte’n sil a suhsual laiun Pathian in a hawi sih a, gawtmun ah a pai a, vaihawmsaha um diingin kokhuuh mial ah a khum zaw hi;
Huchi'n amah ngaihsahlou khovel ah tuijiin tungsah in, nidanglai khovel chu a hawi sih a; hizongleh dihtatna thusoipa Noah midang sagih toh a hundamta hi;
Sodom leh Gommorrah khopite chu vut suaahsah a mohtangsah in a paaikhia a, Pathian ngaihsahlou hung um diingte etsahna diingin a bawlta hi.
Huleh migiloute umdan thanghuaitah jiah a lungsim na mahmah Lot midih chu a hunkheta hi.
(Ajiahchu hu midihpa chu a kawmva a um laiin, a mit in a mu a, a bil in a ja a, daan lou banga a silbawlte un a lungsim dihtat chu a suna mahmah hi).
Lalpa’n amah ngaihsah mite chu heemna apat hutkhiahdan leh midihtatloute chu vaihawm ni a diing a gawt di’a siitdan a he hi.
Utna thanghuai lam a sadan banga um leh, vaihawmna simmoh mite ngeel houh vaihawm ni a diinga gawt di'a siitdan a he hi; ngolhaan leh chihhah ahi va, thupina a soisiat un zong a lau sih uhi.
Angel haat leh silbawltheite’n bawn, Lalpa ma ah a tungthu uh soisah in a soise ngam sih uhi.
Hizongleh hi ganhing ngaihtuahna nei lou mat a hihmang diingte bangin a heetsiam louh uh silte a soisia va; huchi'n amahuh siatna ah a beimang veh diing uhi;
Huleh suun lai a ankuang lui buai nuamsa mi ahih jiahun dihtatlouhna man a mu diing uhi. Na kawmva ankuang a lui un, amahuh kihema ankuang lui ahih jiahun, thanghuaina soisiatna ahi uhi.
Aangkawmna mit a dim, sual tawpsan thei loute a nei uh a; mi kiploute a heempuuh va; eenhaat lungsim a pua va; haamse thuaah tate ahi uhi:
Lampi dih a taisan va, a vaahmang va, dihtatlouhna loh ngainapa Bosor tapa Balaam lampi a juita uhi;
Hizongleh amah chu a giitlouhna jiahin taihilh in a um a: sabiltung haamthei lou mihing haam a hung haam in, zawlnei ngolna chu a khapta hi.
Hute chu tuitohdoh tui um lou, huih muut leeng lehleh meilum ahi uh; amahuh diingin chu mial huaisetah kumtuang a diing siit ahi.
Ajiahchu thuloi lou chiaahjen a soi in, gilou a umte apat a suaahta zoute chu tahsa utna ah huuhna in a heempuuh veu uhi.
Amahuh chu siatna suaah hipum in mite suaahtaatna thu a chiam veu uhi: mi zoh a a umna humah in amah chu suaah in a siam veu hi.
Ajiahchu Lalpa leh Hundampa Jesu Khrist heetna jiah a, khovel thanghuainate a nuutsiatsan nung va, humaha a taan kiit va, zoh a a um uleh, a umdan nunung u’chu a chiil a sangin a sezaw hi.
Ajiahchu dihtatna lampi heet nunga, thupiah siangthou a kawmva kepsaha um chu nungngatsan sangin dihtatna lampi he lou ana hileh uh amahuh diingin a hoihzaw diing hi.
Ui amah luaah maha kiihkiit a, vohpi kisilsiangsa buannawi a kisil diinga kiih, chih thupil dihtah bangmahin amahuh tungah ahung um zawta hi.
Deihtahte, tu a na kawmva ka gelh, hi lehkhathot a nihna ahi: hute geel ah heetzingna thu daanin na lungsim chiimtahte uh ka tohthou ahi:
Zawlnei siangthoute’n ana soi masat uh thute, huleh keiuh Lalpa leh Hundampa sawllehte thupiah na heetzingna diingun:
Hikhu he masa un, ni nununglam ah, simmoh haatte, amahuh utna ngei banga gamta ahung um diing va,
Ahung kiitna thuchiam khoiah ahiai? silsiam chiil akipat sil bangkim pilepute ihmut ni a kipanin a um ngeingei bangin a um jel, a chi diing uhi.
Ajiahchu hite haw a kiheetmohbawl jel uh, Pathian thuin nidanglaiin vaante ahung um a, lei zong tui apat leh tui lahah ana um hi.
Huah chu hu lai a khovel um chu tui in a tuum a, a beimangta hi.
Hizongleh tua um vaante leh lei chu hu thu jiah mahin Pathian ngaihsah lou mite vaihawmna leh manthatna ni a diinga siitin, mei a gawt diing a kholkhawm ahita hi.
Hizongleh, deihtahte, hi sil khat he lou in um sih un, Lalpa ngaih in ni khat chu kum saangkhat bang ahi a, huleh kum saangkhat zong ni khat bang ahi.
Mi khenkhat in zekai a sah bangun, Lalpa chu a thuchiam lamah a zekai sih hi: hizongleh koimah beimang deih louin, mi zousiah kisiih diing deih in eimah lamah a thuaahzou ahi zaw hi.

Hizongleh Lalpa ni chu jan a guta bangmahin ahung tung diing hi; hu ni chiangin, vaante chu nasataha ging in a mang diing a, huleh silbulte chu mei a haaitui ahi diing, lei zong a sunga natoh umte toh haalmang in a um diing hi.
Hu silte zousiah chu huchia beimang diing ahi chih he in, umdan siangthou leh Pathian ngaihsahna lam photah mi bangchi hi diing na hi viai mah?
Pathian ni hung tung diing kinem leh kilawp in; hu niin vaante chu hung kaang in a mang diing a, huleh silbulte zong mei a haaitui in a umta diing hi.
Hizongleh a thuchiam dungjuiin a sunga dihtatna umna, vaan thah leh lei thah i kineppih ahi.
Hujiahin deihtahte, hu silte kineppih na hi uh chih he in, niin baang lou leh dembei a, hamuangtah a ana um a muh na hih heetna diingun thanop suahun.
Huleh i Lalpa thuaahzohna chu hutdamna in sim un; i unaupa deihtah Paul in a kawma piah pilna dungjui a na kawmva a gelh bangin;

A lehkhathot zousiah ah hi silte tungtaang a soi phial hi; huah chu thu heetsiam hahsate a um a, hute chu mipillou leh mikiploute’n Pathian lehkhathu dang a ngaihkawi bang va ngaikawi in amahuh siatna diingin a zang veu uhi.
Huchi'n deihtahte, nangun hu thute na heetlawh jiahun pilvaang un, huchilouin zaw migiloute khelhna a puimang a um in na kipna vapatin na puuhkha diing uhi.
Hizongleh i Lalpa leh Hundampa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna leh heetna ah hung khang lian un. Amah kawmah tu leh kumtuang in loupina um hen. Amen.
A chiil apat a um, ka jahsa uh, ka mit va ka muhsa uh, ka etsa uh, huleh ka khutun zong a thamsa, hu hinna Thu chu;
(Hu hinna chu a kilangta a, huchu ka muta va, ka heetpih uh, huleh hu kumtuang hinna Pa kawma um, ka kawmva suhlata um chu na kawmvah ka hung hilh uhi).
Hu ka muhsa uleh ka jahsa u’chu na kawmvah ka hung hilh uhi, nangun zong na hung kipawlkhawmpih theihna diingun; huleh tahzetin eiuh kipawlkhawmna chu Pa toh, a Tapa Jesu Khrist toh ahi.
Huleh na kipaah uh a kimtheihna diingin hi thute na kawmvah ka hung gial uh ahi.
Huchi'n hichu a kawm apat a ka jah uh, huleh na kawmva ka hung hilhsawn uh thuhaah chu ahi, Pathian chu vaah ahi a, amah ah mial mawngmawng a um sih hi.
Amah toh ka kipawlkhawm chi ngal a, mial a i um inchu zuau i soi a, huleh thutah zong i jui sih hi.
Hizongleh amah vaah a a um banga ei zong vaah a i um leh khat leh khat kipawlkhawmna i nei a, huleh a Tapa Jesu Khrist sisanin sualna zousiah apat ahung silsiang hi.
Sualna ka nei sih i chih inchu eimahle eimah kihem i hi a, huleh thutah eimah ah a um sih hi.
I sualnate i phuan inchu, i sualnate ngaidam diing leh, dihtat louhna zousiah apat hung silsiang diingin amah chu a muanhuai in a dihtat ahi.
Sualna ka nei sih i chih inchu, amah mizuau i hisah a, huleh a thu zong eimah ah a um sih hi.
Ka tate haw, na sual louhna diingun hi thute na kawmvah ka gial ahi. Huleh mi koi aha a sual taah leh, Pa kawma hung soipihtu, Jesu Khrist midihtat i nei uhi.
Amah chu i sualnate diing a thuphatawina ahi; eiuh sualna chauh hilou in, khovel pumpi sual thuphatawina zong ahi.
Huleh a thupiahte i juih a ahihleh, hikhu in amah i he chih i he uhi.
Amah ka he chi ngal a, a thupiahte jui lou chu mizuau ahi, huleh thutah amah ah a um sih hi.
Hizongleh a thu jui photmah chu, amah ah Pathian lungsiatna a bukim tahzet ahi; hikhuin amah ah i um chih i he hi.
Amah ah ka um zing chitu chu amah um bangin a umve diing ahi.
Unaute, thupiah thah na kawmvah ka hung gial ahi sih a, thupiah lui, a chiil apat a na neih uh ka hung gial zaw ahi, Thupiah lui chu a chiil apat a na jah uh thu chu ahi.
Huchiangleh thupiah thah na kawmvah ka hung gial ahi, huchu amah leh nanguh ah dihtahin a um hi; ajiahchu mial a beita a, tuin vaah dihtah ahung vaahta hi,
Mi, vaah ah ka um chi a a unau mudah chu tutanin mial ah a um nalai ahi.
A unau lungsiattu chu vaah ah a um zing a, amah ah kipalpuuh theihna mawngmawng a um sih hi.
Hizongleh a unau mudah chu mialah a um a, huleh mialah a leeng ahi; mialin a mit a suhtawt jiahin a chiahna lam zong a he sih hi.
Tate haw, a min jiaha na sualnate uh ngaihdam ahih taah jiahin na kawmvah ka gial ahi.

Pate haw, a chiil apat a um, amah na heet jiahun na kawmvah ka gial ahi. Tangvalte haw, giloupa chu na zoh taah jiahun na kawmvah ka gial ahi. Tate haw, Pa chu na heet taah jiahun na kawmvah ka gial ahi.
Pate haw, a chiil apat a um, amah na heet taah jiahun na kawmvah ka gial ahi. Tangvalte haw, na haat va, Pathian thu nanguh a a um zing a, huleh giloupa chu na zoh taah jiahun na kawmvah ka gial ahi.
Khovel lungsiat sih unla, khovel a sil umte zong lungsiat sih un. Mi koipouh in khovel a lungsiat inchu Pa lungsiatna amah ah a um sih hi.
Ajiahchu khovel a sil um zousiah, tahsa utnate, mit utnate, huleh damsung kisahtheihnate chu Pathian a kipan ahi sih a, khovel a kipan ahi zaw hi.
Khovel chu a utna toh a bei zing ahi; hizongleh Pathian deihzawng bawl mi chu kumtuang in a um zing hi.
Tate haw, hun nunung ahita hi; Khrist doudaalpa ahung diing chih na jah bangun, tuin zong Khrist doudaal tampi a umta hi; hikhu jiahin hun nunung ahita chih i he hi.

Amahuh chu i lah vapat a pawtdoh va, hizongleh ei u’laha mi ahi sih uhi; ajiahchu ei u’lah a mi na hitaleh uh i kawmva um zing diing hi va; hizongleh a bawnun ei u’lah a mi ahi sih uh chih kilatna diingin a pawtdoh uh ahi.
Hizongleh nangun chu Mi Siangthoupa apat thaunuh na tang va, sil zousiah na he uhi.
Thutah na heet louh jiahun na kawmvah ka gial ahi sih a, na heet jiah uleh thutah a zuau mawngmawng a pawt louh jiahin ka gial ahi zaw hi.
Jesu chu Khrist ahi chih awilou loungal koi ahiai mizuau? Pa leh Tapa awilou mi chu Khrist doudaal ahi.
Mi koipouh Tapa awilou inchu Pa a nei sih a; hizongleh Tapa pom photmah inchu Pa zong a nei hi.
Hujiahin a chiil apat a na jah u’chu nanguh ah umsah zing un. Hu a chiil apat a na jah uh nanguh a a um zing inchu, nanguh zong Tapa ah leh Pa ah na um zing diing uhi.
Huleh hikhu ahi silchiam ama’n piah diing a ahung chiam chu, kumtuang hinna ngei.
Nanguh hung puimang tumte tung thu a hite ka hung gelh ahi.

Hizongleh amah apat a thaunuhna na tan uh nanguh ah a um zing a, koimah hung hilh na kiphamoh sih uhi; hizongleh hu thaunuhna mahin sil zousiah nanguh ahung hilh bangin, thutah ahi a, zuau ahi sih a, huin nanguh ahung hilh bang ngei in, amah ah na um diing uhi.
Huchi'n tate haw, amah ah um zing un; amah hung kilat chiang a kimuanna i neih theihna diing leh, ahung chiang a a ma a i zum louhna diingun.
Amah chu midihtat ahi chih na heet uleh, michin dihtatna bawl photmah chu amaha piang ahi chih na he uhi.
Ngai un, bangchilawma lungsiatna Pa in eiuh hung pia a ta’imah, Pathian tate chih a i um jiang uh! hujiahin khovel in ahung he lou uh ahi, amah a heet louh jiahun.

Deihtahte, tuin Pathian tate i hi a, huleh bangtobangin ahiai i um diing chihchu a kilang nai tadih sih hi; hizongleh amah ahung kilat chiangin amah bangin i um diing uh chihchu i he uhi; amah chu a um bangbang a mu diing i hih jiahin.
Huleh michin amah a hi kinepna nei photmah chu amah a sianthou bangin a kisusiangthou veu hi.
Mi koipouh sual bawl in daan zong a botsia hi; ajiahchu sual chu daan bohsiatna ahi.
Huleh amah chu i sualnate uh lamang diing a hung kilang ahi chih na he uhi; amah ah chu sual himhim a um sih hi.
Mi koipouh amah a um zing in chu sual a bawl ngei sih; koipouh sual bawl in amah a mu sih a, he zong a he sih hi.
Tate haw, kuamah heem in um sih un; dihtatna bawltu chu midihtat ahi, amah a dihtat bangmah in.
Sual bawl mi chu diabol a kuan ahi, ajiahchu diabol in a chiil apatin sual a bawl zing hi. Ajiahchu Pathian Tapa hung kilatnasan chu diabol silbawlte suse diingin ahi.
Mi koipouh Pathian a piangin sual a bawl ngei sih; ajiahchu a chi amahah a um hi; huleh Pathian a piang ahihjiahin sual a bawl thei sih hi.
Hikhu ah Pathian tate leh diabol tate a kihethei hi; mi koipouh dihtatna bawl lou chu Pathian a kuan ahi sih hi, huleh a unau lungsiat lou zong Pathian a kuan ahi sih hi.
Ajiahchu, a chiil apat a thuhaah na jah u’chu hikhu ahi, khat leh khat i kilungsiat diing uh ahi, chih.
Giloupa a kuan, a unaupa that, Kaina banga umlou in bang jiahin ahiai a thah mai? Amah silbawlte a hoih louh a, a unaupa a dihtat jiahin ahi.
Ka unaute, khovel in nanguh ahung muhdah leh limdang sa sih un.
Unaute i lungsiat jiahin sihna apat hinna ah i luutta hi chi'n i he uhi. Mi koipouh a unau lungsiat lou chu sihna ah a um zing ahi.
Hizongleh ke'n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, Koipouh numei enlahtah a en in a lungsimah amahnu toh a aangkawm zouta ahi.
Hikhu ah Pathian lungsiatna i hethei uhi, ama’n eiuh diinga a hinna a piahkhiah jiahin; huleh eiun zong unaute diinga i hinna i piah ve diing uh ahi.
Hizongleh mi koipouh in khovel sil hau henla, a unau tasam in mu in, amah chu lainat het sih leh, bangchi'n Pathian lungsiatna amah ah a um diai?
Ka tate haw, thu chauh in i lungsiat sih diing a, kam chauh in zong i lungsiat sih diing uh; hizongleh silbawl leh thutah in hizaw hen.
Hikhu ah thutah a kuan i hi uh chih i he a, huleh amah ma ah i lungtang uh i muangsah thei diing uhi.
Ajiahchu i lungtang un siamlouh ahung tansah leh, Pathian chu i lungtang sangin a loupizaw a, sil zousiah a he hi.
Deihtahte, i lungtang in siamlouh ahung tansah louh leh Pathian lamah i haang ahi.
Huleh a thupiahte i juih a, a mitmuh a sil kipaahhuaite i bawl jiahin i nget photmah amah apat i mu hi.
Huleh a thupiah chu hikhu ahi. Eihaw’n a Tapa Jesu Khrist min i gintaat a, huleh thu ahung piah banga khat leh khat i kilungsiat diing uh ahi, chih.
Huleh mi koipouh a thupiah jui chu Amah ah a um a, Amah zong amah ah a um hi. Huleh hikhu ah amah chu eiuh ah a um zing chih i he uh, Hagau ahung piah ah.
Deihtahte, hagau taphot gingta sih unla, hagaute chu Pathian a kuan ahihleh hih louh chian zaw un; ajiahchu zawlnei tahlou tampi khovel ah a pawtdohta hi.
Hikhuah Pathian Hagau na he diing uh: Jesu Khrist tahsa in ahung piang chih gum hagau photmah chu Pathian a kuan ahi.
Huleh Jesu Khrist tahsa in ahung piang chih gum lou hagau photmah chu Pathian a kuan ahi sih; hichu Khrist doudaalpa hagau hung diing ahi chih na jah uh chu ahi; tuin zong khovel aha um zouta hi.
Tate haw, nang u’chu Pathian a kuan na hi va, hute na zouta uhi; ajiahchu amah nanguh a um chu, khovel a umpa sangin a lianzaw hi.
Amah u’chu khovel a kuan ahi va, hujiahin khovel sil thute a soi uhi, huleh khovel in a thu uh a ngaikhe veu uhi.
Ei u’chu Pathian a kuan i hi a, Pathian he photin i thu a ngaikhe veu hi; Pathian a kuan hilouin i thu a ngaikhe sih hi. Hikhu ah hagau dih leh dihlou i he uhi.
Deihtahte, khat leh khat i kilungsiat diing uhi; ajiahchu lungsiatna Pathian a kuan ahi; huleh mi chin lungsiat siam photmah chu Pathian a piang ahi a, Pathian a he hi.
Lungsiatna nei lou mi’n Pathian a he sih; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh Pathian chu lungsiatna ahi.
Hikhu ah Pathian in eiuh ahung lungsiatna a kilangta, amah jala i hin theihna diing a Pathian in a Tapa neihsun khovel a ahung sawl jiahin.
Hi-ah lungsiatna a um, eiun Pathian i lungsiat chih ahi sih a, ama’n eiuh ahung lungsiat a, i sualnate thuphatawina hi diingin a Tapa ahung sawl chih ahi zaw hi.
Deihtahte, Pathian in hichilawma ahung lungsiat leh, eihaw zong khat leh khat i kilungsiat diing uh ahi.
Mi koimah in bangchihmahin Pathian a mu ngei sih hi. Eihaw khat leh khat i kilungsiat leh Pathian eimah ah a um zing a, a lungsiatna zong eimah ah a bukim ahi.
Hikhu ah eiuh amah ah i um a, amah eiuh ah a um chih i he hi: a Hagau ahung piah taah jiahin.
Huleh Pain Tapa chu khovel Hundampa diingin a sawl chih i muta va, huleh i hesah uhi.
Mi koipouh Jesu Pathian Tapa ahi chih gum taphot chu Pathian amah ah a um, amah zong Pathian ah a um hi.
Huleh i tunga Pathian in lungsiatna a neih chu i he va, ging zong i gingta uhi. Pathian chu lungsiatna ahi; koipouh lungsiatna a um chu Pathian ah a um a, Pathian zong amah ah a um hi.
Hikhu ah i tung a lungsiatna a bukimta hi, vaihawmni chianga haangsanna i neih theihna diingin; amah um banga khovela eihaw zong i um jiahin.
Lungsiatna ah launa a um sih a, lungsiatna bukimin launa a delhmang zaw hi; Ajiahchu launa in thuaahgimna a nei hi. Launa neimi chu lungsiatna ah a bukim nailou ahi.
Ama’n eiuh ahung lungsiat masat jiahin, eiun amah i lungsiat uh ahi.
Mi’n Pathian ka lungsiat, chi ngal a, a unau a muhdah inchu, mizuau ahi; ajiahchu a muh gegu a unau bawn lungsiat loupi’n a muh louh Pathian bangchi’n a lungsiat thei diai?
Huleh amah apat hi thupiah i nei uhi, Koipouh Pathian lungsiat in a unau zong a lungsiat diing ahi, chih.
Mi koipouh Jesu chu Khrist ahi chih gingta chu Pathian a piang ahi; huleh koipouh a hingtu lungsiat inchu a hin zong a lungsiat veu hi.
Hikhu in Pathian tate i lungsiat uh chih i he, Pathian i lungsiat a, a thupiahte i juih chiangin.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh, Pathian i lungsiatna u’chu a thupiahte i juih uh ahi; huleh a thupiahte chu a khauh sih hi.
Pathian a piang photmahin khovel a zou hi; huleh hikhu ahi khovel tunga gualzohna chu, i ginna ngei uh.
Jesu Pathian Tapa ahi chih gingta mi chauh loungal koi ahiai khovel tunga gualzou?
Hi ahi tui leh sisana hung chu, Jesu Khrist ngei; tui chauh a hilou in, tui leh sisanin ahi zaw. Huleh heetpihtu chu Hagau ahi, Hagau chu thutah ahih jiahin.
Ajiahchu vaan ah heetpihtu thum a um hi, Pa, Thu, huleh Hagau Siangthou; huleh hi thumte chu khat ahi.
Huleh leitung ah heetpihtu thum a um hi, Hagau, tui, huleh sisan; hi thumte chu khat in a kituaah uhi.
Mihing heetpihna bawn i pom inchu, Pathian heetpihna a loupizaw hi; ajiahchu a Tapa tungthu a, a heetsah Pathian heetpihna chu hikhu ahi,
Koipouh Pathian Tapa gingta in amah ah heetpihtu a nei hi; Pathian gingta lou mi’n chu amah mi zuau ahisah hi; Pathian in a Tapa ahung piah thu a heetsah a gintaat louh jiahin.
Huleh heetsahna chu hikhu ahi, Pathian in kumtuang hinna ahung peta a, hu hinna chu a Tapa ah a um hi.
Koipouh Tapa nei in hinna a neita, koipouh Pathian Tapa nei louin hinna a nei sih hi.
Kumtuang hinna na neita uh chih na heetna diingun, nanguh Pathian Tapa min gingtate kawmah hi thute ka gial ahi huleh Pathian Tapa min na gintaat theihna diingun.
Huleh amah a i kimuanna u’chu hikhu ahi, bangpouh amah deihzawng a i nget leh ahung ngaikhe veu hi, chih.
Huleh bangpouh i nget uh ahung ngaihkhiahsah chih i heet inchu, a kawm a i silnget uh i muta chih i he uhi.

Mi koipouh in a unau, sihna khop hilou sual bawl a a muh inchu a ngetsah diing a, huchi'n Ama’n sihna khop hilou sual bawlte diingin hinna a pe diing hi. Sihna khop sual a um a; hukhu diingin a ngetsah diing ka chi sih hi.
Dihtatlouhna zousiah sual ahi; huleh sihna khop hilou sual zong a um hi.
Koipouh Pathian a piang chu a sual zing sih chih i he hi; hizongleh Pathian a piangpa in amah a kikola migiloupa’n a khoihkha sih hi.
Eiuh chu Pathian a kuan i hi chih leh, khovel pumpi chu gilou in a um chih i he uhi.

Huleh Pathian Tapa chu a hungta a, amah Midihtah chu i heet theihna diingin heetsiamna ahung peta chih i he uhi; huleh eihaw chu amah Midihtah, a Tapa Jesu Khrist ngei ah i um uhi. Amah chu Pathian dihtah leh kumtuang hinna ahi.
Tate haw, milem apat kihemkhia un. Amen.
Upa in, numei teel leh a tate, thutah a ka lungsiatte kawmah; huleh keimah chauh hilouin thutah he zousiah in zong ahi.
Ei u’a um, huleh kumtuang a zong i kawma um diing thutah jiahin.
Pa Pathian akipan leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist, Pa Tapa akipan hehpihna leh khotuahna leh hamuanna chu thutah leh lungsiatna in na kawmvah um hen.
Pa kawm akipan a thupiah i muh banga na tate khenkhat thutah a um ka muh jiahin ka kipaah mahmah hi.
Huchi'n, numeipha, thupiah thah gial bang chu hilouin, a chiil a kipana i neih uh gial zawin, khat leh khat kilungsiattuah diingin ka hung ngen hi.
Huleh hikhu ahi lungsiatna, a thupiahte banga i um chu. Thupiah chu hikhu ahi, A chiil a kipana na jah bang va humah ah na um diing uh ahi.
Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh, Jesu Khrist tahsa in ahung chih gum lou heemtu tampi khovel ah a umdohta hi. Hutobang mi chu heemtu leh Khrist doudaaltu ahi.
I tohkhiahsate mangsah lou a, kipaahman a kim a i muhtheih zawh na diingun kiveeng un.
Mi koipouh daan bohsia leh, Khrist thuhilhna daan a um zing louin Pathian a nei sih hi, Khrist thuhilhna daan a um zing mi’n chu Pa leh Tapa a nih in a neikhawm hi.
Mi koipouh hi kihilhna thu keng lou a na kawmva hung a um leh na inn vah tungsah sih unla, kampha in zong ha sih un.
Ajiahchu kampha a hatu chu amah giitlouhna kikoppih ahi.
Na kawmva thu tampi hung gelh diing ka neih vangin lehkhapuan leh lehkhatui in ka gial nuam sih diing hi; hizongleh hung a, i kipaahna uh a kim theihna diingin kimaaituah a hung soi ka kinem hi.
Teel a um na unaunu tate’n chibai ahung buuh uhi. Amen.
Upa deih mahmah Gaia, thutah a ka lungsiat kawmah.
Deihtah, sildang zousiah sangin, na hagau khantouh jel banga na khantouh diing leh damtaha na um diing deihin ka ngen hi,
Ajiahchu unaute a hung a, thutah a na umdan banga nangmaha thutah um ahung heetsah tahun ka kipaah mahmah hi.
Ka tate thutahah a um uh chih ka jah sanga kipaahna lianzaw ka nei sih hi.
Deihtah, unaute tung leh mikhualte tunga na bawl photmah ginumtahin na bawl veu hi.
Hute’n chu na lungsiatna kouhtuam ma ah a phuangta uhi; a khualzinna va Pathianmi bangtah a na makaih jel leh na bawl hoih diing hi.
A min jiaha Jentelte kawma bangmah la lou a chiahdoh ahihjiahun.
Hujiahin thutah a kipanpihtuahte i hihtheihna diingin hutobang mi chu i ngaih diing ahi.
Kouhtuam kawmah ka gial a; hizongleh a lahva tungtuan utpa Diotrephi in keiuh ahung ngai sih hi.

Huchihjiahin, ka hung lechu, a silbawlte ka hedohsah diing hi; ka tungva thu gilou soi a, a kamtam dan, huleh huzong hun sa louin, amah ngei in unaute a hua a, huleh a deih, nuamte zong a khap a, kouhtuam apat a nohdoh hi.
Deihtah, sil gilou jui sinla, sil hoih jui zaw in. Sil hoih bawlmi chu Pathian a kuan ahi; ahihvangin sil gilou bawlmi’n chu Pathian a mu sih hi.
Demetria in mi zousiah apat leh, thutah apat ngei in pahtaat a loh hi; ahi, kei un zong ka heetpih uhi, huleh ka heetpihna u’chu a dih ahi chih na he uhi.
Gelh diing tampi ka nei a, hizongleh lehkhapuan leh lehkhatui in na kawmah ka gial sih diing hi;
Himahleh sawtlou kalin ka hung mu diing a, kimaaituah in thu i soi diing chih ka kinem hi.
Hamuanna na tungah um hen. I lawmte'n chibai ahung buuh uhi. I lawmte minloh chiatin chibai hung na buuhsah in.
Jude, Jesu Khrist suaah leh Jakob unau in, Pa Pathian koihtuam, Jesu Khrist a veenbit leh kouhte kawmah;
Khotuahna leh, hamuanna leh, lungsiatna na tungvah suhpung in um hen.

Deihtahte, i hutdamna thu taangpi na kawmva gelh diing ka ngaihtuah nasat laiin, misiangthoute kawma diing ginna khatvei kipia khu diinga phatuamngaitaha na pan na diingun hung gelh leh, hung hasot kei diingin a poimoh hi.

Ajiahchu ma laipeh a hih siamlouhna tang diing a guatsa, Pathian ngaihsah lou leh, i Pathian uh hehpihna chu huuhna suaahsah a, huleh Lalpa Pathian khat chauh um leh, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist gingta lou, a guuh a hung luut mi koite aha a um uhi.
Hujiahin hikhu khatvei hetamah zongleh u’chin, ka hung hedohsah kiit diing hi, Bangchia Lalpa’n a mite Aigupta gam apat a hutdoh zou nunga a gingta loute a suhmangthai ahiai, chih.
Huleh angelte, a tanvou masa uh kem zing lou a, a umna mun uh nusete chu kumtuanga gaahna siihkhau a kaanin, mial nuaiah, ni loupi vaihawmna a diingin a siitta hi.
Sodom leh Gommorrah, huleh a kimvel a khuate, huchibang maha kingaihna a kipumpiah leh, tahsa tuamdang na delhte chu kumtuang a mei a gawtna thuaah a, etton diing a taahlat a, a um bangun.
Huchibang mahin, hi mang kihdahhuai mante’n zong tahsa a suthanghuai va, thuneihna a musit va, lalnate a soise veu uhi.
Ahi’nla, Mikael, angel tungnungpen in chu, Mosi luang thu a diabol toh kihau a, a kinial laiun, soisia in a mohpaih ngam sih a, Lalpa’n hung tai heh, a chi zaw hi.
Hizongleh hite’n chu sil a heet louhte uh a soisia va; ngaihtuahna nei lou gamsate banga pianken heettheihna a a heet uh hu silte ah amah uleh amahuh a kisusesuaah uhi.
A tung uh a gih hi! ajiahchu Kaina lampi a juita va, loh deihgohna’n Balaam suhkhelhna ah lawptahin a tai va; huleh Kora helna ah a mangthaita uhi.

Hite chu na lungsiatna gual vaahna va nang u’toh an a neeh chiang va tuitup suang mong hiam, launa taang he lou a amahuh ki vaahte ahi uh; amahuh chu tui polou meilum huih muutleeng lehlehte, sing a gah vuaita, gah nei lou, nihvei sita, a zung a kiphungkalhte;
Amahuh mah zumna kiphotuoh tawm, tui khang lian kinawh von von, aahsi leeng lehleh, kumtuanga mialna vombehboh a diing a siitte ahi uhi.
Huleh Enok, Adam apata sagihna pa in zong hite tungthu ana soilawh hi, Ngai un, Lalpa chu a misiangthou saang sawm toh ahung hi.

Mi zousiah tunga vaihawm diing leh, a lahva Pathian ngaihsah loua a toh uh Pathian ngaihsah louhna nna zousiah leh, Pathian ngaihsah lou mi sualte’n a tunga a haamsiatna zousiah jiaha Pathian ngaihsahloute zousiah siamlouh tangsah diingin, chi in.
Hihaw chu phunhaatte, nialhaatte, amahuh ut zawngzawng a gamtaangte ahi uh; a kam un kiuahsahna thu loupi tahtah a soi va, lawhna deih man a mi paahtawi chiingmi ahi uhi.
Hizongleh deihtahte, nangun chu i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist sawllehte manga malaia thu kisoite he zing un.
Hun nunung chiangin Pathian ngaihsah louhna lama amahuh utna banga um, simmoh haatte ahung um diing uh, a chih haw uh bang.
Hitobang mite chu kituambawl haatte, tahsa mi, Hagau neiloute ahi uhi.
Hizongleh deihtahte, nang u’chu na ginna siangthou pen uh tunga kilamtou in, Hagau siangthou a haamtei in,
Kumtuang hinna neihsahna khop i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna chu ngaah zing in Pathian lungsiatna ah kikoldet un.
Khenkhat ginglel a umte chu hehpih unla;
Khenkhatte mei kuang apat kaidoh in, a tahsa thanghuai uh ba ana puansilh tanpha kihdahin, lau kawmin hundam un.
Huchi'n na puuh louhna diing va nangu hung veengbit thei leh, a loupina ma a nasataha nuamsa a soiselbei a nanguh hung koih theipa,
I Hundampa uh Pathian pil chauh kawmah, loupinate, paahtawinate, vaihawmnate leh silbawltheihnate tu leh kumtuang in um zingta hen. Amen.
Jesu Khrist thuphuandoh, Pathian in a kawma, sil hung tungpah ngei diingte a suaahte a heetsah diing a, a piah chu; ama’n huchu a suaah John kawmah a angel sawl in chiamchihna in a hesahta hi.
Ama’n chu Pathian thu leh Jesu Khrist heetpihna thu leh, a sil muh zousiah a hesahta hi.
Hi soilawhna thute sim leh, ngaikhete leh, a sunga thu kigialte juimi chu a hampha hi; a hun a naitaah jiahin.
John in, Asia gam a um kouhtuam sagihte kawmah: Amah um zing leh, umta leh, hung um diingpa apat leh; a laltouphah ma a um Hagau sagihte apat,

Huleh heetpihtu ginum, misi laha piang masapen leh, leia kumpipate vaihawmtu Jesu Khrist a kipan, hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen. Amah ei hung lungsiat a, i sualna apat amah ngei sisana hung silsiangtu leh,
Pathian leh a Pa kawma lal leh siampu a hung bawltu kawmah loupina leh thuneihna kumtuang kumtuang in um zingta hen. Amen.
En in, meipi toh ahung kum hi; mit chintengin amah a mu diing hi, amah suntute ngei inzong; huleh leia nam zousiah amah jiahin a kap diing uhi. Huchi hihen, Amen.
Kei Alpha leh Omega, abul leh atawp ka hi, Lalpa um zing leh umta leh, hung um diing, Bangkimbawlthei in a chi hi.
Kei John, na unaupa uleh, Jesu Khrist a gimthuaahna leh lalgam leh kuhkalna a na tanneihpih u’chu Pathian thu jiah leh Jesu Khrist thu heetpihna jiahin Patmos kichi tuikulh gam ah ka um a.
Lalpa niin Hagau in ka um a, huleh ka nunglamah pengkuul ging bang aw ngaihtah ka ja hi,

Kei Alpha leh Omega, a masapen leh a nunungpen ka hi; na sil muhte lehkhabu ah gial inla, Asia gam a um kouhtuam sagihte kawmah thot in; Ephesa khua ah, Smarna khua ah, Pergamos khua ah, Thyatira khua ah, Sardis khua ah, Philedelphia khua ah, huleh Laodisia khua ah, chi'n.
Huleh hu ahung houpih aw chu muh tum in ka kihei a. Huleh ka kihei a ahihleh sana thaumeitunna sagih ka mu hi;
Huleh hu thaumeitunna sagihte laiah mihing Tapa tobang mi khat, a keengphaang tandong a puan silh, a awm sana kawnggaaha kigaah ka mu a.
A lutang leh a sam chu belaam mul bangin a kaang a, vuuh bangin a ngou a; huleh a mit chu mei kuang bang ahi.
A keeng chu sumeng taahtah mei a haalsan bang ahi a; a aw chu tui tampi luang ging bang ahi.
A khut jiatlam in aahsi sagih a tawi a; a kama kipanin namsaau taattuah hiamtah mai a pawt a; huleh a meel chu ni hahsata a sat lai bang ahi.
Huleh amah ka muh tahin a keengbulah a si bang meiin ka puuhta hi. Huin ama’n a khut jiatlam ka tunga koihin, ka kawmah, Lau sin; kei a masapen leh a nunungpen ka hi;
A hing zingpa chu ka hi; huleh ka si a, hizongleh ngai in, kumtuang in ka hing ahi, Amen; huleh misikhua leh sihna chabite ka nei hi.
Na sil muhtaahte leh, sil umlaite leh, tununga sil hung um diingte chu gial in.
Ka khut jiatlam a aahsi sagih na muhte leh sana thaumeitunna sagihte thuguuh chu. Aahsi sagihte chu kouhtuam sagihte angelhaw ahi va; huleh thaumeitunna sagih na muhte chu kouhtuam sagihte ahi uhi.
Ephesa khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichi'n gial in; A khut jiatlam a aahsi sagih tawipa, sana thaumeitunna sagih laia vaah lehlehpa’n hi thute a soi hi;
Na natohte, na tohgimnate, na kuhkaldan, huleh migilou haw na thuaahtheih louhdan, huleh hiloupi a sawlleh ka hi uh chi haw na etkhiah a mi zu an a hihdan uh na matdoh leh;
Na thuaahzoh a, na kuhkal a, huleh ka min jiaha na tohgimdan leh na chauh louhdan ka he hi.
Hizongleh demna khat ka hung nei hi, na lungsiatna masapen na nuutsiat taah jiahin.

Hujiahin na puuhna laitah he inla, kisiih in; huleh natoh masapente bawl kiit in; ahihlouh inchu kintahin na kawmah ka hung diing a, na thaumeitunna chu a mun a kipanin ka suan diing hi, na kisiih louhleh.
Ahihvangin hi thu ah na hoih hi, Nikolaitan pawlte natoh na huat ah, huchu ke’n zong ka hua hi.
Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh; A gualzoupa kawmah Pathian paradis lailunga um hinna singa neeh diing ka pe diing hi, chi'n.
Huleh Smarna khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichi'n gial in; Amasapen leh a nunungpen, si a hing kiitpa in hi thute a soi hi;
Na natohte leh, gimthuaahte leh, na zawndan (hizongleh na hausa hi) ka he hi, huleh Judami hiloupi a ka hi uh chi, Setan kikhopna inn hingal, hute Pathian soisiatna ka he hi.

Na hung sil thuaah diingte lau sin; ngai in, etkhiah a na um theihna diingun diabol in na lahva khenkhat chu suangkul aha hung khum diing a, ni sawm sung gimthuaahna na nei diing uh; sih tanphain ginum in, huchi'n hinna lallukhuh ka hung pe diing hi.
Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh. A gualzoupa chu sih nihna suhnat in a um sih diing hi, chi'n.
Huleh Pergamos khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichi'n gial in; Amah namsaau taattuah hiamtah neipa’n hi thute a soi hi.
Na natoh leh na umna mun, Setan touna ngei chu ka he hi; huleh ka min na pomkip a, ka martar ginum, Antipa, Setan teenna na lahva thah a, a um laiin zong na hung ginna na phatsan sih hi.

Hizongleh demna sil themkhat ka hung nei hi, ajiahchu Balaam thuhilhna juite huah na umpih a, ama’n chu Israel tate ma a puuhna siam diing leh, milim biahna sa ne diing leh, aangkawmna sual bawl diingin Balak a thuhilh hi.
Huchimahbangin Nikolaitan pawlte thuhilhna jui mi khenkhat zong na nei a, huchu ka hua hi.
Kisiih in, huchilou inchu kintahin na kawmah ka hung diing a, ka kama pawt namsaau in amahuh ka dou diing hi.

Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh. A gualzoupa kawmah manna phualguuh a neeh diing ka pe diing a, suang kaang khat, hu suang tung a minthah, a tangtu loungal midang koima’n a heet louh kigial ka pe diing hi, chi'n.
Huleh Thyatira khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichi'n gial in; Pathian Tapa, mei kuang bangmai mit nei a, sumeng tobang keeng neipa’n hi thute a soi hi;
Na natohte, na itnate, na natohsahte, na ginnate huleh na kuhkalnate ka he hi; huleh na silbawl masapen sangin a nunungpen a tamzaw hi.

Ahihvangin demna sil themkhat ka hung nei hi; hu numei Jezebel na ngaihtheih jiahin, ama’n amah le amah zawlnei ka hi kichi'n ka suaahte aangkawmna sual bawl diing leh, milim biahna sa ne diingin a hilh a, a heemgawp hi.
Amahnu chu a aangkawmna apat kisiih diingin hun ka pia a; hizongleh a kisiih sih hi.
Ngai in, amahnu chu lupna ah ka paai diing a, huleh a aangkawmpih haw chu gimthuaahna loupiah ka puiluut diing hi, a silbawl uh a kisiih louh uleh.
Huleh a tate chu sihna in ka that diing a; huleh kouhtuam zousiah in kei chu lungsimgil leh lungtang hawlpa ka hi chih a he diing uh; huleh na bawnun na natoh dungjuiun ka hung pe chiat diing hi.
Hizongleh nang leh Thyatira khua a um, hi kihilhna nei lou leh, a soi uh banga Setan thugilte he lou midang zousiah kawmah ka soi ahi: tunggihna dang mawngmawng na tungvah ka koih sih diing hi.
Hizongleh hu na neihsa u’chu ka hung masiah tukip un.
Huleh a gualzoupa leh a tawpdong a ka nate kempa chu, a kawmah namte tunga thuneihna ka pe diing hi;
Huleh ke’n zong ka Pa a kipana ka muh bang ngei in ama’n a tungvah beel kheengtu beel a halhal a, a keeh bangin siih chiangin vai a hawm diing hi.
Huleh amah chu jingsol aahsi ka pe diing hi.
Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh.
Huleh Sardis khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichi'n gial in; Pathian Hagau sagih leh, aahsi sagih neipa’n hi thute a soi hi; Na natohte ka he hi, hing min na pua a, hizongleh si na hi.
Kiveeng inla, sil um nalai, si dehdehte chu suhaat in; ajiahchu na natoh Pathian mitmuh ah bukimin ka mu sih hi.

Hujiahin na muhdan leh na jahdan ngaihtuah inla, tukip in, huleh kisiih in. Huchia na kiveen louh inchu guta bangin na kawmah ka hung diing a, huleh bangchih hun a na kawm ka hung tun diing na he sih diing hi.
Ahiinlah, Sardis khua ah a puante uh subuah lou min tawmtakhat na nei hi; huleh amahuh chu kei toh puan vaam silh in a leeng diing uh; huchitaah ahih jiahun.
A gualzoupa chu huchimahin puan vaam silhsah ahi diing a; huleh a min chu hinna lehkhabu apat ka nawtmang sih diing, hizongleh ka Pa ma leh, a angelte ma ah a min ka gum diing hi.
Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh, chi'n.

Huleh Philedelphia khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichi'n gial in; Amah siangthou leh dih, amah David chabi neipa, a hon chianga koima’n a khaah theih louh, huleh a khaah chiang a koima’n a hon theih louhpa’n hi thute a soi hi;
Na natohte ka he hi; ngai in, na ma-ah koimah khaah theih louh kot kihong ka koih hi; ajiahchu thahaatna neutakhat na nei a, ka thu na kol zing a, huleh ka min na kiheetmohbawl sih hi.

Ngai in, Setan kikhopna inn a mi, Judami hiloupia ka hi chia zuau soite; ngai in, hute chu ka hung pia a, amahuh chu hungin na keengbulah ka hung besah diing a, nang ka hung lungsiat chih ka hesah diing hi.
Ka kuhkalna thu na kol zing jiahin leitung a um mite etkhiahna diinga khovel pumpi a hung tung diing heemna hun a kipanin ke'n zong ka hung veengbit diing hi.
Ngai in, kintahin ka hung hi; koimah in na lallukhuh ahung laahsah louhna diingin na sil neihsa chu koldet in.

A gualzoupa chu ka Pathian biahinn ah khuam in ka pangsah diing a, a pawtdoh nawn sih diing; huleh a tungah ka Pathian min leh, ka Pathian khopi Jerusalem thah, Ka Pathian akipana vaan a kuana hung kumsuh min ka gial diing a, a tungah ka min thah ka gial diing hi.
Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh, chi'n.
Huleh Laodisia khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichi'n gial in; Amen, heetpihtu ginum, leh dihtah, Pathian silsiam bulin hi thute a soi hi;
Na natohte ka he hi; lum la lum lou, vot la vot lou a na um chu; na lum aha, na vot aha ka deih ahi.
Huchia lumpelhpulh a, lum la lum lou, vot la vot lou a na um jiahin ka kam apatin ka hung sekhe diing hi.
Ajiahchu nangma’n, Ka hausa a, ka neih a pungta, bangmah ka tasam sih, na chi a; mi lungsiatum, genthei, tagah, mittaw huleh saguah na hih lam na he sih hi.

Na hung hauhsat theihna diingin sana mei a haalchiim leh, na saguah zumhuaina a kilat louhna diing a na silh diing puanvaam leh, na muhtheihna diing a na mit na nuh diing mitna lou ka kawma apat lei diingin ka hung deihsah hi.
Ka lungsiat taphot chu ka tai a ka thunun hi, hujiahin phatuamngai inla, kisiih in.
Ngai in, kotkhaah bul a diingin ka kiu hi; mi koipouh in ka aw a jah a, kot a hon inchu a kawmah ka luut diing a, amah toh nitaah an ka ne diing a, huleh ama’n zong kei toh a ne diing hi.
A gualzoupa chu ka kawmah ka laltouphah ah ka tousah diing, kei zong ka gualzoh a, ka Pa toh a laltouphaha ka tou mahbangin.
Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh, chi'n.

Hi silte nungin ka en a, huleh ngai in, vaan ah kot a kihong a, huleh aw ka jah masat chu pengkuul ging bangin kei hung houpih ahi a, hukhuin, Hilamah hungtou in, tununga sil um diingte ka hung musah diing, a chi a.
Huleh thakhat in kei chu hagau in ka umta a, huleh ngai in, vaan ah laltouphah khat a kitung a, hu laltouphah tungah mi khat a tou a.
Huleh hu a toupa chu jasper leh sardine suang bangmai in a kilang a; hu laltouphah kiimvel ah chu sakhituihuup, et a emerald suang bangmai a kilang a um hi.
Huleh hu laltouphah kiimvelah touphah sawmnih leh li a um a; huleh hu touphahte tungah upa sawmnih leh li puan vaam silh a tou ka mu a; amahun sana lukhuh a khuh uhi.
Huleh hu laltouphah apatin kawlphete, vaangingte, awte ahung suaah a; huleh hu laltouphah ma-ah mei thaumei sagih a kuang a, hute chu Pathian Hagau sagihte ahi uhi.
Huleh hu laltouphah ma-ah crystal suang tobang limlang tui khang lian a um a; huleh hu laltouphah lailung leh, laltouphah kiimvel ah malam leh nunglam mit a dim silhing li a um hi.
Silhing khatna chu huumpibahnei tobang ahi a, silhing nihna chu bawngnou tobang ahi a, huleh silhing thumna in chu mihing meel bang a pua a, silhing lina chu mupi leeng lai bang ahi.

Huleh hu silhing lite’n chu haa guup chiat a nei va: a sunglam uh mit in a dim a; huleh amah unchu suun leh jan a tawlnga louin, Siangthou, Siangthou, Siangthou, Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawlthei, umta leh, um zing leh, hung um diing chu; a chi uhi.
Huleh hu silhingte’n laltouphah tunga toupa, kumtuang a hing zingpa kawmah loupina leh zahbawlna pia a kipaahthu a soi tahun,
Upa sawmnih leh li chu laltouphah tunga toupa ma-ah a bohkhup va, kumtuang kumtuang a hing zingpa chu a bia va, huleh hu laltouphah ma-ah a lukhuhte uh koih in,
Aw Lalpa, Nang chu loupina leh zahbawlna leh thuneihna tangtaah na hi; ajiahchu nangma’n sil zousiah na siam a, huleh nang deihzawng a um leh siam ahi uh, a chi uhi.
Huleh amah laltouphah tunga toupa jiatlamah, a sunglam leh a polama kigial, chiamchihna sagiha kichiamchih lehkhabu khat ka mu a,
Huleh angel haat khat aw ngaihtaha kikou a, Koi ahiai lehkhabu chu hong a, hua chiamchihna umte pheltaah, chi ka mu a.
Huleh vaan ah hiin, leiah hileh, hulou in lei nuaiah hitaleh, hu lehkhabu hong thei leh a tung en thei mi koimah a umta sih hi.
Huleh hu lehkhabu hong diing leh sim diing aha, ahihlouhleh a tung en taah mi koimah a kimuh louh jiahin hahkah in ka kap hi.
Huin upate laha khat in ka kawmah, Kap sin; ngai in, Judah nam Humpibahnei, David zungjam in hu lehkhabu chu hong diing leh, hua chiamchihna sagihte phel diingin a zouta hi, a chi a.

Huleh ka et leh, ngai in, laltouphah leh silhing lite lai ah leh, upate laiah thahsa hileh kilawm Belaamnou, ki sagih leh mit sagih nei, ding ka muta a, hute chu Pathian Hagau sagih, leitung pumpi a sawlkhiahte ahi uhi.
Huleh amah chu a hung a; laltouphah tunga toupa khut jiatlam apatin lehkhabu chu a lata hi.
Huleh lehkhabu chu a laah tahin silhing lite leh, upa sawmnih leh lite chu Belaamnou ma-ah a bohkhup va, tengtang leh gimnamtui a dim sana belhbu a tawi chiat va, huchu misiangthoute haamteina ahi.

Huleh amahun la thah khat a sa va, Nang chu lehkhabu la a, hua chiam chihnate phel taah na hi; ajiahchu thah in na um a, chi chin, haam chin, michin leh nam chin apat mite na sisanin Pathian a diingin na hung tanta a;
Huleh i Pathian uh kawmah lalte leh siamputein na hung siamta hi; huleh leitung ah lal in i tou diing uhi, chi'n.
Huin ka et leh, laltouphah leh silhingte leh upate kimvelah angel tampi aw ka ja a; a tamdan u’chu saang sawm mun saang sawm leh, a saang tampi ahi uh;
Thah a um Belaamnou chu thuneihnate, hauhsatnate, pilnate, thahaatnate, paahtawinate, loupinate leh vangpiahnate tangtaah ahi, chia aw ngaihtaha kikou in.

Huleh vaan a um, lei a um, lei nuaia um leh tui khang lian sunga um chintengin, Laltouphah tunga toupa leh Belaamnou kawmah, vangpiahnate, paahtawinate, loupinate, thuneihnate kumtuang kumtuang in um zingta heh, a chih uh ka ja hi.
Huin silhing lite’n, Amen, a chi va. Huleh upa sawmnih leh lite’n bohkhup in amah kumtuang kumtuang a hing zingpa chu a beta uhi.
Huleh Belaamnou in chiamchihnate laha khat a phel ka mu a, huleh aw vaan ging bangmai in silhing lite laha khat in, Hung en in, a chih ka ja a.
Huin ka et leh, sakol kaang khat ka mu a; a tunga tuangpa’n thalmung a tawi a; huleh a kawmah lallukhuh khat a kipia a; amah chu gualzou leh, gualzou jel diingin a kuankheta hi.
Huleh chiamchihna nihna a phel zohin silhing nihna in, Hung en in, a chih ka ja a;

Huleh sakol dang, a san khat ahung pawtdoh a; a tunga tuangpa kawma chu, leitung apat hamuanna laahsah theihna leh, mite khat leh khat a kithahtuahna diing uh thuneihna a kipia a; huleh a kawmah namsaau liantah piah ahi.
Huleh chiamchihna thumna a phel zohin silhing thumna in, Hung en in, a chih ka ja a. Huleh ka et leh ngai in, sakol vom khat ka mu a; a tunga tuangpa in a khut in buuhna a tawi a.
Huleh silhing lite lai apatin aw khat in, Makhai khat in gehu dan khat, makhai khat in taang dan thum; huleh sathau leh uain chu suse sin, a chih ka ja hi.
Huleh chiamchihna lina a phel zohin silhing lina in, Hung en in, a chih ka ja a.

Huleh ka et leh ngai in, sakol dang khat ka mu a; a tunga tuangpa min chu Sihna ahi a, huleh misikhua in amah a jui a. Huleh amahuh kawma chu namsaau toh, kial toh, sihna toh, huleh leitung a gamsate a thah diingin leitung seh li suah seh khat piah ahi.
Huleh chiamchihna ngaana phel zohin, maitaam nuaiah Pathian thu jiah leh, a heetpihna pom jiaha thahte hagau ka mu a;
Amah u’chu aw ngaihtaha kikou in, Aw Lalpa, siangthou leh dih, bangtan ahiai leitung a teengte tunga vaihawm lou leh, ka sisan uh phuba la lou a na um diing? a chi uh.
Huleh amahuh chu puan vaam a kipe chiat a; a suaah hihpihte uleh a unaute uh, amahuh bangmaha thaha um diingte ahung kim masiah uh tomkhat na khawl tadih diing a, a kawmvah hilh ahi uhi.
Huleh chiamchihna guupna a phel zohin, ka en a, jil nasatahin a kiliing a; huleh ni chu samul saiippuan bangin ahung vomta a, ha chu sisan bangin ahung umta hi.
Huleh vaan aahsite chu theipi kung huihpi haat tahin a muut a, a gah puamte a pulh bangin leiah a kia hi.
Huleh vaan chu lehkhabujial a kijialbei bangin a mangta a; huleh taang leh tuikulh gam chinteng a umna va kipan suanmang in a umta uhi.
Huleh leitung a lalte, mi liante, mi hausate, sepaih houtu lianpente, mi haatte, huleh saltaang leh taanglou mi zousiah chu kohawm leh taanga suangpite ah a kibuta va.
Taangte leh suangpite kawmah, Hung netkhum unla, amah laltouphah tunga toupa ma apat leh, Belaamnou lungthahna apat hung phual un.
Ajiahchu a lungthahna ni loupi hung tung ahita; koi ahiai diing zou diing? a chi uhi.
Huleh hi silte nungin, ke’n angel li, leitung ah hileh, tui khang lian tungah hileh, sing tung bangmaha zong a nun louh na diing a leitung huih lite tutaang a, lei ning li a diing chu ka mu a.

Huleh angel dang, suahlam apat a hung kuan, Pathian hing chiamchihna nei khat ka mu a; huleh amah chu, a kawmva leitung leh tui khang lian suhsiatna diing kipia angel lite kawmah aw ngaihtahin a kikou a,
I Pathian suaahte a tal va i chiamchih zoh masiah leitung hileh, tui khang lian hileh, singte hileh suse sih un, chi’n.
Huleh chiamchiha umte phaahzah chu ka ja a; Israel tate nam zousiah apat nuai khat leh siing li leh saang li chiamchih ahi uh.
Judah nam apat siing khat leh saang nih; Reuben nam apat siing khat leh saang nih; Gad nam apat siing khat leh saang nih;
Aser nam apat siing khat leh saang nih; Naphtalim nam apat siing khat leh saang nih; Manasseh nam apat siing khat leh saang nih;
Simeon nam apat siing khat leh saang nih; Levi nam apat siing khat leh saang nih; Issachar nam apat siing khat leh saang nih;
Zebulon nam apat siing khat leh saang nih; Joseph nam apat siing khat leh saang nih; huleh Benjamin nam apat siing khat leh saang nih chiamchihin a um uhi,

Hi nunga ka et leh, ngai in, mipi nasatah, koimah simseeng louh, nam chin, phung chin, mi chin leh haam chin apat puan ngou silh a, huleh tuumnah tawi a laltouphah leh Belaamnou ma a diing chu ka muta a.
Huleh amahuh chu aw ngaihtahin a kikou va, Hutdamna chu laltouphah tunga tou i Pathian uleh Belaamnou a ahi, chi’n.
Huleh angel zousiah chu laltouphah kim vel leh upate leh silhing lite kimvelaha ding va, huleh laltouphah ma-ah khupboh a puuh in,
Amen: Vangpiahnate, loupinate, pilnate, kipaahthusoinate, paahtawinate, thuneihnate leh silbawltheihnate chu i Pathian kawmah kumtuang kumtuang in um zingta heh. Amen chih Pathian a bia uhi.
Huleh upate laha khat in ahung houpih a, ka kawmah, Hi puan ngou a kithuamte koite ahiviai? huleh khoi apat a hung ahi viai? a chi a.
Ke’n a kawmah, Pu, nangma’n na he hi, ka chi a. Ama’n ka kawmah, Hite chu gimthuaahna nasatah apat hung pawtdohte ahi va, huleh a puan uh Belaamnou sisana sawp in a ngousahta uhi.
Hujiahin amahuh chu Pathian laltouphah ma a um in suun leh janin a biahinn ah a nna a tong uhi; huleh amah laltouphah tunga toupa chu a lahvah a teeng diing hi.
A gil uh a kial nawn sih diing a, a dangtaah kiit nawn sih diing uhi; huleh nisa in amahuh a kaang nawn sih diing a, a satna in zong a sugim nawn sih diing hi.
Ajiahchu Belaamnou, laltouphah laia um khu in amahuh a vaah diing a, tuihing lui luanna ah amahuh a pui diing a; huleh Pathian in a mit va kipat mittui zousiah a siaah siang diing hi, a chi hi.
Huleh ama’n chiamchihna sagihna a phel zohin pung makhai dibang sung vaan chu a sip kiikeei a.
Huin angel sagih Pathian ma a ding ka mu a; a kawmvah pengkuul sagih piah ahi uhi.

Huleh angel dangkhat a hung a, gimtui haalna sana bawm tawi in maitaam bulah a ding a; huleh a kawmah chu Laltouphah ma a sana maitaam tung a misiangthoute haamteina toh a latkhawm diingin gimtui tampi piah ahi.
Huleh gimtui khuu chu misiangthoute haamteina toh kiton in angel khut apatin Pathian ma-ah a jamtouta hi.
Huleh angel in gimtui haalna bawm a la a, maitaam meiin a thundim a, leitung ah a paaikheta hi; huin awte, vaangingte, kawlphete leh, ziillingte ahung umta hi.
Huin hu angel sagih pengkuul sagih neite chu muut diingin a kisa uh.
Angel khatna in a muut a, gial leh mei sisan toh kihal ahung umta a, hute chu leitung a paihkhiah in a um a; singkung mun thum a khen mun khat a kaangtum a, huleh hampa hing zousiah a kaangtumta hi.
Huleh angel nihna in a muut a, mei a kaang taang lianpi hileh kilawm tui khang lian a paihluut in a um a; huleh tui khang lian mun thum a khen mun khat sisan ahung suaahta hi.
Huleh tui khang lian a um hinna nei ganhingte chu mun thum a khen mun khat a sita a; huleh kuang te chu mun thum a khen mun khat suhsiat ahita hi.
Huleh angel thumna in a muut a, aahsi liantah khat, meisel banga kuang vaan apatin ahung kesuh a, luidungte mun thum a khen mun khat leh tuikhuuhte tungah a tu a;
Hu aahsi min chu Gamsaai ahi; huleh tui mun thum a khen mun khat chu gamsaai ahung suaahta a; huleh hu tuite in mi tampi a sita hi, suhkhaat a hihtaah jiahin.

Huin angel lina in a muut a, ni mun thum a khen mun khat, ha mun thum a khen mun khat, aahsi mun thum a khen mun khat suhsiat in a umta a; huchia hute mun thum a khen mun khat suhsiat ahihmah bangin suun chu mun thum a khen mun khat a vaah sih a, jan zong huchi mahin.

Huin ka et leh, angel khat vaanlaizawl a leeng a, aw ngaihtaha, angel thum in pengkuul a muut diing, hu pengkuul gin hung um nalai diingte jiahin lei a umte a tunggih hi, a tunggih hi, a tunggih hi, a chih ka ja hi.
Huin angel ngaana in a muut a, aahsi khat vaan apat a leia kesuh ka mu a; huleh a kawmah kokhuuh tobei chabi piah in a um hi.
Huleh ama’n kokhu a tobei chu a hong a; huin hu kokhuuh apatin haaltuina mei nasatah khuu bangin meikhu ahung pawtdoh a; huleh hu kokhuuh a meikhu jiahin ni leh vaan ahung mialta hi.
Huleh hu meikhu lah apatin khauphe leitung ah ahung pawtdoh a; leia momaaite silbawltheihna neih bang silbawltheihna a kawmvah piah ahi uh.
Amah u’chu, a tal va Pathian chiamchihna neiloute chauh chih louh, leia hampa aha, sil hing aha, ahihlouhleh sing mawngmawng suse lou diing a thupiah ahi uhi.
Huleh amahuh chu hute that lou a, hizongleh ha ngaa sung sugenthei diing a hilh ahi va; huleh a suhgentheihna u’chu momaai in mi a peh chianga natdan bang ahi.
Huleh hu ni chiangin mite’n sihna a hawl diing va, hizongleh a mu sih diing uh; sih a ut diing va, hizongleh sihna in amahuh a taimangsan diing hi.
Huleh hu khauphete meel chu gaal kuan diing a guatsa sakolte bangmai ahi va; a lutung vah sana tobang lallukhuh hileh kilawm a khuh uh, huleh a maai u’chu mihingte maai bang ahi.
Amahun numei sam tobang sam a nei va, a haa u’chu huumpibahnei haa bang ahi.
Huleh amahun siih awmphaw hileh kilawm a nei va; huleh a ha zaapging u’chu gaal a kuan sakol tampi kaangtalai ging bang ahi.
Amahun momaai bangin mei a nei va, a mei vah gu a um hi; huleh a silbawltheihna u’chu mihingte ha ngaa sung suhnat ahi.
Huleh amahun kokhuuh tobei angel chu a tungvah kumpipa in a nei va; a min chu Hebrai haam in Abbadon ahi a, hizongleh Grik haam in chu a min Appolion ahi.
Tunggihna khat a beita a, tunggihna nih ahung tung nalai diing hi.
Huin angel guupna in a muut a, Pathian ma a um sana maitaam ki lite akipan aw ka ja a,
Pengkuul nei angel guupna kawm a, Euphrates luipi lian a angel li kaana umte khu suut in, chi'n.
Huchi'n a pung leh, a ni leh, a ha leh, a kum huntaha mihingte mun thum a khen mun khat that diing a kikoih angel lite chu phelin a umta a.
Huleh hu sakol tungtuang gaalmite tamdan chu saang mun saang ja nih ahi uh; a phaahzah uh kisoi ka ja hi.

Huleh hichibangin kilaahna in sakolte leh a tunga tuang, mei leh ngen leh kaat awmphaw neite chu ka mu a; hu sakolte lutang chu humpibahnei lutang tobang ahi a; huleh a kam sung vapatin mei leh, meikhu leh, kaat a suaahdoh hi.
Hi sil thum, a kam vapat hung suaahdoh, mei leh, meikhu leh, kaat in mihingte mun thum a khen mun khat thah in a umta uhi.
Ajiahchu hu sakolte silbawltheihna chu a kam uleh a mei va um ahi a; a mei u’chu guul tobang ahi; huleh lutang a nei va, hute a mi a suhnat uh ahi.

Huleh hi gawtnate a si lou midang siah chu dawite leh, mu lah mu thei lou, jalah ja thei lou, pai lah pai thei lou, sana milemte leh sing milemte a biah louhna diing va a khut va a silbawlte uh tawpsan diingin a kisiih tuan sih uhi.
Huleh a tualthahna uleh, a mibumna uleh, a aangkawmna uleh a guuhtaatna vapatin zong a kisiih tuan sih uhi.
Huleh angel haat dang khat meilum a kithuam a vaan a kipana hung kumsuh ka mu a; a lutungah sakhituihuup a um a, a maai chu ni bang ahi a, a keengte chu mei khuam bang mei ahi.
Huleh a khut ah lehkhabu neutakhat pheetsa a tawi a: a keeng jiatlam chu tui khang lian tungah a nga a, a keeng veilam chu leitung ah.
Huleh amah chu humpibahnei huum haam bangin aw ngaihtahin a kikou a; a kikou zohin vaanging sagihte’n a aw a suahta uhi.
Huleh vaanging sagihte’n a aw uh a suah tahun gial diingin ka kisata a, huleh vaan akipan aw khat in ka kawmah, Vaanging sagihte silsoi chu iim bihbeh inla, gial sin, chi'n ka ja a.
Huin angel, tui khang lian leh leitung a ding ka muh in a khut vaan lamah a tungtou a.
Kumtuang kumtuang a hing zingpa, vaan leh a sunga sil umte, lei leh a sunga sil umte, tui khang lian leh a sunga sil umte bawltu minin a kihaahsial a, hun a um nawn louhna diingin:
Hizongleh angel sagihna aw gin lai nite a, a muut di’kuan chiangin Pathian thuguuh kiphual chu a suaah zawlneite kawma ana soisa bangin suhkim ahita diing hi, chi'n.
Huleh vaan akipan aw ka jah in, Chiah inla, tui khang lian leh a tunga ding angel khuta lehkhabu neutakhat pheetsa um chu va la in, a chi a.

Huin angel kawmah ka va chiah a, a kawmah, Lehkhabu neutakhat chu hung pia’n, ka va chi a. Huin ama’n ka kawmah, La inla ne zou veh in; hi in na gil a khasah diing a, hizongleh na kam ah chu khuaizu bangin a hum diing hi, a chi a.
Huchi'n angel khut apatin lehkhabu neutakhat chu ka ladoh a, ka ne zou veh a; huleh hichu ka kamah khuaizu bangin a hum a; huleh ka neeh zohin ka gil chu a khata hi.
Huin ama’n ka kawmah, Mi tampite leh, namte leh, haamte leh, kumpipate ma ah Pathian thu na soisawn ngei diing ahi, ahung chi hi.
Huin sialluang chiang tobang khat ahung kipia a; huleh angel chu a ding a, ka kawmah, Thou inla, Pathian biahinn leh, maitaam leh, a sunga betute teh in.
Hizongleh biahinn polam chu nusia inla, teh sin; ajiahchu hichu Jentelte kawma piah ahita hi; huleh khopi siangthou chu amahun ha sawmli leh ha nih a tuandeen diing uhi.
Huleh ka heetpihtu nihte kawmah silbawltheihna ka pe diing a, amahun saiip puan silh in ni saang khat leh za nih leh sawmguup sung thu a soi diing uhi, a chi a.
Hite chu olive sing nihte leh, leitung Pathian ma a ding thaumeitunna nihte ahi uh.
Mi koipouh in amah uh a suhnat leh a kam vapata mei hung pawtdoh in a meelmate uh a kaanggam a; huleh mi koipouh in amahuh a suhnat leh huchibangmah a thah in a um diing hi.

Hite’n chu a thusoi hun sung va guahzut louhna diingin vaan khaah theihna thahaatna a nei va; huleh tui sisan suaahsah theihna leh, a ut thuthu va leitung gawtna chinteng a gawt theihna thahaatna a nei uhi.
Huleh a heetpihna thusoi uh a zoh chiangun kokhuuh tobei apata hung pawtdoh gamsa in amahuh a dou diing a, a zou diing, huleh a that diing hi.
Huleh a luang u’chu hagaulama Sodom leh Aigupta kichi, i Lalpa u’zong kilhbeha a umna khopi loupitah kotzing ah a lum diing hi.
Huleh mipite leh, phung chin leh, haam chin leh, nam china mite’n ni thum leh a kim a luang uh a en diing va, a luang u’chu vui diing a phal sih diing uhi.
Huleh leitung a teengte chu amahuh tungah a nuam diing va, kipaahna a bawl diing va, huleh silpiahte a kithottuah diing uh; ajiahchu hi zawlnei nihte’n leitung a teengte a bawl gim mahmah uhi.
Huleh ni thum leh a kim zouin Pathian akipan hinna hagau a sungvah a luut a, a keeng un a dingta uh; huleh amahuh mute tungah launa nasatah a tungta hi.
Huin amahun vaan akipana aw ngaihtahin, Hi lamah hungtou un, a kawmva a chih a ja va. Huleh amahuh chu meilum lahah vaan ah a kaltouta va; a meelmate un amahuh a mu uhi.

Huleh hu laitahin zil nasatahin a kiliing a, khopi mun sawma khen munkhat a chimta a, huleh hu ziilling ah mi saang sagih thah in a umta hi; a mawh teng chu a lau mahmah va, vaan Pathian kawmah loupina a peta uhi.
Tunggihna nihna a beita a; ngai in, tunggihna thumna chu hung tungpah diing ahi,
Huleh angel sagihna in a muut a; vaan ah aw ngaihtah a ging a, khovel lalgamte chu i Lalpa uleh a Khrist lalgam ahung hita; amah chu kumtuang kumtuang in lal in a tou diing hi, chi'n.
Huin Pathian ma a, a laltouphah va tou upa sawmnih leh li te chu a khupboh in a puuh va, Pathian a bia va,
Nang ka hung phat uhi, Aw Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawlthei, um zing leh, umta leh, hung um diing; ajiahchu nangma’n na silbawltheihna loupitah na lata a, huleh lal in na touta hi.

Namte chu a thangtawm va, huleh nang lungthahna chu ahung tungta, huleh misite vaihawmsahna diing leh, na suaah zawlneite leh, misiangthoute leh, na min laute, mi lian leh mi neute kawma kipaahman piahna hun leh; leitung susetute na suhsiatna diing hun chu ahung tungta hi, chi'n.
Huin vaan ah Pathian biahinn a kihongta a, a biahinn sunga a thuhun bawm ahung kimu a; huleh kawlphe bang, awging bang, vaanging bang, ziilling bang, huleh gialkia nasatah bang ahung umta hi.
