Huleh vaan ah sillimdang loupitah ahung kilang a; numei khat, ni a kithuam, a keeng nuaia hapi um, huleh a lutung a aahsi sawmlenih tuang lallukhuh khuh ahung um a.
Amahnu chu naupaai ahi a, nausuaah diing a natna thuaah in a kap a.
Huin sillimdang vaan ah ahung kilang kiit a; ngai in, dragon san lianpi, lutang sagih leh ki sawm nei, a lutung a lallukhuh sagih khuh ahung um a.
A mei in vaan a aahsi mun thum a khen mun khat a kai a, lei ah a paaikheta a; huleh a nau a suaah phaatphaat ana valhzoupah diingin dragon chu numei nausuaah diing nu ma ah a ding hi.
Huleh amahnu in chu ta pasal, nam zousiah tunga siihchiang a vaihawmtu diing khat ahung neikheta a; huleh a ta chu Pathian leh a laltouphah kawmah laahtouh in a umta hi.
Huleh numeinu chu ni saang khat leh ni za nih leh ni sawmguup a khoi theihna diingun, gamdai ah, Pathian in a bawlsah munah a taimangta hi.
Huin vaan ah kidouna a um a; Mikael leh a angelte’n dragon a dou va; huleh dragon leh a angelte’n zong a dou uh.
Huleh a zou sih va, a mun u’zong vaan a muh in a um nawmta sih hi.
Huleh dragon lian chu paihdoh in a umta a, hu guulpi teeh, Diabol leh Setan kichi, khovel pumpi heemtu chu; amah chu leitung ah paihkhiah in a umta a, a angelte zong amah toh paihkhiah in a um uhi.

Huleh vaan ah aw ngaihtahin, Tuin chu i Pathian uh hutdamna leh, thahaatna leh, lalgam leh, a Khrist thuneihna ahung tungta hi; ajiahchu i unaute uh heehtu chu paihkhiah in a umta hi, ama’n a suun a jan in i Pathian ma ah amahuh a heeh hi.
Huleh amahun Belaamnou sisan jiah leh, a heetpihna thu uh jiahin amah chu a zouta va; huleh sih tanphain a hinna uh a it sih uhi.

Hujiahin nanguh vaan leh a sunga teengte kipaah un. Leitung leh tui khang liana teengte tung a gih hi; ajiahchu hun tomtakhat a neita chih a heet jiahin Diabol chu lungthah mahmahin na kawmvah ahung suhta ahi.
Huleh dragon in leitung a paihkhiah ahi chih a kiheet tahin hu numei ta pasal neinu chu a gawtta a.
Hu numei chu gamdai ah, hu guul muhphaahlouh a hun khat leh, hunte leh, hun kimkhat chawm a, a umna diing muna a leenluut theihna diingin mupi liantah haa nih piah ahi.
Huleh guul inchu numeinu tui a tohmangsah theihna diingin a nungah lui lianpi bangmai in a kam apat tui a phihdoh a.
Huleh leiin numeinu a panpih a, leiin a kam a kaah a, hu guul in a kam apat a phihdoh tuilian chu a valh beita hi.
Huleh dragon chu numeinu tungah a lungthah a, a chihaah umsun Pathian thupiah juite leh, Jesu Khrist heetpihna thu pomtute dou diingin a kuanta hi.

Huleh tui khang lian piauneel tungah ka ding a, tui khang lian a kipanin gamsa khat, lutang sagih leh ki sawm nei, a kite tunga lallukhuh sawm nei, huleh a lutangte tunga Pathian soisiatna min nei, hung pawtdoh chu ka muta a.

Huleh hu ka gamsa muh chu kaamkei tobang ahi a, a keeng chu vompi keeng a banga, a kam chu humpibahnei kam a bang hi; huleh amah chu dragon in a silbawltheihna leh, a touphah leh, thuneihna nasatah a pia hi.
Huleh a lutangte laha khat chu sihpih diing khophial a liam hileh kilawmin ka mu a; huleh sihna khopa a liamna chu ahung damta a; khovel pumpi in hu gamsa chu limdang sa in a jui uhi.
Huleh amahun gamsa kawma thuneihna petu dragon chu a bia va; huleh amahun Gamsa toh kibang koi a um ei? Amah toh kidou ngaap koi ahiai um? chi'n gamsa chu a bia uhi.
Huleh sil loupitahte soina diing leh, Pathian soisiatna diing kam a kawmah piah ahi a; ha sawm li leh ha nih sung thuneihna piah in a umta hi.
Huleh ama’n Pathian soisiatna leh, a min leh, a biahbuuh leh, vaan a umte soisiatna in a kam a kaahta a.
Huleh a kawm a’chu misiangthoute toh kidou diing leh, amahuh zoh diing thu piah ahita a; huleh phung chin leh, haam chin leh, nam chin tunga thuneihna piah ahita hi.
Huleh leitung a teeng zousiah, khovel siam chiil akipana thahsa Belaamnou hinna lehkhabua a min uh kigialloute’n amah a be diing uhi.
Mi koipouh in bil a neihleh ja heh.
Koipouh sala puiluuttu chu sal in a taang diing a; koipouh namsaau a that chu namsaau a thah in a um diing. Hi ah misiangthoute kuhkalna leh ginna a kilang hi.
Huin gamsa dang leitung a kipana hung pawtdoh khat ka mu a; ama’n chu belaam bangin ki nih a nei a; huleh dragon bangin thu a soi hi.
Ama’n gamsa masapen thuneihna zousiah a ma ah a zang a; leitung leh a sunga teenghaw chu gamsa masapen, sihna khop hiala liam hung dam kiitta chu, a besahta hi.
Huleh ama’n mihingte mitmuh in vaan apat mei bang koukhe hialin silmah nasatahte a bawl a.

Hu gamsa mitmuha silmah bawltheihna a kawma piah a umte zangin leitung a umte kawmah, namsaau a saatna maliam nei a hing nalai hu gamsa lim na siam diing uh ahi, chi'n leitung a teengte chu a heemta hi.
Huleh gamsa lim chu a haam theihna diing leh, gamsa lim be lou photmahte a thah theihna diing a gamsa lim kawma hinna piah theihna silbawltheihna ama’n a nei hi.
Huleh ama’n mi zousiah, a neu, a lian, hausa leh tagah, saltaang leh taanglou hitaleh, a khut jiatlam vah, ahihlouhleh a tal vah chiamchihna a neisah chiat hi;
Hu chiamchihna aha, gamsa min aha, ahihlouhleh a min nambar neite chih louh, mi koimah in a leitheih louh va, zuah zong a zuah theih louhna diingun.
Hi-ah pilna a kilang hi. Koipouh heetsiamna nei in gamsa nambar chu sim heh: ajiahchu hichu mihing nambar ahi; huleh a nambar chu za guup leh sawmguup leh guup ahi.
Huleh ka en a, ngai in, Belaamnou, Zion taanga diing leh, a tal va a Pa uh min kigial chiat nuai khat leh siing li leh saang lite chu ka mu a.
Huleh vaan apanin aw khat, tui tampi luang ging leh vaanging nasatah bang ka ja a; huleh tengtang tumte tengtang tumging bang ka ja hi.
Huleh amahun laltouphah ma leh, silhing lite leh upate ma ah la thah hileh kilawm a sa va; leitung apat a tatdoh hu nuai khat le siing li leh saang lite chih louh koima’n hu la chu a he thei sih hi.

Hite chu numei a kisubolhhoh loute ahi uh; nungaah siangthou bang ahihjiahun. Hite chu a chiahna phot a Belaamnou juitute ahi uh. Hite chu Pathian leh Belaamnou diing a gah masapen hi diing a mite laha kipana tatdoh ahi uhi.
Huleh a kam vah zuau thu a um sih a; Pathian laltouphah ma ah soisel bei in a um uhi.
Huleh angel dang khat, leitung a teeng nam chin, phung chin, haam chin leh michin kawma taangkoupih diing kumtuang tanchinpha neia vaanlaizawl a leeng ka mu a.
Aw ngaihtaha kikou in, Pathian lau unla, a kawmah loupina pia un; ajiahchu a vaihawmna hun ahung tungta hi; huleh amah vaan leh, lei leh, tui khang lian leh, tuinaahte bawltu chu bia un, a chi a.
Huleh angel dangkhat in a jui a, Hu khopi loupi, Babylon chu a chimta hi, a chimta hi, a mingaihhaatna lungthahna uain nam zousiah a dawnsah jiahin, chi'n.
Huin angel dang a thumna in amahuh a jui a, Mi koipouh in gamsa leh a lim a biah a, a tal aha, a khut aha a chiamchihna a neihleh,

Pathian lungthahna uain, a hehna noua bangmah toh hal louh kisung chu a dawn diing a; huleh angel siangthoute mitmuh leh Belaamnou mitmuh ah mei leh kaata suhnat in a um diing hi, chi'n aw ngaihtahin a kikou hi.
Huleh a suhnatna meikhu uh chu kumtuang kumtuang in a jamtou a; gamsa leh a lim bete leh, a mina chiamchihna nei photmahte’n chu suun leh janin khawldamna a mu sih uhi.
Hi ah Pathian thupiah juite leh, Jesu gingta misiangthoute kuhkalna a kilang hi.

Huleh vaan a kipan aw khat in ka kawmah, Gial in, Tu apat misi Lalpa a site chu a hampha uhi; Hagau in, Ahi, a tohgimnate uh khawlsana, a silbawlte un hung jui diing ahihjiahin, a chih hi, a chih ka ja hi.
Huleh ka en a, ngai in meilum vaamtah leh, hu meilum tunga mihing Tapa hileh kilawm, a lutunga sana lallukhuh khuh a, a khuta kawite hiam tawi chu ka mu a.

Huleh angel dangkhat Pathian biahinn apatin ahung pawt a, aw ngaihtaha kikou in meilum tunga toupa kawmah, Na kawite pan inla, aat in: nang diingin a aat hun a tungta hi; ajiahchu lei buhte a kuaita hi, a chi a.
Huchi'n hu meilum tunga toupa’n lei tungah a kawite a paaikheta a, lei buh chu aat in a umta hi.
Huleh angel dangkhat vaan a Pathian biahinn apatin ahung pawt a, ama’n zong kawite hiam a tawi a.

Huleh mei tunga thunei, angel dangkhat, maitaam apatin ahung pawt a, aw ngaihtaha kikou in kawite hiam tawipa kawmah, Na kawite pan inla, Lei grep gahbomte khawm in, ajiahchu grepte a min vehta hi, a chih a.
Huin angel in leitung ah a kawite a paahkheta a, lei grepte chu a khawm a, huleh buchu Pathian lungthahna uain suuhna ah a paahluutta hi,
Huleh uain suuhna chu khogei lamah keeng a chilin a um a, uain suuhna a kipan sisan chu sakol kamkhau tanpha in, farlong saang khat leh za guup sung ahung luang kheta hi.
Huin vaan ah chiamchihna loupi leh limdang, angel sagih, gawtna nunung sagih nei ka mu a; hu a Pathian lungthahna bukimta ahihjiahin gawtna nunung ahi uh.

Huleh mei toh kihal limlang tui khang lian hileh kilawm leh, gamsa tung leh, a lim tung leh, a chiamchihna tung leh, a min nambar tunga gualzohna tangte Pathian tengtang tawi a limlang tui khang lian tunga ding ka mu a.
Huleh amahun Pathian suaah Mosi leh Belaamnou la a sa va, Na silbawlte a loupi in a thumah hi, Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawlthei; na lampite chu a dih in a tah hi, nang misiangthoute Kumpipa,

Kua’n nang ahung lau louin, Aw, Lalpa, na min a paahtawi lou ngam diai? Ajiahchu nang chauh siangthou na hi; bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh nam zousiah chu ahung diing va, na ma ah ahung be diing uh; ajiahchu na vaihawmna dihte suhlat in a umta hi, chi'n.
Huleh hi silte nunga ka et leh, ngai in, vaan ah heetsahna biahbuuh pindan sungnung chu a kihong a;
Huleh angel sagihte chu gawtna sagihte tawi in, puan siangthou leh vaama kithuam in, huleh a awm uh sana kawnggaah a gaah in Pathian biahinn apatin ahung pawtdoh va.
Huleh silhing lite laha khat in hu angel sagihte kawmah kumtuang kumtuanga hing zing Pathian lungthahna a dim belhbu sagih a peta hi.

Huleh biahbuuh pindan sungnung chu Pathian loupina leh a silbawltheihna a hung kipan meikhuin a dimta a; huleh hu angel sagihte gawtna sagih chu a kizoh masiah in Pathian biahinn sungnungah koimah a luut theita sih uhi.
Huleh Pathian biahinn sung apatin aw ngaihtah khat in angel sagihte kawmah, Chiah unla, Pathian lungthahna belhbu sagihte chu leitung ah sungkhia un, a chih ka ja a.
Huchi'n angel khatna chu a chiah a, a belhbu leitung ah a sungkhia a; huleh gamsa chiamchihna neite leh, a lim betute tungah meima sia natah mei ahung suaahta hi.
Huleh angel nihna in a belhbu tui khang lian tungah a sungkhia a; huleh hichu misi sisan bangin ahung umta a; huleh tui khang lian a um hinna nei zousiah chu a sita uhi.
Huleh angel thumna in a belhbu luidungte leh tuikhuuhte ah a sungkhia a; hute chu sisan ahung suaahta hi.
Huleh tuite angel in, Aw, Lalpa, hichibanga vai na hawm jiahin, Nang um zing leh, umta leh, hung um diing chu na dihtat hi.
Ajiahchu amahun misiangthoute leh zawlneite sisan a na suah va, huleh nang in a dawn diingun sisan amahuh na peta hi; dawn taah mawng ahihjiahun, a chih ka ja a.
Huleh maitaam a kipan a dang khat in, Ahi, Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawlthei, na vaihawmte chu a dih in a dihtat hi, a chih ka ja hi.
Huleh angel lina in a belhbu chu ni tungah a sungkhia a; amah kawma chu mite meia haaigawp theihna piah ahi.
Huleh mite chu mei sataha haaigawp in a um va, huleh hi bawlgimna tunga thuneitu Pathian min a soisia va; huleh amah kawma loupina pe diingin a kisiih sih uhi.
Huleh angel ngaana in a belhbu chu gamsa touphah tungah a sungkhia a; huleh a lalgam chu ahung mial vehta a; huleh amahun na a sah jiahun a lei uh a petta uhi.
Huleh a natna uleh a meimate uh jiahin vaan Pathian chu a soisia va, a silbawlte uh a kisiih tuan sih uhi.
Huleh angel guupna in a belhbu chu Euphrates luipi ah a sungkhia a; huleh nisuaahna lama kumpipate diing a lampi bawl ahihtheihna diingin a tui chu a kang vehta hi.
Huleh ukeeng toh bang hagau bolhhoh thum, dragon kama kipan leh, gamsa kama kipan leh, zawlnei tahlou kama kipana hung pawt ka mu a.
Amahuh chu Bangkimbawlthei hu Pathian ni loupia kidouna a puikhawm diing a leitung pumpi kumpipate kawma chiahdoh, silmah bawl dawite hagau ahi uhi,
Ngai in, guta bangin ka hung hi. Kiging zing leh puan teengsa a um chu a hampha hi, huchilou inchu saguah in a vaah diing a, a zumhuaina a mukha diing uh.
Huleh amahuh chu mun khat, Hebrai haama Armageddon kichi ah a puikhawmta hi.
Huleh angel sagihna in a belhbu chu huihkhua ah a sungkhia a; huleh vaan a Pathian biahinn a kuanin, laltouphah akipanin aw ngaihtah ahung suaah a, Bawlzoh ahita, a chi a.
Huleh awte leh, vaangingte leh, kawlphete ahung um a; huleh zil nasatah a liing a, huchibang zilliing nasa leh loupi chu leitung a mihing um a kipat a umkha nai sih hi.
Huleh khopi loupi chu mun thum in a kikhen a, huleh namte khopihaw chu a chimta a; huleh a lungthahna uain nou chu a kawma piah diingin Babylon khopi loupi chu Pathian ma ah heetdoh in ahung umta hi.
Huleh tuikulh gam zousiah chu a taimangta a, taangte zong muh in a um nawnta sih hi.
Huleh gial nasatah mai, a tang khat talent khat tuha gih vaan apatin mite tungah a kia a; huleh mite’n hu giala suhgimna jiahin Pathian a soisia uh; ajiahchu hu suhgimna chu a huaise mahmah hi.
Huleh belhbu sagih tawi angel sagihte laha khat a hungdoh a, ahung kihoupih a, ka kawmah, Hilamah hung in; tui tampi tunga tou nohchizuahnu loupitah tung vaihawmna ka hung musah diing;
Lei a kumpipate’n amahnu a kingaihpih va, huleh a mingaihhaatna uain in leitung a teengte dawnkhamsah in a um uhi, a chih a.
Huleh ama’n kei chu hagau in gamdai ah ahung pomangta a; huleh numei khat, Pathian soisiatna mina dim, lutang sagih leh ki sawm nei gamsa sandup tunga tou ka mu a.
Huleh hu numei chu puan sandup leh sandaang in a kichei a, sana leh suang mantam leh tuikep suang in a kijem a, a mingaihhaatna kihdah um leh bolhhohna a dim sana nou chu a khut in a tawi hi.
Huleh a tal ah min khat thuguuh kiphual, Babylon loupi, nohchizuahte leh leitunga kihdahhuaite nu, chih a kigial hi.
Huleh hu numei chu misiangthoute sisan leh, Jesu martarte sisan dawnkham in ka mu a; huleh amahnu ka muh tahin limdang leh thumah ka sa mahmah hi.
Huleh angel in ka kawmah, Bang diinga thumah sa na hiai? hu numei leh a tuanna, lutang sagih leh ki sawm nei gamsa thuguuh ka hung hilh diing hi.

Hu na gamsa muh chu a umta a, huleh a um sih a, huleh kokhuuh tobei apat ahung pawtkhe diing a, manthaina ah a pailuut diing hi; huleh khovel siam chih apata hinna lehkhabu a, a min uh kigial lou leitung a teengte’n hu gamsa um lou leh, umta leh, hung um diing chu a muh chiangun limdang a sa diing uhi.
Hi ah pilna lungsim a um hi. Lutang sagihte chu numeinu touna taang sagihte ahi uhi.
Huleh kumpipa sagih a um a; ngaa chu a puuhta a, khat a um a, huleh khat chu ahung tung nai tadih sih; ahung hun chiangin tomtakhat sung a um diing hi.
Huleh hu gamsa umta a, huleh um lou chu, amah ngei chu giatna ahi a, huleh sagihte laha ahi, huleh manthaina ah a chiah hi.
Huleh hu ki sawm na muhte chu kumpipa sawmte, lalgam mu nai tadihloute ahi uhi; hizongleh amahun gamsa toh pungkal khat sung kumpipate banga thuneihna a nei uhi.
Hite’n chu lungsim munkhat a pua va, huleh gamsa kawmah a thuneihna uleh a haatna uh a pe diing uhi.

Hite’n chu Belaamnou a kidoupih diing va, Belaamnou in amahuh a zou diing hi; ajiahchu amah hi lalpate Lalpa leh kumpipate Kumpipa ahi; huleh amah toh umte chu kouhte, teelte, huleh ginumte ahi uhi, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, Nohchizuahnu touna, na tui muhte chu mite leh, mipite leh, namte leh haamte ahi uhi.
Huleh gamsa tunga ki sawm na muh haw, hite’n chu nohchizuahnu a haw diing va, ta vai leh saguah in a bawl diing va, a sa a ne diing uh, huleh meiin a haalmang diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian thute suhtaangtung a, a um masiah amah deihzawng a bawl theihna diing uleh, a lalgam uh gamsa kawma a piah theihna diing uh Pathian in a lungtang vah a koihta hi.
Huleh hu na numei muh chu hu khopi loupi, leitung a kumpipate tunga vaihawmtu chu ahi, a chi a.
Huleh hi silte nungin angel dangkhat silbawltheihna loupitah neia vaan apat hungsuh ka mu a; a loupina in lei a taan vaahta hi.

Huleh amah chu aw ngaihtahin, naahpitahin a kikou a, Babylon khopi loupi chu a chimta hi, a chimta hi, dawite umna leh, hagau bolhhoh chinteng kulh leh, va sianglou leh kihdahum chinteng bawm ahung hita hi.
Ajiahchu nam zousiah in a kingaihhaatna lungthahna uain chu a dawnta va, huleh leitung a kumpipate’n amah a kingaihpih va, amah noptatluatna jalin leia sumkawlveite a hausa gawpta uhi, a chi a.
Huleh vaan apat aw dangkhat ka ja a, Ka mite haw, a sualnate a na tel louh na diingun leh, amahnu toh na thuaahkhawm louhna diingun amah apat hung pawt un.
Ajiahchu a sualnate’n vaan a suta a, huleh a giitlouhnate Pathian in a he zing ahi.
Ama’n ahung piah bang ngei in amah pia unla, a silbawl bangjelin a kawmah a lehnih in thuh un; a nou sundimah amah diingin a lehnih in sundimsah un,
A kiloupisahdan leh, a noptatdan bangjel in bawlgim unla, sulungkham un; ajiahchu ama’n a lungtang in, Kumpinu in ka tou a, meithai ka hi sih, ka lungkham ngei sih diing, a chi hi.
Hujiahin ni khat thuin amah gawtna, sihna leh, lungngaihna leh kialna ahung tung diing a; amahnu chu mei in a kaangtum diing hi; ajiahchu a tunga vaihawmtu Lalpa Pathian chu a haat ahi, a chi a.
Huleh leitung a kumpipate, amah na kingaihpiha, amah toh nuamtaha na umte’n, amahnu kaatna meikhu a muh chiangun a kah diing va,
Amahnu kibawlgimna lau jiaha gamlapi a ding in, Tamaide, tamaide, Babylon khopi loupi, khopi kip, pungkal khat sunga na tungvaihawmna ahung tun taah mei! a chi diing uhi.
Huleh leia sumkawlveite’n amahnu kahin a suun diing uh; mi koima’n a thuampua uh a lei nawn louh diing jiahin.

Hu thuampote chu sanate, dangkate, suang mantamte, tuikep suang te, puanmalngaatte, puan sandupte, puannemte, puan sandaangte, sing gimtui chintengte, saiha a kibawl beel chituam zousiahte, sing mantampente, sumengte, siihte, suang kaang beel chi tuamtuam zousiahte;
Huleh singthaalte, sil gimtuite, sathaumante, begawte, uainte, taangbuangte, gehute, gante, belaamte, sakolte, kaangtalaite, suaahte, huleh mite hinnate bang ahi.
Huleh silgah na lunggulhte’n nang ahung nuseta va, sil tuituaah leh hoih zousiah in nang ahung paimangsanta hi; hitehaw chu na mu kiit nawn hial sih diing hi.
Hi siltea sumkawlveite, amahnu jiaha hung hausate chu, amahnu kibawlgimna lau jiahin gamlapi a diingin, kap in a suun diing va.
Huleh, Tamaide, tamaide, hu khopi loupi, puanmalngaat leh, puan sandup leh, puan sandaang silh a, huleh sana leh suang mantam leh tuikep suang a kijem chu!

Ajiahchu pungkal khat sung chauh in hibanga hauhsatna loupi bangmahlou ahung suaahta, chi'n. Huleh kuang pu photmah leh, kuang a tuanghaw zousiah leh, kuang mite leh, tui khang liana sumkawlvei photmah chu gamlapi ah a ding va.
A kaatna meikhu a muh un a kikoukhia va, hi khopi loupi tobang khopi khoiah a um ei? a chi uhi.

Huleh amahun a lutung va leivui kitheh in a kikou va, kap leh maupum in, Tamaide, tamaide, amah manphatna jiaha tui khang liana kuang neite zousiah suhhauhsat a umna khopi chu! pungkal khat sungin suhsiat ahung hita hi.
Nang vaan leh, nanguh sawlleh siangthoute leh, zawlneite, amahnu tungah nuam un; ajiahchu Pathian in na phuba uh a tungah ahung laahsahta hi, chi'n.

Huleh angel haattah khat in buhgawina suang liantah tobang suang khat a la a, tui khang lian ah a paailuut a, Hichibanga naahpitahin Babylon khopi loupi chu paihkhiah ahi diing a, muh kiit in a um nawn het sih diing hi.

Huleh tengtang tumte tumging bang, la siamte la sah ging bang, gosem muutte muut ging leh pengkuul muutte ging bang na sungah a kija nawn het sih diing hi. Khutsiammi, banglam pouha khutsiam mawngmawng na sungah a kimu nawn sih diing a; huleh buhheehna gin mawngmawng zong a kija nawn sih diing hi.

Huleh thaumei vaah zong na sungah a taang nawn het sih diing a; mou leh mouneitu aw zong a kija nawn het sih diing hi; ajiahchu na sumkawlveitute hi leitung a miliante ahi va; na bumsiamna a nam zousiah heem a a umtaah jiahun;
Huleh a sung a’chu zawlneite leh misiangthoute leh, leitung a thah a um zousiahte sisan muh in a umta hi, a chi hi.
Hi silte nungin vaan ah mipi tampi aw ngaihtah ka ja a, Hallelujah; hutdamna leh, loupina zahumna leh silbawltheihna chu Lalpa i Pathian u’a ahi;

Bang jiahin ahiai i chih leh a vaihawmnate chu a thutah in a dihtat ahi; ajiahchu ama’n nohchizuahnu loupitah, a mingaihhaatna jiaha leitung suthanghuainu chu vai a hawmkhumta a, huleh a suaahte sisan phuba chu a tungah a laahsahta hi, chi'n.
Huleh amahun, Hallelujah, a chi kiit va. Huleh amahnu haalna meikhu chu kumtuang kumtuang in a jamtouta hi.
Huin upa sawmnih leh lite leh, silhing lite chu a khupboh in a puuh va, Amen; Hallelujah, chi'n laltouphah tunga toupa Pathian chu a beta uhi.
Huin laltouphah a kuanin aw khat ahung gingdoh a, Nanguh a suaahte zousiah leh, nanguh amah lau, a neu a lianin i Pathian u’chu paahtawi un, chi'n.
Huin mipi tamtah awging bang, tui tamtah luang ging bang leh, vaanpi ging nasatah tobang ka jata a, Hallelujah; ajiahchu Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawlthei lal in a tou hi.
Kipaahin i nuam diing uh, huleh a kawmah paahtawina i pe diing uh; ajiahchu Belaamnou ji neih hun ahung tungta a, a ji zong a kisa zoudiamta hi.
Huleh amahnu chu puan malngaat siangthou leh vaama a kijep diing phal ahi a; hu puan malngaat chu misiangthoute dihtatna ahi, chi'n.
Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, Gial in, Belaamnou ji neihna ankuang uum diing a kouhte chu a hampha uhi, a chi a. Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, Hite chu Pathian thu dihtahte ahi, a chi a.

Huleh amah be diingin a keengbulah ka puuh a. Huin ama’n ka kawmah, Hung be hial sin; kei chu na suaah tanpih leh Jesu heetpihna thu nei, na unaute laha ka hi; Pathian bia in; ajiahchu Jesu heetpihna chu thusoitheihna hagau ahi, a chi hi.
Huin vaan kihong ka mu a, huleh ngai in, sakol kaang khat leh a tunga tuangpa, a min Ginum leh, Thutah kichi ka mu a; huleh ama’n dihtatna in vai a hawm a, huleh gaal a bawl hi.
A mitte chu mei kuang tobang ahi a, a lutungah lallukhuh tampi a um hi; huleh amah loungal koimah heettheih louh min kigial a nei hi.
Huleh amah chu sisan a kidiah puan in a kithuam a, huleh a min chu Pathian Thu a kichi hi.
Huleh vaan a um sepaih honin puan malngaat vaam leh siangthou a kithuamin sakol kaang tunga touin amah a jui va.

Huleh namte a thah na diingin a kam apatin namsaau hiamtah a pawtdoh hi; huleh ama’n amahuh chu siih chiangin vai a hawmkhum diing a; Bangkimbawlthei Pathian lauhuaina leh lungthahna uain suuhna chu a tuanchilta hi.
Huleh ama’n a puan tung leh a malpi tungah KUMPIPATE KUMPIPA, LALPATE LALPA chia kigial min a nei hi.
Huleh angel khat ni a ding ka mu a; huleh amah chu aw ngaihtaha kikou in, vaan laizawla leeng vate kawmah, Hung unla, Pathian ankuang luina loupitah ah hung kikhawm un;
Kumpipate sa, sepaih houtute sa, mihaatte sa, sakolte sa leh a tungva tuangte sa, huleh mi zousiah, zalen leh saltaang, a neu leh a lian sa na neeh theihna diingun, a chi a.
Huin hu gamsa leh, leitung kumpipate leh, a sepaihhon u’chu hu sakol tunga tuangpa leh a sepaihte toh kidou diinga a kipunkhawm uh ka mu a.

Huleh gamsa chu matin a umta a, huleh zawlnei tahlou, gamsa chiamchihna neite leh, a lim bete a heemna a, a ma a silmah bawltu zong amah toh matkhawm in a umta a; hite geel chu a nihun kaat a kaang mei diilaha hinga paihluut in a umta uhi.
Huleh a mawh teng chu sakol tunga tuangpa namsaau, a kama hung pawtdoh khu in thah in a umta va; huleh amahuh sa in tungleeng va zousiah a gilvahta uhi.
Huleh angel khat vaan a kipana hung kumsuh, a khuta kokhuuh tobei chabi leh khainiang golpi tawi ka mu a.
Huleh ama’n hu guulpi teeh dragon, Diabol leh Setan chu a man a, kum saang khat sung diingin a kaanta a.
Huleh kum saang khat a chin masiah a namte a heem kiit louhna diingin kokhuuh tobeiah a paailuut a, a khaahkhum a, a siindetta hi; huzoh chiangin amah chu tomkhat sung hahkhiah ahi diing hi.

Huleh laltouphahte leh a tunga pute ka mu a, a kawmvah vaihawmna piah ahi a; huleh Jesu thu heetpihna jiah leh, Pathian thu jiaha a lu uh tana um, gamsa leh a lim be ngeilou a, a tal uh aha, a khut uh aha a zong meelchihna nei ngeiloute hagau haw ka mu a; amahuh chu ahung hing va, Khrist toh kum saang khat vai a hawmta uhi.
Hizongleh misi dangte chu kum saang khat a bei masiah a hing kiit sih uhi. Hichu thohkiitna masapen ahi.
Thohkiitna masapena telte chu a hampha uhi; hute tungah sih nihna in thu a nei sih a, hizongleh amahuh chu Pathian leh Khrist siampute ahi diing va, amah toh kum saang khat vai a hawm diing uhi.
Huleh hu kum saang khat a bei chiangin Setan chu a taanna apat hahkhiah in a um diing a.
Huleh leitung ning li a um namte, Gog leh Magog chu heema kidouna a puikhawm diingin a chiahdoh diing hi; a tamlam u’chu tui khang lian piauneel bang ahi uh.
Huleh amahuh chu lei vailam daap in a chiahtou va, misiangthoute giahbuuh leh, khopi deih um chu a hualkhumta uhi; huin Pathian a kuanin vaan apat mei ahung kesuh a, amahuh a kaangtumta hi.
Huleh amahuh heemtu diabol chu, gamsa leh zawlnei tahlou umna, mei leh kaat diila paihluut in a umta a, kumtuang kumtuang in suun leh janin suhnat in a um diing hi.
Huleh laltouphah ngou loupitah leh a tunga toupa, a ma apata lei leh vaan a taimangnapa chu ka mu a; amahuh diingin mun mawngmawng muh in a umta sih hi.

Huleh misite, a lian, a neu, Pathian ma a diing ka mu a; huleh lehkhabute a kihong a; huleh lehkhabu dang, hinna lehkhabu zong a kihong a; huleh misite chu hu lehkhabute a kigial bangin a natoh dungjuiun vaihawmsah in a umta uhi.
Tui khang lian in a sunga misi umte ahung pawtsahta a; huleh sihna leh misikhua in a sunga misi umte ahung pedohta uh; huleh amahuh chu michin a silbawlte uh dungjuia vaihawmsah in a umta uhi.
Huleh sihna leh misikhua chu mei diil a paihluut in a umta uh. Hichu sih nihna ahi.
Huleh koipouh hinna lehkhabua kigial kimu lou photmah chu mei diil ah paihluut in a umta uhi.
Huin ke’n vaan thah leh lei thah ka mu a; ajiahchu vaan masa leh lei masa chu a paimangta a; tui khang lian zong a um nawn sih hi.
Huleh kei John in khopi siangthou, Jerusalem thah chu, mou a pasal a diing a kichei banga bawlzohsa a Pathian a kuana vaan apata hung kumsuh chu ka mu hi.

Huleh vaan akipan aw ngaihtah khat in, Ngai in, Pathian biahbuuh chu mihingte lahah a umta hi, amah chu a lahvah a teeng diing a, amahuh chu a mite ahi diing va, Pathian amah ngei a kawmvah a um diing a, huleh a Pathian uh ahi diing hi.

Huleh Pathian in a mit vapat mittui zousiah a siaah siangsah diing hi; huleh sihna a um nawn sih diing a, lungkhamna leh, kahna leh, natna zong a um nawn sih diing hi; ajiahchu sil masate teng a paimangta hi, a chih ka ja hi.
Huleh laltouphah tunga toupa’n, Ngai in, sil zousiah ka siam thah hi, a chi a. Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, Gial in; ajiahchu hi thute hi a dih in a ginum ahi, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, bawl zoh ahita. Kei Alpha leh Omega, abul leh atawp ka hi. Dangtaah photmah kawmah hinna tui luikhuuh a, a thawn in ka pe diing hi.
A gualzoutu in chu sil zousiah a luah diing a; huleh a Pathian ka hi diing a, amah zong ka ta ahi diing hi.

Hizongleh meidawite leh, gingtaloute leh, kihdahumte leh, tualthatte leh, tohuuhte leh, bumhaatte leh, milimbete leh, zuau haatte zousiah tan diing chu mei leh kaat a kaang diil ahi a; huchu sih nihna ahi.
Huleh gawtna sagih nunungpen a dim belhbu sagih tawi angel sagihte laha khat ka kawmah a hung a, ahung houpih a, Hilamah hung in, mou, Belaamnou ji chu ka hung ensah diing hi, a chih a.
Huin ama’n hagau in taang saang liantah tungah ahung puita a, huleh hu khopi loupitah, Jerusalem siangthou, Pathian a kuana vaan apata hung kumsuh chu ahung ensah a.
Pathian loupina a nei a; a vaah chu suang mantampen bang, jasper suang bang ahi a, Khristal suang tobang a val ahi.
Huleh kulhbaang nasatah leh saangtah a nei a, kot sawmlenih a nei a, huleh hu kotte ah chu angel sawmlenih a um hi, huleh hu kotte tungah min kigial a um a, hute chu Israel nam sawmlenihte min ahi.
Suahlam ah kot thum; maallam ah kot thum; simlam ah kot thum; huleh tumlam ah kot thum a um hi.
Huleh khopi kulbaang in innbulphuh sawmlenih a nei a, huleh hute tungah Belaamnou sawlleh sawmlenihte min a tuang hi.
Huleh amah kei hung houpihpa’n, hu khopi leh, a kotte leh, a kulhbaang tehna diingin tehna sana chiang a tawi a.

Huleh a khopi chu ning li kibang nei in a um a, a dunglam chu a vailam chia ahi a; huleh ama’n hu chiangin khopi chu a teh a, farlong siing khat leh saang nih; A dunglam leh a vailam leh a saanlam a kibang hi.
Huleh ama’n kulhbaang chu a teh a, mihing tehna a tehin, (huchu angel tehna ahi a) tong zakhat leh tong sawmli leh tong li ahi.
Huleh a kulhbaang chu jasper suang a kibawl ahi a; a khopi chu sana sianga kibawl limlang bang mai ahi;

Huleh khopi kulhbaang innbulphuh chu suang mantam chi chintenga jep ahi. Huleh a innbulphuh masapen chu jasper suang ahi a; a nihna chu sapphire suang ahi a; a thumna chu kalsidoni suang ahi a; a lina chu emerald suang ahi a;

A ngaana chu sardonix suang ahi a; a guupna chu sardia suang ahi a; a sagihna chu krisolit suang ahi a; a giatna chu beril suang ahi a; a kuaahna chu topaz suang ahi a; a sawmna chu krisopra sa suang ahi a; a sawmlekhatna chu jasinth suang ahi a; a sawmlenihna chu amethist suang ahi.
Huleh a kot sawmlenihte chu tuikep suang sawmlenih ahi a; a kot chin chu tuikep suang khata bawl ahi; huleh khopi kotzing chu sana a bawl, limlang etpailet theih bang ahi.
Huleh huah chu biahinn mawngmawng ka mu sih hi; ajiahchu Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawlthei leh Belaamnou chu a biahinn ahi mai uhi.
Huleh hu khopi inchu a taanvaah diingin ni a ngai sih a, ha zong a ngai sih hi; ajiahchu Pathian loupina in hichu a taanvaah a, huleh Belaamnou chu a thaumei ahi mai hi.
Huleh hutdama um namte chu hu vaah ah a leeng diing va, leitung a kumpipate’n a loupina uleh a zahumna uh a poluut diing uhi.
Huleh a kotte chu suun in a kikhaah ngei het sih diing; ajiahchu hu munah jan a um sih diing hi.
Huleh amahun hu sungah namte loupina leh zahumna ahung poluut diing uhi.
Huleh hu sung a’chu bangchihmahin silbolhhoh leh, kihdahhuai bawl leh, zuau bawl himhim a luut sih diing a; hizongleh Belaamnou hinna lehkhabu a min tuangte chauh a luut diing uhi.
Huin ama’n hinna tui lui chiimtah, Khristal suang banga val, Pathian leh Belaamnou laltouphah apata hung pawtkhia ahung ensah a.
Hu khopi kotzing lailung leh a luipang tuaah ah gah chi tuamtuam sawmlenih nei, huleh ha china gah, hinna singkung a um a; huleh hu sing nah chu namte suhdamna diing ahi.
Huleh hu ah haamsia mawngmawng a um nawn sih diing a; hizongleh Pathian leh Belaamnou laltouphah a um zawta diing hi; huleh a suaahte’n ana a tohsah diing uhi.
Huleh amahun a meel a mu diing va; a min chu a tal vah a tuang diing hi;

Huleh huah jan a um nawn sih diing a; thaumei vaah leh ni vaah zong a ngai nawn sih diing uh; ajiahchu Lalpa Pathian in amahuh a taan vaah diing a; huleh amahun kumtuang kumtuang in vai a hawm diing uhi.
Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, hi thute hi a ginum in a dih ahi, huleh zawlnei siangthou Lalpa Pathian in sil kibawlpah diingte chu a suaahte musah diingin a angel a sawlta hi.
Ngai in, kintahin ka hungpah ngei diing hi; hi lehkhabu a soilawhna thute jui photmah chu a hampha hi, a chi a.
Huleh kei John in hi silte ka mu a, ka ja hi. Huleh ka jaha ka muh tahin hi silte hung musahtu angel keeng bulah be diingin ka puuhta a.
Huin ama’n ka kawmah En in, hibang bawl hial sin; kei chu nang leh, na unau zawlneite leh, hi lehkhabua thu kisoite juihaw suaah tanpih ka hi; Pathian bia in, a chi a.
Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, hi lehkhabua soilawhna thute khaahkhum sin; ajiahchu ahun tung diing ahita hi.
Mi dihlou chu dihlou in um nalai heh, mi bolhhoh chu bolhhoh in um nalai heh; huleh mi dihtat chu dihtat in um nalai heh, mi siangthou chu siangthou in um nalai heh.
Ngai in, kintahin ka hung hi; huleh michin a silbawl bang jel a piah diing ka kipaahman ka kawmah a um hi.
Kei Alpha leh Omega, a patna leh a tawpna, a masapen leh a nunungpen ka hi.
Hinna singkunga tan a neih theihna diing uleh, kota khopi sunga a luut theihna diing va a puansilhte uh sawpsiangte chu a hampha uhi.
Ajiahchu polamah uite, bumhaatte, tohuuhte, tualthatte, milem bete, huleh koipouh zuau ngaina leh bawlte a um uhi.
Kei Jesu in kouhtuamte diinga hi thute na kawma hung hesah diingin ka angel ka hung sawl hi. Kei David zungpi leh a haah, huleh jingsol aahsi taang chu ka hi, a chi a.
Huleh Hagau leh mou in, Hung in, a chi uhi. Huleh a ja taphot in, Hung in, chi heh. Huleh koipouh a dangtaah chu hung heh. Huleh a ut taphot in hinna tui a thawnin la heh.
Ajiahchu koipouh hi lehkhabu a soilawhna thute ja taphot kawmah ka hesah hi, Mi koipouh in hi thute a behlap inchu, Pathian in hi, lehkhabu a kigial gawtnate a tungah a behlap diing hi.
Huleh mi koipouh in hi soilawhna lehkhabu thute apat a laahmang inchu hinna singkung leh, khopi siangthou leh, hi lehkhabua kigial silte apat a tan diing chu Pathian in a laahmangsah diing hi.
Hi thute hesahtu in, Ka hungpah ngei diing hi, a chi hi. Amen. Huchi hi heh, hungta in, Lalpa Jesu.
I Lalpa Jesu Khrist hehpihna chu na bawnva kawmah umta hen. Amen.
